MAR 7:9 Man iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ema li dzɛ yi ofɛ nkpa ema okye abɔ byikɛ ele kye ola mgbi Imgbasho ngwuta yɛ kyɛdɔ otsootso mgbi ema!
MAR 7:10 Lubana iMose gbɛɛ: <Nu otsabu yi onabu mmwɛ,> ma <Ali inggisɛ ndi fya otsɔn hona onɔn ito yɔ, nu ma ngwɔn kyɛmɛ.>
MAR 7:11 Nghaduu ema li gbɛɛ li ayin ni inggisɛ nya ama omba ma gbɛɛ, <Gyen aba, n ka yagba tobyi ema ba. Ikyesinɛ n tsekise zondu okye ungwɔ ngwi ani kika kye nu ema ma, nu Imgbasho,
MAR 7:12 nghanɛ ema li non kyɔ unkonyi kpaa mi ikye otsɔn naadi onɔn wuba.
MAR 7:13 Ikyenghanɛ ema kye ngwɔlu elodzɛ Imgbasho mi aletɔ mgbi ema ngwi ema gbeto emidema esɛ nani. Ema di li kyungwɔ kwuba itɔ nani.>>
MAR 7:14 IYesu diyɛ kwu ibyi inggisɛ ela ba mbon di gbɛɛ, <<Ema duu gadɔ mbi ani, di difwi ungwɔnɛ na.
MAR 7:15 Nkonyi nka kaka mbi inggisɛ se ka non tsiidza dzɛma ba. Kpaa li ungwɔ ama ntɔ mbi inggisɛ ba esɛ mani. Li ama li non tsiidza aali.>>
MAR 7:16 (Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ non fwo.)
MAR 7:17 Mi onɔ ngwi o dzita ibyi inggisɛ lu ka kaka ozu nɛ, engwafɔɔn byun ita odzɛ mi utsa nɛni.
MAR 7:18 IYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Ema yama difwi odzɛ ani le gbɔ nɛ walo? Ema ye saan dafi ungwogye ngwi abu kyi gye lu ifu ka nu abu <tsiidza> ba lo?
MAR 7:19 Lubana li lu itukwu mgban ba kpaa li lu ifu, di li yidɔ tɔ mi ewo mgban luba esɛ.>> (Mi odzɛ ngwi iYesu gbɔ nɛ, o tso gbɛɛ ali ungwogye duu <<Mɛ ngwi a ka gye.>>)
MAR 7:20 O kiyayi gbɛɛ: <<Li ungwɔ ntɔ mbi inggisɛ ma li non <tsiidza aali.>
MAR 7:21 Lubana li mi itukwu mgbi inggisɛ mi idzidzɛ, li ba yi ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ ibwubwe, amah-ibwubwe, mmyi, inggisɛ ongwɔɔngwɔ, amah,
MAR 7:22 nggwɔ, okye inggisɛ wo itukwu, okpagyewo, imina mgbi ali ibwubwe, odi tanyi, agya, ohaha bɛyi ikwangha.
MAR 7:23 Ungwɔ ibwubwe ntonɛ duu li mi itukwu ngwi a li tɔ di li nu inggisɛ <yɛɛ kpɛkpɛ aali.> >>
MAR 7:24 IYesu lu dzata imbe nani yɛ lu ewo igeli iTiru. O kaka ozu kpaa i minan gbɛɛ inggisɛ onyi no ka ye ba; nghaduu kpaa o yagba kye ewon da ba.
MAR 7:25 Dafi ongyaa ngwu ongwan dzɛ yi onodzi ibwubwe ka fwo odzɛ mgban nɛ, o ba wa gbɛsɛ lankɛ iyayi.
MAR 7:26 Ongyaa na li iGriki, a mban mi ayɛsɛ iSiafonishia mi iSiria. O tɛkyɛ nu iYesu gbɛɛ non lɔlu emɛsɛ na tɔ mbi ongwan ongwu ongyaa.
MAR 7:27 Nghaduu iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ababɔ ni ɛngbɛ nu ma gye ungwogye dafi a mina duuse, lubana li ayin ba okye ungwogye ndzɛ mi ikye ɛngbɛ ngwuta nu obwe.>>
MAR 7:28 Ongyaa na nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, Otsɛ iYesu, obwe ama nlato ifo adinyatsɛ ogye ungwogye mgbi ɛngbɛ kpaa, li gye ambulu ama nngwuta mani.>>
MAR 7:29 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Mi itɔ uka ngwi abu nu ani nɛ, yɛ lu udɛ abu; emɛsɛ na dzita ongwabu ongwi ongyaa na wa.>>
MAR 7:30 O lu udɛ ta o ka di ongwan ladzɛ akwulo, dafi emɛsɛ na teyi tɔ mbon lu wa.
MAR 7:31 Ta iYesu dzata ewo igeli iTiru yɛ nyɛ iSidon, lu utɔ iGalalia tɔ lu ayɛsɛ mgbi iDekapoli, igeli iwyo ntonani.
MAR 7:32 Inggisɛ angbeka kye inggisɛ nkyadɔ di li fyonmfye ogbɔdzɛ ba mbon, si tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ no kye abɔ gbon ewo.
MAR 7:33 Nghanɛ o kyon lu enggengga, dzata ibyi inggisɛ ntonani, iYesu gbe ongwufabɔ wonkɛ adɔ. Man o kyanggwɔ tokɛ ongwufabɔ di kye bɛ inggisɛ na mi idɛ.
MAR 7:34 Ta iYesu ndinɛ kɛ esho diyɛ sandu man o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Efata!>> (Itan gbɛɛ, <<kwulu!>>).
MAR 7:35 Mi ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ nɛ, adɔ mgbi inggisɛ na kwulu, idɛ mgban di shɛta ta o wita ogbɔdzɛ tɔ saan.
MAR 7:36 IYesu kwo ma adɔ gbɛɛ nu ma ka nya inggisɛ onyi ba. Nghaduu ngwi o le kwunewo okwo ma adɔ nɛ, a nghao le kiyayi ogbɔdzɛ mi ele.
MAR 7:37 Nɛ ama duu ungwɔ okwulewo na kyi gbɛlu ma sɔ. A gbɔgbɛɛ, <<O kyɔ alungwɔ duu saan, o nu ama okyadɔ fwo di nu emi ikplima gbɔdzɛ.>>
MAR 8:1 Mi egbe ntona ibyi inggisɛ angbeka di kwakye. Dafi a dzɛ yi unkonyi kpaa ngwi a ka gye ba nɛ, IYesu kwu engwafɔɔn ela ba mbon si nya ma gbɛɛ,
MAR 8:2 <<Elela kyɔ ani wo inggisɛ ntonɛni; a to yi ani mmɛnɛ egbe eta waani, ma a dzɛ yi unkonyi ogyeegye ba.
MAR 8:3 Kini ani nu ma ofɛ gbɛɛ nu ma lu udɛ yi enbwa ifu yɔ, a ka kwanadza mi ofɛ, ikyesinɛ angbeka kyɛ imbe otunto.>>
MAR 8:4 Emi ongwafɔɔn byun gbɛɛ, <<Nghanɛ li mi ole mi ifoshɛ nɛ ngwi inggisɛ ka tu ibredi mɛ obyi ma enbwa?>>
MAR 8:5 IYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ibredi eminɛ ngwi ema dzɛyan?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Egyafa.>>
MAR 8:6 O nya ibyi inggisɛ ntona gbɛɛ nu ma sisɛ mi ombulu. Ngwi o kye gbɛlu ibredi egyafa ntona di ta Imgbasho angba nɛ, o kye mwalu gbe nu engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ nu ma gha ibyi inggisɛ ntonani, a si kyɔ ngha.
MAR 8:7 A di dzɛ yi engwɛ abatsa kpaa gwee, iYesu di ta Imgbasho angba mi engwɛ abatsa ntonani di nya engwafɔɔn nu ma kye gha ma.
MAR 8:8 Inggisɛ ntona gye di tolo. Ngwi a gye nyɛ nɛ, engwafɔɔn kye salu ambulu ama nsisi ma mbwo uya egyafa.
MAR 8:9 Inggisɛ mɛ dafi idubu enɛ to mi onɔ nani. Ngwi iYesu nu ma ofɛ nu ma lu nɛta,
MAR 8:10 o kaka uwaa yi engwafɔɔn lu ayɛsɛ iDamanuta.
MAR 8:11 Emi iFarasi ba mbi iYesu wa wita obyun ita. Ikye ombadin, a pita ambɛ ongwi esho mbon.
MAR 8:12 O sandu lu byulu si gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi etɔ nɛ le mina ambɛ okwulewo? Otsitsi ani le nya ema, ambɛ onyi kpaa a ka kye nu ma ba.>>
MAR 8:13 Ta iYesu lu dzamata, yidɔ lu ka kaka uwaa si foyombo utɔ na lu agya oka.
MAR 8:14 Engwafɔ iYesu gblimɔ okye ibredi byi, sede li onyi ongwi a kyɛ yan mi uwaa mata.
MAR 8:15 IYesu kwo ma adɔ gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛwɛbyi ewema na. Gbinɛbyi okwuna mgbi emi iFarasi bɛyi mgbi iHerude nani.>>
MAR 8:16 A kponya odzɛ nɛ yi ewoma si gbɛɛ, <<Li ikyegbɛɛ eyi dzɛ yi ibredi ba mani.>>
MAR 8:17 IYesu difwi odzɛ ngwi a tole gbɔ yi ewoma nɛ, o byi ma gbɛɛ: <<Kyɔsinɛse ngwi ema le gbɔdzɛ gbɛɛ ema dzɛ yi ibredi ba? Ema kale dinɛ ba naa kale gbosa lo ema ba maa? Itukwu mgbi ema tiishuu?
MAR 8:18 Ema dzɛ yi inɛ kpaa li yagba di lo, di dzɛ yi adɔ kpaa li yagba ofwo lo? Ema wɛ wulo?
MAR 8:19 Mi onɔ ngwi ani gha ibredi nghi eda mi ikye inggisɛ idubu eda ma, ema gbe ambulu mbwo uya eminɛ?>> A nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Iwyodefa.>>
MAR 8:20 <<Ngwi ani di gha ibredi nghi egyafa mi ikye inggisɛ idubu enɛ ma, li uya eminɛ ngwi ema gbe ambulu mbweele?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Egyafa.>>
MAR 8:21 IYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Kale gbosa lo ema ba maa?>>
MAR 8:22 A ba iBɛtsaida, man inggisɛ angbeka kye ongyulɔ obinɛ ba wa tɛkyɛ nu iYesu gbɛɛ no kye abɔ gbon.
MAR 8:23 O byi ongyulɔ obinɛ na abɔ di kyon tasɛ dzata ogalu. Ngwi o kyanggwɔ kyin inɛ di kye abɔ ban nɛ, iYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu di ungwɔɔ?>>
MAR 8:24 Obinɛ na ndinɛ kɛ esho si gbɛɛ, <<Ani di ibyi inggisɛ, a to dafi ekwɔ mani le kyikyɛ kpatsɛ.>>
MAR 8:25 IYesu diyɛ kye abɔ gbon inɛ. Ta inɛ mgban kwulu, inɛ mgban yɛ, man o di alungwɔ duu saan.
MAR 8:26 Nɛ iYesu won ofɛ lu udɛ, di won ola gbɛɛ, <<Ka yɛ kɛ ogalu na wuba.>>
MAR 8:27 IYesu yi engwafɔɔn lu kaka agwɔ ama nto kwɛkwɛ yi iSisiria iFyilipi. Mi ofɛ ma o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ li kwu ani di emɛ?>>
MAR 8:28 A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Angbeka li gbɛɛ iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima, angbeka gbɛɛ Elaija; angbeka yɔ li gbɛɛ, onyi mi idzidzɛ ama ogbɛɛsɛ.>>
MAR 8:29 Nɛ o byita gbɛɛ, <<Nghanɛ ema ma! Ema li kwu ani di emɛ?>> IPyita nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Abu li iKrestu mani.>>
MAR 8:30 IYesu kwo ma adɔ gbɛɛ nu ma ka nya inggisɛ onyi odzɛ mgbi ongwu ba.
MAR 8:31 Ta iYesu wita otso emi ongwafɔɔn gbɛɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka gyadzɛ ungwɔ kwuba kyɛmɛ, engyukwo dika fwan, engyukwo ama ofifɛ, bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose. A ka ngwɔn mi egbe ongwu ta o dika kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
MAR 8:32 O gbɔdzɛ nɛ mi ododa yi engwafɔɔn, man iPyita kyen lu enggengga sika wita okyɔkyɔ yan.
MAR 8:33 Kpaa ngwi iYesu kyata inɛ di engwafɔɔn nɛ, o fwa yi iPyita. O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kwlekɛ mmɛnɛni iSatan! Abu dzɛ yi ungwɔ mi itukwu ama nli mgbi Imgbasho ba, kpaa li mi ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi inggisɛ.>>
MAR 8:34 Man o kwu ibyi inggisɛ ntona ela bɛyi emi ongwafɔɔn ba mbon si nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ni i mina inggisɛ o kyɛdɔ ani yɔ, o ka tangwɛ ewon dika kye ekwatsi mgban kyɛdɔ ani.
MAR 8:35 Lubana ali inggisɛ nmina odulu oshishe mgban tɔ yɔ, ka byulu lon, kpaa ali inggisɛ nnu oshishe mgban byulu mi ikye ani yi Esɔ Osuse yɔ, ka dulu oshishe mgban tɔ.
MAR 8:36 Li ali oyabɔ inggisɛ ka tu kini a kye ɛsɛ duu nun, kpaa oshishe mgban nyanya?
MAR 8:37 Naadi li alungwɔ ngwi inggisɛ ka kye nu ikye onyinɛ yi oshishe mgban?
MAR 8:38 Kini inggisɛ kwayiwi ani yi esɔ mgbi ani mi ɛsɛ amah yi etɔ ali ibwubwe nɛ yɔ, Ongwɛ Inggisɛ kpaa ka kwayiwi otsungwɔn mi onɔ ngwi o ka ba mi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Otsɔn yi engyesɔ ama osaan mani.>>
MAR 9:1 Ta iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ angbeka kwulɛsɛ to mmɛnɛni a ka kwulu ba nghataa a ka di obaaba mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho yi mfye.>>
MAR 9:2 Ngwi i wa nyɛ egbe egyin nɛ, iYesu kyelu iPyita, iJɛnsi yi iJɔn wafɔ yan kye ma tɔkɛ lu unggwɔ mi esho, ka to ele yuoma. Mi imbe na odzɛɛdzɛ mgban kyata mi inai ma.
MAR 9:3 Angwuto mgban kyata tundzɛ kpledede, i tundzɛ ngha ngwi inggisɛ ka kye enotse san no dzɛ ngha gbɛ.
MAR 9:4 Ta Elaija yi iMose wa mblegba tu ma, sile kponya yi iYesu.
MAR 9:5 IPyita gbɔ yi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, i tishi ni eyi to mmɛnɛni. Ni eyi klɛ afu nghi eta, onyi ikye abu, onyi ikye iMose, oka ikye Elaija.>>
MAR 9:6 (O ye odzɛ ngwi o ka gbɔ ba, ikyena imio wo ma kpakpa.)
MAR 9:7 Ta akpa tɔ mi esho wa gbiiwulu tukwu ma, ela si tɔ mi iwulu na gbɛɛ: <<Nɛnɛ li Ongwani itukwu-itukwu. Gadɔ mbon na!>>
MAR 9:8 Labɔlabɔ mata a ndinɛ kpatsɛ, kpaa a di inggisɛ onyi yi ama wuba se li iYesu yuon.
MAR 9:9 Dafi a le tashulu mi unggwɔ luba esɛ nɛ, iYesu wo ma ola gbɛɛ nu ma ka nya inggisɛ onyi ungwɔ ngwi a di nɛ ba nghataa se ni Ongwɛ Inggisɛ wa kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
MAR 9:10 A kye odzɛ nɛ da mi itukwu mgbi ama, a yɛ le kponya ungwɔ ngwi <<okyɛɛ mi ikwu>> tso mani.
MAR 9:11 Ta a byun gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose gbɔgbɛɛ Elaija ka teyi iKrestu ba?>>
MAR 9:12 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Mi otsitsi, Elaija teyi ba, wa yile alungwɔ duu mɛ le fɛ-fɛ. Kpaa li Afɛ ma kpɔɔ di teyi lɔ gbɛɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka gyadzɛ kpakpa a dika fwan baa?
MAR 9:13 Nghaduu ani le nya ema, Elaija teyi ba wa, kpaa a kyɔ yan dafi a mina, yɛyɛ dafi Afɛ lɔ ikyon mani.>>
MAR 9:14 Ngwi iYesu yi engwafɔɔn eta ntona yɛ wa tu angbeka ntona nɛ, a di ibyi inggisɛ kpakɛkɛ wo ma bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose tole tangwodzɛ yi ama.
MAR 9:15 Ngwi inɛ mgbi inggisɛ ntona gbo yi iYesu nɛ, i kwulu ma ewo man a tsinya kɛ mbon ka tan angba.
MAR 9:16 IYesu byi emi ongwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi ema le tangwɛ yi ama mi ele?>>
MAR 9:17 Ongyulɔ oka mi ibyi na nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, ani kye ongwani ongyulɔ ba mbi abu, o dzɛ yi onodzi obube li non gbɔdzɛ gbɛ ba.
MAR 9:18 Alonɔ ngwi i dzɛsin duu, li kyon ngwuta lakɛ esɛ. O li mbwuuvu ondu, le gyaaba, di li ngwafwa kpɔklɔɔ. Ani nya engwafɔ abu gbɛɛ nu ma lɔ onodzi na tɔ, kpaa a yagba ba.>>
MAR 9:19 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Kpei, ema etɔ ama onoyɛyɛ ba ntonɛ, ani ka dzɛ yi ema onɔ ka tunto sinɛ? Ani ka shitukwu yi ema onɔ ka tunto sinɛ? Kye ongwɛ ma ba mbi ani.>>
MAR 9:20 A si kyon ba mbon. Ngwi onodzi na di iYesu labɔlabɔ mata, o kye ongwɛ na gyɛsɛ le kwɔɔkwɔ. O gbɛsɛ lakɛ esɛ dile myini kpatsɛ, le tsuuvu ondu.
MAR 9:21 IYesu byi otsɔngwɛ na gbɛɛ, <<I kye onɔ sinɛ ngwi o dzɛ ngha?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Kyɛ esɛ mgban.
MAR 9:22 Li kyon ngwuta wokɛ ola naadi eni ikye ongwɔn. Nghanɛ ni abu ka yagba kyungwɔ mi ele yɔ, di eyi elela ya eyi abɔ.>>
MAR 9:23 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li ungwɔ ogbɛɛ kini abu yagbaa? Alungwɔ duu ka yagba kyɔ kyɛmɛ mbi inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ.>>
MAR 9:24 Labɔlabɔ nɛ otsɔngwɛ na kweela gbɛɛ, <<Ani noyɛyɛ; tobyi ani ni ani kɛkiyayi mi oyɛyɛ onuunu.>>
MAR 9:25 Ngwi iYesu di gbɛɛ ibyi inggisɛ tsinya le wa di nɛ, o fwa yi onodzi obube na gbɛɛ, <<Abu onodzi okyadɔ bɛyi ikplima nɛ, ani wo abu ola, tasɛ mbon dika yɛ kaka mbon wuba.>>
MAR 9:26 Onodzi na teela di nu ongwɛ na tsa si tɔ dzanta. Ongwɛ na lakɛ dafi inggisɛ ikwukwɔ man ali inggisɛ duu gbɛɛ, <<O kwulu.>>
MAR 9:27 Nghaduu iYesu byin abɔ kyilen esho ta o si dzɛkunto.
MAR 9:28 Onɔ ngwi iYesu wa kaka ifoozu nɛ, engwafɔɔn byin ita daada gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛse ngwi eyi yagba lɔn tɔ ba?>>
MAR 9:29 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Itɔ nɛ ka tɔ mi ibɔ kyoon ta!>>
MAR 9:30 A lu dzata imbe nani, nyɛ ifu iGalalia. IYesu mina gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ onyi kpaa ye imbe ngwi ama to ba,
MAR 9:31 ikyekyɛ o le tso engwafɔ mgban gbɛɛ, <<A ka wa kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ gya mi abɔ inggisɛ. A ka ngwɔn, ni i wa nyɛ egbe eta ta o ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu.>>
MAR 9:32 Nghaduu a difwi owitukwu mgban ba, i di wo ma imio obyun ita mi ele.
MAR 9:33 A ba iKapenahun. Onɔ ngwi o wodzɛ ozu nɛ, o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi ema le tangwɛ ikyen mi ofɛ?>>
MAR 9:34 Kpaa a kwondu ba ikyekyɛ mi ofɛ ma a teyi tangwodzɛ gbɛɛ li emɛ shewo ngha.
MAR 9:35 IYesu si sɔkɛ esɛ, kwu iwyodefa ntona ela nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kini inggisɛ mina oli ababɔ yɔ, li kyɛmɛ o ka li olɛlɛ dika li ongbidɔ mgbi angbeka duu.>>
MAR 9:36 O nu ongwɛ ongbungbɛ wa kwudzɛkɛ idzidzɛ mgbi ama. O kye abɔ dɔn alubɔ, si nya ma gbɛɛ,
MAR 9:37 <<Inggisɛ ta ngbɛ onyi mi idzidzɛ ɛngbɛ ntonɛ mi iyi mgbi ani yɔ, o gbɛ ani; ma inggisɛ ta ngbɛ ani yɔ, gbɛ ani ta ba kpaa li ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.>>
MAR 9:38 IJɔn gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, eyi di inggisɛ oka le lɔ onodzi emɛsɛ onya tɔ mi iyi mgbi abu kpaa eyi nyan gbɛɛ non nya, ikyekyɛ o li onyi mbi eyi ba.>>
MAR 9:39 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ka non nya ba, inggisɛ onyi nkyungwɔ okwulewo mi iyi mgbi ani se ka yɛ kyata gbɔdzɛ oka obube ikpewo ani dzɛma ba,
MAR 9:40 lubana ali inggisɛ nkye iga fyi yi eyi bayɔ dzɛ yi eyi.
MAR 9:41 N nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ ta nnu abu eni mi ibwɛ mi iyi mgbi ani ikyegbɛɛ ema li emi iKrestu yɔ, li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ umba mgban ka nyan ba.
MAR 9:42 <<Ma kini inggisɛ onyi nu onyi mi itɔ ɛngbɛ ama oshilɛlɛ ama nnoyɛyɛ mbi ani ntonɛ gbɛsɛ mi alobube yɔ, ka tatase lon nu ma kye onikwɔɔ shan onbukwɔ kyon ngwuta wokɛ ekyoo okwukwo.
MAR 9:43 Kini abɔ mgbi abu onyi li nu abu le gbɛsɛ mi alobube yɔ, kye dzɛlu ngwuta. I tatase ni abu kaka oshishe yi mmya ngha onu abu kaka udola yi abɔ efa.
MAR 9:44 (Imbe ngwi awi mgbi ama li kwulu ba, ngwi ola na kpaa li gye myunu ba nani.)
MAR 9:45 Ma kini afɔ mgbi abu onyi nu abu gbɛsɛ mi alobube yɔ, kye dzɛlu ngwuta. I tatase ni abu kaka oshishe yi afɔ onyi odzɛɛdzɛ ngha ngwi abu ka dzɛ yi afɔ efa nu ma di kye abu ngwuta wokɛ udola mani.
MAR 9:46 (Imbe ngwi awi mgbi ama li kwulu ba, ngwi ola na kpaa li gye myunu ba nani.)
MAR 9:47 Ma kini inɛ mgbi abu li nu abu le gbɛsɛ mi alobube yɔ, kye todulu ngwuta. I tatase ni abu kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho yi inɛ onyi ngha odzɛ yi inɛ efa nu ma kye abu ngwuta wokɛ udola,
MAR 9:48 imbe ngwi << <awi mgbi ama li kwulu ba, ngwi ola na kpaa li gye myunu ba nani.>
MAR 9:49 Ama nkyɛdɔ ani duu ka nyɛ mi isɔ dafi inggisɛ li kye mmwaa dzi ungwɔ ofifɛ mgbi ama se kye toola mani.
MAR 9:50 <<Mmwaa tishi, nghaduu ni mmwaa dzɛ yi mfya wuba, ema ka kyɔsinɛse non yɛ dzɛ yi mfya? Fyumfya dafi mmwaa yi ewema, di dzɛ mi iyu yi ewema na.>>
MAR 10:1 Nɛta iYesu si lu dzata imbe na ka kaka ayɛsɛ iJudia di fa ekyoo iJodan. Ibyi inggisɛ di ba mbon, ta dafi o teyi li kyɔ mani, o tso ma.
MAR 10:2 Emi iFarasi angbeka ba wa mbadin yi ita gbɛɛ, <<Li ola ni ongyulɔ gheeba yi owaan?>>
MAR 10:3 IYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<iMose wo ema ola sinɛ?>>
MAR 10:4 A gbɔgbɛɛ, <<iMose gbela gbɛɛ ni ongyulɔ dzɛ afɛ ogheeba duuse lɔ ongyaa onya lu.>>
MAR 10:5 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<IMose wo ema ola nɛ ikyekyɛ ema fyumfye nu ma tso ema ungwɔ.
MAR 10:6 Kpaa mi owita-wita mgbi ɛsɛ ma Imgbasho <Mɛ ongyulɔ yi ongyaa kyoon.>
MAR 10:7 <Ikyenghanɛ ongyulɔ ka dzata otsɔn yi onɔn yidɔ kwokyi yi owan,
MAR 10:8 ta ama efa ka yɛɛ ikpewo onyi.> Hininɛ a yama li ikpewo efa wuba, kpaa a yɛɛ ewo onyi.
MAR 10:9 Nghanɛ ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho kye kwokyi yi eka yɔ, ni inggisɛ ka gha ma ba.>>
MAR 10:10 Ngwi a yidɔ lu ozu nɛ, emi ongwafɔ iYesu byun ita mi ikye ungwɔnɛni.
MAR 10:11 O nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ali ongyulɔ ngheeba yi owan yɛ lu ka kye ongyaa oka yɔ, le kyɔ amah biyan.
MAR 10:12 Ma kini ongyaa tɔ mi udɛ oban yɛ lu ka bongyulɔ oka yɔ, o kyɔ amah.>>
MAR 10:13 Ibyi inggisɛ gbe ɛngbɛ ama ogyɛngyɛ le ba mbi iYesu onon kye abɔ gbo ma ewo, nghaduu engwafɔɔn fwa yi ama.
MAR 10:14 Ngwi iYesu di ungwɔnɛ nɛ, o kyitingga. O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Dzata ɛngbɛ ama oshilɛlɛ nu ma ba mbi ani, ka yama kwɔ ma ba, bana esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ mi ikye ama ntonɛ sini.
MAR 10:15 N nya ema otsitsi, ali inggisɛ nka gbɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dafi ongwɛ ogyɛngyɛ bayɔ, ka yagba kaka ele ba.>>
MAR 10:16 Nɛ o si kyelu ɛngbɛ ama ogyɛngyɛ ntonɛ byikɛ abɔ mgban, kye abɔ dɔ ma kye mse bɛ ma ewo.
MAR 10:17 Dafi iYesu kye ofɛ dikye le lu nɛ, ongyulɔ oka tsinya kɛ mbon ka kye akwafɔ kwokɛ esɛ mi iyayin. O byita gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse osuse, li ekyɛ ngwi ani ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ otu oshishe igyegwu?>>
MAR 10:18 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu kwu ani di osuse? Inggisɛ onyi yama li osuse ba sede li Imgbasho yuon ta.
MAR 10:19 Abu ye ola: <Ka ngwɔ inggisɛ ba, gbaamah ba, ka yimi ba, ka yama kyɔ obwɛndɛ atsika ba, ka kyɔ inggisɛ ogye ba, sunu otsabu yi onabu.> >>
MAR 10:20 O nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ani kyɔ ma nyɛ ngwi ani ka li ongbɛ mani.>>
MAR 10:21 Ta iYesu din inɛ si dzɛ yi okpitukwu mbon. O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ onyi sisi mbi abu, lu, ka kye alungwɔ ngwi abu dzɛyan duu gya kye awuya ma nu emi adzɛ, ta abu ka dzɛ yi aludu mi esho. Taman yɛ, ba wa kyɛdɔ ani.>>
MAR 10:22 Mi elodzɛ nɛ inɛ mgbi inggisɛ na si kyata mi ikye yɛɛ tsikitsiki. O tasɛ yi mtse lu, ikyena o dzɛ yi aludu shewo kpakpa.
MAR 10:23 Nɛ iYesu si kyata inɛ kyidi nya emi ongwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Ka fyumfye kpakpa ni inggisɛ aludu kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho!>>
MAR 10:24 I kwulu engwafɔɔn ewo mi elodzɛ mgban. Kpaa iYesu di yile odzɛ nɛ gbɔ gbɛɛ, <<Ɛngbɛ, dafi i sunɔ okaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho maa!
MAR 10:25 Ka nghao sunɔ ba onu ilakwumyi kaka ifo edi fatɔ ngha onu inggisɛ udza kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
MAR 10:26 Nɛ i nghao kwulu emi ongwafɔɔn ewo, ta a gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nghama li emɛ tsatso ka watɔ?>>
MAR 10:27 IYesu di ma inɛ si gbɛɛ, <<Mbi inggisɛ yɔ ungwɔ ka yagba dzɛ ngha gbɛ ba, nghaduu mbi Imgbasho yɔ ka yagba dzɛ ngha; bana mbi Imgbasho yɔ alungwɔ duu dzɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ.>>
MAR 10:28 IPyita si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Eyi dzata alungwɔ duu kyɛdɔ abu!>>
MAR 10:29 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ onyi ngwu dzata udɛ naadi emi ongwunɔn engyulɔ yi engyaa naadi onɔn yi otsɔn hona ɛngbɛ naadi okwɔ mi ikye ani bɛyi Esɔ Osuse yɔ,
MAR 10:30 ka yama ndan owa yidɔ tuun mi onɔ ngwi eyi wodzɛ ele nɛ bɛyi onɔ ongwi iyayi ba.
MAR 10:31 Nghaduu emi ababɔ gwuba ka wa yɛɛ emi olɛlɛ, emi olɛlɛ dika yɛɛ emi ababɔ.>>
MAR 10:32 A kye ofɛ dikye le lu iJerosalin, iYesu teyi ofɛ, man i kwulu emi ongwafɔɔn ewo, ama nkyɛ ma iyikpa kpaa imio wo ma. Ta o di gblekɛ enggengga yi emi iwyodefa ntona nya ma ungwɔ nka wa kyɔ ongwu mani.
MAR 10:33 O gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Eyi le lu iJerosalin, nɛ a ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ wo engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi etsetse mgbi ola abɔ. A ka ngwɔn ikwɔ ikwongye di kyon wo Udzengye abɔ,
MAR 10:34 a ka nyan agya di kyanggwɔ kyin yɛ gbon ibe di ngwɔn. Ni i wa mɛ egbe eta, o ka kyato mi ikwu.>>
MAR 10:35 Ta iJɛnsi yi iJɔn, emi ongwɛ iDzebedi, ka ba mbi iYesu. A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, eyi mina gbɛɛ abu ki kyɔ eyi alungwɔ ngwi eyi mina duu.>>
MAR 10:36 IYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ ngwi ema mina gbɛɛ ni ani kyɔ ema ele?>>
MAR 10:37 A gbɛɛ, <<Ni onyi mbi eyi sɔ abugye mgbi abu oka mi abubɛ mi okwɔkwɔ mgbi abu.>>
MAR 10:38 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ema yama ye ungwɔ ngwi ema tole mina na ba. Ema ka yagba wa mi ibwɛ ngwi ani ka wa naadi kyɔ iBatisima ngwi a kyɔ ani ma gbɛɛ?>>
MAR 10:39 A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ka yagba.>> Man iYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema ka wa mi ibwɛ ngwi ani wa di kyɔ iBatisima ngwi ani kyɔ mani,
MAR 10:40 nghaduu osɔ abugye hona abubɛ mgbi ani yama li ani ka nu ofɛ ba. Imbe ntonɛ dzɛ mi ikye mgbi ama a kye dzɛ ma mani.>>
MAR 10:41 Ngwi iwyo ntona fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, itingga kyɔ ma kpakpa yi iJɛnsi bɛyi iJɔn.
MAR 10:42 Man iYesu si kwu ma ela kwakye gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ema ye ama ngwu a di gbɛɛ a mɛ ogbe Udzengye teyi li kyɔ mfye mboma, engyukwo ama oshewo mi idzidzɛ ma li kyɔ mfye ikpewo ma.
MAR 10:43 Mbi ema yama li ngha ba. Kini inggisɛ onyi mbi ema mina oyɛɛ ongbodzi inggisɛ yɔ, li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ no yɛɛ ongbidɔ mgbi angbeka,
MAR 10:44 ma ali inggisɛ nmina oli ongwi ababɔ yɔ, li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ no yɛɛ ofyɛɛ mgbi ema duu.
MAR 10:45 Bana Ongwɛ Inggisɛ abuon ba ikyegbɛɛ nu ma wa kyɔn idɔ ba, kpaa owa kyɔɔkyidɔ, odi kye oshishe mgban nu ikye onagbɛ ibyi inggisɛ.>>
MAR 10:46 Nɛ a si luba iJeriko. Dafi iYesu yi engwafɔɔn yi ibyi inggisɛ wafɔ ungwonyi le tasɛ dzata igeli nɛ, inggisɛ obinɛ ngwu a li kwun di iBatimayɔ (itan di, Ongwɛ iTimayɔ), sɔdzɛ ewo ofɛ le bibɔ.
MAR 10:47 Ngwi o fwo gbɛɛ li iYesu ongwi iNadzareti nɛ, o wita okweela gbɛɛ, <<iYesu, Ongwɛ iDevedi, di ani elela!>>
MAR 10:48 Ibyi inggisɛ kwɔn di nyan gbɛɛ non yile ondu tukwu shili-shili, kpaa o kweela nghaabɔ ogbugbe gbɛɛ, <<Ongwɛ iDevedi, di ani elela!>>
MAR 10:49 Ta iYesu si kwulɛsɛ gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Kwun ela na.>> A si kwu obinɛ na ela gbɛɛ, <<Dzɛ yi atsa! Kyato nto! O le kwu abu ela.>>
MAR 10:50 O si gbe angwuto mgban ngwuta mi agya oka, kyato vla kɛ mbi iYesu.
MAR 10:51 Nɛ iYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi abu mina gbɛɛ ni ani kyɔ abu ele?>> Inggisɛ obinɛ na gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, ani mina gbɛɛ n ki dinɛ.>>
MAR 10:52 Ta iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Lu, oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu ngyɛlu abu ootse.>> Vla-vla ma jo inɛ mgban kwulu o di diyɛ kyɛdɔ iYesu mi ofɛ le lu.
MAR 11:1 Dafi a dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka iJerosalin di ba iBɛtifege bɛyi iBetani mi Unggwɔ Olivi nɛ, iYesu dɔ engwafɔɔn efa esɔ,
MAR 11:2 o gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Kɛ agwɔ ndzɛ ema iyayi nani, ni ema kaka ele yɔ, ema ka di ongwɛ itaklimyi shadzɛ ele, ngwi inggisɛ onyi tɔɔn ye waba. Shan kye ba mmɛnɛni.
MAR 11:3 Kini inggisɛ byi ema gbɛɛ, <Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le kyungwɔnɛ ngha yɔ?> Nyan gbɛɛ, <Odzɛ wo Otsɛ iYesu mi ele o ka wa yilen mi onɔ gwee.> >>
MAR 11:4 Ta a si kɛ ka tu ongwɛ itaklimyi shadzɛ onufɛ kye inɛ byi ofɛ. Dafi a le shan nɛta,
MAR 11:5 inggisɛ angbeka nkwulɛsɛ to imbe na byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi ema le kyɔ, ema le shɛ ongwɛ itaklimyi nɛɛ?>>
MAR 11:6 Nɛ a nu uka dafi iYesu tsekise nya ma mani, man inggisɛ ntona si dzamata nu ma kye lu.
MAR 11:7 Ngwi a kye ongwɛ itaklimyi ma ba mbi iYesu nɛ, a kye angwuto mgbi ama tukwun ekpo man iYesu tɔdɔkɛ ele.
MAR 11:8 Ibyi inggisɛ gbe angwuto mgbi ama tasɛ mi ofɛ, angbeka dzɛ afɛ otse mi ondu okwɔ ngwuta tokɛ esɛ mi ofɛ.
MAR 11:9 Ama nteyi tole kiyayi yi ama nkyɛdɔ ma ma, kweela gbɛɛ, <<Osana! Mse no dzɛ yi ongwu nba mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho nɛni!>>
MAR 11:10 <<Mse no dzɛ yi esutɔ mgbi otseyi iDevedi nka ba nani! Osana mi onghaangha!>>
MAR 11:11 Nɛ iYesu wa kaka iJerosalin si lu mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani. O kyidi alungwɔ tsatsadu, nghaduu ngwi onɔ gbɛsɛ wa nɛ, o tasɛ lu iBetani yi iwyodefa ntonani.
MAR 11:12 Tegblifan dafi a le dzata ogalu mgbi iBetani nɛ, enbwa dɔ iYesu.
MAR 11:13 O di andundu kwo mbombo yi afɛ mi efu yugu-yugu, o si kɛ oka kyidi kaba awawa to ele. Ngwi o ka to itan nɛ, o yama tu unkonyi ba se afɛ ta, ikyena li onɔ mgban owa owawa ba.
MAR 11:14 O si nya ekwɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ onyi ka yama tu awawa mbi abu gye wuba.>> Emi ongwafɔɔn fwo dafi o gbɔ ngha mani.
MAR 11:15 Ngwi a kaka iJerosalin nɛ, iYesu kaka ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin na man wita olɔ ama nle kyummya bɛyi ama nle gya mi imbe na onya tɔ. O tsamu adinyatsɛ mgbi ama nle nyinɛ udza bɛyi itse osɔ efu mgbi ama nle kye ingyakpa gya,
MAR 11:16 di nu inggisɛ onyi ofɛ gbɛɛ non kyummya mi idzidzɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho na ba.
MAR 11:17 Man o si le tso ma ungwɔ, o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: << <A ka kwu ozu mgbi ani gbɛɛ ozu ibɔ mgbi ɛsɛ duu baa>? Nghaduu ema kyatan yɛɛ <imbe mgbi emumyi ama oblofɛ.> >>
MAR 11:18 Ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛta a si wita opita ofɛ ngwi a ka ngwɔn, bana a mion, ikyekyɛ le kwulu inggisɛ duu ewo mi otsootso mgban.
MAR 11:19 Ngwi onɔ gbɛsɛ nɛ, a tɔ dzata ogalu.
MAR 11:20 Mi egbegbe, ngwi a le lu nɛ, a di andundu na ngwɔ wita kyɛ akpa lu ikyen.
MAR 11:21 Ta iPyita wɛ di nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, dii! Ekwɔ andundu ngwi abu won ikamba nɛ ngwɔ!>>
MAR 11:22 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi Imgbasho.
MAR 11:23 N nya ema otsitsi, yeba ni inggisɛ nya unggwɔ nɛ gbɛɛ, <Lu, kye ewabu ka ngwuta mi ekyoo okwukwo,> di yama dzɛ yi angwɛ mi itukwu ba di noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi ongwu gbɔ na ka kyɔ ngha yɔ, a ka kyɔn ele.
MAR 11:24 Nghanɛ n nya ema, alungwɔ ngwi ema bɔ mi ibɔ yɔ, noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ ema tun wa, ta dika li mgbi ema.
MAR 11:25 Mi onɔ ngwi ema kwulɛsɛ le bibɔ yɔ, dzata angbeka ama nkyɔ ema obube. Ta Otsema ndzɛ esho na ka dzita ema yi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema.>> [
MAR 11:26 kpaa ni abu dzata inggisɛ yi obube bayɔ, Otsabu ndzɛ esho kpaa ka dzita abu yi obube mgbi abu ba.]
MAR 11:27 A di ba wa kaka iJerosalin, ta ngwi iYesu le kyikyɛ kyɛ mi ayɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho nɛ, engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi etsetse mgbi ola bɛyi engyukwo emi iJuda ba mbon.
MAR 11:28 A byita gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ali mfye ngwi abu le kyungwɔ ntonɛ? Di li emɛ nu abu mfye okyungwɔ ntonɛ?>>
MAR 11:29 Nɛ iYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Ani kpaa ka byi ema ita onyi ta. Nu ani uka na, ta n ka nya ema imbe ngwi ani tu mfye le kyungwɔ ntonɛni.
MAR 11:30 Nyɛn na, iBatisima mgbi iJɔn nɛ tɔkyɛ mi esho naadi mbi inggisɛ?>>
MAR 11:31 A si gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Kini eyi gbɛɛ, <Kyɛ mi esho,> o ka byita gbɛɛ, <Ma kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema nun oyɛyɛ ba?>
MAR 11:32 Kpaa ni eyi gbɛɛ, <Kyɛ mbi inggisɛ yɔ>....>> (A tsimio ibyi inggisɛ, bana ali inggisɛ ye jo gbɛɛ iJɔn li oyegbɔ.)
MAR 11:33 Nɛ a nu iYesu uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ye imbe ngwi i tɔkyɛ ba.>> Man iYesu gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛse ani kpaa ka nya ema itɔ mfye ngwi ani le kyungwɔ ntonɛ ba.>>
MAR 12:1 O si wita ogbɔdzɛ yi ama mi utsa gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ shi okwɔ awawekwɔ. O mbɛ ogalu kpakɛkɛ won, di tishɛ ogbe eni owawa ekwɔ di tuo otila ikye ongyo. Ta o kye okwɔ na wo emi okwɔ angbeka abɔ si lu agaba.
MAR 12:2 Mi onɔ oshɛ etɔ mani, o dɔ ongbidɔ mgban esɔ mbi ama ngwu o kye okwɔ wo ma abɔ ma gbɛɛ non ka gbɛ owawa ekwɔ ongwi okwɔ na mboma.
MAR 12:3 Kpaa a kpaklin, gbon lɔn onya lu abubɔ.
MAR 12:4 Ta o di dɔ ongbidɔ oka esɔ mboma; a kye ungwɔ zudɔn ikye onun ayiwi.
MAR 12:5 Otsungwɔ okwɔ na diyɛ dɔ oka, ongwu na a kyon kye ngwɔlu. O di dɔ angbeka kwuba, angbeka ma, a gbo ma, angbeka yɔ, a ngwɔ ma.
MAR 12:6 <<Otsungwɔ okwɔ sisi yi inggisɛ onyi ta odɛsɔ, ongwan ongwu ongyulɔ, ongwu nkpan itukwu saan. O dɔnsɔ olɛlɛ gbɛɛ, <A ka nu ongwani mmwɛ.>
MAR 12:7 <<Nghaduu ama odi mi okwɔ ntona gbɔ yi eka gbɛɛ, <Nɛnɛ li ongwɛ nka gyokwudɛ ma aani. Ba na, ni eyi ngwɔlun, ta okwudɛ ka yɛɛ mgbi eyi.>
MAR 12:8 Nɛ a si kyon kye ngwɔlu, di kye ikwɔ mgban ngwi tasɛ mi okwɔ.
MAR 12:9 <<Li alungwɔ ngwi otsungwɔ okwɔ na ka kyɔ? O ka ba wa ngwɔlu ama ngwu o kye okwɔ wo ma abɔ ntona di yile okwɔ nu angbeka.
MAR 12:10 Ema gbɔ Afɛ nɛ walo: << <Akwutsɛ ngwi ama ombɛ ozu fwan ma i yɛɛ okwulu ikye ozu;
MAR 12:11 li Otsɛ Imgbasho kyungwɔnɛni, nɛkpaa li ungwɔ okwulewo mbi eyii>?>>
MAR 12:12 Ta a pita ofɛ obwan ikyekyɛ a ye dafi o gbɔ utsa na ikye mgbi ama. Nghaduu a le mio ibyi inggisɛ; nɛ a si dzanta lu.
MAR 12:13 A dɔ emi iFarasi angbeka esɔ mi iyikpa yi emi iHerude mbi iYesu ikye oka bwan mi elodzɛ mgban.
MAR 12:14 A ba mbon wa gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, eyi ye abu li inggisɛ otsitsi. Abu li mio inggisɛ ba, ikyekyɛ abu li kye oshewo nu inggisɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ama ba; kpaa abu li tso ofɛ mgbi Imgbasho imbisɔn-mbisɔn yi otsitsi. Nɛ li ola ni eyi kpa udza ifyɛɛ nu iSidza naadi li ola ba?
MAR 12:15 Ni eyi kpa naadi ni eyi ka kpa ba?>> Nghaduu iYesu ye ɛwɛ mgbi ama, o nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le mina okya ani ukya? Kye isule ma wa nin di.>>
MAR 12:16 A kye isule ma ba, man o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li onodzi mgbi emɛ dɔdzɛ ele? Di li olɔɔlɔ mgbi emɛ?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Li mgbi iSidza.>>
MAR 12:17 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kye ungwɔ mgbi iSidza nu iSidza di kye mgbi Imgbasho nu Imgbasho.>> Man i kwulu ma ewo biyan.
MAR 12:18 Nghanɛ emi iSadusi, ama ngbɛɛ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu dzɛma ba ma, ba mbi iYesu yi ita.
MAR 12:19 A gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, iMose lɔ gbɛɛ ni ongwunɔ inggisɛ kwulu dzata ongyaa kpaa mba ɛngbɛ bayɔ, inggisɛ na no yile owakwadɛ na kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ di mba ɛngbɛ mi ikye ongwunɔ ongwu nkwulu nani.
MAR 12:20 Engwuneka nghi egyafa nose to. Ongwu ababɔ kye ongyaa kwulu dzata ongwɛ onyi ba.
MAR 12:21 Ongwu fan yile owakwadɛ na, kpaa o di kwulu dzata ongwɛ onyi ba. Ongwu ta kpaa li ngha.
MAR 12:22 Mi otsitsi, onyonyi mbi engyulɔ egyafa ntonɛ dzata etɔ onyi ba. Ongyɛɛngyɛ duu, ongyaa na kpaa wa kwulu.
MAR 12:23 Mi egbe ngwi inggisɛ ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu ma li emɛ ngwu ongyaa nɛ ka li owan, ngwi ama egyafa duu kyon?>>
MAR 12:24 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema boofɛ ikyegbɛɛ di ema ye ungwɔ ngwi Afɛ lɔ ba di ye mfye mgbi Imgbasho kpaa ba.
MAR 12:25 Bana mi onɔ ngwi inggisɛ ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu mani, a ka kye ongyaa hona kye ongwɛ nu eba wuba; a ka to dafi engyesɔ emi esho mani.
MAR 12:26 Mi ikye odzɛ okyɛɛ mi ikwu nɛ, ema gbɔ mi Afɛ mgbi iMose, mi odzɛ mgbi oshɛ na walo? Dafi Imgbasho nyan gbɛɛ, <Ani li Imgbasho mgbi Abrahan, Imgbasho mgbi Adziki di li Imgbasho mgbi iJeko ma baa>?
MAR 12:27 O li Imgbasho mgbi emi ikwukwɔ ba, kpaa Imgbasho mgbi emi oshishe. Ema le boofɛ timbi saan!>>
MAR 12:28 Onyi mi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose ba wa fwo ma le tangwodzɛ. Dafi o di gbɛɛ iYesu nu ma uka osuse nɛta, o si byun gbɛɛ, <<Mi ola duu ma, li ole nghao wuuta?>>
MAR 12:29 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ongwu nnghao wuuta ma, li ongwu aani: <Fwo na, ema emi Israi, Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi eyi, Otsɛ na li onyi.
MAR 12:30 Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi abu no kpa abu itukwu yi itukwu mgbi abu duu yi oshishe mgbi abu duu bɛyi mfye mgbi abu duu.>
MAR 12:31 Ongwu fan yɔ: <Inggisɛ nwatse dɔ abu no kpa abu itukwu dafi ewabu mani.> Ola oka dzɛma nshewo ngha ola ntonɛ ba.>>
MAR 12:32 Otsetse mgbi ola na nu iYesu uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, abu gbɔ tishi. Abu li ayin ogbɔgbɛɛ Imgbasho li onyi oka dzɛma ba se ongwu ta mani.
MAR 12:33 Onon kpa abu itukwu, yi itukwu mgbi abu duu yi oyeye mgbi abu duu bɛyi mfye mgbi abu duu, inggisɛ ongwu nwatse dɔ abu no di kpa abu itukwu dafi ewabu na, li ungwɔ nwuuta ngha umba ama otoola bɛyi ama ofifɛ duu.>>
MAR 12:34 Ngwi iYesu di gbɛɛ o nu uka mi ozoyeye nɛ, o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu dzɛ mbombo yi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ba.>> Ta mi onɔ na lu iyayi inggisɛ onyi kpaa yagba byun ita angbeka wuba.
MAR 12:35 Ngwi iYesu le tso mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nɛ, o si byita gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛse ngwi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose gbɔgbɛɛ Ongwu Imgbasho zondu gbɛɛ o ka wa dulu ɛsɛ watɔ (iKrestu) ma li Ongwɛ iDevedi?
MAR 12:36 Onodzi Osaan kye iDevedi abuon kpaa teyi non gbɛɛ: << <Otsɛ Imgbasho nya Otsɛ mgbi ani gbɛɛ: <<Sɔkɛ mi abugye mgbi ani nghataa ni ani wa nu engyikyili mgbi abu yɛɛ itse mgbi abu ogbe afɔ dɔ efu.>> >
MAR 12:37 IDevedi abuon kwun di <Otsɛ.> Nghanɛ ka kyɔsinɛse ngwi o ka li ongwan?>> Ibyi inggisɛ ntona fwo otsootso mgbi iYesu yi atsa mi itukwu mgbi ama.
MAR 12:38 Mi otsootso mgbi iYesu ma, o gbɛɛ, <<Kye inɛ byi etsetse mgbi ola na. A li mina okyikyɛ yi angwuto owulu-wulu nu ma dile ta ma angba mi ifyidu,
MAR 12:39 odi sɔ itse ngwi a nghao kye wuuta mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda yi imbe okpɔngɔ mi oga.
MAR 12:40 A li gye mmgbe mi udɛ mgbi emi owakwadɛ di li bibɔ tunto otso gbɛɛ ama tishi. Itɔ inggisɛ ntona Imgbasho ka kwo ma adɔ she kpakpa.>>
MAR 12:41 Man iYesu sisɛ mi agya imbe ngwi a gbe umba le wokɛ, le di ibyi inggisɛ kye udza mgbi ama le wokɛ mi ashiko mgbi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin. Ama odzɛ yi udza kwuba kpaa kye udza mgbi ama le wokɛ ele.
MAR 12:42 Nghaduu ongyaa owakwadɛ adzɛ ba wa nu anini efa, ngwi mɛ ikobo onyi ta.
MAR 12:43 Nɛ iYesu si kwu engwafɔɔn ela ba mbon nya ma gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, ongyaa owakwadɛ adzɛ nɛ nghao kye wokɛ mi ashiko ngha angbeka duu.
MAR 12:44 Ama duu a nu mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi aludu mgbi ama; kpaa owakwadɛ nɛ yɔ, li mi adzɛ mgban ngwi o nu, li ungwɔ ngwi o dzɛ biyan duu onon dzɛ oshishe mani.>>
MAR 13:1 Dafi iYesu le tasɛ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nɛta, onyi mbi engwafɔɔn nyan gbɛɛ, <<Dii, Otsetse! Li ali itɔ akwutsɛ osugbɔ-osugbɔ dɛn! Li ali itɔ ozu ogbosinɛ nghalo!>>
MAR 13:2 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu di ozu ama oshewo ntonɛ wɛ? Ikwutsɛ onyi mmɛnɛ kpaa ka sisi dɔ ikye oka ba; ali ikwutsɛ duu a ka wa kye gbobu tukwu esɛ.>>
MAR 13:3 Ngwi iYesu sisɛ mi Unggwɔ Olivi mi agya ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nɛ, iPyita yi iJɛnsi yi iJɔn bɛyi Andru byun daada gbɛɛ,
MAR 13:4 <<Nya eyi, li alonɔ ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ ka wa kyɔ? Dika li ali ambɛ ka tso gbɛɛ ungwɔ ntonɛ le ka mbwumbwo?>>
MAR 13:5 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Gbɛwɛbyi na, ka nu inggisɛ kpagya ema wo ba.
MAR 13:6 Inggisɛ kwuba ka ba mi iyi mgbi ani, le gbatsika gbɛɛ, <Li ani li iKrestu mani,> dika kpagya inggisɛ wo kwuba.
MAR 13:7 Mi onɔ ngwi ema fwo ika bɛyi odzɛ a gbɛɛ mgbi ika yɔ, ka teeyi ba na. Bana ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ, kpaa li ongyɛɛngyɛ ɛsɛ wa daaba.
MAR 13:8 Ɛsɛ ka kyɛɛ ika bɛyi ɛsɛ oka, esutɔ ka kyɛɛ ika bɛyi esutɔ oka. Ɛsɛ osuusu ka dzɛ mi imbe idzidza-dzidza, bɛyi enbwa. Ungwɔ ntonɛ li owita-wita mgbi isɔ.
MAR 13:9 <<Gbɛwɛbyi ewema kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ na. A ka kye ema nu mi abɔ okwakye mgbi ama ogbiikwɔ nu ma gbo ema ibe mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda. Mi ikye mgbi ani a ka kye ema ba inɛ emi iGɔna yi emi utɔ dafi obwɛndɛ mboma.
MAR 13:10 Ma Esɔ Osuse nɛ a ka teyi gbɔn kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mi ɛsɛ duu.
MAR 13:11 Kini a bwa ema kye ba owa gbɔ ema ikwɔ yɔ, itukwu no ka teyi kaka ema ewo mi odzɛ ngwi ema ka gbɔ ba. Nghaduu gbɔ ali odzɛ ngwi a kye ba mbi ema mi onɔ na mani, bana li ema kale gbɔdzɛ ba, elodzɛ mgbi ema ka kyɛ mbi Onodzi Osaan.
MAR 13:12 <<Inggisɛ ka kye ongwunɔn nu ikwu, otsɔngwɛ kpaa ka kye ongwan nu. Ɛngbɛ ka ngha ama omba ma adɔ di nu ma kwikwu.
MAR 13:13 Inggisɛ duu ka kyili ema mi ikye ani, nghaduu inggisɛ nkwulɛsɛ kpɔklɔɔ ba ongyɛɛngyɛ ka watɔ.
MAR 13:14 <<Mi onɔ ngwi ema di ungwɔ <idza nka nu odzili-dzili> kwulɛsɛ dzɛ imbe ngwi i wogyɔ gbɛɛ ki dzɛ bayɔ, inggisɛ nle gbɔ ungwɔ olɔɔlɔ ma no difwi, nɛ ama nto iJudia nu ma tsinya lu unggwɔ.
MAR 13:15 Ni inggisɛ onyi ndɔdzɛ ikyendu mgban ka tashulu ba esɛ naadi kaka ozu oka kye ungwɔ onyi tasɛ ba.
MAR 13:16 Ni inggisɛ onyi nkɛdzɛ okwɔ kpaa yɛ ba udɛ owa gbe angwuto mgban ba.
MAR 13:17 Nghaduu odzɛ ka tu engyaa ama nto yi ifewo yi ama nle nu ɛngbɛ abɛ mi egbe ntonani!
MAR 13:18 Ema bibɔ gbɛɛ ungwɔnɛ no ka kyɔ mi owa ba,
MAR 13:19 ikyekyɛ egbe ntona ka li egbe adzɛ ngwi Imgbasho ta ɛsɛ jo itɔ adzɛ na yama dzɛ ngha ye ba, ma dika dzɛ ngha onɔ onyi kpaa wuba.
MAR 13:20 Kini Otsɛ Imgbasho kye mwalu egbe ntona bayɔ, inggisɛ onyi kika watɔ ba. Kpaa mi ikye ama ngwu o sadu mayɔ, o kye mwalu egbe nani.
MAR 13:21 Mi onɔ na kini inggisɛ nya ema gbɛɛ, <Dii, Ongwu Imgbasho zondu gbɛɛ o ka dulu ɛsɛ watɔ ma (iKrestu) dzana!> Hona, <Dii, o dzɛ aali!> Ka noyɛyɛ mi ele ba.
MAR 13:22 Bana emi iKrestu atsika bɛyi oyegbɔ emi atsika ka tole kyɔ ambɛ bɛyi ungwɔ ama okwukwo ikye okpagya ama a sadu ma ma wo, ki no li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ yɔ.
MAR 13:23 Nghanɛ gbɛwɛbyi ewema na; ani teyi nya ema alungwɔ duuse ni onɔ na wa gyɔ.
MAR 13:24 <<Nghaduu ni adzɛ na wa nyɛ mata, << <onɔ ka yifu, ofyia dika tso osa mgban wuba;
MAR 13:25 mcɛ ka yangwuta mi esho, Imgbasho ka kyɔ mfye, alungwɔ mi esho duu ka suusu.>
MAR 13:26 <<Mi onɔ na inggisɛ ka di Ongwɛ Inggisɛ kyɛ akpa mi esho yi mfye okwulewo bɛyi okwɔkwɔ.
MAR 13:27 Ta o ka dɔ engyesɔ mgban esɔ mi ayɛsɛ enɛ wa gbe ama ngwu o sadu mi odondu mgbi ɛsɛ nghataa lu mi odondu mgbi esho ma duu kwakye mbonyi.
MAR 13:28 <<Ikyenghanɛ kpayi ozoyeye nɛ mbi ekwɔ andundu na: Ni abɔn kyinda di baafɛ mata, ema li ye dafi li akyonova mani.
MAR 13:29 Nghaduukpaa, ni ema di ungwɔ ntonɛ le kyɔ yɔ, ye na gbɛɛ dzɛ kwɛkwɛ, jo okaka onufozu.
MAR 13:30 N le nya ema otsitsi, ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ka kyɔ se ɛsɛ nɛ ka ngyɛ.
MAR 13:31 Esho yi esɛ ka nyɛ, kpaa elodzɛ mgbi ani ka yagba nyɛ ba.
MAR 13:32 <<Inggisɛ onyi ye egbe hona onɔ ma ba, engyesɔ emi esho kpaa ye ba, naadi Ongwɛ, kpaa li Otsɛ Imgbasho yuon ye.
MAR 13:33 Kwasisa di ngyo na! Bana ema ye egbe ngwi onɔ na ka ba ba.
MAR 13:34 Dzɛ dafi inggisɛ le lu agaba: O dzata udɛ di gbe engbidɔ mgban tokɛ mi ungwɔ mgban duu, ali inggisɛ mgbi ama yɔ o nun idɔ mgban, di nya ongwu ndzɛ onufozu ma gbɛɛ non ngyo.
MAR 13:35 <<Nghanɛ le ngyo na bana ema ye onɔ ngwi otsungwudɛ na ka yɛ ba, kyayina ka li mi onɔdɛ, naadi ka li mi idzidzɛ otu, hona mi onɔ ngwi ogbigbi ka teela, naadi ka li mi ikyegbe ho.
MAR 13:36 Ki non yɛ bwabwa kpaa, no ka tu ema le nuna ba.
MAR 13:37 Ungwɔ ngwi ani le nya ema nɛ, n le nya ali inggisɛ duu gbɛɛ: <Ngyo na!> >>
MAR 14:1 I sisi mɛ egbe efa ngwi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi bɛyi ibredi ngwi a kye okwuna wo efu ba ka wa gyɔ nɛta, engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose tole pita ofɛ mi oshu ngwi ama ka bwa iYesu di ngwɔn mani.
MAR 14:2 A gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Kpaa no ka li mi egbe oga ba, bana inggisɛ ka ndeye.>>
MAR 14:3 Mi onɔ ngwi iYesu dzɛ iBetani mani, o sisɛ ogye ungwogye mi udɛ inggisɛ ongwu a li kwun di iSaimɔn inggisɛ otsoma, ongyaa ba yi engyie ofyunfyummya mi ikpɔkpɔ alabasta, engyie mgbi ekwɔ iNadi yuon. O kye ikpɔkpɔ alabasta na ondun kye kwulu, kye engyie ma yawo iYesu ikye.
MAR 14:4 Ama nto mi onɔ na ma, tole gbɔ mi itingga-itingga yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li engyie ombeembe dɛn lo?
MAR 14:5 A ki kye gya mɛ udza nngha udza idɔ onova onyi di kye udza ma gha emi adzɛ.>> A si kyɔkyɔ yi ongyaa na mi itingga-itingga.
MAR 14:6 Nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ema dzanta na. Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le kakan ewo ngha? O kyungwɔ nli osuse yi ani.
MAR 14:7 Bana emi adzɛ to yi ema alonɔ duu, ema ka ya ma abɔ alonɔ ngwi ema mina duu. Kpaa ani yɔ, ema ka tu ani alonɔ ba.
MAR 14:8 O kyungwɔ ngwi o yagba okyɔ. O kyi ani engyie mi ewo duuse ni onɔ ondzi ani wa gyɔ.
MAR 14:9 N nya ema otsitsi, mi ali imbe ngwi a le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu, ungwɔ ngwi o kyɔ nɛ a ka gbɔn, ikye ole wan.>>
MAR 14:10 Ta iJuda iSkarɔti, ongwu nli onyi mbi emi iwyodefa ntona, kɛ mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ oka kye iYesu gya yi ama.
MAR 14:11 I kpa ma ofwo odzɛ nɛni a di zondu onun awuya. Nghanɛ o pita ofɛ okyon wo ma abɔ.
MAR 14:12 Mi egbe ongwi ababɔ mgbi oga ibredi ngwi a kye okwuna wo efu ba, ngwi li ungwɔ etɔ mgbi ama ofifɛ yi mmala oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi nɛ, engwafɔ mgbi iYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ole ngwi abu mina ni eyi kɛ ka mɛlu abu imbe ogye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi nɛ?>>
MAR 14:13 Nɛta o dɔ engwafɔɔn efa esɔ, nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kaka ifu igeli na, ongyulɔ kye ishe eni dikye ka wa kpatsɛ ema. Kyɛdɔn na.
MAR 14:14 Imbe ngwi o kaka ma, nya otsungwudɛ ma gbɛɛ, <Otsetse byita gbɛɛ: Ozu ingyoga mgbi ani, ngwi ani ka gye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi yi emi ongwafɔ mgbi ani ma kɔ?>
MAR 14:15 Ta o ka tso ema ozu okwukwo mi ozeesho, ngwi a gbe okye to ele le fɛɛfɛ. Kye mɛlu mi ikye eweyi na.>>
MAR 14:16 Emi ongwafɔ ntona si lu ifu igeli ka di ungwɔ ntona yɛyɛ dafi iYesu nya ma mani. Nɛ a kye kyɔlu ungwogye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi.
MAR 14:17 Onɔ wa gbɛsɛ nɛta, iYesu wa kaka bɛyi emi iwyodefa ntonani.
MAR 14:18 Ngwi a sisɛ kwongongo le gye ungwogye mi adinyatsɛ nɛta, o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ani le nya ema otsitsi, onyi mbi ema ka kye ani gya, o sɔ le gye ungwogye yi ani mmɛnɛ kpaa.>>
MAR 14:19 A si yɛɛ elela dile byun onyonyi gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ba lɔ?>>
MAR 14:20 Nghaduu iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li onyi mbi emi iwyodefa, ama nkye abɔ wo uga yi ani nɛni.
MAR 14:21 Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka lu yɛyɛ dafi Afɛ lɔ mi ikyen mani. Kpaa ahoo mi ikye inggisɛ ongwu nkye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ gya mani! Ka tatase gbɛɛ a ki mban ba.>>
MAR 14:22 Ngwi a le gye ungwogye nɛ, iYesu kyelu ibredi, ta Imgbasho angba man kye mwalu, kye nu emi ongwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛ na; nɛnɛ li ikpewo mgbi ani.>>
MAR 14:23 O di kyi kyelu ibwɛ, ta Imgbasho angba di kye nu ma, ama duu wa mi efu.
MAR 14:24 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li eyi mgbi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ani, ongwi a kye yawo mi ikye ibyi inggisɛ.
MAR 14:25 Ani le nya ema otsitsi, n ka weni awawa ekwɔ nɛ wuba nghataa mi egbe ngwi n ka wan ofufɛ mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho mani.>>
MAR 14:26 Ngwi a shashi nɛta, a tasɛ lu Unggwɔ Olivi.
MAR 14:27 Ta iYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema duu ka tangwɛ ani, bana Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: << <N ka gbo inggisɛ ongyo ifyungwɔ ta, mmala ka ganya.>
MAR 14:28 Nghaduu ni ani wa kyato mi ikwu yɔ, n ka teyi ema kaka iGalalia.>>
MAR 14:29 Kpaa iPyita gbɔ mi ododa gbɛɛ, <<Kini inggisɛ duu tangwɛ kpaa, ani ka tangwɛ ba.>>
MAR 14:30 Man iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<N nya abu otsitsi, mi otu inɛ nɛni, duuse ni ogbigbi teela akpe efa yɔ, abu ka tangwɛ ani akpe eta.>>
MAR 14:31 Nghaduu iPyita biibɛ mi ela mfye gbɛɛ, <<Kini li ikwu kpaa ani ka kwulu yi abu, n ka tangwɛ abu ba.>> Angbeka ntona duu kpaa gbɔ ngha.
MAR 14:32 A kɛ imbe ngwi ali kwun di iGesemani, ta iYesu gbɔ yi emi ongwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Sisɛ mmɛnɛ na nin ka bibɔ.>>
MAR 14:33 O kyi kyelu iPyita yi iJɛnsi bɛyi iJɔn lu yan, man o wita ogyadzɛ mi itukwu kpakpa i di kakan ewo.
MAR 14:34 Nɛ o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Elela okyɔɔkyɔ gbɛlu oshishe mgbi ani duu sɔ nghataa kaka mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ikwongye kpaa, nɛ dzɛ mmɛnɛ le ngyo na.>>
MAR 14:35 O si kiyayi gwee ta, kwokɛ esɛ bibɔ gbɛɛ no li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ yɔ, ni obyi nɛ nyɛ ongwu.
MAR 14:36 O si gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Baba, Otsani, alungwɔ dzɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mbi abu. Kyi kyelu ibwɛ adzɛ nɛ mbi ani. Kpaa no ka li mi owitukwu mgbi ani ba, no li mi owitukwu mgbi abu.>>
MAR 14:37 Ta o yidɔ wa tu engwafɔɔn tole nuna. O si nya iPyita gbɛɛ, <<iSaimɔn, abu le nunaa? Obyi onyi kpaa abu ka yagba ngyo lo?
MAR 14:38 Ngyo di bibɔ ikyegbɛɛ ni ema ka gbɛsɛ mi imbadi ba. Onodzi yɔ le dzɛ yi oweka, kpaa ewo dzatsi.>>
MAR 14:39 O diyɛ lu ka bɔ itɔ ibɔ ngwi o teyi bɔ mani.
MAR 14:40 Mi onɔ ngwi o yɛ mani, o diyɛ tu ma tole nuna, ikyekyɛ akwukwinɛ lo loma. A ye odzɛ ngwi a ka gbɔ nyan ba.
MAR 14:41 Ngwi o yɛ akpe ongwu ta nɛ, o gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Ema kale nuna dile tonya maa? I gyɔ ngha! Onɔ ma gyɔ wa! Dika, a kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ wo emi ibwubwe abɔ wa.
MAR 14:42 Kyato i kɛ na! Inggisɛ nkye ani gya ma ba wa!>>
MAR 14:43 Ngwi o kale gbɔdzɛ nɛta, iJuda, onyi mbi iwyodefa ntona, ba wa to. Ibyi inggisɛ to yan, a sha okwusunkli yi itsitsi okwuta, ngwi li engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose yi emyinɛ dɔ ma esɔ.
MAR 14:44 Mi itɔnɔ nɛ ongye okyon gya na wewo tso ma ambɛ duu gbɛɛ: <<Ongwu ani kye ondu kwon ataka ma li ongwu aali; bwan ngyon kyon lu na.>>
MAR 14:45 Vla nɛta iJuda kɛ mbi iYesu, o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Otsetse!>> Man kye ondu kwon ataka.
MAR 14:46 Engyulɔ ntona si kpakli iYesu di bwan.
MAR 14:47 Ta onyi mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama nkwulɛsɛ to kwɛkwɛ na kye ngwalu okwusunkli mgban kye kwodzɛ adɔ onyi mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ.
MAR 14:48 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani li inggisɛ ogbe ama oblofɛ teyi se ngwi ema ba mbi ani yi okwusunkli yi itsitsi okwuta owa bwa anii?
MAR 14:49 Alegbe ani li dzɛ yi ema, le tso mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, kpaa ema bwa ani ba. Nghaduu li kyɛmɛ ngwi Afɛ ka mbwumbwo.>>
MAR 14:50 Ta ali inggisɛ duu tangwan tsinya dzanta.
MAR 14:51 Ongwɛ mmafa oka, kye angwuto ondlɛndlɛ nghaama, le kyɛdɔ iYesu. Mi onɔ ngwi a bwan mani,
MAR 14:52 o tsinya dzata angwuto mgban mi iyikpa, lu ibiba.
MAR 14:53 Nɛ a kye iYesu kɛ mbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ, bɛyi engyukwo ama ofifɛ duu, yi engyukwo emi iJuda yi etsetse mgbi ola kwakye mbonyi.
MAR 14:54 IPyita si kyan iyikpa mbombo, nghataa ka kaka imbe ogbiikwɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ. Mmana o sisɛ yi ama ongyoongyo dile wola.
MAR 14:55 Engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi okwakye mgbi ama odi mi ola duu tole pita obwɛndɛ mi ikpewo iYesu ikyegbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔn, kpaa a tu onyi ba.
MAR 14:56 Bana inggisɛ kwuba gbɔ obwɛndɛ atsika mi ikpewon, kpaa elodzɛ mgbi ama kwokyi yi eka ba.
MAR 14:57 Nɛ inggisɛ angbeka di kyato nu obwɛndɛ atsika mi ikpewon gbɛɛ:
MAR 14:58 <<Eyi fwon le gbɔgbɛɛ, <N ka kye ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ngwi inggisɛ mbɛ mi abɔ nɛ kye gbobu diyɛ mbɛ oka mi egbe eta, ongwi li abɔ mgbi inggisɛ mbɛ ba mani.> >>
MAR 14:59 Nghaduukpaa obwɛndɛ mgbi ama na kwokyi ba.
MAR 14:60 Ta okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ kyato mi inɛ mgbi ama si byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu ka nu uka lo? Li ali obwɛndɛ ngwi inggisɛ ntonɛ le kye ba ikpewo abu ngha?>>
MAR 14:61 Kpaa iYesu kwulu ondu nu ma uka ba. Okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na di byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu li iKrestu, Ongwɛ Imgbasho Ongha yi mse naa?>>
MAR 14:62 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ma aani. Ema dika wa di Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka sɔ abugye mgbi Ongwu Nghaangha dika kyɛ akpa mi esho.>>
MAR 14:63 Okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na si kye nghalu angwuto mgban. O byita gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi eyi di mina obwɛndɛ angbeka?>>
MAR 14:64 <<Ema fwo ito ntonɛ ma, ema tsɛwɛ sinɛ?>> Ama duu nu iYesu obube gbɛɛ o gyɔ ondu ikwongye.
MAR 14:65 Ta angbeka wita okyanggwɔ kyin ewo; a kye ungwɔ bwan inɛ, kwon asa, di nyan gbɛɛ, <<Di yegbɔ ka!>> Ta inggisɛ ama ongyoongyo na byin di gbon ibe.
MAR 14:66 Mi onɔ ngwi iPyita ka dzɛ esɛ mi ifyudɛ nɛta, ongwongyaa onyi mi idzidzɛ engbidɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ nani, ba wa kaka.
MAR 14:67 Ngwi o di iPyita le wola nɛta, o din inɛ si gblekɛ kwɛkwɛ yan. O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu kpaa li kyɛ yi iYesu ongwi iNadzareti.>>
MAR 14:68 Nghaduu iPyita tangwɛ gbɛɛ, <<Ani yon hona difwi odzɛ ngwi abu le gbɔ nɛ kpaa ba,>> man o tasɛ mi onufɛ okakaakaka.
MAR 14:69 Ngwi ongwongyiidɔ na din mmana nɛ, o di nya ama nkwudzɛ to ma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ kpaa li onyi mboma.>>
MAR 14:70 IPyita di tangwɛ. I wa dzɛ gwee nɛta, ama nkwudzɛ to kwɛkwɛ na nya iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Li otsitsi abu li onyi mi idzidzɛ ma, bana abu li emi iGalalia.>>
MAR 14:71 Ta iPyita wita owo ewon ikamba di fa yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Ani ye inggisɛ ngwu ema le gbɔdzɛ kwu iyin nɛ ba.>>
MAR 14:72 Mina nɛta ogbigbi teela akpe efa. Ta iPyita wɛ elodzɛ ongwi iYesu gbɔ yan gbɛɛ: <<Ogbigbi ka teela akpe efa waba ta, abu ka tangwɛ ani akpe eta mani.>> Man o si nyɛ yi ikwu otseetse.
MAR 15:1 Mi egbegbe ototu nɛta, engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi engyukwo mgbi emi iJuda bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola yi okwakye mgbi ama ogbiikwɔ gbela yi ewoma. A si bwalu iYesu kyon wa nu iPlatu (ongwu nli iGɔna mgbi emi iRoma nani).
MAR 15:2 IPlatu si byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu li utɔ mgbi emi iJudaa?>> Nɛ iYesu nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, dafi abu gbɔ mani.>>
MAR 15:3 Engyukwo ama ofifɛ du ongwufabɔ mbon mi itɔdzɛ kwuba.
MAR 15:4 Nɛ iPlatu diyɛ byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu ka nu ani uka lo? Di umbwo ungwɔ ngwi a le du ongwufabɔ mbi abu ikye ma nɛni.>>
MAR 15:5 Nghaduu iYesu di nun uka ba kpɔɔ, ta i si kwulu iPlatu ewo.
MAR 15:6 Alonɔ oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi yɔ, iPlatu li dulu inggisɛ onyi mi obawi, ongwu emi iJuda mina mani.
MAR 15:7 Ongyulɔ oka ngwu a li kwun di iBaraba wodzɛ obawi. A bwalun yi inggisɛ angbeka ka wokɛ obawi ikyegbɛɛ a ngwɔ inggisɛ onɔ ngwi a le kyɔ ablodzɛ.
MAR 15:8 Ibyi inggisɛ wulu ba mbi iPlatu wa nyan gbɛɛ no kyɔ yi ama ungwɔ ngwi o li tsekise kyɔ mani.
MAR 15:9 Man iPlatu byita gbɛɛ, <<Ema mina gbɛɛ ni ani dzata utɔ mgbi emi iJuda nu emaa?>>
MAR 15:10 Ikyesinɛ o ye dafi li uwaba ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ kye iYesu wa nun mani.
MAR 15:11 Kpaa engyukwo ama ofifɛ si fyi ibyi inggisɛ ntona mfye itukwu gbɛɛ nu ma nu iPlatu dzita iBaraba no ka li iYesu ba.
MAR 15:12 IPlatu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ nin kyɔ yi ongwu ema kwun di utɔ mgbi emi iJuda nɛ?>>
MAR 15:13 A wulu gbɛɛ, <<Ngwɔn mi ekwatsi!>>
MAR 15:14 IPlatu byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ obube ngwi o kyɔ?>> Kpaa a nghao gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ngwɔn mi ekwatsi!>>
MAR 15:15 Ngwi o mina okyɔ itukwu mgbi ibyi nɛ, iPlatu si dzata iBaraba nu ma. O nu ma gbo iYesu onitse ibyibyi si kyon nu ma oka ngwɔ mi ekwatsi.
MAR 15:16 Ama oblakwutsɛ si kye iYesu lu udɛ iGɔna, mi imbe o li sɔ gbiikwɔ si kwu ewoma ela tsatsa kwakye.
MAR 15:17 A kye angwuto omuma shinishini won, di kyi shili akata ato kye tukwun ikye.
MAR 15:18 Ta a wita onyan agya gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ta abu angba utɔ mgbi emi iJuda!>>
MAR 15:19 A diyɛ kye okwuta le gbon mi ikye di kyanggwɔ kyin. Man a gbe akwafɔ kwɛsɛ diyɛ sunun.
MAR 15:20 Ngwi a nyan agya nɛ, a dulun angwuto omuma shinishini na kye mgban won. Ta a kyon tasɛ oka ngwɔ mi ekwatsi.
MAR 15:21 Ongyulɔ oka mi igeli iSirini, ngwu a li kwun di iSaimɔn, otsɔ Alekidzanda bɛyi iRufu, yɛ kyɛ ɛsɛ mgban nyɛ le lu. A siin gbɛɛ non kye ekwatsi nani.
MAR 15:22 Nɛ a kye iYesu ba imbe ngwi a li kwun di iGogota nani (ngwi itan di Imbe Ikpalikye).
MAR 15:23 Ta a kye eneekwɔ takye yi otse oyulu ungwɔ owulewo nun gbɛɛ no wa, kpaa o fwa owaawa.
MAR 15:24 Man a kyon gbokwo mi ekwatsi. A gbelun angwuto kye ghalu, a gbeefa ikye odi ungwɔ ngwi ali inggisɛ ka tu mani.
MAR 15:25 Li obyi ongwu gyanɛ mi egbegbe ngwi a kyon gbokwo ekwatsi.
MAR 15:26 A lɔ ungwɔ ama ngwi a du ongwufabɔ mbon mi ele ma gbɛɛ: UTƆ MGBI EMI IJUDA.
MAR 15:27 A gbokwo ama ofoofɛ nghi efa biyan, onyi mi abugye mgban yi oka mi abubɛ.
MAR 15:28 (Nɛ Afɛ mbwumbwo odzɛ ngbɛɛ, <<A gbɔn wo umbwo yi ama ofoola.>>)
MAR 15:29 Ama nle nyɛ ofɛ gbe ito tukwun kpakpa, le ngwi ikye dile gbɛɛ, <<Oho! Abu ngbɛɛ o ka gbobu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin diyɛ kyi mbɛlu mi egbe eta nɛ,
MAR 15:30 tashulu mi ekwatsi ba esɛ di dulu ewabu tɔ ka!>>
MAR 15:31 Li ngha ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola kpaa le nyan agya yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<O li dulu angbeka tɔ, kpaa o yagba dulu ewon tɔ wuba!
MAR 15:32 Ni iKrestu, utɔ mgbi emi Israi nɛ, tashulu onɛnɛ mi ekwatsi ba esɛ, ni eyi di diyɛ noyɛyɛ.>> Ama ngwu a kye ma gbokwo ekwatsi biyan kpaa fan esɛ.
MAR 15:33 Mi onɔ idzidzɛ udɛ yɛyɛ nɛta ɛsɛ duu yifu nghataa ba obyi eta mi onɔdɛ.
MAR 15:34 Mi obyi ongwu ta mi onɔdɛ na, iYesu si makwɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Eli, Eli, lama sabatani?>> Ngwi itan gbɛɛ, <<Imgbasho mgbi ani, Imgbasho mgbi ani, li ekyɛ ngwi abu le dzanita?>>
MAR 15:35 Ngwi ama nkwulɛsɛ to kwɛkwɛ fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, a gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Gadɔ na, o le kwu Elaija ela.>>
MAR 15:36 Ongyulɔ onyi mboma tsinya kɛ, kye isoso wokɛ eneekwɔ onunɔ, kye fakɛ ekwɔ si kyilen kye nu iYesu gbɛɛ no wa. Man o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Dzanta na. Ni eyi di kyayina Elaija ka wa tashulun ba esɛ.>>
MAR 15:37 IYesu gbobakwɔ mi ela okwukwo man o si yulu.
MAR 15:38 Ta angwuto ngwi a kye tsɛ mi idzidzɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin na gbua efa mi esho nghataa luba esɛ.
MAR 15:39 Ngwi agyegika mgbi ama oblakwutsɛ, ongwu nkwulɛsɛ mmana mi inai iYesu, fwo akwɔ mgban yɛ di dafi o kwulu nɛ, o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Otsitsi inggisɛ nɛ li Ongwɛ Imgbasho!>>
MAR 15:40 Engyaa angbeka kwulɛsɛ mbombo le di ungwɔ nle kiyayi mani. Mi idzidzɛ ma li iMeri iMagidalin bɛyi iMeri onɔ iJɛnsi ongbungbɛ bɛyi iJosisi yi iSalomi.
MAR 15:41 Mi iGalalia engyaa ntonɛ nose li kyɛ yi iYesu dile yan abɔ kpaa. Engyaa angbeka kwuba nba biyan mi iJerosalin kpaa to imbe nani.
MAR 15:42 Li egbe owewo (obwi egbe otonyewo). Ngwi onɔ le gbɛsɛ nɛ,
MAR 15:43 iJose ongwi Arimatia, inggisɛ okpɔngɔ mi idzidzɛ okwakye mgbi ama ogbiikwɔ, ongwu abuon le fɛ obaaba mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho. O kɛ yi imio ba mbi iPlatu ka bɔn ikwɔ mgbi iYesu.
MAR 15:44 Nɛ i kwulu iPlatu ewo ofwo gbɛɛ iYesu kwulu wa. O kwu ongyukwo mgbi ama oblakwutsɛ na ela, o byun ita ni iYesu kwulu wa yɔ.
MAR 15:45 Ngwi o wa fwo mi ondu ongyukwo mgbi ama oblakwutsɛ gbɛɛ dzɛ ngha nɛ, o kye ikwɔ na nu iJose.
MAR 15:46 Ta iJose gya angwuto ondlɛndlɛ, o kye sulu ikwɔ mgbi iYesu kye ndiwokɛ angwuto na man kyon ndzi mi endzi ngwi a cɛfo ikwutsɛ. Ta o tsamu ofishi tukwu ondendzi.
MAR 15:47 Nɛ iMeri iMagidalin bɛyi iMeri onɔ iJosisi di imbe ngwi a kyon ndzi mani.
MAR 16:1 Ngwi egbe otonyidɔ wa nyɛ nɛ, iMeri iMagidalin bɛyi iMeri onɔ iJɛnsi yi iSalomi gya engyie ogbungbɛ ikyegbɛɛ ni ama ka kye gyuwo ikwɔ mgbi iYesu.
MAR 16:2 Mi egbegbe byibyiibyi mi egbe ongwi ababɔ mi ikyidu (egbe iladi) ngwi onɔ le tɔ nɛni. A si tɔ ofɛ le lu endzi,
MAR 16:3 a byi eka ita mi ofɛ gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ ka mulu eyi ofishi mi ondendzi nɛ?>>
MAR 16:4 Kpaa ngwi a kyile ikye esho nɛ, a di gbɛɛ ofishi ngwi a kye tukwu ondendzi ma mulu.
MAR 16:5 Ngwi a kaka endzi nɛ, a di ongwongyulɔ mmafa wo angwuto onzundzɛ sɔdzɛ agya abugye mi endzi, ta i kwulu ma ewo.
MAR 16:6 Ongyulɔ na nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka tsimio ba na. Ema le pita iYesu ongwi iNadzareti, ongwu a ngwɔn mi ekwatsi nani. O kyato mi ikwu! O dzɛ mmɛnɛ wuba. Di imbe ngwi a kyon la ma na.
MAR 16:7 Nghanɛ ema yɛ lu na ka nya engwafɔ mgban yi iPyita gbɛɛ, <O teyi ema le lu iGalalia ma. Ema ka din mi imbe na, dafi o tsekise nya ema mani.> >>
MAR 16:8 Engyaa ntona si tasɛ mi endzi tsinya. Ewo shi igakwu loma i di wo ma ɛndɛ. A gbɔdzɛ yi inggisɛ onyi kpaa wuba, ikyena imio wo ma.
MAR 16:9 [Ngwi iYesu kyato mi egbe iladi mi egbegbe nɛ, o kye ewon tso mbi iMeri iMagidalin ababɔ, ongwu o lɔ onodzi ibwubwe tɔ mbon nghi egyafa nani.
MAR 16:10 O si lu ka nya ama nkyɛ yan tole tsukwu dile makwɔ mani.
MAR 16:11 Ngwi a fwo gbɛɛ iYesu dzɛ oshishe, ongyaa na din nɛ kpaa, a noyɛyɛ mi ele ba.
MAR 16:12 Onɔ wa nyɛ nɛ, iYesu di kye ewon tso emi ongwafɔɔn angbeka nghi efa mi ofɛ oka idzidza onɔ ngwi a le kyikyɛ mi ɛsɛ na mani.
MAR 16:13 A si yɛ wa nya angbeka ntona; kpaa a nu ma oyɛyɛ ba.
MAR 16:14 Onɔ gwee nɛ, iYesu di mblegba to iwyodonyi ntona ngwi a le gye ungwogye; o shɔdzɛ yi ama mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ba bɛyi ikyegbɛɛ a fwa kye itukwu tiishu onoyɛyɛ mbi ama ndin onɔ ngwi o kyato mi ikwongye mani.
MAR 16:15 Man o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Lu ɛsɛ ka gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nɛ nya ali inggisɛ duu.
MAR 16:16 Ali inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ ngwi a di kyɔn iBatisima yɔ, o ka watɔ, nghaduu inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ bayɔ, o ka dzili.
MAR 16:17 Ambɛ ntonɛ dika kyɛdɔ ama nnoyɛyɛ: Mi iyi mgbi ani a ka lɔ onodzi ibwubwe tasɛ; a dika gbɔ ondudzɛ ofufɛ;
MAR 16:18 a ka kye abɔ byi ifa; ni a wa otse ikwongye kpaa unkonyi ka kyɔ ma ba du; a dika kye abɔ gbo ama ndotse ta ootse ka ngyɛ loma.>>
MAR 16:19 Ngwi Otsɛ iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ yi ama ngyɛ nɛta, Imgbasho kyon lu esho, o sika sɔkɛ abugye mgbi Imgbasho.
MAR 16:20 Nɛ emi ongwafɔɔn si tasɛ ka gbeesɔ mi ali imbe duu, ta Otsɛ Imgbasho kyidɔ yi ama dile mbwumbwo mi elodzɛ mgban yi ambɛ nkyɛdɔ mani.]
LUK 1:1 Dafi inggisɛ kwuba fya olɔ ungwɔ nkiyayi mi idzidzɛ mgbi eyi nɛ,
LUK 1:2 ungwɔ olɔɔlɔ nɛ ba mbi eyi mi abɔ mgbi ama ndi inɛ-inɛ di li engbidɔ, ama nkye ewoma fifɛ mi elodzɛ na mani.
LUK 1:3 Nghanɛ, iTiofyilɔ otsungwudɛ, dafi ani abuani kya mi odzɛ nɛ saan mi owita-wita nɛ, n di gbɛɛ i tishi nin lɔn imbisɔn-mbisɔn mi ikye abu,
LUK 1:4 zukwu ni abu difwi otsitsi mgbi ungwɔ ngwi a tso abu nani.
LUK 1:5 Mi onɔ ngwi iHerude li utɔ mgbi iJudia mani, inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho oka iyin gbɛɛ iDzakaria, mi ayɛ inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho mgbi Abyija nani; owan Elidzabeti kpaa li mi etɔ mgbi Eron (ongwu kpaa li etɔ mgbi inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho).
LUK 1:6 Ama efa duu le nyaan mi inɛ Imgbasho, a ngyo ola di gbela yi odzɛ owɛ-wɛ mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho, a sulu idza ewo ba du.
LUK 1:7 Nghaduu a dzɛ yi ongwɛ ba, ikyesinɛ Elidzabeti li ogyoma; ama duu egbe mgbi ama kɛ.
LUK 1:8 Egbe oka nɛ, iDzakaria dzɛ ondidɔ mgban mgbi inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin mi onɔ ngwi idɔ dikyon.
LUK 1:9 A sadun mi efa ogboogbo, dafi nli ola mgbi ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho mani, gbɛɛ no kaka ozu idzidzɛ mgbi Imgbasho mi imbe iwashi okye ungwɔ ogbungbɛ toola.
LUK 1:10 Onɔ ngwi iDzakaria kye ungwɔ ogbungbɛ na le toola nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ ama osunu Imgbasho kwutokɛ esɛ le bibɔ.
LUK 1:11 Man ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho mblegba tun, o kwudzɛkɛ abugye mgbi iwashi okye ungwɔ ogbungbɛ toola.
LUK 1:12 Ngwi iDzakaria di ongyesɔ nɛ, i kakan ewo, imio di won.
LUK 1:13 Ongyesɔ nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka mio ba, iDzakaria; Imgbasho fwo ibɔ mgbi abu. Owaabu Elidzabeti ka mba abu ongwongyulɔ, o ka kwun iyi di iJɔn.
LUK 1:14 Abu ka dzɛ yi atsa diyɛ shisha. Ibyi inggisɛ angbeka ka tsatsa mi ombaamba mgbi ongwɛ nani.
LUK 1:15 Ongwɛ na ka li angbodzi inggisɛ mi inɛ mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho, o ka wa ɛbyɛ hona ungwɔ ofyumfye ba, o ka mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan wita mi onɔ ngwi onɔn byifun mani.
LUK 1:16 O ka kyata emi Israi kwuba, yile ma luba mbi Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi ama.
LUK 1:17 Ongwɛ na ka dzɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho iyayi, o ka dzɛ dafi Elaija mi Onodzi bɛyi mfye, okyatitukwu mgbi etsɛngwɛ yɛ luba mbi engwɛ, ama onghaadɔ yɛ luba ozoyeye mgbi ama osaan, adzi ni ongwu kye mɛlu inggisɛ mgbi Otsɛ tokɛ le fan fɛɛfɛ.>>
LUK 1:18 IDzakaria byi ongyesɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ali ofɛ ngwi ani ka ye gbɛɛ ungwɔnɛ ka wa dzɛ ngha? Bana ani kyɛ, owaani kpaa kyɛ.>>
LUK 1:19 Ongyesɔ nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Li ani iGebre, ani kwudzɛ mi inɛ Imgbasho, ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ gbɛɛ ni ani gbɔ nya abu di kye elodzɛ osuse nɛ ba mbi abu mani.
LUK 1:20 Dafi abu noyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ nka wa kyɔ mi onɔ mgban ba nɛ, o ka yɛɛ ikplima di yagba ogbɔdzɛ wuba, nghataa egbe ngwi owa abu ka wa fwise mani.>>
LUK 1:21 Nghanɛ, ama ntole fɛ iDzakaria mi esɛ ma i kwulu ma ewo dafi o mbe onɔ kwuba mi ifoozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ngha mani.
LUK 1:22 Ngwi o wa tɔ luba esɛ ma, o yagba gbɔdzɛ yi ama wuba, man a difwi gbɛɛ o di ungwɔ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, o yɛ le gbɔdzɛ yi ama mi abɔ ta o si yɛɛ ikplima.
LUK 1:23 Ngwi onɔ idɔ mgban mi ozu Imgbasho wa ngyɛ nɛman, o yɛ lu udan.
LUK 1:24 Onɔ wa nyɛ gwee nɛta, owan Elidzabeti si tiludɛ, o kye ewon da ofyia eda.
LUK 1:25 O gbɛɛ, <<Li Otsɛ Imgbasho kyungwɔnɛ yi ani, mi olɛlɛ nɛ o nu ikyese dɔ ani di kyelu ayiwi mgbi ani mi inɛ inggisɛ.>>
LUK 1:26 Ngwi ifu mgbi Elidzabeti wa li ofyia egyin mata, Imgbasho dɔ ongyesɔ iGebre kɛ ogalu iNadzareti, mi ayɛsɛ mgbi iGalalia,
LUK 1:27 mbi ibidrua ongyaa ngwu a li kwun gbɛɛ iMeri, ngwu inggisɛ oka mi etɔ mgbi iDevedi. Ongwu a li kwun di iJose, tsikwɔn dzɛ esɛ nani.
LUK 1:28 Ongyesɔ na ba mbon, o tan angba di nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu ngwu ikyese dɔ abu kpakpa nɛ! Otsɛ Imgbasho dzɛ yi abu.>>
LUK 1:29 Itukwu gbo-gbo lo iMeri kwuba mi elodzɛ mgbi ongyesɔ nɛni, i di kwulun ewo mi itɔ angba na dafi ka dzɛ mani.
LUK 1:30 Ongyesɔ iGebre nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka mio ba, iMeri, bana ikyese dɔ abu mbi Otsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 1:31 Abu ka wa byifu di mba ongwongyulɔ, o ka kwun iyi gbɛɛ iYesu.
LUK 1:32 O ka li angbodzi inggisɛ a dika kwun gbɛɛ Ongwɛ mgbi Ongwu Nghaangha mi esho. Otsɛ Imgbasho dika kye itsuutɔ mgbi otsɔn iDevedi kye nun.
LUK 1:33 O ka li Utɔ mi etɔ mgbi iJeko gyegwu, esutɔ mgban ka dondu ba.>>
LUK 1:34 IMeri byi ongyesɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔnɛ ka dzɛ ngha sinɛ? Ngwi ani ye ongyulɔ waba.>>
LUK 1:35 Ongyesɔ nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Onodzi Osaan ka kyi gbɛlu abu sɔ, mfye mgbi Ongwu Nnghaangha mi esho dika gbiiwulu tukwu abu. Nɛ Ongwɛ Osaan ngwu abu ka wa mba na, a ka kwun gbɛɛ Ongwɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 1:36 Elidzabeti, odo abu ngwu a tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o li ogyoma nani, o dzɛ yi ewefa ofyia egyin waani.
LUK 1:37 Lubana ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho ka kyɔ gbɛ ba dzɛma ba.>>
LUK 1:38 IMeri gbɛɛ, <<Ani li ongwongyiidɔ mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho, no kyɔ yi ani dafi abu gbɔ nɛni.>> Man ongyesɔ na lu dzatan.
LUK 1:39 Mi onɔ na iMeri wewo di yewo lu ogalu mi ewunggwɔ mi ɛsɛ iJudia.
LUK 1:40 O ka kaka udɛ iDzakaria, man o ta Elidzabeti angba.
LUK 1:41 Ngwi Elidzabeti fwo angba mgbi iMeri nɛ, ongwɛ gbokyɛɛ lon mi ifu. Ta Elidzabeti si mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan.
LUK 1:42 O gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Mse dzɛ yi abu mi idzidzɛ engyaa duu yi ongwɛ ngwu abu ka mba nani.
LUK 1:43 Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ikyese dɛn ngha, ngwi onɔ Otsɛ mgbi ani ba mbi ani?
LUK 1:44 Bana ngwi ani fwo angba mgbi abu mata, ongwɛ gbokyɛɛ len mi ifu yi atsa.
LUK 1:45 Mse no dzɛ yi abu ngwu noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ, odzɛ ngwi Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɔ yi abu ka wa dondu yɛyɛ mani.>>
LUK 1:46 IMeri gbɛɛ, <<Itukwu mgbi ani tsɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho
LUK 1:47 oshishe mgbɛn dzɛ yi atsa mi ikye Imgbasho Onagbɛ ani,
LUK 1:48 lubana o wɛ ani nli unka ba, ongwongyiidɔ mgban. Wita mi onɛnɛ lu iyayi etɔ duu kale kwu ani gbɛɛ ogbumse,
LUK 1:49 bana Imgbasho odatu kyungwɔ okwukwo mi ikye ani, Osaan li iyi mgban.
LUK 1:50 Elela odiidi mgban li na kɛ, mbi ama nli sunun, mi etɔ nghataa kɛ etɔ.
LUK 1:51 O kyungwɔ ama odatu mi abɔ mgban; o kye ganya ama okyile ewo esho, mi ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi ama.
LUK 1:52 O tashulu ama nsɔ utɔ mi itse mgbi ama kpaa o kyile ama oyile ewo esɛ esho.
LUK 1:53 Ama ngwu enbwa dɔ ma ma, o mbwo ma yi ungwɔ osuse, kpaa emi awuya yɔ, o wo ma ofɛ abubɔ.
LUK 1:54 O tobyi ongwongbɛ, mgban Israi, mi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgban yi emi otseyi
LUK 1:55 mbi Abrahan bɛyi engwiba mgban gyegwu.>>
LUK 1:56 IMeri la mbi Elidzabeti mɛ dafi ofyia eta man yɛ lu udɛ.
LUK 1:57 Ngwi onɔ imba mgbi Elidzabeti wa gyɔ nɛta, o mba ongwongyulɔ.
LUK 1:58 Emi ongwunɔn bɛyi ama owatse dɔn fwo gbɛɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho tso elela odiidi kpakpa mbon nɛ, a tsatsa yan.
LUK 1:59 Ongwɛ wa mbwo egbe egyata nɛ, a ba owa kyan ikyɛ, ma dzɛ mbisɔ ngwi a ka yile iyi otsɔn kyɔn gbɛɛ, iDzakaria.
LUK 1:60 Nghaduu onɔn nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ei! Dzɛ mbisɔ ngwi a ka kwun di iJɔn.>>
LUK 1:61 A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ onyi mi etɔ mgbi abu dzɛ yi iyi na ba.>>
LUK 1:62 A gbɔdzɛ yi iDzakaria mi abɔ gbɛɛ nu ma ye iyi ngwi o mina okyɔ ongwɛ na mani.
LUK 1:63 O kyɔ ambɛ gbɛɛ nu ma nun ongwɛ akwukwɔ olɔ ungwɔ, o si lɔ iyin gbɛɛ, <<IJɔn.>> Ta i kwulu ali inggisɛ duu ewo.
LUK 1:64 Labɔlabɔ nɛman ondu mgbi iDzakaria kwulu ta itiidɛ shɛ lon o di wita gbɔdzɛ, le tsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 1:65 Ama nwatse dɔn duu i kwulu ma ewo, inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ undɔ mgbi iJudia duu le gbɔdzɛ ungwɔ okwulewo ntonɛni.
LUK 1:66 Ali inggisɛ nfwo odzɛ nɛ le tsɛwɛ mi ele, le byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ali itɔ inggisɛ ngwi ongwɛ nɛ ka wa dzɛ?>> Bana mfye mgbi Imgbasho dzɛyan.
LUK 1:67 Ta otsɔn iDzakaria mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan man o wita ogbɔdzɛ mi ela oyegbɔ gbɛɛ:
LUK 1:68 <<Nu ma tsɛ Otsɛ, Imgbasho mgbi emi Israi, lubana o ba wa tobyi emidan di nagbɛ ma.
LUK 1:69 O kye otlɛsɛ mgbi owatɔ-watɔ tuo ikye eyi, mi etɔ mgbi ongwongbɛ mgban iDevedi.
LUK 1:70 Dafi o gbɔ nyɛ mbi oyegbɔ osaan emi tugbe
LUK 1:71 gbɛɛ ongwu ka dulu eyi tɔ mi abɔ engyikyili mgbi eyi, bɛyi mi abɔ mgbi ama ngwu di eyi lanyi
LUK 1:72 ikye otso elela odiidi mbi emi otseyi diyɛ wɛ ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgban osaan,
LUK 1:73 ofaafa ngwi o fa yi otseyi Abrahan:
LUK 1:74 odulu eyi tɔ mi abɔ engyikyili mgbi eyi, ikye onu eyi sunun yi imio ba
LUK 1:75 mi osaan bɛyi osaan mi iyayi mgban, mi egbe oshishe mgbi eyi duu.
LUK 1:76 Abu ongwani, a ka kwu abu gbɛɛ, oyegbɔ mgbi Ongwu Nnghaangha mi esho; lubana abu ka teyi Otsɛ ikye omɛlun ofɛ.
LUK 1:77 Onu emidan difwi odzɛ mgbi owatɔ-watɔ mi odzita ma yi ali ibwubwe.
LUK 1:78 Mi ikye elela odiidi oleewo mgbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi, ikyegbɛɛ ni osa dafi onɔ mi esho, gbosa ba esɛ mbi eyi
LUK 1:79 azukwu no wa nu osa mbi ama nwoto iyifu bɛyi iwulu ikwongye duu, ongyo eyi afɔ byi ofɛ iyu.>>
LUK 1:80 Nɛ ongwɛ na she di yɛɛ kpɔklɔɔ mi onodzi, o la okwɛsɛ nghataa se o wa kye ewon tso emi Israi mi ododa.
LUK 2:1 Mi onɔ na iSidza (utɔ) Ogɔstu, utɔ mgbi emi iRoma noola gbɛɛ nu ma lɔ mmbwo inggisɛ mi ɛsɛ iRoma tsatsadu.
LUK 2:2 Nɛnɛ li mmbwo olɔɔlɔ ongwi ababɔ mi onɔ ngwi iKwirinu li iGɔna odi mi ɛsɛ iSiria mani.
LUK 2:3 Ali inggisɛ lu oka lɔ mmbwo mi ɛsɛ udan.
LUK 2:4 IJose kyato mi igeli iNadzareti mi ayɛsɛ iGalalia, lu iBɛtlɛhɛn ogalu mgbi iDevedi mi ayɛsɛ iJudia, ikyekyɛ o tɔ mi etɔ mgbi iDevedi.
LUK 2:5 O kɛ oka lɔ mmbwo na yi iMeri, ongwu o tsikwɔn dzɛ esɛ dzɛ yi ifewo nani.
LUK 2:6 Ngwi a ka to iBɛtlɛhɛn nɛta imba kwun,
LUK 2:7 o si mbongwɛ mgban ovlɛ, ongwongyulɔ. O kye oshata ndiwon kyon lakɛ ikpɔkɔ, lubana a tu imbe mi ozu ingyoga ba.
LUK 2:8 Ama ongyo ifyungwɔ angbeka to agya ɛsɛ nani, a lato oshɛ tole ngyo ifyungwɔ mgbi ama mi otu.
LUK 2:9 Ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho wa mblegba tu ma, ta okwɔkwɔ mgbi Otsɛ gbosa kpakɛkɛ wo ma, nɛ imio wo ma kpakpa.
LUK 2:10 Kpaa ongyesɔ nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka mio ba na, ikyena ani ba yi ema Esɔ Osuse mgbi atsa ngwi shewo nka dzɛ ikye ali inggisɛ duu.
LUK 2:11 Inɛ nɛ mi ogalu mgbi iDevedi a mba ema ongye Onagbɛ, o li iKrestu Otsɛ.
LUK 2:12 Ungwɔ nka li ambɛ mbi ema yɔ, ema ka di ongwɛ eyeyi a kyon ndi wodzɛ oshata ladzɛ ikpɔkɔ.>>
LUK 2:13 Plɛ nɛta ibyi engyesɔ emi esho ba wa tu ongyesɔ nani, le tsɛ Imgbasho dile gbɛɛ,
LUK 2:14 <<Okwɔkwɔ no dzɛ yi Imgbasho ngwu Ngha mi esho, mi ɛsɛ nɛ iyu no dzɛ yi ama ngwu ikyese mgban dɔ ma mani.>>
LUK 2:15 Onɔ ngwi engyesɔ dzamata yɛ lu esho mata, ama ongyo ifyungwɔ gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Ba i kɛ iBɛtlɛhɛn ni i ka di ungwɔ nkyɔ se ngwi Otsɛ Imgbasho nya eyi odzɛ ele nɛni.>>
LUK 2:16 A byakpa lu maama si ka dili iJose yi iMeri bɛyi ongwɛ eyeyi na ladzɛ ikpɔkɔ.
LUK 2:17 Mi onɔ ngwi ama ongyo ifyungwɔ ntona di ongwɛ mata, a le gbɔdzɛ ngwi ongyesɔ nya ma mi ikpewo ongwɛ nɛni.
LUK 2:18 Ama nfwo odzɛ nɛ duu i kwulu ma ewo mi odzɛ ngwi ama ongyo ifyungwɔ gbɔ mi ikpewo ongwɛ nɛni.
LUK 2:19 Nghaduu iMeri kwulu ungwɔ ntonɛ duu wokɛ itukwu diyɛ le tsɛwɛ mi ele.
LUK 2:20 Ama ongyo ifyungwɔ ntona yidɔ lu, le kyile iyi Imgbasho deesho dile tsan mi alungwɔ ngwi ama fwo diyɛ di, ngwi kyɔ yɛyɛ dafi a plɛ nya ama mani.
LUK 2:21 A mban nyɛ egbe egyata, ngwi li egbe a ka kyan ikyɛ nɛman, a si kwun iyi gbɛɛ, iYesu, iyi ngwi ongyesɔ teyi nu duuse a wa byifun mani.
LUK 2:22 Ngwi egbe ogbiiyɛ mgbi ama wa gyɔ dafi ola mgbi iMose gbɔ ma nɛ, iJose yi iMeri kye iYesu kɛ iJerosalin oka kyon dubɔ Otsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 2:23 (Dafi a lɔ mi ola mgbi Otsɛ gbɛɛ, <<Ali ongwongyulɔ ovlɛ ngwu a mba duu nu ma kye dubɔ Otsɛ Imgbasho>>),
LUK 2:24 odi fifɛ dafi ola mgbi Imgbasho gbɔ mani: <<Anyama nghi efa, hona ibidrua ingyakpa efa.>>
LUK 2:25 Mi onɔ na inggisɛ oka dzɛ iJerosalin a kwun di iSimiɔn, o le saan di gbekabyi idɔ mgbi Imgbasho. Ongwu nose le fɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi, Onodzi Osaan nose dzɛyan.
LUK 2:26 Onodzi Osaan teyi kye tson gbɛɛ o ka di ikwongye inɛ waba, imbisɔ ngwi o ka di iKrestu Otsɛ.
LUK 2:27 Onodzi kye iSimiɔn teyi ka kaka ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin. Mi onɔ na iJose yi iMeri kye ongwɛ iYesu ba owa kyɔ yan dafi aletɔ mgbi ola mgbi ama mina mani.
LUK 2:28 ISimiɔn si kye gbɛlu ongwɛ na byikɛ abɔ mgban le tsɛ Imgbasho gbɛɛ:
LUK 2:29 <<Otsɛ onghaangha, dafi abu mbwo ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi abu nɛ, dzata ongbidɔ mgbi abu onɛnɛ no lu mi iyu.
LUK 2:30 Lubana inɛ mgbɛn di owatɔ-watɔ mgbi abu,
LUK 2:31 ngwi abu kye mɛlu dzɛkɛ mi inɛ inggisɛ duu.
LUK 2:32 Li osa nka dzɛ mbi emi agwɛsɛ odi kye okwɔkwɔ ba mbi emidabu Israi.>>
LUK 2:33 I kwulu iJose yi iMeri ewo mi elodzɛ ngwi iSimiɔn gbɔ mi ikpewo ongwɛ ma nɛni.
LUK 2:34 ISimiɔn kye mse bɛ ma ewo diyɛ nya iMeri gbɛɛ, <<Ongwɛ nɛ, Imgbasho kyon dzɛ ikye odzili-dzili bɛyi owatɔ-watɔ mgbi ibyi inggisɛ mi Israi. O dika li ambɛ ngwi inggisɛ kwuba ka fwan.
LUK 2:35 Ikye ni ewodzɛ mgbi inggisɛ ibyibyi wa dɔ ododa. Ta okwusunkli ka suwo abu itukwu kpaa.>>
LUK 2:36 Oyegbɔ oka kpaa nose dzɛ, ongyaa ngwu a li kwun di Anna, ongwɛ iFanue, mi agwɔ mgbi Ashɛ. O kyɛ kpakpa; o dzɛ yi oban mɛ onova egyafa ta oban si kwulu dzanta.
LUK 2:37 O yɛɛ owakwadɛ mɛ onova ngwusenɛ dɔn enɛ. O dzata ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ba, kpaa o li sunu Imgbasho onɔ yi otu mi ondu otukwu-tukwu yi ibɔ.
LUK 2:38 Mi obyi na yɛyɛ o kaka si ta Imgbasho angba dile gbɔdzɛ mgbi ongwɛ na nya ama ntole fɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi iJerosalin duu.
LUK 2:39 Onɔ ngwi iJose yi iMeri ngyɛlu alungwɔ ngwi ola mgbi Otsɛ mina ma, a yɛ luba ogalu mgbi ama iNadzareti mi ayɛsɛ iGalalia.
LUK 2:40 Ongwɛ na she diyɛ fyumfye; o mbwo yi ozoyeye, ikyese mgbi Imgbasho dzɛyan.
LUK 2:41 Ali onova ama omba iYesu li kɛ iJerosalin ikye oka kyɔ oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi.
LUK 2:42 Mi onɔ ngwi iYesu li onova iwyodefa ma, o si kɛ oga nɛ yi ama omban, dafi li aletɔ mgbi ama mani.
LUK 2:43 Egbe ngwi oga wa ngyɛ nɛ a yɛ le lu udɛ, ta ongwɛ iYesu tila mi iyikpa mi iJerosalin, kpaa ama omban ye ba.
LUK 2:44 IJose yi iMeri tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ di iYesu kyɛ yi ama mi idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ, nghanɛ a kyikyɛ mi egbe olɔlɔ. Man a wita opitan mbi odo ma bɛyi oka ma.
LUK 2:45 Dafi a din ba nɛ, a yidɔ lu iJerosalin le ka pitan.
LUK 2:46 Mi egbe ongwu ta ma, a wa tun mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin sɔdzɛ mi idzidzɛ etsetse, le fwo ma dile byi ma ita.
LUK 2:47 Ama nfwon duu, i kwulu ma ewo mi ozoyeye bɛyi uka mgban onuunu.
LUK 2:48 Onɔ ngwi ama omban wa din nɛ, i kwulu ma ewo. Onɔn si byun gbɛɛ, <<Ongwani, kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu kyungwɔnɛ yi eyi ngha? Otsabu yi ani gbili abu ndɛngyɛ.>>
LUK 2:49 IYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le pita ani? Ema ye dafi i wo gbɛɛ ani ka dzɛ mi ozu mgbi Otsani baa?>>
LUK 2:50 Nghaduu elodzɛ ngwi o nya ma na gbosa loma ba.
LUK 2:51 Ta iYesu wafɔ yi ama lu iNadzareti dile siikye nu ma. Onɔn kwulu elodzɛ ntonɛ duu wokɛ itukwu mbon.
LUK 2:52 IYesu she mi ikpewo bɛyi ozoyeye, ikyese mgbi Imgbasho dzɛyan, inggisɛ duu gbela yan.
LUK 3:1 Mi onova ongwi iwyodeda ngwi iSidza (utɔ) iTiberu li utɔ mi iRoma mani, iPontu iPlatu li iGɔna mi ayɛsɛ iJudia, iHerude li atɔtsɛ mi ayɛsɛ iGalalia, ongwunɔn iFyilipi li atɔtsɛ mi Ituria bɛyi iTirakoni, iLisania di li atɔtsɛ mi Abilen.
LUK 3:2 Mi onɔ ngwi Anna bɛyi iKayafa li okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho ma, elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho ba mbi iJɔn ongwɛ iDzakaria mi okwɛsɛ.
LUK 3:3 O kaka ali imbe mi ewekyoo mgbi iJodan, le gbeesɔ gbɛɛ, <<Kyata mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema nu ma kyɔ ema iBatisima ikye nu ma dzita ema yi ali ibwubwe.>>
LUK 3:4 Dafi oyegbɔ Adzaya tsekise lɔ gbɛɛ: <<Ela mgbi inggisɛ le kwu mi okwɛsɛ gbɛɛ: <Mɛlu ofɛ ikye mgbi Otsɛ no byi yɛyɛ na,
LUK 3:5 Ali ufɛ duu nu ma yilen tukwu, ali unggwɔ bɛyi undɔ duu nu ma kye gbobu. Ofɛ ama nkwenggengga ma nu ma kye nalu byi yɛyɛ, ofɛ ama nli ishishɛ duu ni a kye tukwulu.
LUK 3:6 Ta inggisɛ owamyɛ duu ka di owatɔ-watɔ mgbi Imgbasho.> >>
LUK 3:7 IJɔn nya ibyi inggisɛ ama nba gbɛɛ no wa kyɔ ma iBatisima ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema engwɛ ogidzi ntonɛ! Li emɛ wɛ ema odzɛ gbɛɛ ni ema tsinya itingga mgbi Imgbasho, nkyɛ iyayi na?
LUK 3:8 Nghanɛ ema kyɔ ali otso itukwu okyata-kyata mgbi ema, Ka nya ewema gbɛɛ, <Eyi li engwɛ mgbi Abrahan ta si ngyɛ ba.> Lubana n nya ema Imgbasho ka yagba kyata akwutsɛ ntonɛ yɛɛ engwɛ Abrahan gbɛ.
LUK 3:9 Ika ladzɛ iteekwɔ le fɛɛfɛ, ali ekwɔ n wa owawa osuse ba duu, a ka kye dzɛlu ngwuta wokɛ ola.>>
LUK 3:10 Inggisɛ ntona byun gbɛɛ, <<Ni eyi kyɔsinɛ?>>
LUK 3:11 IJɔn nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi abu nghi efa yɔ, no kye onyi nu odon, abu ndzɛ yi ungwogye yɔ gha yi inggisɛ oka.>>
LUK 3:12 Ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ kpaa ba owa kyɔ iBatisima, a byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, eyi ma ni eyi kyɔsinɛ?>>
LUK 3:13 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama gbɛ awuya nyɛ obyi ba.>>
LUK 3:14 Oblakwutsɛ angbeka kpaa byun gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ma ni eyi kyɔsinɛ?>> O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama gbɛ inggisɛ awuya mi abumfye ba dika gbe odzɛ tukwu inggisɛ ewo mi atsika ba, udza ofya mgbi ema no gyɔlo ema.>>
LUK 3:15 Inggisɛ ntona le fɛ yi ɛwɛ ogbebyi dile tsɛwɛ mi itukwu gbɛɛ naadi iJɔn li iKrestu, ngwu ama le fɛ ma hoo!
LUK 3:16 IJɔn nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani le kyɔ ema iBatisima yi eni. Nghaduu Ongwu nshewo ngha ani kyɛma, ngwu odi okpafɔ mgban kpaa ani mɛ oshɛ ba. O ka kyɔ ema iBatisima mi Onodzi Osaan mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ola.
LUK 3:17 Okwuga byidzɛ abɔ mgban, o ka folu ungwogyowe kye gbelu inɛnɛ osuse wokɛ oba, ashuwe yɔ o ka kye toola mi ola ngwi li gyegwu.>>
LUK 3:18 IJɔn kwu inggisɛ ntona ɛwɛ wo mi elodzɛ angbeka kwuba di gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nya ma.
LUK 3:19 Dafi iJɔn fwa mi otsitsi tsɛ iHerude atɔtsɛ inɛ ikyegbɛɛ o kyelu iHerodia owa ongwunɔn iFyilipi bɛyi alungwɔ obube angbeka ngwi o tsekise kyɔ nɛ,
LUK 3:20 iHerude diyɛ kyɔ alobube ndatu ngha duu: O bwalu iJɔn wokɛ obawi.
LUK 3:21 Ngwi iJɔn kyɔ ali inggisɛ duu iBatisima nɛ, o kyɔ iYesu kpaa iBatisima. Mi onɔ ngwi iYesu le bibɔ nɛta, esho kwulu,
LUK 3:22 man Onodzi Osaan tashulu ba mbon dafi anyama mani, ela di tɔ mi esho gbɛɛ, <<Abu li Ongwani nkpaani itukwu; i kpani yi abu saan.>>
LUK 3:23 Onɔ ngwi iYesu li onova osudiwyo ma, o wita idɔ mgban. Ali inggisɛ tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o li ongwɛ iJose, nli ongwɛ iHeli,
LUK 3:24 ongwɛ iMatati, ongwɛ iLevi, ongwɛ iMelki, ongwɛ iJenai, ongwɛ iJose,
LUK 3:25 ongwɛ iMatatia, ongwɛ Emosu, ongwɛ iNahun, ongwɛ Esili, ongwɛ iNaga,
LUK 3:26 ongwɛ iMaati, ongwɛ iMatatia, ongwɛ iSeme, ongwɛ iJoseki, ongwɛ iJoda,
LUK 3:27 ongwɛ iJonan, ongwɛ iResa, ongwɛ iDzerubabɛ, ongwɛ iShetiɛ, ongwɛ iNeri,
LUK 3:28 ongwɛ iMelki, ongwɛ Addi, ongwɛ iKosan, ongwɛ Elimanda, ongwɛ Eri,
LUK 3:29 ongwɛ iJoshua, ongwɛ Eliadza, ongwɛ iJorin, ongwɛ iMatati, ongwɛ iLevi,
LUK 3:30 ongwɛ iSimiɔn, ongwɛ iJuda, ongwɛ iJose, ongwɛ iJonan, ongwɛ Eliakin,
LUK 3:31 ongwɛ iMelia, ongwɛ iMena, ongwɛ iMatata, ongwɛ iNatan, ongwɛ iDevedi,
LUK 3:32 ongwɛ iJese, ongwɛ Obɛdi, ongwɛ iBoadzi, ongwɛ iSalmɔn, ongwɛ iNashɔn,
LUK 3:33 ongwɛ Aminada, ongwɛ iRan, ongwɛ iHerizɔn, ongwɛ iPeredzi, ongwɛ iJuda,
LUK 3:34 ongwɛ iJeko, ongwɛ Adziki, ongwɛ Abrahan, ongwɛ iTera, ongwɛ iNahɔ,
LUK 3:35 ongwɛ iSerɔgu, ongwɛ iReu, ongwɛ iPelegi, ongwɛ Ebɛl, ongwɛ iSala,
LUK 3:36 ongwɛ iKaina, ongwɛ Afadza, ongwɛ iShɛn, ongwɛ iNua, ongwɛ iLameki,
LUK 3:37 ongwɛ iMetusela, ongwɛ Enɔku, ongwɛ iJaredi, ongwɛ iMahalale, ongwɛ iKaina,
LUK 3:38 ongwɛ Enɔsh, ongwɛ iSeti, ongwɛ Adan, Ongwɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 4:1 IYesu mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan, o yɛ mi ekyoo mgbi iJodan, ta Onodzi kyon teyi lu okwɛsɛ,
LUK 4:2 mi imbe na iSatan gyilan mi egbe ngwusefa. Mi egbe ntona duu o gye unkonyi ba, ngwi egbe ntona wa nyɛ nɛ, enbwa si dɔn.
LUK 4:3 Ta iSatan nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kini abu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho yɔ, nya ikwutsɛ nɛ no kyata yɛɛ ibredi.>>
LUK 4:4 IYesu nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: <Li mi ibredi ta ngwi inggisɛ ka dzɛ oshishe ba.> >>
LUK 4:5 ISatan di kyon lu ka dɔkɛ imbe oshigbo, o tson esutɔ mgbi ɛsɛ duu.
LUK 4:6 Ta iSatan nyan gbɛɛ, <<N ka kye ali mfye duu nu abu bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mgbi ɛsɛ nɛni, lubana a kye mfye bɛyi okwɔkwɔ kye nu ani, ani ka yagba okye nu ali inggisɛ ngwu ani mina duu.
LUK 4:7 Nghanɛ, kini abu sunu ani yɔ, ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ka yɛɛ mgbi abu.>>
LUK 4:8 Kpaa iYesu nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: <Sunu Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi abu di li ongwu ta kyɔn idɔ.> >>
LUK 4:9 ISatan di kye iYesu lu iJerosalin ka kyon dɔkɛ ikyikye ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin. O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kini abu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho yɔ, bulu lu esɛ.
LUK 4:10 Lubana Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: << <O ka wo engyesɔ mgban ola ikye abu gbɛɛ nu ma ngyo abu saan;
LUK 4:11 ni abu bulu le lu esɛ a ka kye gbɛlu abu mi abɔ mgbi ama ikyegbɛɛ ni abu ka kye afɔ tsɛ akwutsɛ ba.> >>
LUK 4:12 Nghaduu iYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ <Ka mbadi Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi abu ba.> >>
LUK 4:13 Mi onɔ ngwi iSatan ngyɛlu ogyila iYesu nɛ, o lu dzanta, o nyan gbɛɛ, se egbe oka.
LUK 4:14 IYesu yɛ luba iGalalia mi mfye mgbi Onodzi, ta odzɛ mgban si gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ ɛsɛ na duu.
LUK 4:15 O tso mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, ali inggisɛ duu tsan.
LUK 4:16 Ta iYesu kɛ iNadzareti imbe ngwi o she mani, o ka kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda mi egbe otonyidɔ dafi o li tsekise kyɔ mani. O kyato dzɛkunto ogbɔ afɛ,
LUK 4:17 a kye afɛ ofulu-fulu mgbi oyegbɔ Adzaya kye nun. O kye nalu afɛ na, o tu imbe ngwi Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ;
LUK 4:18 <<Onodzi mgbi Otsɛ dzɛ mbi ani, lubana o kye engyie Kyi ani, onu ani gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nya emi adzɛ. O dɔ ani esɔ ogbɔ otɔ-tɔ mi isɔ nya ama nwoto obawi, bɛyi onu ama nbinɛ dinɛ, onu ama ngwu a si ma, to myɛɛ-myɛɛ.
LUK 4:19 Odi gbɔgbɛɛ onɔ gyɔ ngwi Otsɛ Imgbasho ka dulu emidan watɔ.>>
LUK 4:20 O si kye fulu afɛ na, yilen nu inggisɛ oyabɔ nkye nun mani, man sɔkɛ esɛ. Ta ali inggisɛ ama nwoto ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda na duu gbe inɛ fyakwun.
LUK 4:21 Ta iYesu wita ogbɔdzɛ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Inɛ nɛ, odzɛ ngwi Afɛ lɔ nɛ mbwumbwo mi adɔ mgbi ema.>>
LUK 4:22 Ali inggisɛ duu gbɔdzɛ osuse ikpewon; i di kwulu ma ewo mi itɔ elodzɛ osuse nle tɔ mi ondu mbon nani. A si byi ewoma gbɛɛ <<Nɛnɛ li ongwɛ iJose nɛ baa?>>
LUK 4:23 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li otsitsi ema ka nya ani utsa ngha gbɛ, gbɛɛ: <Inggisɛ obwe ootse, bwe ewabu: di kyungwɔ ngwi abu le kyɔ mi iKapenahun ma mi ɛsɛ udɛ abu.>
LUK 4:24 <<Otsitsi ani le nya ema, oyegbɔ onyonyi kpaa a li gbela yan mi ɛsɛ udan ba.
LUK 4:25 I mina ani ni ema ye gbɛɛ engyaa owakwadɛ to ɛsɛ Israi kwuba mi onɔ mgbi Elaija, mi onɔ ngwi mmbwo kya ba mɛ onova eta yi ofyia egyin ngwi enbwa gbo kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu mani.
LUK 4:26 Nghaduukpaa Imgbasho dɔ Elaija esɔ kɛ mbi owakwadɛ onyi kpaa mi Israi ba, se li owakwadɛ mi iDzarefati mi ogalu iShidon ta.
LUK 4:27 Emi Israi kwuba to yi otsoma mi onɔ mgbi Elaisha oyegbɔ nghaduu Imgbasho ngyɛlu inggisɛ onyi kpaa otsoma ba, se li iNama inggisɛ iSiria ta.>>
LUK 4:28 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ yi ama ngha nɛ, ali inggisɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda na duu nyɛ yi itingga.
LUK 4:29 Ta a kyato, a lɔn onya tasɛ mi ɛsɛ udɛ ama, a kyon tasɛ lu ikpozu udɛ le ka kyon dɔkɛ undɔ ongwi a mbɛ igeli mgbi ama mi ele mani, ikye oka tsamun ngwuta lu agblo.
LUK 4:30 Nghaduu, o sɛ wo ma ewo lu ofɛ mgban.
LUK 4:31 Nɛ iYesu si lu iKapenahun, igeli mi iGalalia, mi egbe otonyidɔ, ka wita otso ma.
LUK 4:32 I kwulu ma ewo mi otsootso mgban, ikyesinɛ esɔ mgban kyɛ yi mfye.
LUK 4:33 Mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda na, inggisɛ oka dzɛ ele ngwu dzɛ yi esɛ ikye, onodzi obube. O teela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ,
LUK 4:34 <<Kpei! iYesu ongwi iNadzareti, li alungwɔ mina abu okyɔ yi eyi? Abu ba owa dzili eyii? Ani ye abu, abu li Ongwɛ Osaan mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 4:35 Nghaduu, iYesu kyɔkyɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Dede, tasɛ mbon.>> Ta onodzi obube na kyon gyɛsɛ mi idzidzɛ ma, man tasɛ mbon, kpaa o yama kyɔn unkonyi ba.
LUK 4:36 I kwulu ma ewo, ta a sile gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ali odzɛ lo! Lubana o gbɔdzɛ mi ela mfye yi onodzi ibwubwe ta a fwon diyɛ tasɛ.>>
LUK 4:37 Man odzɛ mgban si gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ ɛsɛ na bɛyi ɛsɛ ama nto yi ama kwɛkwɛ duu.
LUK 4:38 O si kyato mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, lu udɛ iSaimɔn, onɔ na awo bwa onowa iSaimɔn ladzɛ esɛ le tsaatsa, nɛ a nya iYesu gbɛɛ no yan abɔ.
LUK 4:39 Ta iYesu si kɛ ka klɛsɛ mbon, o kyɔkyɔ yi awo na, man i tɔ dzanta. Onowa iSaimɔn si kyato wita gbe ungwogye le nu ma.
LUK 4:40 Mi onɔnɔdɛ, a gbe emi ootse idzidza-dzidza ba mbi iYesu, ta o kye abɔ gbo ali inggisɛ ewo, man ootse ngyɛ loma.
LUK 4:41 Enedzi ibwubwe kpaa tɔ mbi inggisɛ kwuba le kwu ela gbɛɛ, <<Abu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho.>> Nghaduu o kwo ma adɔ di nu ma ofɛ ogbɔdzɛ ba ikyesinɛ, a ye dafi o li iKrestu mani.
LUK 4:42 Ngwi egbe fa nɛ, iYesu tasɛ lu imbe ngwi inggisɛ dzɛ ele ba; ibyi inggisɛ tɔ tole pitan, ngwi a wa to mbon nɛ, i mina ma omben onɔ, ikyegbɛɛ no ka lu dzata ma ba.
LUK 4:43 Nghaduu iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li kyɛmɛ ngwi ani ka gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ mi igeli angbeka kpaa, lubana li itɔdzɛ nɛ ngwi Imgbasho dɔ ani esɔ ba mmɛnɛ aani.>>
LUK 4:44 O sile gbɔ Esɔ mi emi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda kpatsɛ iJudia.
LUK 5:1 Egbe oka nɛ, iYesu kwulɛsɛ dzɛ ewuutɔ mgbi iGenesareti, ibyi inggisɛ kpakɛkɛ won tole fwo odzɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 5:2 Nɛ o ndinɛ ka gbo yi uwaa nghi efa bɛto onduutɔ kpaa ama otuntsɛ woto ele ba, a tasɛ le sa ukɛ mgbi ama.
LUK 5:3 O kaka uwaa oka ongwi li mgbi iSaimɔn, man nyan gbɛɛ no tsamu uwaa kaka eni gwee, ta o sɔkɛ esɛ mi uwaa si tso ma ungwɔ.
LUK 5:4 Onɔ ngwi o ngyɛlu ogbɔdzɛ yi ama nɛ, o nya iSaimɔn gbɛɛ, <<Gblekɛ ole, ka wo ukɛ ni ema kwu mmbwɛ.>>
LUK 5:5 ISaimɔn nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, eyi kwo ukɛ mi otu nghataa ni egbe fa mi adzɛ kpakpa, kpaa eyi kwu oshagye ba; kpaa li abu gbɔ mayɔ n ka kye wo.>>
LUK 5:6 Ngwi a kyɔ dafi iYesu nya ma nɛ, a kwu mmbwɛ kpakpa, man ukɛ mgbi ama wita ofawa.
LUK 5:7 Nɛ a flɛ ama otuntsɛ angbeka ama nwoto uwaa oka ntona abɔ gbɛɛ nu ma wa ya ma abɔ, nɛ a si kwu mmbwɛ mbwo uwaa efa ntona kyɛɛ dile fya osulu-sulu.
LUK 5:8 Ngwi iSaimɔn iPyita di ungwɔnɛ nghanɛ, o ka kye akwafɔ kwokɛ esɛ mi iyayi mgbi iYesu, o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Lu dzɛ ani ta, Otsɛ, lubana ani li inggisɛ alobube.>>
LUK 5:9 Ikyekyɛ ongwu bɛyi ama nto yan duu i kwulu ma ewo mi itɔ mmbwɛ ngwi ama kwu kwuba nani.
LUK 5:10 Li ngha ngwi iJɛnsi bɛyi iJɔn emi ongwɛ iDzebedi ama nle tuntsɛ yi iSaimɔn na kpaa i kwulu ma ewo aali. Nghaduu, iYesu nya iSaimɔn gbɛɛ, <<Ka mio ba, wita mi onɛnɛ lu iyayi ka li inggisɛ ngwi ema kale kwu.>>
LUK 5:11 Ta a kye kwolu uwaa mgbi ama dɔkɛ esɛ, a dzata alungwɔ duu kyɛdɔn.
LUK 5:12 Dafi iYesu dzɛ mi igeli oka nɛ, inggisɛ oka ba mbon ongwu otsoma gban ewo sɔ. Ngwi o di iYesu nɛ, o lakɛ esɛ kye inɛ tukwu esɛ, tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ni abu ki gbela, o ka yagba nu ani yɛɛ saan.>>
LUK 5:13 IYesu na abɔ gbon ewo nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ani gbela, yɛɛ saan!>> Mi onɔ na ta otsoma ngyɛ lon.
LUK 5:14 Nɛ iYesu kwon adɔ gbɛɛ, <<Ka ka gbɔ nya inggisɛ ba, kpaa kye ewabu lu ka tso inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho di nu umba dafi iMose woola mani, mi oyɛɛ saan mgbi abu, zukwu no yɛɛ obwɛndɛ mbo ma.>>
LUK 5:15 Nghaduu odzɛ mgban nghao le gbɔfwɛ-gbɔfwɛ, ta ibyi inggisɛ nghao le ba ikye ofwon di non ngyɛlu ma ootse.
LUK 5:16 Kpaa iYesu li lu ka dzɛkɛ imbe ndede le bibɔ.
LUK 5:17 Egbe oka nɛ, iYesu le tsungwɔ nɛta, emi iFarasi bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose, ama nkyɛ mi ali udɛ mi iGalalia, mi iJudia bɛyi iJerosalin duu sɔto ele, mfye mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho kpaa dzɛyan ikye onon ongyɛlu ma ootse.
LUK 5:18 Inggisɛ angbeka si kye inggisɛ ngwu alewo mgban kwulu mi amuku, a fya okyon kaka ozu okyon lakiyayi iYesu.
LUK 5:19 Kpaa dafi a tu ofɛ okyɔ ngha ba ikye ibyi inggisɛ nɛ, a lu ka tɔkɛ ikpendu, kyon nyɛ ikpendu mi amuku nyɛ idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ nghataa lu iyayi iYesu.
LUK 5:20 Dafi iYesu di oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama nghanɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Uka, a kye ali ibwubwe mgbi abu ta abu mkpa.>>
LUK 5:21 Ta emi iFarasi bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola, wita otsɛwodzɛ gbɛɛ, <<O tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ongwu li ali inggisɛ? Odzɛ na li ito! Li Imgbasho yuon ka dzata inggisɛ yi obube!>>
LUK 5:22 Nghaduu ngwi iYesu ye ewodzɛ mgbi ama nɛ, o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ali ewodzɛ ngwi ema le tsɛ mi itukwu mgbi ema da?
LUK 5:23 Li ekyɛ nghao li adzɛ ba: Li ogbɛɛ, a dzita abu yi ali ibwubwe mgbi abu naadi li ogbɛɛ: <Kyato kyikyɛ?>
