LUK 5:24 Kpaa li ikye onu ema ye gbɛɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ dzɛ yi mfye mi ɛsɛ nɛ odzɛ inggisɛ ta yi ali ibwubwe...>> O gbɔ yi inggisɛ ngwu alewo mgban kwulu na gbɛɛ, <<Ani le nya abu kyato, kyelu amuku mgbi abu lu udɛ.>>
LUK 5:25 Labɔlabɔ mata, inggisɛ ngwu alewo mgban kwulu na kyato dzɛkunto mi inɛ mgbi ama, o kyi kyelu amuku mgban ongwi a kyon wele ba ma lu udɛ le tsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 5:26 Ali inggisɛ duu ewo waa loma, a si tsɛ Imgbasho. Imio wo ma nɛta a gbɛɛ <<Eyi di ungwɔ ama okwulewo inɛ.>>
LUK 5:27 Ngwi iYesu ngyɛ nɛ, o tasɛ ta o di inggisɛ ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ ngwu a li kwun di iLevi sɔdzɛ mi ozu ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ. O si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyɛdɔ ani.>>
LUK 5:28 Man iLevi kyato dzata alungwɔ duu kyɛdɔn.
LUK 5:29 Nɛ iLevi kyɔn oga okwukwo mi udɛ mgban, ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ kwuba bɛyi angbeka kpaa le gye ungwogye yi ama.
LUK 5:30 Kpaa emi iFarasi bɛyi emidi ama, ama otso ola mgbi iMose le ndaandu, le byi engwafɔ mgbi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le gye ungwogye dile wa yi ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ bɛyi emi ali ibwubwe?>>
LUK 5:31 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Li inggisɛ ama ndzɛ saan li le pita inggisɛ obwotse ba, kpaa li inggisɛ ama ndotse.
LUK 5:32 Ani ba ikye owa kwu ama osaan ela ba, kpaa li ama nle saan ba mani, ikye nu ma kyatitukwu.>>
LUK 5:33 A gbɔ yi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Engwafɔ mgbi iJɔn li tukwondu dile bibɔ alonɔ duu, engwafɔ mgbi emi iFarasi kpaa, nghaduu emidabu le gye di wa alonɔ duu.>>
LUK 5:34 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema ka yagba osi ama nbato oga ongyaa ofufɛ gbɛɛ nu ma tukwondu mi onɔ ngwi ongyaa ofufɛ ka dzɛ yi ama na gbɛɛ?
LUK 5:35 Nghaduu egbe kyɛma ngwi a ka kyi kyelu obongyaa ofufɛ, ta mi egbe ntona, ama kpaa ka tukwondu.>>
LUK 5:36 O diyɛ nya ma utsa gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka mwadzɛ angwuto ofufɛ kye tukwukɛ angwuto ogbugbe ba. Ki non kyɔ ngha, o ka fawa angwuto ofufɛ na ta ba, ayɛ angwuto ofufɛ na dika kwokyi yi ogbugbe na ba.
LUK 5:37 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka kye eneekwɔ ofufɛ yaokɛ ikpɔkpɔ ogbugbe ba. Ki non kyɔ ngha yɔ, eneekwɔ ofufɛ na ka kye gbobu ikpɔkpɔ nani, eneekwɔ na kpaa ka yangwuta nyanya bɛyi ikpɔkpɔ na duu.
LUK 5:38 Kpaa a li kye eneekwɔ ofufɛ yaokɛ ikpɔkpɔ ofufɛ.
LUK 5:39 Inggisɛ onyi nle wa eneekwɔ ogbugbe se ngwi ofufɛ ka minan dzɛma ba, o ka gbɛɛ: <Ogbugbe nghao tishi.> >>
LUK 6:1 Mi egbe otonyidɔ oka nɛ, emi iYesu le kyikyɛ nyɛ ifu okwɔ ekwu, ta engwafɔɔn le shɛ ekwu, ngwunu mi atabɔ le bukwu.
LUK 6:2 Kpaa emi iFarasi angbeka byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le kyungwɔ nli ola ba mi egbe otonyidɔ ngha?>>
LUK 6:3 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema gbɔ ungwɔ ngwi utɔ iDevedi kyɔ mi onɔ ngwi ongwu bɛyi emi ibuge mgban ngwi enbwa dɔ ma na ye wa lo?
LUK 6:4 O ka kaka ozu Imgbasho, kyi kyelu ibredi ongwi a kye dɔ Imgbasho ubɔ, kye gye di kye nu ama nkyɛ yan ma duu. Ongwi ola gbɛɛ se li inggisɛ ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho ta ka gye mani.>>
LUK 6:5 Nɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ongwɛ Inggisɛ li Otsɛ mgbi egbe otonyidɔ.>>
LUK 6:6 Mi egbe otonyidɔ oka nɛ, iYesu kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda le tso, nɛ inggisɛ oka wodzɛ ele ongwu abɔ abugye mgban waawaa.
LUK 6:7 Emi iFarasi bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola gbe inɛ fyakwun ikye nu ma di ni o ka bwe inggisɛ na mi egbe otonyidɔ yɔ, ni ama tu itɔdzɛ okye abɔ byi ele kwun elikwɔ.
LUK 6:8 Nghaduu iYesu ye ewodzɛ mgbi ama otsɛɛtsɛ man o si nya inggisɛ owaa abɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Kyato wa dzɛkɛ mi iyayi mgbi ali inggisɛ duu.>> Ta o kyato wa kwulɛsɛ dzɛkɛ.
LUK 6:9 Nghanɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani le byi ema ita, li ole li ola mgbi eyi ngwi li ayin okyɔɔkyɔ mi egbe otonyidɔ: li okyɔ osuse naadi li okyɔ obube, li odulu oshishe naadi li odzili oshishe?>>
LUK 6:10 IYesu ndinɛ di ma kpatsɛ si nya inggisɛ owaa abɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Na abɔ mgbi abu.>> O si kyɔ ngha, ta abɔ mgban yɛɛ saan.
LUK 6:11 Nghaduu itukwu fu loma a si wita ogbɔ yi ewoma ungwɔ ngwi ama ka kyɔ yi iYesu mani.
LUK 6:12 Egbe oka nose nɛ iYesu tasɛ lu unggwɔ le ka bibɔ, o kye otu na duu bibɔ mbi Imgbasho.
LUK 6:13 Ngwi egbe wa fa nɛ, o kwu ama nkyɛdɔn duu ela takye man, o sadu engyulɔ iwyodefa, o kwu ma gbɛɛ, <<Ama ogbikye ani.>>
LUK 6:14 ISaimɔn ongwu o kyɔn iyi oka gbɛɛ iPyita, bɛyi ongwunɔn Andru, yi iJɛnsi, yi iJɔn, yi iFyilipi, yi iBatlomi,
LUK 6:15 yi iMatiu, yi iTɔmɔsu, yi iJɛnsi ongwɛ Alfeɔ, yi iSaimɔn ongwu a kwun gbɛɛ Ogbodami,
LUK 6:16 yi iJuda ongwɛ iJɛnsi bɛyi iJuda Iskarɔti ongwu n wa yɛɛ inggisɛ okyon gya nani.
LUK 6:17 Nɛta emi iYesu tashulu mi unggwɔ wa kwulɛsɛ mi imbe ogblagadaa. Ama okyɛdɔn kwuto ele bɛyi ibyi inggisɛ mi ali ayɛ iJudia, iJerosalin yi ewekyoo mgbi iTiru bɛyi iSidon duu.
LUK 6:18 A ba ikye owa fwon, no di ngyɛlu ma ootse. Ama ngwu onodzi ibwubwe kaka ma ewo duu o ngyɛlu ma ele.
LUK 6:19 Ta inggisɛ ibyibyi le nana okye abɔ gbon, lubana ama nkye abɔ gbon duu mfye tɔ mbon ngyɛlu ma ootse.
LUK 6:20 IYesu kye inɛ byi ama okyɛdɔn, o nya ma gbɛɛ: <<No kpa ema ewo ema emi adzɛ, lubana esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ ikye ema.
LUK 6:21 No kpa ema ewo ema ngwu enbwa le dɔ ema onɛnɛni, lubana ema ka wa tolo. No kpa ema ewo ema ama nle tsukwu onɛnɛni, lubana ema ka wa shisha.
LUK 6:22 No kpa ema ewo mi onɔ ngwi inggisɛ di ema kyili, nu ma di kye ema wuuta ba di fya ema ito, di fwa ema gbɛɛ ema li emi ibwubwe mi ikye mgbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ.
LUK 6:23 <<Dzɛ yi atsa mi egbe nani di shufwe yi atsa, ikyesinɛ umba mgbi ema shewo mi esho. Lubana li ngha ngwi emi otsikyɔ ma kyɔ yi ama ogbɛɛsɛ aali.
LUK 6:24 <<Kpaa ahoo mbi ema ama nli aludu, Lubana ema tu omyɛɛ-myɛɛ mgbi ema wa.
LUK 6:25 Odzɛ ka tu ema, ema ama ntolo onɛnɛni, Lubana enbwa ka wa dɔ ema. Ahoo mi ikye ema ama nle shisha onɛnɛni, ema ka wa buntse diyɛ tsukwu.
LUK 6:26 Odzɛ ka tu ema, ema ngwu ali inggisɛ li le gbɔdzɛ osuse ikpewo ema, lubana li ngha ngwi emi otsikyɔ ma kyɔ yi oyegbɔ emi atsika aali.
LUK 6:27 <<Nghaduu ani le nya ema ama ntole fwo ani nɛ gbɛɛ: Engyikyili mgbi ema nu ma kpa ema itukwu, kyɔ osuse yi ama ndi ema taanyi,
LUK 6:28 kyumse yi ama nfya ema ito di bibɔ ikye ama nkyɔ yi ema timbi-timbi.
LUK 6:29 Kini inggisɛ ta abu afɛ mi atadɔ agya oka yɔ, kyata agya oka na kpaa nun. Kini inggisɛ kye gbɛlu abu angwuto owoowo ongwi ifun yɔ, ka kwɔ otsungwɔn okye gbɛlu abu angwuto ongwi esɛ ba.
LUK 6:30 Ali inggisɛ nbɔ abu ungwɔ duu, ka kwɔ otsungwɔn ba, ni inggisɛ di gbɛ ungwɔ mbi abu ka kwun mkpa gbɛɛ no yilen wa nu abu ba.
LUK 6:31 Kyɔ yi angbeka dafi i mina ema gbɛɛ ni a kyɔ yi ema mani.
LUK 6:32 <<Kini abu kyɔ okpitukwu yi ama nkpa abu itukwu ta ma, li ali oyabɔ ngwi abu ka tu? Lubana li ngha ngwi emi ali ibwubwe kpaa li di ama ngwu ama kpa ma itukwu ma, kpa ma itukwu aali.
LUK 6:33 Ni abu di kyɔ osuse yi ama nli kyɔ osuse yi abu ta ma, li ali oyabɔ ngwi abu ka tu? Lubana li ngha ngwi emi ali ibwubwe kpaa li kyɔ aali.
LUK 6:34 Kini ema gha ama ngwu ema ye gbɛɛ a ka yilen kpa ema ta umba ma, li ali oyabɔ ngwi ema ka tu? Lubana li ngha ngwi emi ali ibwubwe kpaa li kye nu ama ngwu a ye gbɛɛ a ka yilen kpa ma kyɛɛ ma aali.
LUK 6:35 Nghaduu, engyikyili mgbi ema nu ma kpa ema itukwu, kyɔ osuse yi ama, di kye nu ma gbɛɛ nu ma ka yilen kpa ema ba. Ta umba mgbi ema kale gbagbadzidzi, ema dika li engwɛ mgbi Ongwu Nghaangha mi Esho, lubana o li kyɔ osuse yi ama ungwɔ li mɛ ma inɛ ba yi emi imbali.
LUK 6:36 Dzɛ yi elela odiidi dafi Otsema kpaa li di elela nɛni.
LUK 6:37 <<Ka gbiikwɔ ba, ta ema kpaa a ka gbɔ ema ikwɔ ba. Ka ngwɔ inggisɛ ikwɔ ba ta ema kpaa a ka ngwɔ ema ikwɔ ba. Dzita inggisɛ yi obube, ta ema kpaa a ka dzita ema yi obube mgbi ema.
LUK 6:38 Nu, ta ema kpaa Imgbasho ka yilen nu ema. Ombaamba osuse, ongwi a siin, ngwi a kwonwo saan, ngwi di mbwo le yangwuta, Imgbasho ka kye nu ema; ikyesinɛ li ombaamba ngwi ema mba ma, ngwi Imgbasho ka yilen mba nu ema aali.>>
LUK 6:39 IYesu diyɛ nya ma utsa gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ obinɛ ka kye obinɛ oka teyi gbɛɛ? Ama efa duu a ka gbɛsɛ wokɛ ishɛ baa?
LUK 6:40 Inggisɛ okpayi-kpayi ka ye ngha otsetse mgban ba, kpaa ali inggisɛ ngwu a tson saan ka dzɛ dafi otsetse mgban mani.
LUK 6:41 <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu li di ɛfɛ nwodzɛ inɛ mbi ongwunabu kpaa li difwi otsokplekwɔ nwodzɛ inɛ mgbi abu na ba?
LUK 6:42 Ka kyɔsinɛ abu ka nya ongwunabu gbɛɛ: <Ongwunani detse nin dulu abu ɛfɛ mi inɛ, ngwi otsokplekwɔ wodzɛ inɛ mbi abu?> Abu inggisɛ ikpala nɛ, tsekise dulu otsokplekwɔ nwodzɛ inɛ mbi abu na duuse o ka dinɛ saan odulu ɛfɛ nwodzɛ inɛ mbi ongwunabu nani.
LUK 6:43 <<Ekwɔ osuse li wa owawa obube ba, hona ekwɔ obube li wa owawa osuse ba.
LUK 6:44 Ali ekwɔ duu a li difwin mi owawa mgban, inggisɛ li shɛ andundu mi ato ba, naadi a li shɛ owawa ekwɔ mi afwe ba.
LUK 6:45 Inggisɛ osuse li dulu ungwɔ osuse ama ngwi o kye da mi itukwu mgban, inggisɛ ibwubwe li dulu ungwɔ ibwubwe ama ngwi o kye da mi itukwu mgban, lubana dafi i mbwon itukwu ma ngwi ondu li gbɔ tɔ aali.
LUK 6:46 <<Kyɔsinɛse ngwi ema li kwu ani gbɛɛ, <Otsɛ, Otsɛ> kpaa li kyungwɔ ngwi ani gbɔ ba?
LUK 6:47 Ani ka tso ema dafi inggisɛ nba mbi ani wa fwo elodzɛ mgbi ani diyɛ kyɔ mi ele dzɛ mani.
LUK 6:48 O dzɛ dafi inggisɛ nle mbɛ ozu, o plɛ tishɛ kɛ di wo itozu mi akwutsɛ. Mi onɔ ngwi ekyoo taayɔ, akpeni wa tsɛkɛ ele kpaa i kyɔn unkaba, ikyesinɛ a mban saan.
LUK 6:49 Nghaduu inggisɛ nfwo elodzɛ mgbi ani diyɛ kyɔ mi ele ba, o dzɛ dafi inggisɛ nmbɛ ozu mgban mi ikye mfyan wo itozu ba mani. Onɔ ngwi akpeni okwukwo wa tsɛkɛ ele nɛ, ozu na gbobu tukwu esɛ gbluu!>>
LUK 7:1 Dafi iYesu ngyɛlu odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ yi ibyi inggisɛ tsatsadu nɛ, o si kaka iKapenahun.
LUK 7:2 Mi igeli na, ongbidɔ mgbi ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ oka ngwu kpan itukwu saan dotse dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okwulu-kwulu.
LUK 7:3 Ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ mgbi emi iRoma nɛ si fwo odzɛ mgbi iYesu, o dɔ engyukwo emi iJuda angbeka esɔ gbɛɛ nu ma ka nyan no ba wa ngyɛlu ongbidɔ mgbi ongwu ootse.
LUK 7:4 Nɛ a ka tɛkyɛ nu iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ mina abɔ oyaaya mbi abu kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ.
LUK 7:5 Ikyekyɛ ɛsɛ mgbi eyi kpan itukwu, o di mbɛ eyi ozu okwakye.>>
LUK 7:6 Nɛ iYesu si wafɔ yi ama. Dafi iYesu dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka udɛ nɛ, ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ mgbi emi iRoma na dɔ emi okan angbeka esɔ nu ma ka nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ka nu ewabu okakewo wuba, ikyena ani mɛ ongwu abu ka ba onufozu mgbi ani ba.
LUK 7:7 Ani mɛ okɛ mbi abu ba. Nghanɛ gbɔ elodzɛ ta ootse mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi ani ka ngyɛ.
LUK 7:8 Ikyena ani abuen kpaa n li inggisɛ nbyidzɛ abɔ mfye, yi emi oblakwutsɛ mi abɔ ani, ni ani nya ongwunɛ gbɛɛ, <Lu,> o li lu. N di li gbɔ yi oka gbɛɛ, <Kwa> o di li ba. N di li nya ongbɛ mgbɛn gbɛɛ, <Kyungwɔnɛni,> o di li kyɔ ngha.>>
LUK 7:9 Ngwi iYesu fwo odzɛ nɛ nghanɛ, i kwulun ewo yan, o kyata inɛ mbi ibyi ama nkyan iyikpa ma si gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema, n tu itɔ oyɛyɛ onuunu nshewo itɔ nɛ ye ba, kwo mbi emi Israi kpaa.>>
LUK 7:10 Engyesɔ ntona yɛ lu udɛ ka tu ongbidɔ na yɛɛ saan.
LUK 7:11 Ngwi i wa nyɛ nɛta iYesu wafɔ yi engwafɔɔn bɛyi ibyi inggisɛ le lu mi igeli ngwi a li kwun di iNai.
LUK 7:12 Dafi a dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka onufɛ ogalu nɛ, a kye ikwɔ tɔ le kɛ ongwu nli ongwɛ onyi kpokpo mgbi owakwadɛ. Nghanɛ ibyi inggisɛ mi ogalu na wafɔ yan.
LUK 7:13 Ngwi Otsɛ iYesu din nɛ, elela kyɔn won, o si gbɛɛ, <<Ka tsukwu ba.>>
LUK 7:14 Nɛ iYesu kɛ kwɛkwɛ kye abɔ gbo ogba, ama nsisi ntona kwulɛsɛ. O gbɛɛ, <<Ongwongyulɔ, kyato.>>
LUK 7:15 Nɛta inggisɛ ikwukwɔ ma si kyato sɔ nto wita ogbɔdzɛ, iYesu yilen nu onɔn.
LUK 7:16 Ama duu imio wo ma man a le tsɛ Imgbasho. A gbɛɛ, <<Oyegbɔ okwukwo tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi eyi: Imgbasho ba owa ya emidan abɔ.>>
LUK 7:17 Odzɛ mgbi iYesu si gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ iJudia bɛyi ɛsɛ angbeka ama nwo otsee dɔ ma duu.
LUK 7:18 Engwafɔ mgbi iJɔn nyan ungwɔ ama ngwi iYesu kyɔ duu, o kwu efa ela,
LUK 7:19 o dɔ ma esɔ gbɛɛ nu ma kɛ ka byi Otsɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li abu li ongwu iJɔn gbɔgbɛɛ o kyɛma le ba ma, naadi ni eyi gbe inɛ byi inggisɛ oka idzidza?>>
LUK 7:20 Mi onɔ ngwi emi esɔ ntona ba mbi iYesu nɛ, a gbɛɛ, <<IJɔn okyɔ iBatisima dɔ eyi esɔ mbi abu gbɛɛ ni eyi wa byita gbɛɛ: <Abu li ongwu nkyɛ ka ba ma naadi ni eyi gbe inɛ byi inggisɛ oka?> >>
LUK 7:21 Mi onɔ na iYesu ngyɛlu ibyi inggisɛ ootse idzidza-dzidza, bɛyi onodzi ibwubwe, di nu ama nbinɛ dinɛ.
LUK 7:22 O si nu emi esɔ ntona uka gbɛɛ, <<Yidɔ lu ka nya iJɔn ungwɔ ngwi ema di diyɛ fwo: Ama nbinɛ yɛ le di, ama ngwu afɔ waawaa le kyikyɛ, ama ndɔ otsoma, otsoma mgbi ama ngyɛ, ama nkyadɔ le fwo, ama nkwulu le kyato mi ikwu, a le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nya emi adzɛ.
LUK 7:23 Imgbasho ka kye mse dzɛ yi ali inggisɛ nfwa ani ba mi ungwɔ ama ani kyɔ mani.>>
LUK 7:24 Onɔ ngwi emi esɔ mgbi iJɔn lu nɛ, iYesu wita ogbɔdzɛ yi ibyi inggisɛ mi odzɛ mgbi iJɔn gbɛɛ: <<Li alungwɔ ngwi ema kɛ okwɛsɛ le ka di? Li atakwu ngwi awo le fan ntonaa?
LUK 7:25 Ki no li ngha ba ma, li alungwɔ ngwi ema kɛ le ka di? Li ongyulɔ nwo angwuto osusee? Ama nwo angwuto ofyunfyummya bɛyi ama ogye ɛsɛ a li to udɛ utɔ.
LUK 7:26 Wanɛ li alungwɔ ngwi ema tasɛ le ka di? Li oyegbɔɔ? Ɛɛn, ani le nya ema, o ngha oyegbɔ.
LUK 7:27 Nɛnɛ li ongwu a lɔ ungwɔ ikyen gbɛɛ: << <Dii, ani ka dɔ ongyesɔ mgbi ani no teyi abu, ongwu nka teyi ka mɛ abu ofɛ mani.>
LUK 7:28 Ani le nya ema, inggisɛ ngwu ongyaa mba ma duu, onyi kpaa dzɛma nshewo ngha iJɔn ba; Nghaduu inggisɛ nli olɛlɛ mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho shewo nghan.>>
LUK 7:29 (Ali inggisɛ bɛyi ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ ngwu fwon duu, gbela Imgbasho, lubana iJɔn tsekise kyɔ ma iBatisima.
LUK 7:30 Kpaa emi iFarasi bɛyi ama oye ola fwa oweka mgbi Imgbasho mi ikye mgbi ama, ikyesinɛ a fwa onu iJɔn kyɔ ma iBatisima.)
LUK 7:31 <<Ma li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka kye inggisɛ emi etɔ nɛ mba yan? A to sinɛ?
LUK 7:32 A to dafi ɛngbɛ ama nto ifyidu le kwu ewoma ela gbɛɛ: <<Eyi gbla ema ozuna, kpaa ema shufwe ba, Eyi shashi ibɔ, kpaa ema tsukwu ba!
LUK 7:33 Lubana iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima ba, o li gye ungwogye ba, di li wa eneekwɔ ba; ema gbɛɛ: <Esɛ dɔn ikye.>
LUK 7:34 Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ba le gye diyɛ wa, kpaa ema li gbɛɛ: <Dii, o li inggisɛ okyɔ nggwɔ yi inggisɛ ofya ɛbyɛ di li oka ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ bɛyi emi ali ibwubwe.>
LUK 7:35 Nghaduu ozoyeye li tso otsitsi tɔ mbi ama nkyɛdɔn mani.>>
LUK 7:36 Inggisɛ iFarasi oka bɔ iYesu ungwogye ongwi onɔdɛ mi udɛ mgban, o ka sɔkɛ imbe ogye ungwogye.
LUK 7:37 Onɔ ngwi ongyaa owagbai ngwu dzɛ igeli na, ka fwo dafi iYesu le gye ungwogye mi ozu mgbi inggisɛ iFarasi nɛ, o kye ikpɔkpɔ alabasta mgbi engyie ogbungbɛ,
LUK 7:38 wa kwulɛsɛ mi iyikpa iYesu le tsukwu kye etse kyin afɔ. Di kyi fwɔlu yi otu mgban, o kye ondu le kwon afɔ diyɛ kye engyie ogbungbɛ yawon afɔ.
LUK 7:39 Ngwi inggisɛ iFarasi ngwu bɔɔn ungwogye na di nghanɛ, o gbɔ yi ewon gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ nɛ ki li oyegbɔ yɔ, o ki ye itɔ ongyaa nkye abɔ le gbon ewo nɛ bɛyi iyi obube ngwi o dzɛyan nɛni.>>
LUK 7:40 Ta iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<iSaimɔn, ani dzɛ yi odzɛ ngwi n ka gbɔ yi abu.>> O gbɛɛ, <<Gbɔka otsetse!>>
LUK 7:41 <<Inggisɛ onu mkpa oka dzɛ yi ama ngban mkpa nghi efa: Oka dzɛyan isule ideli eda, oka ma li isule ngwusefa dɔn iwyo.
LUK 7:42 Ama efa duu yagba okpaakpa ba, ta o dzɛ ma ta. Li emɛ ngwu inggisɛ onu mkpa na ka nghao kpan itukwu?>>
LUK 7:43 ISaimɔn nun uka gbɛɛ, <<N tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ, li ongwu o dzanta yi mkpa kwuba nani.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<O gbɔ ayin.>>
LUK 7:44 O si kyata inɛ kɛ mbi ongyaa na nya iSaimɔn gbɛɛ, <<Abu di ongyaa nɛ wɛ? Ani ba udɛ abu kpaa abu nu ani eni osaafɔ ba, kpaa ongyaa nɛ nu ani afɔ yɛɛ eneni yi etse, di kye fwɔlu yi otu mgban.
LUK 7:45 Abu ta ani angba yi ondu okwo ani ataka ba, kpaa ongyaa nɛ kyɛ onɔ ngwi ani ba mmɛnɛ ma jo, o tonya okye ondu kwo ani afɔ waba.
LUK 7:46 Abu kye engyie kyi ani ikye ba, nghaduu ongwu yɔ kye engyie ogbungbɛ kyi ani afɔ.
LUK 7:47 Hininɛ ani le nya abu gbɛɛ a dzanta yi ali ibwubwe kwuba, ikyesinɛ o tso okpitukwu kwuba. Kpaa inggisɛ ongwu a dzanta gwee, li tso okpitukwu gwee ta.>>
LUK 7:48 Ta iYesu nya ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<A dzita abu yi ali ibwubwe mgbi abu.>>
LUK 7:49 Ingyoga angbeka ama nle gye ungwogye yi ama wita ogbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li emɛ ngwu ali ibwubwe kpaa o li dzɛ inggisɛ ta yan?>>
LUK 7:50 IYesu nya ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu dulu abu watɔ, lu mi iyu.>>
LUK 8:1 Dafi egbe wa nyɛ gwee nɛ, iYesu le kyikyɛ nyɛ ifu igeli yi agwɔ idzidza-dzidza le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho. Ama ogbikyon kyɛ yan,
LUK 8:2 bɛyi engyaa angbeka ngwu a ngyɛlu ma ootse onodzi ibwubwe bɛyi ootse ita idzidza-dzidza: li iMeri ngwu a li kwun di iMagidalin, ongwu a lɔ onodzi emɛsɛ tɔ mbon egyafa nani;
LUK 8:3 bɛyi iJoana, owa iKudza, nli ikye mgbi emi idɔ mi opiikwɔ mgbi iHerude; bɛyi iSudzana, bɛyi engyaa angbeka kwuba ama nli kye ungwɔ mgbi ama abuoma kye ya emi iYesu abɔ mani.
LUK 8:4 Ngwi ibyi inggisɛ tole kwakye, angbeka dile ba mbi iYesu mi igeli idzidza-dzidza nɛ, iYesu nya ma odzɛ mi utsa gbɛɛ:
LUK 8:5 <<Inggisɛ ofwe etɔ tasɛ o ka fwe etɔ. Dafi o fwe nɛta, angbeka yangwuta mi ofɛ a kye afɔ dzin, ingwunɔ emi esho ba wa kyi salu gye.
LUK 8:6 Angbeka yangwuta mi akwutsɛ; dafi i lumbye nɛ, a ngwɔ dunto ikyekyɛ a tu eni ba.
LUK 8:7 Etɔ angbeka yangwuta mi ifaato, ato she bɛyi ama nu ma gbufyo.
LUK 8:8 Angbeka yangwuta mi ekyɛ osuse, a lumbye yɛ wa owawa akpe ngwuseda ngha ongwi a kye kya mani.>> IYesu si kwu ela gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ ofwoofwo yɔ, no fwo!>>
LUK 8:9 Engwafɔ iYesu byun ita mi ungwɔ ngwi utsa nɛ tso mani.
LUK 8:10 Nɛ o gbɛɛ, <<Ema yɔ, a nu ema ye ungwɔ ama odaada ongwi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho, kpaa angbeka yɔ, li mi utsa ta ngwi ani li gbɔdzɛ yi ama, ikyegbɛɛ: << <Mi odiidi kpaa, a ka di ba, bɛyi ofwoofwo, ni a fwo kpaa ka gbosa loma ba.>
LUK 8:11 <<Li ngha ngwi utsa nɛ dzɛ aani: Etɔ, li elodzɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 8:12 Etɔ ama n yangwuta mi ofɛ na, i tso gbɛɛ dzɛ mi ikye ama nfwo kpaa iSatan ba wa kye gbɛlu elodzɛ na mi itukwu mgbi ama, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu ni a dulu ma watɔ ba.
LUK 8:13 Etɔ ama n yangwuta mi akwutsɛ ma, a dzɛ mi ikye inggisɛ ama nfwo esɔ diyɛ kyi gbɛlu yi atsa, kpaa a yagba dzɛ yi akpa ba, a noyɛyɛ mi onɔ gwee ta, ngwi imbadi wa ba nɛ, a gbɛsɛ.
LUK 8:14 Etɔ ama n yangwuta mi ifaato ma, a dzɛ mi ikye inggisɛ ama nfwo, kpaa okakewo bɛyi aludu yi oshishe ofyunfya ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ loka wo ma nɛta, a yɛ wa owawa wuba.
LUK 8:15 Etɔ ama n yangwuta mi ekyɛ osuse ma, a dzɛ mi ikye inggisɛ ama nfwo elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho, yilen sisɛ mi itukwu mgbi ama osuse yi osunu mani, a shitukwu nghataa yɛ wa owawa.
LUK 8:16 <<Inggisɛ onyi dzɛma nka kye ipitila dɔ duuse yile mgboko tukwu ele ba, naadi yilen dzɛkɛ ifagwudo ba, kpaa o ka kye dɔkɛ mi ododa, ikyegbɛɛ inggisɛ ama nle kaka nu ma di osa!
LUK 8:17 Lubana alungwɔ ndzɛ mi odaada duu, a ka kye tɔ mi ododa, bɛyi ungwɔ ama ngwi a kye tukwu duu, a dika kye kwulu tɔ mi ododa.
LUK 8:18 Nghanɛ gbɛwɛbyi, mi ofwoofwo ngwi ema fwo nɛni, ikyekyɛ inggisɛ ndzɛ yi ungwɔ ma, a ka mbwon mbwoombwo, kpaa inggisɛ ndzɛ yi ungwɔ ba, ogyɛngyɛ ngwi o tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ongwu dzɛyan ma kpaa, a ka kye gbɛlu mbon.>>
LUK 8:19 Onɔ iYesu bɛyi emi ongwunɔn ba mbon, kpaa a yagba to mbon gbɛ ba ikye ibyi inggisɛ.
LUK 8:20 Inggisɛ oka nyan gbɛɛ, <<Onabu bɛyi emi ongwunabu kwulɛsɛ to esɛ, a mina odi abu.>>
LUK 8:21 IYesu nya ma duu gbɛɛ, <<Ama nle fwo elodzɛ Imgbasho diyɛ kyɔ mi ele ma, li ama nli emi onani bɛyi emi ongwunani aali.>>
LUK 8:22 Egbe oka nɛta, iYesu si kaka uwaa yi engwafɔɔn, o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ka foyombo utɔ.>> A si kyato olu.
LUK 8:23 Ngwi a le lu nɛ, iYesu nauna. Nɛ onikyɔ awo ba wa fa mi utɔ, nghanɛ uwaa le mweeni, ta a dzɛ mi okakewo kpakpa.
LUK 8:24 Man a ba mbon wa kyilen, a nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, Ongyukwo! Eyi le dzili!>> IYesu kyato fa awo yi akpeni ela: onikyɔ awo kwulu, man imbe yɛɛ tsiin.
LUK 8:25 O nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ema kɔ?>> Kpaa dafi i kwulu ma ewo imio diyɛ wo ma nɛ, a gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ali inggisɛ dɛn? O fa awo yi akpeni ela ta a fwon!>>
LUK 8:26 Emi iYesu si fooye ka kaka ogalu iGeraseni, nli oyombo utɔ iGalalia nani.
LUK 8:27 Ngwi iYesu fa dɔkɛ esɛ nɛta, o tsa yi inggisɛ oka mi igeli nani, ngwu esɛ dɔn ikye. O nya yi angwuto owoowo onɔ kɛ, o di li la udɛ ba, li imbe endzi ta ngwi o li la.
LUK 8:28 Ngwi o di iYesu nɛ, o makwɔ mi ela okwukwo, o lankɛ iyayi, yɛ kwu ela mfyumfye gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ wo abu yi ani, iYesu, Ongwɛ Imgbasho nngha mi esho? N le tɛkyɛ nu abu, ka nu ani adzɛ ba!>>
LUK 8:29 IYesu plɛ woola gbɛɛ, ni onodzi ibwubwe na tasɛ mbon. Lubana a li bwan mi onɔ ibyibyi, kye ashi won tan itse, ikye ole ngyon, kpaa o li gbɔdzɛ adi nani, onodzi ibwubwe li lɔn lu okwɛsɛ.
LUK 8:30 IYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<Iyi abu di emɛ?>> O nyan gbɛɛ: <<Ibyibyi>> bana onodzi ibwubwe kaka mbon kwuba.
LUK 8:31 Onodzi ibwubwe ntona tɛkyɛ nu iYesu gbɛɛ no ka lɔ ama onya ka yaokɛ ikplishɛ na ba.
LUK 8:32 Obyia ibyibyi kwuto le gye ungwɔ mi ewunggwɔ. Onodzi ibwubwe ntona si le tɛkyɛ yi iYesu gbɛɛ no nu ama ofɛ ni ama lu ka kaka obyia, man o si nu ma ofɛ.
LUK 8:33 Ta onodzi ibwubwe ntona tasɛ mbi inggisɛ na lu ka kaka mbi obyia ntonani. Obyi obyia ntona nyɛ yi onya kye ikye byi ufɛ lu ka yaokɛ utɔ si dzili mi eni.
LUK 8:34 Ama ntole ngyo obyia ntona di ungwɔ nkyɔ mani ta a si tsinya lu ka kye odzɛ nɛ gbɔfwɛ nya ma mi igeli bɛyi ama nto okwɔ mi agya na duu.
LUK 8:35 Nɛ inggisɛ tasɛ le ka di ungwɔ nkyɔ mani. A si ba mbi iYesu, wa tu inggisɛ ongwu onodzi ibwubwe tɔ mbon ma, sɔdzɛ iyayi mgbi iYesu, o wo angwuto ewo di dzɛ yi ozoyeye saan; ta i kwulu ma ewo.
LUK 8:36 Ama nteyi di ma nya angbeka dafi i kyɔ se inggisɛ ngwu onodzi ibwubwe kaka mbon na yɛɛ saan mani.
LUK 8:37 Ta inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ iGeraseni duu nya iYesu gbɛɛ no lu, ikyekyɛ imio wo ma. Man o si kaka uwaa lu.
LUK 8:38 Inggisɛ ongwu onodzi ibwubwe tɔ mbon na tɛkyɛ yi iYesu gbɛɛ ni ongwu lu yan. Kpaa iYesu nyan gbɛɛ,
LUK 8:39 <<Yɛ lu udɛ abu, ka gbɔ ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ yi abu nɛni.>> Inggisɛ na yɛ lu le kyikyɛ kɛ igeli-igeli, le gbɔ ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ yan mani.
LUK 8:40 Ngwi iYesu yɛ luba nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ gban yi atsa, ikyekyɛ a tole fan.
LUK 8:41 Nɛ inggisɛ oka ba, a li kwun di iJaru, o li ongyukwo mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, o kwɛsɛ mi iyayi iYesu, si tɛkyɛ yan gbɛɛ no kɛ udɛ ongwu.
LUK 8:42 Ikyekyɛ ongwan ongwu ongyaa onyi kpokpo, ngwu mɛ onova iwyodefa, le fyikwu. Dafi iYesu le kɛ nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ tukwun kpakpa.
LUK 8:43 Mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ ntona, ongyaa oka dzɛ le yeeyi mɛ onova iwyodefa. O kye mbelu aludu mgban duu mbi ama obwotse, kpaa onyonyi yan abɔ ba.
LUK 8:44 O kaka ifu ibyi inggisɛ ntona wa kye abɔ gbo iYesu ondu angwuto mi iyikpa, labɔlabɔ mata eyi dzɛ lon.
LUK 8:45 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ kye abɔ gbo ani?>> Ama duu le tangwɛ, iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, ibyi inggisɛ ama nkpakɛkɛ wo abu yɛ mba yi abu nɛ abu le byita gbɛɛ: <Li emɛ kye abɔ gbo ani ewoo?> >>
LUK 8:46 Nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ kye ewo gbo ani, bana n kwu ambɛ dafi mfye tɔ mbi ani mani.>>
LUK 8:47 Ongyaa na di dafi ongwu dzɛ mi odaada wuba nɛ, o ba yi ewo otsaatsa wa kwɛsɛ mi iyayi mbi iYesu. O gbɔ mi inɛ mgbi inggisɛ tsatsa dafi i kyɔ se ongwu kye abɔ gbon ondu angwuto, ngwi ewo mgbi ongwu kpa di gbosa mina mani.
LUK 8:48 Nɛ iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ongwongyaa, oyɛyɛ mgbi abu onuunu dulu abu tɔ. Lu mi iyu.>>
LUK 8:49 Onɔ ngwi iYesu le gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, inggisɛ oka mi udɛ iJaru, ongyukwo mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda na ba, o gbɛɛ, <<Ongwabu ongwu ongyaa na kwulu wa: Ka kaka Otsetse ewo wuba.>>
LUK 8:50 Ngwi iYesu fwo nghanɛ, o nya iJaru gbɛɛ, <<Ka teeyi ba, dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu, ta ootse mgban ka ngyɛ.>>
LUK 8:51 Dafi iYesu ka kaka udɛ iJaru nɛ, o gbela onu inggisɛ onyi kpaa kaka ozu yan ba, se li iPyita yi iJɔn bɛyi iJɛnsi yi otsɔ ongwongyaa na bɛyi onɔn ta.
LUK 8:52 Ali inggisɛ duu le tsukwu dile kyelela mi ikye ongwɛ nani. Nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ka tsukwu ba na, lubana ongwɛ nɛ kwulu ba, o nanuna ta.>>
LUK 8:53 Ama duu shan isha ikwangha, ikyekyɛ a ye gbɛɛ di o kwulu.
LUK 8:54 Kpaa ngwi iYesu byin abɔ nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Ongwani, kyato!>>
LUK 8:55 Ta oshishe mgban yɛ, man o kyato plɛ. IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, nu ma kye ungwogye non gye.
LUK 8:56 I kwulu ama o mban ma ewo, nghaduu iYesu wo ma ola gbɛɛ nu ma ka nya inggisɛ onyi ungwɔ nkyɔ nɛ ba.
LUK 9:1 Onɔ ngwi iYesu kwu iwyodefa ntona kwakye nɛ, o kye mfye nu ma ikye nu ma lɔ ali itɔ onodzi ibwubwe onya di ngyɛlu ootse,
LUK 9:2 o di dɔ ma esɔ gbɛɛ nu ma gbeesɔ mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho di ngyɛlu ama ndotse ootse.
LUK 9:3 O nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ka kye unka byi mi okyɛɛ nɛ ba na, okwuta ba, igbe ba, ungwogye ba, awuya ba, angwuto kpaa ba.
LUK 9:4 Ali udɛ ngwi ema kaka efu duu, dzɛ ele nghataa imbisɔ ngwi ema ka dzata igeli nani.
LUK 9:5 Ni inggisɛ gbɛ ema bayɔ, dzata igeli na di kye gbolu ombulu mi afɔ mgbi ema otso ambɛ adɔ okwookwo mboma.>>
LUK 9:6 Ama okyɛ yi iYesu si lu kaka mi agwɔ udɛ yi agwɔ udɛ le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nɛni dile ngyɛlu ibyi inggisɛ ootse mi ali imbe duu.
LUK 9:7 Ngwi iHerude atɔtsɛ fwo odzɛ nle kiyayi nɛ, i si kakan ewo. Inggisɛ angbeka tole gbɛɛ iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima yɛ kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
LUK 9:8 Angbeka tole gbɛɛ oyegbɔ Elaija yidɔ wa, hona onyi mi oyegbɔ emi tugbe ntona diyɛ kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
LUK 9:9 Nghaduu iHerude gbɛɛ, <<Ani nu ma dzɛ iJɔn ikye! Ma li emɛ ngwu ani le fwo odzan kpakpa ngha?>> I mina iHerude kpakpa otsa inɛ yi iYesu.
LUK 9:10 Ama ogbikye iYesu si yidɔ wa nyan ungwɔ ngwi ama kyɔ duu. Man o kye ma daada lu yan mi igeli mgbi iBɛtsaida,
LUK 9:11 nghaduu ibyi inggisɛ ka difwi imbe ngwi a lu nɛman a si lukwun. O gbɛ ma di nya ma odzɛ mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho, di ngyɛlu ama i wo ma gbɛɛ ni a ngyɛlu ma ootse duu.
LUK 9:12 Ngwi onɔ le ka gbɛsɛ nɛ, emi iwyodefa ntona ba mbi iYesu wa gbɛɛ, <<Nu ijiji inggisɛ ntonɛ ofɛ, nu ma lu igeli yi ayɛsɛ mi agya nɛni. A mina imbe ngwi a ka la di tu ungwogye, ikyekyɛ imbe ngwi eyi dzɛ nɛ li imbe okplagada!>>
LUK 9:13 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Nu ma ungwɔ nu ma gye na.>> Kpaa a gbɛɛ, <<Eyi dzɛ yi ibredi nghi eda bɛyi mmbweni efa ta. Ni eyi ka byi inggisɛ ntonɛ duu enbwa yɔ, sede eyi ka lu ka gyaagya ungwogye.>>
LUK 9:14 (A mɛ engyulɔ idubu eda sini.) Nghaduu iYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Nu ma sisɛ ibwi-ibwi mɛ mmbwo ngwusefa dɔn iwyo, ngwusefa dɔn iwyo hini.>>
LUK 9:15 Engwafɔɔn kyɔ ngha yɛyɛ, ali inggisɛ duu sisɛ.
LUK 9:16 IYesu kyi kyelu ibredi bɛkɛ yi mmbweni ntona man kyile inɛ kɛ esho, o bibɔ di kye mwalu. Ta o kye nu ama okyɛ yan nu ma kye gha ma.
LUK 9:17 Ama duu gye di tolo, ambulu nsisi ma a kye gbelu mbwo uya nghi iwyodefa.
LUK 9:18 Egbe oka ngwi iYesu dzɛ yuon le bibɔ nɛ, ama okyɛ yan to biyan man o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ li gbɛɛ ani li emɛ?>>
LUK 9:19 A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Angbeka gbɛɛ abu li iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima; angbeka gbɛɛ oyegbɔ Elaija; angbeka li gbɛɛ oyegbɔ oka tugbe yidɔ ba.>>
LUK 9:20 Nghanɛ iYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema ma ema gbɛɛ ani li emɛ?>> IPyita nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Abu li iKrestu mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 9:21 IYesu kwo ma adɔ kpakpa gbɛɛ nu ma ka nya inggisɛ onyi odzɛ nɛ ba.
LUK 9:22 IYesu si nya ama okyɛ yan gbɛɛ, <<Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka gbiisɔ mi ungwɔ kwuba engyukwo yi ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama otso ola mgbi iMose, ka ngwɔn kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ. Nghaduu mi egbe ongwu ta ma Imgbasho ka kyilen luba oshishe.>>
LUK 9:23 Nɛ o nya ma duu gbɛɛ: <<Ali inggisɛ nmina okyɛdɔ ani yɔ, li kyɛmɛ ngwi o ka tangwɛ ewon yɛ kyelu ekwatsi mgban kyɛdɔ ani alegbe-alegbe.
LUK 9:24 Ikyena ali inggisɛ nmina odulu oshishe mgban tɔ yɔ ka byulu lon, kpaa inggisɛ ngwu oshishe mgban byulu mi ikye mgbi ani yɔ, ka dulun tɔ.
LUK 9:25 Li ali oyabɔ ngwi inggisɛ ka tu, ni otsungwɔn tu ɛsɛ duu kpaa oshishe mgban dzili?
LUK 9:26 Ni inggisɛ kwayiwi ani yi esɔ mgbi ani, Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka kwayiwi inggisɛ nani mi onɔ ngwi o yɛ mi okwɔkwɔ mgban bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Otsɔn Imgbasho bɛyi engyesɔ mgban ama osaan mani.
LUK 9:27 N nya ema otsitsi, angbeka to mmɛnɛ nka di ikwongye inɛ ba nghataa ngwi a ka di esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 9:28 Ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ ntonɛ nyɛ egbe egyata nɛta, o kyi kyelu iPyita bɛyi iJɔn yi iJɛnsi lu yan mi unggwɔ oka bibɔ.
LUK 9:29 Ngwi o kale bibɔ nɛ, inɛ mgban si kyata, angwuto mgban tundzɛ yɛ kwɔ dafi mmbwo onaabɔ mani.
LUK 9:30 Plɛ nɛta, engyulɔ efa: iMose yi Elaija, tɔ wita ogbɔdzɛ yi iYesu.
LUK 9:31 A tɔ mi okwɔkwɔ ongwi esho sile gbɔdzɛ mgbi ikwu mgbi iYesu ndzɛ kwɛkwɛ ombwumbwo mi iJerosalin mani.
LUK 9:32 IPyita yi angbeka si nuna lu byulu, onɔ ngwi a kyato nɛ, a di iYesu yi okwɔkwɔ mgban yi inggisɛ nghi efa toyan.
LUK 9:33 Dafi iMose yi Elaija wita olu nɛ, iPyita nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, i tishi ni eyi ki to mmɛnɛni! Ni eyi klɛ afu eta, onyi ikye abu, onyi ikye iMose, onyi ikye Elaija.>> (Nghaduu o ye odzɛ ngwi o le gbɔ ma ba.)
LUK 9:34 Ngwi o kale gbɔdzɛ nɛ, akpa tɔ gbiiwulu tukwu ma; man ama okyɛ yi iYesu wimio dafi akpa wa tukwu ma mani.
LUK 9:35 Ta ela tɔ mi akpa na gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li Ongwani, ongwu ani dulu-dulu; gadɔ mbon na.>>
LUK 9:36 Ngwi ela na dede mata, iYesu si dzɛ mmana yuon. A kye ungwɔnɛ da, di nya inggisɛ onyi kpaa ungwɔ ngwi ama di mi onɔ na ba.
LUK 9:37 Tegblifan, ngwi a tashulu mi unggwɔ nɛ ibyi inggisɛ wa tu iYesu.
LUK 9:38 Inggisɛ mi ifu ibyi kwu ela gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, ani gbabɔ nu abu kye inɛ byi ongwani, o li onyi kpokpo.
LUK 9:39 Onodzi obube li dzɛsin non le teela; o li dzɛkwulu li tsuuvu ondu. Ni kyɔn li fyumfye odzanta dile dzilin kpaa.
LUK 9:40 Ani gbabɔ nu engwafɔ mgbi abu gbɛɛ nu ma dulu onodzi na tɔ, kpaa a yagba ba.>>
LUK 9:41 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Ema etɔ ndzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu ba dile kpɛkpɛ nɛ! Ka kye onɔ sinɛ ngwi ani ka dzɛ yi ema yi itukwu oshiishi?>> Man o nya inggisɛ na gbɛɛ, <<Kye ongwabu ma ba mmɛnɛni.>>
LUK 9:42 Ngwi a kyon ba nɛ, onodzi obube na di kyon zudɔwɛsɛ o di dzɛkwulu fyumfye. IYesu fwa yi onodzi obube na, man o ngyɛlu ongwɛ na ootse di yilen nu otsɔn.
LUK 9:43 I kwulu ali inggisɛ ewo mi ogbagbadzidzi mfye ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ nani. Ngwi i kale kwulu ali inggisɛ ewo mi ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ duu nɛ, o nya ama okyɛ yan gbɛɛ,
LUK 9:44 <<Gadɔ mi odzɛ ngwi ani le gbɔ nya ema nɛni: A ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ wo engyikyili mgban abɔ.>>
LUK 9:45 Kpaa ama okyɛ yan kwu ambɛ odzɛ na ba. Itan da ma daada, nɛ a yagba difwi ba, imio kpaa di wo ma obyin ita.
LUK 9:46 Angwodzɛ tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama okyɛ yi iYesu gbɛɛ li emɛ mboma shewo ngha.
LUK 9:47 IYesu ye ungwɔ ngwi a le tsɛwɛ nɛta, o si kye ongbɛ kwulɛsɛ dzɛkɛ agya mgban.
LUK 9:48 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ngbɛ itɔ ongwɛ nɛ mi iyi mgbi ani gbɛ ani; o di gbɛ inggisɛ ngwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani. Ikyena ongwu nghao yɛyikpa mi idzidzɛ ema duu ma nghao shewo.>>
LUK 9:49 IJɔn gbɔ nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, eyi di inggisɛ oka le dulu onodzi emɛsɛ mi iyi mgbi abu eyi fwa yan gbɛɛ non nya, ikyekyɛ o li onyi mbi eyi ba.>>
LUK 9:50 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama non nya ba, lubana inggisɛ nfwa ema bayɔ li mgbi ema.>>
LUK 9:51 Dafi onɔ wa dzɛ kwɛkwɛ ngwi a ka kye iYesu lu esho nɛ, o ngyɛlu odzɛ mi itukwu mgban si byi ofɛ abɔ le lu iJerosalin.
LUK 9:52 O dɔ emi esɔ angbeka teyin, lu mi agwɔ oka mi iSamaria oka mɛlu alungwɔ duu le fan;
LUK 9:53 kpaa inggisɛ emi imbe na gban ba, ikyekyɛ o dzɛ yi oweka olu iJerosalin.
LUK 9:54 Onɔ ngwi iJɛnsi yi iJɔn di ungwɔnɛ nɛ, a gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, i mina abu gbɛɛ ni eyi kwu ola ela mi esho ba esɛ wa kye ma gyee?>>
LUK 9:55 Nghaduu iYesu kyata fwa yi ama,
LUK 9:56 ta a si lu agwɔ oka.
LUK 9:57 Dafi emi iYesu le lu ofɛ mgbi ama nɛ, ongyulɔ oka nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<N ka kyɛdɔ abu ali imbe ngwi abu le kɛ duu.>>
LUK 9:58 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Emi ogbalinya to yi ishɛ, ingwunɔ emi esho dzɛ yi udɛ, kpaa Ongwɛ Inggisɛ dzɛ yi imbe okye ikye da ba.>>
LUK 9:59 O di nya inggisɛ oka gbɛɛ, <<Kyɛdɔ ani.>> Kpaa ongyulɔ ma gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ababɔ nu ani ofɛ nin ka gbinɛbyi otsani nghataa kyon ndzi se.>>
LUK 9:60 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ni emi ikwukwɔ ndzi ewoma, kpaa abu lu ka gbeesɔ mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 9:61 Inggisɛ oka di gbɛɛ, <<N ka kyɛdɔ abu, Otsɛ; kpaa nin ka nya emidani gbɛɛ se egbe oka se.>>
LUK 9:62 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nkye abɔ byi ikwukwɔ oshookwɔ, wita oshookwɔ diyɛ le ndinɛ kɛ iyikpa yɔ, o mɛ unkonyi mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ba.>>
LUK 10:1 Ta Otsɛ iYesu dulu inggisɛ ngwuseta dɔn iwyo diwyefa. Si dɔ ma esɔ efefa, nu ma teyi ongwu kɛ ali igeli bɛyi imbe ngwi ongwu ka wa kɛ duu.
LUK 10:2 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Etɔ oshɛ-shɛ le kwuba, kpaa emi idɔ le gwee ta. Ema bibɔ mbi Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi etɔ oshɛ-shɛ, non dɔ emi idɔ mgban esɔ nu ma wa shɛ etɔ.
LUK 10:3 Lu na! Lubana ani le dɔ ema esɔ dafi engwɛ mmala mi ifu emi idukwlɛbɛ mani.
LUK 10:4 Ka kye ashiko naadi igbe okɛ agaba hona okpafɔ oka ba. Ka kwulɛsɛ mi ofɛ tangba yi inggisɛ ba na.
LUK 10:5 <<Onɔ ngwi ema kaka udɛ inggisɛ yɔ, tsekise gbɔgbɛɛ, iyu mgbi Imgbasho no dzɛ udɛ nɛni.
LUK 10:6 Kini inggisɛ iyu dzɛ udɛ na yɔ, iyu mgbi Imgbasho ka kaka mbi otsungwɔn, kpaa ki no dzɛma ba, iyu mgbi Imgbasho ka yɛ luba mbi ema.
LUK 10:7 Ka kyikyɛ mi udɛ-udɛ ba na. La mbonyi, le gye, diyɛ wa alungwɔ ngwi a kye nu ema duu, lubana inggisɛ idɔ gyɔ ni a kpan.
LUK 10:8 <<Ni ema kaka igeli, nu ma kyɔ ema onɔ yɔ, gye alungwɔ ngwi a kye nu ema duu.
LUK 10:9 Bwe ama ndotse to ele ma na, diyɛ nya ma gbɛɛ: <Esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ema.>
LUK 10:10 Nghaduu, igeli nfwa ogbɛ ema yɔ, tasɛ lu ingɔfɛ ka gbɛɛ,
LUK 10:11 <Ombulu ongwi ogalu mgbi ema nto eyi ka afɔ nɛ, eyi ka kye gbolu dafi ambɛ adɔ okwookwo mbi ema. Di ye na gbɛɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ kwɛkwɛ.>
LUK 10:12 N nya ema gbɛɛ, mi egbe na ka tatase lo ogalu mgbi iSodon ngha ogalu nani.
LUK 10:13 <<Ahoo! Abu ogalu mgbi iKoradzin yi abu iBɛtsaida; ema ka gyadzɛ. Ikyekyɛ ungwɔ okwulewo ongwi a kyɔ mbi ema nɛ, ki li mi ogalu mgbi iTiru yi iSidon yɔ, a ki kyatitukwu mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ama gbegbe, a ki kye ishangli wo ewo yɛ myini mi utɔ.
LUK 10:14 Nghaduu ka tatase mbi iTiru yi iSidon mi egbe ikwɔ ngha ema.
LUK 10:15 Abu ogalu mgbi iKapenahun, a ka kyile abu esho wɛ? Ei, abu ka lu esɛ mi imbe mgbi emi ikwukwɔ.>>
LUK 10:16 IYesu si nya ama okyɛ yan gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nfwo ema fwo ani. Ongwu nfwa ema fwa ani. Ongwu nfwa ani fwa Imgbasho ndɔ ani esɔ nani.>>
LUK 10:17 Emi ngwuseta dɔn iwyo-diwyo-efa ntona yidɔ yi atsa wa gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ iYesu, mi iyi mgbi abu emi onodzi emɛsɛ kpaa le sunu eyi.>>
LUK 10:18 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<N di iSatan gbɛsɛ kyɛ esho dafi mmbwo le naabɔ mani.
LUK 10:19 Ani tsekise kye mfye nu ema okye afɔ dzi ifa bɛyi mnaa odi ngha mfye mgbi ongyikyili mgbi ema, unkonyi kpaa ka kyɔ ema ba.
LUK 10:20 Nghaduu ka tsatsa na gbɛɛ di emi onodzi ibwubwe sunu ema ba. Kpaa, tsatsa ikyegbɛɛ a lɔ ema iyi mi esho.>>
LUK 10:21 Mi onɔ na kpɔɔ iYesu mbwo yi atsa mi Onodzi Osaan, o gbɛɛ, <<Ani ta abu angba Otsani, Otsɛ mgbi esho yi esɛ, ikyekyɛ abu kye ungwɔ ntonɛ da ama ntsɛwɛ gbɛɛ di ama kwiinɛ diyɛ yodzɛ mani, kpaa abu kwulu iba nya ɛngbɛ. Ɛɛn, Otsani, li ngha ngwi i kpaa abu gbɛɛ no dzɛ aali.
LUK 10:22 <<Otsani kye alungwɔ duu wo ani abɔ. Inggisɛ onyi ye ongwu nli Ongwɛ ba li Otsɔn ta, inggisɛ onyi kpaa di ye Otsɔn ba li Ongwɛ ta bɛyi ama ngwu Ongwɛ sadu okye Otsɔn tso ma mani.>>
LUK 10:23 Man iYesu kyata mbi engwafɔɔn ntona gbɔ yi ama daada gbɛɛ, <<Mse no bɛ ama ndi ungwɔ ema di nɛ ewo!
LUK 10:24 N nya ema gbɛɛ i mina ibyi oyegbɔ yi ibyi utɔ gbɛɛ ama ki di ungwɔ ngwi ema di nɛ, kpaa a di ba, odi fwo ungwɔ ngwi ema fwo nɛ, kpaa a yagba fwo ba.>>
LUK 10:25 Onɔɔlɔlɔ ma inggisɛ oye ola mgbi iMose saan kyatunto ombadi iYesu, o gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka kyɔ se ngwi ani ka tu oshishe igyegwu?>>
LUK 10:26 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ <<Ola mgbi iMose gbɔsinɛ? Abu li gbɔn sinɛ?>>
LUK 10:27 O si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: <Otsɛ Imgbasho no kpa abu itukwu yi itukwu mgbi abu duu yi oshishe mgbi abu duu yi mfye mgbi abu duu yi oyeeye mgbi abu duu>; di, <Inggisɛ nwatse dɔ abu kpa abu itukwu dafi ewabu mani.> >>
LUK 10:28 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<O gbɔ ayin; lu ka kyɔ ngha ta o ka dzɛ oshishe.>>
LUK 10:29 Kpaa dafi o mina otso oye-ye mgban nɛ, o byi iYesu gbɛɛ <<Li emɛ li inggisɛ owatse dɔ ani?>>
LUK 10:30 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ iJuda oka kyɛ mi iJerosalin le kɛ iJeriko, o ka kaka abɔ emumyi ama ofofɛ. A gbon ibe di kyon angwuto mi ewo kye dulu dzanta lakɛ ofɛ le fyikwu.
LUK 10:31 I wa yɛɛ gbɛɛ inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho oka wa le nyɛ ofɛ na kpɔɔ, o di inggisɛ na ta, o nyɛ enggengga lu.
LUK 10:32 Inggisɛ iLevi nli kyidɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda kpaa kyɔ ngha, ngwi o di inggisɛ na nɛ, ongwu kpaa nyɛ enggengga lu.
LUK 10:33 Nghaduu inggisɛ iSamaria oka nli ingyoga le kɛ agaba, o wa to imbe ngwi inggisɛ na ladzɛ, ngwi o din nɛ, elela kyɔn won kpakpa.
LUK 10:34 O kɛ kwɛkwɛ yan, o san ifwa mi ewo kye otse yawon ele. O kyon dɔkɛ itaklimyi mgban kyon lu ozu ingyoga ka gbeka byun saan.
LUK 10:35 Tegblifan nɛ, o dulu udza nmɛ okpa idɔ egbe efa sini kye nu inggisɛ odi mi imbe ingyoga nani, o nyan gbɛɛ: <Bwen saan, ni ani yɛ, ungwɔ ngwi abu mbe mi ikyon duu ni ngha ngha kpaa, n ka yilen kpaa abu.> >>
LUK 10:36 IYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ eta ntona li emɛ li inggisɛ owatse dɔ inggisɛ ongwu nkaka abɔ emumyi na?>>
LUK 10:37 Inggisɛ oye ola na nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Li inggisɛ ongwu ndin elela nani.>> IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Lu ka kyɔ ngha.>>
LUK 10:38 Dafi iYesu yi engwafɔɔn kye ikye dɔ le lu iJerosalin nɛ, o wa kaka agwɔ oka, ongyaa oka ngwu a li kwun di iMata gban kaka udɛ mgban.
LUK 10:39 O dzɛ yi ongwunɔn ongwu ongyaa, iyin di iMeri, ngwu ka sɔkɛ iyayi Otsɛ iYesu le fwo elodzɛ mgban.
LUK 10:40 Kpaa i kaka iMata ewo kpakpa yi ungwɔ okyɔɔkyɔ nshewo ngwi ongwu ka kyɔ mani. O ba wa byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, i kpa abu dafi ongwunani dzata idɔ duu tsaani abɔ nɛɛ? Ngyɛse nyan no wa tobyi ani.>>
LUK 10:41 Otsɛ nun uka gbɛɛ, <<IMata, iMata, i kaka abu ewo, eka di kplɔkɔ lo abu mi ungwɔ kwuba;
LUK 10:42 ungwɔ li onyi ta ndzɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ. IMeri kye ayɛ ngwi nghao tishi, ngwi a ka kye gbɛlu mbon ba mani.>>
LUK 11:1 Egbe oka nɛ, iYesu le bibɔ mi imbe oka. Mi onɔ ngwi o ngyɛlu ibɔ obɔɔbɔ nɛ, ongwafɔ mgban onyi ba mbon wa nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, tso eyi obibɔ dafi iJɔn tso engwafɔ mgban nani.>>
LUK 11:2 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ ngwi ema ka bibɔ yɔ, gbɛɛ: << <Otseyi, nu ma nu mmwɛ mi iyi mgbi abu. Ni esutɔ mgbi abu ba.
LUK 11:3 Nu eyi ungwogye mgbi eyi ongwi alegbe-alegbe.
LUK 11:4 Dzɛ eyi ta yi ali ibwubwe mgbi eyi, dafi eyi kpaa li dzata ama nkyɔ eyi obube mani. Dika kye eyi kaka igyila ba; kpaa dulu eyi tɔ mi obube.> >>
LUK 11:5 IYesu di nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ mbi ema ndzɛ yi uka, ka kɛ mbon mi idzidzɛ otu ka nyan gbɛɛ, <Okani, tobyi ani yi ibredi nghi eta;
LUK 11:6 ikyesinɛ okani oka dzagaba wa kaka mbi ani, ma n dzɛ yi unkonyi ngwi n ka kye non gye ba.>
LUK 11:7 <<Ma o nu uka mi ozu dzidzɛ gbɛɛ, <Ka kaka ani ewo ba; onufozu tukwu, ɛngbɛ mgbi ani di lato yi ani mi akwulo. Nghanɛ n ka yagba kyato ba wa nu abu unkonyi ba.>
LUK 11:8 N nya ema, o ka kyato ba wa nun mi ikyegbɛɛ o li okan ba, kpaa mi ikyegbɛɛ o bɔ kyɔ ewewa ba, li ikyengha o ka kyato wa nun dafi o mina duu aali.
LUK 11:9 <<N di nya ema: Bɔ na ta a ka nu ema, di pita na, ta ema ka tu; tsaabɔ na, ta a ka kwulu ema onufozu.
LUK 11:10 Lubana otsungwɔn nbɔ ka gbɛ. Ongwu npita ka tu. Ongwu ntsaabɔ, a ka kwulun ofɛ.
LUK 11:11 <<Li emɛ mbi ema etsɛngwɛ ngwu ongwan ka bɔn mmbweni, se o ka nun ifa gbikye mmbweni?
LUK 11:12 Naadi o bɔn akyogbi, ngwi o ka kye mnaa nun?
LUK 11:13 Ni ema emi ali ibwubwe ye onu ɛngbɛ mgbi ema umba osuse ma, ka kyɔnɛse Otsema ongwi esho ka nghao nu ama nbɔn Onodzi Osaan ba.>>
LUK 11:14 Egbe oka nɛ, iYesu lɔ ikplima emɛsɛ onya. Onɔ ngwi emɛsɛ na tɔ nɛ, inggisɛ ngwu onodzi emɛsɛ na non yɛɛ ikplima ma gbɔdzɛ, ta i kwulu ibyi inggisɛ ntona ewo.
LUK 11:15 Angbeka gbɛɛ, <<IYesu lɔ emɛsɛ onya yi mfye mgbi iBɛdzɛbu ongwu nli ikye mgbi emɛsɛ nani.>>
LUK 11:16 Angbeka le mbadin, a mina ambɛ ongwi esho mbon.
LUK 11:17 IYesu ye ewodzɛ mgbi ama nɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ali esutɔ ngwi gbua mi ikyili yɔ, a ka bulu, udɛ ngwi di gha yi ewon ka bulu.
LUK 11:18 Ni iSatan kpaa gha yi ewon ma, ka kyɔsinɛse esutɔ mgban ka kwudzɛ? Lubana ema gbɛɛ ani lɔ emɛsɛ onya yi mfye mgbi iBɛdzɛbu.
LUK 11:19 Kini ani lɔ emɛsɛ onya yi mfye mgbi iBɛdzɛbu ma, li mfye mgbi emɛ ngwi ɛngbɛ mgbi ema li lɔ emɛsɛ onya? Ngyɛse ɛngbɛ mgbi ema ka gbɔ ema ikwɔ.
LUK 11:20 Kpaa ni li mi mfye mgbi Imgbasho ngwi ani lɔ emɛsɛ onya yɔ, esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ba mbi ema sewaani.
LUK 11:21 <<Ni inggisɛ ndzɛ yi mfye di dzɛ yi okyiika, ngyo udɛ mgban yɔ, alungwɔ ngwi o dzɛyan duu ka dzɛ kyoon.
LUK 11:22 Nghaduu ni inggisɛ ndzɛ yi mfye nghan ba wa gblika yan yɔ, o ka nghan diyɛ gbɛlun okyiika ngwi o le tsaabɔ igɛgɛ yan mani, o dika kyi ghalu okwudɛ mgban yi inggisɛ angbeka.
LUK 11:23 <<Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi ani bayɔ, kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi ani. Ongwu ngbe ngwikwo yi ani bayɔ, le bulu-bulu.
LUK 11:24 <<Onɔ ngwi onodzi emɛsɛ tɔ mbi inggisɛ, o li lu ivu le ka pita imbe otonya. Ki non tu imbe bayɔ, o li gbɛɛ; <N ka yidɔ lu udɛ ani ogbugbe.>
LUK 11:25 Non yɛ ba udan ogbugbe wa di a kyi mɛlu imbe ma dzɛkɛ saan yɔ.
LUK 11:26 O li yɛ lu ka kwu emɛsɛ angbeka egyafa ama ntimbali nghan mani, a ka ba wa kaka sisɛ mi ele. Taman odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ na ka timbi nghaabɔ ogbugbe.>>
LUK 11:27 Dafi iYesu le gbɔdzɛ le kɛ nɛ, ongyaa oka mi idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ ntona si kyile ela esho gbɛɛ, <<Mse no dzɛ yi ifu ngwi mba abu, bɛyi abɛ ngwi abu ngha nani.>>
LUK 11:28 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Nghaduukpaa li inggisɛ nfwo elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho di kyɔ mi ele yɛyɛ mani ka gbumse.>>
LUK 11:29 Dafi ibyi inggisɛ shili kye iYesu wo idzidzɛ nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li etɔ obube! O le mina ambɛ, kpaa o ka tu onyi ba sede ambɛ mgbi iJona ta.
LUK 11:30 Dafi iJona li ambɛ mbi emi iNinive na, li ngha ngwi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka li ambɛ mbi etɔ nɛ aani.
LUK 11:31 Apodza ongwi aca ka kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi inggisɛ emi etɔ nɛni mi egbe ikwɔ dika nu ma obube, lubana o kyɛ mbi ɛsɛ dondu owa fwo ozoyeye mgbi utɔ iSolomu, dinaa, ongwu nshewo ngha iSolomu dzɛ mmɛnɛni.
LUK 11:32 Inggisɛ emi iNinive kpaa ka kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi emi etɔ nɛni mi egbe ikwɔ diyɛ nu ma obube; ikyena a kyatitukwu mi onɔ ngwi a fwo elodzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ mgbi iJona nani, ma onɛnɛ ongwu nshewo ngha iJona dzɛ aani.
LUK 11:33 <<Inggisɛ onyi nka kye ola dɔ se ka kye da di kye mgboko tukwu ele dzɛma ba. O ka kye fakɛ imbe ododa ngwi ali inggisɛ nkaka duu ka di osa mani.
LUK 11:34 Inɛ mgbi abu li ipitila mgbi ewo mgbi abu. Kini inɛ mgbi abu tishi yɔ, ewo mgbi abu duu ka mbwo yi osa. Kpaa kini inɛ mgbi abu tishi bayɔ, ewo mgbi abu kpaa dika mbwo yi iifu.
LUK 11:35 Ikyenghanɛ, di gbɛɛ, osa ndzɛ mbi abu no ka li iifu ba.
LUK 11:36 Nghanɛ, kini ewo mgbi abu duu mbwo yi osa yi alewo onyi kpaa yifu bayɔ, ka mbwo yi osa dafi osa mgbi ipitila li nu abu osa nɛni.>>
LUK 11:37 Ngwi iYesu ngyɛlu odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ nɛ, inggisɛ iFarasi wa bɔɔn gbɛɛ no ba wa gye ungwogye mi udɛ mgban; ta o ka sɔkɛ ogye ungwogye.
LUK 11:38 Nghaduu inggisɛ iFarasi na, difwi gbɛɛ iYesu sabɔ mi odzɛɛdzɛ aletɔ mgbi ama ba ta, wita ogye ungwogye, nɛ i kwulun ewo.
LUK 11:39 Otsɛ iYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ, ema emi iFarasi li sa ewo alubata yi inunggaa, kpaa mi idzidzɛ mgbi ema yɔ li mbwo yi nggwɔ yi imbali.
LUK 11:40 Ema ikwangha inggisɛ ntonɛ! Li ongwu nmɛ idzidzɛ ma, mɛ esɛ kpaa baa?
LUK 11:41 Nɛ nu emi adzɛ umba yi itukwu osaan na, ta alungwɔ duu ka dzɛ ema saan.
LUK 11:42 <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema emi iFarasi, ema li kye onyi mi ikye iwyo ongwi okwɔ mgbi ema duu mbwo yi ungwɔ dafi indzafɛ, atsubo, bɛyi ungwɔ angbeka kye nu Imgbasho. Kpaa ema li kyɔ inggisɛ ogye, Imgbasho di kpaa ema itukwu ba. Li ungwɔ ndzɛ imbisɔ ngwi ema ki tsekise kyɔ duuse angbeka ntona aali.
LUK 11:43 <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema emi iFarasi, li kpa ema osɔ imbe mmwɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda di nu ma le ta ema angba yi mmwɛ mi ifyidu.
LUK 11:44 <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema ama olɔɔlɔ yi emi iFarasi, emi ikpala, ema dzɛ dafi endzi ngwi ambɛ mgban byulu, ngwi inggisɛ li kyikyɛ nyɛ ele kpaa a li difwi ba mani.>>
LUK 11:45 Inggisɛ otso ola mgbi iMose oka nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, dafi ngwi abu gbɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ nɛ, eyi kpaa abu fya eyi ito.>>
LUK 11:46 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema ama otso ola mgbi iMose, ikyekyɛ ema li gbe isɔ gwuba dɔ inggisɛ ikye kpaa ema li kye ongwufabɔ onyi gbo ele ikye oya ma abɔ ba.
LUK 11:47 <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema, ema mbɛ endzi mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ ngwu li emi otsikyema ngwɔ tugbe mani.
LUK 11:48 Nɛ ema tso gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi a kyɔ na li ayin; a ngwɔ ama ogbɛɛsɛ, ema di mbɛ ma endzi.
LUK 11:49 Mi ikyenghanɛ, Imgbasho mi ozoyeye mgban gbɛɛ, <Ani ka dɔ ama ogbɛɛsɛ yi ama ogbikye ani esɔ mboma, angbeka a ka ngwɔ ma diyɛ nu angbeka adzɛ.>
LUK 11:50 Nghanɛ, etɔ nɛni a ka kwo ma adɔ mi ikwu mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ ngwu a ngwɔ mi owita-wita mgbi ɛsɛ nani.
LUK 11:51 Wita mi ikwu mgbi Ebɛl lu ka kaka ikwu iDzakaria, ongwu ma ngwɔn mi idzidzɛ ozu mgbi Imgbasho yi iwashi ofifɛ nani. N nya ema mi otsitsi, a ka kwo etɔ nɛ adɔ mi ungwɔ ntonɛ duu.
LUK 11:52 <<Ahoo! Mi ikye ema ama otso ola, lubana ema kyi kyelu ungwɔ okwulu ofɛ mgbi ozoyeye mgbi Imgbasho. Ema abuema kpaa kaka ba, diyɛ noofɛ gbɛɛ ama nle kaka nu ma kaka ba.>>
LUK 11:53 Ngwi iYesu ngyɛlu odzɛ ntonɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ nɛ, o dzata imbe nani, nɛ emi iFarasi yi ama otso ola mgbi emi iJuda wita ole ban ibɛ di kyitingga gbɛɛ no gbɔdzɛ mi ungwɔ gwuba,
LUK 11:54 zukwu ni ama tu ofɛ di nun obube mi odzɛ ama ntɔ mi ondu mbon nli ayin ba mani.
LUK 12:1 Ngwi inggisɛ idubu ibyibyi wa kwutokɛ mbonyi nɛ, a sile dzi ewoma afɔ, man iYesu wita ogbɔdzɛ ababɔ nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ: <<Kyɔ dumɔɔ yi otsootso mgbi emi iFarasi, ngwi li ɛwɛ nli gbɔfwɛ dafi okwuna mi ibredi nani.
LUK 12:2 Onɔ kyɛma ngwi alungwɔ ndzɛ mi odaada duu ka dɔ ododa, ungwɔ ngwi a di kye da duu a ka kye dɛɛsɛ.
LUK 12:3 Ungwɔ ngwi abu gbɔ mi iyifu a ka fwo mi osa, ungwɔ ngwi abu di gbɔn mi adɔ mi ifoozu idzidzɛ dika gbela tɔ mi ikyendu.
LUK 12:4 <<N nya ema, emi okani, ka mio ama nka ngwɔ ikpewo ta ka kyɔ unka gbɛ wuba na ba.
LUK 12:5 Kpaa n ka tso ema ongwu ema ka mion mani: Mio ongwu, ki non kye ngwɔlu ikpewo, o di dzɛ yi mfye okye abu wokɛ imbe adzɛ nani. Ɛɛn, ani nya ema, mion na.
LUK 12:6 A li kye ifyilo nghi eda gya mi anini efa baa? Nghaduu ifyilo onyi kpaa Imgbasho gblimɔn ba.
LUK 12:7 Nghanɛ, otu mi ikye mgbi ema duu Imgbasho ye mmbwon. Ka mio ba na; ema ngha ifyilo ibyibyi.
LUK 12:8 <<Ani nya ema, inggisɛ ta nkyɔ obwɛndɛ mgbi ani mi inɛ inggisɛ yɔ, Ongwɛ Inggisɛ kpaa ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ mgban mi inɛ engyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho.
LUK 12:9 Nghaduu inggisɛ ntangwɛ ani mi inɛ inggisɛ yɔ, ongwu kpaa Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka tangwan mi inɛ engyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho.
LUK 12:10 Ali inggisɛ ngbɔdzɛ obube mi ikye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ, a ka dzanta yi obube, kpaa ongwu nfya Onodzi Osaan ito yɔ, a ka dzanta ba.
LUK 12:11 <<Onɔ ngwi a kye ema ba inɛ ikwɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda bɛyi inɛ emi atɔtsɛ bɛyi inɛ mgbi emi ola ma, no ka kaka ema ewo dafi ema ka na ewema naadi odzɛ ngwi ema ka gbɔ ba.
LUK 12:12 Ikyena Onodzi Osaan ka nya ema odzɛ ngwi ema ka gbɔ mi onɔ na mani.>>
LUK 12:13 Inggisɛ oka mi ifu ibyi nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, nya ongwunani no kye ghalu okwudɛ ngwi otseyi dzanta nu eyi nɛ yi ani.>>
LUK 12:14 IYesu si nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Okani, li emɛ nu ani mfye ogbiikwɔ naadi ogha ema okwudɛ?>>
LUK 12:15 Ta o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛwɛbyi! Ngyo ewema mi ali ofɛ mgbi nggwɔ duu; oshishe mgbi inggisɛ dzɛ mi aludu mgban ba.>>
LUK 12:16 Man o nya ma utsa nɛ gbɛɛ: <<Ikpɛsɛ mgbi inggisɛ udza oka tishi ungwogye.
LUK 12:17 O tsɛwɛ mi itukwu mgban gbɛɛ, <Li ekyɛ ngwi ani ka kyɔ? Ani dzɛ yi imbe ngwi ani ka gbe ungwogye mgbi ani to ba.>
LUK 12:18 <<Nɛ o gbɔgbɛɛ, <Li ungwɔ ani ka kyɔ aani. N ka kye bulu emi oba mgbi ani yidɔ mbɛ ama okwukwo, man ani ka gbe ungwogyowe yi okye mgbi ani duu da mi efu.
LUK 12:19 Ta n ka nya ewen gbɛɛ, <<Abu dzɛ yi ungwɔ osuse kwuba to nka kye onova ibyibyi. Yile itukwu bɛsɛ; gye, wa diyɛ dzɛ yi atsa.>> >
LUK 12:20 <<Kpaa Imgbasho nyan gbɛɛ, <Abu ikwangha nɛ! Mi otu inɛ nɛni n ka mina oshishe mgbi abu mbi abu. Nɛ li emɛ ka kye gbelu ungwɔ ngwi abu gbe to ikye ewabu nɛ?>
LUK 12:21 <<Li ngha nka dzɛ yi ali inggisɛ ngbe ungwɔ to ikye ewon kpaa li aludu mbi Imgbasho ba aali.>>
LUK 12:22 Ta iYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ: <<Nghanɛ ani nya ema, no ka kaka ema ewo mi oshishe mgbi ema ba, ungwɔ ngwi ema ka gye, naadi mi ikye ewo mgbi ema, ungwɔ ngwi ema ka wo.
LUK 12:23 Oshishe ngha ungwogye, ewo di ngha angwuto.
LUK 12:24 Di emi ajaglama: A li kya naadi shɛ ba, a dzɛ yi ozu hona oba okye ungwɔ da ba, nghaduu Imgbasho li byi ma enbwa. Ema dzɛ yi oyabɔ ngha ingwunɔ duu!
LUK 12:25 Li emɛ mbi ema mi itukwu oshanyɛ mgban ka yagba ombwo obyi onyi mi oshishe mgban?
LUK 12:26 Ma ni itukwu oshanyɛ ka yagba ngyɛlu ungwɔ ogyɛngyɛ ngha ba wali, oyabɔ li ekyɛ onu ewema itukwu shanyɛ mi ungwɔ angbeka?
LUK 12:27 <<Di dafi onggangga oshɛ li she mani. A li kyidɔ naadi gbo ewoma angwuto ba. Nghaduu iSolomu mi okwɔkwɔ mgban nose wewo tishi dafi onyi mbi onggangga ntonɛ ba.
LUK 12:28 Ni li ngha ngwi Imgbasho li nu oshɛ mi okwɔ ngwi dzɛ inɛ, ekeka a ka kye toola sunse ma, ka kyɔsinɛse ngwi o ka nghao kye inɛ byi ema ba? Ema ngwu oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ema shanyɛ ntonɛni!
LUK 12:29 Nghanɛ, no ka kaka ema ewo mi ungwɔ ngwi ema ka gye naadi wa ba; dika dzɛ yi angwodzɛ mi itukwu kpaa ba.
LUK 12:30 Bana li ama n ye Imgbasho ba li kyɛdɔ ungwɔ ntonɛni, ma Otsema ye dafi ema mina ungwɔ ntonɛ mani.
LUK 12:31 Nghaduu pita esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ababɔ, ta a ka gbe ungwɔ ntonɛ duu mbwo ema kɛ ele.
LUK 12:32 <<Ka mio ba na, engwafɔ ama okpa ani itukwu, ikyena i mina Otsema okye esutɔ nu ema.
LUK 12:33 Gbelu ungwɔ ngwi ema dzɛyan duu gya kye udza gha emi adzɛ. Ema ka tu ungwɔ ama osuse nka li gyegwu, aludu mi esho nka ngyɛ ba, imbe ngwi emumyi ka ba kwɛkwɛ naadi ikwukwu ka kye gye ba mani.
LUK 12:34 Lubana imbe ngwi aludu mgbi ema dzɛma, li mmana ngwi itukwu mgbi ema kpaa li dzɛ aali.
LUK 12:35 <<Wewo okyidɔ di nu ipitila mgbi ema le gbɛ,
LUK 12:36 dafi engbidɔ tole fɛ oyɛɛyɛ mgbi ongyukwo mgbi ama mi eba okwokyiikwokyi, ikyegbɛɛ non yɛ wa tsaabɔ ta a ka kwulun ofɛ vla mani.
LUK 12:37 Ka sunse mbi engbidɔ onɔ ngwi ongyukwo yɛ tu ma le ngyo mani. N nya ema otsitsi, ongwu abuon ka wewo gbe ma sisɛ kye oga nu ma gye.
LUK 12:38 Ka sunse mbi engbidɔ ama ngwu ongyukwo mgbi ama wa tu ma wewo mani, yeba non ba mi idzidzɛ otu naadi mi ikyegbe kpaa.
LUK 12:39 Kpaa difwi odzɛ nɛni: Ni otsungwɔ ozu ki ye onɔ ngwi emumyi ka ba yɔ, o kika non gbobun ozu kaka ba.
LUK 12:40 Ema kpaa li kyɛmɛ ngwi ema ka wewo, ikyekyɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka ba mi obyi ngwi ema gbinɛbyi ma ba.>>
LUK 12:41 IPyita byita gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, abu le gbɔ utsa nɛ nya eyi yueyi naadi li ali inggisɛ duu?>>
LUK 12:42 Otsɛ iYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ li ongbidɔ oyɛyɛ di kwiinɛ? Li ongwu ngbeka byi ungwɔ, ngwi ongyukwo kyon dzɛkɛ ikye ogbinɛbyi engbidɔ mgban onu ma ungwogye mi onɔ nwogyɔ mani.
LUK 12:43 Ka tishi mbi ongbidɔ ngwu ongyukwo mgban wa tun le kyɔ ngha mi onɔ ngwi o yɛ mani.
LUK 12:44 N nya ema otsitsi, o ka kyon dzɛkɛ ogbinɛbyi ungwɔ mgban duu.
LUK 12:45 Nghaduu ni ongbidɔ na nya ewon gbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo mgbi ani le kye onɔ tunto oyɛɛyɛ,> man wita ogbo engyulɔ yi engyiidɔ ibe dile gye yɛ wa fya yɔ.
LUK 12:46 Ongyukwo mgbi ongbidɔ na ka yidɔ mi egbe ngwi o kye inɛ byi ma ba bɛyi obyi ngwi o ye ba. O ka non gyisɔ kpakpa di kyon dzɛkɛ imbe mgbi ama onghaadɔ.
LUK 12:47 <<Ongbidɔ ongwu n ye ungwɔ ngwi ongyukwo mgban mina, kpaa wewo ba di kyungwɔ ma bayɔ, a ka gbon onitse kwuba.
LUK 12:48 Nghaduu ongwu n ye ba di kyungwɔ ngwi li oyɛyɛ ba, a ka gbon onitse gwee. Mbi ali inggisɛ ngwu a nun kwuba a dika mina kwuba mbon; ongwu a di nun dzii a dika pita mbon dzii.
LUK 12:49 <<Ani ba ɛsɛ nɛ yi ola, ma dafi i dzɛ ani ma kile gbɛ kpaa wa!
LUK 12:50 Kpaa ani dzɛ yi iBatisima mgbi isɔ ngwi ani ka wa kaka ele, ma n ka gyisɔ ongwi itukwu nghataa se ka wa ngyɛ.
LUK 12:51 Ema tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ani ba owa kye iyu ba ɛsɛɛ? Ei, n nya ema, li ogha inggisɛ yi ewoma.
LUK 12:52 I wita onɛnɛ nghataa lu iyayi inggisɛ ka li eda mi etɔ onyi a ka gbua yi ewema, eta ka kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi efa, efa dika kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi eta.
LUK 12:53 A ka wa gha yi ewoma, otsɔngwɛ yi ongwan ongyulɔ, ongwongyulɔ yi otsɔn, onɔngwɛ yi ongwan ongwu ongyaa, ongwongyaa yi onɔn, onobongyaa yi owongwaan, owongwɛ yi onoban.>>
LUK 12:54 Nɛ iYesu nya ibyi inggisɛ gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ ngwi ema di akpa tseto mi onosa, mi onɔ nata ema li gbɛɛ, <Mmbwo ka wa kya,> man di li kya.
LUK 12:55 Ma onɔ ngwi awo ongwi agwudu wa fa, ema li gbɛɛ, <Imbe ka wa dziwu,> man di li dzɛ ngha.
LUK 12:56 Ema emi ikpala ntonɛ! Ema ye onu osa mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ɛsɛ bɛyi akpa mi esho. Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema ye onu osa mi odzɛɛdzɛ ongwi onɛnɛ wuba?
LUK 12:57 <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema fwikwɔ abuema mi ungwɔ nli ayin wuba?
LUK 12:58 Ni abu le kɛ opiikwɔ yi ongyikyili mgbi abu yɔ, fya kpakpa ni abu yile ide gye yan mi ofɛ, ni abu kyɔ ngha ba, a ka kwo abu ba inɛ inggisɛ ogbiikwɔ, ongwu nka kye abu wo obaka abɔ, ta a sika kye abu wokɛ obawi.
LUK 12:59 N nya abu, o ka tasɛ ba nghataa imbisɔ ngwi abu ka kpa anini mgbi abu ongwi olɛlɛ ngwi a wo abu mani.>>
LUK 13:1 Mi onɔ nani, inggisɛ angbeka to imbe na nnya iYesu gbɛɛ di iPlatu ngwɔ emi iGalalia angbeka ni eyi mgbi ama takye yi ifɛ ngwi a le fɛ mani.
LUK 13:2 IYesu si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ emi iGalalia ngwu a ngwɔ ma ngha na nghao li emi ali ibwubwe ngha emi iGalalia angbeka ntonaa?
LUK 13:3 Ei, li ngha ba! Kpaa n nya ema, ni ema kyata mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema bayɔ, ema ka kwulu dafi ama kpaa kwulu nani.
LUK 13:4 Inggisɛ iwyodegyata ama nkwulu onɔ ngwi ozu oshigbo mi iSilon gbobu si ma na ma, ema tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ a kyɔ obube ngha angbeka ama nto iJerosalin naa?
LUK 13:5 Ei, li ngha ba! Nghaduu n nya ema, ni ema kyata mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema bayɔ, ema kpaa ka wa dzili duu.>>
LUK 13:6 Ta iYesu nya ma utsa nɛ gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ oka nose kye ekwɔ ngwi a li kwun di andundu kye ye mi okwɔ mgban. O li ka kpadi gbɛɛ, ni i wa owawa yɔ, kpaa o li tu ba.
LUK 13:7 Nɛ o nya inggisɛ nle ngyo okwɔ na gbɛɛ, <I mɛ onova eta ngwi ani le ba wa kpadi ekwɔ nɛ gbɛɛ ni ani tu awawa mi ele, kpaa n tu ba. Kye dzɛ ngwuta! Kyɔsinɛ ngwi o le tukwu imbe?>
LUK 13:8 <<Nghaduu inggisɛ ongyo okwɔ nu uka gbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo, di dzanta onova onyi; n ka tishɛ nyɛ ewon gbe ibwa yawon.
LUK 13:9 Ki non wa owawa onova nkyɛ nɛ, tishi! Ni li ngha bayɔ, kye dzɛ ngwuta.> >>
LUK 13:10 IYesu le tsungwɔ mi egbe otonyidɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda oka,
LUK 13:11 man ongyaa oka dzɛ imbe na ngwu onodzi obube non dotse fulu mɛ onova iwyodegyata, o kilɛ li yagba zunto kpaakpa gbɛ ba.
LUK 13:12 Ngwi iYesu din nɛ, o kwun ela ba iyayi si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, a shɛ abu adita mi ootse mgbi abu!>>
LUK 13:13 O kye abɔ gbon, labɔlabɔ nɛta, o si kyato dzɛkunto kpaakpa man le tsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 13:14 Itingga kyɔ inggisɛ okye okwakye teyi gbɛɛ di iYesu ngyɛlu ootse mi egbe otonyidɔ, o si nya inggisɛ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Ali ikyidu dzɛ yi egbe egyin ngwi eyi ka kyidɔ, nghanɛ ba mi egbe ntonɛni, ni a ngyɛlu ema ootse, kpa no ka li egbe otonyidɔ ba.>>
LUK 13:15 Otsɛ iYesu nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema emi ikpala ntonɛ! Ali inggisɛ mgbi ema li kyi shɛlu mnda naadi itaklimyi mgban mi ifatoba kyen ka weni mi egbe otonyidɔ baa?
LUK 13:16 Nghanɛ ongyaa nɛ kyɛ mi etɔ mgbi Abrahan, kpaa iSatan bwan adi mɛ onova iwyodegyata. Wanɛ i tishi gbɛɛ nu ma shan adi mi egbe otonyidɔ ba naadi?>>
LUK 13:17 Ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ nɛ, ayiwi kwu engyikyili mgban. Kpaa inggisɛ ntona duu i kpa ma mi ungwɔ okwulewo ngwi o le kyɔ nani.
LUK 13:18 Nɛta iYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ dzɛ sinɛ? Li ekyɛ ngwi ani ka kye mba yan?
LUK 13:19 Dzɛ dafi inɛnɛ nkwodzi, ngwi inggisɛ kye ka fwe mi okwɔ mgban. I she yɛɛ ekwɔ, ingwunɔ li ludɛ mi abɔn.>>
LUK 13:20 IYesu di byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka kye esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho mba yan?
LUK 13:21 Dzɛ dafi ongyaa kye okwuna tablikyi yi ofumbu nshe mi ikpɔkpɔ di bwuo ewon kpatsɛ mani.>>
LUK 13:22 Ta iYesu nyɛ igeli-igeli bɛyi agwɔ emi oshɛ le tsungwɔ ngwi o le lu iJerosalin mani.
LUK 13:23 Inggisɛ oka byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li inggisɛ gwee ta ka watɔɔ?>> O nya ma gbɛɛ,
LUK 13:24 <<Fya mi ofyaafya mgbi ema ni ema kaka mi onufɛ okpenge nani, ikyena inggisɛ kwuba ka fya gbɛɛ nu ma kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nghaduu a ka yagba ba.
LUK 13:25 Otsungwɔ ozu ka kyato yile onufɛ tukwu, ema ka tila to esɛ le tsaabɔ yɛ gbaabɔ gbɛɛ, <Kwulu eyi onufɛ, ongyukwo!> <<Nghaduu o ka nu uka gbɛɛ, <Ani ye ema hona ye imbe ngwi ema tɔkyɛ ba.>
LUK 13:26 <<Ta ema ka gbɛɛ, <Eyi gye diyɛ wa yi abu, abu di tso mi igeli mgbi eyi kpaa!>
LUK 13:27 <<Nghaduu o dika gbɛɛ, <Ani ye ema naadi imbe ngwi ema tɔkyɛ ba. Lu enggengga mbi ani na, ema emi ali ibwubwe ntonɛni!>
LUK 13:28 <<Akwɔ omaama bɛyi aba ogyeegye ka dzɛ imbe nani, onɔ ngwi ema di Abrahan yi Adziki yi iJeko bɛyi ama ogbɛɛsɛ duu mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho kpaa ema abuema a ka kye ema ngwuta lu esɛ mani!
LUK 13:29 Ibyi inggisɛ ka kyɛ mi onosa yi onɔdɛ, bɛyi aca yi agwudu, dika wa sɔ oga mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.
LUK 13:30 Nghanɛ emi olɛlɛ ka yɛɛ emi ababɔ, emi ababɔ dika yɛɛ emi olɛlɛ.>>
LUK 13:31 Mi onɔ na emi iFarasi angbeka ba mbi iYesu wa nyan gbɛɛ, <<Dzata imbe nɛ lu imbe oka. IHerude mina ongwɔ abu.>>
LUK 13:32 IYesu si nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Kɛ ka nya ogbalinya na gbɛɛ, <N ka dulu emɛsɛ di ngyɛlu ibyi inggisɛ ootse inɛ yi ekeka mi egbe ongwu ta ma, n ka ngyɛlu idɔ mgbi ani.>
LUK 13:33 Nghaduu n ka byi ofɛ mgbi ani abɔ inɛ yi ekeka yi egbetanɛ, lubana i tishi gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔ oyegbɔ mi imbe oka ba li mi iJerosalin ta.
LUK 13:34 <<Ekyi, iJerosalin, iJerosalin, abu nngwɔ ama ogbɛɛsɛ di tsɛ ama ngwu a dɔ ma esɔ mbi abu akwutsɛ, dafi ani gbili okye emi ongwabu kwakye yi eka, dafi onogbi li kwulu engwaan wokɛ asha, kpaa ema nu ani ofɛ ba!
LUK 13:35 Dika, a dzita udɛ mgbi ema yɛɛ okwudɛ waana. N le nya ema, ema ka di ani wuba nghataa sede ni ema wa gbɛɛ, <Ogbumse li ongwu nba mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho se.> >>
LUK 14:1 Egbe otonyidɔ oka nɛ, iYesu kɛ le ka gye oga mi udɛ mgbi inggisɛ iFarasi imɔ oka, a si kye inɛ fyakwun.
LUK 14:2 Nɛta inggisɛ oka ngwu afɔ yi abɔ weeni ba mbi iYesu.
LUK 14:3 Nɛ iYesu byi ama otso ola mgbi iMose bɛyi emi iFarasi ita gbɛɛ, <<Ola mgbi eyi noofɛ ongyɛlu ootse mi egbe otonyidɔ naadi i nu ba?>>
LUK 14:4 Kpaa a dede shilididi. Ta iYesu byi inggisɛ na abɔ, man o ngyɛlun ootse di dzanta non lu.
LUK 14:5 IYesu si byi emi iFarasi ntona gbɛɛ, <<Ni onyi mbi ema dzɛ yi ongwɛ naadi mnda ngbɛsɛ wokɛ ibuga mi egbe otonyidɔ ma, o ka dulun tɔ plɛ lo?>>
LUK 14:6 Nghaduu a yagba nu uka ba.
LUK 14:7 Ngwi iYesu difwi dafi ama nba oga ntonɛ le sadu imbe mmwɛ abuoma nɛ, o nya ma utsa nɛ gbɛɛ:
LUK 14:8 <<Ni inggisɛ bɔ abu oga mgbi eba okwokyiikwokyi yɔ, ka sisɛ mi imbe mmwɛ ba. Ikyayina inggisɛ oka nshewo ngha abu kpaa a bɔɔn.
LUK 14:9 Ni li ngha, inggisɛ nbɔ ema ma, ka ba wa nya abu gbɛɛ, <Ni abu kye itse mgbi abu nu inggisɛ nɛni.> Ta abu ka tu ayiwi yɛ ka sɔkɛ imbe okwushanyɛ.
LUK 14:10 Nghaduu, nu ma bɔ abu oga yɔ, lu ka sɔkɛ imbe ngwi yɛ esɛ tsatsadu mani, ni inggisɛ nbɔ abu wa nya abu gbɛɛ, <Kyato, okani, lu itse ntatase nani.> Ta abu ka dzɛ yi mmwɛ mi inɛ mbi ama ngwu a bɔ ma ntonani.
LUK 14:11 Lubana ali inggisɛ nkyile ewon esho duu a ka yilen esɛ. Kpaa ongwu n yile ewon esɛ, a ka kyilen esho.>>
LUK 14:12 Ta iYesu si nya inggisɛ nbɔɔn oga na gbɛɛ, <<Ni abu kyɔ oga mi onɔ naadi onɔnɔdɛ, ka bɔ emi okaabu ba naadi emi ongwunabu naadi odo abu hona emi aludu ama nwatse dɔ abu ba; ikyena a ka yidɔ bɔ abu ikye oyilen kpaa abu mkpaa.
LUK 14:13 Ni abu kyɔ oga yɔ, bɔ emi adzɛ, yi ama ngbikye tukwu esɛ, yi ama ntummya, yi ama nbinɛ,
LUK 14:14 ta Imgbasho ka kye mse bɛ abu ewo. Ikyekyɛ a ka yagba kpa abu mkpa gbɛ ba, Imgbasho ka yilen kpa abu mi egbe ngwi emi osaan ka kyato mi ikwu mani.>>
LUK 14:15 Onɔ ngwi inggisɛ onyi mbi ama nsɔto oga biyan fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, o nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nka sɔ oga mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ka gbumse.>>
LUK 14:16 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ oka nose le kyɔ andɛfɛ oga si bɔ inggisɛ kwuba.
LUK 14:17 Ngwi onɔ oga ma wa gyɔ nɛ, o dɔ ongye ogbɛsɔ mgban gbɛɛ no kɛ ka nya ama ngwu ongwu bɔ ma gbɛɛ, <Ba na, lubana alungwɔ duu ngyɛ le fɛ-fɛ wa.>
LUK 14:18 <<Kpaa ama duu wita o nu itɔdzɛ idzidza-dzidza. Ongwu ababɔ nya ongye ogbɛsɔ gbɛɛ, <Ani gya ikpɛsɛ, ma li kyɛmɛ ngwi ani ka ka kpadi. N tɛkyɛ nu abu, nu ani ofɛ.>
LUK 14:19 <<Oka gbɛɛ, <Ani gya mnda efefa imbe eda, n kwa le ka mbadi ma aani. Tsuutsu nu ani ofɛ.>
LUK 14:20 <<Oka di gbɛɛ, <Ani kwa kye ongyaa ofufɛ, nghanɛ n ka yagba kɛ ba.>
LUK 14:21 <<Ongye ogbɛsɔ nɛ yidɔ ka nya ongyukwo mgban odzɛ ntonɛ duu. Ta otsungwudɛ nyɛ yi itingga kpakpa man wo ongye ogbɛsɔ mgban ola gbɛɛ, <Lu emi ingɔfɛ plɛ bɛyi emi abɔfɛ mgbi igeli ka gbe emi adzɛ yi ama ntummya yi ama nbinɛ yi ama ngbikye tukwu esɛ duu ba.>
LUK 14:22 <<Ongye ogbɛsɔ na gbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo, ola ngwi abu wo na ani kyɔ mi ele wa, kpaa imbe ka dzɛ mi ikye inggisɛ angbeka.>
LUK 14:23 <<Nghanɛ ongyukwo nya ongye ogbɛsɔ gbɛɛ, <Tasɛ lu emi onɔɔfɛ bɛyi ayɛ ofɛ ka bɔ ali inggisɛ ngwu abu di duu nu ma ba, zukwu ni udɛ mgbi ani mbwo.
LUK 14:24 N nya ema, inggisɛ ama ngwu ani plɛ bɔ ma ntona onyi kpaa ka ta oga mgbi ani kpanɛ ba!> >>
LUK 14:25 Ibyi inggisɛ wafɔ yi iYesu le kɛ, man o kyata nya ma gbɛɛ:
LUK 14:26 <<Inggisɛ ntangwɛ otsɔn yi onɔn, owan yi ɛngbɛ mgban, emi ongwunɔn engyulɔ yi engyaa naadi oshishe mgban bayɔ, o ka li ongwafɔ mgbi ani ba.
LUK 14:27 Inggisɛ ndi kye ekwatsi mgban kyɛdɔ ani bayɔ, o ka li ongwafɔ mgbi ani ba.
LUK 14:28 <<Ni i dzɛ gbɛɛ onyi mbi ema mina o mbɛ ozu oshigbo yɔ, o ka plɛ sisɛ kyɔ mmbwo mi ungwɔ ngwi i ka kyen ombɛ ozu ma ngyɛ baa?
LUK 14:29 Bana ki non wo itozu kpaa di yagba ngyɛlu bayɔ, ali inggisɛ ndi duu ka shan isha
LUK 14:30 gbɛɛ, <Amu nɛ kwaabɔ ombɛɛmbɛ kpaa yagba ngyɛlu ba.>
LUK 14:31 <<Naadi li ali utɔ nle ka gblika yi utɔ oka. Ka tsekise sisɛ tsɛwɛ ki non ka yagba yi engyilika nghi idubu iwyo oka gblika yi utɔ ndzɛ yi engyilika nghi idubu osu ba?
LUK 14:32 Non ka yagba ba, o ka dɔ ama ogbɛsɔ mgban nu ma ka yile ide gye ngwu ma ka dzɛ mbombo yi ama mani.
LUK 14:33 Nghanɛ, inggisɛ mgbi ema ta nkye alungwɔ mgban duu nu ba, o ka li ongwafɔ mgbi ani ba.
LUK 14:34 <<Mmwaa tishi, kpaa ni mmwaa fyumfya wuba ma, a ka kyɔsinɛse non di fyumfya dafi mmwaa?
LUK 14:35 Dika tishi mi ikpɛsɛ naadi ogbagye ibwa wuba; a ka kye yangwuta. <<Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ, otsungwɔn no fwo.>>
LUK 15:1 Egbe oka nɛ, ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ bɛyi emi ali ibwubwe wa kwakye ikye ofwo iYesu.
LUK 15:2 Nghaduu emi iFarasi bɛyi ama otso ola mgbi iMose wita okwondukwɔ gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ gbela yi emi ali ibwubwe diyɛ le gye ungwogye yi ama kpaa!>>
LUK 15:3 Nɛ iYesu nya ma utsa sini:
LUK 15:4 <<Ni inggisɛ oka mbi ema dzɛ yi mmala nghi ideli onyi ma onyi byulu mi efu, li ekyɛ ngwi o ka kyɔ? O ka dzata ngwusenɛ dɔn iwyo diwyegyanɛ ntona mi imbe ododa lu ka pita onyi nbyulu na nghataa se non tuun baa?
LUK 15:5 Onɔ ngwi o ka tuun ma, o ka tsatsa kye dɔkɛ olubɔ
LUK 15:6 le lu udɛ. Non wa to udɛ, o ka kwu emi okan bɛyi ama nwotsuudɛ dɔn ela gbɛɛ, <Tsatsa yi ani na; ikyekyɛ ani ka tu mmala nbyulu ma wa.>
LUK 15:7 N nya ema gbɛɛ mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ kpɔɔ atsa ka dzɛ esho kwuba mi ikye inggisɛ alobube onyi nkyata luba mbi Imgbasho ngha inggisɛ ama osaan ngwusenɛ dɔn iwyo diwyegyanɛ ngwu mina okyata ba ntonani.
LUK 15:8 <<Naadi ni ongyaa dzɛ yi anini nghi iwyo onyi byulu mi ele ma o ka kyɔsinɛ? O ka kye ipitila dɔ kyi waalu ozu di pita yi ɛwɛ ogbebyi nghataa se non di baa?
LUK 15:9 Onɔ ngwi o ka tu ma, o ka kwu emi okan bɛyi ama nwotsuudɛ dɔn ela gbɛɛ, <Tsatsa yi ani na ikyekyɛ ani ka tu anini nbyulu ma wa.>
LUK 15:10 Mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ kpɔɔ, n nya ema, atsa ka dzɛ mi inɛ engyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho mi ikye inggisɛ alobube onyi nkyatitukwu mani.>>
LUK 15:11 IYesu di kiyayi gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ oka nose dzɛ yi engwengyulɔ nghi efa.
LUK 15:12 Ongwu ongbungbɛ nya otsɔn gbɛɛ, <Otsani, kye okwudɛ ndzɛ mi ikye mgbi ani ma nu ani.> Nɛ otsɔn si kye ghalu okwudɛ nu engwaan efa ntonani.
LUK 15:13 <<Egbe nyɛ gwee ta, ongwan ongwu ongbungbɛ si kye gbelu alungwɔ mgban. O kyato lu ɛsɛ mbombo mi imbe na ma, o kye mbelu awuya mgban duu mi oshishe ayayi.
LUK 15:14 Onɔ ngwi o kye mbelu alungwɔ duu nɛ, okɔtɔndzi enbwa kaka ɛsɛ na duu, man o yɛɛ abubɔ yi unkonyi ogyeegye ba.
LUK 15:15 Nɛ o kɛ oka kyɔ inggisɛ oka idɔ mi ɛsɛ nani, inggisɛ na kyon dɛsɔ lu okwɔ mgban oka kye inɛ byun obyia.
LUK 15:16 O mina gbɛɛ ongwu ki gye ungwogye ngwi obyia ntona le gye mani, kpaa inggisɛ nun unkonyi non gye ba.
LUK 15:17 <<Mi onɔ ngwi o wa yile itukwu bɛsɛ nɛ, o gbɔ yi ewon gbɛɛ, <Mi udɛ, ama okyɔ otsani idɔ kpaa a dzɛ yi ungwogye ogyeegye gyɔloma, ma mmɛnɛ ani le kwulu enbwa!
LUK 15:18 N ka yɛ lu udɛ mbi otsani ka nyan gbɛɛ: Otsɛn, ani kyɔ Imgbasho obube yi abu.
LUK 15:19 Nghanɛ ani mɛ gyɔ ngwi a ka kwu ani gbɛɛ ongwabu wuba; nu ani yɛɛ dafi emi idɔ mgbi abu mani.>
LUK 15:20 Man o kyato yɛ lu mbi otsɔn. <<Nghaduu ngwi o ka kyɛ mbombo mani, otsɔn din ta elela kyɔn won; o tsinya ka tsɛkwulu ongwan, si kwokyi ondu yan.
LUK 15:21 <<Ongwan si nyan gbɛɛ, <Otsɛn, ani kyɔ Imgbasho obube yi abu, nghanɛ ani mɛ ngwi a ka kwu ani di ongwabu wuba.>
LUK 15:22 <<Kpaa otsɔn kwu ongbidɔ mgban ela gbɛɛ, <Vla! Ka kye angwuto ntishi ngha mi ozu kye wa won. Kye ongwashi won ongwufabɔ yi okpafɔ won afɔ.
LUK 15:23 Lu ka kye andɛfɛ mnda ongyulɔ wa ngwɔlu ni eyi gye di tsatsa.
LUK 15:24 Ikyena ongwani nɛ kwulu kpaa onɛnɛ o dzɛ oshishe; o byulu kpaa onɛnɛ a din.> Ta a wita oga.
LUK 15:25 <<Mi onɔ na, ongwan ongwu ongyukwo nose dzɛ okwɔ. Ngwi o yɛ wa to ondu udɛ nɛ, o fwo ungwɔ ogboogbo yi ifwe.
LUK 15:26 Nghanɛ o si kwu ongbidɔ oka ela byun gbɛɛ, <Li alungwɔ le kiyayi?>
LUK 15:27 O nun uka gbɛɛ, <Ongwunabu yidɔ luba udɛ, otsabu kye ngwɔlu andɛfɛ mnda ikyekyɛ o yɛ ise.>
LUK 15:28 <<Ongwunɔn ongwu ongyukwo si kyitingga kpakpa gbɛɛ ongwu ka kaka udɛ wuba. Otsɔn tasɛ wa tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ non kaka.
LUK 15:29 Kpaa o nu otsɔn uka gbɛɛ, <Di! Onova ntonɛ duu ani kyɔ abu idɔ dafi ofyɛɛ mani, ma akponyi kpaa ani ngha abu adɔ ye ba. Nghaduu abu nu ani ongwɛ mndɔ kpaa gbɛɛ nin kyɔ oga yi emi okɛɛn ba!
LUK 15:30 Kpaa onɔ ngwi ongwabu nɛ kye mbelu ungwɔ mgbi abu duu yi owagbai engyaa yɛ luba udɛ nɛ, abu ngwɔn andɛfɛ mnda!>
LUK 15:31 <<Otsɔn si nun uka gbɛɛ, <Ongwani, abu dzɛ yi ani alonɔ duu, ma alungwɔ ngwi ani dzɛyan duu li mgbi abu.
LUK 15:32 Nghaduu dzɛ mbisɔ ngwi eyi ka gye oga di tsatsa, ikyekyɛ ongwunabu kwulu, kpaa onɛnɛ o dzɛ oshishe; o byulu kpaa onɛnɛ a din.> >>
LUK 16:1 IYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ udza oka nose dzɛ o dzɛ yi ongyukwiidɔ ngwu kye inɛ le byun udza. Ta a kwu ongyukwiidɔ nɛ elikwɔ mbi otsungwudɛ mgban gbɛɛ o le gyon awuya.
LUK 16:2 Nghanɛ, o kwun ela, nyan gbɛɛ, <Li ali odzɛ ngwi ani le fwo mi ikpewo abu ngha? Lɔlu ungwɔ mgbi ani ama nbyito abɔ abu tsatsadu wa nin, ikyekyɛ abu mɛ okye inɛ byi ani ungwɔ wuba.>
LUK 16:3 <<Ongyukwo idɔ na yɛ gbɔ yi ewon mi itukwu gbɛɛ, <Ani ka kyɔsinɛ onɛnɛ, ngwi otsungwudɛ mgbi ani le nya yi ani idɔ nɛ? Ani dzɛ yi mfye mɛ oshookwɔ ba, ayiwi li kwu ani obibɔ.
LUK 16:4 Ani ye ungwɔ ngwi ani ka kyɔ wa, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma wa nya yi ani idɔ mmɛnɛ kpaa, inggisɛ ka gbɛ ani mi udɛ mgbi ama mani.>
LUK 16:5 <<Ta o kwu ama ngye mkpa mbi otsungwudɛ mgban ela onyonyi, o byi ongwu ababɔ gbɛɛ, <Abu gye mkpa mbi otsungwudɛ mgbi ani mɛ sinɛ?>
LUK 16:6 <<O nyan gbɛɛ, <Li ikpɔkpɔ engyie olivi ideli egyata.> <<Ongyukwo idɔ na nyan gbɛɛ, <Kye afɛ mkpa mgbi abu na sisɛ vla, lɔ ideli enɛ.>
LUK 16:7 <<O diyɛ byi ongwu fan gbɛɛ, <Abu ma, o gye mkpa sinɛ?> <<O gbɛɛ, <Li oba alakama (ndzɛ dafi itsikapa nani) idubu onyi.> <<Ongyukwo idɔ na nyan gbɛɛ, <Kye afɛ mkpa mgbi abu, lɔ ideli egyata.>
LUK 16:8 <<Otsungwudɛ na tsɛ ongyukwiidɔ ndzɛ yi otsitsi ewo ba na ikyekyɛ o kyungwɔ mi inɛ okwuukwu. Bana inggisɛ emi ɛsɛ ongwi onɛnɛ nghao ye ogbɛwɛbyi ungwɔ mgbi ama ngha inggisɛ emi osa.>>
LUK 16:9 IYesu kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<N le nya ema, kye aludu ngwi abu dzɛyan kwu uka yi inggisɛ mi ɛsɛ nɛni, ikyegbɛɛ ni i wa dzɛma wuba kpaa, a ka gbɛ ema mi udɛ ogyegwu.
LUK 16:10 <<Inggisɛ ongwu ndzɛ yi oyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ ogyɛngyɛ ma, o ka dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ okwukwo kpaa, inggisɛ n yagba kye inɛ byi ungwɔ ogyɛngyɛ saan ba, ungwɔ okwukwo kpaa o ka yagba kye inɛ byin saan ba.
LUK 16:11 Nɛ kini ema di dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ mi aludu ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, li emɛ ka kye awuya otsitsi ongwi nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho wo ema abɔ?
LUK 16:12 Ma ni ema di dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ mgbi inggisɛ oka ba ma, li emɛ ka kye ungwɔ mgban kye nu ema gbɛɛ no yɛɛ mgbi ema?
LUK 16:13 <<Ongbidɔ onyi ka yagba kyɔ engyukwo efa idɔ ba. Lubana o ka di onyi tanyi diyɛ di oka kpan itukwu, hona o ka gha yi onyi yɛ lu ka bɛkɛ yi oka. Ema ka yagba kyɔ Imgbasho idɔ bɛyi udza ononyi gbɛ ba.>>
LUK 16:14 Mi onɔ ngwi emi iFarasi, ama ngwu udza kpa ma kpakpa fwo odzɛ nɛ duu mata, a wita onyan odzɛ agya.
LUK 16:15 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema li ama nfwo ewema ikwɔ gbɛɛ di ema le saan mi inɛ inggisɛ, nghaduu Imgbasho ye itukwu mgbi ema. Bana ungwɔ ndzɛ yi mmwɛ mbi inggisɛ ma li ungwɔ idza mi inɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 16:16 <<Ola mgbi iMose bɛyi ungwɔ ama ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ lɔ ma a gbɔn nghataa ba onɔ mgbi iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima. Wita mi onɔ na, a le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho, ali inggisɛ duu le kaka ele mi mfyumfye.
LUK 16:17 Sunɔ ba onu esho yi esɛ byulu ngha onu ambɛ onyi byulu mi ola.
LUK 16:18 <<Ali inggisɛ ngwu gha yi owan yɛ lu ka kye ongyaa oka yɔ, li amah ngwi o le kyɔ, inggisɛ nkye ongyaa ngwu gheeba yi oban le kyɔ amah.
LUK 16:19 <<Inggisɛ udza oka nose dzɛ nli wo angwuto omuma shinishini di tishi ndlɛndlɛ, o di dzɛ mi oshishe omyɛɛ-myɛɛ alegbe-alegbe.
LUK 16:20 Mi onufoka mgban a li kye inggisɛ obibɔ ba wa lakɛ, o saasu ewo a li kwun di iLadzaru,
LUK 16:21 o li mina ogye ambulu ungwogye ama nli ngwuta mi adinyatsɛ ogye ungwogye mgbi inggisɛ udza nani. Obwe li ba wa kpanan ifwa.
LUK 16:22 <<Ta inggisɛ obibɔ na wa kwulu, engyesɔ emi esho kyon lu mi iyayi Abrahan. Inggisɛ udza na kpaa wa kwulu, a kyon ndzi.
LUK 16:23 O lu udola (ihade) ka dzɛ mi isɔ kpakpa, o kyile inɛ esho si di Abrahan mbombo, iLadzaru sɔdzɛ yan.
LUK 16:24 O kwun ela kɛ gbɛɛ, <Abrahan Otsɛn, di ani elela dɔ iLadzaru esɔ no kye ongwufabɔ bakɛ eni wa yulu ani idɛ, bana n dzɛ mi isɔ okwulewo mi ola nɛni!>
LUK 16:25 <<Nghaduu Abrahan nyan gbɛɛ, <Ongwani, wɛ mi onɔ ngwi abu dzɛ oshishe, abu tu ungwɔ ama osuse-osuse, nghaduu iLadzaru tu ungwɔ ama obube, nghaduu onɛnɛ o sɔ kpan, kpaa abu yɔ dzɛ mi isɔ kpaakpaa.
LUK 16:26 Ongyɛɛngyɛ mgbi ungwɔnɛ duu, ikplishɛ ladzɛ mi idzidzɛ mgbi eyi, ongwi inggisɛ oka ka fa kɛ mbi oka gbɛ ba.>
LUK 16:27 <<Ta inggisɛ udza na nu uka gbɛɛ, <N tɛkyɛ nu abu, Abrahan otsɛn, dɔ iLadzaru esɔ kɛ udɛ otsani,
LUK 16:28 bana ani dzɛ yi engwunani mgbi ifu engyulɔ nghi eda toma. No kɛ ka kwo ma adɔ ikye onu ma ka ba imbe isɔ owulewo nɛ ba.>
LUK 16:29 <<Abrahan nu uka gbɛɛ, <Emi engwunabu dzɛ yi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi afɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ okwo ma adɔ, nu ma fwo ma.>
LUK 16:30 <<Inggisɛ udza na gbɛɛ, <Ei, otsani Abrahan, nana ta ka mɛ ba. Kpaa ni inggisɛ oka kyato mbi emi ikwukwɔ yɛ kɛ mboma ta a ka kyatitukwu mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ama.>
LUK 16:31 <<Abrahan gbɔ yan gbɛɛ, <Kini a fwo ola mgbi iMose bɛyi afɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ bayɔ, ni inggisɛ oka kyɛɛ mbi emi ikwukwɔ kpaa a ka nu itukwu mi ele ba.> >>
LUK 17:1 IYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ: <<Ungwɔ ama nli nu inggisɛ kyɔ obube ma li kyɛmɛ a ka ba, nghaduu ahoo mi ikye inggisɛ ngwu ungwɔ obube ntonɛ nyɛ mbon ba mani.
LUK 17:2 I tatase nu ma kye ikwɔɔ shaan onbukwɔ kyon ngwuta mi ekyoo okwukwo ngha non nu onyi mi idzidzɛ ɛngbɛ ntonɛ kyungwɔ obube.
LUK 17:3 Nghanɛ, gbɛwɛbyi ewema na. <<Ni ongwunabu kyungwɔ obube, fwa yan, ki non kyatitukwu yɔ, dzanta yi obube mgban.
LUK 17:4 Ki non kyɔ abu ungwɔ obube akpe egyafa mi egbe onyi, diyɛ ba mbi abu akpe egyafa gbɛɛ, <Ani kyatitukwu yɔ,> dzanta yi obube mgban.>>
LUK 17:5 Ama ogbikye iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Mbwo eyi oyɛyɛ onuunu!>>
LUK 17:6 Otsɛ iYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Ni oyɛyɛ mgbi ema le gyɛngyɛ dafi inɛnɛ nkwodzi yɔ, ema ka nya ita ulɔ nɛ gbɛɛ, <Kwɔlu ewabu yi akpa, kye ewabu ka kwokɛ mi ekyoo okwukwo,> ta o ka fwo ema.
LUK 17:7 <<Kyi kye gbɛɛ onyi mbi ema dzɛ yi ongbidɔ nle shin okwɔ naadi le kye inɛ byin ifyungwɔ. O ka nya ongbidɔ na mi onɔ ngwi o kyɛɛ okwɔ ma gbɛɛ, <Ba i kɛ ka sisɛ gye ungwogye onɛnɛɛ>?
LUK 17:8 Ungwɔ ka dzɛ ngha ba, o ka gbɛɛ, <Kyɔ ungwogye ngwi ani ka gye mi otu nɛni, kye angwuto wo ewo, fɛ ni ani gye di wa ta, abu ka wa gye mgbi abu olɛlɛ baa>?
LUK 17:9 Ongyukwo na ka ta ongbidɔ na angba mi ikyegbɛɛ di o kyungwɔ ngwi o nyan gbɛɛ non kyɔ maa?
LUK 17:10 Mbi ema kpaa, li ngha ndzɛ aali, mi onɔ ngwi ema kyungwɔ ngwi a wo ema duu ma, gbɔ na gbɛɛ, <Eyi li ɛngbɛ ama okyidɔ, eyi mɛ ogbɛ umba ba, eyi kyidɔ ongwi i wo imbisɔ ngwi eyi ka kyɔ mata.> >>
LUK 17:11 Ngwi iYesu tɔ ofɛ le kɛ iJerosalin nɛ, o nyɛ otsee mgbi iSamaria bɛyi iGalalia.
LUK 17:12 Dafi o le kɛ oka kaka agwɔ oka nɛ, emi otsoma nghi iwyo si tun. A kwulɛsɛ mbombo
LUK 17:13 si kwun ela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<iYesu, Ongyukwo, di eyi elela!>>
LUK 17:14 Dafi iYesu di ma nɛta, o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Lu na, ka kye ewema tso ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho.>> Ngwi a tɔ ofɛ le kɛ nɛta, otsoma gbosa loma.
LUK 17:15 Onyi mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama di dafi otsoma gbosa lon nɛta, o yidɔ ba le tsɛ Imgbasho mi ela okwukwo.
LUK 17:16 O ba wa lakɛ esɛ mi iyayi iYesu yɛ tan angba. O li inggisɛ iSamaria.
LUK 17:17 IYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Li inggisɛ iwyo ngwu otsoma gbosa loma baa? Inggisɛ egyanɛ ntona kɔ?
LUK 17:18 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa yidɔ o wa tsɛ Imgbasho ba se li ingyoga nɛ taa?>>
LUK 17:19 Man o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyato lu, oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu nu abu watɔ.>>
LUK 17:20 Emi iFarasi angbeka byi iYesu ita onɔ ngwi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ka ba mani, o nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ka ba dafi ema gbe inɛ byi na ba,
LUK 17:21 naadi inggisɛ ka gbɛɛ, <O dzɛ na, hona o dzɛ aali ba,> bana esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ mi idzidzɛ ema.>>
LUK 17:22 Nghanɛ o nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ kyɛma ngwi ema ka mina odi egbe onyi mi egbe mgbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ, kpaa ema ka di ba.
LUK 17:23 Inggisɛ angbeka ka nya ema gbɛɛ, <O dzɛ aali!> Naadi <O dzɛ na!> Nghaduu ka yama kyɛdɔ ma ba.
LUK 17:24 Dafi mmbwo li naabɔ ni esho agya onyi gbosa nghataa ka tɔ agya oka nɛ, li ngha ngwi egbe mgbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ kpaa ka dzɛ aali.
LUK 17:25 Kpaa ababɔ adzɛ ka kyɔn mi ungwɔ kwuba kyɛmɛ, etɔ emi onɛnɛ dika fwan.
LUK 17:26 <<Dafi i dzɛ mi egbe mgbi iNua nani, li ngha nka wa dzɛ mi egbe ngwi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka yɛ ma aali.
LUK 17:27 Ali inggisɛ duu le gye yɛ wa, engyulɔ le kye engyaa, a kye engyaa le nu eba nghataa ba mi egbe ngwi iNua kaka uwaa okwukwo nani. Ta eni ayɔ ba wa dzili ma duu.
LUK 17:28 <<Di li ungwonyi dafi mi onɔ mgbi iLoti mani. Ali inggisɛ tole gye yɛ wa, a tole kyummya, le kya etɔ dile mbɛ ozu.
LUK 17:29 Kpaa mi egbe ngwi iLoti tasɛ mi ogalu iSodon ma, ola bɛyi enotse nli nu ola gbɛ mfyumfye kya mi esho ba esɛ wa dzili ma duu.
LUK 17:30 <<Li ngha nka dzɛ mi egbe ngwi a ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ tso ma aali.
LUK 17:31 Mi egbe na, inggisɛ ndɔdzɛ ikyendu mgban no ka tashulu ba ikye owa gbelu okye mgban mi ozu ba. Ka li ungwonyi yi inggisɛ ndzɛ okwɔ, no ka yɛ ba udɛ owa kye unkonyi ba.
LUK 17:32 Wɛ ungwɔ nkyɔ owa iLoti nani.
LUK 17:33 Ali inggisɛ nmina odzɛ oshishe yɔ, oshishe mgban ka byulu, ongwu ndzata oshishe mgban gbɛɛ no byulu yɔ, ka yɛ tun.
LUK 17:34 N nya ema mi otu nani, inggisɛ efa ka lato akwulo onyi; a ka kyi kyelu onyi dzata oka.
LUK 17:35 Engyaa efa ka tole kpinangwɔ yi ewoma mi ikwɔɔ; a ka kyelu onyi dzata oka.>>
LUK 17:36 (Inggisɛ efa ka to okwɔ; a ka kyi kyelu onyi dzata oka.)
LUK 17:37 Engwafɔ mgbi iYesu si byun gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ole, Otsɛ?>> O nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Li imbe ngwi ungwɔ ikwukwɔ la ma ngwi mpo li kwakye aali.>>
LUK 18:1 Nɛ iYesu nya engwafɔɔn utsa otso ma gbɛɛ nu ma le bibɔ alonɔ, nu ma ka ndɛ ba.
LUK 18:2 O gbɛɛ: <<Mi ogalu oka ma inggisɛ ogbiikwɔ oka dzɛ nli mio Imgbasho hona kye inggisɛ wuuta ba.
LUK 18:3 Nɛ owakwadɛ oka dzɛ mi ogalu na nli ba mbon le tɛkyɛ mi ikye emyɛmyɛ mgban gbɛɛ, <Ya ani abɔ mi ikye inggisɛ ngwu kwokyi odzɛ yi ani nɛni.>
LUK 18:4 <<Onɔ she ngwi ongye ogbiikwɔ na fwa okyungwɔ mi ele. Nghaduu mi ongyɛɛngyɛ nɛ, o gbɔ yi ewon gbɛɛ, <Dafi ngwi ani li mio Imgbasho hona kye inggisɛ wuuta ba nɛ kpaa,
LUK 18:5 mi ikye okakewo ngwi owakwadɛ nɛ kale nu ani nɛ, n ka di mi ele azukwu no tu emyɛmyɛ mgban. Ni ani kyɔ ba, o ka nin ndɛngyɛ yi okakewo mgban oba alonɔ nɛni!> >>
LUK 18:6 Man Otsɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Gadɔ mi odzɛ ngwi ongye ogbiikwɔ ebɛbɛ na gbɔ mani.
LUK 18:7 Nghanɛ Imgbasho ka yagba gbiikwɔ emyɛmyɛ wo emidan, ama nle makwɔ yan otu yi onɔ le mina abɔ oyaaya nɛ baa? O ka kiyayi ofwɔ ma ngwutaa?
LUK 18:8 N nya ema, o ka di gbɛɛ a tu emyɛmyɛ plɛ jo. Nghaduu, onɔ ngwi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka yɛ ma, o ka tu oyɛyɛ onuunu mi ɛsɛ nɛ joo?>>
LUK 18:9 IYesu diyɛ gbɔ utsa nɛ nya ama ndzɛ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ gbɛɛ ama le saan yuoma, di kye angbeka wuuta ba ma gbɛɛ
LUK 18:10 <<Inggisɛ efa kɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin oka bibɔ. Onyi li inggisɛ iFarasi, oka li inggisɛ ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ.
LUK 18:11 Inggisɛ iFarasi na kwuzunto le bibɔ mi ikye ewon gbɛɛ: <Imgbasho, ani ta abu angba ikyegbɛɛ ani dzɛ dafi inggisɛ angbeka ba; dafi ama ofofɛ yi emi ali ibwubwe yi emi amah hona dafi inggisɛ ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ nɛ ba.
LUK 18:12 Ani li tukwondu akpe efa mi ikyidu onyi, ani di li nu Imgbasho onyi mi ikye iwyo mi alungwɔ ngwi ani tu duu.>
LUK 18:13 <<Kpaa inggisɛ ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ na dzɛkɛ fyata, o yagba kyile inɛ esho kpaa ba, o kye abɔ mgban bɛkɛ igɛgɛ si gbɛɛ, <Imgbasho, di ani elela, ani li inggisɛ alobube.>
LUK 18:14 <<N nya ema gbɛɛ inggisɛ nɛ lu udɛ mgban yi emyɛmyɛ mi inɛ Imgbasho ngha inggisɛ oka nani. Bana ali inggisɛ ta nkyile ewon esho a ka yilen esɛ, ongwu ndi yile ewon esɛ a ka kyilen esho.>>
LUK 18:15 Inggisɛ gbe ɛngbɛ ama oshilɛlɛ ba mbi iYesu ikye no wa kye abɔ gbo ma. Ngwi engwafɔɔn di ngha nɛta, a kwɔ ma oba mbon.
LUK 18:16 Kpaa iYesu kwu ɛngbɛ ntona ela ba mbon si gbɛɛ, <<Dzata ɛngbɛ ntonɛ nu ma ba mbi ani, ka kwɔ ma ba, lubana esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ ikye itɔ ntonɛni.
LUK 18:17 N le nya ema otsitsi, ali inggisɛ ngbɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dafi ongwongbɛ ba ka kaka ele ba.>>
LUK 18:18 Ongyukwo oka ogbe inggisɛ teyi byi iYesu ita gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse osuse, li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ se n ka tu oshishe igyegwu?>>
LUK 18:19 IYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<I kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu le kwu ani di osuse? Inggisɛ onyi kpaa le saan ba se li Imgbasho yuon.
LUK 18:20 Abu ye ola ntonɛni: <Ka ndaamah ba, ka ngwɔ inggisɛ ba, ka yimi ba, ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ atsika ba, sunu otsabu yi onabu.> >>
LUK 18:21 O gbɛɛ, <<Ani ngyo ola ntonɛ duu kyɛ onɔ ngwi ani li ongbɛ ma jo.>>
LUK 18:22 Ngwi iYesu fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ onyi kwoba mbi abu kpɔɔ. Gbelu alungwɔ ngwi abu dzɛyan duu gbe gya kye udza nu emi adzɛ, taman abu ka dzɛ yi aludu mi esho. Ta yɛ wa kyɛdɔ ani.>>
LUK 18:23 Mi onɔ ngwi inggisɛ na fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, o buntse. Lubana o li inggisɛ ndzɛ yi aludu kpakpa.
LUK 18:24 IYesu di dafi o shɛ ewo ta ba nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Ka fyumfye kpakpa ni inggisɛ udza kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho!
LUK 18:25 Mi otsitsi yɔ, ka sunɔ ba ni ilakwumyi nyɛ ifo edi ngha onu inggisɛ udza kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 18:26 Ama nfwo odzɛ nɛ byita gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ tsatso ka watɔ?>>
LUK 18:27 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ nli kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mbi inggisɛ ba li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 18:28 IPyita nyan gbɛɛ, <<Dii! Eyi dzata alungwɔ ngwi eyi dzɛyan duu kyɛdɔ abu.>>
LUK 18:29 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, ali inggisɛ ngwu dzata udɛ naadi owan hona emi ongwunɔn naadi ama omban hona emi ongwan mi ikye esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho yɔ,
LUK 18:30 a ka yilen nu ma kwuba mi onɔ ngwi eyi wele nɛni. A dika tu oshishe igyegwu mi onɔ ongwi iyayi kpaa.>>
LUK 18:31 IYesu gbe ama ogbikyon iwyodefa ntona lu enggengga ka nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi le lu iJerosalin, ta alungwɔ ngwi oyegbɔ lɔ mi ikye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ma duu ka mbwumbwo.
LUK 18:32 A ka kyon wo Udzengye abɔ. A ka nyan odzɛ agya, fyan ito, kyanggwɔ kyin, gbon onitse diyɛ ngwɔn.
LUK 18:33 Mi egbe ongwu ta ma o ka kyato mi ikwu.>>
LUK 18:34 Nghaduu engwafɔ mgban yagba difwi ungwɔ ntonɛ onyi ba. Itan daada loma, a di yagba ye ungwɔ ngwi iYesu le gbɔdzan ma ba.
LUK 18:35 Dafi iYesu le to kwɛkwɛ mi iJeriko nɛ, inggisɛ obinɛ oka sɔdzɛ mi ondoofɛ, le bibɔ.
LUK 18:36 Mi onɔ ngwi o fwo ibyi inggisɛ le nyɛ nɛ, o byita ungwɔ nle kiyayi mani.
LUK 18:37 A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Li iYesu ongwi iNadzareti le nyɛ.>>
LUK 18:38 O kwu ela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<IYesu, Ongwɛ iDevedi, di ani elela!>>
LUK 18:39 Ama nto iyayi mbon fan ela nyan gbɛɛ no tukwondu, kpaa o di kwu ela okwukwo nghaangha, <<Ongwɛ iDevedi, di ani elela!>>
LUK 18:40 Nɛ iYesu kwulɛsɛ woola gbɛɛ nu ma kye inggisɛ obinɛ na ba mbon. Ngwi o ba kwɛkwɛ nɛta, iYesu byun gbɛɛ,
LUK 18:41 <<Li alungwɔ ngwi abu mina gbɛɛ ni ani kyɔ abu ele?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ani mina odinɛ.>>
LUK 18:42 IYesu si gbɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Inɛ no kwulu lo abu; oyɛyɛ mgbi abu nu abu yɛɛ saan.>>
LUK 18:43 Labɔlabɔ mata, o si dinɛ, kyɛdɔ iYesu, dile tsɛ Imgbasho. Ngwi inggisɛ duu di ungwɔnɛ nɛ, ama kpaa tsɛ Imgbasho.
LUK 19:1 IYesu kaka iJeriko nyɛ-nyɛ le lu.
LUK 19:2 Ongyulɔ dzɛ imbe na ngwu a li kwun di iDzakyu; o li ongyukwo mgbi ama ogbɛ udza ifyɛɛ di dzɛ yi aludu.
LUK 19:3 O mina odi itɔ inggisɛ ngwu iYesu dzɛ mani, nghaduu ngwi o shigbo ba nɛ, o yagba odin ba ikye ibyi inggisɛ.
LUK 19:4 Nɛ o tsinya lu iyayi ka tɔkɛ ekwɔ andundu ni ongwu din, ikyesinɛ iYesu kyɛ le nyɛ ofɛ nani.
LUK 19:5 Ngwi iYesu to imbe na yɛyɛ nɛta, o ndinɛ kɛ esho si nyan gbɛɛ, <<IDzakyu, tashulu vla-vla. Li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ n ka kaka udɛ abu inɛ.>>
LUK 19:6 Nɛ o tashulu vla si gban yi atsa.
LUK 19:7 Inggisɛ tsatsa di ungwɔnɛni man, a wita ondandu gbɛɛ, <<O le kɛ ingyoga mi udɛ inggisɛ ali ibwubwe.>>
