LUK 19:8 Nghaduu iDzakyu dzɛkunto gbɔ yi Otsɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Dii, Otsɛ! Mmɛnɛ jo n ka kye ayɛ ungwɔ mgbi ani ngwi ani tulun kyi nu ema adzɛ, ki ani kyɔ inggisɛ ogye, ni li ekyɛkyɛ kpaa, n ka kpa otsungwɔn mkpa akpe enɛ.>>
LUK 19:9 IYesu gbɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Inɛ nɛ abu yi emidabu duu tu owatɔ-watɔ, ikyesinɛ inggisɛ nɛ kpaa, li ongwɛ Abrahan.
LUK 19:10 Bana Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ba ikye owa pita yɛ dulu ungwɔ nbyulu ma watɔ.>>
LUK 19:11 Dafi a le gadɔ mi ungwɔnɛ nɛ, iYesu kiyayi onya ma utsa, ikyesinɛ o dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi iJerosalin, man inggisɛ tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ka byakpa ba akponyi.
LUK 19:12 IYesu gbɔgbɛɛ: <<Ongwɛ utɔ oka wewo okɛ anengye adzi nu ma ka kye abɔ utɔ dɔn ikye di yidɔ.
LUK 19:13 Nɛ o kwu engbidɔ mgban nghi iwyo ela si nu ali inggisɛ mgbi ama awuya ngwi mɛ dafi awuya okpa idɔ ofyia eta sini. O gbɛɛ, <Kyelu awuya nɛ fashi abɔ di tu ungwɔ ele na, duuse nin wa yidɔ.>
LUK 19:14 <<Nghaduu emi ɛsɛ udan dun tanyi man a dɔ inggisɛ angbeka esɔ mbon oka gbɔgbɛɛ, <Eyi mina gbɛɛ inggisɛ nɛ no ka li utɔ mgbi eyi ba.>
LUK 19:15 <<A gyon utɔ man o yɛ luba udɛ. Ta o dɛsɔ mbi engbidɔ ngwu ongwu nu ma awuya ma, ikye oye eni owaawa ngwi a tu mi ele mani.
LUK 19:16 <<Inggisɛ ongwu ababɔ ba wa gbɔgbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo, awuya ngwi abu kye nu ani ma yɛ mbwumbwo nghi iwyo.>
LUK 19:17 <<Ongyukwo nu uka gbɛɛ, <N nu abu abɔ ongbidɔ mgbi ani osuse. Ikyegbɛɛ abu dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ ogwee nɛ, kye inɛ byi igeli okwukwo nghi iwyo.>
LUK 19:18 <<Ongwu fan ba wa gbɔgbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo, awuya mgbi abu yɛ mbwumbwo nghi eda.>
LUK 19:19 <<Ongyukwo mgban si nu uka gbɛɛ, <Kye inɛ byi igeli okwukwo nghi eda.>
LUK 19:20 <<Nɛ ongbidɔ oka di ba wa gbɔgbɛɛ, <Ongyukwo, awuya mgbi abu dzɛ na; ani kye da mi ayangwuto.
LUK 19:21 Ani tsimio abu, ikyesinɛ abu li inggisɛ ngwu fyumfye ali kpakpa. Abu li dulu mi imbe ngwi abu kye da ba, di li shɛ mi imbe ngwi abu kya ba.>
LUK 19:22 <<Ongyukwo mgban nun uka gbɛɛ, <N ka gbɔ abu ikwɔ mi elodzɛ mgbi abu, abu ongbidɔ imbali nɛni, abu ye gbɛɛ ani li inggisɛ ofyumfye ali, n li dulu mi imbe ngwi ani kye da ba, di li shɛ mi imbe ngwi ani kya ba.
LUK 19:23 Kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu kye awuya mgbi ani ka wokɛ mi ozu awuya ba? Mi oyɛɛyɛ mgbi ani, n kika tu eni owaawa mi efu.>
LUK 19:24 <<Ta o nya ama nkwudzɛ to yan ma gbɛɛ, <Gbɛlu awuya na mi abɔ mgban kye nu inggisɛ ndzɛyan nghi iwyo nani.>
LUK 19:25 <<A gbɔgbɛɛ, ongyukwo, <Ongwu na tsekise dzɛ yi iwyo wa.>
LUK 19:26 <<O nu uka gbɛɛ, <N nya ema gbɛɛ mbi ali inggisɛ ntulun ma a dika mbwon ele kpɔɔ, kpaa ama ndzɛ yi unkonyi ba ma, ongwi o dzɛyan ma kpaa a ka kyi gbɛlu.
LUK 19:27 Kpaa emi ikyili mgbi ani ngwu mina gbɛɛ nin ka dzɛ utɔ mi ikye ma ba nɛ, gbe ma ba wa ngwɔ ma mi iyayi ani mmɛnɛni.> >>
LUK 19:28 Ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ nɛ, o kye ofɛ dikye olu iJerosalin.
LUK 19:29 Dafi o wa to kwɛkwɛ mi ongwɛ igeli ngwi a li kwun di iBɛtifege yi iBetani mi undɔ ngwi a li kwun di unggwɔ mgbi Olivi nɛ, o dɔ engwafɔɔn efa esɔ nya ma gbɛɛ,
LUK 19:30 <<Lu mi ogalu ndzɛ ema iyayi nani, ni ema kaka ele yɔ, ema ka di ongwɛ itaklimyi shadi mmanani, ngwi inggisɛ onyi kpaa tɔɔn ye waba. Kyi shɛlu ba mmɛnɛni.
LUK 19:31 Kini inggisɛ byi ema gbɛɛ, <Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le shan yɔ?> Nyan gbɛɛ, <Odzɛ wo Otsɛ yan.> >>
LUK 19:32 Ama ngwu iYesu dɔ ma esɔ ma si kɛ ka di itaklimyi dafi o tsekise nya ma mani.
LUK 19:33 Ngwi a le shan nɛta, emi otsungwɔn byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le shɛ itaklimyi nɛ?>>
LUK 19:34 A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Odzɛ wo Otsɛ yan.>>
LUK 19:35 A kyen ba wa nu iYesu, man kye angwuto mgbi ama kye tukwu ongwɛ itaklimyi na ekpo di ya iYesu abɔ dɔkɛ ele.
LUK 19:36 Dafi o tɔɔn le kɛ nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ gbe angwuto le tasɛ mi ofɛ.
LUK 19:37 Ngwi o ba kwɛkwɛ mi imbe ngwi ofɛ nyɛ lu unggwɔ Olivi nɛ, engwafɔ duu wita le tsatsa dile tsɛ Imgbasho mi ela okwukwo mi alungwɔ okwulewo ngwi ama di nani.
LUK 19:38 Le gbɛɛ, <<Mse no dzɛ yi utɔ ongwu nba mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho nɛni! Iyu mi esho bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mi imbe Onghaangha duu!>>
LUK 19:39 Emi iFarasi angbeka mi idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ ntona gbɔ yi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, fwa yi engwafɔ ntonɛni.>>
LUK 19:40 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema, kini a dede kpaa, akwutsɛ ka gbaakwɔ.>>
LUK 19:41 Ngwi iYesu ba kwɛkwɛ wa di iJerosalin nɛ, o tsukwu mi ikye inggisɛ emi igeli nani.
LUK 19:42 O gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ni abu, ki ye ungwɔ ama nka ba yi abu iyu inɛ kpaa ta. Nghaduu onɛnɛ i daada mi inɛ mgbi ema.
LUK 19:43 Egbe ka wa kwulu abu abɔ ngwi emi ikyili mgbi abu ka loka kye abu wo idzidzɛ di fyi abu mi ali agya duu.
LUK 19:44 A ka fyi abu bɛkɛ esɛ, abu yi inggisɛ ama nto yi abu duu. A ka dzata ikwutsɛ onyi kpaa dɔ ikye oka ba, ikyesinɛ abu fwa o difwi onɔ ngwi Imgbasho ba owa dulu abu watɔ.>>
LUK 19:45 Ta iYesu kaka ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin man wita olɔlu ama nle kyummya tasɛ.
LUK 19:46 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ, <Ozu mgbi ani ka li ozu obibɔ; kpaa ema kye yɛɛ imbe odaada mgbi emumyi.> >>
LUK 19:47 Alegbe o le tso mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani. Kpaa engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho, etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi emi angbodzi inggisɛ le fya gbɛɛ ama ki ngwɔn.
LUK 19:48 Nghaduu a tu ofɛ onyi ongwɔn ba, ikyesinɛ ali inggisɛ kye itukwu shakɛ mi elodzɛ mgban.
LUK 20:1 Egbe oka mi idzidzɛ egbe ntonɛ nɛ, iYesu le tso ibyi inggisɛ mi ifoozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin dile gbɔ Esɔ Osuse, ta engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama otso ola mgbi iMose bɛkɛ yi ama okye ɛsɛ teyi, ba mbon.
LUK 20:2 A gbɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Nya eyi, li mi ali mfye ngwi abu le kyungwɔ ntonɛ, li emɛ nu abu mfye nɛ?>>
LUK 20:3 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani kpaa ka byi ema ita. Nya ani na,
LUK 20:4 iBatisima mgbi iJɔn nɛ, kyɛ mbi Imgbasho mi esho naadi kyɛ mbi inggisɛ?>>
LUK 20:5 A si tsɛwɛ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Kini eyi gbɛɛ, <Kyɛ mbi Imgbasho mi esho yɔ,> o ka byita gbɛɛ, <Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema nun oyɛyɛ ba?>
LUK 20:6 Kpaa ni eyi gbɔgbɛɛ, <Kyɛ mbi inggisɛ yɔ,> ali inggisɛ duu ka tsɛ eyi akwutsɛ, ikyesinɛ a kye gbɛɛ iJɔn li oyegbɔ.>>
LUK 20:7 Nɛ, a nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ye imbe ngwi i tɔkyɛ ba.>>
LUK 20:8 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛse ani kpaa ka nya ema itɔ mfye ngwi ani kye le kyungwɔ ntonɛ ba.>>
LUK 20:9 IYesu si kiyayi o nya inggisɛ utsa nɛni gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ oka nose ye ekwɔ ama onaana mi okwɔ mgban man kye nu emi okwɔ angbeka mi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ, si lu agaba onɔ kɛ.
LUK 20:10 Ngwi onɔ oshɛ etɔ wa gyɔ nɛ, o si dɔ ongbidɔ mgban esɔ mbi ama ngwu o kye okwɔ dɔ ma ubɔ ntonani, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma nun awawekwɔ nli mgbi ongwu mi okwɔ nani. Nghaduu ama ngwu o kye okwɔ dɔ ma ubɔ ntona gbon ibe lɔn onya lu abubɔ.
LUK 20:11 O di dɔ ongbidɔ oka esɔ, ongwu na kpaa a di gbon nun ayiwi saan, lɔn onya lu abubɔ.
LUK 20:12 O di dɔ inggisɛ ongwu ta esɔ kpɔɔ, a gbon ibe tan mmya di lɔn onya tasɛ lu.
LUK 20:13 <<Ta otsungwɔ okwɔ na gbɔgbɛɛ, <N ka kyɔsinɛ dɛn? Ani ka dɔ ongwani esɔ, ongwu nkpɛn itukwu nɛni; i kyayina a ka nun mmwɛ.>
LUK 20:14 <<Nghaduu ngwi ama o kye okwɔ dɔ ma ubɔ ntona dun nɛ, a kye ondu wɛɛsɛ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <Nɛnɛ li ongwɛ ogye okwudan aani. Detse ni i gbongwɔn, ni okwudɛ nɛ yɛɛ mgbi eyi.>
LUK 20:15 A si kwon tasɛ mi okwɔ man gbongwɔn. <<Nghama li alungwɔ ngwi otsungwɔ okwɔ na ka kyɔ yi ama?
LUK 20:16 O ka ba wa kye ama ngwu o kye okwɔ dɔ ma ubɔ ntona tsatsaduu kye ngwɔlu di yile okwɔ na nu inggisɛ angbeka.>> Mi onɔ ngwi inggisɛ ntona fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, a gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔnɛ no ka dzɛ ngha ba!>>
LUK 20:17 IYesu kye inɛ byi ma yɛyɛ si byita gbɛɛ, <<Nghanɛ li alungwɔ ngwi olɔɔlɔ nɛ tso dɛn: << <Ikwutsɛ ngwi ama ombɛ ozu fwan mani li ongwu yɛ kwulu ikye ozu.>
LUK 20:18 Ali inggisɛ ngbɛsɛ gyɛkɛ ikwutsɛ na ka gbobu ambulu-ambulu, kpaa inggisɛ ngwu i ka gyan ma o ka jiyɛ.>>
LUK 20:19 Etsetse mgbi ola bɛyi engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho le pita ofɛ ngwi ama ka bwan tsoli, ikyesinɛ a ye ta gbɛɛ o gbɔ utsa nɛ li mi ikye mgbi ama. Nghaduu a le tsimio ibyi inggisɛ.
LUK 20:20 Nɛ a gbinɛbyin saan. A dɔ ama owodi esɔ, ama nkyɔ ɛwɛ gbɛɛ ama li emi otsitsi mani. A weka obwa iYesu mi ungwɔ ngwi o gbɔ adzi nu ma kyon nu mi abɔ mfye mgbi iGɔna.
LUK 20:21 Ama owodi ntona si byi iYesu gbɛɛ: <<Otsetse, eyi ye abu li gbɔdzɛ di tsungwɔ nle yɛyɛ, abu di li kye idzidza dzɛ ba, kpaa li tso ofɛ mgbi Imgbasho yɛyɛ yi otsitsi.
LUK 20:22 Li ayin ni eyi kpa udza ifyɛɛ nu iSidza naadi li ayin ba?>>
LUK 20:23 O difwi ɛwɛ mgbi ama nɛta o gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ,
LUK 20:24 <<Kye udza ma tsen n di, li onodzi bɛyi olɔɔlɔ mgbi emɛ dɔ efu dɛn?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Li mgbi iSidza.>>
LUK 20:25 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kye ungwɔ mgbi iSidza nu iSidza, mgbi Imgbasho nu Imgbasho.>>
LUK 20:26 A yagba bwan yi elodzɛ ondu mi elodzɛ ngwi o gbɔ mmana mi ododa na ba. Man i kwulu ma ewo mi uka nani, a si yɛɛ shilididi.
LUK 20:27 Emi iSadusi angbeka, ama ngbɛɛ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu dzɛma ba ma, ba mbi iYesu yi ita.
LUK 20:28 A gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, iMose lɔ afɛ nu eyi gbɛɛ kini ongwunɔ inggisɛ kwulu dzata ongyaa, kpaa o dzɛ yi ɛngbɛ bayɔ, ongyulɔ na ka yile owakwadɛ na kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ, ikye otu ɛngbɛ mi ikye ongwunɔn nani.
LUK 20:29 Nose emi ongwunɔ ifu nghi egyafa to. Ongwu ababɔ kye ongyaa ta kwulu tu ongwɛ ba.
LUK 20:30 Ongwu fan
LUK 20:31 bɛyi ongwu ta yilen owakwadɛ, li ungwonyi nghataa ongwu gyafa, kpaa a tu ongwɛ ba man a kwulu duu.
LUK 20:32 Ongyɛɛngyɛ duu ongyaa na kpaa wa kwulu.
LUK 20:33 Nghanɛma, mi egbe olɛlɛ ngwi emi ikwukwɔ ka kyato ma, o ka li owa emɛ, ngwi engyulɔ egyafa ntona duu kyon?>>
LUK 20:34 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ emi egbe nɛ li le kye engyaa, a dile kye engyaa nu engyulɔ.
LUK 20:35 Kpaa ama ngwu a kye ma wuuta gbɛɛ di a mɛ owo atɛ mi onɔ na bɛyi mi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu a ka yama kye ongyaa hona bongyulɔ ba,
LUK 20:36 bana a ka kwulu wuba, a to dafi engyesɔ. A li emi ongwɛ Imgbasho, ikyekyɛ a li ama ngwu a kyile ma mi ikwongye.
LUK 20:37 Nghaduu mi utsa mgbi oshɛ okwoola, iMose kpaa tso gbɛɛ emi ikwukwɔ kyato mi ikwu, bana o kwu Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɛɛ, Imgbasho mgbi Abrahan, yi Adziki bɛyi iJeko.
LUK 20:38 Ongwu li Imgbasho mgbi emi ikwukwɔ ba, kpaa mgbi emi oshishe, bana mbon alungwɔ duu dzɛ oshishe.>>
LUK 20:39 Etsetse mgbi ola angbeka si gbɔgbɛɛ, <<O nu uka saan, Otsetse!>>
LUK 20:40 Man a byun ita onyi wuba.
LUK 20:41 Ta iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛse ngwi a gbɛɛ iKrestu li ongwɛ iDevedi?
LUK 20:42 IDevedi abɔn gbɔ mi afɛ mgbi iPaslami gbɛɛ: << <Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɔ yi Otsɛ mgbi ani gbɛɛ: <<Sɔkɛ abugye mgbi ani
LUK 20:43 nghataa nin nu engyikyili mgbi abu yɛɛ itse mgbi abu ogbe afɔ dɔ efu.>> >
LUK 20:44 IDevedi kwun gbɛɛ Otsɛ. Nghanɛ o dika li ongwan sinɛ?>>
LUK 20:45 Ngwi inggisɛ duu le fwon nɛ, iYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ,
LUK 20:46 <<Gbɛwɛbyi etsetse mgbi ola, ama nli kpa ma okyikyɛ kpatsɛ yi angwuto owulu-wulu di li kpa ma onu ma le ta ma angba mi ifyidu kyɛ, a di li kye itse imɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda bɛyi imbe ama oshewo mi oga.
LUK 20:47 A di li kyɔ emi owakwadɛ ogye mi ungwɔ ngwi a ki kye kyɔ oyabɔ mi udɛ mgbi ama di li kyile ewoma esho mi ibɔ obɔ tunto. Itɔ inggisɛ ntona a ka nghao nu ma adzɛ timbi.>>
LUK 21:1 Dafi iYesu kyile inɛ esho nɛ, o di emi awuya kye umba mgbi ama le wokɛ mi okye ogbɛ umba mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin.
LUK 21:2 O diyɛ di owakwadɛ ngwu dzɛ adzɛ kye anini nghi efa wa wokɛ okye ogbɛ umba.
LUK 21:3 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, owakwadɛ ndzɛ adzɛ nɛ nu ngha angbeka ntona duu.
LUK 21:4 Lubana emi awuya ntonɛ duu fwɛ-fwɛ mi aludu mgbi ama kye nu; kpaa ongwu mi abubɔ mgban kye ungwɔ ngwi o ka dzɛ oshishe mi ele duu kye nu.>>
LUK 21:5 Engwafɔɔn angbeka le gbɔdzɛ mi mse bɛyi idabɔ ngwi a kyɔ mi akwutsɛ ongwi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin bɛyi umba ngwi a kye nu Imgbasho. Nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ,
LUK 21:6 <<Ungwɔ ngwi ema di mmɛnɛ nɛ, onɔ kyɛma ngwi a ka dzata ikwutsɛ onyi dɔ ikye oka ba; ama duu a ka kye bulu tukwu esɛ.>>
LUK 21:7 Nɛ a byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li engga ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ ka kyɔ? Naadi li ali ambɛ ka tso gbɛɛ ungwɔ ntonɛ dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okyɔɔkyɔ?>>
LUK 21:8 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ: <<Gbɛwɛbyi adzi nu ma ka kpagyama wo ba. Ikyesinɛ inggisɛ kwuba ka ba mi iyi mgbi ani, le kye ewoma gbɛɛ, <Li ani ongwu ma aani,> dika gbɛɛ, <Onɔ ma gyɔ wa.> Nghaduu ka kyɛdɔ ma ba.
LUK 21:9 Onɔ ngwi ema fwo odzɛ ika bɛyi ablodzɛ, ka mio ba. Ungwɔ ntonɛ ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ duuse, kpaa ongyɛɛngyɛ mgbi ɛsɛ ka ba labɔlabɔ ma ba.>>
LUK 21:10 Ta iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ɛsɛ oka ka kyɛɛ ika yi ɛsɛ oka, esutɔ oka dika kyɛɛ ika yi esutɔ oka.
LUK 21:11 Ikpɛsɛ osuusu ka dzɛ kpakpa, onikyɔ enbwa omba enbwa bɛyi ootse ibwubwe ka gbɔfwɛ mi imbe idzidza-dzidza, yi ungwɔ ama okwulewo bɛyi ambɛ ama okwukwo mi esho.
LUK 21:12 <<Kpaa duuse ni ungwɔ ntonɛ kyɔ, a ka gbe abɔ dɔ ema ewo dika nu ema okɔtɔndzi adzɛ. A ka kye ema nu mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda bɛyi obawi, dika kye ema ba mi inɛ mgbi emi utɔ bɛyi emi iGɔna, tsatsadu mi ikye iyi mgbi ani.
LUK 21:13 Ungwɔnɛ ka nu ema ofɛ okyɔ obwɛndɛ mgbi ani.
LUK 21:14 Nghaduu bwa itukwu mgbi ema, no ka kaka ema ewo dafi ema ka na ewema duuse ni egbe wa gyɔ ba.
LUK 21:15 Lubana ani ka nu ema elodzɛ bɛyi ozoyeye ngwi engyikyili mgbi ema ka yagba onatsondu yi ema ba.
LUK 21:16 Ama omba ema, engwunema, emi odo ema bɛyi emi oka ema, ka wa kye ema gya, a dika ngwɔ ema angbeka.
LUK 21:17 Inggisɛ duu ka di ema tanyi mi ikye iyi mgbi ani.
LUK 21:18 Nghaduu alotu mgbi ema onyi ka kwɔ ba.
LUK 21:19 Mi okwulɛsɛ mgbi ema kpɔklɔɔ ema ka tu oshishe.
LUK 21:20 <<Onɔ ngwi ema wa di emi oblakwutsɛ kpakɛkɛ wo iJerosalin ma, ye na gbɛɛ odzili-dzili mgban dzɛ kwɛkwɛ.
LUK 21:21 Nghanɛ ama nto iJudia nu ma tsinya lu unggwɔ, ama nto ogalu nu ma tasɛ, ama ndi nto esisɛ nu ma ka yɛ kaka ogalu ba.
LUK 21:22 Lubana nɛnɛ li onɔ ngwi Imgbasho ka nu emi ogalu nɛ adzɛ kpakpa ikye ombwumbwo ungwɔ ngwi a tsekise lɔ mani.
LUK 21:23 Ka kwulewo kpakpa mbi engyaa ama nto yi ifewo mi egbe ntona bɛyi enengwɛ ama nto yi engwɛ abɔ! Okakewo ka dzɛ kpakpa mi ɛsɛ na bɛyi itingga mgbi Imgbasho mi ikye inggisɛ ntonɛni.
LUK 21:24 A ka ngwɔ angbeka yi okwusunkli dika kwu angbeka ofyɛɛ gbe ma lu kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu. Udzengye ka kye afɔ tɔdɔ iJerosalin nghataa onɔ mgbi Udzengye ka wa ngyɛ.
LUK 21:25 <<Ambɛ ka wa tɔ mi onɔ yi ofyia bɛyi mcɛ. Mi ikpɛsɛ, ɛsɛ duu ka dzɛ mi isɔ bɛyi okakewo mi owulu-wulu yi okadu-kadu mgbi ekyoo okwukwo.
LUK 21:26 Ibyi inggisɛ ka dzɛkwulu yi imio, mi odifwi-difwi mgbi ungwɔ ngwi kyɛ le ba ɛsɛ nɛ mani, lubana ali mfye ongwi esho duu ka suusu.
LUK 21:27 Mi onɔ na a ka di Ongwɛ Inggisɛ kyɛ le ba mi akpa mi esho yi mfye bɛyi okwɔkwɔ oshewo.
LUK 21:28 Onɔ ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ wita okyɔɔkyɔ ma, kyato dzɛkunto kyile ikye mgbi ema esho, lubana owatɔ-watɔ mgbi ema dzɛ kwɛkwɛ.>>
LUK 21:29 Ta iYesu nya ma utsa nɛ gbɛɛ: <<Kyidi andundu bɛyi ekwɔ angbeka duu na.
LUK 21:30 Onɔ ngwi a wita okyinda ma, ema li di abuema di ye gbɛɛ akyonova dzɛ kwɛkwɛ wa.
LUK 21:31 Ngwi i dzɛ nghanɛ, ni ema di ungwɔ ntonɛ le kyɔ yɔ, ye na ta gbɛɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ kwɛkwɛ.
LUK 21:32 <<N nya ema otsitsi, etɔ nɛ ka nyɛ ba nghataa se ungwɔ ntonɛ ka kyɔ.
LUK 21:33 Esho yi esɛ ka wa nyɛ, kpaa elodzɛ mgbi ani ka yama nyɛ ba.
LUK 21:34 <<Gbɛwɛbyi na, ka kye itukwu mgbi ema dzɛ mi ungwɔ ogyeegye yi ungwɔ owa fya bɛyi itukwu oshanyɛ mi oshishe ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, ikye ni egbe na ka fa tu ema bwabwa
LUK 21:35 dafi ukya ba mani. Lubana egbe na ka ba mbi ali inggisɛ ndzɛ ɛsɛ duu.
LUK 21:36 Lasisa le ngyo alonɔ na, di bibɔ gbɛɛ ni ema yagba watɔ mi ungwɔ ama nka wa kyɔ duu, adzi ni ema wa yagba kwudzɛ mi inɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ mani.>>
LUK 21:37 Alegbe mi onɔ, iYesu li le tsungwɔ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, kpaa mi otu yɔ o li lu ka la undɔ ngwi a li kwun di unggwɔ olivi nani.
LUK 21:38 Ali ebgegbe inggisɛ kwuba li tɔ owa fwon mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin.
LUK 22:1 Oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi mgbi ibredi ngwi a li kye okwuna wele ba ma le gyɔ,
LUK 22:2 nɛta engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola le pita ofɛ ngwi ama ka ngwɔ iYesu daada, bana a le mio ibyi inggisɛ.
LUK 22:3 Nghanɛ iSatan kaka mbi iJuda ongwu a li kwun di Iskarɔti, nli onyi mbi emi iwyodefa ntonani.
LUK 22:4 O kɛ mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama nle ngyo mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani, ka kye ondu wɛɛsɛ yi ama dafi ongwu ka kye iYesu gya mani.
LUK 22:5 I kpaa ma nɛta a gbela onun awuya.
LUK 22:6 O gbela, dile pita ofɛ ngwi ongwu ka kye iYesu gya yi ama onɔ ngwi ibyi inggisɛ ka dzɛyan ba mani.
LUK 22:7 Egbe ibredi ngwi a kye okwuna wele ba ma gyɔ, ngwi a ka ngwɔ ongwummala mgbi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi.
LUK 22:8 IYesu dɔ iPyita bɛyi iJɔn esɔ, gbɛɛ, <<Lu na ka wewo oga ongwi eyi ka gye yi eweyi mani.>>
LUK 22:9 A byita gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ole ngwi mina abu gbɛɛ ni eyi ka wewo oga?>>
LUK 22:10 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Dafi ema kaka ogalu mata, inggisɛ nkye ishe eni ka kpatsɛ ema. Kyɛdɔn ka kaka udɛ ngwi o ka kaka mani,
LUK 22:11 di nya otsungwudɛ na gbɛɛ, <Otsetse byita gbɛɛ: Ozu ingyoga kɔ, ngwi ani ka wa gye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi bɛyi engwafɛɛn?>
LUK 22:12 Ta o ka tso ema ifoozu ogbada-gbada ongwi esho, bɛyi okye duu mi ele. Kye mɛlu imbe mani.>>
LUK 22:13 A si lu ka di alungwɔ duu yɛyɛ dafi iYesu teyi nya ma mani. Ta a wewo oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi mi ele.
LUK 22:14 Ngwi obyi ma wa gyɔ nɛ, iYesu bɛyi ama ogbikyon sisɛ ogye oga.
LUK 22:15 Man o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<N mina kpakpa ogye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi nɛ yi ema duuse nin wa gyadzɛ.
LUK 22:16 N le nya ema, ani ka gye oga nɛ wuba, nghataa sede ongwi a ka wa gye mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho mani.>>
LUK 22:17 Onɔ ngwi o kyi kyelu ibwɛ mgbi eneekwɔ nɛ, o ta Imgbasho angba si gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛ wa yi ewema na.
LUK 22:18 Bana n nya ema, n ka yama wa eneekwɔ mgbi ekwɔ onaana nɛ wuba nghataa esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ka wa ba.>>
LUK 22:19 Ta o kyi kyelu ibredi di ta Imgbasho angba kye mwalu, yilen kye nu ma, gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ikpewo mgbi ani ngwi a kye nu ikye ema; kyungwɔnɛ ikye ole wɛ ani na.>>
LUK 22:20 Mi itɔ ofɛ na kpɔɔ, ngwi a gye ungwogye ngyɛ nɛ, o kyi kyelu ibwɛ, gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ibwɛ mgbi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ofufɛ yi eyi mgbi ani ngwi a kye kyi ikye ema.
LUK 22:21 Nghaduu abɔ mgbi inggisɛ nle pita ani ikye ma, wo le gye ungwogye mmɛnɛ yi ani.
LUK 22:22 Bana Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka kwulu kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ dafi a lɔ ikyon mani, kpaa ahoo mi ikye inggisɛ nkye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ gya mani.>>
LUK 22:23 A wita obyi ewoma ita ongwu nka kyɔ itɔ ungwɔnɛ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama mani.
LUK 22:24 Angwodzɛ di tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama gbɛɛ li emɛ mbi ama shewo ngha.
LUK 22:25 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Utɔ mgbi Udzengye mi ɛsɛ nɛ li si emidama; man ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi ntona di li yɛ gbɛɛ ama li abuge mgbi ali inggisɛ duu.
LUK 22:26 Kpaa mbi ema no ka dzɛ ngha ba. Nghaduu ongwu nshewo ngha mi idzidzɛ ema ma non yile ewon esɛ yɛɛ dafi ongbɛ ogyɛngyɛ mani, ongwu ngbe inggisɛ teyi ma no yɛɛ dafi ongbidɔ.
LUK 22:27 Bana li emɛ le kpɔngɔ ngha? Inggisɛ ngwu sɔɔsɔ ma naadi, ongwu nle kyidɔ ma? Ongwu nsɔɔsɔ na ngha! Ani dzɛ mi idzidzɛ ema dafi ongbidɔ mani.
LUK 22:28 Ema li ama nfyi ani anya mi onɔ imbadi mgbi ani.
LUK 22:29 N di kye esutɔ nu ema, dafi Otsani kye nu ani mani,
LUK 22:30 ikyegbɛɛ ni ema gye di wa mi imbe ungwogye mgbi ani mi esutɔ mgbi ani di sɔkɛ itsuutɔ, le gbɔ agwɔ mgbi Israi iwyodefa ikwɔ.
LUK 22:31 <<ISaimɔn, iSaimɔn, iSatan pita ofɛ owa kye kwɔɔlu ema dafi a li kwɔɔ ekwu mi okwuga nɛni.
LUK 22:32 Kpaa ani bibɔ mi ikye abu, iSaimɔn, gbɛɛ ni oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu ka yɛyikpa ba. Ma onɔ ngwi abu kyata yɛ luba yɔ, fyi emi engwunabu mfye itukwu.>>
LUK 22:33 Nghaduu iPyita nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ani wewo okaka obawi diyɛ kwulu yi abu.>>
LUK 22:34 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<N nya abu, iPyita, inɛ nɛni ogbigbi ka teela waba ta abu ka tangwɛ ani akpe eta.>>
LUK 22:35 IYesu di byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ ngwi ani dɔ ema esɔ yi ashiko ba, igbe hona okpafɔ ba ma, ungwɔ kwo ema obaa?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Nkonyi kwo eyi oba ba.>>
LUK 22:36 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Nghaduu onɛnɛ ni ema dzɛ yi ashiko yɔ, kye, bɛyi igbe kpaa; ma kini ema dzɛ yi okwusunkli bayɔ, kye angwuto mgbi ema gya yɛ gya onyi na.
LUK 22:37 Afɛ lɔ gbɛɛ: <A gbɔn mmbwo wokɛ yi ama ofoola>; n di nya ema gbɛɛ ungwɔnɛ ka mbwumbwo mbi ani kyɛmɛ. Ɛɛn, ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ mi ikpewo ani na le kɛ ombwumbwo wa.>>
LUK 22:38 Engwafɔɔn si gbɛɛ, <<Di, Otsɛ, okwusunkli efa to mmɛnɛ na.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<I gyɔ ngha.>>
LUK 22:39 IYesu tasɛ dafi o li teyi kyɔ mani lu mi Unggwɔ Olivi, nɛ engwafɔɔn kyɛdɔn.
LUK 22:40 Ngwi o ka kaka imbe na nɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Bibɔ na adzi ni ema ka gbɛsɛ mi igyila ba.>>
LUK 22:41 O gblekɛ gwee dzata ma, o gbe akwafɔ kwɛsɛ si bibɔ gbɛɛ,
LUK 22:42 <<Otsɛn, ni li oweka mgbi abu yɔ, kyi kyelu ibwɛ adzɛ nɛ mbi ani; nghaduu ka kyɔ mi oweka mgbi ani ba, kpaa kyɔ mi oweka mgbi abu.>>
LUK 22:43 Man ongyesɔ mi esho mblegba tun di fyonfye itukwu.
LUK 22:44 Ngwi o kaka isɔ kpakpa nɛ, o bibɔ mi itukwu onyi, man andzɛ mgban kyata yɛɛ dafi eyi mani le wulɔ kyikɛ esɛ.
LUK 22:45 Onɔ ngwi o kyato mi ibɔ nɛ, o wa tu engwafɔɔn tole nuna ikyekyɛ a kyelela ndɛngyɛ.
LUK 22:46 O byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le nuna? Kyato bibɔ na ikyegbɛɛ ni ema ka gbɛsɛ mi igyila ba mani.>>
LUK 22:47 Ngwi iYesu kale gbɔdzɛ nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ wa kaka, ta inggisɛ ngwu a li kwun di iJuda, nli onyi mbi emi iwyodefa, teyi ma. O ba kwɛkwɛ wa kye ondu kwo iYesu ataka,
LUK 22:48 nghaduu iYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<IJuda, li mi ondu okwo ataka ngwi abu ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ gyaa?>>
LUK 22:49 Ngwi ama nkyɛdɔ iYesu di dafi ungwɔ ka wa kyɔ nɛ, a gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ni eyi gblibe yi okwusunkli mgbi eyii?>>
LUK 22:50 Onyi mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama kyi kwɔdzɛ adɔ abugye mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ.
LUK 22:51 Kpaa iYesu gbɛɛ, <<I gyɔ ngha!>> Man o si yile inggisɛ na adɔ bɛkɛ.
LUK 22:52 Nɛta iYesu nya engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama nle ngyo mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin bɛyi engyukwo emi iJuda, ama nba mbon na gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛse, ngwi ema ba mbi ani yi okwusunkli bɛyi okwuta dafi ani li inggisɛ ofofɛ nghaa?
LUK 22:53 Alegbe ani li dzɛ yi ema mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, kpaa ema bwa ani ba. Nghaduu nɛnɛ li onɔ mgbi ema ngwi iyifu sɔ utɔ aani.>>
LUK 22:54 Nghanɛ a bwa iYesu, a kyon lu udɛ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho. IPyita kyɛ ma iyikpa mbombo.
LUK 22:55 A kye ola wo ifyɛ le wɛ, iPyita kpaa sɔ le wɛ yi ama.
LUK 22:56 Ongwongyiidɔ din dafi o sɔdzɛ le wola nɛ, o din inɛ si gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ kpaa dzɛ yi iYesu.>>
LUK 22:57 Nghaduu o tangwɛ gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, ani yama yen ba.>>
LUK 22:58 Ngwi onɔ kɛ gwee nɛ, inggisɛ oka di gbɛɛ, <<Abu kpaa li onyi mboma.>> IPyita gbɛɛ, <<Ongyulɔ, li ani ba.>>
LUK 22:59 I mɛ dafi obyi onyi sini ta inggisɛ oka biibɛ gbɛɛ, <<Otsitsi inggisɛ nɛ li kyɛ yan, bana o li inggisɛ iGalalia.>>
LUK 22:60 Nɛ iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ, ani yama ye ungwɔ ngwi abu le gbɔ na ba!>> Labɔlabɔ ngwi o kale gbɔdzɛ nɛta, ogbigbi teela.
LUK 22:61 Otsɛ iYesu si kyata inɛ byi iPyita yɛyɛ. Man iPyita wɛ odzɛ ngwi iYesu gbɔ yan mani gbɛɛ: <<Duuse ni ogbigbi wa teela mi otu inɛ nɛni, abu ka tangwɛ ani akpe eta.>>
LUK 22:62 Man iPyita tasɛ lu esɛ ka tsukwu kpakpa.
LUK 22:63 Ama nle ngyo iYesu ma wita onyan agya dile gbon ibe.
LUK 22:64 A kye ungwɔ bwan inɛ di byita gbɛɛ, <<Yegbɔ ka! Li emɛ kye ungwɔ gbo abu?>>
LUK 22:65 A di gbɔ agya angbeka kwuba nyan.
LUK 22:66 Ngwi egbe wa fa nɛ, okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda, ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho yi etsetse mgbi ola ba wa kwakye nɛ, a kye iYesu kɛ mboma.
LUK 22:67 A gbɛɛ, <<Ni abu li iKrestu mayɔ, nya eyi.>> IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ni ani nya ema kpaa ema ka nu ani oyɛyɛ ba,
LUK 22:68 ma ni ani byi ema ita kpaa ema ka yagba onu ani uka ba.
LUK 22:69 Nghaduu i wita mi onɛnɛ lu iyayi, Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka sɔ mi abugye mgbi Imgbasho Ongha yi mfye.>>
LUK 22:70 Ama duu byun gbɛɛ, <<Li abu nɛ li Ongwɛ Imgbashoo?>> O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema gbɛɛ ani li ongwu.>>
LUK 22:71 Ta a di gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi eyi di mina obwɛndɛ angbeka? Bana eyi abueyi fwo mi ondun.>>
LUK 23:1 Ta ibyi inggisɛ ama nkwakye duu kyato kye iYesu kɛ mbi iPlatu iGɔna mgbi emi iRoma.
LUK 23:2 A le mwonya odzɛ ban gbɛɛ, <<Eyi tu inggisɛ nɛ le nu emideyi boofɛ. O di fwa gbɛɛ nu ma ka kpa udza ifyɛɛ nu iSidza ba. O di gbɛɛ ongwu li iKrestu, Utɔ.>>
LUK 23:3 Nɛ iPlatu byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu li utɔ mgbi emi iJudaa?>> IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, li ngha dafi abu gbɔ mani.>>
LUK 23:4 IPlatu si diyɛ nya engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ibyi inggisɛ gbɛɛ, <<N di inggisɛ nɛ yi obube ba.>>
LUK 23:5 Kpaa a nghao biibɛ gbɛɛ, <<O le tsungwɔ di ba yi okakewo mi ali imbe duu mi iJudia. O wita mi iGalalia ba wa kaka iJudia mmɛnɛni.>>
LUK 23:6 Dafi iPlatu fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, o byita kini iYesu li inggisɛ iGalalia yɔ.
LUK 23:7 Ngwi o ye gbɛɛ iYesu kyɛ mi iGalalia imbe ngwi iHerude li utɔ nɛ, o kyon dɛsɔ lu mbi iHerude, ongwu nose kpaa baaba dzɛ iJerosalin mi onɔ nani.
LUK 23:8 Ngwi iHerude di iYesu nɛ, i kpan kpakpa, bana onɔ kɛ ngwi o le mina odin. Mi odzɛ mgban ngwi o fwo ma, i minan odin no kyungwɔ okwulewo ngwi o le kyɔ mani.
LUK 23:9 Nɛ iHerude byi iYesu ita kwuba, nghaduu o nun uka ba.
LUK 23:10 Nɛta engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama otso ola mgbi iMose kyatunto si mwonya odzɛ ban mi ali itɔ ali ibwubwe duu.
LUK 23:11 Ta iHerude bɛyi eblakwutsɛ mgban nya iYesu odzɛ agya diyɛ shan isha ikwangha. A kye angwuto utɔ okwɔkwɔ won ewo, yilen lu ka nu iPlatu.
LUK 23:12 Egbe na iHerude yi iPlatu yɛɛ uka, bana a tsekise dzɛ mi ikyili yi ewoma.
LUK 23:13 IPlatu si kwu engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho yi ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi bɛyi ibyi inggisɛ kwakye,
LUK 23:14 si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema kye inggisɛ nɛ ba mbi ani gbɛɛ li ongwu le wɛ ibyi inggisɛ odzɛ gbɛɛ nu ma kyɔ odzɛ oshiishi. Ani kya mi inɛ mgbi ema nghaduu, n din yi ungwɔ ngwi ema le dulu ongwufabɔ mbon na ba.
LUK 23:15 IHerude kpa tun yi obube ba, bana o yilen dɛsɔ ba wa nu eyi; dafi ema di nɛ, inggisɛ nɛ kyɔ unkonyi mɛ ngwi o ka kwulu ba.
LUK 23:16 Nghanɛ, n ka nu ma gbon ibe ta dzanta.>>
LUK 23:17 (IPlatu gbɔ ngha ikyesinɛ mi onɔ oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi ma, li wogyɔ gbɛɛ o ka dulu onyi mbi ama nwoto obawi ikye emi iJuda.)
LUK 23:18 A si feela ondonyi gbɛɛ, <<Ngwɔlu inggisɛ nɛni! Dzata iBaraba nu eyi!>>
LUK 23:19 (IBaraba wodzɛ obawi ikyegbɛɛ o kyɔ ablodzɛ mi igeli di ngwɔ inggisɛ.)
LUK 23:20 Dafi iPlatu mina odzata iYesu nɛ, o di gbɔdzɛ yi ama.
LUK 23:21 Nghaduu a kiyayi yi ela ofaafa gbɛɛ, <<Gbokwon! Ngwɔlun!>>
LUK 23:22 IPlatu gbɔ yi ama akpe ongwu ta ma gbɛɛ: <<Mi ekyɛ? Li ali alobube ngwi o kyɔ? Ani tun yi obube mɛ onon kwulu ba. Nghanɛ n ka nu ma gbon ibe ta dzanta.>>
LUK 23:23 Kpaa a kiyayi ofeela gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔn, man ela mgbi ama nghan.
LUK 23:24 Nɛ iPlatu yɛ gbela yi owitukwu mgbi ama.
LUK 23:25 O dulu inggisɛ nwodzɛ obawi ikyegbɛɛ o kyɔ ablodzɛ di ngwɔ inggisɛ, ongwu ibyi inggisɛ ntona mina mani, di dzata iYesu nu ma dafi a mina mani.
LUK 23:26 Dafi ama oblakwutsɛ kye iYesu le lu nɛ, a bwa iSaimɔn inggisɛ mi iSirini, ongwu tɔkyɛ mi okwɔ le kaka igeli nani, man a bwan kye ekwatsi mgbi iYesu nun gbɛɛ no kye kyɛdɔn.
LUK 23:27 Ibyi inggisɛ kyɛ ma iyikpa, bɛyi engyaa ama nle kyelela dile tsukwu won.
LUK 23:28 Kpaa iYesu kyata inɛ di ma si gbɛɛ, <<Engwengyaa emi iJerosalin, ka tsukwu ikye ani ba; tsukwu ikye ewema bɛyi ɛngbɛ mgbi ema na.
LUK 23:29 Bana onɔ kyɛma ngwi ema ka gbɛɛ, <Mse dzɛ yi engyaa ama nli ogyoma, ifu nmbongwɛ ba yi abɛ ngwi a nghaan ye waba mani!>
LUK 23:30 Ta << <A ka gbɔ yi unggwɔ ntonɛ gbɛɛ, <<Yulu tukwu eyi!>> Bɛyi undɔ ntonɛ gbɛɛ, <<Gbobu tukwu eyi!>> >
LUK 23:31 Bana ni inggisɛ kyungwɔ ntonɛ mi onɔ ngwi ekwɔ li eyuyu waali, ni ekwɔ wa ngwɔ ma ka dzɛ sinɛ?>>
LUK 23:32 Ama ofofɛ nghi efa angbeka kpaa a kye ma tɔ owa ngwɔ.
LUK 23:33 Ngwi a ba imbe ngwi a li kwun di dingbo nɛ, a kyon gbokwo ekwatsi, ama ofofɛ ntona kpaa a kye ma gbokwo ekwatsi, onyi mi abugye yi oka mi abubɛ mgban.
LUK 23:34 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsani, dzamata, bana a ye ungwɔ ngwi a le kyɔ ba.>> Man a kyen angwuto kye ghalu mi efa ogboogbo.
LUK 23:35 Inggisɛ ibyibyi kwuto le di; nghaduu ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi tole nyan agya gbɛɛ, <<O li dulu angbeka watɔ; non dulu ewon tɔ ki non li iKrestu mgbi Imgbasho, ongwu Imgbasho dulu gbɛɛ o ka wa dulu ɛsɛ watɔ ma yɔ!>>
LUK 23:36 Ama oblakwutsɛ kpaa ba wa fan ɛsɛ. A kye eneekwɔ omama kye nun
LUK 23:37 di gbɛɛ, <<Kini abu li utɔ mgbi emi iJuda yɔ, dulu ewabu tɔ.>>
LUK 23:38 A lɔ ambɛ bɛkɛ ekwatsi mi ikye mgban gbɛɛ: <<Nɛnɛ li Utɔ mgbi emi iJuda.>>
LUK 23:39 Onyi mbi ama ofofɛ ngwu a gbokwo ma yan nyan agya gbɛɛ: <<Abu li iKrestu ma baa? Dulu ewabu tɔ bɛyi eyi lɔ!>>
LUK 23:40 Nghaduu oka na kyɔkyɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Abu li mio Imgbasho lo, bana abu kpaa dzɛ mi odzili-dzili nɛni?
LUK 23:41 Eyi yɔ, eyi le gbiisɔ ayin, bana eyi tu ungwɔ nmɛ mi ali ibwubwe ngwi eyi kyɔ. Kpaa inggisɛ nɛ yama kyɔ unkonyi obube ba.>>
LUK 23:42 Ta o gbɛɛ, <<IYesu, wɛ ani mi onɔ ngwi abu kaka esutɔ mgbi abu.>>
LUK 23:43 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsitsi n nya abu, inɛ nɛ abu ka dzɛ yi ani mi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
LUK 23:44 Ta ngwi onɔ dɔ idzidzɛ udɛ nɛ, ɛsɛ duu yifu nghataa obyi eta ongwi onɔdɛ,
LUK 23:45 bana onɔ tsɛ wuba. Man angwuto ngwi a kye tsɛ onufɛ idzidzɛ ozu osaan mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin na si gbua efa.
LUK 23:46 Ta iYesu makwɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Otsani, n kye onodzi mgbi ani wokɛ abɔ mgbi abu.>> Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, o si yulu.
LUK 23:47 Dafi ongyukwo mgbi ama oblakwutsɛ mgbi iRoma di ungwɔ nkyɔ nɛ, o tsɛ Imgbasho di gbɛɛ, <<Otsitsi inggisɛ nɛ le saan.>>
LUK 23:48 Ngwi ibyi inggisɛ ama nkwakye odi ungwɔ nle kiyayi di ungwɔ nkyɔ nɛ, eka kwowina loma ta a lu.
LUK 23:49 Nghaduu emi odon duu, bɛyi engyaa ama nkyɛdɔn mi iGalalia kwulɛsɛ fyata le di ungwɔ ntonɛni.
LUK 23:50 Mi onɔ na inggisɛ oka dzɛ ngwu a li kwun di iJose, ongwu li onyi mbi ama odi mi ola mgbi emi iJuda, o li inggisɛ osuse dile saan kpaa,
LUK 23:51 ongwu gbela yi owitukwu bɛyi okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi emidan ama odi mi ola mi ikye iYesu na ba. O li inggisɛ mi ogalu Arimatia ayɛsɛ mgbi iJudia o dile fɛ obaaba mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.
LUK 23:52 Inggisɛ nɛ kɛ mbi iPlatu ka bɔn ikwɔ mgbi iYesu.
LUK 23:53 Ta o kye sulu ikwɔ mgbi iYesu ba esɛ, o si kye angwuto onzundzɛ ndiwon kyon ka ndzi mi endzi ngwi a cɛfo mi ikwutsɛ, ongwi a teyi kye ikwɔ ndzi mi ele ye waba mani.
LUK 23:54 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ egbe idɔ eda mi onɔdɛ, ngwi a le wewo ikye egbe otonyewo.
LUK 23:55 Engyaa ama nwafɔ yi iYesu mi iGalalia ntona kyɛdɔ iJose wa di endzi di di dafi a kyon ka ndzi mi ele mani.
LUK 23:56 Nɛ a yɛ lu ka mɛ ungwɔ ogbungbɛ yi engyie ngwi a ka kye gyuon ewo. Nghaduu a tonya mi egbe otonyewo dafi ola mgbi ama gbɔ mani.
LUK 24:1 Mi egbe ongwi ababɔ mi ikyidu, mi egbegbe byibyiibyi, engyaa ntona kye ungwɔ ogbungbɛ yi engyie ngwi a mɛ ma, kɛ endzi.
LUK 24:2 A kɛ ka di a kyi mulu ikwutsɛ ma mi ondendzi,
LUK 24:3 Ngwi a kaka ele nɛ, a tu ikwɔ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu ba.
LUK 24:4 Dafi a le tsɛwɛ mi ele nɛ, vla nɛta engyulɔ nghi efa kwulɛsɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ama, wo angwuto onzundzɛ dafi mmbwo onaabɔ mani.
LUK 24:5 Imio wo engyaa ntona ta a si kye inɛ kwɛsɛ, engyulɔ ntona nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le pita inggisɛ oshishe mi imbe emi ikwukwɔ?
LUK 24:6 O dzɛ mmɛnɛ ba; o kyɛɛ mi ikwu! Wɛ dafi o tsekise nya ema, ngwi o ka dzɛ yi ema mi iGalalia mani gbɛɛ:
LUK 24:7 <A ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ wo emi ali ibwubwe abɔ kyɛmɛ, a ka gbokwon mi ekwatsi nghataa o ka kwulu, kpaa mi egbe ongwu ta ma o ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu.> >>
LUK 24:8 Ta engyaa ntona wɛ elodzɛ mgban.
LUK 24:9 Ngwi a yɛ mi endzi luba nɛ, a kye ungwɔ ntonɛ duu kye nya ama ogbikye iYesu iwyodonyi ntonani bɛyi angbeka duu.
LUK 24:10 Li iMeri iMagidalin yi iJoana bɛyi iMeri onɔ iJɛnsi, bɛyi angbeka nto yi ama, nya ama ogbikye iYesu odzɛ nɛni.
LUK 24:11 Nghaduu ama ogbikye iYesu nu engyaa ntona oyɛyɛ ba, ikyekyɛ elodzɛ mgbi ama dzɛ dafi li odzɛ ikwangha mani.
LUK 24:12 Nɛ iPyita kyato tsinya lu mi endzi. O ka klɛsɛ di mi idzidzɛ endzi man di angwuto ngwi a kye ikwɔ mgbi iYesu ndiwo ma lato yuoma, ta o si yɛ lu, le tsɛwɛ yuon ungwɔ nkyɔ nani.
LUK 24:13 Nɛ mi egbe nata ama okyɛdɔ iYesu efa le kɛ agwɔ oka ngwi a li kwun di Emau, ngwi mɛ dafi imai egyafa sini okyɛɛ kɛ iJerosalin.
LUK 24:14 A le kponya yi ewoma mi ungwɔ ama nkyɔ duu.
LUK 24:15 Dafi a le gbɔdzɛ dile kponya mi ungwɔ ntonɛ yi ewoma nɛ, iYesu abuon ba wa wafɔ yi ama;
LUK 24:16 kpaa a tukwu ma inɛ odifwin.
LUK 24:17 Nɛ iYesu byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ ngwi ema le gbɔ le kɛ?>> A kwulɛsɛ, a shɛ inɛ ta ba.
LUK 24:18 Onyi mbi ama efa na, ongwu a li kwun di iKlopa, byun gbɛɛ, <<Li abu ta li ingyoga mi iJerosalin ngwu ye ungwɔ ama nkyɔ mi egbe ntonɛ ba dɛɛn?>>
LUK 24:19 Nghaduu iYesu byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Li odzɛ mgbi iYesu inggisɛ ongwi iNadzareti. O li oyegbɔ, elodzɛ mgban dzɛ yi mfye bɛyi okyɔɔkyɔ mi inai Imgbasho yi inggisɛ duu.
LUK 24:20 Engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ama ogbe eyi teyi kyon nu ama ndzɛ yi mfye nu ma ngwɔn ikwɔ ikwongye, di kyon gbokwo mi ekwatsi;
LUK 24:21 Ma eyi gbekabyi gbɛɛ o li ongwu nkyɛ owa dulu emi Israi watɔ mani. Ma li ekyɛ oka, nghaduu li egbe ongwu ta inɛ ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ kyɔ waani.
LUK 24:22 Nghanɛ, engyaa angbeka mi idzidzɛ mgbi eyi kyungwɔ okwulu eyi ewo. A kɛ endzi mi egbegbe ototu nɛni,
LUK 24:23 kpaa yama tu ikwɔ mgban ba. A yɛ ba wa nya eyi gbɛɛ di ama di inɛ odiidi mgbi engyesɔ, ngwu nya ma gbɛɛ o dzɛ oshishe.
LUK 24:24 Nɛ emideyi angbeka kɛ endzi ka di dafi engyaa ntona tsekise gbɔ mani, nghaduu ongwu yɔ a din ba.>>
LUK 24:25 Ta iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ema li ikwangha ngha, di kyɔnɛ ngwi ema kyɔ itukwu lɔɔ onoyɛyɛ mi alungwɔ ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ gbɔ dzɛ esɛ ngha?
LUK 24:26 Dzɛ mbisɔ ngwi iKrestu ma ka gbiisɔ mi ungwɔ ntonɛ diyɛ kaka udɛ mgban okwɔkwɔ mi esho baa?>>
LUK 24:27 O si nu ma osa mi ungwɔ ngwi Afɛ gbɔ mi ikye ongwu, wita mbi iMose bɛyi oyegbɔ angbeka duu.
LUK 24:28 Dafi a dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka agwɔ ngwi a le kɛ ma nɛ, iYesu kyɔ dafi o ka nyɛ lu iyayi mani.
LUK 24:29 Nghaduu a tɛkyɛ yan kpakpa gbɛɛ, <<dzɛ yi eyi, bana onɔ dzɛ kwɛkwɛ ogbɛsɛ egbe inɛ nɛ kpaa le ngyɛ wa.>> Man iYesu kaka ikye oka dzɛ yi ama.
LUK 24:30 Ngwi o sɔkɛ ogye ungwogye yi ama nɛ, o kyi kyelu ibredi, kye mse bɛ ele, kye mwalu si kye nu ma.
LUK 24:31 Ta inɛ mgbi ama kwulu a si difwin, man o byulu wo ma inɛ.
LUK 24:32 Engwafɔ ntona byi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Ngwi o le gbɔdzɛ yi eyi mi ofɛ le kɛ dile nu eyi osa mi ungwɔ ngwi Afɛ gbɔ ma, itukwu gbɛɛgbɛ lo eyi baa?>>
LUK 24:33 A si kyato akponyi yɛ luba iJerosalin. A wa tu iwyodonyi ntona bɛyi angbeka kwakye to imbe nani
LUK 24:34 di gbɛɛ, <<Li otsitsi! Otsɛ iYesu kyɛɛ mi ikwu, o di mblegba tu iSaimɔn.>>
LUK 24:35 Ta ama okyɛdɔ iYesu efa ntona nya ma ungwɔ ngwi kyɔ mi ofɛ, dafi ama di difwi iYesu mi onɔ ngwi o kye mwalu ibredi mani.
LUK 24:36 Mi onɔ ngwi a kale gbɔdzɛ mi ikye ungwɔnɛ nɛ, iYesu abuon kwudzɛ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama di gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Iyu no dzɛ yi ema.>>
LUK 24:37 Nɛ i kwulu ma ewo imio di wo ma kpakpa, a le tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ama di onodzi inggisɛ ikwukwɔ.
LUK 24:38 Ta iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi i le kaka ema ewo, ngwi itukwu di dzɛ ema efefa ngha?
LUK 24:39 Di abɔ yi afɔ mgbi ani na. Li ani abuen! Ema kye abɔ gbo ani di; bana onodzi inggisɛ ikwukwɔ dzɛ yi ikpewo yi akpukpu dafi ema di ani dzɛyan nɛ ba.>>
LUK 24:40 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, o kye abɔ yi afɔ mgban tso ma.
LUK 24:41 Dafi a kale noyɛyɛ mi ele ba ikye gbɛɛ i kwulu ma ewo a di dzɛ yi atsa nɛ, o byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema dzɛ yi ungwɔ ogyeegye mmɛnɛ wɛ?>>
LUK 24:42 A si kye ambulu mmbweni oshaasha yi ikpɔkpewo nun,
LUK 24:43 man o kye gye mi inai ma.
LUK 24:44 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ungwɔ ngwi ani nya ema onɔ ngwi ani ka dzɛ yi ema mani: Alungwɔ ngwi a lɔ mi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi olɔɔlɔ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ yi iPaslami duu mbwumbwo kyɛmɛ mi ikpewo ani.>>
LUK 24:45 Nɛ o kwulu ma itukwu onu ma difwi Afɛ mgbi Imgbasho,
LUK 24:46 o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ ma aani: iKrestu ma ka gyadzɛ di kwulu di kyɛɛ mi ikwu mi egbe ongwu ta,
LUK 24:47 nɛ a kale gbeesɔ mgbi itukwu okyata-kyata bɛyi odzata inggisɛ yi ali ibwubwe mi iyi mgban mi ɛsɛ duu, wita mi iJerosalin.
LUK 24:48 Ema li obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ntonɛni.
LUK 24:49 Ani ka kye ungwɔ ngwi Otsani Imgbasho zondu ma kye dɛsɔ nu ema; kpaa tila to ogalu iJerosalin na nghataa ni Imgbasho wa kye mfye mi esho nu ema se.>>
LUK 24:50 Onɔ ngwi iYesu gbe engwafɔɔn tasɛ lu iBetani nɛ, o kyile abɔ esho di kye mse bɛ ma ewo.
LUK 24:51 Ngwi o kye mse le bɛ ma ewo nɛ, o dzata ma ta a si kyon lu esho.
LUK 24:52 Ta a sunun diyɛ luba iJerosalin yi atsa kpakpa.
LUK 24:53 Nɛ a kiyayi otsɛ Imgbasho mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, alegbe-alegbe.
JOH 1:1 Mi owita-wita mgbi ɛsɛ ma Elodzɛ dzɛ, Elodzɛ na dzɛ yi Imgbasho, Elodzɛ na di li Imgbasho.
JOH 1:2 O dzɛ yi Imgbasho mi owita-wita mani.
JOH 1:3 Alungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho ta duu nyɛ mbon, ni li Ongwu bayɔ ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho ta duu o ki ta ba.
JOH 1:4 Li mbon ngwi oshishe dzɛ, ma oshishe na li osa mgbi inggisɛ.
JOH 1:5 Osa na di gbosa mi iifu kpaa iifu difwin gbɛ ba.
JOH 1:6 Imgbasho kye inggisɛ oka dɛsɔ ba, iyin di iJɔn.
JOH 1:7 O ba ikye owa nu obwɛndɛ mgbi osa na, adzi ni inggisɛ duu noyɛyɛ mi osa nani.
JOH 1:8 Li ongwu abuon li osa ma ba, o ba ikye owa kyɔ osa na obwɛndɛ ta.
JOH 1:9 Osa otsitsi nka nu ali inggisɛ odifwi-difwi ma ka kyɛma le ba ɛsɛ nɛni.
JOH 1:10 O teyi dzɛ ɛsɛ nɛni, dafi Imgbasho ta ɛsɛ nɛ mbon nɛ kpaa, emi ɛsɛ difwin ba.
JOH 1:11 O ba mbi ama nli mgban kpaa a gbela gban ba.
JOH 1:12 Nghaduukpaa ama ngban mani, mbi ama nnoyɛyɛ mi iyi mgban ma, o nu ma ofɛ oyɛɛ emi ongwɛ Imgbasho,
JOH 1:13 engwɛ ngwu a mba ma mi mmbwɛ yi eyi ba, hona mi ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ naadi mi owitukwu mgbi obongyaa ba, kpaa nli ombaamba mgbi Imgbasho mi onodzi mani.
JOH 1:14 Ta Elodzɛ na yɛɛ inggisɛ wa dzɛ yi eyi. Eyi di okwɔkwɔ mgban, okwɔkwɔ mgbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho Onyi kpokpo, ntɔkyɛ mbi Otsɛ Imgbasho, ngwu elela mgban mbwo le fɛ-fɛ bɛyi otsitsi nani.
JOH 1:15 IJɔn kyɔ obwɛndɛ ikyon. O di gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ongwu ani gbɛɛ, <Ongwu nkyɛ ani iyikpa ma o ngha ani, ikyekyɛ o teyi ani dzɛ.> >>
JOH 1:16 Elela mgban nle dzii ikye eyi nɛ, nu eyi duu gbumse idzidza-dzidza.
JOH 1:17 Bana a kye ola nu mi abɔ mgbi iMose; elela bɛyi otsitsi ba mi abɔ mgbi iYesu iKrestu.
JOH 1:18 Inggisɛ onyi di Imgbasho ye ba, sede li Ongwɛ onyi kpokpo ndi li Imgbasho mi otsitsi di wodzɛ ifafɔ yi Otsɔn nani, li ongwu tso eyi dafi Imgbasho dzɛ aali.
JOH 1:19 Onɔ oka nɛ, engyukwo emi iJuda ama nto iJerosalin dɔ ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi emi iLevi esɔ nu ma ka byi iJɔn ita gbɛɛ, o li emɛ.
JOH 1:20 O kye da ma ba, o gbɛɛ, <<Ani li iKrestu ma ba.>>
JOH 1:21 A byun gbɛɛ, <<Nghama abu li emɛ? Abu li Elaijaa?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ei li ani ba.>> <<Abu li oyegbɔ maa?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ei.>>
JOH 1:22 Mi ongyɛɛngyɛ nɛ a si byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu li emɛ? Nu eyi elodzɛ ngwi eyi ka yilen ka nya ama ndɔ eyi esɔ ntonani. Abu gbɔsinɛ mi ikye ewabu?>>
JOH 1:23 IJɔn nu ma uka mi elodzɛ mgbi oyegbɔ Adzaya gbɛɛ, <<Ani li ela mgbi ongwu nle kwu mi okwɛsɛ gbɛɛ, <Mɛlu ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ no byi yɛyɛ.> >>
JOH 1:24 Ama ngwu a dɔ ma esɔ ma li emi iFarasi.
JOH 1:25 A byun gbɛɛ, <<Ni abu li iKrestu, naadi Elaija, hona oyegbɔ kpaa ba ma, i kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu le kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima?>>
JOH 1:26 IJɔn nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani le kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima yi eni, kpaa inggisɛ oka kwudzɛ idzidzɛ mgbi ema, ongwu ema yon ba.
JOH 1:27 O kyɛ ani iyikpa, odi okpafɔ mgban kpaa ani mɛ oshɛ ba.>>
JOH 1:28 Ungwɔ ntonɛ duu kiyayi mi iBetani, mi oyombo ekyoo iJodan, imbe ngwi iJɔn le kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima mani.
JOH 1:29 Tegblifan iJɔn di iYesu kyɛ le ba mbon nɛta o gbɛɛ, <<Dii ongwummala mgbi Imgbasho, ongwu nkyi kyelu alobube mgbi ɛsɛ mani!
JOH 1:30 Li ongwu ani nya ema odzɛ mgban gbɛɛ, <Inggisɛ oka kyɛma ngwu ngha ani, ikyekyɛ o teyi ani dzɛ.>
JOH 1:31 Ani abuani kpaa nose yon ba, kpaa itɔdzɛ ngwi ani ba le kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima yi eni ma, li ikye okyon tso mbi emi Israi.>>
JOH 1:32 Ta iJɔn si nu ma obwɛndɛ nɛni: <<Ani di Onodzi Osaan tashulu mi esho dafi anyama mani wa tila dɔnkɛ ewo.
JOH 1:33 Ani kika yon ba, nghaduu Imgbasho ndɔ ani esɔ owa kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima yi eni ma nya ani gbɛɛ, <Ongyulɔ ngwu abu di Onodzi mgbi ani tila dɔnkɛ ewo ma, li ongwu ka kyɔ inggisɛ iBatisima yi Onodzi Osaan aali.>
JOH 1:34 Ani di kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ nɛnɛ li Ongwɛ Imgbasho.>>
JOH 1:35 Tegblifan nɛ iJɔn diyɛ kwudzɛ yi engwafɔɔn nghi efa.
JOH 1:36 Ngwi o dili iYesu nyɛ le lu nɛta o gbɛɛ, <<Dii, li Ongwɛ Mmala mgbi Imgbasho ma aani!>>
JOH 1:37 Ngwi engwafɔ mgban ntonɛ fwo odzɛ ngwi o gbɔ nɛta, a kyɛdɔ iYesu.
JOH 1:38 Ngwi iYesu kyata di ma kyan iyikpa nɛ, o byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ ngwi ema mina?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li mi ole ngwi abu dzɛ?>>
JOH 1:39 O gbɛɛ, <<Ba ta ema ka di.>> Man a kɛ ka di imbe ngwi o dzɛ mani, diyɛ dzɛyan mi egbe na olɔlɔ duu. Onɔ li obyi enɛ ongwi onɔdɛ sini.
JOH 1:40 Andru, ongwunɔ iSaimɔn iPyita, li onyi mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ efa ama nfwo odzɛ ngwi iJɔn gbɔ di kyɛdɔ iYesu mani.
JOH 1:41 Ungwɔ ababɔ ngwi Andru kyɔ yɔ, o pita iSaimɔn ongwunɔn nyan gbɛɛ, <<Eyi tu Onagbɛ ngwu Imgbasho zondu ma wa>> (ongwu nli iKrestu nani).
JOH 1:42 Nɛ o si kyon luba mbi iYesu. IYesu din inɛ si gbɛɛ, <<Abu li iSaimɔn ongwɛ iJɔn. A ka kwu abu di iKefa>> (ngwi a li kwun di iPyita, ngwi itan li ikwutsɛ nani).
JOH 1:43 Tegblifan iYesu wewo le lu iGalalia. O wa tu iFyilipi si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyɛdɔ ani.>>
JOH 1:44 IFyilipi li inggisɛ mi iBɛtsaida imbe onyi yi Andru bɛyi iPyita.
JOH 1:45 IFyilipi tu iNataniɛ si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Eyi tu ongwu iMose lɔ odzɛ mgban mi afɛ mgbi ola, ongwu ama ogbɛɛsɛ kpaa lɔ odzɛ mgban nani, iYesu ongwi iNadzareti, ongwɛ iJose.>>
JOH 1:46 Ta iNataniɛ byita gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ osuse ka yagba tɔ mi iNadzaretii?>> IFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Ba wa di.>>
JOH 1:47 Ngwi iYesu di iNataniɛ kyɛ le to kwɛkwɛ nɛ, o gbɔdzɛ mi ikpewon gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li inggisɛ Israi otsitsi, ongwu atsika onyi dzɛ mbon ba.>>
JOH 1:48 INataniɛ byita gbɛɛ, <<Abu kyɔsinɛse ye ani?>> IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani di abu ngwi abu ka dzɛ ita andundu duuse ni iFyilipi wa kwu abu ela.>>
JOH 1:49 Man iNataniɛ byakpa ghatɔ gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, abu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho; abu li Utɔ mgbi Israi.>>
JOH 1:50 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu noyɛyɛ ikyekyɛ ani nya abu gbɛɛ ani di abu mi ita andundu. O ka wa di ungwɔ ama nshewo ngha ntona kpaa.>>
JOH 1:51 O diyɛ kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, ema ka di esho ka kwulu lakɛ asisa, engyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho kale kɛ esho yɛ ba esɛ mbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ.>>
JOH 2:1 Mi egbe ongwu ta ma eba okwokyiikwokyi dzɛ ogalu iKana mi ɛsɛ iGalalia. Onɔ iYesu dzɛ ele,
JOH 2:2 nɛ iYesu yi engwafɔ mgban kpaa a bɔ ma eba okwokyiikwokyi nani.
JOH 2:3 Ngwi eneekwɔ wa ngyɛ nɛ, onɔ iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<A sulu eneekwɔ wuba.>>
JOH 2:4 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Onɛn, li ekyɛ ngwi abu kye ani le wokɛ ele? Onɔ mgbi ani gyɔ waba.>>
JOH 2:5 Onɔn si nya engbidɔ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔ alungwɔ ngwi o nya ema duu.>>
JOH 2:6 Atankpɛ akwutsɛ mgbi eni nghi egyin to kwɛkwɛ mi imbe nani, itɔ ngwi emi iJuda li sa ewoma mi odzɛɛdzɛ aletɔ mgbi ama mani, ali atankpɛ li kye ikpɔkpɔ eni mɛ osu lu osudiwyo.
JOH 2:7 IYesu nya engbidɔ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Kweni mbwo atankpɛ ntonɛ na.>> A si kweni mbwo ma kyɛɛ kyɛɛ.
JOH 2:8 Ta o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ yɔ, mwa ka nu ongyukwo mgbi oga nɛ tsatso na.>> A si kyɔ dafi o gbɔ mani,
JOH 2:9 man ongyukwo mgbi oga nɛ mbadi eni ngwi o kyatan yɛɛ eneekwɔ nani. O ye imbe ngwi eneekwɔ nɛ tɔkyɛ ba, kpaa engbidɔ ama nkweni ma ye. O kwu obongyaa ofufɛ ela lu enggengga,
JOH 2:10 ka gbɛɛ, <<Ali inggisɛ li teyi kye eneekwɔ osuse tasɛ se wa kye obube ba olɛlɛ onɔ ngwi ingyoga wa ungwɔ kpakpa mani, nghaduu abu kye osuse da nghataa ba onɛnɛni.>>
JOH 2:11 Nɛnɛ li ambɛ okwulewo ongwi ababɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ mi iKana mi iGalalia. O kye okwɔkwɔ mgban tso, nɛta engwafɔ mgban si kye oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama byikɛ mbon.
JOH 2:12 Ungwɔnɛ wa ngyɛ man o lu iKapenahun yi onɔn yi emi ongwunɔn bɛyi engwafɔ mgban. A la imbe na egbe efa.
JOH 2:13 Ngwi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda na wa dzɛ kwɛkwɛ nɛ, iYesu lu iJerosalin.
JOH 2:14 O ka to ifoozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani, o di inggisɛ tole kye mnda, mmala yi anyama le gya, angbeka sɔto ewo adinyatsɛ tole nyinɛ awuya.
JOH 2:15 Ta o shi onitse mi osha, si lɔ ma onya duu tasɛ mi ifoozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho, bɛyi emi mmala yi mnda tsatsa; o kye ganya awuya mi adinyatsɛ mgbi ama onyinɛ awuya di kyi kyata adinyatsɛ ma tukwu esɛ.
JOH 2:16 Ama nkye anyama le gya ma o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Gbelu ungwɔ ntonɛ tasɛ mmɛnɛ na! Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema kyata ozu mgbi Otsani yɛɛ idu!>>
JOH 2:17 Engwafɔ wɛ dafi a lɔ gbɛɛ, <<Okpitukwu mgbi ani mi ikye ozu mgbi abu le gbɛ mi itukwu mgbi ani dafi ola mani.>>
JOH 2:18 Emi iJuda byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ali ambɛ okwulewo ngwi abu ka yagba tso eyi zukwu ni eyi difwi mfye ngwi abu sulun se kyɔ itɔ ungwɔ ntonɛnɛ?>>
JOH 2:19 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Gbobu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho nɛni, ta ani ka yilen mbɛ mi egbe eta.>>
JOH 2:20 Emi iJuda byun gbɛɛ, <<I kye onova ngwusefa dɔn egyin ombɛ ozu nɛni, nghanɛ abu ka yilen mbɛ mi egbe eta taa?>>
JOH 2:21 Nghaduu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho ngwi o le gbɔdzan na li ewo mgban.
JOH 2:22 Mi onɔ ngwi a wa kyilon mi ikwongye ma se engwafɔɔn wa ka wɛ odzɛ ngwi o teyi gbɔ nani. Man a si noyɛyɛ mi afɛ bɛyi elodzɛ ngwi iYesu teyi gbɔ.
JOH 2:23 Dafi o ka dzɛ iJerosalin mi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi nɛ, inggisɛ kwuba di ambɛ okwulewo ama ngwi o le kyɔ nɛta, a noyɛyɛ mi iyi mgban.
JOH 2:24 Nghaduu iYesu gbela kye ewon nu ma ba, bana o ye ngyɛ ali inggisɛ duu.
JOH 2:25 O mina obwɛndɛ mgbi inggisɛ ikye inggisɛ ba, ikyekyɛ o teyi ye ungwɔ nwodzɛ mbi inggisɛ mani.
JOH 3:1 Inggisɛ iFarasi oka nose dzɛ iyin di iNikodemu, o li onyi mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama o gbe emi iJuda teyi.
JOH 3:2 O ba mbi iYesu mi otu wa nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, eyi ye abu li otsetse nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho. Bana inggisɛ onyi ka yagba kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo ama ngwi abu le kyɔ nɛ ba ni Imgbasho dzɛyan bayɔ.>>
JOH 3:3 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<N le nya abu otsitsi, inggisɛ onyi ka yagba di esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho gbɛ ba se ni a yilen mba akpe efa.>>
JOH 3:4 INikodemu byita gbɛɛ, <<A ka kyɔsinɛse yile inggisɛ mba ngwi o yɛɛ omyinɛ nɛ? O ka yagba yɛ kaka ifu mbi onɔn akpe ongwu fan ni a yilon mba gbɛɛ?>>
JOH 3:5 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<N le nya abu otsitsi, inggisɛ onyi ka kaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho ba se a ka mban mi eni bɛyi Onodzi.
JOH 3:6 Mmbwɛ yi eyi li mba mmbwɛ yi eyi, Onodzi li mba onodzi.
JOH 3:7 No ka kwulu abu ewo mi odzɛ ngwi ani gbɔgbɛɛ, <Se a ka yile abu mba na ba.>
JOH 3:8 Awo li fa lu imbe ngwi i mina. Abu ka fwo owulu-wulu mgban kpaa abu ka ye imbe ngwi i tɔkyɛ hona imbe ngwi i le kɛ ba. Li ngha ndzɛ yi ali inggisɛ ngwu a mban mi Onodzi aali.>>
JOH 3:9 Nɛ iNikodemu byita gbɛɛ, <<Ka kyɔsinɛse ungwɔnɛ ka dzɛ ngha gbɛ?>>
JOH 3:10 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ngwi abu li otsetse mgbi emi Israi nɛ kpaa, abu yagba difwi ungwɔ ntonɛ lo?>>
JOH 3:11 N le nya abu otsitsi, eyi ye ungwɔ ngwi eyi le gbɔ, eyi dile nu obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ngwi eyi di, nghaduu ema gbela yi obwɛndɛ mgbi eyi ba.
JOH 3:12 Ani gbɔdzɛ yi abu mi ungwɔ ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ kpaa abu noyɛyɛ ba; ma ka kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu ka noyɛyɛ kini Ani gbɔdzɛ yi abu mi ungwɔ ongwi esho?
JOH 3:13 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa kɛ esho ye ba se li Ongwɛ Inggisɛ nkyɛ esho nɛni.
JOH 3:14 Dafi iMose nose byi ifa kyilen esho mi okwɛsɛ na li ngha a ka wa kyile Ongwɛ Inggisɛ esho kyɛmɛ aali,
JOH 3:15 adzi inggisɛ ngwu noyɛyɛ mbon yɔ no ka dzili ba, kpaa no tu oshishe gyegwu.
JOH 3:16 <<Lubana Imgbasho di ɛsɛ nɛ kpan itukwu jo o kye Ongwan onyi kpokpo nu, gbɛɛ ali inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ ta no ka dzili ba, kpaa no tu oshishe igyegwu.
JOH 3:17 Bana Imgbasho dɔ Ongwan esɔ ba ɛsɛ ikye owa fwo ɛsɛ ikwɔ nun obube ba, kpaa li ikye ni ɛsɛ watɔ ikpewon.
JOH 3:18 Ali inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ yɔ o ka dzili ba, kpaa ali inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ bayɔ teyi dzili wa ikyekyɛ o noyɛyɛ mi iyi mgbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho onyi kpokpo na ba.
JOH 3:19 Nɛnɛ li ikwɔ ma aani: Osa ba ɛsɛ nɛni, kpaa inggisɛ nghao mina iifu ngha osa ikyekyɛ okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi ama li ibwubwe.
JOH 3:20 Ali inggisɛ nkyungwɔ ibwubwe yɔ, o di osa lanyi nghanɛ o ka gbela ba imbe ngwi osa dzɛ ba di ali ibwubwe mgban wa dɔ ododa.
JOH 3:21 Nghaduu inggisɛ nkye otsitsi teyi yɔ, o ka ba imbe ngwi osa dzɛ zukwu nu ma difwi saan gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi ongwu kyɔ nɛ kyɛ mbi Imgbasho.>>
JOH 3:22 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛta iYesu yi engwafɔɔn tasɛ lu ikpɛsɛ iJudia, ka kye egbe gwee yi ama le kyɔ ma iBatisima.
JOH 3:23 Onɔ na iJɔn kpaa le kyɔ iBatisima mi Ayenɔ kwɛkwɛ yi iSalin, ikyekyɛ eni kwoba ba, inggisɛ dile ba tonya ba gbɛɛ ni iJɔn kyɔ ma iBatisima.
JOH 3:24 (Ungwɔnɛ li onɔ ngwi a kye iJɔn wo obawi waba mani.)
JOH 3:25 Angwodzɛ tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi engwafɔ iJɔn angbeka bɛyi inggisɛ iJuda oka mi odzɛ ewo ofwɔɔfwɔ.
JOH 3:26 A ba mbi iJɔn wa gbɔ yan gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, inggisɛ ndzɛ yi abu nose mi oyombo iJodan ongwu abu kyɔ obwɛndɛ saan mi ikyon na, o le kyɔ iBatisima, ma ali inggisɛ duu le lu mbon.>>
JOH 3:27 IJɔn nu uka mi odzɛ nɛ gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ka yagba kyungwɔ ba sede ni Imgbasho ongwi esho kye nun yɔ.
JOH 3:28 Ema abuema ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ ani teyi nya ema gbɛɛ, <Ani li iKrestu ma ba a dɔɔdɔ ani esɔ teyun ta.>
JOH 3:29 Ongyaa ofufɛ li mgbi obongyaa ofufɛ. Uka mgbi obongyaa li fwoofwo yi obongyaa, o di li mbwo yi atsa onɔ ngwi o fwo ela mgbi obongyaa mani. Atsa na li mgbi ani, di li ngha ngwi atsa mgbi ani li mbwumbwo aali.
JOH 3:30 IYesu ka sheeshe lu iyayi, ani ka yɛɛyɛ esɛ.
JOH 3:31 <<Ongwu nkyɛ esho ba ma ngha duu, ongwu ntɔkyɛ ɛsɛ ma li mgbi ɛsɛ, o li gbɔdzɛ dafi inggisɛ nkyɛ ɛsɛ. Ongwu nkyɛ esho ma ngha duu.
JOH 3:32 O kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ama ngwi o fwo diyɛ di, kpaa inggisɛ onyi gbela yi obwɛndɛ mgban ba.
JOH 3:33 Inggisɛ ngbela yan gbela gbɛɛ Imgbasho li otsitsi.
JOH 3:34 Lubana ongwu Imgbasho dɔn esɔ ma gbɔ elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho, Imgbasho nun mfye mgbi Onodzi odondu ba.
JOH 3:35 O kpa Otsɔn itukwu o di kye alungwɔ duu dɔn ubɔ.
JOH 3:36 Ali inggisɛ ngwu nu Ongwɛ oyɛyɛ yɔ dzɛ yi oshishe ogyegwu, ali inggisɛ nfwa Ongwɛ yɔ ka di oshishe ba, lubana itingga mgbi Imgbasho ka dzɛyan gyegwu.>>
JOH 4:1 Emi iFarasi fwo gbɛɛ iYesu nghao le tu ama okyɛdɔn dile kyɔ ma iBatisima ngha iJɔn,
JOH 4:2 yama li iYesu abɔn le kyɔ iBatisima ba, kpaa li engwafɔɔn le kyɔ.
JOH 4:3 IYesu wa ye nghanɛ man, o dzata ayɛsɛ mgbi iJudia yidɔ lu iGalalia.
JOH 4:4 I wogyɔ ngwi o ka nyɛ ongwi iSamaria.
JOH 4:5 Nɛ o wa to igeli mgbi iSamaria oka ngwi a li kwun di iSika, kwɛkwɛ yi ongwɛ imbe ngwi iJeko kye nu iJose ongwan nani.
JOH 4:6 Ibuga mgbi iJeko dzɛ imbe nani, dafi indɛ mgbi agaba kwu iYesu nɛ, o sisɛ mi ewo ibuga ngwi onɔ dɔ idzidzɛ udɛ sini.
JOH 4:7 Onɔ ngwi ongyaa iSamaria ba owa kweni nɛ, iYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<O ka nu ani eni owawa wɛ?>>
JOH 4:8 (Engwafɔ mgban lu ifu igeli oka gya ungwogye.)
JOH 4:9 Ongyaa iSamaria na nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu li inggisɛ iJuda, ani li ongyaa iBatlomi. Kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu le bɔ ani eni owawa?>> (Bana emi iJuda li kwokyi yi emi iBatlomi ba.)
JOH 4:10 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ni abu ki ye umba mgbi Imgbasho ndzɛ mi ikye mgbi abu bɛyi inggisɛ nle bɔ abu eni owawa nɛ yɔ, abu kika bɔ ta, o kika nu abu eni mgbi oshishe.>>
JOH 4:11 Ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, abu dzɛ yi odi okweni ba, ibu nɛ kɛ ma abu ka tu eni mgbi oshishe nɛ mi ole?
JOH 4:12 Abu shewo ngha otseyi iJeko nkye ibuga nɛ nu eyi di weni mi ele abuon, ngwi ɛngbɛ mgban kpaa wa bɛyi ifyungwɔ mgban naa?>>
JOH 4:13 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ali inggisɛ nweni nɛ yɔ ekweni ka yɛ kwun,
JOH 4:14 kpaa ali inggisɛ nweni ngwi Ani kye nun yɔ ekweni ka kwun wuba. Mi otsitsi, eni ngwi Ani kye nun na ka yaan uteeni di kale fɛ nghataa kaka oshishe gyegwu.>>
JOH 4:15 Ongyaa na nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, nu ani eni nani adzi ni ekweni ka kwin wuba, nin di nya yi eni owa kwɔɔkwɔ.>>
JOH 4:16 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka kwu obabu ela no ba.>>
JOH 4:17 O gbɛɛ, <<Ani dzɛ yi ongyulɔ ba.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<O gbɔ ayin dafi abu gbɛɛ abu dzɛ yi ongyulɔ ba nani.
JOH 4:18 Otsitsi, abu teyi sulu engyulɔ nghi eda, ongwu abu dzɛyan onɛnɛ nɛ kpaa li obabu ba. Odzɛ ngwi abu kwa gbɔ nɛ li otsitsi.>>
JOH 4:19 Ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, dzɛ ani dafi abu li oyegbɔ mani.
JOH 4:20 Emi otseyi teyi li sunu Imgbasho mi unggwɔ nɛni, nghaduu ema emi iJuda yɔ li gbɛɛ li mi iJerosalin kyɛmɛ ngwi eyi ka sunu Imgbasho.>>
JOH 4:21 IYesu ghatɔ gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, nu ani oyɛyɛ, onɔ kyɛma ngwi ema ka wa sunu Otsɛ Imgbasho mi unggwɔ nɛ hona mi iJerosalin kpaa wuba.
JOH 4:22 Ema emi iBatlomi le sunu ungwɔ ngwi ema yon ba; eyi emi iJuda yɔ, eyi le sunu ungwɔ ngwi eyi yon, bana owatɔ-watɔ kyɛ mbi emi iJuda.
JOH 4:23 Lubana onɔ kyɛma di li onɔ ma aani, ngwi ali inggisɛ osunu mi otsitsi ka sunu Otsɔn Imgbasho mi onodzi bɛyi otsitsi kyɛmɛ, lubana li itɔ ama osunu ngwu Otsɔ Imgbasho le pita ma aali.
JOH 4:24 Imgbasho li Onodzi, ama osunun nu ma sunun mi onodzi bɛyi otsitsi kyɛmɛ.>>
JOH 4:25 Ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Ani ye Onagbɛ (ongwu a kwun di iKrestu ma) kyɛma. Onɔ ngwi o wa ba yɔ, o ka nu eyi osa mi alungwɔ duu.>>
JOH 4:26 Man iYesu ghatɔ gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ma jo le gbɔdzɛ yi abu aani.>>
JOH 4:27 Mi onɔ na mata engwafɔ mgban yɛ man i kwulu ma ewo dafi iYesu le gbɔdzɛ yi ongyaa mani. Nghaduu inggisɛ onyi byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ ngwi abu mina naadi kyɔnɛ ngwi abu le kponya yi ongyaa baa?>>
JOH 4:28 Ta ongyaa na dzata ishe eni mgban, yɛ lu igeli ka nya ali inggisɛ duu gbɛɛ,
JOH 4:29 <<Ba na, wa di inggisɛ ngwu nya ani alungwɔ ngwi ani plɛ kyɔ tsatsa nɛni. Li iKrestu ma dɛn hoo?>>
JOH 4:30 A tasɛ mi ogalu kpatsɛ ofɛ le lu mbon.
JOH 4:31 Duuse nu ma ba yɔ, engwafɔɔn tɛkyɛ yan gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, gye ungwogye.>>
JOH 4:32 Nghaduu iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani sulu ungwogye ongwi ema ye ba mani.>>
JOH 4:33 Nɛman engwafɔɔn tole gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Naadi inggisɛ oka kye ungwogye wa nun?>>
JOH 4:34 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ungwogye mgbi ani, li okyɔ itukwu mgbi Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ di ngyɛlu idɔ mgban ngwi o wo ani mani.
JOH 4:35 Ema li gbɛɛ, <I sisi ofyia enɛ duuse onɔ oshɛ etɔ ka gyɔ baa>? Nin nya ema, kwulu inɛ di okwɔ na! A myɛ gyɔ oshɛ-shɛ.
JOH 4:36 Onɛnɛ kpaa a le kpa inggisɛ oshɛ etɔ mi idɔ mgban, o dile shɛ etɔ mgbi oshishe ogyegwu na onɛnɛni, ikye ni inggisɛ ofwe etɔ bɛyi inggisɛ oshɛ etɔ wa dzɛ yi atsa yi ewoma.
JOH 4:37 Nghanɛ elodzɛ ngbɛɛ, <Inggisɛ oka fwe-fwe etɔ oka di shɛ-shɛ na li otsitsi.>
JOH 4:38 N dɔ ema esɔ le ka shɛ etɔ ngwi li ema kya ba. Angbeka teyi kyɔlu idɔ nsunɔ mani ta ema tu mgbede mi idɔ mgbi ama.>>
JOH 4:39 Emi iSamaria kwuba mi igeli na nu iYesu oyɛyɛ mi ikye obwɛndɛ mgbi ongyaa nani, ngwi o gbɛɛ, <<O nya ani alungwɔ ngwi ani teyi kyɔ tsatsadu.>>
JOH 4:40 Nghanɛ ngwi emi iSamaria ba mbon nɛ, a tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ no dzɛ yi ama, man o si lela yi ama egbe efa.
JOH 4:41 Elodzɛ mgban ogbɔɔgbɔ nu inggisɛ kwuba yɛɛ ama onoyɛyɛ.
JOH 4:42 A nya ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Eyi noyɛyɛ mi elodzɛ ngwi abu nya eyi na ta ba, onɛnɛ eyi fwo mi adɔ ibeyi, eyi di ye gbɛɛ ongyulɔ nɛ otsitsi-otsitsi o li Onagbɛ mgbi ɛsɛ nɛni.>>
JOH 4:43 Ngwi egbe efa na nyɛ nɛta iYesu lu iGalalia.
JOH 4:44 (Bana ongwu abuon teyi gbɛɛ oyegbɔ sulu mmwɛ mi ɛsɛ udan ba.)
JOH 4:45 Ngwi o kaka iGalalia nɛman emi iGalalia kyɔn onɔ. A di ungwɔ ama ngwi o kyɔ mi iJerosalin tsatsa mi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi nani, ikyekyɛ ama kpaa kɛ ele.
JOH 4:46 O diyɛ kɛ igeli iKana mi ayɛsɛ mgbi iGalalia imbe ngwi o kyata eni yɛɛ eneekwɔ nani. Ongbodzi inggisɛ idɔ mgbi utɔ oka ongwan la ootse mi ɛsɛ iKapenahun.
JOH 4:47 Ngwi inggisɛ nɛ fwo gbɛɛ iYesu dzata iJudia luba iGalalia nɛ, o si kɛ mbon ka tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ no ba wa bwe ongwan ongwu ndotse kaka ikwongye nani.
JOH 4:48 Nɛ iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Se ni ema di ambɛ yi ungwɔ okwulewo bayɔ ema ka noyɛyɛ ba.>>
JOH 4:49 Ongbodzi inggisɛ idɔ mgbi utɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, ba vla duuse ni ongwani wa kwulu.>>
JOH 4:50 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<O ka yagba lu, unka ka kyɔ ongwabu ba.>> Inggisɛ na gbela yi odzɛ ngwi iYesu gbɔ nɛ taman o si lu.
JOH 4:51 Ngwi o kale kɛ ofɛ mani engbidɔ mgban wa nyan gbɛɛ ewo gbosa lo ongwan.
JOH 4:52 O byi ma onɔ ngwi ewo gbosa lon mani, a gbɛɛ, <<Li obyi onyi mi onɔ ngwi awo dzanta.>>
JOH 4:53 Man otsɔn difwi dafi li onɔ na yɛyɛ ngwi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ongwabu ka dzɛ oshishe.>> Nɛta ongwu yi etɔ mgban duu noyɛyɛ.
JOH 4:54 Li ambɛ okwulewo ongwu fan ngwi iYesu kyɔ mi onɔ ngwi o dzata iJudia luba iGalalia aani.
JOH 5:1 Onɔ oka nɛ, iYesu di yidɔ kɛ iJerosalin mi oga mgbi emi iJuda.
JOH 5:2 Ibu mmala dzɛ ogalu iJerosalin ngwi a li kwun di Onufɛ Ogalu Mmala ngwi dzɛ yi iwulu opo nghi eda, iyin mi ondu iHibru li iBɛtesda.
JOH 5:3 Ibyi inggisɛ ama ndotse lato opo ntonani, ama obinɛ, ama ogbikye tukwu esɛ, bɛyi ama ngwu alewo kwulu. [
JOH 5:4 Ongyesɔ li kyɛ esho wa kaka eni nani, di kyɔ akpeni: inggisɛ ongwu ababɔ nkaka mi onɔ ngwi akpeni le gbo na yɔ, ali ootse mgban duu li ngyɛ.]
JOH 5:5 Inggisɛ oka nose ladzɛ mmanani ngwu dotse onova osudiwyo diwyegyata.
JOH 5:6 Onɔ ngwi iYesu din ladzɛ mmana di difwi gbɛɛ o dzɛ mi ootse na onɔ kɛ nɛ, o byun gbɛɛ, <<I mina abu gbɛɛ ni ootse mgbi abu ngyɛɛ?>>
JOH 5:7 Inggisɛ ootse na si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, ani dzɛ yi inggisɛ onyi nka ya ani abɔ kye ani kaka ibu onɔ ngwi a kyɔ akpeni ba. Ni ani le fya gbɛɛ nin kaka ta inggisɛ oka li teyi ani.>>
JOH 5:8 Nɛ iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyato! Kyi kyelu obutu mgbi abu, kyikyɛ.>>
JOH 5:9 Labɔlabɔ mata ootse mgban ngyɛ; o kyi kyelu obutu mgban si kyikyɛ. Mi egbe ngwi ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ma li egbe otonyewo,
JOH 5:10 nɛta emi iJuda ntona nya inggisɛ ngwu a ngyɛlun ootse na gbɛɛ, <<Li egbe otonyewo; ola fwa gbɛɛ ni abu ka kye obutu mgbi abu ba.>>
JOH 5:11 Nghaduu o nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ongwu ngyɛlu ani ootse na nya ani gbɛɛ, <Kyi kyelu obutu mgbi abu kyikyɛ.> >>
JOH 5:12 Nɛ a byun gbɛɛ, <<Li ali inggisɛ nya abu gbɛɛ ni abu kyelu obutu mgbi abu kyikyɛ?>>
JOH 5:13 Inggisɛ ngwu a ngyɛlun ootse na ye inggisɛ ma ba, ikyekyɛ iYesu lu dzanta kaka ifu ibyi inggisɛ.
JOH 5:14 Onɔ gwee nɛ iYesu wa din mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Dika, abu yɛɛ saan onɛnɛni. Ka kyɔ alobube wuba di ungwɔ ntimbi nghaabɔ nɛ wa kyɔ abu.>>
JOH 5:15 Inggisɛ na yɛ lu ka nya emi iJuda ntona gbɛɛ li iYesu dzikan ngyɛlu ongwu ootse.
JOH 5:16 Nghanɛ emi iJuda ntona wita opita iYesu mgbɛkyɛ ngwi o ngyɛlu inggisɛ ootse mi egbe otonyewo.
JOH 5:17 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Otsani le kyidɔ mgban alonɔ duu, li ngha ngwi ani kpaa le kyɔ aani.>>
JOH 5:18 Mi ikye odzɛ nɛ emi iJuda ntonɛ fya mi oglijo mgbi ama duu ongwɔn; ikyegbɛɛ o le mbe ola mgbi egbe otonyewo ta ba, kpaa o dile kwu Imgbasho gbɛɛ Otsongwu, okye ewon yɛɛ ungwonyi yi Imgbasho.
JOH 5:19 IYesu nu ma uka sini: <<N nya ema otsitsi, Ongwɛ ka yagba kyɔ unkonyi abuon ba; o ka kyungwɔ ngwi o di Otsɔn le kyɔ ma kyoon ta, bana alungwɔ ngwi Otsɔn kyɔ ma Ongwɛ kpaa li kyɔ ngha yɛyɛ.
JOH 5:20 Ikyesinɛ Otsɔngwɛ di Ongwɛ kpan itukwu di tson alungwɔ ngwi Ongwu li kyɔ duu. Ɛɛn, ikyegbɛɛ no kwulu ema ewo yɔ, ungwɔ ama nngha ongyɛlu inggisɛ nɛ ootse kpaa, Otsɔn ka kye tson.
JOH 5:21 Dafi Otsɔn li kyile inggisɛ ikwukwɔ di li kye oshishe nu ma nɛ, li ngha ngwi Ongwɛ kpaa li kye nu ama ngwu ongwu mina okye nu aali.
JOH 5:22 Nghaduukpaa Otsani li gbɔ inggisɛ onyi ikwɔ ba, o yile ikwɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ duu wo Ongwɛ abɔ,
JOH 5:23 ikyegbɛɛ nu ma kye mmwɛ nu Ongwɛ dafi a li kye nu Otsɔn kpaa yɛyɛ mani. Inggisɛ nkye mmwɛ nu Ongwɛ ba Otsɔn ndɔn esɔ ma kpaa o nun mmwɛ ba.
JOH 5:24 <<N nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ nfwo elodzɛ mgbi ani di nu ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma oyɛyɛ yɔ, o dzɛ yi oshishe ogyegwu. O dika dzili ba; o fa mi ikwongye luba oshishe.
JOH 5:25 N nya ema otsitsi, onɔ kyɛma, i di ba kpaa wa ngwi emi ikwukwɔ ka fwo ela mgbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho, ama nfwo ma ka dzɛ oshishe.
JOH 5:26 Dafi Otsɔngwɛ dzɛ yi oshishe abuon nɛ, li ngha ngwi o nu Ongwɛ kpaa dzɛ yi oshishe abuon aali.
JOH 5:27 Nghanɛ o di nun mfye ogbiikwɔ ikyekyɛ o li Ongwɛ Inggisɛ.
JOH 5:28 <<No ka kwulu ema ewo mi ungwɔnɛ ba, ikyena onɔ kyɛma ngwi ama nlato endzi duu ka fwo ela mgban
JOH 5:29 di tasɛ mi endzi. Ama nkyɔ osuse ka kyato dzɛ oshishe, ama nkyɔ obube ka kyato kaka odzili-dzili.
JOH 5:30 Ani abuen ka yagba kyɔ unkonyi ba; ani li gbiikwɔ dafi ani fwo ma kyoon, ma ikwɔ mgbi ani li otsitsi, ikyesinɛ ani mina okyungwɔ ongwi itukwu ani ba, kpaa itukwu mgbi ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 5:31 <<Ni ani kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi odzɛ mgbi ani abuani yɔ, obwɛndɛ na wuuta ba.
JOH 5:32 Inggisɛ oka dzɛma nli kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi odzɛ mgbi ani, ma ani ye obwɛndɛ mgban li otsitsi.
JOH 5:33 <<Abu dɛsɔ kɛ mbi iJɔn, o di kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikye otsitsi.
JOH 5:34 Li ogbɛɛ Ani mina obwɛndɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ ba; kpaa Ani gbɔ ntonɛ ikyegbɛɛ ni ema watɔ.
JOH 5:35 IJɔn nose dzɛ dafi ipitila nle gbɛ dile gbosa mani, ema dzɛ yi atsa mi ongwonɔ gwee ikye ogbɛ osa mgban.
JOH 5:36 <<Ani dzɛ yi obwɛndɛ nsundo ngha mgbi iJɔn nani. Mi ikye idɔ ngwi Otsani kye nu ani gbɛɛ ni ani ngyɛlu nɛni, ngwi ani le kyɔ nɛ, i tso obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ Otsani dɔ ani esɔ.
JOH 5:37 Otsani ndɔ ani esɔ abuon teyi kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi odzɛ mgbi ani. Ema fwo ela mgban hona di odzɛɛdzɛ mgban ye ba,
JOH 5:38 elodzɛ mgban kpaa wodzɛ mbi ema ba, ikyena ema nu ongwu o dɔn esɔ nɛ oyɛyɛ ba.
JOH 5:39 Ema kpayi elodzɛ Imgbasho nɛ saan ikyekyɛ ema tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ li mi ele ngwi ema tu oshishe gyegwu. Ma li elodzɛ Imgbasho ntonɛ kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikye odzɛ mgbi ani,
JOH 5:40 nghaduu ema fwa oba mbi ani wa tu oshishe.
JOH 5:41 <<Ani mina mmwɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ ba,
JOH 5:42 kpaa ani ye ema. Ani ye dafi ema dzɛ yi okpitukwu mgbi Imgbasho mi itukwu mgbi ema ba mani.
JOH 5:43 Ani ba mi iyi mgbi Otsani, nghaduu ema gbɛ ani ba; kpaa ni inggisɛ oka ba mi iyi mgbi ewon yɔ, ema ka gban.
JOH 5:44 Ema ka noyɛyɛ sinɛ, ngwi ema le mina mmwɛ mbi ewema, kpaa le pita mmwɛ nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho yuon ta ba?
JOH 5:45 <<Nghaduu ka tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ li Ani ka gbe odzɛ wo ema ewo mbi Otsani ba. Li iMose ngwu ema kye itukwu mgbi ema byi mbon na ka gbe odzɛ wo ema ewo aali.
JOH 5:46 Ni ema ki nu iMose oyɛyɛ yɔ, ema kika nu ani kpaa oyɛyɛ, ikyesinɛ o lɔ ungwɔ mi odzɛ mgbi ani.
JOH 5:47 Kpaa ngwi ema noyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ ngwi o lɔ ba nɛ, ema ka noyɛyɛ mi odzɛ ngwi ani gbɔ sinɛ?>>
JOH 6:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, iYesu fooye lu byulu mi agya Ekyoo Okwukwo mgbi iGalalia (ngwi a di li kwun di ekyoo iTiberia kpaa nani),
JOH 6:2 nɛ ibyi inggisɛ kpakpa kyɛdɔn ikyekyɛ a di ambɛ okwulewo ngwi o kyɔ mbi emi ootse mani.
JOH 6:3 Man iYesu tɔ lu unggwɔ ka sisɛ yi emi ongwafɔɔn.
JOH 6:4 Oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda dzɛ kwɛkwɛ mi onɔ mani.
JOH 6:5 Ngwi iYesu kyile inɛ esho di ibyi inggisɛ kpakpa kyɛ le ba mbi ongwu nɛ, o si byi iFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ole ngwi eyi ka gya ibredi nu inggisɛ ntonɛ gye?>>
JOH 6:6 IYesu byita nɛ ikye ombadun ta, ikyesinɛ o teyi ye mi itukwu mgban ungwɔ ngwi ongwu ka kyɔ.
JOH 6:7 IFyilipi nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Udza okpa idɔ mgbi ofyia egyata kpaa ka mɛ ogya ibredi nu ma tsan aba kpatsɛ ba!>>
JOH 6:8 Ongwafɔ mgbi iYesu oka, Andru, ongwunɔ iSaimɔn iPyita si gbɛɛ,
JOH 6:9 <<Ongwongyulɔ dzɛ mmɛnɛni ngwu dzɛ yi ibredi ngwi a kyɔ mi ibale nghi eda bɛyi ongwɛ abatsa efa, ntonɛ ka to ole mbi ibyi inggisɛ ntonɛ?>>
JOH 6:10 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Ni inggisɛ ntonɛ sisɛ.>> Oshɛ kyinda mi imbe na kpakpa man inggisɛ ntona sisɛ mi ele, engyulɔ mɛ dafi idubu eda sini.
JOH 6:11 IYesu si kyelu ibredi kye angba nu Imgbasho man kye nu engwafɔ mgban nu ma kye gha inggisɛ ntonani, o di kyɔ ngha yi mmbweni yɛyɛ, ama duu gye dafi a mina mani.
JOH 6:12 Ngwi inggisɛ duu tu gye gyɔlo ma nɛ, o si nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Kyi salu ambulu nsisi ma kwakye mbonyi ni unkonyi ka nyanya ba na.>>
JOH 6:13 A si kye salu ambulu ibredi ibale nghi eda ngwi a gye sisi ma mbwo uya nghi iwyodefa.
JOH 6:14 Dafi inggisɛ ntona di ambɛ okwulewo ngwi iYesu kyɔ nɛ, a gbɛɛ, <<Mi otsitsi yɔ, nɛnɛ li oyegbɔ nwogyɔ gbɛɛ o ka ba ɛsɛ mani.>>
JOH 6:15 Ngwi iYesu di gbɛɛ, a wewo ogye ongwu utɔ mi abumfye nɛ, o wulɛ lu unggwɔ ka dzɛ yuon.
JOH 6:16 Mi onɔdɛ nani, engwafɔɔn kɛ utɔ,
JOH 6:17 a kaka uwaa le fooye lu iKapenahun dafi imbe yifu wa, kpaa iYesu ba wa tu ma waba.
JOH 6:18 Awo wa le fa fyumfye, dile gbe akpeni.
JOH 6:19 Dafi a fa uwaa kɛ mɛ imai eta naadi eta dɔ itsitsi nɛ, a di iYesu kyikyɛ mi ikye eni le ba kwɛkwɛ yi ama, ta imio wo ma.
JOH 6:20 Nghaduu o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li Ani, ka mio ba na.>>
JOH 6:21 Nɛ a mina okyon kaka uwaa, ntunto nɛta uwaa to ondu esɛ mi imbe ngwi a le kɛ mani.
JOH 6:22 Tegblifan ibyi inggisɛ ama nto oye utɔ agya oka nɛ difwi gbɛɛ li uwaa onyi ta bɛdzɛ mmana edɛdɛ ma iYesu edɛdɛ kaka yi engwafɔɔn ba, a lu yuoma.
JOH 6:23 Nɛ uwaa angbeka kyɛ iTiberia wa bɛsɛ kwɛkwɛ yi imbe ngwi inggisɛ ntona gye ibredi mi onɔ ngwi Otsɛ iYesu nose kye angba nu Imgbasho nani.
JOH 6:24 Ngwi ibyi inggisɛ ntona di gbɛɛ, iYesu naadi engwafɔ mgban to mmana wuba nɛ, a kaka uwaa ntona lu oyombo iKapenahun oka pitan.
JOH 6:25 Ngwi a tun mi oyombo utɔ nɛ, a byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li alonɔ ngwi abu to mmɛnɛ?>>
JOH 6:26 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, ema le pita ani ikyegbɛɛ di ema di ambɛ okwulewo ba, kpaa li ikyegbɛɛ ema gye ungwogye kpakpa tolo.
JOH 6:27 Ka kyidɔ mi ikye ungwogye nli mbe ba, kpaa mi ikye ungwogye nka dzɛ ba oshishe igyegwu ngwi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka kye nu ema mani, ikyesinɛ Imgbasho Otsɔn teyi kye ambɛ mgbi ogbela ungwɔ nun.>>
JOH 6:28 Nɛ a byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi eyi ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ ikye okyidɔ ama ngwi Imgbasho mina?>>
JOH 6:29 IYesu si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Idɔ mgbi Imgbasho ma li ongwu aani: li onoyɛyɛ mbi ongwu Imgbasho dɔn esɔ nɛni.>>
JOH 6:30 Nghanɛ a byun gbɛɛ, <<Li ali ambɛ okwulewo ngwi abu ka kyɔ ikye ni eyi diyɛ nu abu oyɛyɛ? Li alungwɔ ngwi abu ka kyɔ?
JOH 6:31 Emi otsikyeyi nose gye imana nkyɛ esho kyɛ, mi okwɛsɛ dafi ngwi a tsekise lɔ gbɛɛ: <O kye ungwogye kyɛ esho nu ma gye mani.> >>
JOH 6:32 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, li iMose kye ungwogye nkyɛ esho na nu ema ba, kpaa li Otsani kye ungwogye otsitsi nkyɛ esho na nu ema.
JOH 6:33 Ikyekyɛ ungwogye mgbi Imgbasho li ongwu nkyɛ esho ba esɛ wa kye oshishe nu ɛsɛ nɛni.>>
JOH 6:34 A gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, le nu eyi ungwogye na alegbe-alegbe.>>
JOH 6:35 Nɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ani li ungwogye mgbi oshishe, inggisɛ nba mbi ani yɔ enbwa ka dɔn wuba, inggisɛ ndi nu ani oyɛyɛ yɔ ekweni ka kwun wuba.
JOH 6:36 Kpaa dafi Ani nya ema ma, ema di ani wa, nghaduu ema noyɛyɛ ba.
JOH 6:37 Ama ngwu Otsani kye ma nu ani duu a ka ba mbi ani, ali inggisɛ ndi ba mbi Ani duu n ka lɔn onya ba.
JOH 6:38 Ikyena Ani kyɛ esho ba esɛ owa kyɔ owitukwu mgbi ani ba, kpaa okyɔ owitukwu mgbi ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 6:39 Ma nɛnɛ li owitukwu mgbi ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma aani: gbɛɛ ama ngwu ongwu gbe nu ani duu onyi kpaa no ka byulu mi ele ba, kpaa ni Ani kyile ma esho mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ.
JOH 6:40 Lubana owitukwu mgbi Otsani li ogbɛɛ, ali inggisɛ ndi Ongwɛ di nun oyɛyɛ ka tu oshishe gyegwu, Ani dika kyilen mi ikwu mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ mani.>>
JOH 6:41 Mi ungwɔnɛ emi iJuda wita ondandu mi ikye odzɛ mgbi iYesu ikyekyɛ o gbɛɛ, <<Ani li ungwogye nkyɛ esho ba esɛ.>>
JOH 6:42 A gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li iYesu lo, ongwɛ iJose, ongwu eyi ye otsɔn yi onɔn nɛ baa? Kyɔsinɛ ngwi o ka gbɔ onɛnɛ gbɛɛ, Ani kyɛ esho ba esɛ?>>
JOH 6:43 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Nya ondandu yi ewema na.>>
JOH 6:44 <<Inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka ba mbi ani ba se Otsani ndɔ ani esɔ ma kwon ba mbi ani, ani dika kyilen mi ikwu mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ mani.
JOH 6:45 A teyi lɔ mi afɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ gbɛɛ: <Imgbasho ka tso ma tsatsa.> Ali inggisɛ ngaadɔ mbi Otsani di kpayi mbon yɔ ka ba mbi ani.
JOH 6:46 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa di Otsani ye ba, li ongwu nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho nɛ ta, li ongwu yuon di Otsɔn aali.
JOH 6:47 N nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ dzɛ yi oshishe gyegwu.
JOH 6:48 Ani li ungwogye mgbi oshishe.
JOH 6:49 Emi otsikyema gye imana mi imbe okplagada ungwogye nkye esho ba esɛ nani, nghaduu kpaa a kwulu.
JOH 6:50 Kpaa ungwogye nkyɛ esho ba esɛ dzɛ mmɛnɛni, ngwi inggisɛ ka gye di kwulu wuba.
JOH 6:51 Ani li ungwogye mgbi oshishe nkyɛ esho ba esɛ. Inggisɛ ta ngye ungwogye nɛ o ka dzɛ oshishe gyegwu, ungwogye nɛ li ikpewo mgbi ani ongwu ani ka kye nu mi ikye oshishe mgbi ɛsɛ.>>
JOH 6:52 Nɛ emi iJuda ntona wita otangwɛ yi ewoma mi itɔdzɛ ngwi iYesu gbɔ nani, gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi inggisɛ nɛ ka kye ikpewo mgban nu eyi gye?>>
JOH 6:53 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi se ni ema gye ikpewo mgbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ di wa eyi mgban bayɔ, ema dzɛ yi oshishe mbi ema ba.
JOH 6:54 Ali inggisɛ ngye ikpewo mgbi ani diyɛ wa eyi mgbi ani dzɛ yi oshishe igyegwu, ani dika kyilen mi ikwu mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ.
JOH 6:55 Ikyesinɛ, ikpewo mgbi ani li ungwogye otsitsi, eyi mgbi ani di li ungwɔ owawa otsitsi.
JOH 6:56 Inggisɛ ta ngye ikpewo mgbi ani di wa eyi mgbi ani wodzɛ mbi ani, ani kpaa wodzɛ mbon.
JOH 6:57 Yɛyɛ dafi Otsani ndzɛ oshishe dɔ ani esɔ mani, ani di dzɛ oshishe li ikye Otsani nani, nghanɛ inggisɛ ngye di wa mbi ani yɔ, ka dzɛ oshishe ikye ani.
JOH 6:58 Nɛnɛ li ungwogye nkyɛ esho ba esɛ mani, emi otsikyema gye imana nghaduu a kwulu, kpaa inggisɛ nbyi ewon enbwa yi ungwogye ngwi ani kye nu nɛ, ka dzɛ oshishe gyegwu.>>
JOH 6:59 IYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ mi onɔ ngwi o le tsungwɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda mi iKapenahun mani.
JOH 6:60 Ngwi a fwo odzɛ nɛ nghanɛ, engwafɔ mgbi iYesu kwuba gbɛɛ, <<Otsootso nɛ fyumfye, li emɛ ka gbelan?>>
JOH 6:61 IYesu ye dafi engwafɔɔn tole ndandu mi odzɛ nɛni, o si byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Odzɛ nɛ nu ema ka dzani taa?
JOH 6:62 Kini ema di Ongwɛ Inggisɛ yɛ lu esho mi imbe ngwi o teyi dzɛ ma ema ka gbɔsinɛ?
JOH 6:63 Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho li nu oshishe; mfye mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ dzɛ yi oyabɔ ba duudu. Elodzɛ ngwi ani gbɔ nya ema ntonɛ li onodzi, a di li oshishe kpaa.
JOH 6:64 Nghaduu ema angbeka to ma ngwu noyɛyɛ ba.>> Ikyesinɛ iYesu teyi ye mi owita-wita ama ngwu noyɛyɛ ba mi idzidzɛ ema, yi ongwu nka wa kyen gya mani.
JOH 6:65 O kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<Li ungwɔ ngwi ani nya ema gbɛɛ inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka ba mbi ani ba se Otsani nun ofɛ ma aani.>>
JOH 6:66 Wita mi onɔ na emi ongwafɔɔn kwuba kyata iyikpa di kyɛdɔn wuba.
JOH 6:67 Nghanɛ iYesu byi engwafɔ mgban iwyodefa ntona gbɛɛ, <<Ema kpaa i mina ema odzata anii?>>
JOH 6:68 ISaimɔn iPyita nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ li mbi emɛ eyi ka kɛ? Abu dzɛ yi elodzɛ mgbi oshishe ogyegwu.
JOH 6:69 Eyi noyɛyɛ di ye gbɛɛ abu li iKrestu, ongwɛ Imgbasho oshishe.>>
JOH 6:70 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani sadu ema nghi iwyodefa baa? Nghaduu onyi mbi ema li olodu!>>
JOH 6:71 (O gbɔdzɛ mgbi iJuda ongwɛ Iskarɔti, ikyesinɛ ngwi o li onyi mbi engwafɔɔn nɛ kpaa, o ka wa kye ongwu gya.)
JOH 7:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, iYesu kaka iJudia ba kpaa lu le kyikyɛ mi iGalalia, ikyekyɛ ama ogbe emi iJuda teyi le pita ofɛ okyelun oshishe.
JOH 7:2 Nghaduu ngwi oga iTabenako mgbi emi iJuda wa dzɛ kwɛkwɛ nɛ,
JOH 7:3 emi ongwunɔ iYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<I wogyɔ ngwi abu ka dzata imbe nɛ lu iJudia adzi ni emi ongwafɔ abu nu ma di ungwɔ ama okwulewo ngwi abu li kyɔ ntonɛni.
JOH 7:4 Inggisɛ nmina gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ yon, li kyungwɔ mi odaada ba. Ngwi abu le kyungwɔ ntonɛ wa nɛ, kye ewabu tso ni ɛsɛ di.>>
JOH 7:5 Lubana emi ongwunɔn kpaa nun oyɛyɛ ba.
JOH 7:6 Ikyenghanɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ mgbi ani yɛyɛ ma gyɔ waba; mbi ema yɔ alonɔ duu le yɛyɛ.
JOH 7:7 Ɛsɛ ka di ema tanyi ba, kpaa ani yɔ i din tanyi, ikyekyɛ ani kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi o le kyɔ li ibwubwe.
JOH 7:8 Ema kɛ oga na. Ani le kɛ oga nɛ waba ikyekyɛ onɔ mgbi ani yɛyɛ ma gyɔ waba.>>
JOH 7:9 Ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ nɛ, o tila dzɛ iGalalia.
JOH 7:10 Nghaduukpaa, ngwi emi ongwunɔn lu oga nɛman, ongwu kpaa wa kɛ. O kɛ mi ododa ba, kpaa mi odaada.
JOH 7:11 Mi oga na ma, emi iJuda tole ndinan dile byita gbɛɛ, <<O kɔ?>>
JOH 7:12 Ibyi inggisɛ ntona tole ndandu kpatsɛ mi ikye mgbi iYesu, angbeka gbɛɛ, <<O li inggisɛ osuse.>> Angbeka nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ei o le kpagya inggisɛ wo.>>
JOH 7:13 Nghaduu inggisɛ gbɔdzɛ mgban mi ododa ba ikyekyɛ a le mio emi iJuda.
JOH 7:14 Onɔ ngwi oga to idzidzɛ ma se, iYesu wa kɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ka wita ungwɔ otsootso.
JOH 7:15 I kwulu emi iJuda ntona ewo man a byita gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi inggisɛ nɛ ye ungwɔ kpakpa, ma ngwi inggisɛ onyi kpaa tson ba?>>
JOH 7:16 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsootso nɛ li mgbi ani ba. Kyɛ mbi Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 7:17 Ali inggisɛ ngwu i minan okyɔ itukwu mgbi Imgbasho ka fya oye kana otsootso nɛ kyɛ mbi Imgbasho naadi li mgbi ikyibani.
JOH 7:18 Inggisɛ nli gbɔdzɛ mgbi ibɔn li kyɔ ngha ikye otu mmwɛ mgbi ewon, kpaa inggisɛ nkyidɔ mi ikye mmwɛ mgbi ongwu ndɔn esɔ ma yɔ li inggisɛ oyɛyɛ; atsika onyi dzɛ mi odzɛ mgban ba.
JOH 7:19 IMose nose kye ola nu ema baa? Nghaduu inggisɛ mgbi ema onyonyi kpaa kyɔ mi ele ba. Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le fya ongwɔ ani?>>
JOH 7:20 Inggisɛ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Esɛ dɔ abu ikye. Li emɛ le fya ongwɔ abu?>>
JOH 7:21 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani kyungwɔ okwulewo onyi kpata, man i kwulu ema duu ewo.
JOH 7:22 Nghaduu, iMose nu ema ola okyiikyɛ (kpaa li mbi iMose ngwi ola na tɔ ba, li mbi emi otsikyema), ema li kyɛ ongwɛ ikyɛ mi egbe otonyewo.
JOH 7:23 Kini a ka kyɛ ongwɛ ikyɛ mi egbe otonyewo ikye ofoola mgbi iMose ba waali, kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le kyitingga yi ani gbɛɛ di ani ngyɛlu inggisɛ olɔlɔ ootse mi egbe otonyewo?
JOH 7:24 Ka gbiikwɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi ema di ma kyoon ba, gbiikwɔ mi ungwɔ nli emyɛmyɛ mani.>>
JOH 7:25 Mi onɔ na ma inggisɛ angbeka mi iJerosalin wita obyi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ongyulɔ ngwu a le fya ongwɔn ma lo?
JOH 7:26 O dzɛ mmɛnɛ, le gbɔdzɛ mi ododa ma a le kwondu won ba, ama ogbe eyi teyi difwi gbɛɛ o li iKrestu ma waa?
JOH 7:27 Kpaa eyi ye imbe ngwi inggisɛ nɛ tɔkyɛ; onɔ ngwi iKrestu ma wa ba yɔ, inggisɛ onyi ka ye imbe ngwi o tɔkyɛ ba.>>
JOH 7:28 Ta ngwi iYesu kale tso mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho nɛ, o gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, ema ye ani, ema di ye imbe ngwi ani kyɛ mani. Ani dzɛ mmɛnɛ ikyibani ba, ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma li otsitsi. Ema yon ba,
JOH 7:29 nghaduu ani yon ikyekyɛ ani kyɛ mbon o di dɔ ani esɔ.>>
JOH 7:30 Nɛ a fya obwan, kpaa inggisɛ onyi yagba okye abɔ gbon ba ikyekyɛ onɔ mgban gyɔ waba.
JOH 7:31 Inggisɛ kwuba mi ifu ibyi kye oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama byi mbon kpɔɔ. A gbɛɛ, <<Ni iKrestu ma wa ba yɔ, o ka kyɔ ambɛ ama nghao kwulewo ngha inggisɛ nɛɛ?>>
JOH 7:32 Dafi emi iFarasi fwo ibyi inggisɛ tole ndandu mi ungwɔ ntonɛ mi ikpewo iYesu nɛ, engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi emi iFarasi dɔ ama ongyo ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin gbɛɛ nu ma ka bwa iYesu.
JOH 7:33 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani ka dzɛ yi ema ongwonɔ gwee ta, man N ka yɛ lu mbi Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 7:34 Ema ka pita ani, kpaa ema ka tu ani ba; imbe ngwi ani dzɛ kpaa ema ka kɛ gbɛ ba.>>
JOH 7:35 Emi iJuda ntona gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Li mi ole ngwi inggisɛ nɛ weka olu ngwi eyi ka din ba? O ka lu imbe ngwi emideyi ganya to mi idzidzɛ emi iGriki ma, dika tso emi iGrikii?
JOH 7:36 Oweka mgban sinɛ ngwi o gbɛɛ, <Ema ka pita ani, kpaa ema ka tu ani ba, ma imbe ngwi ani dzɛ ema dika ba gbɛ ba>?>>
JOH 7:37 Mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ bɛyi egbe ingblimɔ mi oga na ma iYesu dzɛkunto, di gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ni ekweni kwu inggisɛ yɔ, non ba wa wa mbi ani.
JOH 7:38 Ali inggisɛ nnu ani oyɛyɛ dafi Afɛ gbɔ ma, ifogbe mgbi eni oshishe ka fɛ tɔ mbon.>>
JOH 7:39 Mi odzɛ nɛ iYesu kye inɛ byi Onodzi Osaan ngwi ama nnu ongwu oyɛyɛ ka wa gbɛ mani. Nghataa ba onɔ na a kye Onodzi ma nu waba, ikyekyɛ iYesu kaka okwɔkwɔ oshewo mgban ma waba.
JOH 7:40 Onɔ ngwi ibyi inggisɛ ntona fwo odzɛ ngwi o gbɔ nɛ angbeka gbɛɛ, <<Otsitsi-otsitsi, inggisɛ nɛ li Oyegbɔ mani.>>
JOH 7:41 Angbeka gbɛɛ, <<O li iKrestu mani.>> Angbeka di byita gbɛɛ, <<IKrestu ka tɔ mi iGalalia sinɛ?
JOH 7:42 Afɛ gbɛɛ iKrestu ka tɔ mi etɔ mgbi iDevedi mi iBɛtlɛhɛn, ogalu ngwi iDevedi dzɛ bawɛ?>>
JOH 7:43 Itɔdzɛ nɛta inggisɛ ntonɛ si gha ikye iYesu.
JOH 7:44 Angbeka mina obwan, nghaduu inggisɛ onyi kye abɔ gbon ewo ba.
JOH 7:45 Ongyɛɛngyɛ yɔ ama ongyo ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin yidɔ kɛ mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi emi iFarasi, a byi ama ongyoongyo ntona gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema kye iYesu ba mmɛnɛ ba?>>
JOH 7:46 Ama ongyoongyo ntona nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ onyonyi yama gbɔdzɛ dafi ngwi inggisɛ nɛ gbɔ ye ba.>>
JOH 7:47 Emi iFarasi byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema tso gbɛɛ, ema kpaa o kpagya ema woo?>>
JOH 7:48 <<Ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi hona emi iFarasi onyi nun oyɛyɛ yee?
JOH 7:49 Ei! Kpaa ibyi inggisɛ ama n ye unkonyi mi ola mgbi iMose ba ntonɛ, ikamba dzɛ ikye ma.>>
JOH 7:50 INikodemu, nteyi kɛ mbi iYesu, di li onyi mboma ma byita gbɛɛ,
JOH 7:51 <<Ola mgbi eyi noofɛ gbɛɛ ni eyi fwo mbi inggisɛ ba ta ngwɔn ikwɔɔ?>>
JOH 7:52 A si nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Abu kpaa kyɛ iGalaliaa? Tsɛwɛ mi ele, ta abu ka difwi gbɛɛ oyegbɔ li tɔ mi iGalalia ba.>> [
JOH 7:53 Ta ali inggisɛ duu lu udɛ mgban.]
JOH 8:1 Ta iYesu lu Unggwɔ Olivi.
JOH 8:2 Tegblifan mi egbegbe ototu nɛ, o diyɛ lu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani, inggisɛ duu kwakye kpaklili won, man o si sisɛ otso ma.
JOH 8:3 Etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi emi iFarasi kye ongyaa ngwu a bwan mi amah ba. A non dzɛkunto mi inɛ ibyi ntona
JOH 8:4 si nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, a bwa ongyaa nɛ le kyɔ amah.
JOH 8:5 Mi ola ma iMose nu eyi ofɛ otsɛngwɔ itɔ ongyaa nɛ mi akwutsɛ, ma abu gbɔ dikyɛ?>>
JOH 8:6 A tole byun ita nɛ ikye okyan ukya di tu itɔdzɛ okye abɔ byi ele. Kpaa iYesu klɛsɛ wita olɔ ungwɔ mi esɛ mi ongwufabɔ mgban.
JOH 8:7 Dafi a kiyayi obyun ita nɛ, o kyile ikye esho si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ni inggisɛ onyi mi idzidzɛ ema kyungwɔ obube ye bayɔ, otsungwɔ no li ababɔ otsan ikwutsɛ.>>
JOH 8:8 O diyɛ klɛsɛ wita olɔ ungwɔ mi esɛ.
JOH 8:9 Mi odzɛ nɛ, ama nfwo ma wita olu onyonyi, ama nli engyukwo ma teyi, nghataa wa sisi iYesu yi ongyaa na ka kwuzunto mi imbe nani.
JOH 8:10 IYesu kyile ikye esho byi ongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, a kɔ? Inggisɛ onyi kpaa sisi onu abu obube wulo?>>
JOH 8:11 O gbɛɛ, <<Onyi kpaa ba, ongyukwo.>> IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛse, ani kpaa nu abu obube ba. Lu kpaa ka kyɔ alobube wuba.>>]
JOH 8:12 IYesu di gbɔdzɛ yi inggisɛ ntonɛni, o gbɛɛ, <<Ani li osa mgbi ɛsɛ. Ali inggisɛ nkyɛdɔ ani yɔ o ka yama kyikyɛ mi iifu ba, kpaa o ka dzɛ yi osa mgbi oshishe.>>
JOH 8:13 Emi iFarasi si kwun shanyɛ gbɛɛ, <<Abu kwudzɛ mmɛnɛ le kyɔ ewabu obwɛndɛ; obwɛndɛ mgbi abu wuuta ba.>>
JOH 8:14 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ni Ani kyɔ ewani obwɛndɛ kpaa, obwɛndɛ mgbi Ani wuuta, ikyekyɛ Ani ye imbe ngwi Ani tɔkyɛ bɛyi imbe ngwi Ani le kɛ mani. Nghaduu ema dzɛ yi ozoyeye mi imbe ngwi Ani tɔkyɛ hona le kɛ ba.
JOH 8:15 Ema li fwikwɔ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ; kpaa Ani li fwo inggisɛ onyi ikwɔ ba.
JOH 8:16 Ma ni ani gbiikwɔ yɔ, ikwɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ mgbi ani ka li ayin, ikyesinɛ ani dzɛ yuen ba. Ani dzɛ yi Otsani, ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 8:17 Mi ola mgbi ema ma a lɔ gbɛɛ obwɛndɛ mgbi inggisɛ efa li wuuta.
JOH 8:18 Ani li ongwu nkyɔ ewani obwɛndɛ; obwɛndɛ mgbi ani oka li Otsani, ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.>>
JOH 8:19 A si byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsabu kɔ?>> IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema ye ani hona Otsani ba. Ema ki ye ani yɔ, i kika ye Otsani kpaa.>>
JOH 8:20 IYesu gbɔdzɛ ntonɛ mi onɔ ngwi o le tsungwɔ mi akangga ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin kwɛkwɛ yi imbe ngwi a li kye umba wokɛ nani. Nghaduu inggisɛ onyi bwan ba, ikyekyɛ onɔ mgban gyɔ waba.
JOH 8:21 Akpe oka nɛ, iYesu di nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani le lu, ma ema ka pita ani, i dika kwulu mi alobube mgbi ema. Imbe ngwi ani le lu ma, ema ka yagba kɛ ba.>>
JOH 8:22 Odzɛ nɛ nu emi iJuda ntona byita gbɛɛ, <<O ka ngwɔ ewoon? Li ungwɔ ma ngwi o gbɛɛ, <Imbe ngwi ani le lu ma ema ka ba gbɛ ba daa>?>>
JOH 8:23 Nghaduu iYesu kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<Ema kyɛ mi esɛ; ani kyɛ mi esho. Ema li emi ɛsɛ nɛni; ani li emi ɛsɛ nɛ ba.
JOH 8:24 Ani teyi nya ema gbɛɛ ema ka kwulu mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema; kini ema noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ ani li ongwu ani gbɛɛ ani dzɛ ma bayɔ, ema ka kwulu otsitsi mi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema.>>
JOH 8:25 A byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu li emɛ?>> IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani li itɔ inggisɛ ngwu ani teyi nya ema gbɛɛ ani dzɛ mani.
JOH 8:26 Ani dzɛ yi odzɛ kpakpa ofwo ema ikwɔ mi ele. Kpaa ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma li otsitsi, odzɛ ngwi ani fwo mbon ma n li kye nya ɛsɛ.>>
JOH 8:27 A yagba difwi gbɛɛ o le nya ma odzɛ mgbi Otsɔn ba.
JOH 8:28 Nghanɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ ngwi ema kyile Ongwɛ Inggisɛ desho mata, ema ka ye gbɛɛ Ani li inggisɛ ngwu ani tso gbɛɛ di Ani dzɛ mani. Ani dika kyɔ unkonyi mgbi ikyibani ba kpaa Ani li gbɔ ungwɔ ngwi Otsani tso Ani ma yɛyɛ.
JOH 8:29 Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma dzɛ yi ani; o dzata ani yuen ba, ikyesinɛ Ani li kyungwɔ nli kpan alonɔ duu.>>
JOH 8:30 Ngwi o gbɔ elodzɛ ntonɛnɛ, inggisɛ kwuba nun oyɛyɛ.
JOH 8:31 Mbi emi iJuda ama nnun oyɛyɛ ma, iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ni ema kwudzɛ mi otsootso mgbi ani yɔ, ema li ama okyɛdɔ ani yɛyɛ.
JOH 8:32 Ema ka ye otsitsi, ta otsitsi ka shɛ ema adi ta.>>
JOH 8:33 A nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi li etɔ mgbi Abrahan, eyi li ofyɛɛ mgbi inggisɛ onyi ye ba. Kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu dika gbɛɛ a ka shɛ eyi adi ta?>>
JOH 8:34 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, inggisɛ nle kyɔ alobube tayɔ li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube.
JOH 8:35 Ofyɛɛ dzɛ yi imbe igyegwu mi etɔ ba, kpaa ongwɛ li mgbi etɔ gyegwu.
JOH 8:36 Nghanɛ ni ongwɛ shɛ ema adi ta yɔ, ema ka shɛta otsitsi.
JOH 8:37 Ani ye ema li etɔ mgbi Abrahan. Nghaduu ema wewo ongwɔ ani, ikyekyɛ elodzɛ mgbi ani wodzɛ itukwu mbi ema ba.
JOH 8:38 Ani le nya ema ungwɔ ngwi ani di mi inai Otsani, ema di li kyungwɔ ngwi ema fwo mbi otsema mani.>>
JOH 8:39 A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abrahan li otseyi.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ni ema ki li emi ongwɛ Abrahan yɔ, ema kile kyungwɔ ngwi Abrahan kyɔ mani.
JOH 8:40 Ngwi i dzɛ nɛ, ema weka ongwɔ ani, ikyegbɛɛ ani nya ema otsitsi ngwi ani fwo mbi Imgbasho mani. Abrahan kyɔ itɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ ba.
JOH 8:41 Ema le kyungwɔ ama ngwi otsema teyi kyɔn mani.>> A gbɛɛ, <<Eyi li ofyɛɛ ba. Otsɔ ngwi eyi dzɛyan li Imgbasho abuon.>>
