JOH 8:42 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ni Imgbasho ki li Otsema yɔ, ani kika kpema itukwu, ikyesinɛ ani kyɛ mbi Imgbasho badzɛ mmɛnɛ onɛnɛ aani. Ani ba mgbi ikyibani ba; kpaa li ongwu dɔ ani esɔ.
JOH 8:43 Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le difwi odzɛ ngwi ani le gbɔ ba? Li ikyegbɛɛ ema le gbela odzɛ ngwi ani le gbɔ ba mani.
JOH 8:44 Ema li mgbi otsema, Olodu, di mina ema okyɔ oweka mgbi otsema. O li inggisɛ ogbɔngwɔ inggisɛ mi owita-wita ma jo, o kwudzɛ mi otsitsi ba, bana otsitsi dzɛ mbon ma ba. Mi onɔ ngwi o mwonya ma, o li gbɔdzɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgban, bana o li inggisɛ omwonya di li otsɛ mgbi onya omwaamwa.
JOH 8:45 Nghaduu ikyegbɛɛ ani nya ema otsitsi nɛ, ema nu ani oyɛyɛ ba!
JOH 8:46 Inggisɛ mgbi ema onyi ka yagba tso abɔ mi obube mgbi ani wɛ? Ni ani le nya ema otsitsi ma, i kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema nu ani oyɛyɛ ba?
JOH 8:47 Ongwu nli mgbi Imgbasho li fwon. Itɔdzɛ ngwi ema li fwo ba ma li ikyegbɛɛ ema li mgbi Imgbasho ba.>>
JOH 8:48 A byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Eyi gbɔ ayin mi ogbɛɛ abu li inggisɛ iSamaria esɛ di dɔ abu ikye ba naadi?>>
JOH 8:49 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Esɛ dɔ ani ikye ba, kpaa Ani nu Otsani mmwɛ nghaduu ema nu ani mmwɛ ba.
JOH 8:50 Ani le pita okwɔkwɔ mi ikye ewen ba; kpaa inggisɛ dzɛma ngwu pitan, di li ongwu li ongye ogbiikwɔ aali.
JOH 8:51 N nya ema otsitsi, kini inggisɛ ngyo elodzɛ mgbi ani yɔ, o ka di ikwongye inɛ ba.>>
JOH 8:52 Mi ikye odzɛ nɛ emi iJuda ntonɛ kwulu ela gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ eyi ye gbɛɛ esɛ dɔ abu ikye otsitsi! Abrahan kwulu, li ngha ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ kpaa kwulu aali, nghaduu abu gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ ngyo elodzɛ mgbi abu yɔ, o ka di ikwongye inɛ ba.
JOH 8:53 Abu shewo ngha otseyi Abrahan? O kwulu, li ngha ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ kpaa kwulu aali. Abu tsɛwɛ di abu li emɛ?>>
JOH 8:54 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ni Ani nu ewani okwɔkwɔ yɔ, okwɔkwɔ mgbi ani na wuuta ba. Otsani, ongwu ema li gbɛɛ o li Imgbasho mgbi ema na, li ongwu nu ani okwɔkwɔ aali.
JOH 8:55 Ema yen ba, kpaa Ani yen. Kini Ani gbɛɛ di Ani yen bayɔ, n ka li inggisɛ omwonya dafi ema mani, nghaduu Ani yen di ngyo elodzɛ mgban.
JOH 8:56 Otsema Abrahan dzɛ yi atsa mi ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ odi egbe obaaba mgbi ani; o di egbe na diyɛ dzɛ yi atsa.>>
JOH 8:57 Emi iJuda ntona nyan gbɛɛ, <<Abu mɛ onova ngwusefa dɔn iwyo kpaa waba, ta abu di Abrahan ye!>>
JOH 8:58 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Duuse nu ma mba Abrahan yɔ, ani plɛ dzɛ!>>
JOH 8:59 Mi itɔdzɛ nɛ, a sa akwutsɛ gbɛɛ a ka tsan, kpaa iYesu kye ewon da, wulɛ tasɛ dzata ikpɛsɛ mgbi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nani.
JOH 9:1 Dafi iYesu kyikyɛ le kɛ nɛta, o di ongyulɔ ongwu nbinɛ kyɛ ifu.
JOH 9:2 Engwafɔɔn byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li emɛ kyɔ obube, inggisɛ nɛ naadi ama omban, ngwi a mban binɛ kyɛ ifu?>>
JOH 9:3 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li inggisɛ nɛ naadi ama omban kyɔ obube ba, kpaa ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ikyegbɛɛ idɔ mgbi Imgbasho no tso ambɛ mi oshishe mgban.
JOH 9:4 Dafi onɔ ka desho nɛ, li kyɛmɛ ngwi eyi ka kyidɔ mgbi Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ nani. Otu kyɛma, ngwi inggisɛ onyi ka kyidɔ wuba.
JOH 9:5 Ngwi Ani ka dzɛ ɛsɛ nɛ nɛ, Ani li osa mgbi ɛsɛ.>>
JOH 9:6 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngha nɛ, o kyanggwɔ tokɛsɛ, o bwili ekyɛ mi anggwɔ si kye gyuwo ongyulɔ na inɛ.
JOH 9:7 O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Lu, ka ngwunɛ mi uta mgbi iSilon>> (ita iyi nɛ gbɛɛ deesɔ). Nɛta ongyulɔ na lu ka ngwunɛ, si yɛ luba udɛ le dinɛ.
JOH 9:8 Ama nwatse udɛ dɔn bɛyi ama nteyi li din le bibɔ ma byita gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ongyulɔ nli teyi sɔ le bibɔ nɛ lo?>>
JOH 9:9 Angbeka gbɔgbɛɛ, li ongwu. Angbeka gbɛɛ, <<Ei, o lun luulu ta.>> Nghaduu ongwu abuon le kali-kali gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ma aani.>>
JOH 9:10 Nɛ a byita gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛse inɛ mgbi abu kwulu?>>
JOH 9:11 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ongyulɔ ngwu a kwun di iYesu na bwili ekyɛ kye gyuwo ani inɛ. O nya ani gbɛɛ ni ani lu iSilon ka ngwunɛ. Dafi ani lu ka ngwunɛ nɛtaman, ani si dinɛ.>>
JOH 9:12 A byun gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ma kɔ?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ani ye ba.>>
JOH 9:13 A kye ongyulɔ nbinɛ na ba mbi emi iFarasi.
JOH 9:14 Egbe ngwi iYesu bwili ekyɛ kwulu ongyulɔ na inɛ ma, li egbe otonyewo.
JOH 9:15 Nghanɛ emi iFarasi kpaa di byun ita dafi i kyɔ se ngwi inɛ mgban kwulu mani. Inggisɛ na nu uka gbɛɛ, <<O bwili ekyɛ kye gyuwo ani inɛ, ani ka ngwunɛ taman n sile di aani.>>
JOH 9:16 Emi iFarasi angbeka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi Imgbasho ba, bana o wɛ egbe otonyewo ba.>> Nghaduu angbeka byita gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛse inggisɛ alobube ka kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo ngha?>> Ikyenghanɛ a si gheefa.
JOH 9:17 Mi ongyɛɛngyɛ ma a diyɛ kyata byi inggisɛ obinɛ na gbɛɛ, <<Abu ma, o gbɔsinɛ ikpewon? Li inɛ mgbi abu ngwi o kwulu.>> Inggisɛ na nu uka gbɛɛ, <<O li oyegbɔ.>>
JOH 9:18 Emi iJuda noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ di inggisɛ na teyi binɛ se inɛ wa kwulu lon ba, mbise ngwi a dɛsɔ mbi ama omban.
JOH 9:19 A byita gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ongwɛ emaa? Li ongwu ema gbɛɛ di a mban binɛ kyɛ ifu ma dɛɛn? Kyɔnɛse ngwi o le di onɛnɛ?>>
JOH 9:20 Ama omban nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ye o li ongwɛ eyi, eyi di ye o binɛ kyɛ ifu.
JOH 9:21 Nghaduu eyi ye dafi i kyɔ se o le dinɛ onɛnɛ ba, naadi eyi ye inggisɛ nkwulun inɛ ba. Byun na. O li ongbɛ wuba; o ka gbɔdzɛ ikye ewon.>>
JOH 9:22 Ama omban gbɔdzɛ nɛ ikyekyɛ a le mio emi iJuda, bana emi iJuda teyi bwalu ondu gbɛɛ inggisɛ ta nnoyɛyɛ gbɛɛ iYesu li iKrestu yɔ, a ka dulun tɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda.
JOH 9:23 Li ikyengha ngwi ama omban gbɔgbɛɛ, <<O li ongbɛ wuba; byun na aali.>>
JOH 9:24 Akpe ongwu fan, a kwu inggisɛ nteyi binɛ kyɛ ifu na ela. A gbɛɛ, <<Kye oshewo nu Imgbasho, eyi ye inggisɛ nɛ li inggisɛ alobube.>>
JOH 9:25 O si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Kini o li inggisɛ alobube hona o li inggisɛ alobube ba kpaa, ani ye ba. Ungwɔ onyi ngwi ani ye yɔ. Ani teyi binɛ, kpaa onɛnɛ ani le di!>>
JOH 9:26 Nghanɛ a byun gbɛɛ, <<O kyɔsinɛ yi abu? O kwulu abu inɛ sinɛ?>>
JOH 9:27 O gbɛɛ, <<Ani teyi nya ema kpaa ema gadɔ ba. Li alungwɔ mina ema odi fwo? Ema mina oyɛɛ engwafɔɔn naadi?>>
JOH 9:28 Ta a wulun ito di gbɛɛ, <<Abu li ongwafɔ mgbi inggisɛ nɛni! Eyi yɔ, eyi li engwafɔ mgbi iMose!
JOH 9:29 Eyi ye gbɛɛ Imgbasho gbɔdzɛ yi iMose, kpaa inggisɛ nɛ yɔ, eyi yama ye imbe ngwi o tɔkyɛ kpaa ba.>>
JOH 9:30 Ongyulɔ na nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔnɛ li ungwɔ okwulewo! Dafi ema ye imbe ngwi o tɔkyɛ ba, kpaa o kwulu ani inɛ nɛni.
JOH 9:31 Eyi ye dafi Imgbasho li fwo odzɛ mgbi emi ali ibwubwe ba mani. O li fwo odzɛ mgbi inggisɛ oyɛyɛ ongwu nle kyɔ oweka mgban.
JOH 9:32 Kyɛ onɔ ngwi a ta ɛsɛ nghataa ba onɛnɛni, inggisɛ onyi kpaa fwo gbɛɛ a kwulu inggisɛ ongwu nbinɛ kyɛ ifu inɛ ye ba.
JOH 9:33 Ongyulɔ nɛ ki kyɛ mbi Imgbasho bayɔ, o ki kyɔ unkonyi gbɛ ba.>>
JOH 9:34 Mi elodzɛ nɛ a nu uka gbɛɛ, <<A mba abu yi alobube kyɛ ifu; kyɔnɛse ngwi abu le tso eyi!>> Man a tsamun tasɛ.
JOH 9:35 IYesu si fwo dafi a tsamun tasɛ mani, ngwi o wa tun nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Abu noyɛyɛ mbi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ joo?>>
JOH 9:36 Ongyulɔ na byita gbɛɛ, <<O li emɛ, ongyukwo? Nya ani zukwu ni ani wa nun oyɛyɛ.>>
JOH 9:37 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ abu din; mi otsitsi, li ongwu nle gbɔdzɛ yi abu nɛni.>>
JOH 9:38 Ongyulɔ na gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ani noyɛyɛ,>> man o sunun.
JOH 9:39 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani ba ɛsɛ nɛ ikye ikwɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ, ikyegbɛɛ obinɛ non di, ama ntole di ma nu ma yɛɛ obinɛ.>>
JOH 9:40 Emi iFarasi angbeka nto yan ma fwon le gbɔ ngha nɛta, a byun gbɛɛ, <<Ekyɛgbɔɔ? Eyi kpaa binɛɛ?>>
JOH 9:41 Nɛ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Kini ema li obinɛ yɔ, ema ki gye obube mi alobube ba; kpaa onɛnɛ ngwi ema le tso gbɛɛ ema le dinɛ nɛ, alobube mgbi ema ka dzɛ yi ema.
JOH 10:1 <<Mi otsitsi-otsitsi yɔ, n le nya ema, inggisɛ ongwu nkaka mi onufoka mgbi ifatoba mmala ba, kpaa ka tɔ kaka mi ofɛ angbeka yɔ, o li emumyi bɛyi inggisɛ ofofɛ.
JOH 10:2 Nghaduu inggisɛ nkaka mi onufɛ li inggisɛ ongyo mmala.
JOH 10:3 Inggisɛ ongyoongyo li kwulu onufoka, mmala li fwo ela mgban. O li kwu mmala mgban ela mi iyi, di li gbe ma tasɛ.
JOH 10:4 Mi onɔ ngwi o gbe ama nli mgban tsatsa tasɛ ma, o li teyi ofɛ, man mmala mgban di li kyɛdɔn, ikyekyɛ a ye ela mgban.
JOH 10:5 Kpaa a ka yama kyɛdɔ ingyoga ba; otsitsi, a ka tsinyan ikyesinɛ a yagba difwi ela mgbi ingyoga ba.>>
JOH 10:6 IYesu gbɔ itaodzɛ nɛni, kpaa ungwɔ ngwi o le nya ma gbosa lo ma ba.
JOH 10:7 Nghanɛ iYesu diyɛ gbɔgbɛɛ, <<N le nya ema otsitsi, ani li onufoka mgbi mmala.
JOH 10:8 Ama nteyi ani ba duu li emumyi bɛyi ama ofofɛ, nghaduu mmala fwo ma ba.
JOH 10:9 Ani li onufɛ; ali inggisɛ nkaka nyɛ mbi ani yɔ, o ka watɔ. O ka kaka tasɛ, di tu ungwogye.
JOH 10:10 Emumyi li ba ikye owa yi di ngwɔ diyɛ dzili; ani ba gbɛɛ nu ma tu oshishe, di tuun dzii.
JOH 10:11 <<Ani li inggisɛ ongyo mmala osuse mani. Inggisɛ ongyo mmala osuse li kye oshishe mgban lasɛ ikye mmala mgban.
JOH 10:12 Inggisɛ ngwu a kyon idɔ ongyo mmala yɔ, mmala li mgban ba. Nghanɛ onɔ ngwi o di idukwlɛbɛ kyɛ le ba ma, o li dzata mmala ntona tsinya lu. Ta idukwlɛbɛ li ba wa kwu mmala di ganya ma.
JOH 10:13 Inggisɛ na tsinya ikyekyɛ o li inggisɛ ngwu a kyen kyeekye idɔ ta unkonyi won yi mmala ntona ba.
JOH 10:14 <<Ani li inggisɛ ongyo ifyungwɔ osuse; ani ye mmala mgbi ani, mmala mgbi ani kpaa ye ani.
JOH 10:15 Dafi Otsani ye Ani, Ani kpaa di ye Otsani mani, Ani di kye oshishe mgbi Ani nu mi ikye mmala.
JOH 10:16 Ani dzɛ yi mmala angbeka ama nwoto ifatoba yi ama ntonɛ ba. Ama kpaa li kyɛmɛ ngwi ani ka gbe ma ba. Ama kpaa ka fwo ela mgbi ani dika yɛɛ obyi ifyungwɔ onyi yi inggisɛ ongyo ifyungwɔ onyi.
JOH 10:17 Itɔdzɛ ngwi Ani kpa Otsani itukwu yɔ, li ikyegbɛɛ Ani kye oshishe mgbi Ani nu, ikye odi yidɔ kyi kyelu.
JOH 10:18 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka yagba gbɛ Ani oshishe ba, Ani ka kye nu abuani. Ani dzɛ yi mfye okye nu di dzɛ yi mfye okyi kyelu. Ola nɛ Ani gbɛ mbi Otsani.>>
JOH 10:19 Mi ikye elodzɛ ntonɛ, emi iJuda di dzɛ yi ogbua-gbua yi ewoma.
JOH 10:20 Ama kwuba gbɛɛ, <<Esɛ dɔn ikye o dile wede. Kyɔnɛ ngwi eyi le gadɔ mbon?>>
JOH 10:21 Nghaduu angbeka gbɛɛ, <<Elodzɛ ntonɛ li mgbi inggisɛ ngwu esɛ dɔn ikye ba. Emɛsɛ ka yagba kwulu obinɛ inɛ gbɛɛ?>>
JOH 10:22 Li onɔ oga owɛ-wɛ mgbi okye ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin dubɔ Imgbasho. Li mi onɔ ofu,
JOH 10:23 nɛ iYesu le kyikyɛ mi akangga ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, mi iwulu onufozu mgbi iSolomu nani.
JOH 10:24 Emi iJuda kwakye kpakɛkɛ won, le gbɛɛ, <<Ka kye onɔ sinɛ ngwi abu kale tsili-tsili eyi ngha? Kini abu li iKrestu ma yɔ, nya eyi mi ododa.>>
JOH 10:25 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani nya ema, kpaa ema noyɛyɛ ba. Ungwɔ ama okwulewo ngwi Ani kyɔ mi iyi mgbi Otsani nɛ, gbɔ odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ani,
JOH 10:26 nghaduu ema noyɛyɛ ba ikyekyɛ ema li mmala mgbi ani ba.
JOH 10:27 Mmala mgbi ani li fwo ela mgbi ani; ani ye ma, a di li kyɛdɔ ani.
JOH 10:28 Ani nu ma oshishe gyegwu, a dika dzili wuba; inggisɛ onyi kpaa dika lafwa ma mi abɔ mgbi ani ba.
JOH 10:29 Otsani, nkye ma dɔ ani ubɔ ma, shewo ngha ali inggisɛ duu; inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka lafwa ma mi abɔ mgbi Otsani ba.
JOH 10:30 Ani yi Otsani eyi li onyi.>>
JOH 10:31 Emi iJuda di kye akwutsɛ gbɛɛ a ka tsan,
JOH 10:32 nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani tso ema ungwɔ okwulewo ama nshewo kwuba mbi Otsani. Li ikye ole mi efu ngwi ema ka tsɛ ani akwutsɛ?>>
JOH 10:33 Emi iJuda gbɛɛ, <<Eyi le tsɛ abu akwutsɛ mi ikye ungwɔ ntonɛ onyi kpaa ba, li mi ikye ito ofya Imgbasho, ikyesinɛ abu nli inggisɛ owamyɛ nɛ, le tso gbɛɛ abu li Imgbasho.>>
JOH 10:34 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<A lɔ mi ola mgbi ema gbɛɛ, <Ani gbɛɛ ema li emi imgbasho baa>?
JOH 10:35 Ki non kwu ma di emi imgbasho ma, li mbi ele ngwi elodzɛ Imgbasho ba, ngwi Afɛ ka yagba nyinɛ ba.
JOH 10:36 Ongwu Otsɔn dulu-dulu dafi li mgban abuon di kye dɛsɔ ba ɛsɛ nɛ mayɛ? Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema dulu ongwufabɔ mbi Ani gbɛɛ Ani le fyito ikyekyɛ ani gbɛɛ, <Ani li Ongwɛ Imgbasho>?
JOH 10:37 Ni Ani le kyidɔ mgbi Otsani bayɔ, ka nu ani oyɛyɛ ba na.
JOH 10:38 Kpaa ni ani le kyɔ yɔ, ni ema nu ani oyɛyɛ ba kpaa, nu idɔ okwulewo ntona oyɛyɛ na, ikye ni ema ye diyɛ difwi dafi Otsani dzɛ mbi ani, ani kpaa di dzɛ mbi Otsani mani.>>
JOH 10:39 A di fya obwan, nghaduu o dzidzɛ tɔ mi abɔ ma lu.
JOH 10:40 Ta iYesu yidɔ foyombo iJodan lu imbe ngwi iJɔn teyi le kyɔ iBatisima ababɔ mani. O ka dzɛkɛ ele.
JOH 10:41 Inggisɛ di ba mbon kpakpa. A gbɛɛ, <<iJɔn kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo onyi ba, kpaa alungwɔ ngwi iJɔn gbɔ mi ikye ongyulɔ nɛ duu li otsitsi.>>
JOH 10:42 Inggisɛ kwuba si nu iYesu oyɛyɛ mi imbe nani.
JOH 11:1 Onɛnɛ inggisɛ ngwu a li kwun di iLadzaru dotse. O kyɛ mi iBetani, mi agwɔ mgbi iMeri bɛyi ongwunɔn iMata.
JOH 11:2 IMeri nɛ, li ongwu ongwunɔn iLadzaru onɛnɛ ladzɛ esɛ mi ootse aani, di li ongwu kpɔɔ ka wa kye engyie ogbungbɛ kyi iYesu afɔ di kye fɔlu mi otu mgban.
JOH 11:3 Nghanɛ emi ongwunɔn engyaa deesɔ mbi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ongwu nkpaabu itukwu na dotse.>>
JOH 11:4 Mi onɔ ngwi iYesu fwo ungwɔnɛ mata, o gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ootse nɛ ka ngyɛ mi ikwongye ba. Ei, li mi ikye okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho adzi ni Ongwɛ Imgbasho tu okwɔkwɔ mi ele.>>
JOH 11:5 IYesu di iMata yi ongwunɔn ongwu ongyaa bɛyi iLadzaru kpan itukwu.
JOH 11:6 Nghaduu, ngwi o fwo gbɛɛ iLadzaru dotse nɛ, o diyɛ dzɛ imbe ngwi o dzɛ na egbe efa kpɔɔ.
JOH 11:7 Ta o nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Yidɔ kɛ iJudia na.>>
JOH 11:8 A gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse, li enggeengga ngwi emi iJuda fya otsɛ abu akwutsɛ, nghanɛ abu diyɛ le kɛ imbe naa?>>
JOH 11:9 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Obyi li iwyodefa mi egbe baa? Inggisɛ nkyikyɛ mi onɔ ka tsiishi ba, ikyekyɛ o li di osa ongwi ɛsɛ nɛni.
JOH 11:10 Li mi onɔ ngwi o kyikyɛ mi otu mata ngwi o li tsiishi, ikyekyɛ osa dzɛ ba.>>
JOH 11:11 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ nyɛ nɛ, o kiyayi onya ma gbɛɛ, <<Okeyi iLadzaru nuna, kpaa n le kɛ ele oka kyilen una.>>
JOH 11:12 Engwafɔɔn nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ki non nuna yɔ, o ka tu iyu.>>
JOH 11:13 IYesu le gbɔdzɛ ikwu mgbi iLadzaru, kpaa engwafɔɔn tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o le gbɔdzɛ una onana mgbi atta nɛni.
JOH 11:14 Nɛta o si nya ma mi ododa gbɛɛ, <<ILadzaru kwulu,
JOH 11:15 ma mi ikye mgbi ema yɔ, ani dzɛ yi atsa dafi ngwi ani dzɛ ele ba mani, ikyegbɛɛ ni ema noyɛyɛ. Nghaduu i kɛ ka din na.>>
JOH 11:16 Nɛ iTɔmɔsu (ngwu a li kwun gbɛɛ ongwɛ efa na), nya engwafɔ mgbi iYesu angbeka ntona gbɛɛ, <<Ba ni eyi kpaa kɛ na, adzi ni eyi ka kwulu biyan.>>
JOH 11:17 IYesu ka kaka, dafi a kye iLadzaru ndzi mɛ egbe enɛ wa.
JOH 11:18 Okyɛɛ mi iJerosalin ba iBetani sisi gwee omɛ imai efa,
JOH 11:19 emi iJuda kwuba di ba mbi iMata yi iMeri owa gyila ma mi ikwu ongwunɔ ma.
JOH 11:20 Ngwi iMata fwo dafi iYesu kyɛ nɛta, o tasɛ oka kpatsan, nghaduu iMeri tila dzɛ udɛ.
JOH 11:21 IMata nya iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ni abu ki dzɛ mmɛnɛ yɔ, ongwunani ki kwulu ba.
JOH 11:22 Nghaduu ani ye gbɛɛ mi onɛnɛ kpaa Imgbasho ka kyɔ abu alungwɔ ngwi abu bɔ duu.>>
JOH 11:23 IYesu si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ongwunabu ka yɛ kyɛɛ.>>
JOH 11:24 IMata gbɛɛ, <<Ani ye o ka yɛ kyɛɛ mi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ mani.>>
JOH 11:25 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani li okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu bɛyi oshishe. Inggisɛ nnu ani oyɛyɛ yɔ, o ka dzɛ oshishe, yeba non kwulu kpaa;
JOH 11:26 ma inggisɛ ta ndzɛ oshishe di nu ani oyɛyɛ ka kwulu ba. Abu noyɛyɛ mi odzɛ nɛ wɛ?>>
JOH 11:27 IMata nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, Otsɛ, ani noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ abu li iMedzaya, Ongwɛ Imgbasho, ongwu nka ba ɛsɛ nɛ mani.>>
JOH 11:28 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ nyɛ mata, o yidɔ kwu ongwunɔn iMeri ela kɛ enggengga gbɛɛ, <<Otsetse dzɛ mmɛnɛni, o le pita abu.>>
JOH 11:29 Ngwi iMeri fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, o kyato vla kɛ mbi iYesu.
JOH 11:30 Mi onɔ na iYesu kaka ogalu na waba, kpaa o ka dzɛ imbe ngwi iMata ka tun nani.
JOH 11:31 Ngwi emi iJuda ama nbato yi iMeri mi udɛ, le gyilan na, di dafi o kyato vla tasɛ nɛta, a si kyɛdɔn, tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o le lu endzi ka tsukwu mi ele.
JOH 11:32 Ngwi iMeri ka to imbe ngwi iYesu dzɛ di din mata, o gbɛsɛ lankɛ iyayi di gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ni abu ki dzɛ mmɛnɛ yɔ, ongwunani ki kwulu ba.>>
JOH 11:33 Ngwi iYesu din le tsukwu, yi emi iJuda ama nbato yan ntona kpaa tole tsukwu nɛ, itukwu mu lon mi onodzi i di kakan ewo.
JOH 11:34 O byita gbɛɛ, <<Ema kyon da mi ole?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Ba wa di, Otsɛ.>>
JOH 11:35 IYesu tsukwu.
JOH 11:36 Ta emi iJuda gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Di dafi o kpan itukwu maa!>>
JOH 11:37 Nghaduu angbeka mi efu gbɛɛ, <<Ongwu nkwulu obinɛ inɛ nɛ kyɔnɛ ngwi o kyi ndɛlu ikwu inggisɛ nɛ wuba?>>
JOH 11:38 Dafi itukwu nghao fu-fu lo iYesu nɛ, o kɛ endzi. Li endzi olo ngwi a di kye ikwutsɛ tukwu ondufan.
JOH 11:39 O gbɛɛ, <<Mulu ikwutsɛ nɛni.>> IMata, ongwu ongwunɔn kwulu na gbɛɛ, <<Kpaa, Otsɛ, mi onɛnɛ o ka li odikyi, lubana o la endzi egbe enɛ waani.>>
JOH 11:40 Nɛta iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ani teyi nya abu gbɛɛ kini abu noyɛyɛ yɔ, abu ka di okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho baa?>>
JOH 11:41 Ta a kyi mulu ikwutsɛ nani. Nɛ iYesu kyile inɛ esho, si gbɛɛ, <<Otsani, Ani ta abu angba dafi abu fwo (ibɔ mgbi) ani wa mani.
JOH 11:42 Ani ye dafi abu li fwo (ibɔ mgbi) Ani alonɔ mani, kpaa n le gbɔdzɛ nɛ mi ikye abɔ oyaaya mgbi inggisɛ ama nkwudzɛ to mmɛnɛ nɛni, ikye nu ma noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ di abu dɔ ani esɔ.>>
JOH 11:43 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, iYesu kwu ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<ILadzaru, tasɛ!>>
JOH 11:44 Inggisɛ ikwukwɔ na si tasɛ, yi ayangwuto ngwi a kye ndiwon afɔ yi abɔ, yi ongwi a kye bwan inɛ mani. Man iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Shɛlun angwuto ikwɔ na non lu.>>
JOH 11:45 Nɛ emi iJuda ibyibyi ama nba angba ikwu mbi iMeri, di ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ nɛtaman, a nun oyɛyɛ.
JOH 11:46 Nghaduu angbeka mi efu lu mbi emi iFarasi ka dakwɔ ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ mani.
JOH 11:47 Nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ama ofifɛ bɛyi emi iFarasi kwu ela okwakye mgbi osɔɔsɔ mgbi ama ogbiikwɔ. A byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi eyi ka kyɔ? Inggisɛ nɛ le kyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo kwuba.
JOH 11:48 Kini eyi dzatan le kiyayi ngha yɔ, ali inggisɛ duu ka wa nun oyɛyɛ, nghanɛ emi iRoma ka ba wa kyi gbɛlu imbe mgbi eyi bɛyi ɛsɛ mgbi eyi kpaa.>>
JOH 11:49 Ta onyi mi ifu ma, iyin di iKayafa, ongwu li okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mi onova nani, nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema ye unkonyi ba duu!
JOH 11:50 Ema yama difwi gbɛɛ i tatase ni inggisɛ onyi kwulu mi ikye ibyi inggisɛ ngha ogbɛɛ ni ɛsɛ mgbi eyi duu dzili ba.>>
JOH 11:51 Li mi owitukwu mgban ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ ba, kpaa li dafi o li okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mi onova na mani, o gbɔ ela oyegbɔ gbɛɛ iYesu ka kwulu mi ikye ɛsɛ mgbi iJuda duu,
JOH 11:52 dika li ikye mgbi ɛsɛ na ta ba kpaa ka li mi ikye engwɛ mgbi Imgbasho ama nganya ntona mi oyile ma luba mbonyi di nu ma yɛɛ onyi.
JOH 11:53 Nɛ i wita mi egbe na lu iyayi, a wibu ongwɔ iYesu.
JOH 11:54 Nghanɛ iYesu di kyikyɛ mi ododa mi idzidzɛ emi iJuda wuba. Kpaa o lu ayɛsɛ ndzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi okwɛsɛ, mi agwɔ ngwi a li kwun di iFrɛn nani, ka dzɛ efu yi engwafɔɔn.
JOH 11:55 Ngwi onɔ oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda dzɛ kwɛkwɛ nɛ, inggisɛ kwuba le lu iJerosalin ikye oka fwɔ ewo duuse ni oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ wa gyɔ.
JOH 11:56 A kale pita iYesu, dafi a kwudzɛ to mi akangga ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin nɛ, a le byi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Ema le tsɛwɛ sinɛ? O ka ba Oga nɛ ba naadi?>>
JOH 11:57 Nghaduu engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi emi iFarasi teyi noola gbɛɛ kini inggisɛ ye imbe ngwi iYesu dzɛ yɔ, non gbɔ adzi nu ma ka bwan.
JOH 12:1 Ngwi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda sisi egbe egyin nɛ, iYesu si kaka iBetani, imbe ngwi iLadzaru ongwu iYesu kyilon mi ikwu dzɛ nani.
JOH 12:2 A kyɔ oga ongwi onɔdɛ ikye mmwɛ mgbi iYesu mi imbe nani. IMata gbe oga nu, iLadzaru kpaa sɔdzɛ adinyatsɛ ogye ungwogye yi iYesu.
JOH 12:3 Nɛ iMeri kyi kyelu ikpen engyie olɔlɔ ongwi fyunfyummya saan kye tulu kyi iYesu afɔ. Di kyi fɔlu yi otu mgban, man mmgbɛ mgbi engyie na kyi gbɛlu ozu sɔ.
JOH 12:4 Kpaa engwafɔ mgbi iYesu onyi, iJuda Iskarɔti ongwu nka wa kyon gya ma byita gbɛɛ,
JOH 12:5 <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi a kye engyie nɛ gya kye awuya na gha emi adzɛ ba? I mɛ udza okpa idɔ onova olɔlɔ.>>
JOH 12:6 O gbɔdzɛ nɛ ikyegbɛɛ di o kye emi adzɛ wuuta ba, kpaa li ikyegbɛɛ o li emumyi; ngwi o li inggisɛ okye ashiko da nɛ, o li ya ewon abɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi a kye wokɛ ele mani.
JOH 12:7 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Dzanta kɛ. O kye engyie nɛ dzɛkɛ mi ikye egbe owa ndzi ani.
JOH 12:8 Ema ka dzɛ yi emi adzɛ mi idzidzɛ ema alonɔ duu, kpaa ema ka dzɛ yi ani alonɔ ba.>>
JOH 12:9 Ibyi inggisɛ emi iJuda difwi gbɛɛ iYesu dzɛ imbe nani man a ba, mi ikyon ta ba kpaa owa di iLadzaru, ongwu iYesu kyilon mi ikwongye nani.
JOH 12:10 Nɛ engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ yi oweka okyi ngwɔlu iLadzaru kpaa,
JOH 12:11 lubana mi ikye mgbi iLadzaru emi iJuda kwuba le dzata engyukwo mgbi ama yɛ nu iYesu oyɛyɛ.
JOH 12:12 Tegblifan ibyi inggisɛ kpakpa ama nba oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda fwo gbɛɛ iYesu kye ofɛ dikye le ba iJerosalin nɛ,
JOH 12:13 a gbe abaade tasɛ oka tun, le gbaakwɔ gbɛɛ, <<Osana! Mse no bɛ Inggisɛ ngwu ba mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ ewo! Mse no bɛ Utɔ mgbi emi Israi ewo!>>
JOH 12:14 IYesu tu ongwɛ itaklimyi dɔkɛ ele, dafi a teyi lɔ mi afɛ gbɛɛ,
JOH 12:15 <<Ka mio ba na, engwengwengyaa mgbi iDzayɔn; dii, utɔ mgbi abu kyɛ aali, o dɔdzɛ ongwɛ itaklimyi.>>
JOH 12:16 Mi ababɔ ma engwafɔ mgban difwi ungwɔ ntonɛ ba. Li onɔ ngwi a nu iYesu okwɔkwɔ nyɛ ma se, a kuma difwi gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi a kyɔn ntonɛ, Afɛ plɛ lɔ dzɛ esɛ ikyon.
JOH 12:17 Ikyenghanɛ ibyi inggisɛ ama nto yan mi onɔ ngwi o kwu iLadzaru ela tasɛ mi endzi di kyilon mi ikwu ma, kiyayi okye elodzɛ na gbɔfwɛ.
JOH 12:18 Ikyegbɛɛ inggisɛ kwuba fwo ambɛ okwulewo ngwi o kyɔ nɛ, a tasɛ oka tun.
JOH 12:19 Nɛ emi iFarasi gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Dii, ungwɔnɛ le kye eyi kɛ mbeka ba. Di dafi ɛsɛ duu kyɛdɔn mani!>>
JOH 12:20 Emi iGriki angbeka kɛ oka sunu mi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda nani.
JOH 12:21 A ba mbi iFyilipi, ongwu kyɛ mi iBɛtsaida mi iGalalia na, yi imina. A gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, i mina eyi odi iYesu.>>
JOH 12:22 IFyilipi si kɛ ka nya Andru; Andru yi iFyilipi diyɛ lu ka nya iYesu.
JOH 12:23 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Obyi ngwi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ ka gbɛ okwɔkwɔ ma gyɔ wa.
JOH 12:24 N nya ema otsitsi, ni inɛnekwu ngwuta lakɛ esɛ ma ni i bwa bayɔ, ka li inɛnɛ onyi kpɔɔ; kpaa non bwa yɔ, ka mba kwuba.
JOH 12:25 Inggisɛ ndi oshishe mgban kpan itukwu yɔ, oshishe na ka nyanya lon, kpaa ongwu ndi oshishe mgban tan anyi mi ɛsɛ nɛ yɔ, ka kyon kaka oshishe ogyegwu.
JOH 12:26 Ali inggisɛ nkyɔ ani idɔ ka kyɛdɔ ani kyɛmɛ; imbe ngwi ani dzɛ ma, ongbidɔ mgbi ani kpaa ka dzɛ ele. Otsani ka nu ongwu nli kyɔ ani idɔ ma mmwɛ.
JOH 12:27 <<Onɛnɛ itukwu mgbi Ani dzɛ mi okakewo, ma li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka gbɔ? Nin gbɛɛ, <Otsani, dulu Ani tɔ mi obyi nɛɛ>? Ei, li mi itɔdzɛ nɛ yɛyɛ ngwi Ani kaka obyi nɛ aani.
JOH 12:28 Otsani, kye okwɔkwɔ nu iyi mgbi abu!>> Ta ela tɔ mi esho gbɛɛ, <<N kye okwɔkwɔ nu mi ele wa, ma n dika nun okwɔkwɔ kpɔɔ.>>
JOH 12:29 Ibyi inggisɛ ama nto mmana ma fwo ungwɔ na di gbɛɛ akpala gbo; angbeka gbɛɛ ongyesɔ gbɔdzɛ yan.
JOH 12:30 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ela nɛ ba mi ikye mgbi ani ba, kpaa li mi ikye oyabɔ mgbi ema.
JOH 12:31 Onɛnɛ li onɔ ngwi a ka gbɔ ɛsɛ nɛ ikwɔ, li onɛnɛ ngwi a ka lɔ ongwuutɔ ongwu ɛsɛ nɛ onya tɔ.
JOH 12:32 Nghaduu Ani, onɔ ngwi a wa kyile Ani esho mi ɛsɛ nɛ yɔ, N ka kwo inggisɛ duu ba mbi ani.>>
JOH 12:33 O gbɔ ungwɔnɛ ikye otso itɔ ikwu ngwi ongwu ka wa kwu mani.
JOH 12:34 Ibyi inggisɛ gbɛɛ, <<Eyi fwo mi Afɛ gbɛɛ iMedzaya ma ka dzɛ gyegwu, ma kyɔnɛ ngwi abu ka gbɛɛ, <A ka kye Ongwɛ Inggisɛ lu esho kyɛmɛ>? Li emɛ li Ongwɛ Inggisɛ nɛ?>>
JOH 12:35 IYesu si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema ka wa tu osa mi ongwonɔ mi iyayi. Kyikyɛ mi onɔ ngwi ema ka dzɛ yi osa nɛni, duuse ni otu wa to tu ema. Inggisɛ nli kyikyɛ mi iyifu li ye imbe ngwi o le kɛ ba.
JOH 12:36 Ema noyɛyɛ mi osa ngwi ema ka dzɛyan nɛni, ikye ni ema wa yɛɛ emi ongwɛ osa.>> Ngwi o ngyɛlu odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ mata, o si lu ka da.
JOH 12:37 Ambɛ ama okwulewo ngwi iYesu kyɔ mi inai ma nɛ kpaa, a nun oyɛyɛ ba.
JOH 12:38 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ikye ombwumbwo elodzɛ mgbi oyegbɔ Adzaya ngbɛɛ: <<Otsɛ, li emɛ noyɛyɛ mi esɔ mgbi eyi, di li emɛ ngwu mfye mgbi Otsɛ tso tɔ ododa mbon?>>
JOH 12:39 Li mi itɔdzɛ nɛ ngwi a yagba noyɛyɛ ba aali, ikyena, dafi Adzaya kpaa gbɔ mbeka ma gbɛɛ:
JOH 12:40 <<O tukwu ma inɛ di nu itukwu mgbi ama tiishu, nghanɛ a ka di mi inɛ mgbi ama wuba, naadi difwi mi itukwu mgbi ama ba, hona kyatitukwu ni ani bwe ma ba.>>
JOH 12:41 Adzaya gbɔdzɛ nɛ ikyekyɛ o di okwɔkwɔ mgbi iYesu di gbɔdzɛ mi efu.
JOH 12:42 Nghaduu mi onɔ na kpɔɔ angbeka kwuba mi idzidzɛ ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi nun oyɛyɛ. Kpaa mi ikye mgbi emi iFarasi a yama gbɔ oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama tasɛ esɛ ba, ikyesinɛ a le mio gbɛɛ a wa dulu ma tɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda.
JOH 12:43 Lubana a mina otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi inggisɛ ngha otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi Imgbasho.
JOH 12:44 IYesu gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ni inggisɛ nu ani oyɛyɛ yɔ, li ani ta ngwi o noyɛyɛ ba, kpaa o nu ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma oyɛyɛ.
JOH 12:45 Inggisɛ ndi ani yɔ, o di ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 12:46 Ani ba ɛsɛ nɛ dafi osa, ikyegbɛɛ ali inggisɛ ongwu nu ani oyɛyɛ yɔ non ka dzɛ mi iifu ba.
JOH 12:47 <<Mbi inggisɛ ongwu nfwo elodzɛ mgbi ani kpaa ngyo ma bayɔ, ani gbɔn ikwɔ ba. Bana ani ba owa gbɔ ɛsɛ ikwɔ ba, kpaa owa dulun tɔ.
JOH 12:48 Ikwɔ dzɛ mi ikye mgbi ongwu nfwa ani diyɛ gbɛ elodzɛ mgbi ani ba mani; elodzɛ ngwi ani gbɔ na kpɔɔ ka ngwɔn ikwɔ mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ.
JOH 12:49 Bana ani le gbɔdzɛ mgbi ikyibani ba, kpaa li Otsani ndɔ ani esɔ ma wo ani ola mi ungwɔ ngwi ani ka gbɔ yi itɔ ofɛ ngwi ani dika gbɔn mani.
JOH 12:50 Ani ye gbɛɛ ola mgban li nu oshishe gyegwu. Nghanɛ alungwɔ ngwi ani gbɔ yɔ le yɛyɛ yi ungwɔ ngwi Otsani nya ani gbɛɛ ni ani gbɔ mani.>>
JOH 13:1 Duuse nu ma wa gye oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda. IYesu ye dafi onɔ mgban ngyɛ owa dzata ɛsɛ nɛ yɛ lu mbi Otsɔn. Ngwi ama nli mgban kpan itukwu ka to ɛsɛ nɛ nɛ, o si tso ma okpitukwu mgban ngyɛ klɛklɛ.
JOH 13:2 Dafi a sɔ ungwogye ongwi onɔdɛ nɛman, Olodu tu iJuda Iskarɔti ongwɛ iSaimɔn wo, owa kye iYesu gya.
JOH 13:3 IYesu ye dafi Otsɔn nun mfye mi alungwɔ duu mani, di ye dafi ongwu kyɛ mbi Imgbasho dile yɛ lu mbi Imgbasho mani.
JOH 13:4 Nɛ o kyato mi ita ungwogye fwadulu angwuto ongwi esɛ kye oshata to oshi.
JOH 13:5 O kyi mwalu eni wokɛ okye wita le sa emi ongwafɔɔn afɔ, yile oshata na fwɔ ma afɔ.
JOH 13:6 O wa to mbi iSaimɔn iPyita, ongwu nbyun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, abu ka sa ani afɔɔ?>>
JOH 13:7 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ ema yama ye ungwɔ ngwi ani le kyɔ nɛ waba, kpaa ema ka wa ye mi iyayi.>>
JOH 13:8 IPyita gbɛɛ, <<Ei, o ka yama sa ani afɔ ba.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Kini ani sa abu afɔ bayɔ, abu wo atɛ yi ani ba.>>
JOH 13:9 ISaimɔn iPyita si gbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛse, Otsɛ, no ka li afɔ ta ba, sa ani abɔ yi ikye kpaa!>>
JOH 13:10 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nteyi shuwo yɔ i wogyɔ ngwi o ka saafɔ ta; ikyekyɛ ewo mgban duu teyi le saan wa. Ema le saan, kpaa li ema duu ba.>>
JOH 13:11 Bana iYesu ye otsungwɔn nka wa kye ongwu gya mani, li ngha ngwi o gbɛɛ li ema duu le saan ba aali.
JOH 13:12 Dafi o sa ma afɔ ngyɛ nɛ, o yile angwuto wo yɛ luba imbe mgban. O si byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema difwi ungwɔ ngwi ani kyɔ yi ema nɛ wɛ?>>
JOH 13:13 <<Ema li kwu ani gbɛɛ, <Otsetse> yi <Otsɛ> li ayin yɛyɛ, li ungwɔ ngwi ani dzɛ aali.
JOH 13:14 Onɛnɛ ngwi ani, Otsɛ yi Otsetse mgbi ema, sa ema afɔ nɛ, ema kpaa ka yɛ sa ewema afɔ ngha.
JOH 13:15 N tso ema ambɛ ngha ikye ni ema kyɔ dafi ani kyɔ yi ema nɛni.
JOH 13:16 N nya ema otsitsi ongbidɔ yama dzɛ yi oshewo ngha ongyukwo mgban ba, naadi ongyesɔ ngha ongwu ndɔn esɔ ma ba.
JOH 13:17 Ngwi ema ye ungwɔ ntonɛ onɛnɛ nɛ, ema ka tu mse kini ema kyɔ ma yɔ.
JOH 13:18 <<N yama le gbɔ yi ema duu ba; n ye ama ani sadu mani. Nghaduu nɛnɛ li ikye ni ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ dzɛ Afɛ gbɛɛ: Ongwu nkye abɔ wo uga yi ani nɛ ka yile iga fyi yɛn na no mbwumbwo.
JOH 13:19 <<N le nya ema onɛnɛ duuse no wa kyɔ, ikyegbɛɛ no wa kyɔ yɔ ema ka noyɛyɛ mi itɔ inggisɛ ngwu Ani dzɛ mani.
JOH 13:20 N nya ema otsitsi, ali inggisɛ ngbɛ inggisɛ ngwu ani dɔn esɔ tayɔ gbɛ ani; ma inggisɛ ta ongwu gbɛ Ani yɔ gbɛ ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani.>>
JOH 13:21 IYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ man i kakan ewo mi onodzi ta o kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ, <<N nya ema otsitsi, onyi mbi ema ka wa kye ani gya.>>
JOH 13:22 Engwafɔɔn ndinɛ di ewoma, ikye ni ama difwi inggisɛ ngwu o le gbɔdzɛ na ikyen mani.
JOH 13:23 Oka mi idzidzɛ ma, ongwafɔ nkpa iYesu itukwu, sɔ dɔn.
JOH 13:24 ISaimɔn iPyita kyɔ ongwu nkpa iYesu itukwu na abɔ gbɛɛ, <<Byun li emɛ ngwi o le gbɔdzɛ na yan.>>
JOH 13:25 O kye ewo ge iYesu kɛ, si byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ li emɛni lo?>>
JOH 13:26 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Li ongwu ani ka kye anggayɛ ibredi nɛ ba kye nun mani.>> Nɛ, o kye anggayɛ ibredi na ba, kye nu iJuda Iskarɔti, ongwɛ iSaimɔn nani.
JOH 13:27 Ntunto ngwi iJuda kye gbɛlu ibredi nɛman, iSatan si kaka mbon. IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ nwo abu owa kyɔ ma, kyɔn plɛ-plɛ tsatso!>>
JOH 13:28 Nghaduu inggisɛ onyi mi ita ungwogye difwi ungwɔ nkyɔ se ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ yan ma ba.
JOH 13:29 Dafi iJuda li utɔ igbe nɛ, angbeka tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ iYesu le nyan gbɛɛ no ka gya ungwɔ ngwi ama ka wa kyɔ aboyaaya ele mi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda, hona kye ungwɔ nu emi adzɛ.
JOH 13:30 Labɔlabɔ ngwi iJuda kyi gbɛlu ibredi nɛta, o tɔ lu esɛ. Ma li mi otu.
JOH 13:31 Ngwi iJuda tɔ lu nɛ, iYesu gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ Ongwɛ Inggisɛ tu okwɔkwɔ wa, Imgbasho kpaa tu okwɔkwɔ mbon.
JOH 13:32 Kini Imgbasho tu okwɔkwɔ mbon yɔ, Imgbasho ka nu Ongwɛ okwɔkwɔ mbi ewon, dika nu okwɔkwɔ ma akponyi.
JOH 13:33 <<Ɛngbɛ mgbi ani, ani ka dzɛ yi ema onɔ gblɔgɔdɔ wuba. Ema ka pita ani, dafi n nya emi iJuda ma n dile nya ema onɛnɛ ngha yɛyɛ: Imbe ngwi ani le kɛ ma, ema ka ba gbɛ ba.
JOH 13:34 <<Ani le wo ema ola ofufɛ: Kpa ewema itukwu na. Dafi ema kpa ani itukwu nɛ, li ngha ema kpaa ka kpa ewema itukwu aali.
JOH 13:35 Ni ema le kyɔ ngha yɔ inggisɛ duu ka ye gbɛɛ ema li engwafɔ mgbi ani.>>
JOH 13:36 ISaimɔn iPyita byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li mi ole ngwi abu le kɛ?>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Imbe ngwi ani le kɛ ma, ema ka kyɛdɔ onɛnɛ gbɛ ba, nghaduu ema ka wa kyɛdɔ mi onɔ ongwi iyayi.>>
JOH 13:37 IPyita byita gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, kyɔsinɛ ngwi ani ka yagba kyɛdɔ abu onɛnɛ gbɛ ba? Ani ka kye oshishe mgbi ani nu mi ikye abu.>>
JOH 13:38 IYesu si gbɛɛ, <<Mi odzimɔ abu ka kye oshishe mgbi abu nu mi ikye anii? N nya abu otsitsi, ogbigbi ka teela waba ta, abu ka tangwɛ ani akpe eta!
JOH 14:1 <<Ka nu itukwu kaka ema ewo ba. Nu Imgbasho oyɛyɛ; di nu ani kpaa oyɛyɛ na;
JOH 14:2 Mi udɛ Otsɛn ozu kwuto; ki li ngha bayɔ, n ki nya ema. Ani le lu ele oka yile imbe mɛ ikye ema.
JOH 14:3 Ni Ani ka yile imbe mɛ ikye ema yɔ, n ka yɛ wa gbe ema ka dzɛ yi Ani adzi imbe ngwi Ani dzɛ ma ema kpaa ka dzɛ.
JOH 14:4 Ema ye ofɛ okɛ imbe ngwi ani le lu mani.>>
JOH 14:5 ITɔmɔsu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, eyi ye imbe ngwi abu le kɛ ba, ma ka kyɔsinɛse eyi ka ye ofɛ?>>
JOH 14:6 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani li ofɛ yi otsitsi bɛyi oshishe. Inggisɛ onyi ka yagba kɛ mbi Otsani ba se o ka nyɛ mbi ani.
JOH 14:7 Ema ki ye ani saan yɔ, ema kika ye Otsani kpaa. Wita onɛnɛ lu iyayi, ema yon di din waani.>>
JOH 14:8 IFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, tso eyi Otsabu mani ta sika gyɔlo eyi.>>
JOH 14:9 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<iFyilipi, ngwi Ani dzɛ yi ema onɔ gblɔgɔdɔ nɛ kpaa abu ye ani lo? Ali inggisɛ ndi ani yɔ li Otsani ma ngwi o di. Kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu gbɛɛ, <Tso eyi Otsani ma>
JOH 14:10 Abu noyɛyɛ dafi Ani dzɛ mbi Otsani, Otsani kpaa di dzɛ mbi ani baa? Elodzɛ ngwi Ani le nya ema nɛ li mgbi ani abuen ta ba. Kpaa li Otsani ndzɛ mbi ani ma, le kyidɔ mgban aani.
JOH 14:11 Nu Ani oyɛyɛ dafi Ani gbɛɛ Ani dzɛ mbi Otsani, Otsani kpaa di dzɛ mbi ani nɛni; hona ni i ndɛ sinɛ-sinɛ kpaa ema noyɛyɛ mi ambɛ mgbi ungwɔ okwulewo ntonɛni.
JOH 14:12 N nya ema otsitsi, ali inggisɛ ndzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi ani ka kyungwɔ ama ngwi Ani teyi le kyɔ ntonɛni. O ka kyungwɔ ama nngha ntonɛ kpaa, ikyekyɛ n le lu mbi Otsani.
JOH 14:13 N ka kyɔ alungwɔ ngwi ema bɔ mi iyi mgbi ani duu, adzi ni Ongwɛ kye okwɔkwɔ nu Otsɔn.
JOH 14:14 Ema ka yagba bɔ alungwɔ duu mi iyi mgbi ani, n dika kyɔ ema ele.
JOH 14:15 <<Kini ani kpa ema itukwu yɔ, ema ka ngyo ola ngwi Ani wo ema mani.
JOH 14:16 N dika bɔ Otsani, ta o ka nu ema Ongye okwu ema ɛwɛ wo oka, ongwu nka dzɛ yi ema gyegwu mani,
JOH 14:17 Onodzi mgbi otsitsi nani. Ɛsɛ ka gban ba, ikyekyɛ o yon hona din kpaa ba. Nghaduu ema yon, lubana o dzɛ yi ema dika wo mbi ema kpaa.
JOH 14:18 N ka dzata ema dafi ongwokwu ba; n ka yɛ ba mbi ema.
JOH 14:19 Mi ongwonɔ gwee ɛsɛ ka di ani wuba, kpaa ema yɔ ka di ani. Ikyesinɛ Ani dzɛ oshishe, ema kpaa ka dzɛ oshishe.
JOH 14:20 Mi egbe na ema ka wa difwi dafi ani dzɛ mbi Otsani, ema wo mbi ani, ani di wo mbi ema mani.
JOH 14:21 Ali inggisɛ ndzɛ yi ola mgbi ani di li ngyo ma yɔ, li ongwu ani kpan itukwu. Inggisɛ ani kpan itukwu yɔ o ka kpa Otsani itukwu, ani kpaa o dika kpa ani itukwu, n dika kye ewani tson.>>
JOH 14:22 Ta iJuda (li mgbi Iskarɔti na ba) gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu witukwu okye ewabu tso ɛsɛ ba ngwi li eyi ta?>>
JOH 14:23 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Kini ani kpa inggisɛ itukwu yɔ, o ka kyɛdɔ otsootso mgbi ani. O dika kpa Otsani itukwu, eyi dika ba mbon wa dzɛyan.
JOH 14:24 Inggisɛ ngwu ani kpan itukwu bayɔ, o ka kyɛdɔ otsootso mgbi ani ba. Elodzɛ ngwi ema li fwo ntonɛ li mgbi ani ba; a li mgbi Otsani ndɔ ani esɔ mani.
JOH 14:25 <<Ani le nya ema ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ngwi ani ka dzɛ yi ema nɛni.
JOH 14:26 Kpaa Ongye okwɛwɛwo, Onodzi Osaan, ngwu Otsani ka kye dɛsɔ mi iyi mgbi ani na, ka tso ema ungwɔ duu diyɛ wɛ ema alungwɔ ama ngwi ani teyi gbɔ nya ema duu.
JOH 14:27 N dzata iyu yi ema; n kye iyu mgbi ani nu ema. N kye nu ema dafi ɛsɛ li nu ma ba. Ka nu itukwu sha ema anyɛ ba dika tsimio ba na.
JOH 14:28 <<Ema fwo dafi ani gbɛɛ, <N le lu mbeka n dika yɛ ba mbi ema mani.> Ni ani kpa ema itukwu yɔ, ema ka tsatsa gbɛɛ Ani le lu mbi Otsani, lubana Otsani shewo ngha Ani.
JOH 14:29 N nya ema onɛnɛ duuse no wa kyɔ, ikyegbɛɛ no wa kyɔ yɔ, ni ema noyɛyɛ mani.
JOH 14:30 N ka gbɔdzɛ yi ema gblɔgɔdɔ wuba, lubana ongwuutɔ ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ kyɛma. O dzɛ yi mfye mbi ani ba,
JOH 14:31 kpaa ɛsɛ no ye kyɛmɛ gbɛɛ Otsani kpa ani itukwu, ani di li kyungwɔ ngwi Otsani wo ani ola ma yɛyɛ. <<Kyato; ni eyi lu dzata imbe nɛ na.
JOH 15:1 <<IYesu nya engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ: Ani li ekwɔ eneekwɔ otsitsi, Otsɛn li inggisɛ ogbinɛbyi ekwɔ.
JOH 15:2 O li kyi dzɛlu ali abɔ ndzɛ mbi ani wa owawa ba ma ngwuta, kpaa o li kye gbɔmbɔ akyikyen mi abɔ ngwi wa owawa mani, ikye no kiyayi owa awawa kwuba.
JOH 15:3 Ema teyi le saan mi ikye elodzɛ ngwi Ani plɛ gbɔ nya ema nani.
JOH 15:4 Kwudzɛ mbi ani na, ta Ani kpaa ka kwudzɛ mbi ema. Abɔ ka yagba wa owawa ikyibɔn ba, sede o ka kwokyi mi iteekwɔ kyɛmɛ. Ema kpaa ka yagba wa owawa ba sede ni ema kwudzɛ mbi ani.
JOH 15:5 Ani li ekwɔ eneekwɔ ema li abɔ. Kini inggisɛ kwudzɛ mbi ani yɔ, ani kpaa ka kwudzɛ mbon, o ka wa awawa nghaabɔ ogbugbe; ni li Ani bayɔ ema ka kyɔ unkonyi gbɛ ba.
JOH 15:6 Ali inggisɛ nkwudzɛ mbi ani bayɔ, o dzɛ dafi abekwɔ ngwi a kyi fwɛlu ngwuta non ngwɔ mani; itɔ abekwɔ ntona a li sa ma wokɛ ola nu ma gyola.
JOH 15:7 Kini ema kwudzɛ mbi ani elodzɛ mgbi ani kpaa di dzɛ mbi ema yɔ, ema ka bɔ alungwɔ ngwi ema mina duu a ka kye nu ema.
JOH 15:8 Ungwɔnɛ li ikye onu Otsani okwɔkwɔ, ogbɛɛ ni ema wa awawa nghaabɔ ogbugbe, nu ma di difwi gbɛɛ ema li engwafɔ ani.
JOH 15:9 Dafi Ani kpa Otsani itukwu nɛ, li ngha ngwi ema kpa ani itukwu aali, onɛnɛ kwudzɛ mi okpitukwu mgbi ani na.
JOH 15:10 Kini ema ngyo ola mgbɛn yɔ, ema ka kwudzɛ mi okpitukwu mgbɛn, dafi ani kpaa ngyo ola mgbi Otsɛn di kwudzɛ mi okpitukwu mgban nɛni.
JOH 15:11 Ani nya ema ungwɔnɛ ikye ni atsa mgbi ani dzɛ mbi ema, adzi ni atsa mgbi ema mbwumbwo.
JOH 15:12 Ola mgbi Ani ma li ongwu aani: Di ewema kpa eka itukwu dafi ema kpa Ani itukwu nɛni.
JOH 15:13 Inggisɛ onyi dzɛ yi okpitukwu ngwi she ngha ongwunɛ ba, ogbɛɛ inggisɛ kye oshishe mgban lasɛ mi ikye mgbi emi okaan.
JOH 15:14 Ema li emi okani kini ema ngyo ola ngwi ani wo ema yɔ.
JOH 15:15 Ani kwu ema gbɛɛ engbidɔ wuba, ikyesinɛ ongbidɔ ye ungwɔ ngwi ongyukwo mgban li kyɔ ba. Nghanɛ, n kwu ema gbɛɛ emi okani, bana alungwɔ ngwi ani kpayi mbi Otsani duu ani nu ema ye.
JOH 15:16 Li ema dulu Ani ba, kpaa Ani dulu ema di wo ema idɔ gbɛɛ ni ema lu ka wa owawa nka li gyegwu. Ta Otsani ka nu ema alungwɔ ngwi ema pita mi iyi mgbi ani duu.
JOH 15:17 Nɛnɛ li ola ngwi ani wo ema: Di eka kpa eka itukwu na.
JOH 15:18 <<Kini ɛsɛ di ema tanyi yɔ, wɛ gbɛɛ i tsekise di ani tanyi.
JOH 15:19 Kini ema li mgbi ɛsɛ yɔ, ema kika kpan dafi ema li mgban mani. Dafi i dzɛ nghanɛ, ema li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, kpaa ani dulu ema tɔ mi ɛsɛ. Li ikyengha ngwi ɛsɛ di ema tanyi aali.
JOH 15:20 Wɛ odzɛ ngwi ani tsekise gbɔ yi ema gbɛɛ: <Ongbidɔ onyi shewo ngha ongyukwo mgban ba nani.> Kini a gbɔ ani odzɛ ewo yɔ, a dika gbɔ ema kpaa ngha. Kini a sunu otsootso mgbi ani, a ka sunu otsootso mgbi ema kpaa.
JOH 15:21 A ka kyɔ yi ema mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ mi ikye iyi mgbi ani, ikyesinɛ a ye Ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ ma ba.
JOH 15:22 Ni ani ki teyi ba wa gbɔdzɛ yi ama bayɔ, a kika dzɛ yi obube mi alobube mgbi ama ba. Nghaduu onɛnɛ nɛ ema ka yagba natsondu mi obube mgbi ema wuba.
JOH 15:23 Inggisɛ ongwu ndi ani kyili di Otsani kpaa kyili.
JOH 15:24 Ni ani ki kyɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama ungwɔ ngwi inggisɛ oka teyi kyɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama ye bayɔ, a kika dzɛ yi obube mi alobube mgbi ama ba. Kpaa onɛnɛ a di ungwɔ ama okwulewo ntonɛ duu, nghaduu kpaa a di ani kyili yi Otsani duu.
JOH 15:25 Nghaduu nɛnɛ li ombwumbwo ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ mi Ola mgbi ama gbɛɛ: <A di ani kyili mi itɔdzɛ ba nani.>
JOH 15:26 <<Ni ongye Okwɛwɛwo, Onodzi mgbi otsitsi ntɔkyɛ mbi Otsani ongwu ani ka wa dɔn esɔ mbi ema ma, wa ba yɔ, o ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikye ani.
JOH 15:27 Li kyɛmɛ ema kpaa ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ, ikyesinɛ ema dzɛ yi ani kyɛ mi owita-wita.
JOH 16:1 <<Ungwɔ ntonɛ duu Ani tsekise nya ema ikyegbɛɛ ni ema ka boofɛ ba.
JOH 16:2 A ka wa dulu ema tɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda; mi otsitsi, onɔ kyɛma ngwi ali inggisɛ ngwu ngwɔ ema duu ka tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ongwu le kyɔ Imgbasho idɔ.
JOH 16:3 A ka kyɔ itɔ ungwɔ ntonɛni ikyesinɛ, a ye Otsani hona ani ba.
JOH 16:4 Ani tsekise nya ema ungwɔ ntonɛni, ikyegbɛɛ ni onɔ ma wa gyɔ ema ka wɛ gbɛɛ ani tsekise kwo ema adɔ. Ani nya ema ungwɔnɛ mi ababɔ ma ba, ikyekyɛ ani ka dzɛ yi ema.
JOH 16:5 <<Onɛnɛ Ani le lu mbi ongwu ndɔ ani esɔ mani, nghaduu onyi mbi ema kpaa byi ani ita gbɛɛ, <Li mi ole ngwi abu le lu baa?>
JOH 16:6 Ikyegbɛɛ Ani nya ema ungwɔ ntonɛ nɛ, ema yɛɛ elela.
JOH 16:7 Nghaduu Ani le nya ema otsitsi: Li mi abɔ oyaaya mgbi ema ngwi Ani le lu dzɛ ema ta aani. Sede Ani ka lu dzɛ ema ta bayɔ, Ongye okwɛwɛwo na ka ba mbi ema ba; Kpaa kini Ani lu, Ani ka dɔnsɔ mbi ema.
JOH 16:8 Non wa ba yɔ, o ka fwo ɛsɛ ikwɔ mi ikye alobube yi osaan:
JOH 16:9 mi ayɛ mgbi obube yɔ, li ikyegbɛɛ a nu ani oyɛyɛ ba;
JOH 16:10 mi ayɛ mgbi osaan yɔ, li mi ikyegbɛɛ Ani le lu mbi Otsani, mi imbe ngwi ema ka di ani alonɔ-alonɔ wuba;
JOH 16:11 mi ayɛ mgbi ikwɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ yɔ, li ikyegbɛɛ ongwuutɔ mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ, a tsekise gbɔn ikwɔ.
JOH 16:12 <<Ani ka dzɛ yi odzɛ kpakpa ogbɔ yi ema, nghaduu i mbwo nyɛsɛ ngwi ema ka difwi ngyɛ onɛnɛni.
JOH 16:13 Kpaa onɔ ngwi ongwu, Onodzi mgbi otsitsi, wa ba yɔ, o ka ngyo ema kaka ali otsitsi duu. O ka gbɔdzɛ mgbi ikyibɔn ba; o ka gbɔdzɛ ngwi o fwo ma kyoon ta, o dika nya ema ungwɔ nka kyɛ iyayi mani.
JOH 16:14 O ka kye okwɔkwɔ ba mbi ani ikyekyɛ o ka kye odzɛ ngwi Ani gbɔ yilen nya ema.
JOH 16:15 Alungwɔ nli mgbi Otsani li mgbi ani. Li ikyengha ngwi ani gbɛɛ Onodzi ka todulu mi ungwɔ nli ngwi ani kye nu di nu ema yon aali.
JOH 16:16 <<Mi ongwonɔ gwee ema ka wa di ani wuba, dika tunto bata ema dika wa di ani.>>
JOH 16:17 Engwafɔ mgbi iYesu angbeka gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<O kye inɛ byi sinɛ ngwi o gbɛɛ, <Mi ongwonɔ gwee ema ka di ani wuba, dika tunto bata ema dika wa di ani,> <Ikyekyɛ ani le lu mbi Otsani>? >>
JOH 16:18 A kiyayi obyita gbɛɛ, <<Ongwonɔ gwee nɛ ma, <tso sinɛ>? Eyi difwi odzɛ ngwi o le gbɔ nɛ ba.>>
JOH 16:19 Ngwi iYesu di gbɛɛ i mina ma obyi ongwu ita mi odzɛ nɛ nɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema le byi ewema ita mi odzɛ ngwi Ani gbɛɛ, <Mi ongwonɔ gwee ema ka wa di ani wuba, dika tunto bata ema dika wa di ani nɛɛ>?
JOH 16:20 Ani nya ema otsitsi, ema ka wa tsukwu di kyelela nghaduu ɛsɛ ka dzɛ yi atsa kwuba. Ema ka wa dzɛ mi okakewo, kpaa okakewo mgbi ema ka wa yɛɛ atsa.
JOH 16:21 Ongyaa nle gblimba li dzɛ yi owulu-wulu kpakpa ikyekyɛ onɔ imba mgban gyɔ; kpaa mi onɔ ngwi o mbongwɛ yɔ, o li gblimɔ yi owulu-wulu nani ikyesinɛ atsa mgban li ogbɛɛ ongwu mbimba mi ɛsɛ nɛni.
JOH 16:22 Li ngha ndzɛ yi ema aani: Onɛnɛ li onɔ okakewo mgbi ema, kpaa Ani dika yɛ di ema ta ema ka dzɛ yi atsa, ma inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka gbɛlu ema atsa na ba.
JOH 16:23 Mi egbe na ema ka byi ani ita ungwɔ onyi kpaa wuba. N nya ema otsitsi, Otsani ka kye alungwɔ ngwi ema bɔ mi iyi mgbi ani duu nu ema.
JOH 16:24 Nghataa ba onɛnɛ kpaa ema bɔ unkonyi mi iyi mgbi ani waba. Bɔ na ta ema ka gbɛ, man ema ka dzɛ yi atsa kpakpa.
JOH 16:25 <<Nghaduu ani teyi le gbɔdzɛ yi ema mi itaodzɛ, onɔ kyɛma ngwi ani ka wa gbɔ itɔ ondudzɛ nɛ yi ema wuba, kpaa n ka wa nya ema odzɛ mgbi Otsani mi ododa.
JOH 16:26 Mi egbe na ema ka bɔ mi iyi mgbi ani. Ani le gbɛɛ n ka bɔ Otsani mi ikye ema ba.
JOH 16:27 Ei, Otsani abuon di ema kpan itukwu ikyesinɛ Ani kpa ema itukwu ema di noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ Ani kyɛ mbi Imgbasho.
JOH 16:28 Ani kyɛ mbi Otsani di wa kaka ɛsɛ nɛni; onɛnɛ ani le dzata ɛsɛ nɛ diyɛ lu mbi Otsani.>>
JOH 16:29 Ta engwafɔ iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ abu le gbɔdzɛ yi eyi gbosa di li mi itaodzɛ wuba.
JOH 16:30 Onɛnɛ eyi di gbɛɛ abu yengyɛ alungwɔ duu di mina gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ onyi kpaa no ka byi abu ita angbeka wuba. Ungwɔnɛ nu eyi noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ abu kyɛ mbi Imgbasho.>>
JOH 16:31 IYesu nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<Ema noyɛyɛ onɛnɛɛ?
JOH 16:32 Nghaduu onɔ kyɛma, di li onɔ ma joani, onɔ ngwi a ka ganya ema, ali inggisɛ ka lu udɛ mgban. Ema ka dzata ani yuen. Kpaa Ani dzɛ yuen ba, lubana Otsani dzɛ yi ani.
JOH 16:33 <<Ani teyi nya ema ungwɔ ntonɛ, ikyegbɛɛ ni ema tu iyu ikpewo ani. Mi ɛsɛ nɛ ema ka dzɛ yi okakewo. Nghaduu bwalu itukwu na! Ani ngha ɛsɛ wa.>>
JOH 17:1 Dafi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ nɛ, o kyile inɛ esho si bibɔ gbɛɛ: <<Otsani, onɔ ma gyɔ wa. Kye Okwɔkwɔ nu ongwabu, adzi ni Ongwabu kpaa kye okwɔkwɔ nu abu.
JOH 17:2 Bana abu teyi kye mfye nun mi ikye mgbi ali inggisɛ duu gbɛɛ no kye oshishe gyegwu nu ama abu kye nun duu.
JOH 17:3 Ma li oshishe gyegwu aani: li onu ma ye abu, Imgbasho otsitsi yuon, bɛyi iYesu iKrestu, ongwu abu dɔn esɔ nɛni.
JOH 17:4 Ani kye okwɔkwɔ nu abu mi ɛsɛ mi ongyɛlu idɔ ngwi abu kye nu ani gbɛɛ ni ani kyɔ mani.
JOH 17:5 Ikyenghanɛ, Otsani, nu ani okwɔkwɔ mi inai abu okwɔkwɔ ngwi ani teyi dzɛyan yi abu duuse ɛsɛ wa wita nani.>>
JOH 17:6 <<Ani kye abu tso mbi ama abu kye nu ani mi ɛsɛ nɛni. A teyi li mgbi abu; abu kye ma nu ani a di ngyo elodzɛ mgbi abu.
JOH 17:7 Onɛnɛ a ye gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi Ani dzɛyan duu kyɛ mbi abu.
JOH 17:8 Lubana ani kye elodzɛ ngwi abu kye nu ani ma nu ma a di kyi gbɛlu. A ye saan gbɛɛ ani kyɛ mbi abu, a di noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ abu dɔ ani esɔ.
JOH 17:9 Ani bibɔ mi ikye ma. Ani le bibɔ mi ikye mgbi ɛsɛ ba, kpaa li mi ikye mgbi ama ngwu abu teyi gbe ma nu ani, ikyesinɛ a li mgbi abu.
JOH 17:10 Alungwɔ ani dzɛyan duu li mgbi abu, alungwɔ abu di dzɛyan duu li mgbi ani. Ani di tu okwɔkwɔ ikpewo ma.
JOH 17:11 Ani ka dzɛ ɛsɛ nɛ wuba, kpaa ama ka to ɛsɛ nɛni, ani kyɛma le lu mbi abu. Otsani Osaan, ngyo ma mi mfye mgbi iyi mgbi abu, iyi ngwi abu kye nu ani ikye nu ma yɛɛ onyi dafi eyi kpaa li onyi nɛni.
JOH 17:12 Mi onɔ ngwi ani ka dzɛ yi ama ma, ani ngyo ma di kye ma dzɛ saan mi iyi ngwi abu kye nu ani. Onyi kpaa byulu ba sede li onyi ongwu dzɛ mi ikye odzili-dzili, ikyegbɛɛ ni elodzɛ mgbi Afɛ mbwumbwo nani.>>
JOH 17:13 <<Ani kyɛma le ba mbi abu onɛnɛni, nghaduu ani gbɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ ngwi ani ka dzɛ ɛsɛ nɛni, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma tu atsa kpakpa dafi ani kpaa tu nɛni.
JOH 17:14 Ani teyi kye elodzɛ mgbi abu nu ma wa, kpaa ɛsɛ di ma kyili, ikyekyɛ a li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ wuba dafi ani kpaa li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ ba nɛni.
JOH 17:15 Ibɔ mgbi ani li ikyegbɛɛ ni abu kye gbelu ma mi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, kpaa li ikyegbɛɛ ni abu ngyo ma mi abɔ emi obube.
JOH 17:16 A li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, dafi ani kpaa li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛ ba nɛni.
JOH 17:17 Kye ma kyi salu mi otsitsi mgbi abu; elodzɛ mgbi abu li otsitsi.
JOH 17:18 Dafi abu dɔ ani esɔ ba ɛsɛ nɛ nɛ, ani kpaa dɔ ma esɔ mi ɛsɛ.
JOH 17:19 Mi ikye mgbi ama ani kye ewani kyi salu, adzi ni a kyi salu ma saan.>>
JOH 17:20 <<Ibɔ mgbi ani li ikye ma yuoma ba. Ani bibɔ ikye ama nka wa noyɛyɛ mbi ani mi esɔ mgbi ama ogbɔɔgbɔ kpaa,
JOH 17:21 gbɛɛ ama duu nu ma wa yɛɛ onyi, Otsani, dafi abu dzɛ mbi ani ngwi ani kpaa dzɛ mbi abu nɛni. Ni ama kpaa dzɛ mbi eyi ikye ni ɛsɛ noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ abu dɔ ani esɔ.
JOH 17:22 Ani kye okwɔkwɔ ngwi abu kye nu ani ma nu ma wa, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma li onyi, dafi eyi kpaa li onyi nɛni:
JOH 17:23 Ani wo mboma abu di wo mbi ani. Ni a gbe ma duu kwakye yɛɛ ondonyi onu ɛsɛ ye gbɛɛ abu dɔ ani esɔ, a di kpa abu itukwu yɛyɛ dafi ani kpa abu itukwu nɛni.>>
JOH 17:24 <<Otsani, ani mina gbɛɛ ama ngwu abu kye nu ani ma nu ma dzɛ yi ani mi imbe ngwi ani dzɛ mani, odi di okwɔkwɔ mgbi ani, okwɔkwɔ ngwi abu kye nu ani ikyesinɛ ani kpa abu itukwu duuse ni abu ta ɛsɛ nani.>>
JOH 17:25 <<Otsani Osaan, dafi ɛsɛ ye abu ba nɛ kpaa, ani ye abu, ma engwafɔ ntonɛ ye dafi abu dɔ ani esɔ.
JOH 17:26 Ani teyi kye abu tso ma, dika kiyayi ole kye abu tso ikyegbɛɛ okpitukwu mgbi abu mbi ani no dzɛ mboma ani abuen kpaa dika dzɛ mboma.>>
JOH 18:1 Onɔ ngwi iYesu bibɔ ngyɛ nɛ, ongwu yi engwafɔɔn fa ufɛ mgbi iKidrɔn. Mi oyombo na okwɔ ekwɔ dzɛ, a si kaka efu.
JOH 18:2 IJuda, nkyon gya na, ye imbe nani, ikyesinɛ iYesu li teyi kwakye mi imbe na alonɔ yi engwafɔɔn.
JOH 18:3 IJuda si ba okwɔ ekwɔ nani, o gbe obyi oblakwutsɛ mgbi emi iRoma bɛyi ama ongyo ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho angbeka nkyɛ mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi emi iFarasi teyi. A gbe ola byi yi okyiika.
JOH 18:4 Ngwi iYesu teyi ye alungwɔ nka wa kyɔn nɛ, o tasɛ ka byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ ngwi ema le pitan?>>
JOH 18:5 A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<IYesu ongwi iNadzareti.>> IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ma aani.>> (iJuda ongwu nkyon gya na, kwudzɛ mmana yi ama.)
JOH 18:6 Onɔ ngwi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ma aani,>> nɛta a yɛyikpa zudɔwokɛ esɛ.
JOH 18:7 O diyɛ byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ ngwi ema le pitan?>> A di gbɛɛ, <<IYesu ongwi iNadzareti.>>
JOH 18:8 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<N teyi nya ema gbɛɛ li ani ma aani. Kini ema le pita ani yɔ, ni inggisɛ ntonɛ lu na.>>
JOH 18:9 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ikyegbɛɛ elodzɛ ngwi o teyi gbɔ ma no mbwumbwo: <<Ani nu onyi kpaa byulu mi ama ngwu abu gbe nu ani ntonɛ ba.>>
JOH 18:10 Nɛ iSaimɔn iPyita, ongwu ndzɛ yi okwusunkli na, kye ngwalu kye kwɔdzɛ adɔ abugye mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ. (Ongbidɔ na iyin di iMalku.)
JOH 18:11 Nghaduu iYesu wo iPyita ola gbɛɛ, <<Yile okwusunkli mgbi abu wokɛ ifwɛ. Nin ka wa ibwɛ ngwi Otsani kye nu ani nɛ baa?>>
JOH 18:12 Obyi oblakwutsɛ yi ongyukwo mgbi ama bɛyi ama ongyo ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho bwalu iYesu. A bwan adi,
JOH 18:13 si kyon kɛ mbi Anna ababɔ, ongwu li otsowa iKayafa, nli okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mi onova na mani.
JOH 18:14 IKayafa li ongwu teyi wɛ emi iJuda ɛwɛ gbɛɛ i tatase gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ onyi kwulu mi ikye ibyi inggisɛ mani.
JOH 18:15 ISaimɔn iPyita yi ongwafɔ oka kyɛdɔ iYesu. Ikyekyɛ ongwafɔ nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na yon, nghanɛ o kaka yi iYesu mi idzidzɛ udɛ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ nani,
JOH 18:16 kpaa iPyita yɔ kwudzɛ onufoka mi esɛ. Ta ongwafɔ oka, ngwu okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ yon na, yɛ wa gbɔdzɛ yi ongwongyaa ndzɛ ondu idɔ mi onufoka, man o kye iPyita kaka idzidzɛ.
JOH 18:17 Ongwongyaa mi onufɛ na byi iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Abu kpaa li onyi mi engwafɔ mgban lɔ?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Li Ani ba.>>
JOH 18:18 Onɔ ma ofu le yi, nɛ engbidɔ bɛyi ama ongyoongyo kwudzɛ kpakɛkɛ wo ola ngwi a kye wo le wɛ mani. IPyita kpaa kwudzɛ le wola yi ama.
JOH 18:19 Nghanɛ, okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na byi iYesu ita mi odzɛ mgbi engwafɔɔn bɛyi otsootso mgban.
JOH 18:20 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani gbɔdzɛ nya ɛsɛ mi ododa, n li tso alonɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda hona mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, imbe ngwi emi iJuda duu li kwakye nani. N gbɔdzɛ onyi mi odaada ba.
JOH 18:21 Kyɔsinɛse ngwi abu le byi ani ita? Byi ama nfwo ani mani. Otsitsi a ye ungwɔ ngwi ani gbɔ.>>
JOH 18:22 Mi onɔ ngwi iYesu gbɔdzɛ nɛ ma, onyi mbi ama ongyoongyo ndzɛ kwɛkwɛ yan ma tan afɛ mi inɛ. O byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ngha ngwi a li nu okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ uka daa?>>
JOH 18:23 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Kini ani gbɔ ungwɔ nli ayin bayɔ, tso ani obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ nli obube mani. Kpaa kini ani gbɔ otsitsi ma, kyɔnɛ ngwi abu ta ani afɛ?>>
JOH 18:24 Nɛta Anna si kyon dɛsɔ, yi adi mi abɔ, lu mbi iKayafa, okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ nani.
JOH 18:25 Dafi iSaimɔn iPyita ka kwudzɛ le wola nɛ, a di byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu li onyi mi engwafɔɔn wɛ?>> O tangwɛ gbɛɛ, <<Li ani ba.>>
JOH 18:26 Nghaduu onyi mbi ama ongyoongyo mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na, ongwu nli odo yi ongyulɔ ngwu iPyita teyi dzan adɔ na, fwa ikwangha yi iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Ani di abu yi iYesu mi okwɔ baa?>>
JOH 18:27 IPyita di tangwɛ, labɔlabɔ nɛta ogbigbi wita oteela.
JOH 18:28 Ta emi iJuda kyelu iYesu mbi iKayafa lu opiikwɔ mgbi iGɔna inggisɛ iRoma. Onɔ na li egbegbe ototu, mi ikye ofwa idza owa ndɛlu ma oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda nɛ, emi iJuda fwa okaka udɛ iGɔna.
JOH 18:29 IPlatu tasɛ kɛ mboma ka byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ali itɔdzɛ ngwi ema kye le ba mi ikpewo ongyulɔ nɛ?>>
JOH 18:30 A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ ki kyungwɔ obube bayɔ, eyi ki kyon ba mbi abu ba.>>
JOH 18:31 IPlatu gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Nghanɛ kyon abuema ka gbɔn ikwɔ mi ola mgbi ema na.>> Emi iJuda fwa gbɛɛ, <<Ola nu eyi ofɛ ongwɔ inggisɛ ba.>>
JOH 18:32 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ikyegbɛɛ odzɛ ngwi iYesu teyi gbɔ mi itɔ ikwu ngwi ongwu ka wa kwu ma no mbwumbwo.
JOH 18:33 IPlatu si yɛ kaka ifoozu, kwu iYesu ela ba di byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu li utɔ mgbi emi iJudaa?>>
JOH 18:34 IYesu byun gbɛɛ, <<Li ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi abu naadi inggisɛ angbeka nya abu odzɛ mi ikye ani?>>
JOH 18:35 IPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Ani li emi iJudaa? Li emidabu yi engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi abu kye abu ba mbi ani aani. Li alungwɔ abu kyɔ?>>
JOH 18:36 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Esutɔ mgbi ani li ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ ba. Ki li ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ yɔ, engbidɔ mgbɛn kika gblika ikye otukwu ofɛ onu emi iJuda bwa ani. Nghaduu esutɔ mgbi ani dzɛ mbeka.>>
JOH 18:37 IPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛse, abu li utɔ!>> IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<O gbɔ ayin ogbɛɛ di ani li utɔ. Mi otsitsi yɔ, li itɔdzɛ nɛ ngwi a mba ani, di li itɔdzɛ nɛ ngwi ani ba ɛsɛ nɛni, ikye okyɔ obwɛndɛ mi otsitsi nani. Ali inggisɛ ndzɛ mi agya mgbi otsitsi yɔ li fwo ani.>>
JOH 18:38 IPlatu byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ li otsitsi?>> Mi odzɛ nɛ o di tasɛ kɛ mbi emi iJuda ka gbɔgbɛɛ, <<N tun yi obube ba.
JOH 18:39 Ema dzɛ yi aletɔ mgbi ema onu ani dulu inggisɛ onyi mi obawi mi onɔ oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda nu ema. Ema mina gbɛɛ ni ani dulu utɔ mgbi emi iJudaa?>>
JOH 18:40 Nghaduu a wulu ela gbɛɛ, <<Ei, no ka li ongwu ba! Kye iBaraba nu eyi!>> Onɔ na iBaraba wo abɔ mi ablodzɛ.
JOH 19:1 Ta iPlatu woola nu ma gbo iYesu onitse.
JOH 19:2 Ama oblakwutsɛ ndi akata ato kye tukwun ikye. A kye awulu omuma shinishini kye won
JOH 19:3 diyɛ kɛ mbon dudɔ-dudɔ, gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ta abu angba, utɔ mgbi emi iJuda!>> A dile tukwun afɛ mi inɛ.
JOH 19:4 IPlatu di tasɛ ba esɛ wa gbɔ yi emi iJuda gbɛɛ, <<Dii, ani kyon le ba esɛ mbi ema ni ema ye gbɛɛ ani tun yi obube mi elikwɔ ngwi ema kwun nɛ ba.>>
JOH 19:5 Ngwi iYesu tasɛ ba esɛ yi akata ato mi ikye bɛyi awulu omuma shinishini mi ewo nɛ, iPlatu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ongyulɔ ma dzɛ na!>>
JOH 19:6 Plɛ ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi ama ongyoongyo mgbi ama din nɛ, a wulu gbɛɛ, <<Gbokwon mi ekwatsi! Gbokwon mi ekwatsi!>> Nghaduu iPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Ema kyon ka gbokwo mi ekwatsi abuema na. Mbi ani yɔ, ani tu itɔdzɛ mi elikwɔ mgban ba.>>
JOH 19:7 Emi iJuda biibɛ gbɛɛ, <<Eyi dzɛ yi ola, ma mi ola mgbi eyi mayɔ, o ka kwulu kyɛmɛ, ikyena o kye ewon gbɛɛ ongwu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho.>>
JOH 19:8 Ngwi iPlatu fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, i nghao kwulun ewo,
JOH 19:9 ta o diyɛ kaka ifyudɛ. O byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu kyɛ mi ole?>> Nghaduu iYesu kwondu won ba.
JOH 19:10 IPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Abu fwa ogbɔdzɛ yi anii? Abu difwi gbɛɛ ani dzɛ yi mfye odzata abu hona gbokwo abu mi ekwatsi baa?>>
JOH 19:11 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Abu kika dzɛ yi mfye mi ikye ani ba, ni a ki kye nu abu kyɛ esho bayɔ. Nghaduukpaa ongwu nkye ani nu mi abɔ mgbi ema na, nghao kyɔ obube duu.>>
JOH 19:12 Wita mi onɔ na lu iyayi, iPlatu fya odzata iYesu, kpaa emi iJuda kiyayi owulu gbɛɛ, <<Kini abu dzata ongyulɔ nɛ lu yɔ, abu li oka iSidza wuba. Ali inggisɛ nkye ewon gbɛɛ ongwu li utɔ duu kye iga le fyɛsɛ yi iSidza.>>
JOH 19:13 Ngwi iPlatu fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, o ka kye iYesu luba esɛ man sɔkɛ itse ogbiikwɔ mi imbe ngwi a li kwun di Ikwutsɛ (ngwi a li kwun mi ondudzɛ Aramai gbɛɛ iGabata nani).
JOH 19:14 Li mi egbe owewo mgbi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi iJuda, di li mi onɔ idzizudɛ. Nɛ iPlatu nya emi iJuda gbɛɛ, <<Utɔ mgbi ema dzana.>>
JOH 19:15 Nghaduu a wulu gbɛɛ, <<Kyon lu mmɛnɛni! Kyon lu mmɛnɛni! Gbokwon ngwɔn!>> Ta iPlatu byita gbɛɛ, <<Nin gbokwo utɔ mgbi ema mi ekwatsii?>> Engyukwo ama ofifɛ gbɛɛ, <<Eyi dzɛ yi utɔ oka ba li iSidza yuon.>>
JOH 19:16 Mi ongyɛɛngyɛ duu iPlatu kyon nu ma gbɛɛ nu ma ka gbokwon mi ekwatsi. Man ama oblakwutsɛ kye iYesu lu.
JOH 19:17 Ngwi o kye ekwatsi mgban nɛ, o lu imbe idingbo (ngwi a li kwun mi ondudzɛ Aramai di iGogota nani).
JOH 19:18 Mi imbe nɛ a gbokwon yi inggisɛ efa, oka mi abugye yi oka mi abubɛ, iYesu wo idzidzɛ.
JOH 19:19 IPlatu nu ma lɔ ungwɔ kye bɛkɛ mi ekwatsi. I gbɔgbɛɛ: IYESU ONGWI INADZARETI, UTƆ MGBI EMI IJUDA.
JOH 19:20 Emi iJuda kwuba gbɔ ambɛ nɛni, bana imbe ngwi a gbokwo iYesu ma dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi igeli okwukwo, ambɛ na a lɔn mi ondu Aramai, iLatin yi iGriki.
JOH 19:21 Engyukwo ama ofifɛ mgbi emi iJuda fwa yi iPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Ka lɔ gbɛɛ, <Utɔ mgbi emi iJuda ba,> kpaa gbɛɛ ongyulɔ nɛ li kye ewon gbɛɛ ongwu li utɔ mgbi emi iJuda.>>
JOH 19:22 IPlatu gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ ngwi ani lɔ yɔ, ani lɔ setawaali.>>
JOH 19:23 Onɔ ngwi ama oblakwutsɛ gbokwo iYesu mi ekwatsi ngyɛ nɛ, a kyi gbelu angwuto mgban, kyi ghalu imbe enɛ, onyi mi ikye mgbi ali inggisɛ mgbi ama, i sisi awulu mgban. Angwuto nɛ dzɛ yi okwokyiikwokyi ba, li ungwonyi kyɛ esho lu esɛ.
JOH 19:24 Ama oblakwutsɛ ntona gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ka fawa angwuto nɛ ba, eyi ka gbo efa mi ele ni eyi ye inggisɛ nka li mgban.>> Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ikye ombwumbwo ungwɔ ntsekise dzɛ mi Afɛ gbɛɛ, <<A kye ghalu angwuto mgbi ani nu ewoma di gbo efa mi abu mgbi ani.>> Li ungwɔ ngwi ama oblakwutsɛ kyɔ aani.
JOH 19:25 Onɔ iYesu kwudzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ekwatsi mgbi iYesu yi oshanɔn, yi iMeri owa iKlopa, bɛyi iMeri iMagidalin.
JOH 19:26 Dafi iYesu di onɔn mi imbe na, yi ongwafɔɔn ngwu kpan itukwu kwudzɛ yan nɛ, iYesu nya onɔn gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa ongwabu dzana,>>
JOH 19:27 o diyɛ gbɔ yi ongwafɔɔn na gbɛɛ, <<Onabu dzana.>> Wita mi onɔ na nghataa lu iyayi, ongwafɔɔn na kye iMeri lu udɛ mgban.
JOH 19:28 Onɔ gwee nɛ, iYesu ye dafi alungwɔ duu ngyɛ, ma ikyegbɛɛ ni ungwɔ ndzɛ mi Afɛ mbwumbwo yɔ, O gbɛɛ, <<ekweni kwin.>>
JOH 19:29 Mi imbe na atankpɛ eneekwɔ ofyunfyummya ba dzɛ ele, nghanɛ a kye isoso tswokɛ ele, kye fakɛ anggekwɔ ihiso, kyilen bɛ iYesu kɛ ikpondu.
JOH 19:30 Ngwi iYesu wa duu nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<I ngyɛ wa.>> Ta, o kye onbukwɔ ngwuta si yulu.
JOH 19:31 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ mi obwi, tegblifan li egbe otonyewo mgbi emi iJuda. Ikyegbɛɛ emi iJuda mina gbɛɛ ni ikwɔ ntona fato ekwatsi mi egbe otonyewo ba nɛ, a ka bɔ iPlatu ofɛ gbɛɛ nu ma gbikye ma afɔ di tashulu ikwɔ ntonani.
JOH 19:32 Ama oblakwutsɛ ba wa gbikye afɔ efa mgbi inggisɛ ongwu ababɔ ngwu a kyon gbokwo mi ekwatsi yi iYesu dika gbikye mgbi oka nani.
JOH 19:33 Nghaduu ngwi a ba mbi iYesu ma, a difwi dafi o teyi kwulu wa nɛ, a gbikyen afɔ wuba.
JOH 19:34 Nɛta, inggisɛ oblakwutsɛ oka kye okpa kwo iYesu mi esa, ta eyi yi eni fɛ lon mi esa.
JOH 19:35 Inggisɛ ndi ma kyɔ obwɛndɛ, obwɛndɛ mgban li otsitsi. O ye gbɛɛ ongwu gbɔ otsitsi, di kyɔ obwɛndɛ ikyegbɛɛ ni ema kpaa ki noyɛyɛ.
JOH 19:36 Ungwɔ ntonɛ kyɔ adzi ni ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi Afɛ dzɛ gbɛɛ <<Akpukpu mgban onyi kpaa a ka gbikyen ba,>> na no mbwumbwo.
JOH 19:37 Dafi Afɛ oka di gbɛɛ, <<A ka di ongwu a kwon okpa nani.>>
JOH 19:38 Onɔ gwee nɛ, iJose ongwi Arimatia wa bɔ iPlatu ikwɔ mgbi iYesu. IJose kpaa li ongwafɔ mgbi iYesu, o wa bɔ mi odaada ikyekyɛ o le mio emi iJuda. Dafi iPlatu nun ofɛ nɛ, o wa kyi kyelu ikwɔ mgbi iYesu lu.
JOH 19:39 O kyɛ bɛyi iNikodemu, ongyulɔ nteyi kɛ mbi iYesu mi otu nani. INikodemu ba yi ungwɔ ama ogbungbɛ kwuba ngwi a kye bwuo yi ewoma mɛ mlo dafi ngwuseta dɔn iwyo diwyeda sini.
JOH 19:40 Ngwi a kyi kyelu ikwɔ mgbi iYesu nɛ, ama efa kye ikwɔ na ndi wokɛ angwuto yi ungwɔ ama ogbungbɛ ntonani. A kyungwɔnɛ dafi emi iJuda li ndzi inggisɛ mi aletɔ mgbi ama mani.
JOH 19:41 Imbe ngwi a gbokwo iYesu mi ekwatsi na, li mi okwɔ, di li mi okwɔ na ngwi endzi ofufɛ dzɛ ele, ongwi a ndzi inggisɛ mi ele ye waba.
JOH 19:42 Ikyegbɛɛ li egbe owewo mgbi emi iJuda mi ikye egbe otonyewo, endzi di dzɛ kwɛkwɛ nɛ, a kye iYesu ndzi mi ele.
JOH 20:1 Egbe Iladi mi egbegbe ototu nɛ, iMeri iMagidalin kɛ endzi ka di dafi ikwutsɛ ngwi a kye tukwu ondendzi na a kye mulu.
JOH 20:2 Nɛ o nyɛ yi onya kɛ mbi iSaimɔn iPyita bɛyi ongwafɔ oka, ongwu nkpa iYesu itukwu nani, ka gbɛɛ, <<A kyi dulu Otsɛ iYesu mi endzi, ma eyi ye imbe ngwi a kyon ka lakɛ ba.>>
JOH 20:3 Ta iPyita yi ongwafɔ na kyato olu imbe ngwi endzi dzɛ mani.
JOH 20:4 Ama efa le lu onyonya, kpaa ongwafɔ oka na tsinya ngha iPyita teyi ka to itendzi ababɔ.
JOH 20:5 O klɛsɛ winɛ mi ifun kpaa li angwuto ngwi a kye ndi wo iYesu mata ladzɛ ele, nghaduu o kaka ifun ba.
JOH 20:6 Nɛ iSaimɔn iPyita, ngwu kyan iyikpa ma, wa to si kaka lu ifendzi. O di angwuto ikwɔ ntona lato ifun,
JOH 20:7 bɛyi ayangwuto ngwi a kye bwa iYesu ikye nani. Angwuto na fulu ewon, i lakɛ idzidza yi ongwi a ndzin mi ele mani.
JOH 20:8 Ongyɛɛngyɛ yɔ, ongwafɔ oka ongwu nteyi kaka itendzi ababɔ na kpaa, kaka ifun ka di si noyɛyɛ.
JOH 20:9 (Nghaduukpaa i gbosa lo ma mi odzɛ ngwi Afɛ gbɛɛ iYesu ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu na ba.)
JOH 20:10 Ta engwafɔ ntona yidɔ lu udɛ mgbi ama,
JOH 20:11 kpaa iMeri yɔ tila dzɛ itendzi le tsukwu. Dafi o le tsukwu nɛ, o klɛsɛ le winɛ mi ifendzi
JOH 20:12 man di engyesɔ nghi efa wo angwuto onzundzɛ, a sɔto imbe ngwi a teyi kye ikwɔ mgbi iYesu la mani, onyi mi ikye oka mi atafɔ.
JOH 20:13 A byun gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, li ekyɛ ngwi abu le tsukwu?>> O gbɛɛ, <<A kyi kyelu ikwɔ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu mgbi ani lu, ma ani ye imbe ngwi a kyon ka lakɛ ba.>>
JOH 20:14 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, o ndinɛ kpatsɛ man o di iYesu kwudzɛ imbe nani, nghaduu o difwi gbɛɛ li iYesu ba.
JOH 20:15 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ongyaa, li ekyɛ ngwi abu le tsukwu? Li emɛ ngwu abu le ndinan?>> Ongyaa na tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o li otsungwɔ okwɔ, o gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, kini abu kyon lu yɔ, nya ani imbe ngwi abu kyon lakɛ mani nin nka kyi kye.>>
JOH 20:16 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<IMeri!>> O kyata inɛ byun man kwu ela okwukwo mi ondu Aramai gbɛɛ, <<IRaboni!>> (Ngwi itan gbɛɛ otsetse).
JOH 20:17 IYesu gbɛɛ, <<Ka tsɛkwulin ba, ikyesinɛ N yidɔ lu mbi Otsɛn waba. Nghaduukpaa lu ka nya emi ongwunani gbɛɛ, <Ani le yidɔ lu mbi Otsani bɛyi Otsema, mbi Imgbasho mgbi Ani yi Imgbasho mgbi ema.> >>
JOH 20:18 IMeri iMagidalin kye esɔ nɛ lu mbi engwafɔɔn gbɛɛ, <<Ani di Otsɛ iYesu!>> O di nya ma gbɛɛ o nya ongwu ungwɔ ntonɛni.
JOH 20:19 Mi onɔdɛ mi egbe iLadi na, ngwi engwafɔɔn kwakye yi eka nɛ, a kye ofɛ tukwu bana a le mio emi iJuda, iYesu ba wa kwudzɛkɛ idzidzɛ mgbi ama si gbɛɛ, <<Iyu no dzɛ yi ema!>>
JOH 20:20 Ngwi o gbɔ ungwɔnɛ nyɛ nɛ, o gbe abɔ tso ma bɛyi esa. Engwafɔɔn tsatsa kwuba mi onɔ ngwi a di Otsɛ iYesu mani.
JOH 20:21 IYesu di gbɛɛ, <<Iyu non dzɛ yi ema! Dafi Otsani dɔ ani esɔ nɛ, ani kpaa le dɔ ema ngha.>>
JOH 20:22 Yi odzɛ na ta, o tufu ma wo si gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛ Onodzi Osaan na.
JOH 20:23 Kini ema dzata inggisɛ yi ali ibwubwe mgban yɔ, a dzanta yan, kini ema dzatan bayɔ, a dzanta ba sewaali.>>
JOH 20:24 Nghaduu iTɔmɔsu (ongwu a li kwun di ongwefa nani), onyi mbi emi iwyodefa ntona dzɛ yi ama mi onɔ ngwi iYesu ba ma ba.
JOH 20:25 Nghanɛ engwafɔ angbeka ntona nyan gbɛɛ, <<Eyi di Otsɛ iYesu!>> Kpaa o nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li kyɛmɛ ngwi ani ka di emi ambɛ mgbi ikusa mi abɔ mgban di kye ongwufabɔ kɛ imbe a gbokwon ikusa ntona, di kye abɔ mgbi ani kaan esa bayɔ, n ka noyɛyɛ ba.>>
JOH 20:26 Ngwi i wa nyɛ egbe egyata nɛ, engwafɔ mgban di woto yi eka, iTɔmɔsu kpaa wodzɛ yi ama. Dafi onufozu tukwu nɛ kpaa, iYesu wa kwudzɛkɛ idzidzɛ ma di gbɛɛ, <<Iyu no dzɛ yi ema!>>
JOH 20:27 Ta o nya iTɔmɔsu gbɛɛ, <<Kye ongwufabɔ mgbi abu bɛkɛ mmɛnɛni, di atabɔ mgbi ani. Na abɔ mgbi abu ba esa mgbi ani, ka tangwɛ wuba kpaa noyɛyɛ.>>
JOH 20:28 ITɔmɔsu si kwun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ mgbi ani yi Imgbasho mgbi ani!>>
JOH 20:29 IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ikyegbɛɛ abu di ani nɛ, abu nu ani oyɛyɛ, mse no dzɛ yi inggisɛ ama ndi ani ba kpaa noyɛyɛ mani.>>
JOH 20:30 IYesu kyɔ ambɛ ungwɔ angbeka okwulewo gwuba mi inai engwafɔɔn, ngwi a lɔ ma wo afɛ nɛ ba.
JOH 20:31 Kpaa ntonɛ a lɔ ma ikyegbɛɛ ni ema noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ iYesu li iMedzaya, Ongwɛ Imgbasho, di li ikyegbɛɛ ni ema noyɛyɛ mi iyi mgban ta ema ka tu oshishe.
JOH 21:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, iYesu di tsetu emi ongwafɔɔn, mi ekyoo okwukwo mgbi iTiberia. Li itɔ ofɛ ngwi i kyɔ joani:
JOH 21:2 iSaimɔn iPyita, iTɔmɔsu (ngwi a li kwun di ongwefa nani) iNataniɛ ongwi iKana mi ɛsɛ iGalalia, emi ongwɛ iDzebedi, bɛyi engwafɔ mgbi iYesu angbeka efa kpaa to mbonyi.
JOH 21:3 ISaimɔn iPyita nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ani le lu mtsɛ ota-ta,>> a gbɛɛ, <<Eyi kpaa ka kɛ yi abu.>> Ta a si tasɛ ka kaka uwaa, kpaa mi otu na duu a kwu unkonyi ba.
JOH 21:4 Mi egbegbe ototu nɛ iYesu wa kwudzɛkɛ mi agobo, kpaa emi engwafɔɔn yagba difwi gbɛɛ li iYesu ba.
JOH 21:5 O kwu ma ela kɛ gbɛɛ, <<Emi okani, ema kwu nka wa lo?>> A nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Ei.>>
JOH 21:6 O nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ngwi Ibriji mgbi ema mi abugye mgbi uwaa ta ema ka kwu ungwɔ.>> Ngwi a kyɔ ngha nɛta, a yagba okwo ukɛ kaka uwaa ba, ikye mmbweni kwuba ngwi a kwu mani.
JOH 21:7 Ta ongwafɔ nkpa iYesu itukwu na nya iPyita gbɛɛ, <<Li Otsɛ iYesu!>> Ngwi iSaimɔn iPyita fwo gbɛɛ, <<Li Otsɛ nɛ,>> o kye angwuto mgban ongwi esɛ tukwu (lubana o teyi kye kwulu mi ewo) man ngwa gyɛkɛ eni.
JOH 21:8 Engwafɔ angbeka ntona kyɛdɔ mi uwaa, a kwo ukɛ yi mmbwɛ ngwi mbweele ma luba agobo, ikyesinɛ i tunto yi agobo ba, i mɛ dafi akwubɔ ideli onyi hini.
JOH 21:9 Ngwi a tɔ lu agobo nɛ, a di ibredi ladzɛ, angola le gbɛ mmbweni di dɔdzɛ ele.
JOH 21:10 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Dulu mmbwɛ ngwi ema kwa kwu nɛ ba na.>>
JOH 21:11 ISaimɔn iPyita tɔdɔkɛ uwaa di kye kwolu ukɛ dɔkɛ esɛ. Mmbweni okwukwo mbweele, duu li ideli onyi yi ngwusefa dɔn iwyo diwyeta, ma dafi mmbwɛ ntona le kwuba nɛ kpaa ukɛ fawa ba.
JOH 21:12 IYesu nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ba wa tiikyɛ na.>> Onyi mi ifu ma kpaa shitukwu byun ita gbɛɛ, <<Abu li emɛ ba>> A ye dafi li Otsɛ iYesu mani.
JOH 21:13 IYesu wa kyelu ibredi ma kye nu ma, di kyɔ ngha yɛyɛ yi mmbweni ma kpaa
JOH 21:14 Nɛnɛ li akpe ongwu ta ngwi iYesu mblegba tu emi ongwafɔɔn mi onɔ ngwi o kyɛ mi ikwu aani.
JOH 21:15 Onɔ ngwi a gye ungwogye ngyɛ nɛ, iYesu byi iSaimɔn iPyita ita gbɛɛ, <<iSaimɔn ongwɛ iJɔn, otsitsi-otsitsi ani kpa abu itukwu ngha ungwɔ ntonɛɛ?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, Otsɛ, abu ye dafi abu kpa ani itukwu mani.>> IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Byi mmala mgbi ani enbwa.>>
JOH 21:16 IYesu di byun gbɛɛ, <<ISaimɔn ongwɛ iJɔn, ani kpa abu itukwu otsitsii?>> O nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, Otsɛ iYesu, abu ye dafi abu kpa ani itukwu mani.>> IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛwɛbyi mmala mgbi ani.>>
JOH 21:17 Akpe ongwu ta o byin gbɛɛ, <<iSaimɔn ongwɛ iJɔn, ani kpa abu itukwuu?>> IPyita wulu itukwu ikyesinɛ iYesu byun akpe ongwu ta gbɛɛ, <<Ani kpa abu itukwuu?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, abu ye alungwɔ duu; abu ye gbɛɛ abu kpa ani itukwu.>> IYesu nyan gbɛɛ, <<Byi mmala mgbi ani enbwa.
JOH 21:18 N nya abu otsitsi, onɔ ngwi abu li mmafa ma, o li gbe angwuto wo ewo di kɛ imbe ngwi abu mina duu, kpaa onɔ ngwi abu yɛɛ ishongye abu ka na abɔ mgbi abu efa, inggisɛ oka ka gbe angwuto wo abu di kye abu kɛ imbe nmina abu okɛɛkɛ ba mani.>>
JOH 21:19 IYesu gbɔ ungwɔnɛ ikye otso itɔ ikwu mgbi iPyita ngwi o ka wa kwu kye okwɔkwɔ nu Imgbasho mani. Ta o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyɛdɔ ani!>>
JOH 21:20 IPyita kyata inɛ man di ongwafɔ nkpa iYesu itukwu na kyɛ ma iyikpa. (Li ongwu nsɔ kye ewo ge iYesu mi onɔ ngwi a le gye ungwogye ongwi olɛlɛ di li ongwu teyi byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li emɛ ka kye abu gya?>>)
JOH 21:21 Onɔ ngwi iPyita din nɛ, o byi iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li ekyɛ ngwi inggisɛ nɛ ka kyɔ?>>
JOH 21:22 IYesu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<kini ani mina gbɛɛ no dzɛ oshishe nghataa ni ani wa yɛ ba ma, li ekyɛ mgbi ema mi ele? Abu yɔ kyɛdɔ ani.>>
JOH 21:23 Mi ikye odzɛ nɛ, ayayi odzɛ gbɔfwɛ mbi emi ongwunɔn gbɛɛ ongwafɔ nɛ ka kwulu ba. Nghaduu iYesu gbɛɛ o ka kwulu ba ba, o gbɔɔgbɔ ta gbɛɛ, <<Kini ani mina gbɛɛ non dzɛ oshishe nghataa ni ani wa yɛ ma, li ekyɛ mgbi ema mi ele?>>
JOH 21:24 Nɛnɛ li ongwafɔ nkyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ntonɛ duu di lɔ ma tokɛ esɛ. Eyi ye dafi obwɛndɛ mgban li otsitsi mani.
JOH 21:25 IYesu kyungwɔ angbeka kpaa kwuba. Ni a ki lɔ alungwɔ duu tokɛ esɛ yɔ, n tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ɛsɛ duu kpaa imbe kika dzɛ ogbe afɛ ntona tokɛ ba.
ACT 1:1 Otsungwudɛ iTiofyilɔ, mi olɔɔlɔ mgbi ani ongwi ababɔ ma, n lɔ alungwɔ ngwi iYesu wita okyɔɔkyɔ diyɛ tso
ACT 1:2 nghataa ba egbe ngwi a kyon lu esho, ngwi o wo ama ngwu o sadu ma li ama Ogbikyon ola mi mfye mgbi Onodzi Osaan ngyɛ mani.
ACT 1:3 Ngwi o gbiisɔ nyɛ nɛ, o kye ewon tso mbi inggisɛ ntonɛ di nu ma obwɛndɛ kwuba saan gbɛɛ ongwu dzɛ oshishe. O kye ewon tso ma mɛ egbe ngwusefa di gbɔdzɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nya ma.
ACT 1:4 Onoka ngwi o kwakye yi ama, le gye ungwogye yi ama nɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ka tasɛ dzata iJerosalin ba na, kpaa fɛ umba ngwi Otsani zondu, ngwi ema tsekise fwo ani gbɔdzɛ efu nani.
ACT 1:5 Bana iJɔn okyɔ iBatisima kyɔ iBatisima yi eni ta, nghaduu egbe sisi gwee ta a ka kyɔ ema iBatisima yi Onodzi Osaan.>>
ACT 1:6 Ngwi a ka to yi ewoma nɛ, a byun gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li mi onɔnɛ ngwi abu ka yile esutɔ mgbi emi Israi nu maa?>>
ACT 1:7 Nɛ iYesu nya ma gbɛɛ: <<I wogyɔ ngwi ema ka ye egbe yi onɔ ngwi Otsani kye dzɛ mi mfye mgban ba.
ACT 1:8 Kpaa ema ka gbɛ mfye mi onɔ ngwi Onodzi Osaan ba mbi ema mani, ta ema ka yɛɛ emi obwɛndɛ mgbi ani mi iJerosalin yi iJudia yi iSamaria nghataa kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu.>>
ACT 1:9 Ngwi iYesu gbɔ ungwɔnɛ ngyɛ nɛta, a kyon mi inai ma lu esho, man akpa tukwu ma inɛ odin.
ACT 1:10 A si kye inɛ fyakwu esho dafi o le lu mani, vla nɛta engyulɔ nghi efa wo angwuto onzundzɛ kwudzɛkɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ama.
ACT 1:11 Engyulɔ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Emi iGalalia, li ekyɛ ngwi ema to mmɛnɛ kye inɛ byi esho nghaa? iYesu ngwu a kyon inai ema lu esho nɛ, di li itɔ ofɛ nɛ kpɔɔ ngwi o dika yɛ ba ɛsɛ nɛni.>>
ACT 1:12 Ta ama ogbikye iYesu si yidɔ mi iJerosalin mi Unggwɔ Olivi nani, ngwi mɛ dafi itsitsi imai okyɛɛ mi ele ba ogalu iJerosalin.
ACT 1:13 Ngwi a wa kaka iJerosalin nɛ, a lu ozeesho mi imbe ngwi a lato mani. Ama nto ma li iPyita, iJɔn, iJɛnsi, Andru, iFyilipi, iTɔmɔsu, iBatlomi, iMatiu, iJɛnsi ongwɛ Alfeɔ yi iSaimɔn ogbodami na bɛyi iJuda ongwɛ iJɛnsi.
ACT 1:14 Ama duu kwakye mbonyi le bibɔ alonɔ duu, angbeka nto bɛyi ama li engyaa yi iMeri onɔ iYesu bɛyi emi ongwunɔn.
ACT 1:15 Mi egbe ntona iPyita kyato nto mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ ntona (okwakye nmɛ mmbwo dafi ideli onyi dɔn osu sini)
ACT 1:16 si gbɛɛ, <<Emi ongwunani, i wogyɔ ngwi Afɛ ka mbwumbwo mi ungwɔ ngwi Onodzi Osaan tsekise gbɔ tɔ mi ondu iDevedi mi ikpewo iJuda, ongwu nmɛ ofɛ nu ma bwa iYesu nani.
ACT 1:17 Ongwu nose li onyi mi atɛ mgbi eyi di kyidɔ nɛ yi eyi kpaa.>>
ACT 1:18 (Udza ngwi iJuda tu mi alobube mgban ma, o kye gya ikpɛsɛ, ngwi non kye ewon widɔkwɔ. Ikwɔ mgban mwɛ gbobu ɛfwɛɛ yangwuta.
ACT 1:19 Ali inggisɛ mi iJerosalin fwo ungwɔnɛni, nɛ a kwu imbe na mi ondudzɛ mgbi ama di Akedama, ngwi itan gbɛɛ, ikpɛsɛ eyi.)
ACT 1:20 IPyita kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<Bana, a lɔ mi Afɛ mgbi iPaslami gbɛɛ, << <Ni imbe mgban na la ayayi; ni inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka dzɛ ele ba,> << <Ni inggisɛ oka di kyi kyelu imbe idɔ mgban nani.>
ACT 1:21 Nghanɛ li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ ngwi eyi ka dulu inggisɛ onyi mbi engyulɔ ama ntonɛ, ongwu nteyi le kyɛ yi eyi alonɔ duu ngwi Otsɛ iYesu ka dzɛ yi eyi mani,
ACT 1:22 eyi mina inggisɛ onyi nka kyɔ obwɛndɛ mgbi iYesu nɛ yi eyi. Ma dika li inggisɛ ndzɛ yi eyi wita mi onɔ ngwi iJɔn kyɔ iYesu iBatisima nghataa ba onɔ ngwi a kyi kyelu iYesu mbi eyi lu esho nani.>>
ACT 1:23 Nɛ a si dulu engyulɔ efa ba iyayi: Onyi ma a li kwun di iJɔstusu ngwu iyin oka li iBasaba (iyin oka di li iTɔmɔsu) iyi oka ma li iMataya.
ACT 1:24 A si bibɔ gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ Imgbasho, abu ye itukwu ali inggisɛ duu. Tso eyi inggisɛ ongwu abu sadu mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ efa ntonɛ
ACT 1:25 ongwu nka kyelu imbe idɔ mgbi ama ogbikye iYesu nɛ, ngwi iJuda dzanta lu imbe ndzɛ mi ikyon mani.>>
ACT 1:26 Ta a gbeefa, efa si kwu iMataya; man a kyon mbwokɛ yi iwyodonyi ntonani.
ACT 2:1 Ngwi egbe iPɛntikɔsu wa gyɔ nɛ, ama duu kwakye mbonyi.
ACT 2:2 Vla nɛta adu kyɛ esho dafi onikyawo wa yaokɛ ozu ngwi a sɔto mani.
ACT 2:3 A di ungwɔ ndzɛ dafi amoola ganya wa dɔkɛ ikye mgbi ama duu.
ACT 2:4 Ama duu si mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan man wita le gbɔ ondudzɛ angbeka dafi Onodzi kye ma teyi mani.
ACT 2:5 Mi onɔ na, emi iJuda ama ndzɛ yi imio mgbi Imgbasho kyɛ mi ayɛsɛ duu wa kwakye mi iJerosalin.
ACT 2:6 Onɔ ngwi a fwo adu nɛ nɛ, ibyi inggisɛ kwakye. Nghaduu i kwulu ma ewo, ikyekyɛ ali inggisɛ fwo ma le gbɔ ondudzɛ mgbi ongwu.
ACT 2:7 I kwulu ma ewo kpakpa, a si byita gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ama nle gbɔdzɛ ntonɛ duu li emi iGalalia baa?
ACT 2:8 Ma i kyɔsinɛse ngwi eyi fwo ama duu le gbɔ ondudzɛ mgbi eyi?
ACT 2:9 Emi iPatia, iMede yi Elami; iMesopotamia, iJudia bɛyi iKapadosia, iPontu yi Asia,
ACT 2:10 iFrijia yi iPamfyilia, Igyibiti bɛyi ayɛ mgbi iLibyia kwɛkwɛ yi iSereni, ingyoga mgbi iRoma
ACT 2:11 (yi emi iJuda bɛyi ama ngwu kyatitukwu yɛ le sunu Imgbasho mgbi emi iJuda duu), emi iKrete bɛyi emi Arabia, eyi fwo ma le gbɔ ungwɔ okwulewo mgbi Imgbasho mi ondudzɛ mgbi eyi!>>
ACT 2:12 I kwulu ma ewo a di wɛndɛ, a si byi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔnɛ tso sinɛ?>>
ACT 2:13 Angbeka gbɔ ibwa nya ama onoyɛyɛ ntona gbɛɛ, <<A wa ɛbyɛ le fya.>>
ACT 2:14 Nɛ iPyita kyato dzɛkunto yi iwyodonyi ntonani, kyile ela mgban gbɔdzɛ yi ibyi inggisɛ ntona gbɛɛ: <<Emidani emi iJuda bɛyi ema ama nto iJerosalin duu, detse nin gbɔfwɛ odzɛ nɛ nya ema; gadɔ saan mi odzɛ ngwi ani le nya ema nɛni.
ACT 2:15 Inggisɛ ntonɛ le fya ɛbyɛ, dafi ema tsɛwɛ na ba. Kwa li obyi egyanɛ mi egbegbe ta aani!
ACT 2:16 Ei, ungwɔnɛ li ungwɔ ngwi oyegbɔ iJowɛ tsekise gbɔn dzɛ esɛ gbɛɛ:
ACT 2:17 << <Imgbasho gbɛɛ, mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ, ani ka kye Onodzi mgbi ani yaokɛ mbi ali inggisɛ duu. Engwɛ ema engyulɔ yi engyaa kale yegbɔ, ɛngbɛ mmafa mgbi ema kale di inɛ odiidi, engyukwo mgbi ema kale woowo elela.
ACT 2:18 Mbi engbidɔ mgbi ani kpaa, engyulɔ yi engyaa duu, n ka kye Onodzi mgbi ani yaokɛ mboma mi egbe ntonani, man a ka yegbɔ.
ACT 2:19 N ka kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo mi esho mbyoo bɛyi ungwɔ ama okwulewo mi iteesɛ, otso gbɛɛ di ani dzɛ yi mfye. N ka tiika mi ɛsɛ adzi ni inggisɛ ngwɔ ewoma, ola dika gbimbe sɔ yi iwu.
ACT 2:20 A ka kyata onɔ yɛɛ iyifu, di kyata ofyia yɛɛ eyi duuse ni egbe oshewo bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Otsɛ no ba.
ACT 2:21 Nghanɛ ali inggisɛ nkwu mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ duu ka tu owatɔ.>
ACT 2:22 <<Emi Israi, gadɔ mi odzɛ nɛ na; iYesu ongwi iNadzareti nose li inggisɛ ngwu Imgbasho gbela yan di kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo mbi ema nyɛ mbon, dafi ema abuema ye mani.
ACT 2:23 Inggisɛ nɛ a kyon wo ema abɔ mi owitukwu mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi oye-ye mgban; ma ema noofɛ ni emi imbali, gbokwon ngwɔn mi ekwatsi.
ACT 2:24 Nghaduu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwu, dulun tɔ mi owulewo mgbi ikwongye, lubana li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ ni ikwongye bwan adi ba.
ACT 2:25 IDevedi gbɔdzɛ mgban gbɛɛ: << <Ani di Otsɛ dzɛ yi ani alonɔ duu. Ikyegbɛɛ o dzɛ abugye mgbi ani nɛ, ani ka teeyi ba.
ACT 2:26 Nghanɛ itukwu mgbi ani shɛta idɛ mgbi ani di dzɛ yi atsa; ikpewo mgbi ani kpaa ka dzɛ mi ɛwɛ ogbebyi,
ACT 2:27 lubana abu ka dzita ani mi endzi ba, hona abu ka dzita Ongwabu Osaan no bwa ba.
ACT 2:28 Abu nu ani ye ofɛ oshishe; abu ka mbwo ani yi atsa mi ifafɔ mgbi abu.>
ACT 2:29 <<Emi ongwunani, ani ka nya ema yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ gbɛɛ iDevedi nli ikye mgbi ema na kwulu a kyon ndzi, ma endzi mgban dzɛ mmɛnɛ nghataa ba inɛ.
ACT 2:30 Kpaa ongwu nose li oyegbɔ di ye dafi Imgbasho zondu yan kpɔklɔɔ gbɛɛ ongwu ka wa kye ongwiba mgban oka sɔkɛ itsuutɔ mgban mani.
ACT 2:31 Ngwi iDevedi di ungwɔ ndzɛ iyayi nɛ, o gbɔdzɛ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu mgbi iMedzaya nani, gbɛɛ a dzanta mi endzi ba, naadi ikwɔ mgban bwa ba.
ACT 2:32 Imgbasho teyi kyile iYesu nɛ luba oshishe, ma eyi duu li obwɛndɛ mgbi otsitsi nɛni.
ACT 2:33 A kyilon esho sɔkɛ abugye mgbi Imgbasho, o gbɛ Onodzi Osaan ngwi Otsɔn zondu mani di kye ungwɔ ngwi ema le di diyɛ fwo onɛnɛ nɛ yaokɛ.
ACT 2:34 Lubana li iDevedi nose lu esho ba, nghaduu o gbɛɛ, << <Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɔ yi Otsɛ mgbi ani gbɛɛ: <<Sɔkɛ abugye mgbi ani
ACT 2:35 nghatakata ni Ani nu engyikyili mgbi abu yɛɛ itse mgbi abu ogbe afɔ dɔ ele.>> >
ACT 2:36 <<Ikyenghanɛ emi Israi duu nu ma ye ungwɔnɛni: Imgbasho nu iYesu, ngwu ema gbokwon mi ekwatsi nɛ, yɛɛ Otsɛ bɛyi iKrestu.>>
ACT 2:37 Ngwi inggisɛ ntonɛ fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, eka dzɛ loma ta a byi iPyita bɛyi ama ogbikye iYesu angbeka ntona gbɛɛ, <<Emi ongwuneyi, eyi ka kyɔsinɛ?>>
ACT 2:38 IPyita nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Kyatitukwu nu ma kyɔ ema iBatisima, mi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu mi ikye odzita ema yi ali ibwubwe. Ta ema ka gbɛ umba mgbi Onodzi Osaan.
ACT 2:39 Ondu odzɛɛdzɛ nɛ dzɛ ikye ema yi emi ongwɛ ema bɛyi ama nto mbombo ikye ama ngwu Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi eyi ka kwu ma ela duu mani.>>
ACT 2:40 O di kwo ma adɔ yi elodzɛ angbeka kwuba; di tɛkyɛ nu ma gbɛɛ, <<Dulu ewema tasɛ mi ungwɔ nka wa kyɔ etɔ obube nɛni.>>
ACT 2:41 Ama ngbɛ esɔ mgban ma a kyɔ ma iBatisima, i mɛ inggisɛ idubu eta mbwokɛ mbwo mgbi ama mi egbe nani.
ACT 2:42 A kye ewoma tswokɛ mi otsootso mgbi ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi okwakye, ungwogye ogyeegye yi ewoma, ibredi oghaagha bɛyi ibɔ obɔɔbɔ.
ACT 2:43 I kwulu ali inggisɛ duu ewo, ama ogbikye iYesu ntona di kyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo gwuba.
ACT 2:44 Ama onoyɛyɛ duu to yi eka di li kyɔ alungwɔ duu ungwonyi.
ACT 2:45 A kye ungwɔ ngwi ama dzɛyan bɛyi okye duu gya, di gha nu ali inggisɛ duu dafi okakewo mgbi otsungwɔn dzɛ mani.
ACT 2:46 Alegbe a li kiyayi okwakye yi ewoma mi ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin. A li gha ibredi mi udɛ mgbi ama di li gye yi ewoma mi atsa yi itukwu onyi,
ACT 2:47 le tsɛ Imgbasho dile tu mgbede mbi inggisɛ duu. Nɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho sile mbwo ama ngwu o dulu ma watɔ ma mmbwo alegbe-alegbe.
ACT 3:1 Egbe oka nɛ iPyita bɛyi iJɔn le kɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin mi onɔ ibɔ mi obyi eta ngwi onɔ tashulu akpa.
ACT 3:2 Onɔ na inggisɛ oka ngwu gbikye tukwu esɛ kyɛ ifu, a li kyon ka sɔkɛ onufozu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ngwi a li kwun di osunse nani, le bɔ inggisɛ ama nle kaka ozu ungwɔ alegbe-alegbe.
ACT 3:3 Onɔ ngwi o di iPyita yi iJɔn le kaka nɛ, o bɔ ma awuya.
ACT 3:4 IPyita yi iJɔn kye inɛ byun yɛyɛ. IPyita si gbɛɛ <<Kye inɛ byi eyi!>>
ACT 3:5 Inggisɛ na si kye itukwu byikɛ mboma, le tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ongwu ka tu ungwɔ mboma.
ACT 3:6 Man iPyita gbɛɛ, <<N dzɛ yi iyudza onzundzɛ yi Abashi ba, kpaa ungwɔ ngwi ani dzɛyan ma, n ka kye nu abu. Mi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu ongwi iNadzareti kyato kyikyɛ.>>
ACT 3:7 Ngwi o byin mi abugye nɛ, o yan abɔ non kyato, labɔlabɔ nɛta afɔ mgbi inggisɛ na si fyumfye.
ACT 3:8 O ta yile afɔ dzɛkɛ esɛ man wita okyikyɛ. Nɛ o si lu yi ama mi ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, le kyikyɛ tablika dile tsɛ Imgbasho.
ACT 3:9 Ngwi inggisɛ duu din le kyikyɛ dile tsɛ Imgbasho nɛ,
ACT 3:10 a difwin dafi ka li inggisɛ nli sɔ le bibɔ mi onufozu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin ngwi a li kwun di osunse nani, ta i kwulu ma ewo kpakpa mi ungwɔ nkyɔ yan mani.
ACT 3:11 Ngwi inggisɛ obɔ ungwɔ yɛ wa bɛkɛ yi iPyita yi iJɔn nɛ i kwulu inggisɛ ntona duu ewo ta a ba onyonya wa tu ma mi imbe ngwi a li kwun di iwulu onufɛ mgbi iSolomu nani.
ACT 3:12 Ngwi iPyita di nghanɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Emi Israi, kyɔsinɛ ngwi ungwɔnɛ le kwulu ema ewo? Kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le di eyi inɛ dafi li mfye naadi osaan mgbi eyi ngwi eyi nu inggisɛ nɛ kyikyɛ?
ACT 3:13 Imgbasho mgbi Abrahan, Adziki bɛyi iJeko; Imgbasho mgbi emi otseyi, kye okwɔkwɔ nu ongbidɔ mgban iYesu. Ema kyon nu gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔn, di tangwan mi inai iPlatu, bana o mina odzanta non lu.
ACT 3:14 Ema tangwɛ Ongwu nle Saan dile Nyaan nani, di mina gbɛɛ a ki dulu inggisɛ ongwɔ inggisɛ nu ema.
ACT 3:15 Ema ngwɔ otsungwɔ oshishe, nghaduu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwu. Eyi li obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔnɛni.
ACT 3:16 Li oyɛyɛ onuunu mi iyi mgbi iYesu ngwi inggisɛ ema di, di yon nɛ yɛɛ saan aani. Li iyi mgbi iYesu bɛyi oyɛyɛ onuunu nkyɛ mbon ma nu ootse ngyɛ lo inggisɛ nɛ saan, ngwi ema di nɛni.
ACT 3:17 <<Onɛnɛ, emi ongwunani, ani ye ta gbɛɛ ema kyungwɔnɛ mi inɛ obuubu, dafi ama okye ema teyi kpaa tsekise kyɔ mani.
ACT 3:18 Nghaduu li itɔ ofɛ ngwi Imgbasho mbwumbwo ungwɔ ngwi ongwu tsekise gbɔn nyɛ mbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ aali, gbɛɛ iMedzaya mgbi ongwu ka wa gyadzɛ.
ACT 3:19 Kyatitukwu yidɔ luba mbi Imgbasho na, adzi ni Otsɛ dzɛ ema ta yi ali ibwubwe mgbi ema, onɔ onya otooto ka kyɛ mbi Otsɛ,
ACT 3:20 onɔ di kyɛma ngwi Otsɛ ka nu ema mfye ofufɛ. O ka kye iYesu dɛsɔ nu ema, iMedzaya mgban ngwu o dulu-dulu nani.
ACT 3:21 Li kyɛmɛ ngwi o ka tila dzɛ esho nghataa ngwi onɔ ka gyɔ ngwi Imgbasho ka yile alungwɔ duu sisɛ, dafi o zondu gbegbe nyɛ mbi oyegbɔ mgban ama osaan mani.
ACT 3:22 Ikyesinɛ iMose gbɛɛ, <Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi ema ka dulu oyegbɔ dafi ani mi idzidzɛ ema nu ema; li kyɛmɛ ema ka gadɔ mi alungwɔ ngwi o nya ema duu.
ACT 3:23 Ali inggisɛ ngwu gadɔ fwon ba duu a ka dulun mbi engwɛ Imgbasho dzɛkɛ enggengga.>
ACT 3:24 <<Mi otsitsi ama ogbɛɛsɛ wita mbi iSamue lu mbi angbeka duu, teyi gbɔdzɛ ungwɔ ama ntole kyɔ mi ɛsɛ ongwi onɛnɛ nɛni.
ACT 3:25 Nghanɛ ema li ama gyokwudɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ bɛyi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi Imgbasho dzɛ yi otsema mani. O nya Abrahan gbɛɛ, <Ikpewo etɔ mgbi abu inggisɛ mi ɛsɛ duu ka tu mse.>
ACT 3:26 Onɔ ngwi Imgbasho dulu ongbidɔ mgban ma, o kyon dɛsɔ mbi ema ababɔ ikye okye mse bɛ ema ewo mi okyata ema mi imbali mgbi ema.>>
ACT 4:1 Ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho yi inggisɛ ogbe obaka ama ongyo ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin teyi bɛyi emi iSadusi ba mbi iPyita yi iJɔn mi onɔ ngwi a kale gbɔdzɛ yi inggisɛ ntona mani.
ACT 4:2 I kaka ma ewo kpakpa ikyekyɛ ama ogbikye iYesu le tso inggisɛ ntona dile gbɔ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu mgbi iYesu kpaa.
ACT 4:3 A bwa iPyita yi iJɔn, ma ikyegbɛɛ onɔ gbɛsɛ nɛ, a kye ma wokɛ obawi nghataa egbe fa.
ACT 4:4 Nghaduu ibyi inggisɛ ama nfwo esɔ na duu noyɛyɛ, nɛ mmbwo mgbi ama okyɛdɔ iYesu si she mɛ dafi idubu eda sini.
ACT 4:5 Tegblifan nɛ, ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi, engyukwo bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose kwakye mi iJerosalin.
ACT 4:6 Anna okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ na dzɛ mmanani, yi iKayafa, iJɔn, Alekidzanda bɛyi inggisɛ angbeka mi etɔ mgbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ nani.
ACT 4:7 A nu ma kye iPyita bɛyi iJɔn ba inai ma, si wita obyi ma gbɛɛ: <<Li mi ali mfye naadi ali iyi ngwi ema le kyungwɔnɛ?>>
ACT 4:8 Nɛ iPyita, ngwu Onodzi Osaan shewo mbon na, nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ema ama oteyi bɛyi engyukwo mgbi inggisɛ ntonɛnɛ!
ACT 4:9 Yeba ni a kwu eyi ela gbɛɛ ni eyi nu uka mi ikye ali osuse ngwi eyi kyɔ yi inggisɛ ngwu gbikye tukwu esɛ nɛ, di byita dafi a kyilon yɔ,
ACT 4:10 ngyɛse ye odzɛ nɛ na, ema yi emi Israi duu: Li mi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu ongwi iNadzareti, ongwu ema kyon gbokwo ekwatsi kpaa ngwu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwu na, ngwi ootse mgbi inggisɛ nɛ ngyɛ ngwi o kwuzunto mi inai ema aani.
ACT 4:11 O li << <Ikwutsɛ ngwi ema ama ombɛ ozu fwan, ngwi i wa yɛɛ ikwutsɛ okwulu ikye ozu mani.>
ACT 4:12 Owatɔ dzɛ mbi inggisɛ oka ba, ikyesinɛ iyi oka dzɛma mi ɛsɛ nɛ ngwi a kye nu gbɛɛ inggisɛ ka watɔ kyɛmɛ ba.>>
ACT 4:13 Ngwi okwakye di abɔ otsigɛgɛ mgbi iPyita bɛyi iJɔn di difwi gbɛɛ a kpayi afɛ ba, a li inggisɛ ama n ye unka ba nɛ, i kwulu ma ewo man a kwambɛ gbɛɛ inggisɛ ntonɛ nose dzɛ yi iYesu.
ACT 4:14 Nghaduu ngwi a di inggisɛ ongwu a ngyɛlun ootse na kwudzɛ yi ama nɛ, odzɛ onyi kpaa dzɛma ngwi a ka gbɔ ba.
ACT 4:15 Nghanɛ a nya ma gbɛɛ nu ma dzata okwakye, ta a si wita okponya yi ewoma.
ACT 4:16 A byita gbɛɛ, <<Li alungwɔ ngwi eyi ka kyɔ yi engyulɔ ntonɛ?>> <<Bana ali inggisɛ ndzɛ iJerosalin duu ye gbɛɛ a kyungwɔ okwulewo okwukwo, ma eyi ka tangwan gbɛ ba.
ACT 4:17 Kpaa onu ungwɔnɛ kwulɛsɛ mi ogbɔfwɛ kiyayi mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ yɔ, eyi ka wo inggisɛ ntonɛ ola kyɛmɛ gbɛɛ, nu ma ka gbɔdzɛ yi inggisɛ onyi kpaa mi iyi nɛ wuba.>>
ACT 4:18 Nɛ a di kwu ma ela ba ifun si wo ma ola gbɛɛ, nu ma ka gbɔdzɛ hona tsungwɔ mi iyi mgbi iYesu wuba du.
ACT 4:19 Nghaduu iPyita yi iJɔn nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Tsɛwɛ abuema na ni i tishi mi inɛ Imgbasho gbɛɛ ni eyi fwo ema dzata Imgbasho yɔ.
ACT 4:20 Lubana eyi ka yagba sɔ shili mi ungwɔ ngwi eyi di diyɛ fwo gbɛ ba.>>
ACT 4:21 Ngwi a di wo ma ola yɛɛyɛ nɛ, a nu ma lu. A yagba ye dafi ama ka kwo ma adɔ ba, ikyekyɛ ali inggisɛ duu le tsɛ Imgbasho mi ungwɔ nkyɔ nyɛ nani.
ACT 4:22 Ikyesinɛ inggisɛ ngwu a ngyɛlun ootse kwulewo na, ngha onova ngwusefa wa.
ACT 4:23 Ngwi a dzɛ ma ta ma; iPyita yi iJɔn yidɔ lu mbi emidama ka nya ma alungwɔ ngwi engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi emi obɔtsɛ gbɔ yi ama mani.
ACT 4:24 Onɔ ngwi a fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, a kyile ela mgbi ama esho yi eka mi ibɔ mbi Imgbasho. A gbɛɛ <<Otsɛ Imgbasho onghaangha, abu ta esho yi esɛ yi ekyoo okwukwo, yi alungwɔ nto efu duu.
ACT 4:25 Abu gbɔdzɛ mi Onodzi Osaan nyɛ ondu mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi abu, otseyi iDevedi gbɛɛ: << <Kyɔnɛ ngwi Udzengye le kyitingga ngwi inggisɛ dile tsɛwodzɛ ikwangha?
ACT 4:26 Utɔ ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ li tsɛwɛ ika man ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi li kwakye yi eka kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi Otsɛ Imgbasho bɛyi iMedzaya mgban kpaa.>
ACT 4:27 Mi otsitsi yɔ, iHerude yi iPontu iPlatu kye ewoma kwakye yi Udzengye bɛyi emi Israi mi ogalu nɛni ikye okye afɔ twɛsɛ yi ongbidɔ mgbi abu osaan iYesu, ongwu abu kye engyie kyun ikye nani.
