ACT 4:28 A kyungwɔ ngwi mfye yi oweka mgbi abu teyi kye bwalu dzɛ esɛ gbɛɛ ka kyɔ mani.
ACT 4:29 Ngwi i dzɛ nghanɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho, di mi ega odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ama di tobyi engbidɔ mgbi abu nu ma gbeesɔ mgbi abu yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ.
ACT 4:30 Na abɔ mgbi abu ikye ongyɛlu ootse di kyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo yi ungwɔ okwulewo mi iyi mgbi ongbidɔ mgbi abu osaan iYesu.>>
ACT 4:31 Ngwi a bibɔ ngyɛ nɛ, imbe ngwi a kwakye ma suusu. Ta ama duu a mbwo ma yi Onodzi Osaan man a si gbeesɔ Imgbasho yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ.
ACT 4:32 Ama onoyɛyɛ ntona duu dzɛ yi itukwu onyi. Onyi mboma kpaa li tso gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi ongwu dzɛyan li mgbi ongwu ba, kpaa a li kye ghalu alungwɔ ngwi a dzɛyan duu.
ACT 4:33 Yi mfye okwulewo ama ogbikye iYesu ntona kiyayi okyɔ obwɛndɛ mi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu mi ikwu, elela mgbi Imgbasho di dzɛ yi ama kpakpa.
ACT 4:34 Ungwɔ kwo inggisɛ onyi kpaa oba mi idzidzɛ ma ba. Ikyesinɛ alonɔ duu ama ndzɛ yi ikpɛsɛ naadi ozu li kye gya, kye awuya ngwi a kye gya ma ba
ACT 4:35 wa nu ama ogbikye iYesu, ta a li gha nu ali inggisɛ dafi imina mgbi otsungwɔn dzɛ mani.
ACT 4:36 IJose, inggisɛ iLevi kyɛ mi iSapru, ongwu ama ogbikye iYesu kwun di iBanabasi (ngwi itan gbɛɛ ongwɛ onu itukwu ofyumfye-fyumfye),
ACT 4:37 kye ikpɛsɛ mgban gya kyelu awuya ma ba wa lakiyayi ama ogbikye iYesu.
ACT 5:1 Nɛ inggisɛ ngwu iyin di Anania, bɛyi owan iSafira, kpaa kye ikpɛsɛ gya.
ACT 5:2 Yi oye-ye mgbi owan saan o kye mwalu awuya na da ikye ewon, man kye ongwi nsisi ma ba wa lakiyayi mgbi ama ogbikye iYesu.
ACT 5:3 IPyita si gbɛɛ, <<Anania, kyɔsinɛ ngwi iSatan gbɛ abu itukwu sɔ nghaa, ngwi abu mwonya nya Onodzi Osaan di kye mwalu awuya ngwi abu kye ikpɛsɛ gya kye dzɛ ewabu kɛ?
ACT 5:4 I plɛ li mgbi abu duuse abu kye gya lo? Ma ngwi abu kye gya ma, awuya ma li mgbi abu baa? Li alungwɔ nu abu tsɛwɛ okyɔ itɔ ungwɔnɛ? Li inggisɛ ngwu abu mwonya nya ba, kpaa li Imgbasho.>>
ACT 5:5 Ngwi Anania fwo odzɛ nɛ mata, o si gbɛsɛ kwulu. Nɛ imio wo ali inggisɛ nfwo ungwɔ nkyɔ na duu.
ACT 5:6 Nɛta ɛngbɛ mmafa tɔ ba wa kye ikwɔ mgban ndi wokɛ angwuto, kyon lu ka ndzi.
ACT 5:7 I nyɛ obyi eta man owan wa kaka, o ye ungwɔ nkyɔ waba.
ACT 5:8 IPyita byun gbɛɛ, <<Nya ani, li mmya ngwi abu yi Anania tu mi ikpɛsɛ na dɛɛn?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, li mmya ma aani.>>
ACT 5:9 IPyita nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔsinɛse ngwi ema bwondu ombadi Onodzi mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho? Di! Atafɔ mgbi inggisɛ ama nkye obabu ndzi to onufɛ aali, ma a dika kye abu kpaa tasɛ.>>
ACT 5:10 Mi onɔ na mata o gbɛsɛ lakiyayi mgbi iPyita si kwulu. Nɛ ɛngbɛ mmafa ntona kaka ifun, ngwi a di gbɛɛ o kwulu nɛ, a kyon tasɛ lu ka ndzi mi ewo endzi mgbi oban.
ACT 5:11 Imio wo emi iKrestu kpakpa bɛyi ama nfwo ungwɔ nkyɔ na duu.
ACT 5:12 Ama ogbikye iYesu kyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo ibyibyi yi ungwɔ ama okwulewo mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ ntonani. Ma ama onoyɛyɛ ntona duu li kwakye yi ewoma mi iwulu onufɛ mgbi iSolomu.
ACT 5:13 Dafi inggisɛ kye ma wuuta kpakpa nɛ kpaa, inggisɛ onyi li boofɛ ka kwakye yi ama ba.
ACT 5:14 Nghaduu, engyulɔ yi engyaa kwuba noyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ di mbwo ma mmbwo.
ACT 5:15 Ikyenghanɛ, inggisɛ kye ama ndotse ba ondoofɛ wa lakɛ akwulo yi obutu gbɛɛ ni i ndɛndɛ kpaa onodzi mgbi iPyita no gbo tukwu angbeka mi ele mi onɔ ngwi o le nyɛ mani.
ACT 5:16 A gbe ibyi inggisɛ kyɛ igeli ama nto kwɛkwɛ wa kwakye mi iJerosalin, ama ndotse yi ama ngwu onodzi ibwubwe ngwunu ma, a si ngyɛlu ama duu ootse.
ACT 5:17 Nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ bɛyi ama okyɛdɔn duu, ama nto mi ayɛ mgbi iSadusi ma, yɛɛ okyɔ ama ogbikye iYesu uwaba.
ACT 5:18 A bwa ama ogbikye iYesu ntona gbe ma wokɛ obawi ndzɛ ikye ali inggisɛ duu mani.
ACT 5:19 Nghaduu, mi otu ma ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ kyi kwulu onufɛ obawi gbe ma tasɛ.
ACT 5:20 O gbɛɛ, <<Lu na, ka kwudzɛkɛ mi ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, di nya inggisɛ ntona esɔ mgbi oshishe ofufɛ nɛ yɛɛyɛ.>>
ACT 5:21 Ngwi egbe fa nɛ, a kaka imbe okwakye mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, dafi a plɛ nya ma mani, si wita otso inggisɛ ntonani. Onɔ ngwi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ yi ama okyɛdɔn wa to nɛ, a kwu ewoma ela okwakye bɛyi engyukwo emi Israi duu. Ta a dɛsɔ kɛ obawi gbɛɛ nu ma kye ama ogbikye iYesu ntona wa nu ma.
ACT 5:22 Nghaduu ngwi a ka to obawi nɛ, emi idɔ ntona di ma mmana ba. Nɛ a yidɔ ka nya ma gbɛɛ,
ACT 5:23 <<Eyi kɛ ka di obawi tukwu saan, yi ama ongyoongyo kwudzɛ to onufɛ; kpaa ngwi eyi kwulu onufɛ nɛ, eyi di inggisɛ onyi mi ifun ba.>>
ACT 5:24 Ngwi ongyukwo obaka mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin bɛyi engyukwo ama ofifɛ fwo esɔ nɛ ma i wo ma ɛndɛ, a le tsɛwɛ ungwɔ nkiyayi mani.
ACT 5:25 Nɛ inggisɛ oka si ba wa gbɛɛ, <<Dika! Engyulɔ ngwu ema gbe ma wo obawi ntona, to ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin le tsungwɔ ma.>>
ACT 5:26 Mi odzɛ na na, inggisɛ ogbe ama ongyo obawi teyi kɛ yi emi idɔ mgban ka kye ama ogbikye iYesu ntona luba. A kyɔ mi mfye ba, ikyekyɛ a mio gbɛɛ inggisɛ ntona wa tsɛ ama akwutsɛ.
ACT 5:27 Ngwi a kye ama ogbikye iYesu ba nɛ, a nu ma ba inai okwakye adzi nii okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ byi ma ita.
ACT 5:28 O gbɛɛ, <<Eyi wo ema ola kpɔklɔɔ gbɛɛ ni ema ka tsungwɔ mi iyi nɛ ba. Nghaduu ema gbɔfwɛ otsootso mgbi ema mi iJerosalin wa, di mina onu eyi gye obube mi eyi mgbi inggisɛ nɛni.>>
ACT 5:29 IPyita yi ama ogbikye iYesu angbeka ntona nu uka gbɛɛ: <<Li Imgbasho ngwu eyi ka kyɔ ola mgban kyɛmɛ aali li inggisɛ ba!
ACT 5:30 Imgbasho mgbi emi otseyi kyile iYesu mi ikwu, ongwu ema ngwɔn mi okyon gbokwo ekwatsi nani.
ACT 5:31 Imgbasho kyilon esho kyon dzɛkɛ abugye mgbi ongwu dafi Ongwuutɔ yi Onagbɛ mani, adzi non nu okyatitukwu bɛyi odzita inggisɛ yi ali ibwubwe mbi emi Israi.
ACT 5:32 Eyi li obwɛndɛ mgbi ungwɔ ntonɛni, bɛyi Onodzi Osaan ongwu Imgbasho kye nu ama osunun na kpaa.>>
ACT 5:33 Onɔ ngwi emi okwakye ntonɛ fwo odzɛ nɛ ma, itukwu fu loma kpakpa a di mina okye ngwɔlu ma.
ACT 5:34 Nghaduu inggisɛ iFarasi ngwu a li kwun gbɛɛ iGamalie, otsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose, ongwu inggisɛ ntona tsatsadu nun mmwɛ, kyato mi okwakye noola gbɛɛ ni a kye ama ogbikye iYesu ntona tokɛ esɛ mi onɔ gwee se.
ACT 5:35 Nɛ o si gbɔdzɛ yi ama gbɛɛ: <<Ema emi Israi, kyɔ dumɔɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi ema tsɛwɛ okyɔ yi engyulɔ ntonɛ nɛni.
ACT 5:36 Ongwɛ onɔ ngwi nyɛ ma iTeuda tɔ, le tso gbɛɛ ongwu li ungwɔ, nɛ inggisɛ mɛ ideli enɛ kyɛdɔn. A ngwɔn, ama okyɛdɔn duu ganya, ta alungwɔ duu yɛɛ mnana.
ACT 5:37 Ongwu nyɛ, iJuda ongwi iGalalia tɔ mi egbe olɔ umbwo man inggisɛ ibyibyi di kyɛdɔn. Ongwu kpaa a ngwɔn, ta ama okyɛdɔn duu ganya.
ACT 5:38 Inghawanɛ, mi odzɛ nɛ, ani le wɛ ema odzɛ gbɛɛ: dzata engyulɔ ntonɛ nu ma lu! Ikyesinɛ ni itɔdzɛ hona okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi ama tiita mbi inggisɛ owamyɛ yɔ, ka dondu.
ACT 5:39 Kpaa ni i kyɛ mbi Imgbasho yɔ, ema ka yagba ngha ma ba; ema ka di ewema kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi Imgbasho ta.>>
ACT 5:40 A si gbɛ elodzɛ mgban, ta a kwu ama ogbikye iYesu ela si gbo ma ibe. Man wo ma ola gbɛɛ, nu ma ka gbɔdzɛ mi iyi mgbi iYesu wuba, si nu ma lu.
ACT 5:41 Ama ogbikye iYesu ntona dzita okwakye, le tsatsa ikyekyɛ Imgbasho kye ama wuuta dafi ama gyadzɛ tu ayiwi mi ikye iyi mgbi iYesu mani.
ACT 5:42 Alegbe-alegbe, mi okwakye mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin bɛyi udɛ udɛ, a yama nya ole tso dile gbɔ Esɔ Osuse gbɛɛ iYesu li iMedzaya ba.
ACT 6:1 Mi onɔ ngwi engwafɔ mgbi iYesu wale mbwo kpakpa nɛ, emi iJuda ama ogbɔ ondu iGriki le kwondukwɔ ikye ama ogbɔ ondu iHibru ikyekyɛ a kye owakwadɛ mgbi ama wuuta mi ungwogye ngwi a li gha alegbe-alegbe na ba.
ACT 6:2 Nghanɛ ama ogbikye iYesu iwyodefa ntona kwu ama onoyɛyɛ ntona duu kwakye si gbɛɛ, <<Ka li ayin ba kini eyi dzita idɔ mgbi elodzɛ Imgbasho yɛ le gha ungwogye yɔ.
ACT 6:3 Emi ongwunani, sadu engyulɔ egyafa mi idzidzɛ ema, ama ngwu ema ye gbɛɛ a dzɛ yi Onodzi saan yi ozoyeye mani. Eyi ka yile idɔ nɛ wo ma abɔ
ACT 6:4 ta eyi ka yile itukwu mgbi eyi nu mi ibɔ yi idɔ mgbi elodzɛ Imgbasho.>>
ACT 6:5 Ewodzɛ nɛ kpa inggisɛ ntona duu. A sadu iStivin, inggisɛ ngwu mbwo yi oyɛyɛ onuunu bɛyi Onodzi Osaan; iFyilipi kpaa, iProkoru, iNikano, iTimɔn, iPamena, bɛyi iNikola ongwu nkyɛ mi Antiɔku, nkyata luba odzɛ Imgbasho mgbi emi iJuda nani.
ACT 6:6 A gbe inggisɛ ntona tso ama ogbikye iYesu, man a bibɔ woma di kye abɔ dɔ ma ikye.
ACT 6:7 Nghanɛ elodzɛ Imgbasho gbɔfwɛ. Mmbwo mgbi engwafɔ iYesu mi iJerosalin she kpakpa, nɛ ama ofifɛ kwuba yɛɛ ama onoyɛyɛ.
ACT 6:8 Nɛ iStivin, inggisɛ ngwu elela mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ mbon yi mfye kpakpa, kyungwɔ ama okwulewo yi ambɛ okwulewo mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ ntonani.
ACT 6:9 Nɛ, inggisɛ angbeka mi ozu okwakye mgbi ofyɛɛ ama a shɛ ma adi ta wita otangwodzɛ yi iStivin. A li emi iJuda ama nkyɛ iSirini yi Alekdzandra bɛyi ayɛsɛ mgbi iSilisia yi Asia.
ACT 6:10 Nghaduu a yagba kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi ozoyeye mgban hona Onodzi ndzɛ mbon ma ba.
ACT 6:11 Nɛ a wɛ inggisɛ angbeka ɛwɛ daada ikye nu ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi fwo iStivin gbɔ elodzɛ ofya iMose yi Imgbasho ito.>>
ACT 6:12 Mi odzɛ nɛ, a kyile inggisɛ ntona angbi yi engyukwo bɛyi etsetse mgbi ola mgbi iMose. A bwa iStivin kyon ba okwakye.
ACT 6:13 A gbe ama omwonya angbeka ba, wa mwonya gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ nya ogbɔdzɛ obube ikpewo imbe osaan nɛ bɛyi ola waba.
ACT 6:14 Ikyesinɛ eyi fwon le gbɔgbɛɛ iYesu ongwi iNadzareti nɛ ka bulu imbe nɛ di nyinɛ aletɔ ngwi iMose kye wo eyi abɔ nɛni.>>
ACT 6:15 Ama nsɔto okwakye duu kye inɛ fyakwu iStivin, man a di inɛ mgban dzɛ dafi inɛ mgbi ongyesɔ mani.
ACT 7:1 Nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ byun gbɛɛ, <<Odzɛ ntonɛ li otsitsii?>>
ACT 7:2 IStivin nu uka gbɛɛ: <<Emi ongwunani yi emi otsani, gadɔ mbi ani na! Imgbasho mgbi okwɔkwɔ tɔ tu otseyi Abrahan ngwi o ka dzɛ iMesopotamia mani, duuse o wa dzɛ iHaran.
ACT 7:3 Imgbasho gbɛɛ, <Dzita ɛsɛ mgbi abu yi emidabu, lu ikpɛsɛ ngwi ani ka tso abu mani.>
ACT 7:4 <<Nghanɛ o dzita ikpɛsɛ mgbi emi iCadia lu ka sɔ iHaran. Ngwi otsɔn wa kwulu nyɛ nɛ, Imgbasho dɔn esɔ ba ikpɛsɛ ngwi ema todzɛ ele onɛnɛ nɛni.
ACT 7:5 Imgbasho nun okwudɛ onyi mmɛnɛ ba, atafɔ ikpɛsɛ onyi kpaa ba. Nghaduu Imgbasho zondu yan gbɛɛ ongwu yi etɔ mgban ka yɛɛ otsungwɔ ikpɛsɛ nɛni, nghataa gyegwu. Mi onɔ na Abrahan dzɛ yi ongwɛ waba.
ACT 7:6 Li odzɛ ngwi Imgbasho gbɔ yan aani: <Etɔ mgbi ema ka li ingyoga mi ɛsɛ ngwi li mgbi ama ba, a ka kwu ma ofyɛɛ di nu ma adzɛ mi onova ideli enɛ.
ACT 7:7 Imgbasho gbɛɛ, nghaduu ani ka kwo ɛsɛ ngwi a to ele dafi ofyɛɛ ma adɔ, ngyɛduu a ka tasɛ mi ɛsɛ na wa sunu ani mi imbe nɛni.>
ACT 7:8 Nɛ o nu Abrahan ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ikyɛ okyɛ-kyɛ. Man Abrahan yɛɛ otsɔ Adziki di kyan ikyɛ ngwi a mban nyɛ egbe egyata mani. Adziki wa yɛɛ otsɔ iJeko, iJeko di wa yɛɛ otsɔ iwyodefa emi otsikyeyi ntonani.
ACT 7:9 <<Ikyegbɛɛ emi otsikyeyi ntona di iJose tanyi nɛ, a kyon gya dafi ofyɛɛ lu Igyibiti. Nghaduu Imgbasho dzɛyan
ACT 7:10 di dulun tɔ mi okakewo mgban duu. Imgbasho nu iJose ozoyeye di yan abɔ nu untsɛ osuse dɔn mbi iFaro utɔ mgbi emi Igyibiti; nghanɛ o non yɛɛ inggisɛ ogbe emi Igyibiti teyi yi udɛ mgbi ongwu duu.
ACT 7:11 <<Nɛ omani wa dɔ mi Igyibiti yi iKana duu, kye adzɛ kpakpa ba, emi otseyi si tu ungwogye wuba.
ACT 7:12 Onɔ ngwi iJeko fwo gbɛɛ ungwogyowe dzɛ Igyibiti nɛ, o dɔ emi otseyi esɔ kɛ ele ababɔ.
ACT 7:13 Mi okɛɛkɛ mgbi ama ongwu fan ma, iJose nya emi ongwunɔn inggisɛ ngwu ongwu dzɛ mani, man iFaro si ye odzɛ etɔ mgbi iJose.
ACT 7:14 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ nyɛ nɛ, iJose dɛsɔ mbi otsɔn iJeko yi etɔ mgban duu, a li ngwuseta dɔn iwyo diwyeda duudu.
ACT 7:15 Nɛ iJeko si lu Igyibiti, li mi imbe na ngwi ama duu ka kwulu aali.
ACT 7:16 A yile ikwɔ mgbi ama luba iShekɛn wa ndzi mi endzi ngwi Abrahan gya nose mi abɔ mgbi emi ongwɛ iHamɔ mi awuya mani.
ACT 7:17 <<Ngwi onɔ wa mba ngwi Imgbasho ka mbwo ondu odzɛɛdzɛ yi Abrahan nɛ, mmbwo mgbi emideyi mi Igyibiti she kpakpa.
ACT 7:18 Nɛ utɔ ofufɛ, ngwu ye unkonyi mi odzɛ mgbi iJose ba, yɛɛ utɔ mgbi Igyibiti.
ACT 7:19 O ngwunu emideyi di si emi otsikyeyi, gbɛɛ nu ma gbe engwengyulɔ eyeyi ngwuta adzi nu ma kwulu.
ACT 7:20 <<Mi onɔ na a mba iMose, ma o li nngwadza mi inɛ mgbi Imgbasho. A gbɛwɛ byun mi udɛ otsɔn ofyia eta.
ACT 7:21 Ngwi a kyon tɔ dzata udɛ nɛ, ongwɛ iFaro ongwu ongyaa kyon si byun dafi ongwan mani.
ACT 7:22 A tso iMose ozoyeye mgbi emi Igyibiti tsatsa, o diyɛ datu mi elodzɛ yi okyɔɔkyɔ.
ACT 7:23 <<Onɔ ngwi iMose li onova ngwusefa ma, itukwu kyɛɛ lon oka kpadi emi Israi emidan.
ACT 7:24 O di onyi mi ele ngwu inggisɛ Igyibiti le nun adzɛ, nghanɛ o kɛ oka tobyun di kpumkpa ikyon mi okyi ngwɔlu inggisɛ Igyibiti nani.
ACT 7:25 IMose tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ, emidongwu ka difwi gbɛɛ Imgbasho kye ongwu le kyidɔ ikye odulu ma tɔ, nghaduu kpaa a difwi ba.
ACT 7:26 Tegblifan iMose wa kpatsɛ yi emi Israi nghi efa tole gblibe. O fya oyile ma gyiide mi ogbɛɛ, <Engyulɔ, ema li engwunɔ ewe kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema mina ota ewema mmya?>
ACT 7:27 <<Nghaduu ongwu nle kyɔ yi oka timbi ma tsamu iMose lu enggengga si gbɛɛ, <Li emɛ nu abu mfye okye eyi teyi di gbɔ eyi ikwɔ?
ACT 7:28 I mina abu ongwɔ ani dafi abu ngwɔ inggisɛ Igyibiti edɛdɛ naa?>
ACT 7:29 Ngwi iMose fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, o tsinya lu iMidian, imbe ngwi o ka dzɛ ingyoga di kye ongyaa mba ɛngbɛ efa.
ACT 7:30 <<Ngwi i wa nyɛ onova ngwusefa nɛ, ongyesɔ mblegba tu iMose mi ambɛ mgbi oshɛ ogyola mi imbe okplagada kwɛkwɛ yi Unggwɔ iSinai.
ACT 7:31 Ngwi iMose di ungwɔnɛ nɛ, i kwulun ewo. Ngwi o gbo kɛ kwɛkwɛ oka di saan nɛ, o fwo ela mgbi Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɛɛ:
ACT 7:32 <Ani li Imgbasho mgbi emi otsabu, Imgbasho mgbi Abrahan, Adziki yi iJeko.> IMose tsaatsa yi imio di yagba kye inɛ byi ola na wuba.
ACT 7:33 <<Nɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho si nyan gbɛɛ, <Kyi dulu okpafɔ mgbi abu; ikyekyɛ imbe ngwi abu kwudzɛ nɛ li imbe osaan.
ACT 7:34 Ani di adzɛ mgbi emidani mi Igyibiti wa. Ani fwo andu omama mgbi ama di ba esɛ owa shɛ ma adi ta. Ba onɛnɛni, n ka dɔ abu esɔ yɛ kɛ Igyibiti.>
ACT 7:35 <<Nɛnɛ li iMose ngwu a teyi fwan yi elodzɛ gbɛɛ, <Li emɛ nu abu li inggisɛ ogbe eyi teyi di gbɔ eyi ikwɔ?> Li iMose nɛ kpɔɔ ngwu Imgbasho nyɛ mbi ongyesɔ mblegba tun ngwi oshɛ le gyola mani. Dɔn esɔ no ka li inggisɛ ogbe ma teyi di dulu ma tɔ.
ACT 7:36 O gbe ma tasɛ mi Igyibiti di kyungwɔ ama okwulewo yi emi ambɛ okwulewo mi Igyibiti, mi ekyoo omuma okwukwo yi imbe okplagada mi onova ngwusefa.
ACT 7:37 <<Nɛnɛ li iMose ngwu nya emi Israi gbɛɛ, <Imgbasho ka kye oyegbɔ ndzɛ dafi ani mi idzidzɛ ema dɛsɔ nu ema mani.>
ACT 7:38 O wodzɛ okwakye mi imbe okplagada, yi ongyesɔ ngbɔdzɛ yan mi Unggwɔ ongwi iSinai, bɛyi emi otseyi; o di gbɛ elodzɛ oshishe okye wa gbɔ nya eyi.
ACT 7:39 <<Nghaduu emi otsikyeyi gbela yan ba. A fwan, di mina gbɛɛ ama ki yɛ lu Igyibiti.
ACT 7:40 A nya Eron gbɛɛ, <Mɛ eyi Imgbasho ama nka kye eyi teyi mani. Lubana iMose ngbe eyi tɔ mi Igyibiti nɛ, eyi ye ungwɔ nkyɔn ba!>
ACT 7:41 Nana li onɔ nose ngwi a mɛ adagyɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ongwumnda mani. A gbe ifɛ ofɛ-fɛ ba ele di kyɔ oga osunu ungwɔ ngwi ama mɛ mi abɔ mgbi ama.
ACT 7:42 Nghanɛ Imgbasho fashi iyikpa tsɛ ma yile osusunu mgbi ama nu mcɛ mi esho. Ungwɔnɛ kwokyi yi ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ mi Afɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ gbɛɛ: << <Emi Israi! Li ani ngwu ema ngwɔ ifyungwɔ di fifɛ nu mi onova ngwusefa mi imbe okplagadaa?
ACT 7:43 Emi adagyɛ ngwi ema mɛ osunu nani, ema kyile udɛ angwula ongwi iMoleki esho yi mcɛ mgbi Imgbasho mgbi ema iRefanu. Nghanɛ n ka lɔ ema onya lu anɔ oka> nyɛ-nyɛ iBabyilon kpaa.
ACT 7:44 <<Emi otsikyeyi dzɛ yi iTabenako obwɛndɛ yi ama mi oshɛ. A man dafi Imgbasho tso iMose mi odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi o di mani.
ACT 7:45 Dafi a kyi gbɛlu iTabenako nɛ, emi otseyi kyi kyelu byi yi ama, mi onɔ ngwi iJoshua kye ma teyi kaka ɛsɛ ngwi Imgbasho kyi gbɛlu nu ma nani. I tila dzɛ ikpɛsɛ na nghataa ba onɔ mgbi iDevedi,
ACT 7:46 ngwu ikyese mgbi Imgbasho dɔn, o di bɔn ibɔ gbɛɛ ni ongwu mbɛ imbe ngwi Imgbasho mgbi iJeko ka dzɛ nani.
ACT 7:47 Kpaa li iSolomu mbaan ozu nani.
ACT 7:48 <<Nghaduu, onghaangha na, li la ozu ngwi inggisɛ mbɛ ba. Dafi oyegbɔ gbɔgbɛɛ:
ACT 7:49 << <Esho li esutɔ mgbi ani, ɛsɛ li imbe mgbi ani ogbe afɔ dɔ. Li ali itɔ ozu ngwi abu ka mbɛ ani ele? Li ngha Imgbasho gbɔ aali. Naadi li mi ole ngwi imbe mgbi ani otonya ka dzɛ?
ACT 7:50 Li abɔ mgbi ani mɛ ungwɔ ntonɛ duu baa?>
ACT 7:51 <<Ema ama ndɔto ibiba dzɔgbɔ di kyiikyɛ mi itukwu yi adɔ ba nɛni! Ema to yɛyɛ dafi emi otsema mani: Ema li kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi Onodzi Osaan alonɔ duu!
ACT 7:52 Oyegbɔ teyi dzɛma ngwu emi otsikyema nose nun isɔ baa? A kye ngwɔlu ama ngbɔ obaaba mgbi ongwu nle saan na kpaa. Ma onɛnɛ ema kyon gya di ngwɔn wa.
ACT 7:53 Ema ama ngbɛ ola ngwi nyɛ abɔ ongyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho kpaa kyɔ mi ele ba nɛni.>>
ACT 7:54 Ngwi emi okwakye fwo odzɛ nɛ mi ondu mgban nɛ, a nyɛ yi itingga di kwolu inɛ ikye yan.
ACT 7:55 Kpaa iStivin, mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan, o ndinɛ kɛ esho si di okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho yi iYesu kwudzɛ abugye mgbi Imgbasho.
ACT 7:56 O gbɛɛ, <<Dika, ani di esho kwulu Ongwɛ Inggisɛ di kwudzɛ abugye mgbi Imgbasho.>>
ACT 7:57 Mi odzɛ nɛ a kye abɔ tukwu adɔ mgbi ama, le kwu ela mi ela okwukwo, ama duu kyɛɛ tukwun,
ACT 7:58 kwon tasɛ mi ogalu si wita otsan akwutsɛ. Nghanɛ, emi obwɛndɛ gbe angwuto mgbi ama wa tokɛ iyayi mgbi ongwɛ mmafa ngwu a li kwun di iSol nani.
ACT 7:59 Ngwi a le tsan akwutsɛ nɛ, iStivin bibɔ gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ iYesu, kyi gbɛlu onodzi mgbi ani.>>
ACT 7:60 Nɛ o gbe akwafɔ kwokɛ esɛ makwɔ tɔ esɛ gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ka wɛ alobube nɛ ikye ma ba.>> Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, o si yulu.
ACT 8:1 ISol dzɛ imbe nani di gbela ikwu iStivin. Mi egbe na isɔ gbobu tɔ ikye emi iKrestu mi iJerosalin, nɛ ama duu ganya kpatsɛ iJudia yi iSamaria, i sisi ama ogbikye iYesu yuoma.
ACT 8:2 Emidi Imgbasho kye iStivin ndzi di tsukwu kpakpa ikyon.
ACT 8:3 Nghaduu iSol wita odzili emi iKrestu. O le kaka udɛ udɛ, le kwo ama onoyɛyɛ engyulɔ yi engyaa gbe ma wokɛ obawi.
ACT 8:4 Ama ngwu a ganya ma na, gbeesɔ nɛ mi ali imbe ngwi a kɛ duu.
ACT 8:5 IFyilipi kɛ ogalu oka mi iSamaria ka gbeesɔ mgbi iKrestu mi ele.
ACT 8:6 Ngwi ibyi ntona fwo iFyilipi di di ambɛ okwulewo ngwi o kyɔ nɛ, a nghao gbekabyi mi odzɛ ngwi o gbɔ mani.
ACT 8:7 Onodzi ama okpɛkpɛ tasɛ mbi inggisɛ ibyibyi yi ela ota-ta, ama ngwu alewo kwulu yi ama ngbikye tukwu esɛ kwuba a ngyɛlu ma ootse.
ACT 8:8 Man atsa si dzɛ ogalu na kpakpa.
ACT 8:9 Inggisɛ oka dzɛ ogalu na li kyɔ obudei onɔ kɛ, li kwulu emi iSamaria duu ewo kpakpa, a li kwun di iSaimɔn. O tsaabɔ igɛgɛ gbɛɛ ongwu li ongbodzi inggisɛ.
ACT 8:10 Ta ali inggisɛ, ama nshewo yi ama n yɛ esɛ duu, kye eka mgbi ama nu mbon si li wulu gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ li mfye mgbi Imgbasho ngwi a ye gbɛɛ li mfye ogbagbadzidzi mani.>>
ACT 8:11 A kyɛdɔn ikyekyɛ onɔ kɛ ngwi o le kyungwɔ okwulu ma ewo yi obudei mgban.
ACT 8:12 Kpaa ngwi a nu iFyilipi oyɛyɛ dafi o gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu nɛ, a kyɔ ma iBatisima, engyulɔ yi engyaa duu.
ACT 8:13 ISaimɔn abuon noyɛyɛ ta a kyɔn iBatisima. O di kyɛdɔ iFyilipi mi ali imbe duu, i kwulun ewo mi ambɛ okwulewo kpakpa yi ungwɔ ama okwulewo ngwi o di ntonani.
ACT 8:14 Onɔ ngwi ama ogbikye iYesu mi iJerosalin fwo gbɛɛ, emi iSamaria gbɛ Imgbasho nɛ, a dɔ iPyita yi iJɔn esɔ kɛ mboma.
ACT 8:15 Ngwi a ka to nɛ, a bibɔ wo ma ikyegbɛɛ nu ma gbɛ Onodzi Osaan,
ACT 8:16 ikyena Onodzi Osaan ba mbi inggisɛ mgbi ama onyi waba; a kyɔ ma iBatisima mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ iYesu kyoon.
ACT 8:17 Nɛ iPyita yi iJɔn kye abɔ dɔ ma ikye ta a si gbɛ Onodzi Osaan.
ACT 8:18 Ngwi iSaimɔn di gbɛɛ li mi abɔ mgbi ama ogbikye iYesu okye dɔ ma ikye ta ngwi a kye Onodzi nu nɛ, o kye awuya ba mboma
ACT 8:19 si gbɛɛ, <<Nu ani kpaa mfye nɛni, adzi ni ali inggisɛ ngwu ani kye abɔ gbon duu no gbɛ Onodzi Osaan.>>
ACT 8:20 IPyita nu uka gbɛɛ: <<Ni awuya mgbi abu dzili bɛyi abu duu, ikyesinɛ abu tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ abu ka gya umba mgbi Imgbasho yi awuya!
ACT 8:21 Abu dzɛ yi ayɛ hona umba mi idɔ nɛ ba, ikyekyɛ itukwu mgbi abu le saan mbi Imgbasho ba.
ACT 8:22 Kyatitukwu mi imbali nɛni di bibɔ mbi Otsɛ. Kpakpana o ka dzita abu mi odzɛ yi itɔ ewodzɛ ngwi abu dzɛyan mi itukwu mbi abu nɛni.
ACT 8:23 Ikyekyɛ ani di gbɛɛ abu mbwo yi unɔ bɛyi adi obwa-bwa mi alobube.>>
ACT 8:24 Nɛ iSaimɔn nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Bɔ Otsɛ Imgbasho ibɔ ikye ani adzi ni ungwɔ ngwi abu gbɔ ntonɛ onyi kpaa no ka kyɔ ani ba mani.>>
ACT 8:25 Onɔ ngwi a kyɔ obwɛndɛ di gbeesɔ mgbi Otsɛ ngyɛ nɛ, iPyita yi iJɔn yidɔ le lu iJerosalin, le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mi agwɔ ibyibyi mi iSamaria.
ACT 8:26 Nɛ ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ nya iFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Lu ofɛ atɛsɛ, ofɛ okplagada nkyɛ mi iJerosalin lu iGadza nani.>>
ACT 8:27 Nɛta o si tɔ ofɛ le lu, ngwi o le kɛ ofɛ nɛ, o kpatsɛ adumongyaa inggisɛ iTiopia, inggisɛ imɔ nle di mi awuya mgbi iKandase duu, Apodza mgbi emi iTiopia mani. Inggisɛ nɛ kɛ iJerosalin oka sunu Imgbasho,
ACT 8:28 ngwi o sɔdzɛ mmya yɛ le lu udɛ mgban nɛ, o le gbɔ afɛ mgbi oyegbɔ Adzaya.
ACT 8:29 Onodzi nya iFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Kɛ ka kwudzɛkɛ kwɛkwɛ yi mmya nani.>>
ACT 8:30 IFyilipi si tsinya kɛ kwɛkwɛ yi mmya na si fwo inggisɛ na le gbɔ afɛ mgbi oyegbɔ Adzaya. IFyilipi byita gbɛɛ, <<Ungwɔ ngwi abu gbɔ na gbosa lo abuu?>>
ACT 8:31 O gbɛɛ, <<Ka gbosa lo ani sinɛ, sede inggisɛ oka ka kye gbɔfwɛ nya ani se lo?>> Nghanɛ o bɔ iFyilipi gbɛɛ no wa sɔ yan.
ACT 8:32 Inggisɛ na le gbɔ imbe ngbɛɛ, <<A kyon teyi dafi ongwummala ngwi a kye le ka ngwɔ mani. O di dzɛ shili dafi ongwummala ngwi a dzan andu, kpaa o kwondu ba mani.
ACT 8:33 Mi ayiwi mgban yɔ, a non gye emyɛmyɛ ba. Li emɛ ka gbɔdzɛ etɔ mgban? Lubana a kyi kyelun oshishe mi ɛsɛ nɛni.>>
ACT 8:34 Adumongyaa na byi iFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Tsuutsu nya ani, li emɛ ngwu oyegbɔ le gbɔdzan, li mi ikye ongwu abuon naadi inggisɛ oka idzidza?>>
ACT 8:35 Ta iFyilipi si wita yi imbe mgbi Afɛ na yɛyɛ nyan Esɔ Osuse mgbi iYesu.
ACT 8:36 Ngwi a le kɛ ofɛ nɛ, a wa to imbe ngwi eni dzɛ, ta adumongyaa na gbɛɛ, <<Dii, eni dzɛ aani. Kyɔnɛ ngwi a ka kyɔ ani iBatisima ba?>> [
ACT 8:37 IFyilipi gbɛɛ, <<Kini abu noyɛyɛ yi itukwu mgbi abu duu yɔ, a ka yagba kyɔ abu.>> Adumongyaa na si gbɛɛ, <<N noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ iYesu iKrestu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho.>>]
ACT 8:38 O byakpaa gbɛɛ nu ma kwulɛsɛ yi mmya. IFyilipi yi inggisɛ na tashulu kaka eni man iFyilipi kyɔn iBatisima.
ACT 8:39 Mi onɔ ngwi a tasɛ mi eni ma, Onodzi mgbi Otsɛ wa kyi kyelu iFyilipi lu akponyi, man adumongyaa na din wuba, kpaa lu ungwɔn le tsatsa.
ACT 8:40 IFyilipi ka tɔ mi Azotu le kyikyɛ kyɛ, le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mi ali igeli duu nghataa ka kaka iSisiria.
ACT 9:1 Mi ongwonɔ na, iSol kale pita ofɛ obube ongwɔ engwafɔ mgbi Otsɛ. O kɛ mbi okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ
ACT 9:2 ka bɔn gbɛɛ non lɔ afɛ kwuba kɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda nto iDamasiko, ikyegbɛɛ kini ongwu tu inggisɛ nka dzɛ itɔ Ofɛ na yɔ, ni li ongyulɔ naadi ongyaa kpaa ni ongwu kwun ofyɛɛ luba iJerosalin.
ACT 9:3 Ngwi o dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka iDamasiko nɛta, osa tɔkyɛ esho wa dzanwo akponyi.
ACT 9:4 O gbɛsɛ lakɛ esɛ si fwo ela le nyan gbɛɛ, <<iSol, iSol, li ekyɛ ngwi abu le nu ani isɔ?>>
ACT 9:5 ISol byita gbɛɛ, <<Li abu emɛni Otsɛ?>> Ela na nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Li ani iYesu ngwu abu le nu ani isɔ mani.
ACT 9:6 Kyato onɛnɛ kaka ifu ogalu, ta a ka nya abu ungwɔ ngwi abu ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mani.>>
ACT 9:7 Inggisɛ ama nkyɛ yi iSol na mmyɛ dzɛma; ikyesinɛ a fwo ela na kpaa a di inggisɛ ba.
ACT 9:8 ISol kyato mi esɛ, ngwi o kwulu inɛ nɛ, o yagba odinɛ wuba. Nɛ a byin abɔ kaka iDamasiko.
ACT 9:9 O binɛ dzɛ imbe na egbe eta, o gye ungwɔ hona wa ungwɔ kpaa ba.
ACT 9:10 Mi iDamasiko ma ongwafɔ oka dzɛ ele iyin di Anania. Otsɛ kwun ela mi inɛ odiidi gbɛɛ, <<Anania!>> O gbela gbɛɛ, <<Uwoo, Otsɛ.>>
ACT 9:11 Otsɛ nyan gbɛɛ, <<Lu ofɛ ngwi iyin gbɛɛ Byi yɛyɛ nani kɛ udɛ iJuda ka byita inggisɛ ongwi iTasu ngwu iyin di iSol, o le bibɔ mi abɔ ma.
ACT 9:12 O di inggisɛ ngwu a li kwun di Anania ba mi inɛ odiidi wa kye abɔ le dɔn ikye, ikye okwulun inɛ.>>
ACT 9:13 Kpaa Anania gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, ani fwo inggisɛ ibyibyi le gbɔdzɛ ungwɔ obube ama inggisɛ nɛ kyɔ yi emi osaan mi iJerosalin.
ACT 9:14 Ma o di gbɛ mfye mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ badzɛ owa bwa ali inggisɛ nle kwu mi iyi mgbi abu duu.>>
ACT 9:15 Nghaduu Otsɛ nya Anania gbɛɛ, <<Kɛ! Inggisɛ nɛ li okyiidɔ ngwi ani dulun okye iyi ani kɛ mbi Udzengye yi utɔ mgbi ama bɛyi emi Israi duu.
ACT 9:16 Ma n ka tson dafi o ka gbiisɔ mi ikye iyi mgbi ani kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ mani.>>
ACT 9:17 Ta Anania si lu ka kaka ozu mani, ngwi o kye abɔ dɔ iSol ikye nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<Ongwunɛn iSol, Otsɛ iYesu ngwu tsetu abu mi ofɛ mi onɔ ngwi abu le ba mmɛnɛ nani, dɔ ani esɔ ikyegbɛɛ ni abu yɛ dinɛ diyɛ mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan.>>
ACT 9:18 Labɔlabɔ mata, ungwɔ dafi akwukwu mmbweni tɔ ngwuta mi inɛ mgbi iSol, ta o diyɛ le di. O kyato taman a kyɔn iBatisima,
ACT 9:19 ngwi o wa gye ungwogye nɛta o si yile ewo bɛsɛ. ISol kye egbe gwee yi engwafɔ mgbi iYesu mi iDamasiko.
ACT 9:20 O byakpa wita ogbeesɔ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda gbɛɛ iYesu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho.
ACT 9:21 Ama nfwon duu i kwulu ma ewo ta a byita gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ongyulɔ nle nu ama nle kwu mi iyi nɛ isɔ mi iJerosalin ma baa? Ma o di ba mmɛnɛ owa bwa ma gbe ma lu ka nu engyukwo ama ofifɛ naadi?>>
ACT 9:22 Nghaduu esɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ mgbi iSol nghao fyumfye di non kwulu emi iJuda ama nto iDamasiko ewo mi otso gbɛɛ iYesu li iMedzaya.
ACT 9:23 Ngwi i wa kɛ gɔɔ nɛ, emi iJuda wibu ongwɔn,
ACT 9:24 kpaa iSol difwi oweka mgbi ama. Otu yi onɔ a gbinɛbyi onufɛ ogalu le ngyo ikye ongwɔn.
ACT 9:25 Nghaduu ama okyɛdɔn kyen wokɛ uya mi otu kyon nyɛ ifo mi ewishi luba esɛ.
ACT 9:26 Ngwi o wa kaka iJerosalin nɛ, o fya gbɛɛ ni ongwu kwakye yi engwafɔ mgbi iYesu, kpaa ama duu tsimion, a noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ o li ongwafɔ otsitsi ba.
ACT 9:27 Kpaa iBanabasi kyon ba mbi ama ogbikye iYesu. O nya ma dafi mi onɔ ngwi iSol le kɛ okyɛɛ ma o di Otsɛ iYesu, Otsɛ di gbɔdzɛ yan, dafi o di gbeesɔ mi iyi mgbi iYesu mi iDamasiko yi imio ba mani.
ACT 9:28 Nghanɛ iSol dzɛ yi ama mi iJerosalin shewota, le gbɔdzɛ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ.
ACT 9:29 O li gbɔdzɛ di tangwodzɛ yi emi iJuda ama ogbɔ ondu iGriki, kpaa a fya ongwɔn.
ACT 9:30 Ngwi ama onoyɛyɛ wa difwi nghanɛ, a kyon lu iSisiria, di kyon dɛsɔ lu iTasu.
ACT 9:31 Ta ali okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mi iJudia, iGalalia bɛyi iSamaria duu dzɛ mi iyu onɔ nani. Onodzi Osaan si ya ma abɔ nu ma fyumfye di she mi mmbwo, di dzɛ yi imio mgbi Otsɛ.
ACT 9:32 Dafi iPyita le dzagaba kpatsɛ ɛsɛ na duu nɛ, o kɛ oka kpadi emi osaan mi iLida.
ACT 9:33 Mi imbe na o tu inggisɛ ngwu a li kwun di Aeni, kwulu afɔ yi abɔ ladzɛ akwulo onova egyata.
ACT 9:34 IPyita nyan gbɛɛ, <<Aeni iYesu iKrestu ngyɛlu abu ootse. Kyato kyi kyelu akwulo mgbi abu.>> Aeni byakpa kyato akponyi.
ACT 9:35 Ama nto iLida bɛyi iSharon duu di Aeni man kyata yɛɛ ama okyɛdɔ Otsɛ.
ACT 9:36 Ongwafɔ ongyaa oka dzɛ iJopa iyin di iTabyita (ngwi itan di iDokasi mi ondu iGriki), o li le kyungwɔ ama osuse di ya emi abubɔ abɔ alonɔ duu.
ACT 9:37 Mi itɔnɔ na o dotse si kwulu, a sho ikwɔ mgban ewo kye ka dɔ mi ozeesho.
ACT 9:38 ILida tunto yi iJopa ba; ngwi engwafɔ wa fwo gbɛɛ iPyita dzɛ iLida nɛ, a dɔ inggisɛ efa esɔ kɛ mbon gbɛɛ, <<Wafɔ yi eyi plɛ-plɛ!>>
ACT 9:39 IPyita wafɔ yi ama, ngwi o ka to nɛ a kyon lu ozeesho. Engyaa owakwadɛ duu kyato tokɛ unto yan, le makwɔ di gbe abu yi angwuto angbeka ngwi iDokasi kwo nu ma mi onɔ ngwi o ka dzɛ oshishe ma tson.
ACT 9:40 IPyita lɔ ma onya duu tɔ mi ifoozu; si kwɛsɛ bibɔ. Ngwi o kyata inɛ kɛ mbi ongyaa ikwukwɔ nɛ, o gbɛɛ, <<iTabyita, kyato.>> O kwulu inɛ, ngwi o di iPyita nɛta, o sɔkɛ unto.
ACT 9:41 O kye abɔ byun yan abɔ non kye afɔ dzɛkɛ esɛ. Nɛ o si kwu ama onoyɛyɛ ela bɛyi ewakwadɛ kyon nu ma oshishe.
ACT 9:42 Odzɛ nɛ gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ iJopa duu, inggisɛ kwuba di noyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ.
ACT 9:43 IPyita tila dzɛ iJopa kye onɔ kpakpa yi inggisɛ okyidɔ okpa okwookwo ngwu a li kwun di iSaimɔn.
ACT 10:1 Ongyulɔ oka dzɛ iSisiria a li kwun di iKɔnɛlu, o li okwukwo ogbakwu nle di mi obyi oblakwutsɛ mi Italia.
ACT 10:2 Ongwu yi etɔ mgban duu kye itukwu nu di li mio Imgbasho; o li gha emi abubɔ umba dzii di li bɔ Imgbasho ibɔ alonɔ duu.
ACT 10:3 Egbe oka dafi obyi eta ngwi onɔ tashulu akpa nɛ, o di inɛ odiidi. O di ongyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho saan, ba mbon wa gbɛɛ, <<IKɔnɛlu!>>
ACT 10:4 IKɔnɛlu kye inɛ fyakwun yi imio. O byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ɛkyɛ, Otsɛ?>> Ongyesɔ na nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ibɔ yi umba mgbi abu ogha emi abubɔ duu lu esho i yɛɛ ungwɔ Imgbasho kale wɛ abu.
ACT 10:5 Dɔ inggisɛ esɔ nu ma kɛ iJopa ka yile inggisɛ ngwu iyin di iSaimɔn ngwu a li kwun di iPyita na onɛnɛni.
ACT 10:6 O dzɛ yi iSaimɔn inggisɛ okyidɔ okpa, ngwu udɛ mgban dzɛ ondekyoo okwukwo nani.>>
ACT 10:7 Onɔ ngwi ongyesɔ ngwu gbɔdzɛ yan na lu nɛ, iKɔnɛlu kwu engbidɔ mgban efa ela bɛyi inggisɛ oblakwutsɛ nli mio Imgbasho, di li onyi mbi ama ogban esɔ.
ACT 10:8 O nya ma alungwɔ nkyɔ duu man dɔ ma esɔ lu iJopa.
ACT 10:9 Tegblifan ngwi onɔ dɔ idzidzɛ udɛ ngwi a le lu agaba ungwɔ ma di dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi iJopa nɛ, iPyita dɔkɛ ikpendu oka bibɔ.
ACT 10:10 Onyagleu dɔn o di mina ogye ungwogye. Ngwi a kale kyɔ ungwogye nɛ, o di inɛ odiidi.
ACT 10:11 O di esho kwulu a kye ungwɔ dafi akwukwɔ ogbada kye odi tsan mi okoko enɛ naan luba esɛ.
ACT 10:12 Mi ifun ali itɔ mmbwaba afɔ enɛ, yi ungwɔ ama okwo ifu esɛ bɛyi ali itɔ ingwunɔ emi esho duu woto ele.
ACT 10:13 Nɛ ela si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyato, iPyita. Ngwɔlu ma gye.>>
ACT 10:14 IPyita nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ mi otsitsi yɔ ungwɔ ka dzɛ ngha gbɛ ba. Lubana ani gye ungwɔ onyi ntsiidza naadi le kpɛkpɛ ye ba.>>
ACT 10:15 Ela na diyɛ nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka kwu ungwɔ onyonyi ngwi Imgbasho kye mɛlu saan gbɛɛ ungwɔ idza ba.>>
ACT 10:16 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ngha akpe eta, man a byakpa kyi kyelu akwukwɔ na lu esho.
ACT 10:17 Ngwi iPyita kale tsɛwɛ ungwɔ ngwi inɛ odiidi nɛ tso nɛ, inggisɛ ama ngwu iKɔnɛlu dɔ ma esɔ ntona ka ye imbe ngwi udɛ iSaimɔn dzɛ man kwulɛsɛ tokɛ onufoka.
ACT 10:18 A kwu ela, byita gbɛɛ ni ama ye ni iSaimɔn ngwu a li kwun di iPyita na ka dzɛ mmana mayɔ.
ACT 10:19 Dafi iPyita kale tsɛwɛ mi inɛ odiidi nɛ, Onodzi nyan gbɛɛ, <<iSaimɔn, inggisɛ eta to esɛ le pita abu ma.
ACT 10:20 Nghanɛ tashulu lu ozu esɛ. Ka fwa owafɔ yi ama lu ba, ikyesinɛ li ani dɔ ma esɔ.>>
ACT 10:21 IPyita tashulu ka nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ani li inggisɛ ngwu ema le pitan mani. Ema ba li ɛkyɛ?>>
ACT 10:22 A gbɛɛ, <<iKɔnɛlu okwukwo ogbakwu dɔ eyi esɔ. O li inggisɛ osaan di li mio Imgbasho, ngwu emi iJuda duu li fwon. Ongyesɔ osaan nyan gbɛɛ no nu abu ba udɛ mgban adzi non fwo odzɛ ngwi abu ka gbɔ nyan mani.>>
ACT 10:23 Nɛ iPyita gbɛ ma kaka udɛ dafi ingyoga mgban mani. Tegblifan nɛ iPyita kyato okyɛɛ yi ama, ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka mi iJopa kpaa di wafɔ yi ama.
ACT 10:24 Ngwi egbe di fa nɛ, o kaka iSisiria. IKɔnɛlu kye inɛ kwo ofɛ le fɛ ma di kwu etɔ bɛyi abuge mgban duu kwakye.
ACT 10:25 Dafi iPyita wa to udɛ ma nɛ, iKɔnɛlu wa kwɛsɛ mi iyayi mbon di sunun.
ACT 10:26 Kpaa iPyita kye abɔ byun nyan gbɛɛ, <<kyato, ani kpaa li inggisɛ owamyɛ dafi abu.>>
ACT 10:27 Ngwi iPyita kale gbɔdzɛ yan nɛ, iPyita lu idzidzɛ ozu ka di ibyi inggisɛ kwakye to.
ACT 10:28 O nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Ema ye saan ta gbɛɛ ola mgbi eyi fwa gbɛɛ inggisɛ emi iJuda no ka kwakye yi Udzengye hona kɛ ingyoga mi udan ba. Nghaduu Imgbasho tso ani gbɛɛ ni ani ka kwu inggisɛ owamyɛ gbɛɛ o le kpɛkpɛ hona tsiidza ba.
ACT 10:29 Nghanɛ ngwi ema dɛsɔ mbi ani ma, ani tsondu ba ani ba. Ema dɛsɔ mbi ani li ali itɔdzɛ?>>
ACT 10:30 IKɔnɛlu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Egbe enɛ inɛ waani ani wodzɛ ozu mbi ani le bibɔ mi obyi eta itɔ onɔ nɛni. Nɛta inggisɛ wo angwuto onzundzɛ kwɔkwɔ wa mblegba tu ani
ACT 10:31 <<Si gbɛɛ, <IKɔnɛlu Imgbasho fwo ibɔ mgbi abu di wɛ umba ngwi abu le gha emi adzɛ mani.
ACT 10:32 Nghanɛ dɛsɔ kɛ iJopa mbi iSaimɔn ngwu a li kwun di iPyita nani. O kɛdzɛ ingyoga mi udɛ iSaimɔn inggisɛ nli kyidɔ okpa, ndzɛ ondekyoo okwukwo nani.>
ACT 10:33 Man ani byakpa dɛsɔ mbi abu, i tishi dafi abu di ba mani. Onɛnɛ eyi duu kwakye mmɛnɛni mi inai Imgbasho ikye ofwo alungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho wo abu ola gbɛɛ ni abu nya eyi mani.>>
ACT 10:34 IPyita si wita ogbɔdzɛ gbɛɛ: <<Onɛnɛ ani difwi otsitsi gbɛɛ Imgbasho li tso osadu-sadu ba
ACT 10:35 kpaa li gbela yi inggisɛ mi ali agwɔ nli mion di kyungwɔ nli ayin mani.
ACT 10:36 Ema ye esɔ ngwi Imgbasho dɔ mbi emi Israi, onya ma Esɔ Osuse mgbi iyu ngwi nyɛ mbi iYesu iKrestu, ongwu nli Otsɛ mgbi alungwɔ duu nani.
ACT 10:37 Ema ye ungwɔ nkyɔ mi ikpɛsɛ iJudia duu, wita mi iGalalia mi onɔ ngwi iJɔn gbeesɔ mgbi iBatisima nyɛ
ACT 10:38 dafi Imgbasho kye engyie kyi iYesu ongwi iNadzareti ikye yi Onodzi Osaan bɛyi mfye, dafi o dile kyikyɛ kpatsɛ le kyungwɔ osuse dile ngyɛlu ama ngbeka woto abumfye mgbi onodzi ibwubwe duu ootse, ikyesinɛ Imgbasho dzɛ biyan.
ACT 10:39 <<Eyi li obwɛndɛ mi alungwɔ ngwi o kyɔ mi ɛsɛ iJuda bɛyi iJerosalin duu. A ngwɔn mi okyon gbokwo ekwatsi,
ACT 10:40 nghaduu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwu mi egbe ongwu ta mani di nu ma dun.
ACT 10:41 Li ali inggisɛ duu din ba, kpaa li ama Imgbasho sadulu ma mbi eyi ama ngye di wa yan mi onɔ ngwi o kyato mi ikwu ma li obwɛndɛ aali.
ACT 10:42 O wo eyi ola gbɛɛ ni eyi gbeesɔ nya inggisɛ di kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ li ongwu ngwu Imgbasho dulu gbɛɛ ni ongwu li inggisɛ ogbɔ emi oshishe bɛyi emi ikwukwɔ ikwɔ.
ACT 10:43 Oyegbɔ duu kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikyon gbɛɛ ali inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ duu a zanta yi alobube mi iyi mgban.>>
ACT 10:44 Ngwi iPyita kale gbɔ elodzɛ ntonɛ nɛ, Onodzi Osaan kaka mbi ali inggisɛ ama nfwo esɔ na duu.
ACT 10:45 I kwulu emi iJuda ama nkyiikyɛ di noyɛyɛ wafɔ yi iPyita ma ewo dafi umba mgbi Onodzi Osaan kpaa a kye nu Udzengye mani.
ACT 10:46 Lubana a fwo ma le gbɔ ondudzɛ angbeka dile tsɛ Imgbasho. Nɛta iPyita gbɛɛ,
ACT 10:47 <<Inggisɛ oka dzɛma nka fwa gbɛɛ nu ma ka kyɔ inggisɛ ntonɛ iBatisima mi eni ba gbɛɛ? Lubana a gbɛ Onodzi Osaan dafi eyi kpaa gbɛ nɛni.>>
ACT 10:48 IPyita nu ondu gbɛɛ nu ma kyɔ ma iBatisima mi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu. Nɛ a si nya iPyita gbɛɛ no dzɛ yi ama mi egbe gwee.
ACT 11:1 Ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka mi iJudia duu fwo dafi Udzengye kpaa gbɛ elodzɛ Imgbasho mani.
ACT 11:2 Dafi iPyita wa kaka iJerosalin nɛta, ama nnoyɛyɛ kyiikyɛ kwun shanyɛ
ACT 11:3 gbɛɛ, <<Abu ka kaka udɛ ama okyiikyɛ ba gye ungwogye yi ama.>>
ACT 11:4 IPyita wita di gbɔ alungwɔ duu nya ma klɛklɛ dafi i kyɔ mani:
ACT 11:5 <<Ani dzɛ igeli iJopa le bibɔ, ani nuna lu kpini si di inɛ odiidi. Ani di ungwɔ dafi akwukwɔ ogbada a kye odi tsan mi okoko enɛ kyɛ esho luba esɛ, di li imbe ani dzɛ ma yɛyɛ ngwi i ba.
ACT 11:6 Ani winɛ kɛ ifun man di mmbwaba ama owo afɔ enɛ, mmbwaba ama okwukwo, mmbwaba ama okwo ifu esɛ, bɛyi ingwunɔ emi esho.
ACT 11:7 Ta ani fwo ela le nya ani gbɛɛ, <Kyato iPyita, ngwɔlu ma gye.>
ACT 11:8 <<Ani nu uka gbɛɛ, <Otsɛ mi otsitsi yɔ ungwɔ ka dzɛ ngha gbɛ ba. Lubana ani gye ungwɔ onyi ntsiidza naadi le kpɛkpɛ ye ba.>
ACT 11:9 <<Ela na diyɛ nya ani gbɛɛ, <Ka kwu ungwɔ onyonyi ngwi Imgbasho kye mɛlu saan gbɛɛ ungwɔ idza ba.>
ACT 11:10 Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ ngha akpe eta, man a di kyi kwolu yɛ lu esho.
ACT 11:11 <<Mi onɔ nata engyulɔ nghi eta ngwu a dɔ ma esɔ kyɛ iSisiria ba mbi ani wa kwulɛsɛ to udɛ ngwi ani ladzɛ mani.
ACT 11:12 Onodzi nya ani gbɛɛ ni ani ka kwagbini owafɔ lu yi ama ba. Ama onoyɛyɛ nghi egyin ntonɛ kpaa tawo ani, ka kaka udɛ inggisɛ nani.
ACT 11:13 O nya eyi dafi ongyesɔ mblegba tu ongwu mi ozu mgban di gbɛɛ, <Dɛsɔ kɛ mbi iSaimɔn mi iJopa ngwu a li kwun di iPyita nani.
ACT 11:14 O ka nya abu esɔ ngwi abu yi etɔ mgbi abu duu ka watɔ mi ele mani.>
ACT 11:15 <<Dafi ani wita ogbɔdzɛ nɛ, Onodzi Osaan ba mboma dafi i teyi ba mbi eyi mi owita-wita nani.
ACT 11:16 Ta ani wɛ odzɛ ngwi Otsɛ nose gbɔ mani, gbɛɛ: <iJɔn kyɔ iBatisima mi eni, kpaa a ka kyɔ ema iBatisima mi Onodzi Osaan.>
ACT 11:17 Nghanɛ kini Imgbasho nu ma umba ungwonyi dafi o nu eyi ama nnoyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ iYesu iKrestu nɛ ma, ani li emɛ mi onɔ na okye afɔ twɛsɛ fwa yi Imgbasho?>>
ACT 11:18 Ngwi a fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, a kiyayi otangwodzɛ wuba man tsɛ Imgbasho, le gbɛɛ, <<Alima, Imgbasho gbela yi Udzengye kpaa odzita ma yi obube nu ma tu oshishe.>>
ACT 11:19 Ikyenghanɛ, ama onoyɛyɛ nganya ikye ikwu iStivin nɛ, tse lu iFonishia, iSapru, bɛyi Antiɔku, le gbeesɔ nya emi iJuda yuoma kyoon.
ACT 11:20 Angbeka mboma, dafi i dzɛ duu kpaa, a li emi iSapru bɛyi iSirini, lu Antiɔku ka wita ogbɔdzɛ yi emi iGriki kpaa, le nya ma Esɔ Osuse mgbi Otsɛ iYesu.
ACT 11:21 Abumfye mgbi Otsɛ dzɛ yi ama, nɛ inggisɛ kwuba noyɛyɛ di kyata luba mbi Otsɛ.
ACT 11:22 Odzɛ nɛ kaka adɔ mgbi emi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mi iJerosalin, man a dɔ iBanabasi esɔ kɛ Antiɔku.
ACT 11:23 Ngwi o ka kaka di di dafi Imgbasho kye mse bɛ inggisɛ ntona ewo nɛ, atsa tsan o di fyuma mfye itukwu duu gbɛɛ nu ma kwulɛsɛ mi otsitsi mbi Otsɛ yi itukwu mgbi ama duu.
ACT 11:24 Lubana iBanabasi li inggisɛ osuse, di mbwo yi Onodzi Osaan bɛyi oyɛyɛ onuunu. Ikyenghanɛ inggisɛ kwuba luba mbi Otsɛ.
ACT 11:25 Nɛ iBanabasi kɛ iTasu oka pita iSol,
ACT 11:26 ngwi o ka tun nɛ, o kyon luba Antiɔku. Mi onova na duu iBanabasi yi iSol li kwakye yi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu di tso ibyi inggisɛ kpakpa ungwɔ. Li mi Antiɔku ababɔ ngwi a wita okwu ama okyɛdɔ iYesu di emi iKrestu.
ACT 11:27 Mi onɔ nɛ oyegbɔ angbeka kyɛ iJerosalin bato Antiɔku.
ACT 11:28 Onyi mboma, ngwu iyin di Agabu, kyato gbɛɛsɛ nyɛ mi Onodzi gbɛɛ onikyenbwa ka gbo kpatsɛ ɛsɛ iRoma. (Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ mi onɔ ngwi iKladiɔsu li utɔ.)
ACT 11:29 Ama okyɛdɔ iYesu mi Antiɔku kye ali itɔ oyabɔ ngwi ama dzɛyan duu dɛsɔ nu emi ongwunɔ ma mi iJudia.
ACT 11:30 Ungwɔ ngwi a li kyɔ yɔ, a li kye umba mgbi ama dɛsɔ nyɛ mbi iBanabasi yi iSol kɛ mbi engyukwo mgbi ama mi iJerosalin.
ACT 12:1 Li mi itɔnɔ nɛ ngwi utɔ iHerude wita obwa emi iKrestu angbeka, yi oweka onu ma isɔ.
ACT 12:2 O teyi ngwɔ iJɛnsi ongwunɔ iJɔn mi okwusunkli.
ACT 12:3 Ngwi o di gbɛɛ i kpa emi iJuda nɛ, o kiyayi di bwa iPyita kpaa. Ungwɔnɛ kyɔ mi onɔ mgbi ibredi ngwi a li kye okwuna wele ba nani.
ACT 12:4 Dafi o bwan nɛ, o kyon wokɛ obawi di kyon dɔ ama ongyoongyo ubɔ, oblakwutsɛ eneenɛ mi otsa enɛ duu. IHerude dzɛ yi oweka owa dulun tɔ ba wa gbɔn ikwɔ mi ododa mi onɔ ngwi oga owɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi emi Israi ngyɛ mani.
ACT 12:5 IPyita tila wodzɛ obawi, kpaa okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu yɔ le bibɔ mi itukwu onyi mbi Imgbasho ikyon.
ACT 12:6 Mi obwi egbe ngwi iHerude ka kyon tɔ wa gbɔn ikwɔ ma, iPyita la le nuna mi idzidzɛ oblakwutsɛ nghi efa, a bwan adi agya efa, ama ongyoongyo di to onufɛ okakaakaka.
ACT 12:7 Plɛ nɛta ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ wa mblegba tu ma ta obawi si gbosa. O kye abɔ mu iPyita mi agya kyilen una, o nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kyato Plɛ!>> Man ashi ntona shɛ lon mi owashi abɔ yangwuta.
ACT 12:8 Ongyesɔ na si nyan gbɛɛ, <<Gbe angwuto mgbi abu wo bɛyi okpafɔ.>> IPyita si kyɔ ngha. Ongyesɔ na di nyan gbɛɛ, kye angwuto ofu mgbi abu tukwu kyɛdɔ ani.
ACT 12:9 IPyita kyɛdɔn tasɛ mi obawi, kpaa i gbosa lon gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi ongyesɔ le kyɔ na li otsitsi ba, o tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ongwu le woowo elela.
ACT 12:10 A nyɛ imbe ongyoongyo ongwi ababɔ bɛyi ongwu fan, di wa to onufɛ ashashi ntɔ lu ogalu nani. I kwulu ewon, man a nyɛ ele tasɛ. Ngwi a kyikyɛ lu byulu nɛ, ongyesɔ na byulu dzanta.
ACT 12:11 Nɛta iPyita difwi di gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ ani ye yɛyɛ gbɛɛ Otsɛ dɔ ongyesɔ mgban gbɛɛ no wa dulu ani tɔ mi abumfye mgbi iHerude bɛyi alungwɔ ngwi emi iJuda le tsɛwɛ ikye ani duu.>>
ACT 12:12 Ngwi o wa difwi ungwɔnɛ nɛ, o lu udɛ iMeri onɔ iJɔn, ngwi a di li kwun gbɛɛ iMaki, imbe ngwi ibyi inggisɛ kwakye to dile bibɔ.
ACT 12:13 IPyita tsaabɔ mi onufɛ ongwi esɛ, man ongwongyiidɔ ngwu iyin di iRoda ba owa ye inggisɛ ndzɛ onufɛ mani.
ACT 12:14 Ngwi o difwi ela mgbi iPyita nɛ, atsa atsan nyɛsɛ o kwulu ofɛ wuba kpaa yɛ tsinya lu dile kwu-ela gbɛɛ, <<iPyita dzɛ onufɛ ma!>>
ACT 12:15 Kpaa a nyan gbɛɛ, <<O dzɛ yi ikye yɛyɛ ba.>> Dafi o kale kiyayi gbɛɛ di li otsitsi nɛ, a nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ka li ongyesɔ mgban kyɛmɛ.>>
ACT 12:16 Nghaduu iPyita yɔ kale tsaabɔ kpɔɔ ma, ngwi a wa kye kwulu ofɛ nɛ, a din man i kwulu ma ewo.
ACT 12:17 IPyita kyɔ ma abɔ gbɛɛ nu ma dede si tsuutsa dafi Otsɛ dulu ongwu tɔ mi obawi mani. O di gbɛɛ, <<Nya iJɛnsi bɛyi ama onoyɛyɛ odzɛ mi ungwɔnɛni.>> Nɛman o si lu imbe oka.
ACT 12:18 Ngwi egbe fa nɛ, ɛndɛ olɛlɛ efu ba dzɛ mi idzidzɛ ama oblakwutsɛ mi ungwɔ nkyɔ yi iPyita nani.
ACT 12:19 Ngwi iHerude gbilin kpatsɛ din ba nɛ, o diyɛ kya mbi ama ongyoongyo ntonani si nu ondu gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔ ma. Nɛ iHerude kyɛɛ mi iJudia lu iSisiria ka kye egbe gwee mi ele.
ACT 12:20 IHerude teyi dzɛ yi odzɛ oshiishi yi emi iTiru bɛyi iSidon; a yɛ kwakye yi ewoma di pita ofɛ ogbɔdzɛ yan. Ngwi a tu oyabɔ mgbi iBlastu, ongbidɔ mgbi utɔ yuon ngwu a nun oyɛyɛ nɛ, a kɛ mbi utɔ ka pita iyu, ikyekyɛ li ɛsɛ mgbi utɔ na li nu ma ungwogye.
ACT 12:21 Mi egbe ngwi a kye dzɛ ma, iHerude gbe angwuto mgban mgbi utɔ wo ewo, sɔkɛ itsuutɔ mgban man gbɔdzɛ yi ama mi ododa.
ACT 12:22 A wulu gbɛɛ, <<Nɛnɛ li ela mgbi Imgbasho li mgbi inggisɛ ba.>>
ACT 12:23 Ikyegbɛɛ iHerude tsɛ Imgbasho ba nɛ, Ongyesɔ mgbi Otsɛ tan afɛ, ta o gbaangbi byakpa kwulu.
ACT 12:24 Nghaduukpaa elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho kiyayi osheeshe di gbɔfwɛ.
ACT 12:25 Ngwi iBanabasi bɛyi iSol ngyɛlu ungwɔ ngwi a kɛ ma nɛ, a yɛ mi iJerosalin, a kye iJɔn ngwu a li kwun di iMaki na wafɔ yi ama.
ACT 13:1 Mi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mi Antiɔku ma, ama ogbɛɛsɛ yi etsetse to ele; li iBanabasi yi iSimiɔn ngwu a li kwun di iNaija bɛyi iLushɔ ongwi iSirini yi iMane (ongwu nshe bɛyi iHerude iGɔna nani) yi iSol.
ACT 13:2 Ngwi a tole sunu Otsɛ dile tukwondu nɛ, Onodzi Osaan gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Dulu iBanabasi yi iSol dzɛkɛ idzidza mi ikye idɔ ngwi ani kwu ma ela ikyon mani.
ACT 13:3 Ngwi a tukwondu diyɛ bibɔ nɛta, a gbe abɔ dɔ ma ikye di wo ma ofɛ lu.
ACT 13:4 Ngwi Onodzi Osaan dɔ ma esɔ nɛ, iBanabasi yi iSol byi ofɛ abɔ lu ka kaka iSelushia si kaka uwaa dzɛkyo lu ibu ongwi iSapru.
ACT 13:5 Ngwi a wa to iSalami nɛ, a gbeesɔ mgbi Imgbasho mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda. IJɔn iMaki kyɛ yi ama le tobyi ma.
ACT 13:6 A kyikyɛ kpatsɛ ibu na nghataa wa kaka iPafosu. Mi imbe nɛ a kpatsɛ yi inggisɛ iJuda otseefa di li oyegbɔ atsika ngwu iyin di iBa-iYesu,
ACT 13:7 nli kyɛ yi iSejiɔ iPaɔlɔsu iGɔna ongwi ibu nani. IGɔna na, li inggisɛ ndzɛ yi ozoyeye saan, o dɛsɔ mbi iBanabasi yi iSol ikyekyɛ o mina ofwo elodzɛ Imgbasho.
ACT 13:8 Kpaa Elimasi inggisɛ otseefa na (bana li ita iyi mgban aali) kaka ma idzidzɛ fwa yi iGɔna na gbɛɛ no ka noyɛyɛ mi odzɛ ngwi iBanabasi yi iSol le gbɔ na ba.
ACT 13:9 Nɛ iSol, ngwu iyin oka di iPol, nmbwo yi Onodzi Osaan na tongwinɛ byi Elimasi nyan gbɛɛ,
ACT 13:10 <<Abu ongwɛ owapɛ olodu nli ongyikyili mgbi alungwɔ osuse duu nɛ! Abu mbwo yi ali ɛwɛ yi okpagyewo duu. Abu ka nya ombe ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ nli ayin nɛ lo?
ACT 13:11 Nghanɛ abɔ mgbi Otsɛ kpakli abu wa. O ka binɛ, mi ongwonɔ gwee o ka di osa mgbi onɔ ba.>> Ntunto nɛta inɛ tuubu lon man o yɛɛ pwaapwa dile mina inggisɛ nka kwon abɔ tɔ mani.
ACT 13:12 Ngwi iGɔna di ungwɔ nkyɔ nɛ, o noyɛyɛ, bana i kwulun ewo mi otsootso odzɛ mgbi Otsɛ.
ACT 13:13 IPol yi emi afokyɛɛ mgban kaka uwaa mi iPafosu luba iPega, igeli mi iPamfyilia, li imbe na ngwi iJɔn ngwu iyin oka di iMaki na dzita ma yɛ lu iJerosalin aali.
ACT 13:14 Mi iPega ma, a kyato lu Antiɔku ongwi iPisidia. Mi egbe otonyewo nɛ, a kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda di sisɛ.
ACT 13:15 Onɔ ngwi a gbɔ mi afɛ mgbi Ola mgbi iMose bɛyi afɛ mgbi emi Oyegbɔ nyɛ nɛta, ama odi mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda na dɛsɔ mboma gbɛɛ, <<Emi ongwunani, ni ema dzɛ yi esɔ mgbi onu itukwu ofyumfye-fyumfye ikye inggisɛ ntonɛ yɔ, gbɔ na.>>
ACT 13:16 IPol dzɛkunto kyɔ ma abɔ si gbɛɛ: <<Emi Israi bɛyi Udzengye ama osunu Imgbasho, gadɔ mbi ani na!
ACT 13:17 Imgbasho mgbi emi Israi dulu emi otseyi; o nu ma okiyayi mi onɔ ngwi a to Igyibiti mani, mi abumfye odatu o dulu ma tɔ mi ɛsɛ nani,
ACT 13:18 o shitukwu yi okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi ama mi afutse onova ngwusefa,
ACT 13:19 di dzili agwɛɛsɛ egyafa mi iKana kye ikpɛsɛ mgbi ama kye nu emidi ongwu no yɛɛ okwudɛ mgbi ama.
ACT 13:20 Ungwɔ ntonɛ duu kye mɛ onova ideli enɛ ngwusefa dɔn iwyo. <<Ngwi ungwɔnɛ kyɔ nyɛ nɛ, Imgbasho gbe ama ogbiikwɔ nu ma nghataa ba onɔ mgbi oyegbɔ iSamue.
ACT 13:21 Nɛ inggisɛ ntona si mina utɔ, man Imgbasho kye iSol ongwɛ iKish, mi udzɛ mgbi iBenjamin nu ma, o sɔ utɔ onova ngwusefa.
ACT 13:22 Ngwi o wa dulu iSol utɔ nɛ, o nu iDevedi yɛɛ utɔ mgbi ama. O kyɔ obwɛndɛ ikyon gbɛɛ: <Ani tu iDevedi ongwɛ iJese inggisɛ ongwi itukwu mgbi ani, o ka kyɔ alungwɔ duu ngwi ani mina gbɛɛ no kyɔ mani.>
ACT 13:23 <<Mi etɔ mgbi inggisɛ nɛ, Imgbasho kye ongye Onagbɛ iYesu nu emi Israi, dafi o zondu mani.
ACT 13:24 Duuse ni iYesu wita idɔ yɔ, iJɔn gbeesɔ okyatitukwu bɛyi iBatisima nya ali inggisɛ duu mi Israi.
ACT 13:25 Ngwi iJɔn le ngyɛlu idɔ mgban nɛ, o byi ma gbɛɛ: <Ema tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ani li emɛ? Ani li ongwu ma ba. Ei, o kyɛma mi iyikpa ani, odi okpafɔ mgban kpaa ani mɛ oshɛ ba.>
ACT 13:26 <<Emi ongwunani, engwɛ Abrahan, bɛyi Udzengye ama omio Imgbasho, li ikye mgbi eyi ngwi a kye esɔ mgbi owatɔ-watɔ nɛ ba aani.
ACT 13:27 Inggisɛ emi iJerosalin bɛyi ama ogbe ma teyi difwi itɔ inggisɛ ngwu iYesu dzɛ ma ba, kpaa mi ongwɔn ikwɔ yɔ, a mbwumbwo ungwɔ ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ li tsekise gbɔ mi alegbe otonyewo mani.
ACT 13:28 Dafi a tu itɔdzɛ nmɛ ongwɔn ba nɛ kpaa, a nya iPlatu gbɛɛ no nu ondu nu ma ka ngwɔn.
ACT 13:29 Ngwi a kyi kyɔlu alungwɔ ngwi a lɔ ikpewon duu ma ngyɛ nɛ, a tashulun mi ekwatsi di kyon ndzi.
ACT 13:30 Nghaduu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwongye,
ACT 13:31 egbe ibyibyi ama nwafɔ yan mi iGalalia kɛ iJerosalin ma din. A li obwɛndɛ mgban mbi emideyi onɛnɛni.
ACT 13:32 <<Eyi le nya ema Esɔ Osuse nɛni: Li ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho zondu yi emi otseyi
ACT 13:33 o mbwumbwo ikye eyi emi ongwama, mi okyile iYesu mi ikwongye. Dafi a tsekise lɔn mi afɛ mgbi ashi ongwu fan mani gbɛɛ: << <Abu li Ongwani; inɛ nɛ ani yɛɛ Otsabu.>
ACT 13:34 Ikyegbɛɛ Imgbasho kyilen mi ikwu, dika non bwa ba nɛ kpaa, a lɔn mi elodzɛ ntonɛni gbɛɛ: << <N ka kye ondu odzɛɛdzɛ osaan bɛyi mse ingblimɔ ngwi ani teyi dzɛ yi iDevedi ma nu abu.>
ACT 13:35 Li ngha ngwi a lɔ imbe oka gbɛɛ: << <Abu ka nu Ongwabu Osaan mbee ba aali.>
ACT 13:36 <<Lubana ngwi iDevedi kyɔ oweka mgbi Imgbasho ngyɛ duu nɛ, o kwulu; a kyon ndzi yi emi otsɔn ikpewo mgban bwa.
ACT 13:37 Nghaduu ongwu Imgbasho kyilon mi ikwu na bwa ba.
ACT 13:38 <<Ikyenghanɛ, emi ongwunani, i mina ani gbɛɛ ni ema ye gbɛɛ li ikpewo iYesu ngwi a gbeesɔ odzita inggisɛ yi ali ibwubwe nya ema aani.
ACT 13:39 Mi ikpewon ali inggisɛ ngwu noyɛyɛ duu gye emyɛmyɛ, ola mgbi iMose yagba kyungwɔnɛ ba.
ACT 13:40 Gbɛwɛbyi ni ungwɔ ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ gbɔ ntona no ka kyɔ ema ba ungwɔ ama ngbɛɛ:
ACT 13:41 << <Dii, ema ama ogbɔ agya, kwu Imgbasho shanyɛ ntonɛ, ka kwulu ema ewo, ema dika dzili. Ani ka kyungwɔ mi egbe mgbi ema ngwi ema ka noyɛyɛ ba yeba ni inggisɛ nyaanya ema kpaa.> >>
ACT 13:42 Dafi iPol yi iBanabasi le dzita ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda nɛ, inggisɛ ntona bɔ ma gbɛɛ nu ma di wa gbɔdzɛ mi itɔdzɛ ntonɛ mi egbe otonyidɔ nkyɛ nɛni.
ACT 13:43 Onɔ ngwi a ngyɛlu okwakye nɛ, emi iJuda ibyibyi bɛyi ama nkyata le sunu odzɛ Imgbasho mgbi emi iJuda ma, kyɛdɔ iPol yi iBanabasi, a gbɔdzɛ yi ama di nu ma itukwu ofyumfye-fyumfye gbɛɛ nu ma kiyayi odzɛ mi elela mgbi Imgbasho.
ACT 13:44 Mi egbe otonyidɔ ngbɔdɔ ma, i dzɛ dafi inggisɛ mi ogalu duu kwakye ikye ofwo elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ mani.
ACT 13:45 Ngwi emi iJuda di ibyi inggisɛ ntona nɛ, a kaka uwaba dile fyito mi odzɛ ngwi iPol le gbɔ mani.
ACT 13:46 Nɛ iPol yi iBanabasi nu ma uka yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ gbɛɛ: <<Dzɛ gyɔ ngwi eyi kika gbɔdzɛ Imgbasho nya ema ababɔ. Kpaa ngwi ema fwan di kye ewema wuuta otu oshishe igyegwu ba nɛ, eyi yile inɛ byi Udzengye onɛnɛni.
ACT 13:47 Lubana nɛnɛ li ungwɔ ngwi Otsɛ wo eyi ola mi ele aani gbɛɛ: << <Ani nu abu li osa mbi Udzengye, ikyegbɛɛ ni abu kye esɔ mgbi owatɔ-watɔ kpatsɛ ɛsɛ.> >>
ACT 13:48 Onɔ ngwi Udzengye fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, ewo shɛta lo ma a di kye mmwɛ nu elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ; ama ngwu a di sadu ma ikye oshishe igyegwu duu noyɛyɛ.
ACT 13:49 Elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ si gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ ayɛsɛ na duu.
ACT 13:50 Nghaduu emi iJuda kaka mbi engyaa ama omio Imgbasho ama nle kpɔngɔ bɛyi inggisɛ ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi mi ogalu nani. A nu ma wita eye yi iPol bɛyi iBanabasi, di lɔ ma onya tɔ mi ayɛsɛ nani.
ACT 13:51 Nghanɛ a kyi gbolu ombulu mi afɔ mgbi ama dafi a gbela yi ama ba mani, ta a si lu iKonu.
ACT 13:52 Man engwafɔ si mbwo yi atsa bɛyi Onodzi Osaan.
ACT 14:1 IPol yi iBanabasi ka kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda mi iKonu dafi a teyi li kyɔ mani. Mi ele ma a gbeesɔ saan ta mmbwo inggisɛ kwuba mi iJuda bɛyi Udzengye onoyɛyɛ.
ACT 14:2 Kpaa emi iJuda ama nfwa onoyɛyɛ ntona kwo Udzengye ntona wo nu ma kyitingga yi iPol bɛyi iBanabasi.
ACT 14:3 Nghanɛ iPol yi iBanabasi kye onɔ kpakpa mi ele, le gbɔdzɛ mgbi Otsɛ mi ododa. Otsɛ tso gbɛɛ esɔ mgbi elela mgban na li otsitsi mi onu ma mfye okyungwɔ bɛyi ambɛ ama okwulewo.
ACT 14:4 Emi ogalu na gheefa, angbeka yɛ agya mgbi emi iJuda, angbeka yɛ agya mgbi ama ogbikye iYesu.
ACT 14:5 Ta Udzengye yi emi iJuda bɛyi engyukwo mgbi ama duu, wibu onu iPol bɛyi iBanabasi adzɛ di tsɛ ma akwutsɛ.
ACT 14:6 Nghaduu ngwi a wa ye odzɛ ele nɛ a tsinya lu iLikonia igeli mgbi iListra bɛyi iDebe bɛyi ɛsɛ ama nkpakɛkɛ won,
ACT 14:7 dika gbeesɔ osuse mi imbe ntonani.
ACT 14:8 Inggisɛ oka dzɛ iListra waawaa afɔ, tummya kyɛ ifu di kyikyɛ ye ba.
ACT 14:9 O kye adɔ ge le fwo iPol dafi o le gbɔdzɛ mani. IPol kye inɛ byin yɛyɛ, difwi gbɛɛ o dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu ongyɛlun ootse,
ACT 14:10 si kwu ela tɔ gbɛɛ, <<Kyato dzɛkunto mi afɔ mgbi abu!>> Mi elodzɛ nɛ, inggisɛ na ta lu esho si wita okyikyɛ.
ACT 14:11 Onɔ ngwi ibyi ntona di ungwɔ ngwi iPol kyɔ nɛ, a wulu mi ondu iLikonia gbɛɛ, <<Imgbasho gbeka ba mbi eyi mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ wa!>>
ACT 14:12 IBanabasi a kwun gbɛɛ iDzeu, a di kwu iPol gbɛɛ iHɛmɛ ikyesinɛ o li inggisɛ oteyi odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ.
ACT 14:13 Ta inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi imgbasho mgbi iDzeu, ngwu ozu ofifɛ mgban dzɛ kyila yi igeli okwukwo nani, ba yi engyulumnda bɛyi ofumbu wa to onufɛ ogalu igeli ikyesinɛ ongwu bɛyi ibyi inggisɛ ntona mina ofifɛ nu iPol bɛyi iBanabasi.
ACT 14:14 Nghaduu ngwi iPol yi iBanabasi fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, a fawa angwuto mgbi ama tsinya kaka idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ, le weela gbɛɛ:
ACT 14:15 <<Engyulɔ, kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le kyungwɔnɛ nghaa? Eyi kpaa li inggisɛ owamyɛ ta dafi ema mani. Eyi kye esɔ osuse nɛ le wa nu ema, le nya ema gbɛɛ ni ema kyata mi ayayi ungwɔ ntonɛni luba mbi Imgbasho oshishe, ongwu nta esho yi esɛ bɛyi ekyoo okwukwo bɛyi alungwɔ ama nto efu duu nani.
ACT 14:16 Tugbe ma, Imgbasho li nu ali ɛsɛ duu kyɔ owitukwu mgbi ama.
ACT 14:17 Nghaduu o li nya okye ewon tso ma ba. O tso ema mse mgban mi onu ema mmbwo di nu etɔ ungwogye she mi onɔ mgban; o nu ema ungwogye kpakpa di mbwo ema yi atsa mi itukwu.>>
ACT 14:18 Yi elodzɛ ntonɛ duu kpaa, i fyi ma mfye okwɔ ibyi inggisɛ ntona ofifɛ nu ma.
ACT 14:19 Ta emi iJuda angbeka kyɛ mi Antiɔku bɛyi iKonu wa kwolu ibyi inggisɛ luba agya mgbi ama. Nɛ a tsɛ iPol akwutsɛ di kwon tasɛ mi ogalu nani, le tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o kwulu.
ACT 14:20 Kpaa ngwi engwafɔ wa kpakɛkɛ won nɛ, o kyato diyɛ lu ogalu nani. Tegblifan ma ongwu bɛyi iBanabasi dzata imbe na lu iDebe.
ACT 14:21 A gbeesɔ osuse mi igeli okwukwo nani di tu inggisɛ ama onoyɛyɛ kwuba. Man a yɛ lu iListra, iKonu bɛyi Antiɔku,
ACT 14:22 a yile engwafɔ dzɛ ofɛ di kwu ma ɛwɛwo gbɛɛ nu ma noyɛyɛ mi otsitsi. A di nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi ka nyɛ mi adzɛ kpakpa ikye okaka esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.>>
ACT 14:23 IPol bɛyi iBanabasi dulu engyukwo nu ma mi ali okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu duu, yi ibɔ obɔɔbɔ bɛyi ondu otukwu-tukwu, a kye ma dubɔ Otsɛ, ongwu a kye oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama byi mbon nani.
ACT 14:24 A nyɛ ongwi iPisidia, a wa kaka iPamfyilia,
ACT 14:25 ngwi a gbeesɔ mi iPega ngyɛ nɛ, a kye ikye dɔ lu Atalia.
ACT 14:26 Mi Atalia ma a dzɛkyo mi uwaa yidɔ lu Antiɔku, imbe ngwi a kye ma dubɔ elela mgbi Imgbasho mi ikye idɔ ngwi a kyɔ ngyɛ nani.
ACT 14:27 Ngwi a kaka imbe na ma, a gbe emi iKrestu kwakye mbonyi di nya ma alungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ nyɛ mbi ama, dafi o di kwulu ofɛ mgbi oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi Udzengye kpaa mani.
ACT 14:28 A si dzɛ yi engwafɔ mi imbe na onɔ tunto.
ACT 15:1 Inggisɛ angbeka kyɛ mi iJudia wa kaka Antiɔku man le tso ama onoyɛyɛ ntona gbɛɛ: <<Sede a ka kyɛ ema ikyɛ mi otsootso mgbi iMose bayɔ, ema ka yagba otu owatɔ-watɔ ba.>>
ACT 15:2 Mi odzɛ nɛ iPol bɛyi iBanabasi si kaka angwodzɛ ota-ta yi ama kpakpa. Ta a si dulu iPol yi iBanabasi, bɛyi ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka, gbɛɛ nu ma lu iJerosalin ka di ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi engyukwo mi odzɛ nɛni.
ACT 15:3 Opokwakye mgbi emi iKrestu dɔ ma esɔ nu ma byi ofɛ abɔ, dafi a kyikyɛ nyɛ iFonishia bɛyi iSamaria nɛ, a gbɔ dafi Udzengye kpaa kyata yɛ luba mbi Imgbasho mani. Elodzɛ nɛ nu ama onoyɛyɛ duu ewo oshɛta kpaakpaa.
ACT 15:4 Ngwi a wa kaka iJerosalin nɛ, okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu yi ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi engyukwo duu gbɛ ma, nɛta a nya ma alungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ nyɛ mbi ama duu.
ACT 15:5 Ta ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka ama ndzɛ agya mgbi emi iFarasi ma kyɛɛ tokɛ unto si gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Li kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ ngwi a ka nu Udzengye kyiikyɛ, di ngyo ola mgbi iMose.>>
ACT 15:6 Nghanɛ ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi engyukwo kyi ikye kwokyi yi ewoma ikye odi mi odzɛ nɛni.
ACT 15:7 Ngwi a gbɔdzɛ kpakpa nɛ, iPyita kyɛɛ unto si gbɔdzɛ yi ama gbɛɛ, <<Emi ongwunani, ema ye dafi mi onɔ ama nyɛ ma Imgbasho dulu ani mi idzidzɛ ema ogbɔ Esɔ Osuse mi ondu mgbi ani ni Udzengye fwo di noyɛyɛ mani.
ACT 15:8 Imgbasho n ye itukwu mgbi inggisɛ duu ma, tso gbɛɛ di ongwu gbɛ Udzengye mi okye Onodzi Osaan nu ma, yɛyɛ dafi o kyɔ yi eyi nɛni.
ACT 15:9 O tso idzidza mgbi eyi yi ama ba, lubana o salu ma itukwu yɛɛ saan ikyekyɛ a noyɛyɛ.
ACT 15:10 Nghama, kyɔsinɛ ngwi ema le fya ombadi Imgbasho mi okye okye egyeegyɛ ngwi eyi naadi emi otseyi yagba okye ye ba kye dɔ engwafɔ ikye?
ACT 15:11 Ei! Eyi noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ li mi elela mgbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu ngwi a dulu eyi tɔ, dafi ama kpaa a dulu ma tɔ nani.>>
ACT 15:12 Okwakye na duu zumyɛ le gadɔ mbi iPol bɛyi iBanabasi dafi a le nya ma odzɛ ungwɔ ama okwulewo bɛyi ambɛ ama ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ yi Udzengye nyɛ mbi ama mani.
ACT 15:13 Onɔ ngwi a ngyɛ nɛ, iJɛnsi gbɔdzɛ tɔ gbɛɛ: <<Engwunani, gadɔ mbi ani na.
ACT 15:14 ISaimɔn tsuutsa nya eyi dafi mi ababɔ ma Imgbasho tso oweka mgban mi odulu Udzengye angbeka nu ma yɛɛ emidan mani.
ACT 15:15 Elodzɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ kpaa kwokyi yi ungwɔnɛ, dafi a lɔ mi Afɛ mani gbɛɛ:
ACT 15:16 << <Ni ungwɔnɛ nyɛ ani ka yidɔ di yile esutɔ mgbi iDevedi sisɛ. Ikpishi mgban ani ka yilen mbɛ, dika non dzɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgban,
ACT 15:17 adzi ni inggisɛ owamyɛ ama nsisi duu pita Otsɛ, bɛyi Udzengye ama ndzɛ yi iyi mgbi ani duu, li ngha ngwi Otsɛ nkyungwɔ ntonɛnɛ gbɔ aali>
ACT 15:18 ungwɔna a teyi yen mi owita-wita mgbi ɛsɛ majo.
ACT 15:19 <<Nghanɛ, ani le ngyɛlu gbɛɛ, ni eyi ka non yɛɛ okye mbi Udzengye ama nle kyata luba mbi Imgbasho ba.
ACT 15:20 Tatase ni eyi lɔ ma afɛ, nya ma nu ma dulu abɔ mi ungwogye ngwi a kye fifɛ nu angwula, mi amah idza, mi mmbwɛ mmbwaba ngwi a tsili-tsili ma onbukwɔ bɛyi mi ali eyi duu.
ACT 15:21 Lubana a gbɔ ola mgbi iMose mi ali ogalu onɔ kɛ di gbɔn mi imbe okwakye mgbi emi iJuda ali egbe otonyewo duu.>>
ACT 15:22 Ta ama ogbikye iYesu yi engyukwo, bɛyi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu olɔlɔ duu, bwondu dulu emidama angbeka di dɔ ma esɔ lu Antiɔku yi iPol bɛyi iBanabasi. A dulu iJuda (ngwi a li kwun gbɛɛ iBasaba) bɛyi iSaila, inggisɛ efa ntonɛ a nu ma mmwɛ kpaakpaa mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ.
ACT 15:23 A kye afɛ ntonɛ dɔ ma esɔ a lɔ mi ele gbɛɛ: Ama ogbikye iYesu yi engyukwo, bɛyi emi engwunema, dɛsɔ angba mbi ema Udzengye emi engwuneeyi mi Antiɔku, iSiria, bɛyi iSilisia.
ACT 15:24 Eyi fwo gbɛɛ angbeka mbi eyi tɔ mi oye-ye mgbi eyi ba di nu ema okakewo, nu ema isɔ mi itukwu mi odzɛ ngwi a gbɔ mani.
ACT 15:25 Nghanɛ eyi duu gbela odulu inggisɛ angbeka yi emi okeyi ingblimɔ iBanabasi yi iPol di dɔ ma esɔ mbi ema.
ACT 15:26 Inggisɛ ntonɛ kye oshishe mgbi ama lasɛ mi ikye iyi mgbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu.
ACT 15:27 Nghawanɛ eyi le dɔ iJuda yi iSaila esɔ nu ma ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ ongwi ondu mi ungwɔ ngwi eyi le lɔ ntonɛni.
ACT 15:28 I kpa Onodzi Osaan bɛyi eyi ombwo ema okye ngha ungwɔ ntonɛ ba, sede li ama ndzɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ nɛni.
ACT 15:29 Ema ka gye ungwogye ngwi a kye fifɛ nu angwula ba, ungwɔ eyeeyi ba, ema dika gye mmbwɛ mmbwaba ngwi a tsili-tsili ma onbukwɔ ba, di dulu abɔ mi amah idza. Kini ema kyungwɔ ntonɛ bayɔ, li ayin seali. Kɛ saan na.
ACT 15:30 Inggisɛ ntona kyɛɛ okyɛɛ lu Antiɔku, ka kwu emi iKrestu kwakye mbonyi kye afɛ ma nu ma.
ACT 15:31 Inggisɛ ntona gbɔ afɛ nani ewo di shɛta loma ikyesinɛ li esɔ okwu ma ɛwɛwo.
ACT 15:32 IJuda yi iSaila, ama abuoma li oyegbɔ, a gbɔdzɛ kpakpa okwu ama onoyɛyɛ ntona ɛwɛwo di yile ma dzɛ ofɛ.
ACT 15:33 Ngwi a kye egbe gwee mi ele nɛ, ama onoyɛyɛ ntona wo ma ofɛ mi iyu nu ma yidɔ lu ka tu ama ndɔ ma esɔ mani.
ACT 15:34 (Nghaduukpaa iSaila yɔ i kpan odzɛ imbe nani.)
ACT 15:35 Kpaa iPol bɛyi iBanabasi tila dzɛ Antiɔku, nɛ ama bɛyi inggisɛ angbeka kwuba tso diyɛ gbeesɔ mgbi Otsɛ mi ele.
ACT 15:36 I wa la gwee nɛ iPol gbɔ yi iBanabasi gbɛɛ, <<Ba ni eyi yɛ ka kpadi emi ongwuneyi mi ali igeli ngwi eyi gbeesɔ mgbi Otsɛ mi ele duu, di di dafi a le kyɔ mani.>>
ACT 15:37 I mina iBanabasi okye iJɔn, ngwu a di li kwun gbɛɛ iMaki na, wafɔ yi ama,
ACT 15:38 kpaa iPol tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ li ayin ba okyon wafɔ yi ama, ikyesinɛ o tse dzamata mi iPamfyilia di nya okyidɔ yi ama.
ACT 15:39 A dzɛ yi angwodzɛ fyumfye kpakpa yi ewoma nɛman a gha okyɛɛ. IBanabasi kyelu iMaki fooye lu iSapru,
ACT 15:40 nghaduu iPol dulu iSaila lu yan, ngwi a le lu nɛ, ama onoyɛyɛ kye ma wokɛ iwulu abɔ mgbi Otsɛ.
ACT 15:41 O kyikyɛ kpatsɛ iSiria bɛyi iSilisia, le fyi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mfye itukwu.
ACT 16:1 IPol bɛyi iSaila kɛ iDebe, a di nyɛ kɛ iListra, imbe ngwi inggisɛ onoyɛyɛ ngwu a li kwun di iTimoti dzɛ, Onɔn li emi iJuda di noyɛyɛ. Nghaduu otsɔn li emi iGriki.
ACT 16:2 Ama onoyɛyɛ mi iListra bɛyi iKonu duu gbɔdzɛ osuse ikpewo iTimoti.
ACT 16:3 Nghanɛ i mina iPol okyon wafɔ kɛ agaba yan, ikyenghanɛ o kyan ikyɛ ikye mgbi emi iJuda ama nto imbe na mani, ikyena ama duu ye gbɛɛ otsɔn li emi iGriki.
ACT 16:4 Ngwi a le dzagaba mi igeli igeli kyɛ nɛ, a kye ewodzɛ ngwi ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi engyukwo emi iJerosalin kye bwalu ma, gbɔ nya inggisɛ ntona ikyegbɛɛ nu ma sunu mi ele.
ACT 16:5 Nghanɛ ozu okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu duu fyumfye kpakpa mi oyɛyɛ onuunu dile mbwoombwo mi mmbwo mgbi ama alegbe-alegbe.
ACT 16:6 Akpe oka nɛ iPol bɛyi emidan dzagaba nyɛ iFrijia bɛyi iGalatia, ikyena Onodzi Osaan nya ma gbɛɛ nu ma ka yama gbeesɔ mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia ba.
ACT 16:7 Ngwi a wa to otsee iMisia nɛ, i mina ma okaka iBitinia, nghaduu Onodzi mgbi iYesu nu ma ofɛ nu ma kaka ba.
ACT 16:8 Nghanɛ ta a si wikye nyɛ ongwi iMisia lu iTroa.
ACT 16:9 Mi otu na iPol si di inɛ odiidi. O di ongyulɔ mi iMasidonia, le tɛkyɛ yan gbɛɛ, <<Ba iMasidonia wa ya eyi abɔ.>>
ACT 16:10 Ngwi iPol di inɛ odiidi nyɛ nɛ, eyi si wewo akponyi lu iMasidonia. ikyekyɛ eyi kyi kye gbɛɛ, Imgbasho kwu eyi ela gbɛɛ ni eyi ka gbɔ Esɔ Osuse nya ma mi imbe nani.
ACT 16:11 Eyi kaka uwaa mi iTroa dzɛkyo dɔkɛ ibu iSamotre, tegblifan nɛ eyi bɛsɛ mi iNiapoli.
ACT 16:12 Mi imbe na eyi lu iFyilipi, ogalu ongwi ababɔ mi agwɔ iMasidonia nbyidzɛ abumfye mgbi iRoma nani; eyi la imbe na egbe ibyibyi.
ACT 16:13 Mi egbe otonyewo nɛ, eyi tasɛ dzita onufɛ ogalu lu ondekyoo, imbe ngwi eyi tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ emi iJuda ka kwakye le bibɔ mani. Eyi sisɛ di wita ogbɔdzɛ yi engyaa angbeka ama nkwakye mi imbe na mani.
ACT 16:14 Onyi mi idzidzɛ ma nle fwo eyi ma li iLedia mi iTyatira, o li gbe angwuto ondlɛndlɛ gya. O li sunu Imgbasho, nɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho kwulun itukwu non gbela odzɛ ngwi iPol le gbɔ mani.
ACT 16:15 Ngwi a kyɔn iBatisima bɛyi emidan duu nɛ, o bɔ eyi gbɛɛ ni eyi ba udan. O gbɛɛ, <<Ni ema kye ani gbɛɛ ani noyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ yɔ, ba wa la udɛ ani na.>> O biibɛ yi eyi, ta eyi si kɛ.
ACT 16:16 Egbe oka ngwi eyi le kɛ imbe obibɔ nɛ, eyi kpatsɛ yi ongwongyaa ofyɛɛ ngwu esɛ dɔn ikye di li ongye ogbɛɛsɛ. O li tseefa kwo awuya kpakpa nu emi otsidɔn.
ACT 16:17 Ongwongyaa nɛ kyɛdɔ iPol yi eyi le kwu-ela gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ntonɛ li engbidɔ mgbi Imgbasho onghaangha, a le nya ema ofɛ ngwi ema ka watɔ mani.>>
ACT 16:18 O kiyayi ogbɔdzɛ nɛ alegbe-alegbe, nghataa itukwu wa wulu iPol man o kyata nya onodzi obube nwodzɛ mbon na gbɛɛ, <<N wo abu ola mi iyi mgbi iYesu iKrestu tasɛ mbon!>> Onodzi na si tɔ dzanta mi onɔ nani.
ACT 16:19 Ngwi emi otsidɔ ofyɛɛ na difwi gbɛɛ ofɛ otu awuya mgbi ama tukwu nɛ, a si kpakli iPol yi iSaila kwo ma kpɛɛkpɛɛ lu ifyidu ka wo emi mfye abɔ.
ACT 16:20 A gbe ma ba mbi ama ogbiikwɔ wa gbɛɛ, <<Engyulɔ ntonɛ li emi iJuda, a le ba yi okakewo mi igeli mgbi eyi kpakpa.
ACT 16:21 A tole tso aletɔ nli ayin ba mbi eyi emi iRoma.>>
ACT 16:22 Ibyi si yaokɛ okyɔ eye yi iPol bɛyi iSaila, ama ogbiikwɔ kyi nghalu ma angwuto di noola gbɛɛ nu ma gbo ma ibe.
ACT 16:23 Ngwi a gbo ma ibe saan nɛ, a gbe ma wokɛ obawi. A si wo ongye ongyoongyo na ola gbɛɛ no ngyo ma saan.
ACT 16:24 Ngwi a woola nghanɛ, inggisɛ ongyo obawi na si gbe ma wokɛ mi idzidzɛ obawi di ta ma itse mi afɔ.
ACT 16:25 Mi idzidzɛ otu nɛ, iPol bɛyi iSaila tole bibɔ dile shashi mbi Imgbasho. Inggisɛ angbeka mi ifu obawi tole fwo ma dafi a le shashi mani.
ACT 16:26 Ntunto nɛ, ikpɛsɛ suusu kpakpa man itozu mgbi obawi suusu. Onufɛ obawi duu kwulu akponyi, ta itse ngwi a ta ama nwoto obawi duu shɛ.
ACT 16:27 Ngwi inggisɛ ongyo obawi wa gbokyato nɛta, o dili onufɛ obawi tsatsa lato asisa, o si kye ngwalu okwusunkli mgban ikye ongwɔ ewon, ikyekyɛ o tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ emi obawi duu tse lu.
ACT 16:28 Hininɛ iPol fan ela gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama ngwɔ ewoo ba! Eyi duu ka todzɛ aana!>>
ACT 16:29 Ongye ongyo obawi kwu ela ola si maama lu ifun ka gbɛsɛ lakiyayi iPol bɛyi iSaila le shi adagba gbagbaagba.
ACT 16:30 O gbe ma tasɛ wa byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Engyukwo, li ekyɛ n ka kyɔ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ se n ka watɔ?>>
ACT 16:31 A nyan gbɛɛ, <<Nu oyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ iYesu ta abu ka tu owatɔ-watɔ bɛyi udɛ mgbi abu duu.>>
ACT 16:32 Nɛta a si gbɔ elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu nyan bɛyi ama nto udan duu.
ACT 16:33 Ngwi ka li otu mani, inggisɛ ongyo obawi na gbe ma ka sa ma ifwa mi ewo tsatsadu; ntunto mata a si kyɔn iBatisima bɛyi emidan duu.
ACT 16:34 Inggisɛ ongyo obawi na gbe ma tɔ luba udɛ mgban wa nu ma ungwogye, o mbwo yi atsa, ikyekyɛ o yɛɛ owa noyɛyɛ mbi Imgbasho, ongwu yi etɔ mgban duu.
ACT 16:35 Ngwi egbe wa fa nɛ, ama ogbiikwɔ dɔ obaka mgbi ama esɔ mbi inggisɛ ongyo obawi na gbɛɛ: <<Nu inggisɛ ntona ofɛ nu ma lu.>>
ACT 16:36 Inggisɛ ngyo obawi nɛ si nya iPol gbɛɛ, <<Ama ogbiikwɔ ntona dɛsɔ gbɛɛ ni a dzita abu bɛyi iSaila. Onɛnɛ ema ka lu. Lu mi iyu na.>>
ACT 16:37 Nghaduu iPol nya obaka ntona gbɛɛ: <<A gbo eyi ibe mi ododa ikwɔ kpaa a yama fwo eyi ba, dafi eyi li emi iRoma nɛ kpaa a di gbe eyi wo obawi. Nghama onɛnɛ a mina odzita eyi ni eyi lu ngha mgbanta imimaa? N fwa! Nya nu ma ba abuoma wa dulu eyi tasɛ.>>
ACT 16:38 Obaka ntonɛ si yɛ lu ka nya ama ogbiikwɔ ntona ngha, dafi a ka fwo gbɛɛ iPol yi iSaila li emi iRoma nɛ, imio wo ma.
ACT 16:39 A lukwu ma kɛ obawi ka nu ma aba ogyeegye. A gbe ma tasɛ wa tɛkyɛ nu ma gbɛɛ nu ma lu dzita ogalu mgbi ama.
ACT 16:40 Nghaduu iPol bɛyi iSaila yidɔ luba udɛ iLedia, mmana a wa tu ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka, a di kwu ma ɛwɛ wo duuse a kwa lu dzita igeli nani.
ACT 17:1 Ngwi iPol bɛyi emi okan dzagaba ka nyɛ ongwi Amfipoli yi Apolonia nɛ, a wa to iTesalonika, imbe na ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda dzɛ efu.
ACT 17:2 Dafi iPol teyi li kyɔ mani, o ka kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, man si kponya yi ama mi Afɛ mi egbe otonyewo nghi eta,
ACT 17:3 le nu ma osa diyɛ le tso ma ambɛ gbɛɛ iMedzaya ma ka gyadzɛ kyɛmɛ di kyɛɛ mi ikwongye. O gbɛɛ, <<IYesu ngwu ani le gbɔdzan nya ema nɛ li iMedzaya mani.>>
ACT 17:4 Emi iJuda angbeka noyɛyɛ di yɛɛ ama okyɛdɔ iPol bɛyi iSaila, dafi emi iGriki ibyibyi ama omio Imgbasho bɛyi engyaa imɔ angbeka kwuba kpaa kyɔ mani.
ACT 17:5 Nghaduu emi iJuda angbeka kyoofu, nghanɛ a kwu ama ondeye angbeka kwakye mi ifyidu, a yɛɛ ondu onyi man si wita eye mi ogalu nani. A tsinya ka kaka udɛ iJasɔn le pita iPol bɛyi iSaila ikye okye ma luba esɛ wa nu ibyi inggisɛ.
ACT 17:6 Dafi a yama tu ma mi imbe na ba nɛ, a si kwo iJasɔn yi ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka gbe ma kɛ mbi engyukwo emi igeli, le kwu-ela gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ ama nle nu okakewo kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu nɛ, bato mmɛnɛ onɛnɛni,
ACT 17:7 ma iJasɔn gbɛ ma kaka udɛ mgban. Ama duu tole foola ngwi iSidza wo, a tole gbɛɛ utɔ oka dzɛ ngwu a li kwun di iYesu.>>
ACT 17:8 Ngwi a fwo odzɛ nɛ ngha nɛ, igeli duu yɛɛ yaaya.
ACT 17:9 Ta a nu iJasɔn bɛyi angbeka ntona kpaa udza ogbɛ-abɔ se nu ma lu.
ACT 17:10 Mi otu na ama onoyɛyɛ kye iPol bɛyi iSaila dɛsɔ lu iBɛria. Ngwi a ka to imbe na nɛ, a kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda.
ACT 17:11 Emi iBɛria dzɛ yi ali osuse ngha emi iTesalonika, lubana a gbɛ esɔ na yi atsa kpakpa dile kya mi Afɛ alegbe-alegbe ikye odi ni odzɛ ngwi iPol gbɔ na li otsitsi yɔ.
ACT 17:12 Emi iJuda ibyibyi noyɛyɛ, dafi ibyi engyaa imɔ emi iGriki bɛyi engyulɔ kpaa kyɔ nani.
ACT 17:13 Nghaduu ngwi emi iJuda angbeka mi iTesalonika kwambɛ gbɛɛ iPol le gbɔ elodzɛ Imgbasho mi iBɛria nɛ, a lɔ kɛ imbe na ka teeye.
ACT 17:14 Nɛ ama onoyɛyɛ byakpa kye iPol dɛsɔ lu ondiiga, kpaa iSaila bɛyi iTimoti tila mi iBɛria.
ACT 17:15 Ama nwafɔ bɛyi iPol ntona tawon nghataa kɛ Atɛn, nɛ a si yidɔ lu iBɛria yi esɔ mbi iSaila bɛyi iTimoti gbɛɛ nu ma vla-vla ka tun.
ACT 17:16 Ngwi iPol kale dzɛgiyi ma mi Atɛn nɛ, eka kwowina lon kpakpa mi ikye angwula ama ngbiimbe mi ifu ogalu nani.
ACT 17:17 Nghanɛ o li kponya yi emi iJuda bɛyi emi iGriki ama omio Imgbasho mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, bɛyi inggisɛ ama ngwu o tu ma mi ifyidu kpaa alegbe-alegbe.
ACT 17:18 IPol kaka angwɛ ota-ta yi obyi etsetse angbeka ngwu a li kwu ma gbɛɛ Epikuria yi iStɔki a li inggisɛ ama otsɛwodzɛ kpakpa. Angbeka mi ele byita gbɛɛ, <<Li ali odzɛ ngwi inggisɛ ntso gbɛɛ ongwu ye ngha duu nɛ le mina ogbɔ?>> Angbeka gbɛɛ, <<Dzɛ dafi o le gbɔdzɛ Imgbasho ongwi anengye mani.>> A gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngha ikyekyɛ iPol le gbɔ Esɔ Osuse mi odzɛ mgbi iYesu bɛyi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mgban mi ikwu.
ACT 17:19 Nɛ a kyon kɛ okwakye mgbi Ariopagu, mmana ma a byun gbɛɛ, <<Ni eyi ye li ali otsootso ofufɛ ngwi abu le tso kyɛ dɛn?
ACT 17:20 Abu le kye odzɛ angbeka ama nfyi eyi mfye ofwoofwo kpakpa ba, nghanɛ eyi mina oye itan.>>
ACT 17:21 (Emi Atɛn yi ingyoga mgbi ama ngwu lato yi ama duu, li kye onɔ okyɔ nkonyonyi wuba, kpaa a li le gbɔdzɛ di gadɔ mi odzɛ ama ofufɛ.)
ACT 17:22 Nɛta iPol kyato dzɛkiyayi okwakye mgbi emi Ariopago si gbɛɛ: <<Ema emi Atɛn! N difwi gbɛɛ ema li sunu Imgbasho angbeka saan mi ali itɔ ofɛ duu.
ACT 17:23 Ikyena n kyikyɛ wodi agwɔ mgbi ema, n di ungwɔ ama ngwi ema le sunu ma mani, n di iwashi oka a lɔ ungwɔ mi efu gbɛɛ; Ikyenghanɛ ungwɔ ngwi ema tole sunun dafi Imgbasho ngwu a yen ba na, n ka gbɔdzan nya ema.
ACT 17:24 <<Imgbasho nɛ li ongwu ta ɛsɛ bɛyi alungwɔ ama nto efu duu na, li Otsɛ mgbi esho yi esɛ, o li yama la ozu ngwi a mbɛ mi abɔ ba.
ACT 17:25 O mina unkonyi mi abɔ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ ba, ikyekyɛ i won yi unka ba, lubana li ongwu abuon li nu ali inggisɛ oshishe yi mmyɛ bɛyi ungwɔ angbeka duu aali.
ACT 17:26 Ikpewo inggisɛ onyi Imgbasho ta inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ tsatsadu, ikyegbɛɛ ɛsɛ duu no li mgbi ama; li ongwu di kye onɔ dzɛ ali inggisɛ duu bɛyi imbe ngwi a ka dzɛ yɛyɛ mani.
ACT 17:27 Imgbasho kyungwɔnɛ ngha ikye ni inggisɛ ye ongwu, pita ongwu di tu ongwu, nghaduu o dzɛ mbotunto yi eyi ba.
ACT 17:28 <Lubana li mbon ngwi eyi dzɛ oshishe di li kyikyɛ kyɛ di dzɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi eyi.> Dafi ama olɔ ungwɔ mgbi abu angbeka gbɔ mani gbɛɛ, <Eyi li etɔ mgban.>
ACT 17:29 <<Nghanɛ dafi eyi li etɔ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ, ni eyi ka tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ odzɛɛdzɛ mgban dzɛ dafi abashi naadi iyudza onzundzɛ okwɔkwɔ hona ikwutsɛ naadi ungwɔ okpaakpa ngwi inggisɛ kpa mi ozoyeye mgban ba.
ACT 17:30 Tugbe ma Imgbasho kye adɔ onghaangha itɔ nɛ wuuta ba, kpaa onɛnɛ yɔ o woola gbɛɛ ni ali inggisɛ mi ali imbe duu kyatitukwu mi ofɛ obube mgbi ama.
ACT 17:31 Lubana o kye egbe dzɛ ngwi o ka wa fwo ɛsɛ duu ikwɔ mi otsitsi mi abɔ mgbi iYesu ngwu o tsekise dulu nani. Imgbasho tsekise tso obwɛndɛ nɛ mbi ali inggisɛ duu mi okyile iYesu mi ikwu.>>
ACT 17:32 Onɔ ngwi a fwo iPol gbɔdzɛ mgbi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu nɛ, angbeka shan isha, kpaa angbeka gbɛɛ, <<I mina eyi odi fwo abu mi itɔdzɛ nɛ onoka.>>
ACT 17:33 Ngwi a gbɔdzɛ nɛ mata, iPol si lu dzata okwakye.
ACT 17:34 Nghaduu inggisɛ angbeka gbela kyɛdɔ iPol di yɛɛ ama onoyɛyɛ. Onyi mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama li iDiɔnasu, inggisɛ mi okwakye mgbi Ariopago, bɛyi iwata ngwu iyin di iDamari bɛyi angbeka kwuba.
ACT 18:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ nyɛ nɛ, iPol dzita Atɛn lu iKorinti.
ACT 18:2 Li mmana ngwi o tu inggisɛ iJuda ngwu a li kwu iyin di Akwila, o li inggisɛ mi iPontu, o kwa kyɛ mi Itali yi owan iPrisila onɔ kɛ waba, ikyekyɛ utɔ iKladiɔsu woola gbɛɛ emi iJuda duu nu ma dzita iRoma. Nɛ iPol si kɛ oka di ma,
ACT 18:3 ma ikyegbɛɛ ongwu kpaa li inggisɛ otuo opo dafi ama kpaa li tuo nɛ, o tila dzɛ le kyidɔ yi ama.
ACT 18:4 Alegbe otonyewo duu o li ka kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, le fya ikye ni ongwu kyata emi iJuda bɛyi emi iGriki itukwu.
ACT 18:5 Onɔ ngwi iSaila bɛyi iTimoti yidɔ mi iMasidonia nɛ, iPol kyelu onɔ mgban duu nu mi esɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ di kyɔ obwɛndɛ mbi emi iJuda gbɛɛ, <<IYesu li iMedzaya mani.
ACT 18:6 Kpaa ngwi emi iJuda gbela yi iPol wuba yidɔ le fyan ito nɛ, o gbo angwuto mgban otso ma gbɛɛ di a le tangwɛ Imgbasho di nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi mgbi ema no dikye ema! Ani yɔ, ani kyidɔ mgbi ani saan. Wita onɛnɛ lu iyayi n le lu ka gbeesɔ nya Udzengye.>>
ACT 18:7 Nɛ iPol si dzita ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda lu udɛ nwatse dɔn mani, udɛ iTaitusu iJɔstusu ongwu nli Udzengye li sunu Imgbasho nani.
ACT 18:8 IKrispu, ongyukwo mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda, bɛyi etɔ mgban olɔlɔ duu noyɛyɛ mbi Otsɛ iYesu; bɛyi emi iKorinti gwuba ama nfwo iPol noyɛyɛ a di kyɔ ma iBatisima.
ACT 18:9 Otu oka ma, Otsɛ iYesu gbɔdzɛ yi iPol mi inɛ odiidi gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama wo imio ba; kiyayi ogbɔɔgbɔ, dika tukwondu ba.
ACT 18:10 Ikyesinɛ n dzɛ bɛyi abu, ma inggisɛ onyonyi ka yama dzɛ abu wo di kyɔ abu ibli ba, ikyekyɛ ani to yi inggisɛ kwuba mi ogalu nɛni.>>
ACT 18:11 Nghanɛ iPol la imbe na onova onyi yi ofyia egyin le tso ma elodzɛ Imgbasho.
ACT 18:12 Nghaduu onɔ ngwi iGalio gye iGɔna mgbi Akaya ma, emi iJuda dzɛ iPol wo bwan kyon lu opiikwɔ.
ACT 18:13 A gbɛɛ, <<Ongyulɔ nɛ, le fya okyata inggisɛ nu ma sunu Imgbasho mi ofɛ ngwi ola mgbi eyi gbela ba.>>
ACT 18:14 Ngwi iPol kwa wewo ogbɔdzɛ nɛ, iGalio nya emi iJuda gbɛɛ, <<Ni ema emi iJuda kile kwondukwɔ mi ungwɔ obube hona alobube ntimbi kpakpa yɔ, n kika yagba kyungwɔ mi efu.
ACT 18:15 Kpaa ngwi i yɛɛ angwodzɛ mi ikye odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ yi iyi, bɛyi ola mgbi ema nɛ, yile odzɛ mgbi ema mɛ abuema na. N ka yama wo abɔ mi itɔ ntona ba.>>
ACT 18:16 Nɛman o lɔ ma onya tasɛ mi ozu ikwɔ.
ACT 18:17 Ta ama duu kpakli iSɔstɛnɛ nkye ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda teyi mani di gbon mi iyayi opiikwɔ. Nghaduu iGalio gbinɛ ngwuta i kakan ewo ba.
ACT 18:18 IPol la iKorinti egbe ibyibyi. Ta o dzita ama onoyɛyɛ, kye ikye dɔ onyɛ ongwi eni lu iSiria. O wafɔ yi iPrisila yi oban Akwila. Duuse non lu yɔ, o nyɛ wulɔ otu mi iSɛnkria, ikye ombwo ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi o dzɛ mani.
ACT 18:19 A ka kaka Efesu, man iPol dzita iPrisila bɛyi Akwila. Ongwu abɔn kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda ka kponya yi ama.
ACT 18:20 Ngwi a nyan gbɛɛ no la yi ama kpakpa nɛ, o fwa.
ACT 18:21 Ngwi o ka lu nɛ, o zondu gbɛɛ, <<N ka yidɔ ba mbi ema, ni li oweka mgbi Imgbasho yɔ.>> Nɛta o si kaka uwaa lu dzata Efesu.
ACT 18:22 Ngwi o kaka iSisiria nɛ, o ka ta emi iKrestu angba di nyɛ lu Antiɔku.
ACT 18:23 Dafi o la Antiɔku kye egbe gwee nɛ, iPol kyato mi imbe na dzagaba kɛ imbe idzidza-dzidza kpatsɛ ayɛsɛ iGalatia bɛyi iFrijia, le kwu ama onoyɛyɛ ɛwɛ wo.
ACT 18:24 Nghanɛ inggisɛ iJuda ngwu iyin di Apolo, ngwu a mban mi ogalu Alekdzandra ba Efesu. O li ongyulɔ ngwu kpayi afɛ, di dzɛ yi ozoyeye mgbi Ibyibyilo saan.
ACT 18:25 A tson Ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ, ngwi o le fu mi onodzi nɛ, o gbɔdzɛ di tso odzɛ mgbi iYesu mi itukwu onyi, nghaduu o ye odzɛ iBatisima mgbi iJɔn kyoon ta.
ACT 18:26 O si wita odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda. Ngwi iPrisila bɛyi Akwila fwon nɛ, a kyon lu udɛ ama ka nun osa mi Ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ saan.
ACT 18:27 Onɔ ngwi i wa wo Apolo okɛ Akaya nɛ, ama onoyɛyɛ fyonmfye itukwu, di lɔ afɛ mbi ama okyɛdɔ mi imbe na gbɛɛ nu ma gban abɔ efa. Okakaakaka mgban ma, o dzɛ yi abɔ oyaaya mbi ama Imgbasho nu ma noyɛyɛ mi elela mgban mani.
ACT 18:28 Ikyena o tangwodzɛ yi emi iJuda kpɔklɔɔ di ngha ma mi ododa, tso ma ambɛ mi Afɛ saan gbɛɛ iYesu li iMedzaya.
ACT 19:1 Ngwi Apolo ka dzɛ iKorinti nɛ, iPol nyɛ ongwi afɛɛsɛ wa kaka Efesu. Mmanana o tu ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka
ACT 19:2 di byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema gbɛ Onodzi Osaan onɔ ngwi ema noyɛyɛ ma wɛ?>> A gbɛɛ, <<Ei, eyi fwo kpaa gbɛɛ Onodzi Osaan dzɛ ma ba.>>
ACT 19:3 Nɛ iPol byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Nghama li ali itɔ iBatisima ngwi a kyɔ ema?>> A nu uka gbɛɛ, <<IBatisima mgbi iJɔn.>>
ACT 19:4 IPol si gbɔgbɛɛ, <<IBatisima mgbi iJɔn li iBatisima itukwu okyata-kyata. IJɔn nya inggisɛ ntona gbɛɛ nu ma noyɛyɛ mbi ongwu nka wa ba mi iyikpa ongwu mani, li iYesu waali.>>
ACT 19:5 Ngwi a fwo odzɛ nɛ nɛ, a kyɔ ma iBatisima mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ iYesu.
ACT 19:6 Dafi iPol kye abɔ dɔ ma ikye nɛ, Onodzi Osaan kaka mboma, a si gbɔ ondudzɛ angbeka di yegbɔ.
ACT 19:7 Mmbwo mgbi ama duu mɛ iwyodefa.
ACT 19:8 IPol kaka ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda di gbɔdzɛ yi ama mi ododa nghataa ofyia eta, le tangwodzɛ di biibɛ yi ama mi ikye odzɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho.
ACT 19:9 Nghaduu angbeka mi ifu ma fyumfye ikye di fwa onoyɛyɛ, di kwu Ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ fyito mi ododa. Nɛ iPol dzita ma di kyi gbelu ama onoyɛyɛ ntona wafɔ biyan lu kale tso ma alegbe mi ozu otsuungwɔ mgbi iTiranu.
ACT 19:10 Ungwɔnɛ kiyayi mɛ onova efa, nghataa emi iJuda bɛyi emi iGriki ama nto ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia duu fwo elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ.
ACT 19:11 Imgbasho nyɛ ikpewo iPol kyungwɔ ama okwulewo,
ACT 19:12 Nghanɛ gbaka ayangwuto ofwɔ inɛ bɛyi ishisha angwuto ngwi a kye gbo iPol ewo kpaa, ni a kye kɛ ni emi ootse kye abɔ gbo efu ootse mgbi ama li ngyɛ onodzi ibwubwe kpaa li tɔ dzamata.
ACT 19:13 Emi iJuda angbeka ama ntole gaaga tsili kyɛ le lɔ onodzi ibwubwe onya, a fya okwu mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ iYesu mi ikye ama ngwu esɛ dɔ ma ikye gbɛɛ ni esɛ tɔ lu. A le gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Mi iyi iYesu, ongwu iPol li le gbeesɔ mgban na, tasɛ lu na.>>
ACT 19:14 Emi ongwɛ iSkeva, ongyukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi emi iJuda, nghi egyafa, tole kyungwɔnɛni.
ACT 19:15 Egbe oka nɛ onodzi ibwubwe nu ma uka gbɛɛ, <<iYesu ani yen, iPol kpaa ani ye odzan, nghama ema li ele?>>
ACT 19:16 Nghanɛ inggisɛ ndzɛ yi onodzi obube bulu gyɛ ma di ngha ma yi mfye. O sulu ma onikyibe, a si tsinya dzata udɛ mgban ibiba yi eyi mi ewo.
ACT 19:17 Onɔ ngwi emi iJuda bɛyi emi iGriki nto Efesu wa ye ungwɔnɛ nɛ, imio wo ma, ta iyi mgbi Otsɛ iYesu si gye mmwɛ kpakpa.
ACT 19:18 Ibyi inggisɛ ama nnoyɛyɛ tɔ ba mi ododa wa fwi ali ibwubwe ngwi ama kyɔ mani.
ACT 19:19 Inggisɛ ibyibyi ama okyɔ obudei, gbe afɛ ofulu-fulu mgbi ama kwakye gbe toola mi inɛ ibyi inggisɛ. Ngwi a kyi gbɔlu mmya mgbi umbwo afɛ ntona nɛ, i mɛ iDracama idubu ngwusefa dɔn iwyo.
ACT 19:20 Mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ elodzɛ mgbi Otsɛ gbɔfwɛ di nghao fyumfye.
ACT 19:21 Ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ duu kyɔ nyɛ nɛ, iPol wewo olu iJerosalin, o nyɛ ongwi iMasidonia bɛyi Acaya. O gbɛɛ, <<Ni ani ka kaka iJerosalin yɔ, n ka kɛ iRoma kpaa kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ.>>
ACT 19:22 O dɔ ama okyidɔ biyan nghi efa, iTimoti bɛyi Erastu, kɛ iMasidonia, ongwu yɔ tila dzɛ mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia ongwonɔ gwee se.
ACT 19:23 Mi itɔnɔ na onikyeeye gbokyɛɛ mi ikye Ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu.
ACT 19:24 Inggisɛ onda iyudza onzundzɛ okwɔkwɔ, iyin gbɛɛ iDemetriɔ, li ongwu mɛ ozoka Atemi, ungwɔnɛ li nu ma awuya ongyɛɛngyɛ ba, li mmya ongbungbɛ ba mbi ama onduufa.
ACT 19:25 O kwu ama onduufa kwakye, bɛyi ama ndzɛ mi itɔ ofɛ idɔ pita li ungwonyi mani, si gbɛɛ: <<Engyulɔ, ema ye li mi idabɔ nɛ ngwi eyi li tu aludu mgbi eyi.
ACT 19:26 Ema di diyɛ fwo, dafi iPol biibɛ yi ibyi inggisɛ mi Efesu mmɛnɛni wo ma ɛndɛ, sisi gwee ki li ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia duu. O gbɛɛ Imgbasho ama ngwu inggisɛ mɛ ma mɛɛmɛ mi abɔ ntonɛ duu, a yama li Imgbasho ba dududu.
ACT 19:27 Odzɛ obube dzɛ ana, yama li idabɔ mgbi eyi nɛta ngwi iyi mgban osuse ka byulu ba, kpaa ozoka mgbi imgbasho ongyaa oshewo Atemi kpaa ka yɛɛ ungwɔ onyadi, ongwu imgbasho ongyaa abɔn ngwu a li sunun kpatsɛ ayɛsɛ Asia yi ɛsɛ olɔlɔ duu na, a ka kye bulu ugabaidu mgban oshewo nani.>>
ACT 19:28 Ngwi a fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, itukwu gyaabyi loma man a wita owulu gbɛɛ: <<Oshewo li Atemi mgbi emi Efesu!>>
ACT 19:29 Labɔlabɔ nɛta igeli yɛɛ onɔgbɛ-onɔgbɛ. Inggisɛ ntona kye bwalu iGayɔsu bɛyi Aristakɔ, ongwu li ongwɛ afokyɛɛ mgbi iPol kyɛ mi iMasidonia, a si wafɔ ondonyi dafi a li inggisɛ onyi mani kaka imbe okwakye okwukwo.
ACT 19:30 IPol mina okye ewon tɔ iyayi ibyi inggisɛ, kpaa ama okyɛdɔ gbelon ba.
ACT 19:31 Engyukwo emi idɔ angbeka mi ayɛsɛ na, ama nli oka iPol dɛsɔ tɛkyɛ nun gbɛɛ non ka yama lɛlɛ kye ewon kɛ imbe okwakye okwukwo na ba.
ACT 19:32 Okwakye wɛndɛ. Angbeka tole wulu mi itɔdzɛ oka angbeka mi itɔdzɛ idzidza. Angbeka ye itɔdzɛ nkye ma kɛdzɛ imbe na ba.
ACT 19:33 Emi iJuda tsamu Alekidzanda dzɛkiyayi ibyi inggisɛ man angbeka mi ibyi inggisɛ tole nyan odzɛ ngwi o ka gbɔ mani. O si kyɔ ma abɔ gbɛɛ nu ma dzɛ shilididi ikye ni ongwu natsondu onagbɛ ewon, mi inai ma.
ACT 19:34 Ngwi a wa difwi gbɛɛ o li emi iJuda nɛ, ama duu wulu ondonyi mɛ dafi obyi efa hini gbɛɛ: <<Oshewo li Atemi mgbi emi Efesu!>>
ACT 19:35 Ongye olɔɔlɔ mgbi ogalu okwukwo tukwu ma ondu, o nya ibyi inggisɛ gbɛɛ: <<Ema emi Efesu, li emɛ mi ɛsɛ ye gbɛɛ igeli mgbi Efesu li ogalu osunu angbodzi Imgbasho ongyaa Atemi ba di ye dafi onodzi mgban, nngwuta kyɛ esho ma dzɛ imbe nɛ ba?
ACT 19:36 Nghanɛ, dafi a ka tangwɛ otsitsi nɛ gbɛ ba nɛ, li ayin ni ema yile itukwu bɛsɛ di kyɔ unkonyi mi ikwangha ba.
ACT 19:37 Ema gbe engyulɔ ntonɛ ba mmɛnɛ, nghaduu a yama yi ozoka unkonyi hona kwu ashu mgbi eyi shanyɛ ba.
ACT 19:38 Nghanɛ, kini iDemetriɔ bɛyi ama okyidabɔ yan dzɛ yi okakewo yi inggisɛ yɔ, opiikwɔ lasisa, emi ola kpaa to. Nu ma ka kwelikwɔ mmanani.
ACT 19:39 Nghaduu ni odzɛ ka dzɛma ngwi ema mina okye ba yɔ, li kyɛmɛ ni a kye mɛlu mi okwakye ndzɛ mi ola mani.
ACT 19:40 Dafi i dzɛ nghanɛ, ungwɔ nkyɔ inɛ nɛ a ka yagba maayi bɛ eyi gbɛɛ di li eyi teeye. Eyi ka yagba tangwɛ mi ikye onɔgbɛ nɛ naadi nu itɔdzɛ nka mɛ ba.>>
ACT 19:41 Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ mata, o si nu okwakye ganya.
ACT 20:1 Onɔ ngwi eye wa ngyɛ nɛ, iPol dɛsɔ mbi ama onoyɛyɛ, ngwi o fyuma mfye itukwu nɛ, o nya ma gbɛɛ se egbe oka man kye ofɛ dikye lu iMasidonia.
ACT 20:2 O si dzagaba nyɛ imbe nani, o nya ma elodzɛ kpakpa ofyuma mfye itukwu, mi olɛlɛ nɛ o ka kaka iGriki,
ACT 20:3 o la imbe na ofyia eta. Ikyekyɛ emi iJuda wibu okyɔn ungwɔ obube dafi o wewo okaka uwaa lu iSiria mani, nɛ o kyatitukwu yidɔ wikye ka nyɛ ongwi iMasidonia.
ACT 20:4 Ama ntawon li iSopata ongwɛ iPerusu ngwu kyɛ mi iBɛria, Aristakɔ bɛyi iSekundu yi iGayɔsu emi iTesalonika, mi iDebe, iTimoti kpaa, yi iTacikɔ bɛyi iTrofimu mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia.
ACT 20:5 Inggisɛ ntonɛ wikye lu ka dzɛ giyi eyi mi iTroa.
ACT 20:6 Nghaduu ngwi oga ibredi ongwi a kye okwuna wo efu ba wa nyɛ nɛ, eyi kaka uwaa mi iFyilipi kye egbe eda duuse kwa lu ka tu angbeka ntona mi iTroa, eyi la ele ikyidu olɔlɔ.
ACT 20:7 Egbe ongwi ababɔ mi ikyidu ma eyi kwakye ikye ogye oga. IPol gbɔdzɛ yi ama, ma ikyegbɛɛ o weka olu tegblifan nɛ, o kiyayi yi onya okpaaakpaa yi ama nghataa otu gheefa.
ACT 20:8 A gbe ola ipitila dɔto mi ifoozu ongwi esho imbe ngwi eyi kwakye mani.
ACT 20:9 Ongwongyulɔ mmafa ngwu a li kwun di iYutuku sɔdzɛ ofɛ awo le mwuna. Dafi iPol kale kiyayi yi odzɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ nɛ, una wa ngwɔn lu kpini, o si gbɛsɛ kyɛ esho wa zudɔwokɛ esɛ man a ka kyon ikwukwɔ tatso.
ACT 20:10 Nghaduu iPol tashulu luba esɛ, o tukwukɛ ikwɔ nani tsɛkwulun. O si nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama teeyi ba na, o dzɛ oshishe!>>
ACT 20:11 Ta o diyɛ tɔkɛ lu esho kye ghalu ibredi gye yi ama. Ngwi o gbɔdzɛ yi ama nghataa ni egbe fa nɛman, o si lu.
ACT 20:12 Inggisɛ ntona si kyi kyelu ongwongyulɔ mmafa nɛ lu udɛ oshishe itukwu di fyuma mfye kpakpa.
ACT 20:13 IPol nya eyi gbɛɛ ni eyi nyɛ ongwi uwaa teyi ongwu lu Aso, ka kye ongwu mi imbe nani, ikyesinɛ o le lu imbe na mi afɛɛsɛ.
ACT 20:14 Ngwi o tu eyi mi Aso ma, eyi kyon wo uwaa lu iMitilene.
ACT 20:15 Tegblifan ma, eyi dzata imbe na dzɛkyo wa to kwɛkwɛ yi ibu iKio. Egbe oka nɛ eyi dzɛkyo dɔkɛ ibu iSamosi, di kaka iMiletu tegblifan.
ACT 20:16 IPol di wewo nu ma fan nyɛ ongwi eni lu dzata Efesu, ikye ombe onɔ mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia wuba, lubana i won okaka iJerosalin plɛ, duuse ni oga iPɛntikɔsu wa gyɔ.
ACT 20:17 Mi iMiletu ma, iPol dɛsɔ kɛ Efesu ikye engyukwo emi iKrestu gbɛɛ nu ma ba wa tu ongwu.
ACT 20:18 Ngwi a wa kaka nɛ, o gbɔ yi ama gbɛɛ: <<Ema ye odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi ani dzɛ mi onɔ ngwi ani dzɛ yi ema ma duu, wita mi egbe ongwi ababɔ ngwi ani ba ɛsɛ Asia mani.
ACT 20:19 N kyɔ Otsɛ idɔ mi ewo oyile esɛ bɛyi etse inɛ. N di shitukwu mi ali imbadi yi isɔ ngwi emi iJuda wibu ani mi ele duu.
ACT 20:20 Ema ye n yama yɛyikpa ogbɔ ungwɔ ndzɛ yi oyabɔ nya ema mi ododa ba, mi udɛ ema hona mbi ibyi inggisɛ kpaa.
ACT 20:21 Ani gbɔ nya emi iJuda bɛyi emi iGriki gbɛɛ li kyɛmɛ nu ma kyatitukwu luba mbi Imgbasho di dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu.
ACT 20:22 <<Nghanɛ onɛnɛ, Onodzi Osaan si ani le lu iJerosalin, nghaduu n yama ye ungwɔ nka kiyayi yɛn mi imbe na ba.
ACT 20:23 Kpaa ungwɔ ngwi ani ye li onyi ta, ali ogalu ngwi ani kaka efu duu, Onodzi Osaan li le kwen adɔ gbɛɛ obawi bɛyi adzɛ ogyeegye dzɛ ani esɛ ma.
