ACT 20:24 Nghaduukpaa n kye oshishe mgbɛn gbɛɛ li unkonyi ba, ni ani ki yagba ngyɛlu onya otse-tse bɛyi idɔ ngwi Otsɛ iYesu kye wo ani abɔ nɛ kpata idɔ okyɔ obwɛndɛ mi Esɔ Osuse mgbi elela mgbi Imgbasho nɛni.
ACT 20:25 <<Onɛnɛ, n ye ta gbɛɛ inggisɛ onyonyi mi idzidzɛ ema ngwu ani gbeesɔ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nyan, ka yama di ani wuba.
ACT 20:26 Nghanɛ, n le nya ema mi ododa onɔngwunɛ gbɛɛ, n yama dzɛ yi obube mi odzili-dzili mgbi inggisɛ onyonyi ba.
ACT 20:27 Lubana ani fwijiwo onya ema oweka mgbi Imgbasho duu ba.
ACT 20:28 Gbɛwɛdzɛ ewema bɛyi ifyungwɔ ama Onodzi Osaan gbe wo ema abɔ gbɛɛ ni ema le di mboma mani. Li inggisɛ ama ongyo emi iKrestu mgbi Otsɛ, ngwu ongwu gyaagya yi eyi mgban ntonɛni.
ACT 20:29 Ani ye ta gbɛɛ ni ani wa dzita imbe nɛ yɔ, emi idukwlɛbɛ ibwubwe, ka ba idzidzɛ ema a ka yama dzita ifyungwɔ ba.
ACT 20:30 Mi idzidzɛ ema kpaa, angbeka ka tɔ nka kyata otsitsi, ikye otu ama okyɛdɔ ma.
ACT 20:31 Nghanɛ gbɛwɛbyi na! Wɛ na gbɛɛ mi onova eta n yama kwulɛsɛ okwo ali inggisɛ mgbi ema adɔ mi otu yi onɔ yi etse inɛ ba.
ACT 20:32 Onɛnɛ n kye ema dɔ Imgbasho ubɔ yi esɔ mgbi elelan, nka nu ema she di nu ema okwudɛ mi idzidzɛ ama ngwu a kye ma kyi salu duu.
ACT 20:33 N yama mina iyudza onzundzɛ hona abashi naadi angwuto mgbi inggisɛ onyi ba.
ACT 20:34 Ema abuema duu ye gbɛɛ abɔ mgbi ani ntonɛ nu ani ungwɔ ngwi ani mina tsatsadu bɛyi imina mgbi ama okyɛ yi ani kpaa.
ACT 20:35 Alungwɔ ani kyɔ duu, ani tso ema dafi mi itɔ idɔ okwunewo nɛ eyi ka ya emi abubɔ yi emi ootse abɔ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ, ole wɛ elodzɛ ama ngwi Otsɛ iYesu abuon gbɔ mani gbɛɛ: <Mse dzɛ mi onuunu ngha ogbɛ-gbɛ.> >>
ACT 20:36 Ngwi iPol gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ nɛ, o si gbe akwafɔ kwɛsɛ yi ama duu bibɔ.
ACT 20:37 Nɛta ama duu si nyɛ yi ikwu otseetse, a tsɛkwulun di nyan gbɛɛ se egbe oka yi okpitukwu.
ACT 20:38 Ungwɔ nnghao nu eka kplɔkɔ lo ma yɔ, li elodzɛ ngwi o gbɛɛ a ka yama di ongwu wuba nani. Taman a si tawon ka kaka uwaa.
ACT 21:1 Ngwi o nya ma gbɛɛ se egbe oka duu nɛ, eyi si nyɛ ongwi eni byakpa lu iKosu yɛyɛ. Tegblifan ma eyi kɛ iRode di nyɛ lu iPatara.
ACT 21:2 Ngwi eyi tu uwaa ongwi nle lu iFonishia nɛ, eyi kaka si kyɛɛ okyɛɛ.
ACT 21:3 Dafi eyi di iSapru kɛ nɛ, eyi nyɛ ongwi atiisɛ mgban mi uwaa lu iSiria. Eyi ka bɛsɛ mi iTai, imbe ngwi iwudza mgbi eyi ka dulu okye mani.
ACT 21:4 Ka kpatsɛ yi ama onoyɛyɛ angbeka emi imbe nani, nɛ eyi la yi ama ikyidu onyi. Ama okyɛdɔ ntonɛ, mi ikpewo Onodzi Osaan yegbɔ gbɛɛ iPol no ka kɛ iJerosalin ba.
ACT 21:5 Nghaduu ngwi onɔ mgbi eyi wa ngyɛ nɛ, Eyi dzata imbe na wikye lu iyayi. Ama okyɛdɔ yi owama bɛyi ɛngbɛ duu tawo eyi tasɛ mi ifyigeli, nɛman eyi kwɛsɛ bibɔ mi ondiiga.
ACT 21:6 Ngwi eyi kyɔ eka se egbe oka ngyɛ nɛ, eyi kaka iwudza, man ama si yidɔ lu udɛ.
ACT 21:7 Eyi kiyayi yi agaba mgbi eyi mi iTai ka bɛsɛ mi iPitolemai, imbe na eyi tangba yi ama onoyɛyɛ di dzɛ yi ama egbe onyi.
ACT 21:8 Tegblifan nɛ, eyi dzita ma wa kaka iSisiria di dzɛ udɛ iFyilipi inggisɛ ogbeesɔ, o li onyi mbi inggisɛ egyafa ngwu a dulu ma gbɛɛ nu ma gha ungwogye mi iJerosalin mani.
ACT 21:9 O dzɛ yi engwengyaa nghi enɛ ama nbongyulɔ waba li yegbɔ.
ACT 21:10 Ngwi eyi la imbe na egbe ibyibyi nɛ, oyegbɔ oka ngwu a li kwun di Agabu kyɛ iJudia ba.
ACT 21:11 Ngwi o nyɛ ba mbi eyi nɛ, o kyi kyelu okpa obwa oshi mgbi iPol, kye bwa ewon afɔ bɛyi abɔ duu si gbɛɛ, <<Onodzi Osaan gbɔgbɛɛ, <Li itɔ ofɛ nɛ emi iJuda ama nto iJerosalin ka bwa otsungwɔ okpa nɛ adi kyon wo Udzengye abɔ aali.> >>
ACT 21:12 Ngwi eyi fwo ungwɔnɛ nɛ, eyi bɛyi inggisɛ ama nto mmanana tɛkyɛ yi iPol gbɛɛ no ka kɛ iJerosalin ba.
ACT 21:13 Nghaduu iPol gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ ngwi ema le tsukwu dile gbua ani eka? Ani wewo ikye adi obwa-bwa ta ba, kpaa odi kwulu mi iJerosalin ikye iyi mgbi Otsɛ iYesu.>>
ACT 21:14 Dafi i yɛɛ gbɛɛ eyi ka kyɔkyɔ yan gbɛ ba nɛ, eyi si dzɛ abɔ ta nyan gbɛɛ, <<Ni oweka mgbi Imgbasho kyɔ.>>
ACT 21:15 Ngwi egbe ntonɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, eyi kyi gbelu okye mgbi eyi si lu iJerosalin.
ACT 21:16 Ama okyɛdɔ angbeka mi iSisiria wafɔ yi eyi di kye eyi ba udɛ Mnasɔn, imbe ngwi i wo gbɛɛ eyi ka dzɛ mani. Ongwu nose li ongyulɔ nkyɛ mi iSapru di li onyi mbi ama okyɛdɔ emi ababɔ ntonani.
ACT 21:17 Ngwi eyi kaka iJerosalin nɛ, ama onoyɛyɛ gbɛ eyi abɔ efa.
ACT 21:18 Tegblifan nɛ iPol bɛyi eyi angbeka duu kɛ oka di iJɛnsi, engyukwo emi iKrestu mi iJerosalin duu kpaa todzɛ ele.
ACT 21:19 IPol kye angba kwulu ma di kyatse odzɛ nya ma klɛklɛ ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho kyɔ yi Udzengye mi ikpewo idɔ ngwi ongwu kyɔ mani.
ACT 21:20 Ngwi a fwo ungwɔnɛ mata, a si tsɛ Imgbasho. Ta a nya iPol gbɛɛ: <<Anɔ, o di dafi umbwo inggisɛ idubu ibyibyi mi iJuda kyatitukwu, di dzɛ yi itukwu olola ongyo Ola mgbi iMose mani.
ACT 21:21 A nya ma gbɛɛ abu le tso emi iJuda ama nto idzidzɛ Udzengye gbɛɛ nu ma kyata dzita Ola iMose, le nya ma gbɛɛ nu ma ka kyɛ engwɛ ma ikyɛ ba hona kyɔ aletɔ mgbi eyi ba.
ACT 21:22 Li kyɛmɛ ngwi a ka fwo gbɛɛ abu badzɛ, nghanɛ li ekyɛ i ka kyɔ?
ACT 21:23 Ngyɛse kyungwɔ ngwi eyi nya abu mani. Engyulɔ enɛ to mmɛnɛ yi eyi ama nzondu yi Imgbasho.
ACT 21:24 Wafɔ yi ama, ni ema wewo lu mi ewo ofwɔ-fwɔ mgbi ama mani di kpa mi ungwɔ ngwi a kyɔ duu, adzi ni a kpalu ma otu. Ta ali inggisɛ ka ye gbɛɛ otsitsi dzɛ mi odzɛ ngwi a le gbɔ ikpewo abu nɛ ba, kpa i tso gbɛɛ abu abuabu gbela yi ola mgbi iMose.
ACT 21:25 Nghaduu mbi Udzengye ama onoyɛyɛ yɔ, eyi teyi lɔ oweka mgbi eyi kɛ mboma gbɛɛ nu ma dzɛ enggengga mi ungwogye ngwi a kye fifɛ nu angwula, yi eyi, yi mmbwɛ ngwi a ngwɔ mfyumfye bɛyi amah idza.>>
ACT 21:26 Tegblifan nɛ, iPol kye Engyulɔ ntonɛ ka fwɔ ewo yi ama. Nɛ o si kɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin oka nu ma ye egbe ngwi ewo ofwɔ-fwɔ nɛ ka dondu ngwi a dika nu umba ikye ali inggisɛ mgbi ama mani.
ACT 21:27 Ngwi egbe egyafa ntona wa dzɛ kwɛkwɛ ongyɛɛngyɛ nɛ, emi iJuda angbeka mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia di iPol mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin. A si kyile etasɛ angbi man a bwan,
ACT 21:28 le teela gbɛɛ, <<Emi Israi, ya eyi abɔ na! Nɛnɛ li ongyulɔ nle tsungwɔ nli ayin ba kpatsɛ mi ikpewo eyi yi ola mgbi eyi bɛyi imbe nɛ mani. Ungwɔ oka nbɛ efu yɔ, o gbe emi iGriki kaka ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin di kwo idza kaka imbe Osaan nɛni.>>
ACT 21:29 (Lubana a tsekise di iTrofimu inggisɛ emi Efesu yi iPol mi ogalu, a si kyi kyelu mi itukwu mgbi ama gbɛɛ iPol kyon kaka ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin.)
ACT 21:30 Ogalu na duu gbokyɛɛ, inggisɛ kyɛ onyonya mi ali agya duu. Ngwi a kpakli iPol nɛ, a kwon tɔ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin, labɔlabɔ nɛta a gbe onufɛ gyɛtukwu.
ACT 21:31 Ngwi a le fya ongwɔn nɛ, akwɔ mgbi odzɛ nɛ kaka mbi agyegika mgbi oblakwutsɛ mgbi emi iRoma gbɛɛ ogalu iJerosalin duu yɛɛ kwutukwutu.
ACT 21:32 Akponyi man agyegika na gbe engyukwo oblakwutsɛ angbeka bɛyi ɛngbɛ oblakwutsɛ si tsinya lukwu ibyi inggisɛ. Onɔ ngwi emi ablodzɛ ntona dili agyegika bɛyi eblakwutsɛ mgban nɛ, a nya ogbo iPol ibe.
ACT 21:33 Ta agyegika na ba wa bwa iPol di woola gbɛɛ nu ma bwan adi yi ashi efa. Nɛ o si byun itɔ inggisɛ ngwu o dzɛ bɛyi ungwɔ ngwi o kyɔ mani.
ACT 21:34 Mi idzidzɛ ibyi inggisɛ ntona angbeka tole gbɔ itɔdzɛ idzidza mi ela okwukwo, angbeka di li itɔdzɛ idzidza, ngwi i fyumfye gbɛɛ agyegika na no difwi otsitsi odzɛ mi ikye onɔgbɛ nɛ, o si woola nu ma kye iPol lu ogalu oblakwutsɛ.
ACT 21:35 Dafi iPol wa to afɔ otɔkɛ ozu nɛ, ablodzɛ mgbi ibyi inggisɛ ntona she nyɛsɛ i yɛɛ gbɛɛ oblakwutsɛ ntona ka kyon kye-kye.
ACT 21:36 Ibyi inggisɛ ama nkyɛ ma iyikpa ma tole wulu gbɛɛ, <<Ngyɛlu yan na!>>
ACT 21:37 Dafi ama oblakwutsɛ wewo okye iPol lu ogalu mgbi ama nɛ, o si byi agyegika gbɛɛ, <<Nin gbɔdzɛ yɔɔ lɔ?>> Agyegika na byun gbɛɛ, <<O li gbɔ iGriki wɛ?
ACT 21:38 Abu li inggisɛ Igyibiti ngwu wita eye di gbe ama ongwɔ inggisɛ idubu enɛ lu imbe okplagada onoka nose ma wɛ?>>
ACT 21:39 IPol si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ani li emi iJuda, n kyɛ mi iTasu mi ogalu iSilisia, ogalu ingblimɔ. Tsuutsu nin gbɔdzɛ yi inggisɛ ntonɛni.>>
ACT 21:40 Ngwi o gbɛ ofɛ mbi agyegika nɛ, iPol kwudzɛkɛ afɔ otɔkɛ ozu di kyɔ ibyi inggisɛ ntona abɔ. Ngwi a dede nɛ, o gbɔ yi ama mi ondu Aramai gbɛɛ:
ACT 22:1 <<Emi ongwunani bɛyi emi otsani, gadɔ dafi ani ka natsondu ewen onɛnɛ nɛni.>>
ACT 22:2 Onɔ ngwi a fwon le gbɔdzɛ yi ama mi ondu Aramai nɛ, a si zumyɛ. Nɛta iPol gbɛɛ:
ACT 22:3 <<Ani li inggisɛ iJuda, a mba ani mi iTasu mi iSilisia, kpaa ani she mi igeli nɛni. Mi abɔ mgbi iGamalie a nyɛ ani klɛklɛ mi ola mgbi emi otseyi, n di fyumfye itukwu mbi Imgbasho yɛyɛ dafi ema kpaa dzɛ inɛ nɛni.
ACT 22:4 Ani nu ama okyɛdɔ Ofɛ nɛ isɔ nghataa kaka ikwongye mgbi ama, di bwa engyaa yi engyulɔ gbe ma wo obawi.
ACT 22:5 Okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ bɛyi engyukwo okwakye duu kpaa ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ. A di nu ani afɛ kɛ mbi emi ongwunɔma ama nto iDamasiko, ikye oka bwa ma dafi emi obawi mani, gbe ma ba iJerosalin wa kwo ma adɔ.
ACT 22:6 <<Mi onɔ idzidzɛ udɛ ngwi ani dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okaka iDamasiko nɛta, osa tɔkyɛ esho wa dzaniwo akponyi.
ACT 22:7 Man ani gyɛkɛ esɛ si fwo ela le gbɔ yi ani gbɛɛ, <ISol! iSol! Kyɔsinɛ ngwi abu le nu ani isɔ?>
ACT 22:8 Ani byun gbɛɛ, << <Li abu emɛ Otsɛ? O nya ani gbɛɛ, << <Ani li iYesu ongwi iNadzareti, ngwu abu le nun isɔ mani.
ACT 22:9 Ama nkyɛ yi ani di osa nani, kpaa a fwo ela mgbi ongwu nle gbɔdzɛ yi ani ma ba.
ACT 22:10 Ani byun gbɛɛ, << <Li alungwɔ ngwi ani ka kyɔ?> Otsɛ nya ani gbɛɛ, << <Kyato; lu iDamasiko. Mi imbe na a ka nya abu alungwɔ ngwi a kye dzɛ gbɛɛ abu ka kyɔ duu.>
ACT 22:11 Ama nkyɛ yi ani ma byi ani abɔ kaka iDamasiko, ikyesinɛ osa na bulu ani inɛ.
ACT 22:12 <<Ongyulɔ iyin gbɛɛ Anania ba owa di ani. O li ngyo ola saan di dzɛ yi mmwɛ mbi emi iJuda ama nto imbe na duu.
ACT 22:13 O kwulɛsɛ dzɛ ani kɛ agya si nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Ongwunani iSol, inɛ mgbi abu no kwulu!>> Mi onɔ na yɛyɛ ta ani yagba dun.
ACT 22:14 <<O si nya ani gbɛɛ, <Imgbasho mgbi emi otseyi dulu abu gbɛɛ ni abu ye oweka mgban di di Ongwu Nle Nyaan na diyɛ fwo odzɛ mi ondun.
ACT 22:15 Abu ka li obwɛndɛ mgban mbi inggisɛ duu mi ungwɔ ngwi abu di diyɛ fwo nɛni.
ACT 22:16 Ma li ekyɛ ngwi abu le fɛ onɛnɛ? Kyato, kwu mi iyi mgban nu ma kyɔ abu iBatisima di salu ali ibwubwe mgbi abu ngwuta.>
ACT 22:17 <<Ngwi ani yɛ luba iJerosalin dile bibɔ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho nɛ, ani di inɛ odiidi
ACT 22:18 di di Otsɛ iYesu le gbɔdzɛ yi ani gbɛɛ, <Lu dzata iJerosalin Plɛ, ikyesinɛ a ka gbela obwɛndɛ mgbi abu onuunu ikye ani ba.>
ACT 22:19 Nghaduu ani gbɛɛ, << <Otsɛ, inggisɛ ntonɛ ye ani dafi ani kyikyɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda kpatsɛ, ikye ogbe ama nnoyɛyɛ mi iyi mgbi abu wo obawi di gbo ma ibe mani.
ACT 22:20 Onɔ ngwi a tsɛngwɔ iStivin ikyegbɛɛ o le kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi iyi mgbi abu ma, ani kwudzɛ ele di gbela yi ongwɔɔngwɔ mgban di ngyo angwuto mgbi ama nle ngwɔn mani.>
ACT 22:21 <<Ta Otsɛ iYesu si nya ani gbɛɛ, <Lu, ani ka dɔ abu esɔ lu kpini mbi Udzengye.> >>
ACT 22:22 Ibyi inggisɛ gadɔ mbi iPol nghataa o gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ. Man a kyile ela ondonyi gbɛɛ, <<Ngwɔn na, o mɛ odzɛ oshishe ba!>>
ACT 22:23 Dafi a le wulu di fwadulu angwuto mgbi ama ngwuta dile tombulu kɛ esho nɛ,
ACT 22:24 agyegika nu ondu nu ma kye iPol kaka ogalu oblakwutsɛ. O nu ondu gbɛɛ nu ma gbon di byun ita, nu ma ye ungwɔ nkyɔ duuse ibyi inggisɛ tole fan ela ngha mani.
ACT 22:25 Dafi a nan lasɛ ogbon nɛ, iPol byi ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ nkwudzɛ mmana ma gbɛɛ, <<Li ola ni abu gbo inggisɛ iRoma ngwu a gbɔn ikwɔ di tun yi obube ba kpaa ibee?>>
ACT 22:26 Ngwi ongyukwo na fwo ngha nɛ, o kɛ mbi okwukwo ogbakwu na ka kye tson gbɛɛ, <<Li ekyɛ abu le kyɔ? Inggisɛ nɛ li inggisɛ iRoma.>>
ACT 22:27 Okwukwo ogbakwu na kɛ mbi iPol ka byun gbɛɛ, <<Nya ani n di abu li inggisɛ iRomaa?>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, ani li inggisɛ iRoma.
ACT 22:28 Nɛ okwukwo ogbakwu na gbɛɛ, <<Ani kpa udza she ikye oyɛɛ inggisɛ iRoma.>> IPol nyan gbɛɛ, <<Nghaduu ani yɔ ani li imba mgbi iRoma.>>
ACT 22:29 Ama nwewo obyin ita ma byakpa yɛyikpa. Okwukwo ogbakwu na abuon ewo waa lon onɔ ngwi o difwi gbɛɛ iPol li inggisɛ iRoma kpaa ongwu tan itse mani.
ACT 22:30 Tegblifan, ngwi i mina agyegika na oye itɔdzɛ yɛyɛ ngwi emi iJuda gbe odzɛ tukwu iPol ewo nɛ, o shan adi ta di nu ondu ni engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi okwakye mgbi engyukwo duu kwakye. Ta o si kye iPol ba non dzɛkunto mi iyayi ma.
ACT 23:1 IPol kye inɛ byi okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda yɛyɛ si gbɛɛ, <<Emi engwunani, ani kyidɔ mgbi ani mbi Imgbasho mi itukwu asisa nghataa ba inɛ.>>
ACT 23:2 Mi odzɛ nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ Anania nu ama nkwulɛsɛ to kwɛkwɛ yi iPol ondu gbɛɛ nu ma gbobun ondu.
ACT 23:3 Nɛ iPol nya Anania gbɛɛ, <<Imgbasho ka ta abu afɛ, abu inggisɛ ikpala nɛni! Abu sɔ mmana le gbɔ ani ikwɔ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi Ola, nghaduu abu abuabu foola mi onu ondu gbɛɛ nu ma ta ani afɛ!>>
ACT 23:4 Ama nkwudzɛ yi iPol ntona byun gbɛɛ, <<Abu shitukwu le fya okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho itoo?>>
ACT 23:5 IPol gbɛɛ, <<Engwunani, ani yama ye gbɛɛ o li okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ ba, lubana a lɔ gbɛɛ, <Ka gbɔdzɛ obube ikpewo inggisɛ ogbe emidabu teyi ba.> >>
ACT 23:6 Ngwi iPol ye gbɛɛ angbeka li emi iSadusi angbeka di li emi iFarasi nɛ, o makwɔ yi okwakye mgbi engyukwo ntona gbɛɛ, <<Emi ongwunani, ani li inggisɛ iFarasi, di li ongwɛ inggisɛ iFarasi. A le gbɔ ani ikwɔ ikyegbɛɛ ani kye eka byi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwongye.>>
ACT 23:7 Onɔ ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngha nɛ, odzɛ oshiishi tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi emi iFarasi bɛyi emi iSadusi, man okwakye na gheefa.
ACT 23:8 (Emi iSadusi noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu, bɛyi engyesɔ naadi emi onodzi dzɛma ba, kpaa emi iFarasi noyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ ntonɛ duu.)
ACT 23:9 Odzɛ oshiishi yɛɛ okwukwo nɛman etsetse mgbi ola angbeka ama nli emi iFarasi tokɛ unto di tangwɛ kpɔklɔɔ gbɛɛ, <<Eyi tu unkonyi obube mbi inggisɛ nɛ ba,>> A byi ma gbɛɛ, <<Ni li onodzi hona ongyesɔ gbɔdzɛ yan ma yɛ?>>
ACT 23:10 Odzɛ oshiishi na yɛɛ eye man okwukwo ogbakwu na mio gbɛɛ a ka kyi fwalu iPol ambulu-ambulu. O woola gbɛɛ oblakwutsɛ nu ma ka kyen kyi gbɛlu mi abɔ mfye yilen luba ogalu oblakwutsɛ.
ACT 23:11 Mi otu ongwi egbe na Otsɛ wa dzɛkɛ yi iPol nyan gbɛɛ, <<Fyumfye itukwu! Dafi abu gbɔdzɛ mgbi ani mi iJerosalin na, li ngha ngwi abu dika gbɔ kyɛmɛ mi igeli iRoma aali.>>
ACT 23:12 Mi egbegbe nɛ emi iJuda kwakye di bwalu ondu mi ofaafa gbɛɛ ama ka gye hona wa ungwɔ ba sede ama ngwɔlu iPol.
ACT 23:13 Inggisɛ ngha ngwusefa ama nwodzɛ mi ondu obwa-bwa nɛni.
ACT 23:14 A kɛ mbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi engyukwo emi iJuda ka nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Eyi bwa mi ofaafa kpɔklɔɔ gbɛɛ eyi ka gye unkonyi ba sede eyi ngwɔlu iPol.
ACT 23:15 Nghawanɛ, ema yi okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda dɛsɔ mbi okwukwo ogbakwu mi ikpala no kyen ba mbi ema gbɛɛ, i mina ema ofwo itɔdzɛ saan mi odzɛ mgban. Eyi wewo ogbongwɔn duuse no wa to mmɛnɛni.>>
ACT 23:16 Kpaa ngwi ongwɛ ongwunɔ iPol fwo ngha nɛ, o lu ogalu oblakwutsɛ ka nya iPol.
ACT 23:17 Ta iPol kwu ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ ntona onyi ela nyan gbɛɛ, <<Kye ongwummafa nɛ kɛ mbi okwukwo ogbakwu, o dzɛ yi odzimɔ onyan.>>
ACT 23:18 Nghanɛ o kyon kɛ mbi okwukwo ogbakwu nani. O nyan gbɛɛ, <<IPol inggisɛ mi obawi na dɛsɔ mbi ani nya ani gbɛɛ ni ani kye mmafa nɛ ba mbi abu ikyekyɛ o dzɛ yi odzimɔ onya abu.>>
ACT 23:19 Okwukwo ogbakwu na byi ongwongyulɔ mmafa na abɔ, kwon lu enggengga si byun gbɛɛ, <<Li ali odzɛ ngwi abu dzɛyan onya ani?>>
ACT 23:20 O nyan gbɛɛ, <<Emi iJuda bwondu onya abu ni abu kye iPol ba okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda ekeka mi ɛwɛ gbɛɛ ama mina oye itɔdzɛ yɛyɛ mi odzɛ mgban.
ACT 23:21 Ka gbela yi ma ba, ikyesinɛ inggisɛ ngha ngwusefa da to oshɛ le fan. A fa gbɛɛ ama ka gye hona wa ungwɔ ba sede ama ngwɔ iPol. A wewo ngyɛ onɛnɛ le fɛ ogbela-gbela mgbi abu mi oweka mgbi ama.>>
ACT 23:22 Okwukwo ogbakwu na wo ongyulɔ mmafa na ofɛ di kwon adɔ gbɛɛ, <<Ka nya inggisɛ onyi kpaa gbɛɛ di abu nya ani odzɛ nɛ loo.>>
ACT 23:23 Ta o kwu engyukwo mgbi ama oblakwutsɛ efa ela si nu ma ondu gbɛɛ, <<Gbe oblakwutsɛ ideli efa yi ama otɔ mmya ngwuseta dɔn iwyo bɛyi emi ashɔ ideli efa nu ma wewo okɛ iSisiria mi obyi egyanɛ mi otu inɛ.
ACT 23:24 Di wewo yi mmya angbeka nka kye iPol kɛ mbi iGɔna iFelisi saan mani.>>
ACT 23:25 O lɔ afɛ sini:
ACT 23:26 IKladiɔsu iLisia, Ugabaidu, iGɔna iFelisi: N ta abu angba.
ACT 23:27 Inggisɛ nɛ emi iJuda bwan di wewo ongwɔn, kpaa ani ba yi ibyi oblakwutsɛ wa nagban, ikyekyɛ ani fwo gbɛɛ o li imba mgbi iRoma.
ACT 23:28 Ani mina oye ungwɔ ngwi a le gbe odzɛ tukwun ewo mani, nghanɛ ani kyon ba mbi okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda.
ACT 23:29 Man ani wa difwi gbɛɛ a le gbe odzɛ tukwun ewo mi ikye ola mgbi ama, nghaduu itɔdzɛ onyi ngwi a nu ngwi mɛ ongwɔn hona kyen wo obawi dzɛma ba.
ACT 23:30 Onɔ ngwi a nya ani ungwɔ ngwi a kye weka okyɔ yi inggisɛ nɛ mata, ani kyon dɛsɔ lu mbi abu akponyi. Ani di nu ondu gbɛɛ ama ngbe odzɛ tukwun ewo ntona nu ma gbɔ itɔdzɛ mgbi ama ma nya abu.
ACT 23:31 Nghanɛ oblakwutsɛ ntona kyidɔ ngwi a nu ma ondu mani, a kye iPol wafɔ yi ama kyon lu byulu kaka Antipatri mi otu nani.
ACT 23:32 Tegblifan ma emi mmya tawon lu kpaa emi afɛɛsɛ yɔ yidɔ luba ogalu mgbi oblakwutsɛ.
ACT 23:33 Ngwi emi mmya ntona ka kaka iSisiria nɛ, a kye afɛ ma nu iGɔna di kye iPol kpaa won abɔ.
ACT 23:34 IGɔna gbɔ afɛ na si byita ayɛsɛ ngwi o kyɛ ele mani. Ngwi o difwi gbɛɛ o kyɛ mi iSilisia nɛ,
ACT 23:35 o gbɛɛ, <<Ani ka fwo odzɛ mgbi abu mi onɔ ngwi ama ngbe odzɛ tukwu abu ewo kaka mmɛnɛ mani.>> Ta o wo ma ola gbɛɛ nu ma kye iPol lu udɛ utɔ iHerude ka ngyon.
ACT 24:1 Ngwi i kye egbe eda nɛ okwukwo inggisɛ ofifɛ Anania ba wa kaka iSidzaria yi engyukwo angbeka bɛyi inggisɛ oye ola iyin di iTetulɔ, a si gbe itɔdzɛ ngwi a le gbe odzɛ tukwu iPol ewo mi ele ma to iGɔna esɛ.
ACT 24:2 Ngwi a kwu iPol ela kaka ifun nɛ, iTetulɔ kye itɔdzɛ mgbi elikwɔ mgban tso iFelisi gbɛɛ, <<Eyi to mi iyu mi abɔ abu onɔ she, inɛ mgbi abu odiidi na di ba yi okiyayi mi ɛsɛ nɛni.
ACT 24:3 Ugabaidu iFelisi, mi ali imbe yi ali ofɛ duu, eyi gbela ungwɔnɛ di gbede nu abu kwuba.
ACT 24:4 Nghaduu ombe abu onɔ bayɔ, n le bɔ gbɛɛ o ki shitukwu diyɛ fwo eyi gwee.
ACT 24:5 <<Eyi difwi gbɛɛ inggisɛ nɛ li inggisɛ oteeye, o li tu ola eye wo mi idzidzɛ mgbi emi iJuda mi ɛsɛ duu. O li inggisɛ ogbe emi iNadzareti teyi mi eye
ACT 24:6 o di fya okye ayiwi kaka ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin; nghanɛ eyi kpaklin. [Di mina ogbɔn ikwɔ mi ola mgbi eyi.
ACT 24:7 Kpaa agyegika iLisia ba mfyumfye wa kyon kyi lafwa mbi eyi,
ACT 24:8 kwu ama nkwun elikwɔ ntonɛ ela nu ma ba], ni abu byi ma ita abuabu ta abu ka yagba otu otsitsi mi odzɛ ngwi eyi gbe le tukwun ewo ntonɛni.>>
ACT 24:9 Emi iJuda ntona gbela wo odzɛ ngwi a gbe tukwun ewo ntonani, dile tso gbɛɛ odzɛ ntonɛ li otsitsi.
ACT 24:10 Ngwi iGɔna kyɔ iPol abɔ gbɛɛ no gbɔdzɛ nɛ, o si wita ogbɔdzɛ gbɛɛ: <<Ani ye i kye onova ibyibyi ngwi abu li inggisɛ ogbiikwɔ mi ɛsɛ nɛni; nghanɛ n dzɛ yi atsa onatsondu ewen.
ACT 24:11 O ka yagba byi inggisɛ angbeka fwo i ngha egbe iwyodefa waba ngwi ani kɛ iJerosalin oka sunu.
ACT 24:12 Ama ogbe odzɛ tukwu ani ewo ntonɛ yama din le tangwodzɛ yi inggisɛ onyi mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho hona tu inggisɛ wo mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda naadi mbeka onyonyi mi ogalu ba.
ACT 24:13 A dika yagba nu osa mi odzɛ onyi ngwi a gbe le tukwu ani ewo nɛ ba.
ACT 24:14 Nghaduu, ani gbela dafi engyukwo mgbi ama tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ ngwi ani le kyɛdɔ na li ayin ba mani. Kpaa ani kale sunu Imgbasho ngwi emi otsikyani sunu mani. Ani di noyɛyɛ mi alungwɔ ngwi a lɔ mi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi afɛ mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ duu
ACT 24:15 ani di dzɛ yi ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi mbi Imgbasho ungwonyi dafi inggisɛ ntonɛni, gbɛɛ emi osaan bɛyi emi imbali duu ka kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
ACT 24:16 Nghanɛ ani li fya alonɔ ni itukwu mgbi ani dzɛ saan mi inɛ Imgbasho bɛyi inggisɛ.
ACT 24:17 <<Ngwi ani wa dzɛma ba onova ibyibyi nɛ, n ba iJerosalin ikye okye umba wa nu emidɛn emi adzɛ di fifɛ nu Imgbasho.
ACT 24:18 Ani fwɔlu ewani yɛɛ saan mi onɔ ngwi a tu ani mi ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho le kyungwɔnɛ mani. Ibyi inggisɛ to yi ani hona ani ndeye yi inggisɛ oka ba.
ACT 24:19 Nghaduu emi iJuda angbeka to ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia, ngwi i gbuo a ki to mmɛnɛ mi inai abu nu ma sulu obwɛndɛ obube ikpewo ani yɔ a ki kyɔ.
ACT 24:20 Hona ama nto mmɛnɛnɛ nu ma gbɔ ungwɔ obube ngwu ma tu mbi ani mi onɔ ngwi ani kwudzɛ mi inai okwakye mgbi engyukwo emi iJuda mani.
ACT 24:21 Li mi ikye ungwɔ onyi ngwi ani kyile ela esho onɔ ngwi ani kwudzɛ inai ma na ta: <Li itɔdzɛ mgbi okyɛɛ mi ikwu ngwi abu le gbɔ ani ikwɔ inɛ aani.> >>
ACT 24:22 Nghanɛ iFelisi n ye odzɛ Ofɛ mgbi Otsɛ saan nɛ, tsamu egbe ikwɔ lu iyayi. O gbɛɛ, <<Ni iLisia okwukwo ogbakwu wa ba ta n ka ngyɛlu ikwɔ mgbi abu nɛni.>>
ACT 24:23 O wo ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ ola gbɛɛ no nu ma ngyo iPol kpaa nu ma ka kyon tukwu ba di nu emi okan ofɛ nu ma tobyun mi imina mgban.
ACT 24:24 Ngwi egbe nyɛ gwee nɛ, iFelisi yi owan iDrusila, nli ongyaa emi iJuda na waba. O dɛsɔ nu ma kye iPol ba wa fwon dafi o le gbɔdzɛ oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi iYesu iKrestu mani.
ACT 24:25 Dafi iPol le tsuutsa mgbi odzɛ saan, yi obwa ewo fyii bɛyi ikwɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ nkyɛ iyayi nɛ, imio wo iFelisi man o gbɛɛ, <<I gyɔ ngha tsatso! O ka yagba lu. Nin wa tu onɔ ta, n ka dɛsɔ mbi abu.>>
ACT 24:26 Mi itɔnɔ na, iFelisi tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ iPol ka kye akwatsa wo ongwu ondu, nghanɛ o tonya odɛsɔ mbon ba.
ACT 24:27 Ngwi i nyɛ onova efa nɛ, iPoshiɔ iFɛstusu dɔkɛ utɔ gbikye iFelisi, kpaa ikyegbɛɛ i mina iFelisi okyumse yi emi iJuda nɛ, o dzata iPol mi obawi.
ACT 25:1 Ngwi iFɛstusu gyuutɔ kye egbe eta nɛ, o dzata iSisiria lu iJerosalin,
ACT 25:2 imbe na engyukwo ama ofifɛ bɛyi engyukwo emi iJuda ba mbon wa gbe itɔdzɛ obube mgbi iPol tonkɛ esɛ.
ACT 25:3 A si byakpa mina abɔ oyaaya mbi iFɛstusu gbɛɛ, no tobyi ama kye nyinɛ iPol luba iJerosalin maama, ali ma a le wewo owa kwo ofɛ ngwɔn.
ACT 25:4 IFɛstusu nu uka gbɛɛ, <<A kye iPol dzɛkɛ iSisiria, ma ani abuen kpaa n le kɛ ele dzikan-dzikan.
ACT 25:5 Yeba non kyɔ obube yɔ, ni ama ogbe ema teyi angbeka wafɔ yi ani ka gbɔ obube ngwi o kyɔ ma, mi imbe nani.
ACT 25:6 Ngwi iFɛstusu kye egbe egyata naadi iwyo yi ama nɛ, o si lu iSisiria, tegblifan nɛ o kwu ela gbɛɛ nu ma kwakye mi opiikwɔ di noola gbɛɛ nu ma kye iPol ba mbi ongwu.
ACT 25:7 Ngwi iPol wa to nɛ, emi iJuda ama nkyɛ mi iJerosalin ba ma loka won, gbe odzɛ okwulewo ama nli otsitsi ba le tukwun ewo.
ACT 25:8 Ta iPol si natsondu gbɛɛ: <<N kyungwɔ obube onyi mi ikpewo ola mgbi emi iJuda naadi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin hona iSidza ba.>>
ACT 25:9 Ngwi i mina iFɛstusu okyungwɔ gbɛɛ no kpa emi iJuda nɛ, o nya iPol gbɛɛ, <<O ka gbela okɛ iJerosalin azukwu ni ani ka fwo abu ikwɔ mi itɔdzɛ obube ntonɛ wɛ?>>
ACT 25:10 IPol gbɛɛ: <<Ani kwudzɛ mi opiikwɔ mgbi iSidza onɛnɛni, li imbe ngbuo gbɛɛ a ka gbɔ ani ikwɔ aani. Abu abuabu ye saan n kyɔ emi iJuda obube onyi ba.
ACT 25:11 Kini ani kyɔ obube yɔ, n fwa okwulu ba. Kpaa ni odzɛ obube ngwi emi iJuda gbe tukwu ani ewo nɛ li otsitsi bayɔ, inggisɛ onyi sulu ofɛ okye ani wo ma abɔ ba. N tɛkyɛ ni iSidza abuon fwo ani ikwɔ!>>
ACT 25:12 Ngwi iFɛstusu kye bwalu ondu yi ama osɔ ikwɔ yan nɛ, o nya iPol gbɛɛ: <<O tɛkyɛ nu iSidza nɛ li mbi iSidza o ka kɛ!>>
ACT 25:13 I kye ongwɛ egbe gwee nɛ Utɔ Agripa yi iBɛnisi kaka iSisiria oka kye mmwɛ nu iFɛstusu.
ACT 25:14 Ngwi i yɛɛ gbɛɛ a ka la egbe ibyibyi mi imbe na nɛ, iFɛstusu kponya odzɛ mgbi iPol na yi utɔ. O gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ oka dzɛ mmɛnɛ ma ngwu iFelisi dzanta wo obawi.
ACT 25:15 Onɔ ngwi ani kɛ iJerosalin ma, engyukwo ama ofifɛ yi engyukwo mgbi emi iJuda gbe odzɛ obube tukwun ewo di gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔn ikwɔ.
ACT 25:16 N nya ma gbɛɛ yama li aletɔ mgbi emi iRoma okye inggisɛ nu ama ngbe odzɛ obube le tukwun ewo ba, sede a ka nun ofɛ no natsondu ewon mi odzɛ obube ngwi a gbe tukwun ewo mani.
ACT 25:17 Onɔ ngwi a ba mmɛnɛ yi ani ma, ani mbe onɔ yi ikwɔ na wuba, kpaa n byakpa kwu ela ni a kwakye mi ozu ikwɔ tegblifan si nu ma kyon ba.
ACT 25:18 Ngwi ama ogbe odzɛ tukwun ewo kyato ogbɔdzɛ nɛ, a yama kwu iyi ungwɔ obube ama ani tsɛwɛ ma ba.
ACT 25:19 Ungwɔ ngwi a yɛ kyɔ yɔ, a yɛ le gbɔ onɔgbɛ biyan mi ikye odzɛ Imgbasho mgbi ama bɛyi odzɛ mgbi inggisɛ ikwukwɔ ngwu a kwun di iYesu ngwu iPol le tso gbɛɛ o dzɛ oshishe nani.
ACT 25:20 I wo ani ɛndɛ dafi n ka kya mi itɔ ikwɔ nɛ mani; nghanɛ n yɛ byun ita ni o ka gbela kɛ iJerosalin nu ma ka kya mi itɔdzɛ ntonɛ yɔ.
ACT 25:21 Ngwi iPol tɛkyɛ gbɛɛ nu ma kye ongwu nu dafi oweka mgbi ongyufa dzɛ ma nɛ, n woola gbɛɛ nu ma kwunewo ongyon saan nghataa ba onɔ ngwi ani ka kyon kɛ mbi iSidza mani.>>
ACT 25:22 Ta Agripa nya iFɛstusu gbɛɛ, <<I mina ani ofwo ongyulɔ nɛ abuen.>> O gbɛɛ, <<Ekeka ta o ka fwon.>>
ACT 25:23 Tegblifan nɛ, Agripa yi iBɛnisi wewo datu kaka ozu okwakye yi engyukwo oblakwutsɛ ama olɔngbɔ-lɔngbɔ bɛyi ama ogbe inggisɛ teyi mi ogalu nani. IFɛstusu si woola nu ma kye iPol kaka ifun.
ACT 25:24 IFɛstusu gbɛɛ: <<Utɔ Agripa yi ema ama nto mmɛnɛ yi eyi duu, ema di ongyulɔ nɛ lɔɔ! Emi iJuda duu biibɛ yi ani mi iJerosalin bɛyi iSidzaria mmɛnɛni, le feela gbɛɛ o mɛ ngwi o ki dzɛ oshishe wuba.
ACT 25:25 N difwi gbɛɛ o kyungwɔ mɛ ondu ikwu ba, kpaa ikyegbɛɛ o kye akwɔ mgban kɛ mbi ongyufa nɛ, n kye weka okyon dɛsɔ lu iRoma.
ACT 25:26 Nghaduu n sulu itɔdzɛ onyonyi ngwi n ka lɔ nu Ugabaidu ikye inggisɛ nɛ ba. Nɛ n kyon ba inai ema duu, onghaangha duu yɔ mbi abu utɔ Agripa, azukwu ni ema kyan di kana n ka tu itɔdzɛ ngwi n ka lɔ.
ACT 25:27 Lubana i tso ozoyeye ba, olɔ itɔdzɛ obube ikye inggisɛ obawi ba ta kyon dɛsɔ lu mbi Ugabaidu.>>
ACT 26:1 Nɛ Agripa nya iPol gbɛɛ, <<N nu abu ofɛ gbɔdzɛ mgbi abu mani.>> Nɛta iPol kyɔ abɔ si wita ogbondu ewon gbɛɛ:
ACT 26:2 Utɔ Agripa ikyese dɛn okwudzɛ inai abu inɛ ogbondu ewani mi ungwɔ obube ngwi emi iJuda gbe tukwu ani ewo duu nɛni,
ACT 26:3 onghaangha duu ngwi abu ye aletɔ bɛyi angwodzɛ mgbi emi iJuda saan nɛni. Nghanɛ n tɛkyɛ nu abu shitukwu gen adɔ saan.
ACT 26:4 <<Emi iJuda duu ye odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ani kyɛ ongbɛ, mi okyɛɛ esɛ mgbi ani mi ɛsɛ mgbi ani, bɛyi iJerosalin kpaa.
ACT 26:5 A teyi ye ani onɔ kɛ onɛnɛni dika kyɔ obwɛndɛ, ni imina ma yɔ, ani li emi iFarasi ama ngwu nghao fyumfye mi odzɛ Imgbasho mgbi eyi nɛni.
ACT 26:6 Ikyenghanɛ li mi ikye ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi mi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi Imgbasho dzɛ yi emi otseyi ma ngwi a le fwo ani ikwɔ inɛ aani.
ACT 26:7 Li ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ngwi agwɔ mgbi eyi iwyodefa le sunu Imgbasho onɔ yi otu gbɛɛ ni ama wa di dafi i ka ba mani. Utɔ dee, li ikye ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi nɛ ngwi emi iJuda le dulu ongwufabɔ mbi ani aani.
ACT 26:8 Kyɔnɛse i fyi ema mfye onoyɛyɛ gbɛɛ Imgbasho li kyile inggisɛ mi ikwu?
ACT 26:9 <<Ani abuani kpaa teyi gbela gbɛɛ i gbuo nin kyɔ alungwɔ ama ndzɛ kyɛmɛ duu ikye okye afɔ twɛsɛ yi iyi mgbi iYesu ongwi iNadzareti nɛni.
ACT 26:10 Di li ungwɔ ngwi ani kyɔ mi iJerosalin yɛyɛ kpaa aali. Mi ogbela-gbela mgbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ n gbe emi osaan kwuba wokɛ obawi, ani di li onyi mbi ama nwo abɔ ogbela gbɛɛ ni a gbɔ ma ikwɔ ngwɔ ma.
ACT 26:11 Onɔ ibyibyi n kyikyɛ mi ozu okwakye mgbi emi iJuda idzidza-dzidza ikye okwo ma adɔ, di li fya osi ma nu ma fya Imgbasho ito. Dafi itingga kyɔ ani yi ama ma, n lu anengye kpaa oka nu ma isɔ.
ACT 26:12 N kyɛɛ okɛ itɔ agaba nɛ mi iDamasiko mi ondu onuunu yi ogbela-gbela mgbi engyukwo ama ofifɛ.
ACT 26:13 Utɔ dee, ngwi onɔ dɔ idzidzɛ udɛ ngwi ani kye ofɛ dikye le kɛ nɛ, ani di osa kyɛ esho, gbosa ngha onɔ, naabɔ yawo ani yi ama nwafɔ yi ani mani.
ACT 26:14 Eyi duu zudɔ wokɛ esɛ, man ani fwo ela le gbɔ yi ani mi ondu Aramiki gbɛɛ, <iSol, iSol, kyɔnɛ abu le nu ani isɔ ngha? Mnda ka yagba kye afɔ twɛsɛ yi okwuta ogbon ba.>
ACT 26:15 <<Ta ani byita gbɛɛ, <Li abu emɛ, Otsɛ?> Otsɛ nu uka gbɛɛ, << <Li ani iYesu ngwu abu le nu ani isɔ mani.
ACT 26:16 Onɛnɛ kyato dzɛkunto. Ani mblegba tu abu ikye okye abu yɛɛ ongbidɔ bɛyi obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ngwi abu di mbi ani bɛyi ungwɔ ani ka tso abu mani.
ACT 26:17 N ka nagbɛ abu mi abɔ emidabu yi abɔ Udzengye. N le dɔ abu esɔ mboma
ACT 26:18 ikye okwulu ma inɛ di kyata ma mi iyifu luba osa, bɛyi mfye mgbi iSatan luba abɔ mgbi Imgbasho, azukwu ni a dzita ma yi ali ibwubwe di gbe ma tokɛ mbonyi yi ama ngwu a salu ma yɛɛ saan mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi ani mani.>
ACT 26:19 <<Nghanɛ, utɔ Agripa, n yama nghaadɔ mi inɛ odiidi nkyɛ esho na ba.
ACT 26:20 N wita mi iDamasiko, luba iJerosalin yi iJudia duu, bɛyi Anengye kpaa. N gbeesɔ gbɛɛ nu ma kyata luba mbi Imgbasho nu ma di tso okyata-kyata mgbi ama mi okyɔɔkyɔ.
ACT 26:21 Li itɔdzɛ ngwi emi iJuda kpakli ani mi ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho di fya ongwɔ ani ma aali.
ACT 26:22 Nghaduu n tu otobyi-tobyi mgbi Imgbasho nghataa ba inɛ, n di kwudzɛ mmɛnɛ ikye okyɔ obwɛndɛ nya ama nshewo bɛyi ama n yɛyikpa kpaa. Ani le gbɔdzɛ onyonyi ngha ungwɔ ngwi ama ogbɛɛsɛ bɛyi iMose gbɛɛ ka wa kyɔ ma ba
ACT 26:23 gbɛɛ iMedzaya ka gyadzɛ, ngwi o di li inggisɛ ongwu ababɔ owa kyɛɛ mi ikwu nɛ, o ka gbɔ osa nya emidan bɛyi Udzengye.>>
ACT 26:24 Duuse ni iPol ngyɛlu ogbondu ewon yɔ, iFɛstusu dzan elodzɛ ondu, o gbɔ mi ela esho gbɛɛ, <<Eka kwagbɔdɔ loo iPol! Afɛ mgbɔɔ okpayi kwuba nɛ nu ikye kyata loo.>>
ACT 26:25 IPol gbɛɛ, <<Ikye kyata lo ani ba, ugabaidu iFɛstusu,>> <<Odzɛ ngwi ani le gbɔ li otsitsi di li ingblimɔ.
ACT 26:26 Utɔ bɛ yi ungwɔ ntonɛni, n ka yagba gbɔdzɛ biyan itukwu asisa. N noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ ungwɔ ntonɛ onyi kpaa byulu lon mi ikye waba, ikyekyɛ a kyɔn mi odaada ba.
ACT 26:27 Utɔ Agripa, abu nu ama ogbɛɛsɛ oyɛyɛɛ? N ye o nu.>>
ACT 26:28 Ta Agripa nya iPol gbɛɛ, <<Abu tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ mi ongwonɔ gwee nɛta elodzɛ mgbi abu ka yagba kyata ani yɛɛ inggisɛ iKrestuu?>>
ACT 26:29 IPol nu uka gbɛɛ, ni li onɔ bwee hona onɔ gblɔgɔdɔ kpaa, N le bɔ Imgbasho ibɔ gbɛɛ, no wa li abu yuwoo ta ba kpaa ama nle fwo ani inɛ nɛ duu ki kyata dzɛ dafi ani sini, kpaa itse yɔ nu ma ka ta ema ba.>>
ACT 26:30 Utɔ yi iGɔna yi iBɛnisi bɛyi ama nsɔto yi ama duu kyato.
ACT 26:31 A dzata ifoozu, ngwi a kyi ge ewoma nɛ a gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ le kyungwɔ onyonyi ngwi mɛ ondu ikwongye hona kaka obawi ba.>>
ACT 26:32 Agripa nya iFɛstusu gbɛɛ, <<IPol ki teyi tɛkyɛ gbɛɛ ni iSidza gbɔn ikwɔ bayɔ, o mɛ odzanta.
ACT 27:1 Ngwi ondu wa bwa gbɛɛ uwaa ka gbe eyi lu iTali nɛ, a kye iPol yi emi obawi angbeka wo ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ ongwu nli ikye odi mi obyi oblakwutsɛ mgbi ugabaidu ngwu a li kwun di iJuliyɔsu na abɔ.
ACT 27:2 Eyi kyɛɛ yi uwaa mi Adramatun eyi wewo obɛsɛ mi iga ama nto ondekyoo mi ayɛsɛ mgbi Asia di nyɛ kaka onekyoo. Aristaku, inggisɛ iMasidonia ngwu nkyɛ mi iTesalonika na, kyɛ yi eyi.
ACT 27:3 Tegblifan nɛ, eyi bɛsɛ mi iSidon; nɛ iJuliyɔsu di iPol elela, nun ofɛ no kɛ mbi emi okan adzi nu ma nun ungwɔ ama nminan.
ACT 27:4 Mmana eyi diyɛ lu onekyoo di nyɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ibu ongwi iSapru ikyekyɛ awo gbeleyi wuba.
ACT 27:5 Ngwi eyi fa uwaa dzɛkyo onekyoo mi iga mgbi iSilisia yi iPamfyilia nɛ, eyi ka bɛsɛ mi iMira ongwi iLisia nani.
ACT 27:6 Mi imbe na ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ di iwudza ongwi Alekdzandra le lu Itali man gbe eyi wokɛ ele.
ACT 27:7 Eyi lu dumɔ-dumɔ mi egbe ibyibyi yi adzɛ kpakpa ka nyɛ kwɛkwɛ yi iSinidɔ. Ngwi awo gbela ni eyi kye inɛ byi imbe ngwi eyi le kɛ ma ba nɛ, eyi yɛ kye inɛ byi oyombo iSamɔ ikye ni ibu ongwi iKrete na tukwu eyi awo mani.
ACT 27:8 Eyi nyɛ ondiiga nɛ mi isɔ wa to imbe ngwi a kwun di iFɛ Hɛvun, kwɛkwɛ yi ogalu iLasia.
ACT 27:9 Eyi mbe onɔ kpakpa nyɛ wa, ma okyɛɛ ongwi iwudza nɛ yɛɛ okakewo ikyesinɛ onɔ Oga otukwondu ngwi a li dzata inggisɛ yi alobube kpaa nyɛ wa. Nghanɛ iPol wɛ ma ewodzɛ gbɛɛ,
ACT 27:10 <<Engyulɔ, n le di gbɛɛ agaba nɛ ka ba yi eyi odzili-dzili dika nu iwudza yi okye bɛyi oshishe mgbi eyi kpaa nyanya.>>
ACT 27:11 Nghaduu ongyukwo oblakwutsɛ na gbela odzɛ owɛɛwɛ mgbi iPol ba kpaa kyɛdɔ elodzɛ mgbi inggisɛ ofa iwudza bɛyi otsungwɔ iwudza.
ACT 27:12 Dafi iga iFɛ Hɛvun na tishi ola ele nghataa ni ogba ngyɛ ba nɛ, inggisɛ kwuba gbela gbɛɛ ni eyi kiyayi yi okyɛɛ, ka la iFɔni nghataa ni ogba ngyɛ. Nɛnɛ li iga mi iKrete nkye inɛ byi okwokyiikwokyi mgbi aca yi onɔdɛ bɛyi agwudu yi onɔdɛ nani.
ACT 27:13 Ngwi awo aca wita ofa fee nɛman, a tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ di ama tu ungwɔ ngwi ama mina ma wa; nɛ a takye ashi obwa iwudza kwulɛsɛ ngwuta wokɛ iwudza, si kye ondu agobo iKrete dikye.
ACT 27:14 Onɔ gwee nɛta awo okwokyiikwokyi mgbi agwudu yi onosa gbokyɛɛ mfyumfye kyɛ ibu wa fa eyi lu onekyoo.
ACT 27:15 Awo na wa tsɛkɛ iwudza ta eyi yagba fa iwudza kye inɛ byi awo wuba; nɛta eyi nya yi iwudza ofaafa nɛ awo kyi gbelu iwudza le lu.
ACT 27:16 Ngwi eyi nyɛ lu ongwɛ ibu ngwi a li kwun di iKauda nɛ, eyi fya kpakpa se wa yagba onu uwaa ongbungbɛ na gbobu ba.
ACT 27:17 Ngwi a kyi kyelu uwaa ongbungbɛ wokɛ ifun nɛ, a kye odi bwalu iwudza bɛkɛ. Ngwi a mio gbɛɛ di iwudza ka ka kwo esɛ mi mfyan mgbi iSati nɛ, a takye ashi obyi iwudza kwulɛsɛ ngwuta wokɛ eni ni iwudza le kwo lu dumɔ-dumɔ.
ACT 27:18 Tegblifan, dafi awo na kale fa nghaabɔ le gbobulu iwudza nɛ a wita omwa okye yangwuta mi eni.
ACT 27:19 Mi egbe ongwu ta nɛ, a kye abɔ mgbi ama abuoma shɛ okye iwudza angbeka yangwuta.
ACT 27:20 Ngwi onɔ hona ofyia kpaa eyi di ma wuba egbe ibyibyi, onikyawo kpaa kale fa nɛ, eyi gbɛwɛ ngwuta gbɛɛ eyi ka watɔ wuba.
ACT 27:21 Dafi inggisɛ ntonɛ kyikyɛ onɔ tunto tu ungwogye gye ba nɛ, iPol kyato nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Engyulɔ, ema ki gbela odzɛ mgbi ani owɛ-wɛ mi iKrete gbɛɛ ni ema ka fa ba na yɔ; ungwɔ ama nnyanya di byulu lo ema ntonɛ kika kyɔ ba.
ACT 27:22 Nghaduu onɛnɛ, ani kwu ema ɛwɛ wo gbɛɛ ni ema kiyayi mi itukwu mgbi ema fyumfye-fyumfye, ikyekyɛ inggisɛ mgbi ema onyi kpaa ka byulu ba, sede li iwudza ta ka nyanya.
ACT 27:23 Mi otu ongwu dɛdɛ na, ongyesɔ mgbi Imgbasho mgbi ani ngwu ani li sunun na wa kwudzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ani
ACT 27:24 si nya ani gbɛɛ, <Ka wimio ba iPol, iSidza ka fwo abu ikwɔ kyɛmɛ; ma di li ikye mgbi abu Imgbasho ka dzata ama nwoto iwudza yi abu ntonɛ duu oshishe.
ACT 27:25 Nghanɛ fyumfye itukwu kpɔɔ na engyulɔ, lubana ani noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi Imgbasho gbɔ nɛ ka kyɔ ngha yɛyɛ.
ACT 27:26 Nghaduukpaa, iwudza mgbi eyi ka ka fatila dɔkɛ ibu mbeka.>>
ACT 27:27 Mi otu ongwi iwyodenɛ ma kpaa awo na ka kye eyi le ga kyɛ Onekyoo Adratiki, ngwi otu wa gheefa nɛ, ama ofa iwudza difwi gbɛɛ ama le dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi ondikyi.
ACT 27:28 A mba okɛɛkɛ mgbi eni si di gbɛɛ li atafɔ ideli onyi dɔn osu. I kye onɔ gwee nɛ, a di mba tu atafɔ ngwusenɛ dɔn iwyo.
ACT 27:29 Ngwi eyi le mio gbɛɛ eyi ka wa gyɛkɛ akwutsɛ nɛ, a kyi takye iyudza obwa iwudza kwulɛsɛ nghi enɛ yaokɛ eni mi iyikpa di bibɔ gbɛɛ ni egbe fa.
ACT 27:30 Ngwi i mina ama ofa iwudza otse dzamata nɛ, a kyi shɛlu uwaa ongbungbɛ na wokɛ eni tole kyɔ ɛwɛ dafi ama takye iyudza okwu iwudza kwulɛsɛ le ngwuta wokɛ eni mi iyayi mani.
ACT 27:31 Ta iPol nya okwukwo ogbakwu bɛyi oblakwutsɛ ntona gbɛɛ, <<Ni inggisɛ ntonɛ tɔ dzata iwudza yɔ ema ka watɔ ba.>>
ACT 27:32 Nghanɛ oblakwutsɛ ntona kye dzɛlu odi ngwi a kye ongwuwaa na sha ele ma non fɛ lu.
ACT 27:33 Duuse ni egbe fa nɛ, iPol tɛkyɛ yi ama duu gbɛɛ ni a gye ungwogye. O gbɛɛ, <<Egbe iwyodenɛ inɛ waani, itukwu kaka ema ewo jo ema gye unkonyi ba.
ACT 27:34 Kpaa onɛnɛ n tɛkyɛ nu ema gbɛɛ ni ema gye ungwogye adzi ni ema dzɛ oshishe. Lubana alotu onyi kpaa ka kwɔ mi ikye mgbi inggisɛ onyi ba.
ACT 27:35 Ngwi iPol gbɔdzɛ nɛ ngyɛ nɛ, o kyi gbelu ibredi angbeka si ta Imgbasho angba mi inai ma duu. Kyi mwalu wita ogyeegye.
ACT 27:36 Ama duu fyumfye itukwu di gye ungwogye abuoma.
ACT 27:37 Eyi ama nwoto iwudza duu li inggisɛ ideli efa ngwuseta dɔn iwyo diwyegyin.
ACT 27:38 Ngwi a gye ungwogye dafi a mina ma nɛ, a kyi gbelu ungwogyowe nsisi duu yangwuta mi onekyoo ikye okyi mwalu mlo mi iwudza.
ACT 27:39 Ngwi egbe wa fa nɛ, ama ofa iwudza difwi agobo ma wuba, kpaa a di iga mfyan. Nghanɛ a tsɛwodzɛ gbɛɛ ni ama yagba yɔ, ama ka fa iwudza na nyɛ mfyan ka bɛkɛ esɛ.
ACT 27:40 Dafi a kye dzɛlu iyudza okwu iwudza kwulɛsɛ nɛ, a dzitama mi eni di kye shɛlu odi ama ntsɛ anghi ntona mi onɔ na kpɔɔ. Ta a kyile angwuto ogbaawo iwudza ikyegbɛɛ ni awo fa iwudza bɛkɛ iga.
ACT 27:41 Nghaduu iwudza kwo esɛ kye ikye shawokɛ mfyan kye inɛnɛ byi esho fatila yagba okiyayi wuba man akpeni gbobu iwudza mi iyikpa.
ACT 27:42 Ama oblakwutsɛ tsɛwɛ okyi ngwɔlu emi obawi ntonani di a wa tsɛ eni lu agobo ka tsebyulu.
ACT 27:43 Nghaduu i mina okwukwo ogbakwu na odulu oshishe mgbi iPol watɔ, nɛ o kwɔ ma oweka mgbi ama ikyenghanɛ o wo ama n ye eni otsɛɛtsɛ ola gbɛɛ nu ma tsɛ eni lu agobo.
ACT 27:44 Ama nsisi ka gbe igɛgɛ tukwu otsokplekwɔ bɛyi ombwumbwu uwaa lu agobo. Li ngha ngwi eyi duu bɛsɛ saan aali.
ACT 28:1 Ngwi eyi wa bɛsɛ saan nɛ eyi difwi gbɛɛ li mi ibu ongwi iMɔta.
ACT 28:2 Emi ibu ntona tso eyi okpitukwu ngwi eyi din ye ba. A gbɛ eyi di mɛ ola wo eyi ikyekyɛ mmbwo le kya ofu dile yi.
ACT 28:3 IPol waa akyikye ekwɔ kwutokɛ, ngwi o le sa wokɛ ola nɛ, ogidzi ngwi olola non tasɛ ton tandri won abɔ.
ACT 28:4 Ngwi emi ibu di ifa na fatila kwodzɛ abɔ nɛ, a gbɔ yi ewoma gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nɛ ka li inggisɛ ongwɔ inggisɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ; lubana dafi o watɔ mi ekyoo okwukwo nɛ kpaa, obube mgban ka non dzɛ oshishe ba.>>
ACT 28:5 Kpaa iPol ngwi ifa na wokɛ ola unka di kyɔn ba.
ACT 28:6 Inggisɛ ntona kye ɛwɛ byi gbɛɛ o ka mwɛ ewo naadi tsɛɛsɛ kwulu ntunto. Nghaduu ngwi a fɛ onɔ kɛ di di unkonyi okakewo kyɔn ba nɛ, a kyatitukwu mgbi ama di gbɛɛ o li Imgbasho.
ACT 28:7 Ogalu dzɛ kwɛkwɛ mi imbe na ngwi li mgbi iPobilu, utɔ mgbi ibu nani. O gbɛ eyi mi udan abɔ efa di kyɔ yi eyi saan egbe eta.
ACT 28:8 Otsɔn dotse ladzɛ esɛ, awo bwan o dile nya adama. IPol kaka ka din, ngwi o bibɔ won ngyɛ nɛ, o gbe abɔ dɔn ikye di ngyɛlun ootse.
ACT 28:9 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ kyɔ nyɛ nɛ, emi ootse angbeka mi ibu na duu ba, a di ngyɛlu ma ootse.
ACT 28:10 A nu eyi mmwɛ mi ofɛ idzidza-dzidza, ngwi eyi di wa wewo onyɛ ongwi eni lu nɛ, a nu eyi alungwɔ ngwi eyi mina mi ikye okyɛɛ nani.
ACT 28:11 Ngwi i wa nyɛ ofyia eta nɛ, eyi kaka iwudza oka ngwi a dzanta mi ibu na owa olɔlɔ olu. Li iwudza ongwi Alekdzandra ngwi a kye ambɛ dzɛ ikyen gbɛɛ Imgbasho ongwefa.
ACT 28:12 Eyi wa bɛsɛ mi iSiraku, di la ele egbe eta.
ACT 28:13 Mi imbe na eyi di nyɛ ongwi eni ka kaka iRejun. Tegblifan man awo iwu gbokyɛɛ, ngwi i di fa egbe oka nɛ eyi to iPuteli.
ACT 28:14 Mi imbe na eyi tu ama okyɛdɔ iYesu angbeka, a bɔ eyi wa la yi ama ikyidu olɔlɔ. Man eyi si kyɛɛ wa kaka iRoma.
ACT 28:15 Ama okyɛdɔ iYesu emi imbe na teyi fwo gbɛɛ eyi kyɛma, man a lukwu eyi nghataa luba idu Apiɔ bɛyi imbe ngwi a kwun gbɛɛ Ozu eta mgbi ingyoga owa kpatsɛ eyi. Ngwi iPol dili ma nɛ, o ta Imgbasho angba itukwu di fyonmfye.
ACT 28:16 Ngwi eyi ka kaka iRoma ma, a nu iPol ofɛ gbɛɛ no la ozu yuon kpaa oblakwutsɛ nu ma ngyon.
ACT 28:17 Ngwi i kye egbe eta nɛ, iPol kwu engyukwo emi iJuda kwakye, dafi a wa kwakye nɛ, iPol nya ma gbɛɛ: <<Emi ongwunani, ani kyɔ nkonyonyi ongha emideyi adɔ naadi aletɔ mgbi emi otsikyeyi ba, kpaa a bwa ani mi iJerosalin di kye ani wo emi iRoma abɔ.
ACT 28:18 A kya mi odzɛ mgbi ani di mina ma odzita ani ikyesinɛ ani kyungwɔ obube nmɛ ondu ikwongye ba.
ACT 28:19 Kpaa emi iJuda fwa, nghanɛ i yɛɛ kyɛmɛ ngwi ani ka tɛkyɛ nu ma yile ani luba mbi iSidza. Nghaduu ani dzɛ yi odzɛ onyi ogbe tukwu emidani ewo ba.
ACT 28:20 Li itɔdzɛ nɛ ngwi ani gbɛɛ ni ani di ema di gbɔdzɛ yi ema. Li mi ikye ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi mgbi emi Israi ma ngwi a bwa ani adi mi ashi nɛ aani.>>
ACT 28:21 A nun uka gbɛɛ, <<Eyi tu afɛ onyi nkyɛ mi iJudia mi ikye odzɛ mgbi abu ba, emi ongwuneyi onyi nkyɛ mi imbe na nya eyi hona gbɔdzɛ obube onyi mi ikpewo abu ba.
ACT 28:22 Nghaduu i mina eyi ofwo ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi abu, lubana eyi ye dafi inggisɛ mi ali imbe duu le gbɔdzɛ osuse ba ikpewo ayɛ inggisɛ ntona mani.>>
ACT 28:23 A kye egbe dzɛ owa kwakye yi iPol, di ba mi mmbwo kpakpa nghaabɔ ogbugbe mi imbe ngwi o dzɛ mani. O li gbɔdzɛ esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho nya ma mi egbegbe nghataa onɔ li gbɛsɛ dile biibɛ yi ama mi ola mgbi iMose bɛyi oyegbɔ gbɛɛ nu ma noyɛyɛ mbi iYesu.
ACT 28:24 Engyukwo angbeka mboma noyɛyɛ mi odzɛ ngwi o gbɔ mani, kpaa angbeka yɔ gbela ba.
ACT 28:25 Dafi angwodzɛ tɔ mi idzidzɛ mgbi ama nɛ, a wita oganya mi onɔ ngwi iPol ngyɛlu odzɛ nɛ ogbɔɔgbɔ mani gbɛɛ: <<Onodzi Osaan na gbɔdzɛ otsitsi mi ikye mgbi emi otsikyema mi onɔ ngwi o gbɔdzɛ nyɛ mbi oyegbɔ Adzaya mani gbɛɛ:
ACT 28:26 << <Kɛ mbi inggisɛ ntonɛ dika nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Ema kale fwo alonɔ kpaa ka yama gbosa lo ema ba; ema kale di alonɔ kpaa ema ka yama difwi ba.>>
ACT 28:27 Itukwu mgbi inggisɛ ntonɛ tiishu; a li fwo kpaa gbadikye, a di kye inɛ mgbi ama tukwu. Lubana a kika di yi inɛ mgbi ama, fwo mi adɔ mgbi ama, difwi mi itukwu mgbi ama di kyata ba mbi ani Imgbasho ta ani kika ngyɛlu ma ootse.>
ACT 28:28 << <Ikyenghanɛ ani mina ni ema ye gbɛɛ owatɔ-watɔ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ a kye dɛsɔ nu Udzengye, ama yɔ a ka kyi gbɛlu!>>
ACT 28:29 Ngwi iPol gbɔ elodzɛ ntonɛ ngyɛ nɛ, emi iJuda si lu kale tangwodzɛ yi ewoma kpakpa.
ACT 28:30 IPol kwu ozu onova efa le gbɛ inggisɛ ama nba owa din duu.
ACT 28:31 Ngwi imbe fyin ba nɛ, o gbeesɔ mgbi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ di tsungwɔ mgbi Otsɛ iYesu iKrestu.
ROM 1:1 Afɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi iPol, ongbidɔ mgbi iKrestu iYesu, ongwu a kwun ela non gbikye iYesu, ngwu a di dulun dzɛkɛ ikye ogbɔ Esɔ Osuse mgbi Imgbasho nani.
ROM 1:2 Esɔ Osuse nɛ Imgbasho plɛ zondu nyɛ mbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ mi Afɛ Osaan.
ROM 1:3 Esɔ Osuse nɛ li odzɛ mgbi Ongwan, mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ yɔ, o li ongwiba mgbi iDevedi.
ROM 1:4 A kyon tso gbɛɛ o li ongwɛ Imgbasho mi onɔ ngwi a kyilon mi ikwu mi mfye mgbi Onodzi Osaan nani: O li iYesu iKrestu Otsɛ mgbi eyi.
ROM 1:5 Li mi ikpewon bɛyi ikye iyi mgban ngwi eyi yɛɛ ama ogbikye iYesu ngwi mtsɛ di dɔ eyi otso Udzɛ duu ofɛ gbɛɛ nu ma siikye nu di dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu aani.
ROM 1:6 Ema kpaa wodzɛ idzidzɛ ama ngwu a kwu ma ela gbɛɛ nu ma yɛɛ emidi iYesu iKrestu nɛni.
ROM 1:7 Ani le lɔ afɛ nɛ kɛ mbi ema emi iRoma, nkpa Imgbasho itukwu ngwu O di kwu ema ela gbɛɛ, ni ema li emi osaan nani: Elela yi iyu nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho Otseyi yi Otsɛ iYesu iKrestu na no dzɛ yi ema duu.
ROM 1:8 Ababɔ yɔ, angba mgbi ani le kɛ mbi Imgbasho mgbɛn ikpewo iYesu iKrestu ikye ema duu, ikyena a gbɔdzɛ oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ema kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu.
ROM 1:9 Imgbasho, Ongwu ani li kyɔn idɔ itukwu onyi mi ogbeesɔ osuse mgbi ongwan na li obwɛndɛ mgbɛn dafi n li wɛ ema alonɔ
ROM 1:10 mi ibɔ mgbɛn obɔɔbɔ mani. N di bɔ gbɛɛ kpakpana Imgbasho ka nu ani ofɛ nin ba mbi ema.
ROM 1:11 I mina ani odi ema adzi nin kye umba mgbi onodzi nu ema onu ema fyumfye mi oyɛyɛ mgbi ema onuunu,
ROM 1:12 ikyegbɛɛ, ni eyi fyi eka mfye itukwu mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ewe.
ROM 1:13 I mina ani gbɛɛ ema ki ye emi ongwunani, dafi onɔ ibyibyi ani weka okɛ mbi ema mani, kpaa ofɛ nin ba nghataa ba onɛnɛni. I mimɛn gbɛɛ nin ka tu ama okyatitukwu mi idzidzɛ ema, yɛyɛ dafi ani tu mi idzidzɛ udzɛ angbeka kpaa nani.
ROM 1:14 N dzɛ yi idɔ okyɔ yi emi iGriki bɛyi emi iGriki ba kpaa, ikye ama okwiinɛ bɛyi ogbadrɔ duu.
ROM 1:15 Li ngha ngwi i tsɛ ani olo kpakpa ogbɔ Esɔ Osuse nya ema ama nto iRoma aali.
ROM 1:16 Bana ayiwi kwu ani ogbɔ Esɔ Osuse nɛ ba, ikyekyɛ li mfye mgbi Imgbasho ikye owatɔ-watɔ mgbi ali inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ duu: ababɔ ikye emi iJuda duuse Udzengye.
ROM 1:17 Lubana Esɔ Osuse nɛ Imgbasho kye tso ofɛ ngwi inggisɛ ka dzɛ nyaan yi Ongwu mani: ngwi li mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mi owita-wita nghataa ka dondu. Yɛyɛ dafi Afɛ lɔ mani gbɛɛ: <<Ama osaan ka dzɛ oshishe mi oyɛyɛ onuunu.>>
ROM 1:18 Itingga mgbi Imgbasho nɛ tsotɔ mi esho ikye ama ngbela yan ba duu yi emi imbaali ama nli si otsitsi bɛsɛ yi imbaali mgbi ama mani.
ROM 1:19 Lubana ungwɔ ndzɛ gyɔ ngwi a ka ye Imgbasho daada ba, ikyekyɛ Imgbasho kye tso ma gedee.
ROM 1:20 Inggisɛ sulu itɔdzɛ ogbɛɛ n ki ye wuba, lubana wita mi onɔ ɛsɛ ota-ta majo, odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi Imgbasho ngwi a li din ba, mfye mgban ogyegwu, mbisɔ onghaangha mgban duu, O nu ma di saan adzi ni inggisɛ ka yagba tangwan ba du.
ROM 1:21 Lubana ngwi a ye Imgbasho nɛ kpaa, a li nun mmwɛ gyɔ yan hona tan angba ba, kpaa ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi ama yɛɛ ayayi, ikwangha itukwu mgbi ama yifu.
ROM 1:22 Ama yɔ tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ ama kwiinɛ, nghaduu a yɛɛ emi ikwangha
ROM 1:23 ngwi a kile sunu Imgbasho nli kwulu ba na ma, a yɛ le sunu adagyɛ ngwi a kpaakpa dzɛ dafi inggisɛ naadi ingwunɔ naadi mmbwaba hona ungwɔ ama okwo ifu esɛ (nli kwulu ntonani).
ROM 1:24 Nghanɛ Imgbasho dzata ma nu ma kyɔ alungwɔ ayiwi ngwi itukwu mgbi ama mina mani. Ewodzɛ idza mgbi ama nu ma kyungwɔ ayiwi ola yi ewoma di nu ikpewo mgbi ama mmwɛ wuba.
ROM 1:25 A kyi nyinɛ otsitsi mgbi Imgbasho yi atsika, yɛ le sunu ungwɔ ama Imgbasho taata ngha Imgbasho ntaata ungwɔ, nmɛ ngwi a ka tsan gyegwu nani. No dzɛ ngha.
ROM 1:26 Mi itɔdzɛ nɛ Imgbasho dzata ma nu ma le mina ungwɔ ayiwi. Engyaa mgbi ama kpaa le la yi engyulɔ dafi atta ta ma wuba, yɛ le la yi ewoma.
ROM 1:27 Mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ kpɔɔ engyulɔ kpaa dzata abɔ ola yi engyaa yɛ le la yi ewoma. Engyulɔ le kyungwɔ ayiwi yi ewoma, di tu umba mgbi adɔ okwookwo ngwi gyɔ yi ikwangha ali mgbi ama nani.
ROM 1:28 Okiyayi yɔ, ngwi a fwa ogbela Imgbasho nɛ, O dzata ma ni ewodzɛ ikwangha mgbi ama kye ma teyi. Li ikyengha ngwi a le kyɔ idza nwogyɔ a ki le kyɔ ba aali.
ROM 1:29 Imbali gbɛ ma sɔ, ungwɔ ibwubwe yi nggwɔ yi mmgbe. Anyi mbwo ma itukwu yi inggisɛ ongwɔɔngwɔ yi ibe ogboogbo yi okpagyewo bɛyi inggisɛ okye wo itukwu. A li ama odziidzɛ,
ROM 1:30 ama ogbaagya yi ama Imgbasho ta ma anyi, ama ofyito yi emi imoga bɛyi abɔ otsigɛgɛ; a li ba yi ofɛ ofufɛ okyungwɔ obube; di li ngha ama omba ma adɔ;
ROM 1:31 a dzɛ yi ozoyeye ba, oyɛyɛ onuunu ba, a tishi itukwu ba, a li di elela ba.
ROM 1:32 Ngwi a ye dafi ola mgbi Imgbasho gbɛɛ, inggisɛ nkyɔ itɔ ali ntonɛ gyɔ ondu ikwongye nɛ kpaa, a kɛɛkiyayi okyungwɔ ntonɛnɛ ta ba kpaa, a li tu ama nle kyɔ itɔ ali nɛ wo nu ma kiyayi.
ROM 2:1 Nghanɛ, ema ama nli fwo inggisɛ angbeka ikwɔ nɛ, dzɛ yi ɛkyɛ oto-to wuba, lubana mi ali itɔ ofɛ ngwi ema le fwo angbeka ikwɔ duu, ema le ngyɛlu yi ewema, ikyekyɛ ungwɔ ngwi ema le fwo angbeka ikwɔ mi ele nɛ, ema le kyɔ ma tsatsa.
ROM 2:2 Ikyenghanɛ eyi ye ta gbɛɛ ikwɔ ofwoofwo mgbi Imgbasho mbi ama nle kyɔ itɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ li mi otsitsi.
ROM 2:3 Nghawanɛ ni abu inggisɛ ɛwɛwɛ le fwo ma ikwɔ dile kyɔ ungwonyi yi ama ma, o tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ o ka watɔ mi ikwɔ ofwoofwo mgbi Imgbashoo?
ROM 2:4 Naadi ema kwu itukwu oleewo mgbi Imgbasho okwulewo yi onyɔtsɛ bɛyi itukwu mgban oshiishi nɛ shanyɛ? Mi otsitsi yɔ ema ye dafi Imgbasho di eyi elela mani, ikyesinɛ o le tobyi eyi ni eyi kyata mi ali ibwubwe mgbi eyi.
ROM 2:5 Kpaa mi ikye adɔ onghaangha bɛyi itukwu otiishu mgbi ema yɔ, ema le gbe adɔ okwookwo ngwikwo le fɛ egbe itingga mgbi Imgbasho, onɔ ngwi ikwɔ mgban ofwoofwo mgbi otsitsi na kawa tsotɔ mani.
ROM 2:6 Imgbasho <<Ka wa nu ali inggisɛ yɛyɛ dafi otsungwɔn kyɔ mani.>>
ROM 2:7 Ama nkwunewo kyɔ osuse kyɛdɔ okwɔkwɔ, yi mmwɛ bɛyi oshishe nka dondu ba na, o ka nu ma oshishe ogyegwu.
ROM 2:8 Nghaduu ama nli tsuntsli di fwa otsitsi dile kyɛdɔ ofɛ ibwubwe yɔ, itingga yi itukwu owulu-wulu ka dzɛ ikye ma.
ROM 2:9 Okakewo yi isɔ okwulewo ka dzɛ ikye ali inggisɛ owamyɛ nkyungwɔ ibwubwe yɔ: ababɔ mbi emi iJuda, man mbi ama nli emi iJuda ba;
ROM 2:10 nghaduu Imgbasho ka kye okwɔkwɔ, mmwɛ yi iyu nu ali inggisɛ nkyɔ osuse duu: ababɔ mbi emi iJuda, bɛyi mbi ama nli emi iJuda ba.
ROM 2:11 Lubana Imgbasho li tso osadu-sadu ba.
ROM 2:12 Ama nkyɔ obube ngwi ola dzɛ waba ma kpaa, a ka ngwɔ ma ikwɔ imbisɔ ngwi a dzɛ yi ola ba mani, ama nkyɔ obube ngwi ola dzɛ yɔ, a dika ngwɔ ma ikwɔ mi ola mani.
ROM 2:13 Lubana li ama nfwoofwo ola mata le saan mi inɛ Imgbasho ba, kpaa li ama nngyo ola ma ngwi a ka kwu ma di ama osaan aali.
ROM 2:14 (Udzengye dzɛ yi ola ba, kpaa nu ma le kyɔ dafi ola mina ma yɔ, i yɛɛ ola mboma, dafi a dzɛ yi ola ba nɛ kpaa.
ROM 2:15 A tso ambɛ gbɛɛ ungwɔ ngwi ola mina ma, a lɔ ma mi itukwu mgbi ama, dafi ewodzɛ mgbi ama kpaa dile kyɔ obwɛndɛ mani. Ɛwɛ otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi ama kpaa le nu ma obube hona nagbɛ ma.)
ROM 2:16 Ungwɔnɛ ka wa kyɔ mi egbe ngwi Imgbasho ka nu iYesu iKrestu gbɔ inggisɛ ikwɔ mi ungwɔ ama a le kyɔ daada, dafi Esɔ Osuse mgbɛn gbɔ mani.
ROM 2:17 Ikyenghanɛ, ni abu kwu ewabu di emi iJuda; di kye abɔ byikɛ ola, di kye odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi abu yi Imgbasho le kwaayi;
ROM 2:18 di ye owitukwu mgban yɛ gbela yi ungwɔ nnghaangha ikyekyɛ ola tso abu;
ROM 2:19 di gbela otsitsi gbɛɛ abu li inggisɛ otso obinɛ ofɛ, di li osa mgbi ama nwoto iyifu,
ROM 2:20 abu li inggisɛ owɛ emi ikwangha odzɛ, abu li otsetse mgbi ɛngbɛ ama oshilɛlɛ, ikyekyɛ abu ye odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ola bɛyi otsitsi mgban,
ROM 2:21 nghama abu, o li tso angbeka, kyɔnɛ ngwi o tso ewoo wuba? Abu nle gbeesɔ gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ ka yimi ba nɛ, o kale yimii?
ROM 2:22 Abu nli gbɛɛ ni inggisɛ ka kyɔ amah ba nɛ, o li kyɔ amaah? Abu ngwu angwula ta abu anyi nɛ, o li yimi mi ozu angwulaa?
ROM 2:23 Abu nli kyile ewo esho yi ola nɛ, o li kwu Imgbasho shanyɛ mi ola ofaafaa?
ROM 2:24 Dafi a lɔ mi afɛ gbɛɛ: <<A fya iyi Imgbasho ito mi Anengye ikye abu.>>
ROM 2:25 Kini abu ngyo ola yɔ, ikyɛ sulu oyabɔ, kpaa ni abu foola yɔ, abu yɛɛ dafi o kyiikyɛ ye kpaa ba.
ROM 2:26 Ki ama nkyiikyɛ ba le kyungwɔ ama ola mina ma, Imgbasho ka di ma dafi ama nkyiikyɛ ntona baa?
ROM 2:27 Mi otsitsi yɔ, Ama nli emi iJuda ba ngwu a kyan ikyɛ ba kpaa ngyo ola yɔ, ka yagba nu abu ngwu dzɛ yi ola di kyiikyɛ kpaa foola ma gye obube.
ROM 2:28 Inggisɛ nkyiikyɛ mi mmbwɛ yi eyi taman ka yɛɛ emi iJuda otsitsi ba.
ROM 2:29 Ei, inggisɛ emi iJuda otsitsi yɔ, li inggisɛ ngwu itukwu mgban le saan yi Imgbasho mani. Ikyɛ okyɛɛkyɛ otsitsi nɛ, di li osunu ola ngwi a lɔ mi afɛ ta ba; kpaa li itukwu okyata-kyata nkyɛ mi Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho nani. Inggisɛ nkyatitukwu na li mina gbɛɛ, ni inggisɛ tsɛ ongwu ba, kpaa ni Imgbasho tsɛ ongwu.
ROM 3:1 Ni inggisɛ li emi iJuda, o ngha angbeka mi ekyɛ? Naadi oyabɔ mgbi ikyɛ okyɛ-kyɛ li ɛkyɛ?
ROM 3:2 Dzɛ yi oyabɔ mi ali itɔ ofɛ duu! Ababɔ yɔ, li ama Imgbasho kye elodzɛ mgban wo ma abɔ.
ROM 3:3 Ni emi iJuda angbeka dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ onuunu ba ma? Oyɛyɛ mgbi ama onuunu ba na ka yagba ndɛ Imgbasho ombwo ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgbaan?
ROM 3:4 Onoka ba du! Ki ali inggisɛ duu li gbatsika kpaa, Imgbasho li gbɔ otsitsi. Dafi Afɛ lɔ mani gbɛɛ: <<Ikye ni Abu gbɔdzɛ yɔ, ni a di gbɛɛ Abu gbɔ ayin, ni Abu di gbiikwɔ yɔ, ni Abu di ngha.>>
ROM 3:5 Nghaduu kini okpɛkpɛ mgbi eyi nu osaan mgbi Imgbasho nghao tsotɔ saan ma, eyi ka gbɔsinɛ? Eyi ka gbɛɛ Imgbasho kyɔ ayin ba okyitingga yi eyii? (N byita odzɛ ma dafi ikwangha inggisɛ mani.)
ROM 3:6 Li ngha ba du! Ki Imgbasho li gbiikwɔ mi otsitsi ba ma, O gbɔ ɛsɛ ikwɔ sinɛ?
ROM 3:7 Inggisɛ oka ka tangwɛ gbɛɛ, <<Kini atsika ngbɛn ogboogbo nu otsitsi mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mgban sheeshe waali, kyɔnɛ ngwi Imgbasho dika kwo ani adɔ?>>
ROM 3:8 Inggisɛ angbeka kye ondu le wo eyi ewo mi atsika di eyi gbɛɛ, <<Tatase okyɔ obube kpakpa!>> Ama nle gbɔ itɔ odzɛ ntonɛnɛ mɛ ngwi Imgbasho ka ngwɔ ma ikwɔ.
ROM 3:9 Nghanɛma eyi duu ka ngyɛlu sinɛ? Eyi emi iJuda tatase ngha ama nli emi iJuda ba ntonaa? Ba dududu! Eyi teyi kyi gbɔlu ngyɛ wa, gbɛɛ, emi iJuda yi ama nli emi iJuda ba kpaa li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube ungwonyi.
ROM 3:10 Dafi a lɔ mi Afɛ mani gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ onyi osaan dzɛma ba, ei onyi kpaa ba;
ROM 3:11 inggisɛ onyi odzɛ yi ozoyeye kpaa dzɛma ba, inggisɛ onyi kpaa pita oye Imgbasho ba.
ROM 3:12 Ama duu kyata iyikpa, a yɛɛ ayayi duu; inggisɛ onyi kpaa kyɔ osuse ba, onyi kpaa ba.
ROM 3:13 Elodzɛ mgbi ama dzɛ dafi endzi ngbofo le nukwɔ mani; ikyidɛ mgbi ama li gbatsika. Unka mgbi ogidzi dɔdzɛ ikpondu mgbi ama.
ROM 3:14 Ikamba yi elodzɛ ama onunɔ mbwo ma ondu.
ROM 3:15 Afɔ mgbi ama dzɛ vla-vla o ka dzɛ eyi kyi esɛ;
ROM 3:16 idɔ mgbi ama li onu inggisɛ kaka isɔ ali imbe ngwi a kɛ duu,
ROM 3:17 a ye ofɛ odzɛ mi iyu ba.
ROM 3:18 A dzɛ yi imio mgbi Imgbasho ba du.>>
ROM 3:19 Onɛnɛ eyi ye gbɛɛ alungwɔ ngwi ola gbɔ yɔ, i gbɔ yi ama nwoto abɔ ola mani, ikye ni ali inggisɛ ka natsondu yi Imgbasho wuba.
ROM 3:20 Nghanɛ Imgbasho ka yama gbela yi inggisɛ gbɛɛ o le saan mi ikye ola ongyoongyo ba, lubana li ola li nu eyi difwi gbɛɛ eyi kyɔ obube.
ROM 3:21 Nghaduu dulu ola dzɛkɛ esɛ onɛnɛ kpaa, osaan nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho ma a nu eyi yen wa, ngwi ola bɛyi ama ogbɛɛsɛ mgbi Imgbasho kyɔ obwɛndɛ.
ROM 3:22 Osaan nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho nɛ ba ikpewo oyɛyɛ onuunu mbi iYesu iKrestu ikye ama nnoyɛyɛ duu. Idzidza dzɛma ba,
ROM 3:23 lubana inggisɛ duu kyɔ obube di dzitsi mi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho,
ROM 3:24 kpaa Imgbasho nu eyi gye emyɛmyɛ ayayi mi elela mgban mi owatɔ-watɔ nba ikpewo iKrestu iYesu nani.
ROM 3:25 Imgbasho kyon nu dafi ifɛ ofɛɛfɛ, mi onoyɛyɛ mi eyi mgban. O kyungwɔnɛ ikye okye emyɛmyɛ mgban tso, ifɛ nɛ tso gbɛɛ, Imgbasho kyɔ osuse dafi o kwo ama nkyɔ obube mi onɔ ngwi nyɛ na adɔ ba mani,
ROM 3:26 o kyungwɔnɛ ikye otso gbɛɛ ongwu li inggisɛ ogbiikwɔ osuse mi onɔ ongwi onɛnɛ nɛni, ikye ni ongwu gye emyɛmyɛ di nu ama nnoyɛyɛ mbi iYesu gye emyɛmyɛ.
ROM 3:27 Nghanɛ abɔ otsigɛgɛ kɔ? A kye dzɛkɛ enggengga. Mi ali itɔ ofɛ? Li mi ola ongyoongyoo? Ei, kpaa li mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ngwi eyi ka gye emyɛmyɛ.
ROM 3:28 Lubana eyi kye abɔ byi gbɛɛ inggisɛ li gye emyɛmyɛ li mi ola ongyoongyo ba, kpaa li mi oyɛyɛ onuunu.
ROM 3:29 Imgbasho nɛ li Imgbasho mgbi emi iJuda yuomaa? O li Imgbasho mgbi Udzengye kpaa baa? Ɛɛn, li mgbi Udzengye kpaa,
ROM 3:30 Ngwi Imgbasho li onyi ta nɛ, li ongwu ka nu ama okyiikyɛ bɛyi ama okyiikyɛ ba duu emyɛmyɛ.
ROM 3:31 Nghanɛma, eyi ka kyi ngwɔlu ola dɔ ikye oyɛyɛ onuunu nɛɛ? Onoka ba du! I ka kɛkiyayi onu ola mmwɛ.
ROM 4:1 Ikyenghanɛ li ekyɛ ngwi eyi ka gbɛɛ otsikyeyi Abrahan difwi mi itɔdzɛ nɛ?
ROM 4:2 Ni Abrahan gye emyɛmyɛ ikye idɔ yɔ, o dzɛ yi ungwɔ otsabɔ igɛgɛ ele, kpaa li mbi Imgbasho ba.
ROM 4:3 Afɛ gbɔ dikyɛ? <<Abrahan nu Imgbasho oyɛyɛ, Imgbasho kyon gbɛɛ o li inggisɛ osaan.>>
ROM 4:4 Kini inggisɛ kyidɔ yɔ, awuya ngwi a li kpan na a li di gbɛɛ li umba ba, kpaa li ungwɔ nwogyɔ a ka kyɔ.
ROM 4:5 Nghaduukpaa, inggisɛ ama nli kyidɔ ba kpaa li nu Imgbasho ongwu nli nu emi imbaali kpaa gye emyɛmyɛ na oyɛyɛ yɔ, a li kye oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama gbɛɛ di li osaan.
ROM 4:6 IDevedi kpaa gbɔ ngha onɔ ngwi o gbɔdzɛ inggisɛ nkyidɔ ba kpaa Imgbasho non gye emyɛmyɛ ma gbɛɛ mse dzɛ yan:
ROM 4:7 <<Mse dzɛ yi ama ngwu a dzamata yi obube, di tukwulu ma alobube mani.
ROM 4:8 Mse dzɛ yi inggisɛ ngwu Otsɛ ka kye alobube mgban wuuta ba mani.>>
ROM 4:9 Mse nɛ dzɛ ikye ama okyiikyɛ kyoon ta naa dzɛ ikye ama nkyiikyɛ ba kpaa? Eyi teyi li gbɛɛ oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi Abrahan nu ma kwun di inggisɛ osaan.
ROM 4:10 Otsɛ-tsɛ na ba mi ali itɔ ofɛ? A tsan duuse non kyiikyɛ naadi o kyiikyɛ se? A tsan duuse o wa kyiikyɛ!
ROM 4:11 O di gbɛ ambɛ ikyɛ, ambɛ mgbi osaan ngwi o tu mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mi onɔ ngwi o kyiikyɛ waba mani. Ikyenghanɛ, o li otsɔ ama nkyiikyɛ waba kpaa noyɛyɛ duu, adzi ni a kwu ma di ama osaan.
ROM 4:12 O di li otsɔ ama nkyɛkyikyɛ ta ba kpaa le kyikyɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ngwi Abrahan tun duuse wa kyiikyɛ nani.
ROM 4:13 Li mi abɔ ola ngwi Abrahan yi etɔ mgban tu ondu odzɛɛdzɛ gbɛɛ, o ka gyokwudɛ ɛsɛ ba, kpaa li mi osaan nkyɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu nani.
ROM 4:14 Lubana ni ama nle kyɛdɔ ola ntona yɛɛ ama gyokwudɛ yɔ, oyɛyɛ onuunu dzɛ yi oyabɔ wuba ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgban kpaa yɛɛ ayayi.
ROM 4:15 Ikyekyɛ ola li ba yi itingga. Imbe ngwi ola dzɛ bayɔ ola ofaafa kpaa dzɛ ba.
ROM 4:16 Nghanɛ, ondu odzɛɛdzɛ li ba mi oyɛyɛ onuunu, adzi ni elela di dzɛ ikye etɔ mgbi Abrahan duu. Ondu odzɛɛdzɛ otsitsi nɛ dzɛ ikye ama nli mgbi ola kyoon ba, kpaa li mbi ama nsulu oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi Abrahan nani. O li otseyi duu.
ROM 4:17 Dafi Afɛ tsekise lɔ ma gbɛɛ: <<Ani nu abu li otsɔ ɛsɛ ibyibyi.>> O li otseyi mi inɛ Imgbasho, ongwu o nun oyɛyɛ nani, Imgbasho nli kyile emi ikwukwɔ, di li kwu ungwɔ ama ndzɛma ba dafi a tsekise dzɛ nani.
ROM 4:18 Ngwi dzɛ dafi ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi dzɛma ba nɛ kpaa, Abrahan gbɛwɛbyi noyɛyɛ. Nghanɛ o yɛɛ otsɔ ɛsɛ ibyibyi, yɛyɛ dafi Imgbasho teyi nyan mani gbɛɛ, <<Li ngha ngwi engwiba mgbi abu ka mbwo aali.>>
ROM 4:19 Ngwi Abrahan mɛ onova ideli onyi nɛ kpaa, oyɛyɛ onuunu mgban shanyɛ ba. O ye dafi ongwu dzɛ kwɛkwɛ okwulu, owan iSara kpaa kyɛ ka mbongwɛ wuba mani.
ROM 4:20 Nghaduu Abrahan tangwɛ ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi Imgbasho ba, kpaa kɛɛkiyayi mi oyɛyɛ mgban onuunu di kye okwɔkwɔ nu Imgbasho,
ROM 4:21 ikyesinɛ o ye saan ta gbɛɛ Imgbasho dzɛ yi mfye okyungwɔ ngwi o zondu nani.
ROM 4:22 Li ikyengha <<ngwi a gbela yan gbɛɛ o le saan aali.>>
ROM 4:23 Elodzɛ ngwi a lɔ gbɛɛ <<a gbela yan na>> a lɔn li ikye mgban yuon ba,
ROM 4:24 kpaa li ikye eyi ama Imgbasho ka gbela gbɛɛ eyi le saan ikye gbɛɛ eyi noyɛyɛ mbi ongwu Imgbasho nkyile iYesu Otsɛ mgbi eyi mi ikwongye mani.
ROM 4:25 A kyon nu mi abɔ ikwongye mi ikye ali ibwubwe mgbi eyi di kyilon mi ikwongye ikye ni eyi gye emyɛmyɛ mi inɛ Imgbasho.
ROM 5:1 Nghawanɛ, dafi eyi gye emyɛmyɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu nɛ, eyi sulu iyu yi Imgbasho mgbi eyi ikpewo Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu,
ROM 5:2 ongwu eyi tu ofɛ kaka elela ongwi eyi kwudzɛ ele onɛnɛ nɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu nɛni. Eyi di dzɛ yi atsa yi ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi otu okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho nani.
ROM 5:3 Li ngha ta ba, kpaa eyi di tsatsa mi isɔ mgbi eyi, ikyekyɛ eyi ye ta gbɛɛ isɔ li ba yi itukwu oshiishi;
ROM 5:4 itukwu oshiishi li ba yi itukwu ofyumfye, itukwu ofyumfye li ba yi ɛwɛ ogbebyi.
ROM 5:5 Ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi di li nu eyi ayiwi ba, ikyekyɛ Imgbasho kye okpitukwu mgban yawo eyi kɛ itukwu nyɛ mi Onodzi Osaan ngwi O kye nu eyi nani.
ROM 5:6 Ngwi onɔ wa gyɔ yɛyɛ nɛ, iKrestu kwulu ikye eyi mi onɔ ngwi eyi dzɛ yi mfye ba kale ngha Imgbasho adɔ mani.
ROM 5:7 I fyumfye ni inggisɛ kwulu ikye inggisɛ osaan, kpaa mi ikye inggisɛ osuse saan yɔ, kaba inggisɛ ka yagba kwulu.
ROM 5:8 Nghaduu Imgbasho kye okpitukwu mgban tso eyi mi itɔ ofɛ nɛni: Ngwi eyi ka li emi ali ibwubwe majo iKrestu kwulu ikye eyi.
ROM 5:9 Ngwi eyi gye emyɛmyɛ mi eyi mgban wa nɛ, a ka dulu eyi mi itingga mgbi Imgbasho ikpewon sinɛ ngha lo?
ROM 5:10 Lubana onɔ ngwi eyi ka li engyikyili mgbi Imgbasho ma, a yile eyi gyiide yan mi ikwu ongwan, ikyegbɛɛ a yile eyi gyiide nɛ, eyi ka wa watɔ ikpewo okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mgban mi ikwu sinɛ ngha lo?
ROM 5:11 Ungwɔnɛ li ngha ta ba, kpaa eyi di tsatsa mbi Imgbasho ikpewo Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu, mi oyile eyi gyiide yi Imgbasho.
ROM 5:12 Nghanɛ, dafi alobube kaka ɛsɛ ikpewo inggisɛ onyi, ikwongye di kaka ɛsɛ ikpewo alobube nɛ, inggisɛ duu tu ikwongye, ikyekyɛ ali inggisɛ duu kyɔ obube.
ROM 5:13 Lubana duuse ni a kye ola nu yɔ, alobube teyi dzɛ ɛsɛ nɛni. Kpaa a kye alobube wuuta ba ikyesinɛ ola dzɛma waba.
ROM 5:14 Ndzɛ nghanɛ kpaa, ikwongye wita kyɛ onɔ mgbi Adan nghataa ba onɔ mgbi iMose jo kaka mbi ama nfoola dafi Adan ndzɛ dafi iKrestu nka wa ba na ba mani.
ROM 5:15 Nghaduu umba ungwɔ ngwi iYesu kyɔ na dzɛ dafi adɔ onghaangha na ba. Lubana ki ibyi inggisɛ kwulu ikye adɔ onghaangha mgbi inggisɛ onyi yɔ, mbi inggisɛ onyi iYesu iKrestu na umba itukwu oleewo mgbi Imgbasho nkyɛ mbon ka gbɔfwɛ mbi ibyi inggisɛ!
ROM 5:16 Odi kiyayi yɔ, umba mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ dafi alobube ngwi Adan kyɔ na ba. Ikwɔ kyɛdɔ alobube onyi na di ba yi odzili-dzili, kpaa umba na yɔ kyɛdɔ adɔ onghaangha mgbi inggisɛ ibyibyi di nu ma gye emyɛmyɛ.
ROM 5:17 Lubana ki adɔ onghaangha mgbi inggisɛ onyi, nu ikwongye gyutɔ ikpewo inggisɛ onyi na waali, ka dzɛ sinɛ mbi ama ngbɛ elela mgbi Imgbasho dzii bɛyi umba mgbi osaan ngyutɔ mboma ikpewo inggisɛ onyi iYesu iKrestu na!
ROM 5:18 Nghawanɛ, dafi adɔ onghaangha onyi ba yi odzili-dzili mbi inggisɛ duu nɛ, li ngha ngwi ali osaan onyi ba yi emyɛmyɛ nka nu inggisɛ duu tu oshishe yɛyɛ aali.
ROM 5:19 Lubana dafi adɔ onghaangha mgbi inggisɛ onyi nu inggisɛ duu yɛɛ emi alobube nɛ, li ngha ngwi osiikyenu mgbi inggisɛ onyi ka nu inggisɛ ibyibyi yɛɛ saan kpaa aali.
ROM 5:20 A kye ola na ba ikye ni obube tsotɔ; kpaa ni obube tsotɔ yɔ, elela Imgbasho nghao tsotɔ duu.
ROM 5:21 Ikyenghanɛ, dafi alobube gbe inggisɛ duu teyi kaka ikwongye nɛ, li ngha ngwi elela mgbi Imgbasho nnu eyi osaan na gbe eyi teyi onɛnɛ, nu eyi tu oshishe gyegwu ikpewo iYesu iKrestu Otsɛ mgbi eyi aali.
ROM 6:1 I ka gbɔn sinɛ wadɛn? Ni eyi kɛɛkiyayi okyɔ alobube zukwu ni elela sheeshee?
ROM 6:2 Onoka lo! Ni eyi kwulu mi alobube waali; kyɔsinɛ se eyi di kale kyɔn kpɔɔ?
ROM 6:3 Naadi ema ye dafi eyi ama ngwu a kyɔ eyi iBatisima mbi iYesu iKrestu nɛ, a kyɔ eyi iBatisima kaka ikwongye mgban ma wɛ?
ROM 6:4 Nghanɛ a gbe eyi ndzi yan nyɛ mi iBatisima kaka ikwongye ikyegbɛɛ, dafi a kyile iKrestu mi ikwongye mi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Otsɔn nɛ, eyi kpaa kawa dzɛ mi oshishe ofufɛ.
ROM 6:5 Dafi a gbe eyi kwokyi yan mi ikwongye nghanɛ, li kyɛmɛ a dika gbe eyi kwokyi yan mi okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu.
ROM 6:6 Lubana eyi ye odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi eyi ogbugbe na a kye gbokwo yan ikye ongyɛlu yi ikpewo mgbi alobube nani, zukwu ni eyi ka li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube wuba.
ROM 6:7 Inggisɛ nkwulu yi iKrestu ta wa yɔ, o watɔ mi alobube.
ROM 6:8 Onɛnɛ kini eyi kwulu yi iKrestu yɔ, eyi noyɛyɛ ta gbɛɛ i dika wa dzɛ oshishe yan.
ROM 6:9 Lubana eyi ye ta gbɛɛ ngwi a kyile iKrestu mi ikwu nɛ, o ka yama kwulu wuba; ikwongye sulu mfye onghan wuba.
ROM 6:10 Ikwu ngwi iYesu kwu na, o kwikwu akponyi ikye odzili alobube; kpaa oshishe ngwi o dzɛ na, o dzɛ ikye Imgbasho kyoon.
ROM 6:11 Mi itɔ ofɛ na kpɔɔ, kye ewema gbɛɛ ema kwulu ikye odzɛ mi alobube wuba, kpaa wɛ gbɛɛ iKrestu iYesu nu ema oshishe mbi Imgbasho.
ROM 6:12 Ikyenghanɛ ka nu alobube gyutɔ mi ikpewo mgbi abu nli kwulu nɛ ba, di abu wa sunu imina mgban ibwubwe.
ROM 6:13 Ka yama kye alewo mgbi ema nu ali ibwubwe no yɛɛ okye mgbi imbaali ba. Kye ewema nu Imgbasho, dafi ama ngwu a dulu ma tɔ mi ikwongye luba oshishe mani; di kye alewo mgbi ema nun dafi okyiidɔ mgbi osaan mani.
ROM 6:14 Nghawanɛ, ka nu alobube kye ema teyi ba, ikyekyɛ ema byidzɛ abɔ ola ba, kpaa abɔ elela.
ROM 6:15 Ungwɔ ntonɛ duu ma itan sinɛ? Eyi ka kiyayi okyɔ obube ikyegbɛɛ eyi woto abɔ ola ba kpaa woto abɔ elela nghaoo? Onoka ba du!
ROM 6:16 Ema ye dafi ema li ofyɛɛ mgbi inggisɛ ngwu ema le siikyenun ma wɛ? Ema ka yagba li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube di kwulu, hona ofyɛɛ ama osiikyenu Imgbasho, nka nu ema dzɛ mi ofɛ mgbi osaan.
ROM 6:17 Nghaduu eyi ta Imgbasho angba gbɛɛ, nose ma ema li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube kpaa onɛnɛ yɔ, ema yɛ kyɛdɔ itɔ otsootso ngwi a tso ema nɛ itukwu onyi.
ROM 6:18 A shɛ ema adi mi ifu alobube, ema yɛɛ ofyɛɛ mgbi osaan.
ROM 6:19 N le gbɔdzɛ nɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ ikyekyɛ ema ndɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi atta mgbi ema. Dafi ema li kye alewo mgbi ema yɛɛ ofyɛɛ nu idza ni ali ibwubwe mgbi ema le sheeshe wele ma, onɛnɛ kye alewo mgbi ema yɛɛ ofyɛɛ nu osaan nka kye ema kaka osaan kpaa mani.
ROM 6:20 Onɔ ngwi ema li ofyɛɛ mgbi alobube ma, ungwɔ kwu osaan akye yi ema ba.
ROM 6:21 Li ali oyabɔ ngwi ema tu mi onɔ na mi ungwɔ ama n yɛɛ ema ungwɔ ayiwi onɛnɛ nɛ? Bana ungwɔ ntona li ba yi ikwongye mi ongyɛɛngyɛ!
ROM 6:22 Nghaduu onɛnɛ ngwi a dulu ema tɔ mi abɔ alobube di yɛɛ ofyɛɛ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ, oyabɔ ngwi ema tu ma kye ema kaka osaan. Ongyɛɛngyɛ mgban di li oshishe ogyegwu.
ROM 6:23 Lubana mkpa alobube li ikwongye, kpaa umba mgbi Imgbasho li oshishe ogyegwu mbi iKrestu iYesu Otsɛ mgbi eyi.
ROM 7:1 Emi ongwunani, ema ama nbɛ mi ola ntonɛnɛ, ema ye dafi ola li kyidɔ mi ikpewo inggisɛ onɔ ngwi otsungwɔn dzɛ oshishe ma ta baa?
ROM 7:2 Dzɛ sini, ola tso gbɛɛ ongyaa dzɛ ikye oban onɔ ngwi o ka dzɛ oshishe mani. Nghaduu ni oban kwulu yɔ, o tɔ mi abɔ ola nani.
ROM 7:3 Nghawanɛ, ki non kyuka yi ongyulɔ oka ngwi oban ka dzɛ oshishe yɔ, o kyɔ amah. Kpaa ni oban wa kwulu yɔ, o tɔ mi abɔ ola nani. Non yɛ bongyulɔ oka jokpa, o yama li ongyaa amah wuba.
ROM 7:4 Nɛ, emi ongwunani, ema kpaa ola nwodzɛ mbi ema na kwulu ikpewo ikwu iKrestu, ikye ni ema li mgbi iKrestu ongwu a kyilon mi ikwu ikye ni eyi wa owaawa mbi Imgbasho nani.
ROM 7:5 Lubana ngwi odzɛɛdzɛ ibwubwe mgbi atta kye eyi teyi ma, imina obube ngwi ola kye ba ma le kyidɔ mbi eyi, man alungwɔ ngwi eyi kyɔ duu ngyɛ mi ikwongye.
ROM 7:6 Nghaduu onɛnɛ ngwi eyi kwulu mi ungwɔ nplɛ kwu eyi ofyɛɛ nɛ, eyi tɔ mi abɔ ola ikye ni eyi ki kyungwɔ mi odzɛɛdzɛ ofufɛ mgbi Onodzi, no ka li imbisɔ mgbi ola ogbugbe ngwi a lɔɔlɔ na ba.
ROM 7:7 I ka gbɔn sinɛ wa dɛn? Ola nɛ li ungwɔ obubee? Onɔ oka ba du! Mi otsitsi ki li ola bayɔ, n kika ye ungwɔ nli alobube ba du. N kika ye ungwɔ nli odi mbe angwɔ ba du, ni ola ki gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama di ungwɔ mbe angwɔ bayɔ.>>
ROM 7:8 Li ofɛ ngwi ola kye ba nani, ngwi alobube tu ofɛ okwokyile ali imina obube duu mbi ani aani. Kini ola dzɛma bayɔ, alobube dzɛ yi mfye wuba.
ROM 7:9 Duuse ni ani ye ola yɔ, ani dzɛ oshishe; kpaa ngwi ola wa ba nɛ, alobube fwi tɔ dzɛ oshishe man ani kwulu.
ROM 7:10 N difwi gbɛɛ ola se ndzɛ yi oweka okye oshishe ba ma, yɛ kye-kye ikwongye ba.
ROM 7:11 Lubana alobube tu ofɛ ikpewo ola kpagya ani wo, di ngwɔ ani.
ROM 7:12 Nghawanɛ, ola le saan, ali ola le ayin di tishi.
ROM 7:13 Ungwɔ ntishi nɛ di yɛɛ ikwongye mbi anii? Onoka ba du! Ikyegbɛɛ nu ma difwi alobube gbɛɛ di li alobube yɔ, i kye ikwongye ba mbi ani ikpewo ungwɔ osuse, adzi ni alobube yɛɛ alobube yɛyɛ ikpewo ola mani.
ROM 7:14 Eyi ye ta gbɛɛ ola li ungwɔ ongwi onodzi, nghaduu ani dzɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ali ibwubwe mgbi atta, a kyen gya yi alobube dafi ofyɛɛ mani.
ROM 7:15 Ani yama ye ungwɔ ani le kyɔ ba. Lubana ungwɔ ngwi ani mina okyɔ ma n li kyɔn ba, kpaa ungwɔ nta ani anyi ma n li kyɔn.
ROM 7:16 Ni ani di kyungwɔ ngwi ani mina okyɔ ba ma kpaa, n di li gbela gbɛɛ ola tishi.
ROM 7:17 Ngwi i dzɛ nghanɛ yama li ani yuen le kyɔ ba kpaa, li alobube nwodzɛ mben mani.
ROM 7:18 N ye ta gbɛɛ mi atta mgbi ani ibwubwe nani, unkonyi osuse wodzɛ mbi ani ba. Bana n sulu imina okyungwɔ osuse kpaa, n li yagba kyɔn ba.
ROM 7:19 Lubana ungwɔ osuse ngwi ani mina okyɔ ma n li kyɔ ba, li obube ngwi ani mina okyɔ ba ma, n li kiyayi okyɔ aali.
ROM 7:20 Kini ani le kyungwɔ ngwi ani mina okyɔn bayɔ, yama li ani yuen le kyɔ wuba, kpaa li alobube nwodzɛ mbi ani ma le kyɔ aali.
ROM 7:21 Nɛ n difwi gbɛɛ mfye oka le tsamu ani, onɔ ngwi i mina ani okyungwɔ osuse ma, ungwɔ obube li kye ani teyi.
ROM 7:22 Lubana n gbela yi ola mgbi Imgbasho itukwu onyi;
ROM 7:23 nghaduu n difwi mfye oka idzidza nle gblika yi itukwu mgbi ani, i di nu ani yɛɛ ofyɛɛ alobube nkye ani le teyi mi alungwɔ ngwi ani le kyɔ duu.
ROM 7:24 Li ali itɔ ishisha inggisɛ ngwi ani dzɛ dɛn! Li emɛ ka nagbɛ ani mi abɔ atta mgbi ani nkye ani le lu ikwongye nɛ?
ROM 7:25 N ta Imgbasho angba ikpewo iYesu iKrestu Otsɛ mgbi eyi! Nghawanɛ, ani abuen mi itukwu mgbɛn yɔ, n li ofyɛɛ mi ola mgbi Imgbasho, kpaa mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi mmbwɛ yi eyi yɔ, mfye oka le tsamu ani ni ani kyɔ alobube.
ROM 8:1 Nghanɛ, onɛnɛ odzili-dzili yama dzɛ ikye ama ndzɛ mi ifu iKrestu iYesu ba,
ROM 8:2 ikyekyɛ ikpewo iKrestu iYesu mfye mgbi Onodzi nu oshishe shɛn adi ta mi mfye mgbi alobube yi ikwongye.
ROM 8:3 Lubana ungwɔ ngwi ola yagba kyɔ ba, ikyegbɛɛ odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ sulu mfye mmɛ ba ma, Imgbasho kyɔn. O kye ongwan dɛsɔ ba mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ, ikye owa kyi kyelu adɔ okwookwo mgbi alobube mi ikpewo mgban,
ROM 8:4 adzi ni a di osaan ngwi a gbɛɛ ni eyi dzɛ mi ola ma mbi eyi ama nle kyɛdɔ odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi mmbwɛ yi eyi ba kpaa le kyɛdɔ odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi Onodzi nɛni.
ROM 8:5 Ama ngwu mmbwɛ yi eyi kye ma le teyi yɔ, li gbe itukwu mgbi ama byi ungwɔ ngwi mmbwɛ yi eyi mina mani; kpaa ama Onodzi kye ma le teyi, li gbe itukwu ma byi ungwɔ ama Onodzi mina.
ROM 8:6 Itukwu mgbi inggisɛ ngwi alobube kye le teyi yɔ li ikwongye, nghaduu itukwu ngwi Onodzi kye le teyi yɔ, li oshishe yi iyu.
ROM 8:7 Kpaa itukwu alobube, li dzɛ mi ogblɔgblɔ yi Imgbasho. Li yama sunu ola mgbi Imgbasho ba, hona dika yagba kpaa ba.
ROM 8:8 Ama ngwu mmbwɛ yi eyi kye ma le teyi yɔ, ka yagba kyungwɔ okpa Imgbasho ba.
ROM 8:9 Ema ta yɔ, mmbwɛ yi eyi kye ema le teyi ba kpaa li Onodzi, kini Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho wodzɛ mbi ema yɔ. Ma ali inggisɛ ndzɛ yi Onodzi mgbi iKrestu ba wa, o li mgbi iKrestu luba.
ROM 8:10 Nghaduu ni iKrestu dzɛ mbi abu yɔ, ewo mgbi abu kwulu ikye alobube, kpaa onodzi mgbi abu dzɛ oshishe ikye osaan.
ROM 8:11 Ma ni Onodzi mgbi Ongwu nkyile iYesu mi ikwu na wodzɛ mbi abu yɔ, Ongwu nkyile iKrestu mi ikwu na dika nyɛ mi Onodzi mgban nwodzɛ mbi abu nɛ, dulu abu mi ikwongye luba oshishe.
ROM 8:12 Nghanɛ, emi ongwunani, eyi li ofyɛɛ mgbi imina ongwi ɛsɛ nɛ ba, nɛ eyi sulu itɔdzɛ okyɛdɔ imina ongwi ɛsɛ wuba.
ROM 8:13 Lubana ni abu dzɛ mgbi mmbwɛ yi eyi yɔ, o ka kwulu; kpaa ni abu dzɛ mi Onodzi, kyi kyelu imina obube mgbi ewo ngwuta yɔ, o ka dzɛ oshishe.
ROM 8:14 Ama ngwu Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho kye ma le teyi yɔ, a li emi ongwɛ Imgbasho.
ROM 8:15 Ikyesinɛ ema gbɛ onodzi nnu ema yɛɛ ofyɛɛ nka mio wuba, kpaa ema gbɛ Onodzi nnu ema yɛɛ engwɛ Imgbasho mani. Ma mi ikpewo Onodzi nɛ eyi kwun gbɛɛ, <<Baba, Otseyi.>>
ROM 8:16 Onodzi na abɔn kyɔ obwɛndɛ yi onodzi mgbi eyi gbɛɛ eyi li emi ongwɛ Imgbasho.
ROM 8:17 Ma ngwi eyi li engwɛ nɛ, eyi li ama gyokwudɛ mgban. Eyi li ama gyokwudɛ Imgbasho ungwonyi yi iKrestu. Eyi ka gyadzɛ yi iKrestu, ma ni eyi gyadzɛ yi iKrestu yɔ, eyi dika kaka okwɔkwɔ mgban yan.
ROM 8:18 Ani noyɛyɛ gbɛɛ adzɛ ngwi eyi le gye onɛnɛ nɛ yama mɛ mi okwɔkwɔ ngwi a kawa kye tso eyi ma ba.
ROM 8:19 Ɛsɛ duu le tsoolo ni ama wa di dafi Imgbasho ka kye emi ongwan tso mani.
ROM 8:20 Lubana a nu ɛsɛ duu ndɛngyɛ, yama li itukwu ɛsɛ ba, kpaa li itukwu Imgbasho non dzɛkɛ ngha, yi ɛwɛ ogbe byi
ROM 8:21 gbɛɛ ɛsɛ abuon ka watɔ mi adi mgbi ungwɔ ombeembe ngwi a bwan na luba ewo oshɛta okwɔkwɔ mgbi emi ongwɛ Imgbasho.
ROM 8:22 Lubana eyi ye dafi ɛsɛ duu le maandu dafi imba ongwɛ mani, nghataa ba onɔ dzikan nɛni.
ROM 8:23 Yama li ɛsɛ yuon ta ba, eyi abueyi ama nka wa tu owawa ongwi ababɔ mgbi Onodzi ma jokpaa, le maandu mi itukwu le fɛ onɔ ngwi a ka gbɛ eyi dafi engwɛ, bɛkɛ yi ikpewo ofufɛ ngwi a zondu okye nu eyi mani.
ROM 8:24 Ikyesinɛ li mi ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi nɛ ngwi eyi watɔ aani. Kpaa ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi ongwi a di yɔ, yama li ɛwɛ ogbe byiibyi luba du. Li emɛ li kye ɛwɛ byi ungwɔ ngwi ongwu teyi dzɛyan?
ROM 8:25 Kpaa ni eyi gbɛwɛbyi ungwɔ ngwi eyi plɛ dzɛyan wa bayɔ, i ka shitukwu fɛ.
ROM 8:26 Mi itɔ ofɛ na kpɔɔ, Onodzi li tobyi eyi onɔ ngwi eyi dzɛ ewo atsi mani. Eyi ye ungwɔ ngbuo ngwi eyi ka bibɔ ikyen ba, kpaa Onodzi li bɔ ikye eyi yi andu omaama ngwi a ka gbɔn gbɛ ba mani.
ROM 8:27 Imgbasho nli kyidi itukwu mgbi eyi ma ye oweka mgbi Onodzi, ikyekyɛ Onodzi li bɔ ikye emi osaan dafi owitukwu mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ mani.
ROM 8:28 Eyi di ye gbɛɛ alungwɔ nba mbi eyi duu li Imgbasho nu ofɛ gbɛɛ no tɔ lo ama ongwu kpa ma itukwu ma tishi, ama ngwu a kwu ma ela mi itɔdzɛ mgbi ongwu mani.
ROM 8:29 Lubana ama Imgbasho teyi ye ma ma, o kye ma dzɛkɛ dafi emi Ongwan, adzi nu ma yɛɛ yɛyɛ dafi Ongwɛ nli Ongwovlɛ mgbi emi ongwunɔn duu.
ROM 8:30 Ama ngwu o di plɛ kye ma dzɛ ma, o kwu ma ela; ama ngwu o kwu ma ela ma, o di nu ma gye emyɛmyɛ; ama ngwu o di nu ma gye emyɛmyɛ ma, o di kye okwɔkwɔ mgban nu ma.
ROM 8:31 Li ali uka tsatso ngwi eyi ka nu ikye ungwɔ ntonɛ? Ni Imgbasho dzɛ yi eyi ma li emɛni ka fyinyɛnɛ yi eyi?
ROM 8:32 Ongwu nkye abɔ tukwu ongwan ba, kpaa kyon nu mi ikye eyi duu na, ka kyɔsinɛse o ka di eyi elela kye alungwɔ duu nu eyi ba.
ROM 8:33 Li emɛ ka gbe odzɛ tukwu ama Imgbasho sadu ma nɛ ewo? Li Imgbasho li nu inggisɛ gye emyɛmyɛ.
ROM 8:34 Li ongwu emɛ ka ngwɔ eyi ikwɔ dɔ? Inggisɛ dzɛma ba, lubana iKrestu iYesu kwulu mi ikye eyi a di kyilon luba oshishe ikye eyi, o di sɔdzɛ imbe mmwɛ mi abugye mgbi Imgbasho le tɛkyɛ ikye eyi.
ROM 8:35 Li emɛ ka gha eyi yi okpitukwu mgbi iKrestu? Li okakewo naadi adzɛ naadi isɔ hona enbwa hona ibiba naadi inoola naadi okwusunkli?
ROM 8:36 Dafi Afɛ lɔ ma gbɛɛ, <<Mi ikye abu Imgbasho, eyi li tsigɛgɛ yi ikwongye alonɔ duu; A di eyi dafi mmala ngwi a le ka kye eba gbon onbukwɔ mani.>>
ROM 8:37 Mi ungwɔnɛ duu kpaa eyi shewo ngha ama onghaangha ikpewo iKrestu ndi eyi kpan itukwu nani.
ROM 8:38 Lubana n ye saan gbɛɛ ikwongye hona oshishe, naadi engyesɔ hona onodzi ibwubwe, hona onɔ ongwi onɛnɛ naadi onɔ ongwi iyayi, hona ali itɔ mfye duu,
ROM 8:39 naadi mfye ongwi esho hona mfye ongwi ikpɛsɛ, hona ungwɔ ngwi a ta duu, ka yagba ghalu eyi yi okpitukwu mgbi Imgbasho ndzɛ mi idzidzɛ eyi yi iKrestu iYesu Otsɛ mgbi eyi nɛ ba.
ROM 9:1 N le gbɔ otsitsi mbi iKrestu, n le mwonya ba, itukwu mgbɛn kpaa nin obube ba, Onodzi Osaan li obwɛndɛ mgbɛn,
ROM 9:2 Eka kwowina len kpakpa itukwu di wulin jo dondu ba.
ROM 9:3 Bana n mina gbɛɛ ani abuen a ki wo ani ikamba di dzabɔ yi iKrestu mi ikye emi ongwunani, emi Israi ama nli etɔ yi ani nɛni.
ROM 9:4 A li emidi Imgbasho ngwu Imgbasho kyelu ma nu ma yɛɛ etɔ mgban. Imgbasho tso ma okwɔkwɔ mgban. O bwondu yi ama di kye ola mgban nu ma. Ozu osunu Imgbasho mi iJerosalin na bɛyi ondu Imgbasho dzɛ duu li mgbi ama.
ROM 9:5 Li ama li inyabyi, di li mboma ngwi iKrestu tɔ etɔ mi ɛsɛ nɛni, ongwu nli Imgbasho onghaangha nɛni. Nu ma tsan gyegwu! No dzɛ ngha.
ROM 9:6 No ka dzɛ dafi elodzimgbasho wɛɛsɛ ba. Lubana li ama ntɔ etɔ mi Israi duu li emi Israi yɛyɛ ba.
ROM 9:7 Dafi etɔ mgbi Abrahan tsatsa li emi ongwiba mgbi Abrahan ba nɛni. Imgbasho nya Abrahan gbɛɛ, <<Li ikpewo Adziki ngwi abu ka tu etɔ ngwi Ani zondu yi abu nani.>>
ROM 9:8 Ungwɔnɛ tso gbɛɛ, li engwɛ ama Abrahan mba abɔn li emi ongwɛ Imgbasho kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ ba, kpaa li engwɛ ama Abrahan mba mi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ma ngwu a kye ma wuuta gbɛɛ engwiba mgbi Abrahan aali.
ROM 9:9 Lubana li ela mgbi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ ma aani: <<Onova nkyɛ nɛ mi itɔ onɔ nɛ yɛyɛ n ka yidɔ, iSara ka byi ongwɛ abɔ.>>
ROM 9:10 Li nana ta ba, ongwefa mgbi iRebeka ntona a sulu otsɔma onyi, otsikyeyi Adziki.
ROM 9:11 Nghaduu, duuse ni a mba engwefa ntona, naadi nu ma wa kyɔ obube hona osuse yɔ, Imgbasho nya iRebeka gbɛɛ ongwan ongwu okwukwo na kale kyɔ ongwu ongbungbɛ idɔ. Imgbasho gbɔdzɛ nɛ ikye otso gbɛɛ ongwu dulu ongwi itukwu ongwu wa, ma yama li ikye unkoka ngwi a kyɔ ba,
ROM 9:12 li mi idɔ okyɔɔkyɔ ba, kpaa li mbi Imgbasho ongwu nkwu ela mani, a nyan gbɛɛ, <<Okwukwo na kale kyɔ ongwu ongbungbɛ idɔ.>>
ROM 9:13 Yɛyɛ dafi Afɛ lɔ mani gbɛɛ, <<iJeko kpɛn itukwu, kpaa Isol tɛn anyi.>>
ROM 9:14 Nghanɛ i ka gbɔn sinɛ tso? Imgbasho kyɔ ebɛbɛ? Ngha ba dududu!
ROM 9:15 Lubana o gbɔ nya iMose gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ngwu ani mina n ka dun elela, inggisɛ ngwu ani di mina n ka kyɔ elela won.>>
ROM 9:16 Nghanɛ, ungwɔ ndzɛ mbisɔ gbɛɛ ka dzɛ yɔ, li imina hona ofyaafya mgbi inggisɛ ba, kpaa li elela odiidi mgbi Imgbasho.
ROM 9:17 Li ngha ma ngwi Imgbasho gbɔ nya iFaro mi Afɛ gbɛɛ, <<Li mi itɔdzɛ nɛ yɛyɛ ngwi ani kyile abu desho, gbɛɛ nin tso mfye mgbɛn mboo, adzi ni a gbɔdzɛn kpatsɛ ɛsɛ duu.>>
ROM 9:18 Nghanɛ Imgbasho sulu elela odiidi mbi inggisɛ ngwu i kpan odin elela mani, o di li kye ali inggisɛ ngwu i kpan duu itukwu tiishu.
ROM 9:19 Inggisɛ oka mbi ema ka byi ani gbɛɛ: <<Nɛ kyɔnɛ ngwi Imgbasho di li nu eyi obube? Lubana li emɛ ka kyi ndɛlu owitukwu mgbi Imgbasho?>>
ROM 9:20 Ei, ka gbɔ ngha ba. Abu li emɛ, inggisɛ owamyɛ hini, ka tangwɛ yi Imgbasho? Ungwɔ ngwi a ta-ta ka yagba nya Ongwu ntan ma gbɛɛ, <<Kyɔnɛ abu ta ani dzɛ ngha gbɛɛ?>>
ROM 9:21 Ongye ombɛ ishe sulu ofɛ okye akwiibɛ onyi ma mbɛ ishe ama a ka kyungwɔ ingblimɔ di mbɛ angbeka ngwi a ka kyungwɔ imɔ mi ele ba gbɛ lo?
ROM 9:22 Kabana Imgbasho mina otso itingga yi mfye mgban mbi ali inggisɛ ngwu o mina odzilin duu, nghaduu o shitukwu yi ama.
ROM 9:23 Kaba o kyungwɔnɛ ikye otso okwɔkwɔ mgbi ongwu mi onɔ ngwi ongwu dzɛ yi elela odiidi mbi ama ongwu kyi mɛlu ma tokɛ gbɛɛ ni a tu okwɔkwɔ mgbi ongwu mani.
ROM 9:24 Eyi kpaa wodzɛ mbi ama ngwu o sadu mani, li emi iJuda ta ba, Udzengye kpaa.
ROM 9:25 Dafi Otsɛ gbɔ yɛyɛ mi afɛ mgbi iHosia mani gbɛɛ: <<A yama li <inggisɛ mgbɛn> ba kpaa n ka kwu ma gbɛɛ, <Emidɛn>; n ka tso okpitukwu mbi inggisɛ ama ngwu a tso okpitukwu yi ama ye ba mani.
ROM 9:26 O diyɛ gbɛɛ, <<Imbe ngwi a plɛ nya ma gbɛɛ, <Ema li emidani ba na,> li mi ele yɛyɛ ngwi a dika kwu ma gbɛɛ, <Emi ongwɛ Imgbasho oshishe.> >>
ROM 9:27 Ongye ogbɛɛsɛ Adzaya gbobakwɔ ikye emi Israi gbɛɛ: <<Dafi mmbwo mgbi emi Israi dzɛ dafi mfyan mi onekyoo nɛ kpaa, li gwee ni ta ka watɔ.
ROM 9:28 Lubana Otsɛ ka kwo ɛsɛ adɔ plɛ, ma dika li dafi o gbɔgbɛɛ ongwu ka kyɔ ma yɛyɛ.>>
ROM 9:29 Dzɛ yɛyɛ dafi Adzaya tsekise gbɔ mani gbɛɛ: <<Ni Otsɛ Ongha yi mfye ki dzata etɔ mgbi eyi angbeka oshishe bayɔ, eyi kika dzili dafi iSodon yi iGomora mani.>>
ROM 9:30 Ni i gbɔn sinɛ tsatso? Udzengye ama ngbli mi odzɛ osaan ba kpaa, tun mi oyɛyɛ onuunu.
ROM 9:31 Kpaa emi Israi ama ngbli gbɛɛ ama ki dzɛ osaan yi Imgbasho ma kpaa tun ba.
ROM 9:32 Kyɔnɛ ngwi a tu ba? Ikyekyɛ a pita li mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ba, kpaa a pita dafi li mi idɔ mgbi ama okyɔɔkyɔ mani. Ali nɛ yɛɛ iKrestu ngwi inggisɛ le tsiishi mi ele.
ROM 9:33 Dafi a lɔ mani gbɛɛ, <<Dika, n kye iKrestu la emi iDzayɔn nu ma le tsiishi bɛyi ikwutsɛ nnu ma le gbɛsɛ mani, nghaduu inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ yɔ, ka gyayiwi ba.>>
ROM 10:1 Emi ongwunani, oweka yi ibɔ mgbi ani mbi Imgbasho ikye emi Israi yɔ, li ogbɛɛ a ki watɔ.
ROM 10:2 Lubana n ka kyɔ obwɛndɛ ikye ma gbɛɛ Imgbasho gbɛ ma itukwu sɔ, kpaa a difwi ofɛ ngwi a ka kyɛdɔ Imgbasho ba.
ROM 10:3 Dafi a yama ye osaan nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho na ba le di gbɛɛ ama ki kyɔ osaan mgbi ikyibɔ ma nɛ, a gbela nu osaan mgbi Imgbasho kye ma teyi ba.
ROM 10:4 Lubana iKrestu ngyɛlu yi ola, ikye ni ama nnun oyɛyɛ duu, yɛɛ saan yi Imgbasho.
ROM 10:5 IMose nu osa mi osaan ngwi a li tu mi ola mani o gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ nkyungwɔ ama ola gbɔ yɔ, ka dzɛ oshishe.>>
ROM 10:6 Nghaduu osaan ndzɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ma gbɛɛ, <<Ka yama gbɔ mi itukwu mgbi abu gbɛɛ, <Li emɛ ka kɛ esho?> >> (ka kye iKrestu ba esɛ)
ROM 10:7 <<naadi, <Li emɛ ka lu esɛ kpini?> >> (gbɛɛ no kyile iKrestu mbi emi ikwukwɔ).
ROM 10:8 Imbe odzɛ nɛ kyinɛbyi ma li ongwu aani: <<Esɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ kwɛkwɛ yi abu, dzɛ ikpondu mgbi abu bɛyi itukwu mgbɔɔ,>> ali ma, li esɔ mgbi oyɛyɛ onuunu ngwi eyi le gbɔ nɛni.
ROM 10:9 Kini abu gbɔ mi ondu mgbi abu gbɛɛ, <<IYesu li Otsɛ,>> di noyɛyɛ mi itukwu mgbi abu gbɛɛ Imgbasho kyilen mbi emi ikwukwɔ yɔ, o ka watɔ.
ROM 10:10 Lubana li mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ema mi itukwu ngwi ema gye emyɛmyɛ, di li obwɛndɛ ngwi ema kyɔ mi ondu mgbi ema ma, ngwi a dulu ema watɔ aali.
ROM 10:11 Dafi Afɛ gbɔ mani gbɛɛ, <<Ali inggisɛ nnun oyɛyɛ duu, ka gyayiwi ba.>>
ROM 10:12 Lubana idzidza dzɛ mbi emi iJuda yi Udzengye ba, Otsɛ onyi ma li mgbi ama duu di li kye mse bɛ ama nkwu mi iyi mgban duu ewo kpakpa,
ROM 10:13 ikyesinɛ, <<Ali inggisɛ nkwu mi iyi mgbi Otsɛ duu ka watɔ.>>
ROM 10:14 Nghanɛ, ka kyɔnɛ, ngwi a ka kwu mi iyi mgbi ongwu a nun oyɛyɛ ba? Dika kyɔnɛ ngwi a ka noyɛyɛ mbi ongwu a fwo odzan ba? A dika kyɔsinɛse fwo ni inggisɛ gbɔ nya ma ba?
ROM 10:15 Ni a dɔ ma esɔ ba ma a ka kyɔnɛse gbɔ? Dafi Afɛ gbɔ mani gbɛɛ, <<Ama nle wa gbɔ Esɔ Osuse ma obaaba mgbi ama sunse saan!>>
ROM 10:16 Kpaa li emi Israi duu gbela Esɔ Osuse nɛ ba. Lubana Adzaya gbɛɛ, <<Otsɛ, li emɛ nu esɔ mgbi eyi oyɛyɛ?>>
ROM 10:17 Ongwikpa yɔ, oyɛyɛ onuunu kyɛ mi ofwoofwo, ofwo esɔ ogbɔɔgbɔ mgbi elodzɛ iKrestu.
ROM 10:18 Nghaduu n le byita gbɛɛ, a yama fwo ba naadi? Mi otsitsi yɔ a fwo, <<Ela mgbi ama gbɔfwɛ kaka ɛsɛ duu, elodzɛ mgbi ama kpatsɛ imbe ɛsɛ dondu duu.>>
ROM 10:19 N dile byita gbɛɛ, Israi yama tu osa ba naadi? Ababɔ yɔ, iMose gbɛɛ, <<N ka nu ema di ɛsɛ nli unkonyi ba ma kyofu; n ka nu ɛsɛ ndifwi unkonyi ba ma kyɔ ema itingga.>>
ROM 10:20 Adzaya di gbɔ yi imio ba gbɛɛ, <<Inggisɛ ama npita ani ba ma li ama di di ani aali; N kye ewen tso mbi ama nle byita ani kpaa ba mani.>>
ROM 10:21 Nghaduu mi odzɛ mgbi Israi yɔ Imgbasho gbɛɛ, <<I kye egbe olɔlɔ ngwi ani na abɔ kɛ mbi ama onghaadɔ bɛyi ama nfwa onoyɛyɛ ntonani.>>
ROM 11:1 Nghanɛ n le byita gbɛɛ, Imgbasho fwa emidan naadi? Onoka ba du! Ani li inggisɛ Israi abuen, ongwiba mgbi Abrahan, mi agwɔ mgbi iBenjamin nani.
ROM 11:2 Imgbasho yama fwa emidan ama o teyi ye ma na ba. Ema ye odzɛ ngwi Afɛ gbɔ ikye Elaija dafi o fyewo yi Imgbasho ikye emi Israi ma lo:
ROM 11:3 <<Otsɛ, a kyi ngwɔlu ama ogbɛɛsɛ mgbi abu di kyi gbobulu abu iwashi ntonani; li ani onyi ta sisi, a dile fya ongwɔ ani>>?
ROM 11:4 Ma Imgbasho nose nun uka sinɛ? <<Ani nu inggisɛ idubu egyafa sisi ama nfwa okwakwafɔ nu iBaa.>>
ROM 11:5 Onɛnɛ kpaa inggisɛ sisi to ma ama Imgbasho sadu ma mi elela.
ROM 11:6 Ki li mi elela yɔ, yama li idɔ okyɔɔkyɔ wuba. Ni li otsitsi yɔ, elela ka li elela wuba.
ROM 11:7 Ungwɔnɛ tso gbɛɛ osaan ngwi emi Israi le gbili mi itukwu mgbi ama onyi ma kpaa a tu ba, li ama a sadu ma gwee ma ta tu. Kpaa ama nsisi duu gbadikye,
ROM 11:8 dafi Afɛ lɔ mani gbɛɛ, <<Imgbasho nu ma itukwu yɛɛ mbuumbu, a sulu inɛ kpaa a li di ba, a sulu adɔ kpaa a li fwo ba, nghataa ba inɛ.>>
ROM 11:9 IDevedi di gbɛɛ, <<Ni oga mgbi ama yɛɛ mmbwalii yi ukya, nka nu ma esɛ ogboogbo ngwi li adɔ okwookwo ngyɔ yi ama mani.
ROM 11:10 Inɛ no bulu lo ma mi ikye zukwu nu ma ka yagba di ba, ni ekpo fulu loma mi isɔ gyegwu.>>
ROM 11:11 N diyɛ byita gbɛɛ, emi Israi tsiishi gbɛsɛ lamyɛ okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ? Onoka ba dududu! Ola ofaafa mgbi ama nu owatɔ-watɔ ba mbi Udzengye adzi ni Israi di kyofu.
ROM 11:12 Kpaa kini adɔ onghaangha mgbi ama yɛɛ mse mbi ɛsɛ, esɛ ogboogbo mgbi ama di yɛɛ mse mbi Udzengye, emi iJuda duu wa gbelan ma, itɔ aludu ngwi inggisɛ mi ɛsɛ duu ka tu ma ka shewo sinɛ!
ROM 11:13 N le gbɔdzɛ yi ema Udzengye. Dafi ani li ongye ogbikye iYesu mbi ema Udzengye nɛ, n ka dzɛ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ mi idɔ mgbɛn
ROM 11:14 yi ɛwɛ ogbebyi gbɛɛ kaba n ka kyile emidɛn itukwu esho nu ma kyofu, emi iJuda nu ma watɔ.
ROM 11:15 Lubana kini ofwaafwa ngwi emi Israi fwa Imgbasho nɛ yile ɛsɛ duu gyiide yi Imgbasho ma, ogbela-gbela mgbi ama ka li ɛkyɛ tsatso? Ka dzɛ dafi okyile emi ikwukwɔ luba oshishe.
