1JO 3:20 Alonɔ ngwi itukwu mgbi eyi nu eyi obube yɔ, Imgbasho shewo ngha itukwu mgbi eyi, o di ye alungwɔ duu.
1JO 3:21 Emi okani itukwu-tukwu, ni itukwu mgbi eyi nu eyi obube bayɔ, eyi dzɛ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ mi inai Imgbasho
1JO 3:22 di tu alungwɔ ngwi eyi bɔn duu, ikyesinɛ eyi ngyo ola mgban di kyɔ oweka mgban.
1JO 3:23 Nɛnɛ di li ola mgban aani: ni eyi noyɛyɛ mi iyi mgbi Ongwan, nli iYesu iKrestu nani. Ni eyi diyɛ di eka kpa eka itukwu dafi o wo eyi ola mani.
1JO 3:24 Ama nngyo ola mgban ma dzɛ mbon, ongwu kpaa di dzɛ mboma. Di li itɔ ofɛ ngwi eyi ye gbɛɛ o dzɛ mbi eyi aani: Eyi li ye mi mfye mgbi Onodzi ngwi o kyi nu eyi nani.
1JO 4:1 Emi okani osuse, ka nu ali inggisɛ ngbɛɛ ongwu dzɛ yi Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho oyɛyɛ ba, kpaa mbadi onodzi mani odi kaba kyɛ mbi Imgbasho, ikyekyɛ oyegbɔ ama omwonya kwuba tasɛ tole ga mi ɛsɛ wa.
1JO 4:2 Li ofɛ ngwi ema ka difwi Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho aani: Ali inggisɛ ngbela gbɛɛ iYesu iKrestu ba mi mmbwɛ yi eyi yɔ, kyɛ mbi Imgbasho.
1JO 4:3 Kpaa ali inggisɛ ngbela iYesu ba wa, dzɛ yi onodzi nkyɛ mbi Imgbasho ba. Nɛnɛ li onodzi mgbi Ongyikyili mgbi iKrestu, ngwu ema fwo gbɛɛ kyɛma mani, onɛnɛ kpaa o ba dzɛ ɛsɛ wa.
1JO 4:4 Ema, emi ongwani, ema kyɛ mbi Imgbasho di ngha onodzi atsika ntona wa, ikyesinɛ Onodzi ndzɛ mbi ema ma shewo ngha onodzi ndzɛ mbi ɛsɛ nani.
1JO 4:5 Oyegbɔ atsika ntona li mgbi ɛsɛ nɛni, ikyenghanɛ, a li gbɔdzɛ ongwi ɛsɛ nɛni, inggisɛ emi ɛsɛ di li fwo ma.
1JO 4:6 Nghaduu eyi li mgbi Imgbasho, ma ali inggisɛ n ye Imgbasho ta li fwo eyi; kpaa inggisɛ ta nli mgbi Imgbasho bayɔ li fwo eyi ba. Li itɔ ofɛ ngwi eyi li difwi Onodzi mgbi otsitsi bɛyi onodzi mgbi atsika joali.
1JO 4:7 Emi okani osuse, ba ni eyi di eka kpa eka itukwu na, lubana okpitukwu kyɛ mbi Imgbasho kyɛ. Ali inggisɛ ndi ongwunɔn kpan itukwu li ongwɛ Imgbasho di ye Imgbasho.
1JO 4:8 Inggisɛ ta ndi ongwunɔn kpan itukwu bayɔ, ye Imgbasho ba, ikyekyɛ Imgbasho li okpitukwu.
1JO 4:9 Nɛnɛ li ofɛ ngwi Imgbasho tso okpitukwu mgban mbi eyi aani: O dɔ Ongwan onyi kpokpo esɔ ba ɛsɛ ikyegbɛɛ ni eyi dzɛ oshishe ikpewon.
1JO 4:10 Li okpitukwu aani: li ikyegbɛɛ eyi teyi di Imgbasho kpa eyi itukwu ba, kpaa li ikyegbɛɛ ongwu di eyi kpan itukwu di dɔ Ongwan esɔ ikye owa kye ewon fifɛ ikye ali ibwubwe mgbi eyi.
1JO 4:11 Emi okani, dafi Imgbasho di eyi kpan itukwu kpakpa nghanɛ, i wogyɔ ngwi eyi kpaa ka di eka kpa eka itukwu.
1JO 4:12 Inggisɛ onyi kpaa di Imgbasho ye ba; kpaa ni eyi di eka kpa eka itukwu yɔ, Imgbasho wodzɛ mbi eyi, okpitukwu mgban di tsotɔ saan mbi eyi.
1JO 4:13 Eyi ye gbɛɛ eyi wodzɛ mbon ongwu kpaa wodzɛ mbi eyi, ikyekyɛ o teyi kye Onodzi mgban nu eyi.
1JO 4:14 Ma eyi teyi di diyɛ kyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ Otsɔngwɛ dɔ Ongwan esɔ no li Onagbɛ mgbi ɛsɛ.
1JO 4:15 Ali inggisɛ nkyɔ obwɛndɛ gbɛɛ iYesu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho tawa, Imgbasho wodzɛ mbon ongwu kpaa wodzɛ mbi Imgbasho.
1JO 4:16 Nghanɛ, onɛnɛ eyi ye di noyɛyɛ mi okpitukwu ngwi Imgbasho dzɛyan mi ikye eyi nɛni. Imgbasho li okpitukwu. Ali inggisɛ ndzɛ mi okpitukwu dzɛ mbi Imgbasho, Imgbasho kpaa dzɛ mbon.
1JO 4:17 Mi itɔ ofɛ nɛ, a nu okpitukwu tsotɔ saan mbi eyi ikyegbɛɛ ni eyi wa dzɛ yi abɔ otsigɛgɛ mi egbe ikwɔ, ikyesinɛ mi ɛsɛ nɛ eyi dzɛ dafi iKrestu mani.
1JO 4:18 Imio dzɛ mi okpitukwu ba. Nghanɛ okpitukwu nle saan li lɔ imio onya tasɛ, ikyekyɛ imio li dzɛ ikye adɔ okwookwo. Inggisɛ nli mio yɔ, okpitukwu mgban tsotɔ saan ba.
1JO 4:19 Eyi li tso eka okpitukwu, ikyekyɛ o tsekise di eyi kpan itukwu.
1JO 4:20 Ni inggisɛ gbɛɛ, <<Imgbasho kpa ani itukwu,>> kpaa di ongwunɔ tanyi yɔ, o li inggisɛ omwonya. Lubana ali inggisɛ ndi ongwunɔn ngwu o li din kpan itukwu bayɔ, o ka yagba di Imgbasho, ngwu o din ye ba na kpan itukwu gbɛ ba.
1JO 4:21 Ma o di wo eyi ola nɛni gbɛɛ: Ali inggisɛ ndi Imgbasho kpan itukwu yɔ, o ka di ongwunɔn kpaa kpan itukwu kyɛmɛ.
1JO 5:1 Ali inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ gbɛɛ iYesu li iKrestu ma yɔ, li ongwɛ Imgbasho, ma ali inggisɛ ndi otsɔngwɛ kpan itukwu yɔ, o li di ongwɛ kpaa kpan itukwu.
1JO 5:2 Nɛnɛ li ofɛ ngwi eyi li ye gbɛɛ eyi di emi ongwɛ Imgbasho kpa eyi itukwu aani: mi odi Imgbasho kpa eyi itukwu di ngyo ola mgban.
1JO 5:3 Eyi li tso okpitukwu mgbi eyi mbi Imgbasho mi ongyo ola mgban. Ma ola mgban se eyi undo ba,
1JO 5:4 lubana ali ongwɛ Imgbasho duu ngha ɛsɛ. Ma eyi ngha ɛsɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi eyi.
1JO 5:5 Li emɛ ka ngha ɛsɛ gbɛ? Li inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ gbɛɛ iYesu li Ongwɛ Imgbasho mani.
1JO 5:6 Nɛnɛ li iYesu iKrestu ma aani, ongwu a mban dafi inggisɛ owamyɛ mi eni yi eyi mani. Li mi eni kyoon ngwi a mban ba, kpaa li mi eni bɛyi eyi. Ma li Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi odzɛ nɛni, ikyekyɛ Onodzi na li gbatsika ba.
1JO 5:7 Lubana ama eta duu kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi otsitsi odzɛ nɛni.
1JO 5:8 Onodzi, eni, bɛyi eyi; ama eta duu di kyɔ obwɛndɛ ungwonyi.
1JO 5:9 Eyi noyɛyɛ mi obwɛndɛ mgbi inggisɛ, kpaa obwɛndɛ mgbi Imgbasho shewo ngha, ikyekyɛ li obwɛndɛ mgbi Imgbasho abuon, ngwi o nu mi ikye Ongwan.
1JO 5:10 Ali inggisɛ nnoyɛyɛ mbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho tayɔ, dzɛ yi obwɛndɛ nɛ mi itukwu mbon. Nghaduu ali inggisɛ nnu Imgbasho oyɛyɛ bayɔ, kwu Imgbasho onya, ikyekyɛ o noyɛyɛ mi obwɛndɛ ngwi Imgbasho nu mi ikye Ongwan nɛ ba.
1JO 5:11 Di li obwɛndɛ ma aani: Imgbasho kye oshishe igyegwu nu eyi, ma oshishe nɛ li mbi Ongwan.
1JO 5:12 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi Ongwɛ Imgbasho dzɛ yi oshishe; kpaa ongwu ndzɛ yi Ongwɛ na ba dzɛ yi oshishe ba.
1JO 5:13 Ani lɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ kɛ mbi ema ama nnoyɛyɛ mi iyi mgbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho ma adzi ni ema ye gbɛɛ ema dzɛ yi oshishe ogyegwu mani.
1JO 5:14 Nɛnɛ li abɔ otsigɛgɛ ngwi eyi dzɛyan mi oba kwɛkwɛ yi Imgbasho aani: gbɛɛ alungwɔ ngwi eyi bɔ mi oweka mgban tawa, o ka fwo eyi.
1JO 5:15 Ma ni eyi ye gbɛɛ o li fwo eyi yɔ, alungwɔ ngwi eyi bɔ duu, eyi noyɛyɛ ta gbɛɛ eyi tu wa.
1JO 5:16 Kini inggisɛ di ongwunɔn kyɔ alobube nkyon kɛ ikwongye bayɔ, no bibɔ ikyon adzi ni Imgbasho nun oshishe. N gbɔ ikye ama ngwu alobube mgbi ama lu nghataa kɛ ikwongye na ba. Alobube dzɛma nli kye inggisɛ kɛ ikwongye. N le gbɛɛ no bibɔ mi ikye ongwu na ba.
1JO 5:17 Ali imbaali duu li alobube, ma alobube toma nli kye inggisɛ kɛ ikwongye ba gbɛ.
1JO 5:18 Eyi ye ta gbɛɛ inggisɛ nli ongwɛ Imgbasho yɔ, li kyɔ alobube alonɔ-alonɔ ba; ikyekyɛ Ongwɛ Imgbasho na li ngyon, Ongyikyili na ka yagba kyɔn unka gbɛ ba.
1JO 5:19 Eyi ye gbɛɛ ngwi Ongyikyili na kye ɛsɛ nɛ duu le teyi nɛ kpaa, eyi li emi ongwɛ Imgbasho.
1JO 5:20 Nghanɛ, eyi di ye gbɛɛ Ongwɛ Imgbasho ba wa nu eyi odifwi-difwi, adzi ni eyi ye ongwu nli otsitsi nani. Ma eyi di wodzɛ mbi Ongwan, iYesu iKrestu nli otsitsi nani. O li Imgbasho otsitsi bɛyi oshishe ogyegwu.
1JO 5:21 Nghanɛ, emi ongwani, dulu abɔ mi angwula na.
2JO 1:1 Afɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi ongyukwo okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu, le kɛ mbi ongyaa ngwu a sadu bɛyi ɛngbɛ mgban, nkpa ani itukwu mi otsitsi, ma li ani yuwen ba, kpaa ama n ye otsitsi duu,
2JO 1:2 ikye otsitsi nwodzɛ mbi eyi nani, dika dzɛ mbi eyi gyegwu.
2JO 1:3 Mse yi elela bɛyi iyu nkyɛ mbi Otseyi Imgbasho bɛyi iYesu iKrestu; Ongwɛ Otseyi na, no dzɛ yi eyi mi otsitsi bɛyi okpitukwu.
2JO 1:4 I nu ani atsa kwuba oye gbɛɛ emi ongwabu angbeka le kyikyɛ mi otsitsi, dafi Otseyi wo eyi ola ma yɛyɛ.
2JO 1:5 Ikyenghanɛ, ongyaa, ani le lɔ abu ola ofufɛ ba kpaa li ongwi eyi teyi dzɛyan mi owita-wita nani. Ani gbɛɛ ni eyi di eka kpa eka itukwu.
2JO 1:6 Ma nɛnɛ li okpitukwu aani: gbɛɛ ni eyi ngyo ola mgban. Dafi ema fwo mi owita-wita mani, ola mgban li ogbɛɛ ni eyi kiyayi mi okpitukwu.
2JO 1:7 Ama okpagyewo gwuba, ngbela gbɛɛ iYesu iKrestu ba mi mmbwɛ yi eyi ba, gbeka ganya to ɛsɛ. Itɔ inggisɛ ntona li ama okpagyewo di li engyikyili mgbi iKrestu.
2JO 1:8 Gbɛwɛbyi adzi ni ungwɔ ngwi ema kyidɔ ikyon na ka nyanya ba, kpaa ni ema wa gbɛ umba mgbi ema kyɛɛ.
2JO 1:9 Ali inggisɛ ntila dzɛ mi otsootso mgbi iKrestu bayɔ, dzɛ yi Imgbasho ba; ali inggisɛ nkiyayi mi otsootso mgbi iKrestu yɔ, dzɛ yi Otseyi Imgbasho bɛyi Ongwan.
2JO 1:10 Kini inggisɛ ba mbi ema kpaa gbela yi otsootso nɛ ba, ka gban mi udɛ ema hona kyɔn onɔ ba.
2JO 1:11 Ali inggisɛ ngban wo ewo yɔ, le kyidɔ imbaali yan.
2JO 1:12 Ani dzɛ yi odzɛ olɔ kɛ mbi ema kwuba, nghaduu i mina ani olɔ mi afɛ bɛyi enuntu ba. Nghaduu, i wo ani okɛ mbi ema ka gbɔdzɛ yi ema inɛ-inɛ, adzi ni atsa mgbi eyi mbwumbwo.
2JO 1:13 Emi ongwɛ ongwunabu ongwu ongyaa ama a sadu-sadu ma ntona dɛsɔ angba mbi abu.
3JO 1:1 Afɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi ongyukwo okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu, le kɛ mbi okani iGayɔsu, nkpa ani itukwu mi otsitsi-otsitsi nani.
3JO 1:2 Okani okpa ani itukwu, ani bibɔ gbɛɛ unkonyi no ka wulu abu ba, alungwɔ duu no kɛ saan yi abu, dafi oshishe mgbi abu mi iKrestu kpaa le kɛ saan nɛni.
3JO 1:3 I nu ani atsa kpakpa onɔ emi ongwuneyi mi iKrestu angbeka yɛ wa kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi oyɛyɛ mgbi abu onuunu, dafi abu kale kiyayi okyikyɛ mi otsitsi nɛni.
3JO 1:4 Mi onɔ ngwi ani fwo gbɛɛ emi ongwani kale kyikyɛ mi otsitsi ma, li kpani ngha alungwɔ duu.
3JO 1:5 Okani okpa ani itukwu, dafi emi ongwunabu emi iKrestu ntonɛ li ingyoga mgbi abu nɛ kpaa, ungwɔ ama abu le kyɔ yi ama ntonɛ abu le kyɔ mi otsitsi.
3JO 1:6 A gbɔdzɛ okpitukwu mgbi abu nya okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mmɛnɛni. Tsuutsu ya ma abɔ nu ma kiyayi yi agaba mgbi ama mi itɔ ofɛ nka kpa Imgbasho mani.
3JO 1:7 Li mi ikye Iyi mgbi iKrestu ngwi a tasɛ, ngwi a mina oyabɔ onyi mbi emi ɛsɛ ba, se li ama osunu Imgbasho ntona aali.
3JO 1:8 Wanɛ, i dzɛ mbisɔ ngwi eyi ka tobyi itɔ inggisɛ ntonɛni, zukwu ni eyi kyidɔ yi eka mi ikye otsitsi.
3JO 1:9 Ani lɔ afɛ nɛ mbi emi okwakye mgbi iKrestu, nghaduu iDiotrɛfɛ nli mina oli ongyukwo mgbi ama na, fwa okye wuuta.
3JO 1:10 Ni ani ba yɔ, n ka nya ma ungwɔ ngwi o le kyɔ, idzɛ ngwi o le dzɛ kwu iyi eyi timbi-timbi nani. Nana ta ba, o fwa ogbɛ emi iKrestu ama nli ingyoga ntonani. O di kwɔ ama ngwu mina ogbɛ ma kpa, di lɔ ama nmina ogbɛ ma ma tasɛ mi okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu.
3JO 1:11 Okani osuse, ka gbama ungwɔ ibwubwe ba kpaa gbama ungwɔ osuse. Ali inggisɛ nkyungwɔ osuse yɔ li mgbi Imgbasho. Ali inggisɛ nkyungwɔ obube yɔ teyi ye Imgbasho waba.
3JO 1:12 Ali inggisɛ duu gbɔdzɛ osuse mi ikpewo iDɛmɛtru; otsitsi kpaa tso ngha. Eyi kpaa gbɔdzɛ osuse mi ikpewon, ema di ye dafi obwɛndɛ mgbi eyi li otsitsi mani.
3JO 1:13 Ani dzɛ yi ungwɔ kwuba olɔ kɛ mbi abu, nghaduu, i mina ani okyɔ ngha mi igbɔ yi enuntu ba.
3JO 1:14 N weka odi abu dzikan-dzikan ta eyi ka gbɔdzɛ inɛ-inɛ.
3JO 1:15 Ni iyu dzɛ yi abu. Emi okeyi mmɛnɛ le ta abu angba. Ta emi okeyi ama nto mmana duu angba onyonyi.
JUD 1:1 Afɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi ani iJudu, ongbidɔ mgbi iYesu iKrestu di li ongwunɔ iJɛnsi, le kɛ mbi ama ngwu Otseyi Imgbasho kwu ma ela, a kpan itukwu ngwu iYesu iKrestu kye abɔ ge ma ntonani.
JUD 1:2 Imgbasho no nu ema elela yi iyu bɛyi okpitukwu dzii.
JUD 1:3 Emi okani osuse, dafi i dzɛ ani nghina-nghina olɔ ema afɛ ikye owatɔ-watɔ mgbi eyi nɛ kpaa, n di gbɛɛ i yɛɛ kyɛmɛ-kyɛmɛ nin nlɔ wo ema ola gbɛɛ ni ema kwumewo mi oyɛyɛ onuunu ngwi a kye wo emi osaan abɔ akponyi ta gyegwu nani.
JUD 1:4 Lubana ani lɔ ungwɔnɛ ikyegbɛɛ inggisɛ angbeka tasɛ wa kaka okwakye mgbi emi iKrestu mi idzidzɛ ema le gbɛɛ, elela mgbi Imgbasho okwulewo na le nu eyi ofɛ okyɔ amah ibwubwe. Odzili-dzili mgbi itɔ inggisɛ ntona a teyi lɔ dzɛ esɛ gbegbe wa, ikyekyɛ a tangwɛ Otsɛ iYesu iKrestu Ugabaidu mgbi eyi nani.
JUD 1:5 Dafi ema teyi ye ungwɔnɛ duu nɛ kpaa, i minɛn oyɛ wɛ ema gbɛɛ, Otsɛ Imgbasho dulu emidan tɔ mi ɛsɛ Igyibiti, nghaduu o wa yɛ dzili ama nnun oyɛyɛ ba mani.
JUD 1:6 Mi ofɛ oka yɔ, Engyesɔ ama ndzata imbe yi udɛ mgbi ama na, o gbe ma tokɛ iyifu, ta ma itse yi ashi nka dzɛ ba, le fɛ egbe ikwɔ okwulewo mgbi Imgbasho nani.
JUD 1:7 Mi itɔ ofɛ na kpɔɔ, iSodon yi iGomora bɛyi ogalu ama nkpakɛkɛ woma duu kye ewoma nu mi amah bɛyi ali idza duu. A yɛɛ ambɛ mbi ama nkawa gyadzɛ mi ola gyegwu mani.
JUD 1:8 Mi itɔ ofɛ na yɛyɛ, ama nkye gbɛɛ ama gbɛ inɛ odiidi ntona kye ewoma wokɛ idza, a di fwa ofwo ama ogbe ma teyi di fya engyesɔ ito.
JUD 1:9 Nghaduu angbodzi ongyesɔ iMaikye onɔ ngwi o le natsondu mi ikwɔ mgbi iMose yi Olodu ma jokpaa, o kyɔ odzasha fyan ito ba, kpaa o gbɛɛ, <<Ni Otsɛ kyɔkyɔ yi abu!>>
JUD 1:10 Nghaduu inggisɛ ntonɛ li fyito mi ungwɔ ama ngbosa lo ma ba bɛyi ama ngbosa lo ma kpaa mi odiidi mgbi ama, a li tsɛwodzɛ dafi mmbwaba mani, ma di li ungwɔ ntonɛ yɛyɛ li dzili ma kpaa aali.
JUD 1:11 Ahoo mi ikye ma! A kyɛdɔ ofɛ mgbi iKain; a wɛndɛ dafi iBalan mani, ikyena a gbe itukwu mgbi ama duu fakɛ odzɛ awuya; a ka dzili ma mi afɔ okye twɛsɛ yi Imgbasho dafi iKora nani.
JUD 1:12 Inggisɛ ntonɛ li inggisɛ imbaali, a dzɛ yi ayiwi ba, di zofu kpakpa, a le kyi mbelu ema okwakye mi onɔ ngwi ema le gye ungwogye owɛ okpitukwu mgbi iKrestu mani. A dzɛ dafi akpumbwo nli gbe kpa, li kya ba nani. A to dafi ekwɔ ama nli wa owawaba mi onɔ oshɛ etɔ mani. Ni a kye kwɔlu man a li kwulu.
JUD 1:13 A dzɛ dafi akpeni ongwi onikyekyoo mani, ayiwi mgbi ama li tsotɔ dafi uvu; a dzɛ dafi mcɛ ama nle ga kyɛ ngwi Imgbasho kye imbe nghao yifu duu dzɛ ma gyegwu mani.
JUD 1:14 Enɔku, nli ongwiba mgbi Adan ongwu gyafa na teyi yegbɔ mi ikye inggisɛ ntonɛ gbɛɛ: <<Dii, Otsɛ kyɛma ka ba yi engyesɔ mgban ama osaan idubu-idubu
JUD 1:15 owa gbɔ ali inggisɛ duu ikwɔ, di wa ngwɔ ama n ye Imgbasho ba ikwɔ mi alobube mgbi ama okyɔɔkyɔ duu, mi ofɛ ayin ba bɛyi elodzɛ otimbi-timbi ngwi a gbɔ kwu iyi Imgbasho mani.>>
JUD 1:16 A li ama okwondukwɔ di pita imbe okye abɔ byi; a li kyɛdɔ imina ibwubwe mgbi ama nani; a li tsaabɔ igɛgɛ ikye ewoma di fyumfya ondu yi angbeka ikye ni ama tu ungwɔ nmina ma mani.
JUD 1:17 Nghaduu, emi okani osuse, wɛ ungwɔ ngwi ama ogbikye Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu, teyi gbɔ nani.
JUD 1:18 A gbɔ nya ema gbɛɛ, <<Mi egbe ongwi olɛlɛ ma, ama okye ondu wo inggisɛ ewo kawa tɔ le kyɛdɔ ofɛ imina mgbi ama obube nli mgbi Imgbasho ba mani.>>
JUD 1:19 Inggisɛ ntonɛ li gha ema, a li kyɛdɔ ayayi imina mgbi ewoma di sulu Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho ba.
JUD 1:20 Nghaduu ema, emi okani ingblimɔ, kwunewo kiyayi mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ema mbi Imgbasho, dile bibɔ mi mfye mgbi Onodzi Osaan na.
JUD 1:21 Kye ewema dzɛ mi okpitukwu mgbi Imgbasho dafi ema le fɛ elela odiidi mgbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu ikye okye ema kaka oshishe ogyegwu nɛni.
JUD 1:22 Tobyi ama ngwu oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi ama le ngwiingwi mani;
JUD 1:23 lafwa angbeka tɔ mi ola di dulu ma watɔ; angbeka yɔ di ma elela ikye imio mi oshishe mgbi abu, nghaduu kyili angwuto mgbi ama n yɛɛ kplɛkplɛ yi ali ibwubwe mgbi ama nani.
JUD 1:24 Nghanɛ i kye angba otaata nu Imgbasho, nka nu ema esɛ ogboogbo ba, ndika kye ema tso mi inai okwɔkwɔ mgban yi obube onyi ba bɛyi atsa oshewo nani.
JUD 1:25 Mbi Imgbasho Onagbɛ eyi na yuon, okwɔkwɔ yi onghaangha yi mfye bɛyi ɛnɛpɛ no dzɛ nyɛ mbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi iYesu iKrestu, dafi i teyi dzɛ mani, onɛnɛ nghataa gyegwu! No dzɛ ngha.
REV 1:1 Iba mgbi iYesu iKrestu, ongwi Imgbasho kye nun ikye okye tso ɛngbɛ mgban ungwɔ ama nka kye onɔ bata kawa kyɔ mani. O non tsotɔ mi odɔ ongyesɔ mgban esɔ mbi ongbidɔ mgban iJɔn,
REV 1:2 ngwu nkyɔ obwɛndɛ mi alungwɔ ngwi ongwu di ngwi li, elodzɛ mgbi Imgbasho yi obwɛndɛ mgbi iYesu iKrestu.
REV 1:3 Mse ka bɛ inggisɛ ngwu ngbɔ elodzɛ mgbi oyegbɔ nɛ ewo, mse dika bɛ ama nfwo di noyɛyɛ mi ungwɔ ngwi a lɔ to ele nɛ ewo, ikyekyɛ onɔ ma dzɛ kwɛkwɛ wa.
REV 1:4 Afɛ nɛ kyɛ mbi iJɔn kɛ mbi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nghi egyafa mi ɛsɛ Asia gbɛɛ: elela bɛyi iyu nkyɛ mbi ongwu ndzɛ onɛnɛ, ongwu nteyi dzɛ, dika wa dzɛ na, yi mbi onodzi egyafa ama nkwudzɛ iyayi itsuutɔ mgban na nu ma dzɛ yi ema,
REV 1:5 bɛyi mbi iYesu iKrestu ongwu nli obwɛndɛ otsitsi, ongwovlɛ mbi emi ikwukwɔ, bɛyi ongye oteyi mgbi emi utɔ mi ɛsɛ. Mbi ongwu ndi eyi kpan itukwu di dulu eyi tɔ mi ali ibwubwe mgbi eyi mi eyi mgban,
REV 1:6 di nu eyi yɛɛ esutɔ onyi bɛyi ama ofifɛ ikye okyɔ Imgbasho bɛyi otsongwu idɔ mani, okwɔkwɔ yi mfye no dzɛ mbon nghataa gyegwu! No dzɛ ngha.
REV 1:7 Dii o ka yɛkyɛ mi akpa mi esho, ma ali inɛ duu ka dun, yi ama nton okpa ma kpaa; man inggisɛ mi ɛsɛ duu ka tsukwu ikyon. Li ngha nka dzɛ aali! No dzɛ ngha.
REV 1:8 Otsɛ Imgbasho gbɔgbɛɛ, <<Ani li owita-wita bɛyi ongyɛɛngyɛ, Ongwu ndzɛ onɛnɛ, yi ongwu nteyi dzɛ, yi ongwu ndika wa ba, ongwu nghaangha duu mani!>>
REV 1:9 Ani, iJɔn, ongwunema yi ibuge mgbi ema mi adzɛ ogyeegye yi esutɔ mgbi okwonyɔtsɛ yi itukwu oshiishi mgbi eyi mbi iYesu, kɛdzɛ ibu ongwi iPatimo mi ikye elodzimgbasho bɛyi obwɛndɛ mgbi iYesu.
REV 1:10 Mi egbe mgbi Otsɛ ma Onodzi kye ani teyi, man ani fwo onikyɔ ela mi iyikpa mbi ani dafi agba mani,
REV 1:11 ela na gbɛɛ: <<Lɔ mi afɛ ungwɔ ngwi abu di mani kye dɛsɔ nu okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ egyafa ntonani: Mbi emi Efesu yi iSimina yi iPegamu yi iTyatira yi iSadi yi iFyiladefyia bɛyi iLaodisia.>>
REV 1:12 Ani kyata gbɛɛ ni ani di ela nle gbɔdzɛ yi ani mani. Onɔ ngwi ani kyata ma, ani di otlɛsɛ abashi mgbi ola nghi egyafa,
REV 1:13 ma mi idzidzɛ otlɛsɛ ntona <<Inggisɛ oka dzɛ ele dafi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ mani,>> wo angwuto owulu-wulu kyɛ esho lu afɔ mi esɛ yi ayangwuto abashi nyɛ igɛgɛ mgban.
REV 1:14 Otu mi ikye mgban tundzɛ dafi ofufitu, i tundzɛ dafi akwummbwo, inɛ mgban di dzɛ dafi abɔ onaana mgbi ola mani.
REV 1:15 Afɔ mgban mi esɛ dzɛ dafi iyudza ngwi a gyuon enotse omuma oshinishini mani, ela mgban di dzɛ dafi adu eni nle kwobu mani.
REV 1:16 O byi mcɛ nghi egyafa mi abugye mgban, ma mi ondu mgban okwusunkli ngyigye agya efa tɔ mi ele. Inɛ mgban dzɛ dafi onɔ le kwɔ mi idzidzɛ udɛ mani.
REV 1:17 Ngwi ani din nɛ, ani si gbɛsɛ lankɛ iyayi dafi ani kwulu mani. Nɛ o kye abugye mgban dɔ ani ewo si gbɛɛ: <<Ka mio ba. Ani li ongwu ababɔ bɛyi ongwu olɛlɛ mani.
REV 1:18 Ani li ongwu ndzɛ oshishe mani; ani plɛ kwulu, kpaa onɛnɛ dika ani dzɛ oshishe nghataa gyegwu! Ani di dzɛ yi ungwɔ okwulu ofɛ mgbi ikwongye bɛyi endzi.
REV 1:19 <<Nɛ kye lɔlu, ungwɔ ngwi abu di, ngwi dzɛ onɛnɛ bɛyi ungwɔ nkawa kyɔ mi iyayi.
REV 1:20 Ungwɔ odaada mgbi mcɛ egyafa ngwi abu di mi abugye mgbi ani bɛyi otlɛsɛ mgbi ola okwɔkwɔ ma li ongwu aani: Mcɛ egyafa ntona li engyesɔ mgbi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ egyafa ntonani, otlɛsɛ egyafa mgbi ola ntona li okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ egyafa ntonani.
REV 2:1 <<Lɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ mgbi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi Efesu gbɛɛ: Nɛnɛ li elodzɛ mgbi ongwu nbyi mcɛ nghi egyafa mi abugye mgban di kyikyɛ mi idzidzɛ otlɛsɛ mgbi ola okwɔkwɔ nani:
REV 2:2 Ani ye idɔ ngwi abu kyɔ mani, okwunewo idɔ mgbi abu yi itukwu oshiishi. Ani ye abu ka gbela yi emi imbaali ba, ikyesinɛ abu mbadi ama ntso gbɛɛ di ama li ama ogbikye iYesu kpaa a li ama ba, di difwi gbɛɛ a li ama omwonya.
REV 2:3 Abu kwonyɔtsɛ, di gyadzɛ mi ikye mgbi ani, abu di yɛyikpa ba.
REV 2:4 Kpaa li ungwɔ nkpa ani yi abu ba aani: Abu dzata okpitukwu mgbi abu ongwi ababɔ nani.
REV 2:5 Wɛ imbe abu gbɛsɛ mani! Kyatitukwu diyɛ kyungwɔ ama ngwi abu teyi kyɔ ma ababɔ mani. Ni abu kyatitukwu ba, n ka ba mbi abu wa kyi kwɔlu otlɛsɛ mgbi ola okwɔkwɔ mgbi abu na mi imbe mgban.
REV 2:6 Nghaduu li ikyese mgbi abu aani: Abu di okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi emi iNikoleti tanyi, dafi ani kpaa di tanyi nɛni.
REV 2:7 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ, otsungwɔn no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi emi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni. Ongwu ngha ma, n ka nun ofɛ no gye ekwɔ mgbi oshishe, ndzɛ mi iPradiso mgbi Imgbasho nani.
REV 2:8 Lɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iSimina gbɛɛ: Nɛnɛ li elodzɛ mgbi ongwu nli ababɔ di li olɛlɛ, ongwu nkwulu diyɛ kyato dzɛ oshishe nani.
REV 2:9 Ani ye okakewo yi adzɛ mgbi abu nghaduu abu dzɛ aludu! Ani ye odzɛ ibwubwe ngwi inggisɛ ama ngbɛɛ ama li emi iJuda kpaa li emi iJuda ba le gbɔ mi ikpewo abu mani, kpaa a li ozu okwakye mgbi iSatan.
REV 2:10 Ka wimio mi ungwɔ ngwi abu le ka gyadzɛ mi ele na ba. N nya abu, Olodu ka gbe ema angbeka wokɛ obawi ikye ombadi ema, ema dika gbiisɔ mi egbe iwyo. Shitukwu kpɔɔ, nghataa kɛ onɔ ikwongye, man ani ka kye okpaapyi mgbi oshishe nu abu.
REV 2:11 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ, otsungwɔn no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi emi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni. Inggisɛ nngha ma, ka gyisɔ mi ikwongye ongwu fan na wuba.
REV 2:12 Lɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iPegamu gbɛɛ: Nɛnɛ li elodzɛ mgbi ongwu ndzɛ yi okwusunkli ngyigye agya efa nani.
REV 2:13 Ani ye imbe ngwi abu dzɛ na li imbe ngwi itsuutɔ mgbi iSatan dzɛ aali. Nghaduu abu kwudzɛ mi oyɛyɛ onuunu mi iyi mgbi ani. Abu tangwɛ oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu mbi ani ba, mi egbe mgbi Antipa ma kpaa, obwɛndɛ mgbi ani otsitsi, a ngwɔn mi ogalu mgbi ema imbe ngwi iSatan dzɛ nani.
REV 2:14 Nghanɛ kpaa, ani dzɛ yi ungwɔ gwee ngwi ani ka bɛwo ema ba: Ema to yi inggisɛ mmana ngwu gbela yi otsootso mgbi iBalan, ongwu ntso iBalaki ogbe emi iSrai teyi oka kyɔ alobube mgbi ogye ungwogye ngwi a kye fifɛ nu emi angwula bɛyi okyɔ amah nani.
REV 2:15 Li ngha ngwi ema kpaa dzɛ yi inggisɛ ama ngbela yi otsootso mgbi emi iNikoleti aali.
REV 2:16 Nghanɛ kyatitukwu na! Lubana, ani ka ba mbi ema plɛ jo owa gblika yi ama mi okwusunkli ongwi ondu mgbi ani.
REV 2:17 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi emi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni. Mbi inggisɛ ongwu ngha, n ka nun iManna angbeka odaada. N dika nun ikwutsɛ onzundzɛ ngwi a lɔ iyi ofufɛ mi ele, ngwi inggisɛ ngbɛ ma ta ka ye.
REV 2:18 Lɔ ungwɔ ntonɛ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iTyatira gbɛɛ: Nɛnɛ li elodzɛ mgbi Ongwɛ Imgbasho, ongwu inɛ mgban dzɛ dafi ola onaabɔ ngwu afɔ mgban mi esɛ dzɛ dafi iyudza ngwi a gyuon enotse shinishini nani.
REV 2:19 Ani ye okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi abu, okpitukwu mgbi abu yi oyɛyɛ onuunu, idɔ yi okwonyɔtsɛ mgbi abu, di ye gbɛɛ abu le kyɔ onɛnɛ ngha ongwi abu teyi kyɔ ababɔ mani.
REV 2:20 Nghanɛ kpaa, li ungwɔ nkpa ani yi abu ba aani: Abu gbɛ ongyaa iJedzɛbɛ nkwu ewon di oyegbɔ na wo ewo. Mi otsootso mgban o nu engyiidɔ mgbi ani boofɛ kaka amah ibwubwe, dile gye ungwogye ngwi a kye fifɛ nu angwula.
REV 2:21 Ani nun onɔ gbɛɛ no kyata mi amah mgban nani, kpaa o dzɛ yi oweka ba.
REV 2:22 Nghanɛ n ka kyon ngwi dɔkɛ akwulo mgbi adzɛ ogyeegye, n dika nu ama nle kyɔ amah yan gyadzɛ kpakpa, sede nu ma kyatitukwu mi okyɔɔkyɔ mgban ntonani.
REV 2:23 N ka ngwɔn ɛngbɛ. Ta okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ duu ka ye gbɛɛ ani li kyidi ali inggisɛ mi eka yi itukwu, ma n ka yile mkpa kpa ali inggisɛ mgbi ema duu mi okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi ema.
REV 2:24 Onɛnɛ nle gbɔ yi ema ama nsisi mi iTyatira nɛ gbɛɛ, ema ama nkyɛdɔ mi otsootso mgban ba, di kpayi ungwɔ mgbi iSatan ngwi a li kwun di iba olu byulu ba ma, (n ka kye okakewo oka dɔ ema ikye wuba).
REV 2:25 Nghaduu gbɛwɛbyi otsootso ngwi ema dzɛyan na kyoon nghataa ni ani wa yidɔ.
REV 2:26 Mbi inggisɛ ngwu ngha di kyɔ owitukwu mgbi ani ka dondu ma, n ka nun mfye mi ikye ɛsɛ ibyibyi.
REV 2:27 O ka kye ma teyi yi okwuta utɔ ashashi; o ka gbobu ma ambulu-ambulu dafi ishe> yɛyɛ dafi ani gbɛ mfye mbi Otsani mani.
REV 2:28 N dika kye Oshɛbɛ nun.
REV 2:29 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ, no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni.
REV 3:1 Lɔ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iSadi gbɛɛ: Ntonɛ li elodzɛ mgbi ongwu nbyi Onodzi mgbi Imgbasho egyafa bɛyi mcɛ egyafa nani. Ani ye okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi abu; ali inggisɛ duu tsɛwɛ gbɛɛ abu ka dzɛ oshishe mi onodzi, kpa o li ikwukwɔ.
REV 3:2 Ngyo! Ni oyɛyɛ onuunu mgbi abu nsisi dzɛ na fyumfye di i wa kwulu, ikyesinɛ ani di okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi abu mbi Imgbasho mgbi ani saan ngyɛ ba.
REV 3:3 Nghanɛ wɛ, ungwɔ ngwi abu teyi gbɛ di fwo mani; kyɔ mi ele, di kyatitukwu. Kpaa kini abu ngyo bayɔ, n ka ba dafi emumyi mani, ma abu ka ye onɔ ngwi ani ka ba mbi abu ba.
REV 3:4 Nghaduu ema to yi inggisɛ gwee mi iSadi ama nnu angwuto mgbi ama shimbi ba mani. A ka wewo mi angwuto onzundzɛ kyikyɛ yi ani, ikyesinɛ a mɛ.
REV 3:5 Inggisɛ nngha ma, ka wo angwuto onzundzɛ dafi ama mani. Ani dika dulu iyi mgban mi afɛ mgbi oshishe ba, kpaa n ka kye iyi mgban tso mi ododa mi inai Otsani yi engyesɔ mgban.
REV 3:6 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ, no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi emi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni.
REV 3:7 Lɔ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iFyiladefyia gbɛɛ: Nɛnɛ li elodzɛ mgbi ongwu nle saan di dzɛ yi oyɛyɛ, ongwu nbyi ungwɔ okwulu ofɛ mgbi iDevedi. Ungwɔ ngwi o kwulu inggisɛ onyi ka kye tukwu gbɛ ba, ungwɔ ngwi o di kye tukwu inggisɛ onyi ka kwulu gbɛ ba.
REV 3:8 Ani ye ungwɔ ngwi abu kyɔ. Di, ani kwulu ofɛ lakɛ asisa ikye abu, ngwi inggisɛ onyi ka kye tukwu gbɛ ba. Ani ye ɛnɛpɛ mɛ abu ba, nghaduu abu ngyo elodzɛ mgbi ani di tangwɛ iyi mgbi ani ba.
REV 3:9 N ka nu ama nto mi ozu okwakye mgbi iSatan, nli tso gbɛɛ ama li emi iJuda kpaa li ama ba, kpaa a li ama omwonya ntonani, N ka nu ma wa kwɛsɛ mi iyayi mbi abu di difwi gbɛɛ abu kpa ani itukwu.
REV 3:10 Ikyegbɛɛ ema ngyo ola mgbi ani di shitukwu kpɔɔ nɛ, ani kpaa ka dulu ema tɔ mi imbadi nka ba mi ikye ɛsɛ duu owa mbadi ama nto ɛsɛ mani.
REV 3:11 Ani kyɛma dzikan-dzikan. Kye abɔ byi ungwɔ ngwi abu dzɛyan ma kpɔklɔɔ, ikye ni inggisɛ onyi wa gbɛ abu okpapyi ba mani.
REV 3:12 Inggisɛ nngha ma, n ka non li otlɛsɛ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mgbi ani. Akponyi kpaa o dika dzanta ba. Ani ka lɔ iyi Imgbasho bɛyi iyi ogalu mgbi Imgbasho mgbi ani mbon, iJerosalin ofufɛ ntɔ mi esho mbi Imgbasho mgbi ani kyɛ le ba nani; ani dika lɔ iyi ofufɛ mgbi ani mbon.
REV 3:13 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ, no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni.
REV 3:14 <<Lɔ kɛ mbi ongyesɔ ongwi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ mi iLaodisia gbɛɛ: Ntonɛ li elodzɛ mgbi No Dzɛ Ngha mani, ongwu ndzɛ yi otsitsi bɛyi obwɛndɛ otsitsi, ongwu nli ikye mi ungwɔ ama Imgbasho ta ntonɛni.
REV 3:15 Ani ye ungwɔ ama abu teyi kyɔ mani; ani ye dafi abu yuyu naadi zola ba mani. Dafi i dzɛ ani ma gbɛɛ abu ki yuyu hona zola!
REV 3:16 Kpaa ikyegbɛɛ abu tɛwɛwɛ, abu zola hona yuyu ba nɛ, n le ka kye abu ngwuta dafi anggwɔ mi ondu mgbi ani mani.
REV 3:17 Abu gbɛɛ, <ani dzɛ aludu; ani tu aludu di mina unkonyi wuba.> Nghaduu abu difwi gbɛɛ, i ngha abu ewo, kyelela, dzɛ adzɛ, binɛ di dzɛ ibiba ba.
REV 3:18 Ani wɛ abu ɛwɛ gbɛɛ, ni abu gya abashi ngwi a falufa won mi ola mbi ani, ikye ni abu yɛɛ aludu; yi angwuto onzundzɛ owoowo, ikye ni abu tukwu iba ayiwi mgbi abu; yi otse okye wo inɛ mgbi abu, ikye ni abu di mani.
REV 3:19 Ama nkpaa ani itukwu ma, ani li kyɔkyɔ di kwo ma adɔ. Nghanɛ dzɛ mi otsitsi, di kyatitukwu.
REV 3:20 Gadɔ! Ani kwudzɛ onufozu le tsaabɔ! Inggisɛ ta nfwo ela mgbi ani di kwulu ofɛ yɔ, n ka kaka di gye ungwogye yan, ongwu kpaa ka gye yi ani.
REV 3:21 Mbi ali inggisɛ nngha duu, n ka nun ofɛ no sɔ yi ani mi itsuutɔ mgbi ani, yɛyɛ dafi ani kpaa ngha di sɔ yi Otsani mi itsuutɔ mgban nɛni.
REV 3:22 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ, no fwo odzɛ ngwi Onodzi gbɔ yi okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ nɛni.>>
REV 4:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, ani ndinɛ, ta mmana mi iyayi mgbi ani onufozu lasisa mi esho. Man ela ngwi ani teyi fwo le gbɔdzɛ yi ani dafi agba ma gbɛɛ, <<Ba esho mmɛnɛni, ta n ka tso abu ungwɔ nka kyɔ onɔ ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ mani.>>
REV 4:2 Labɔ mata ani dzɛ mi Onodzi, man inggisɛ sɔdzɛ itsuutɔ mgbi Imgbasho wa dzɛkɛ inɛ mbi ani.
REV 4:3 Ongwu ndi sɔdzɛ mmana ma odzɛɛdzɛ mgban dzɛ dafi ikwutsɛ onyina-nyina bɛyi ikwutsɛ nli omuma gloglo mani. Mmbwo olowa, nlu ikwutsɛ ngwi dzɛ yi enotse dafi indrakpakpa kwɔkwɔ, loka wo itsuutɔ nani.
REV 4:4 Itsuutɔ angbeka nghi osudenɛ kpakɛkɛ wo itsuutɔ nani, engyukwo osudenɛ di sɔto efu tsatsadu. A wo angwuto onzundzɛ di tukwu okpapyi abashi mi ikye mgbi ama.
REV 4:5 Mi itsuutɔ na mmbwo naabɔ tɔ, kwadu, akpala di gbo. Ola ipitila nghi egyafa tole gbɛ mi iyayi itsuutɔ nani. Ngwi li onodzi egyafa mgbi Imgbasho mani.
REV 4:6 Mi iyayi itsuutɔ na ungwɔ oka di dzɛ ele dafi onekyoo idzinggi, gbosa dafi ikwutsɛ ola mani sɔdzɛ idzidzɛ. Adan owamyɛ nghi enɛ ngwu dzɛ yi inɛ mi iyayi bɛyi iyikpa loka wo itsuutɔ nani.
REV 4:7 Adan owamyɛ ongwu ababɔ ma dzɛ dafi ugaba, ongwu fan dzɛ dafi mnda ngwi a won elozu, ongwu ta dzɛ yi inɛ dafi inggisɛ, ongwu nɛ dzɛ dafi uyɛɛ nle bulu mani.
REV 4:8 Ali atta owamyɛ enɛ ntona dzɛ yi asha egyin yi inɛ kpatsɛ ele, kwo yi asha mgban mi esɛ kpaa. Onɔ yi otu duu a yama kwulɛsɛ ogbɛɛ:
REV 4:9 Alonɔ ni atta owamyɛ ntona kye okwɔkwɔ yi mmwɛ bɛyi angba nu ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ di dzɛ oshishe gyegwu-gyegwu na,
REV 4:10 engyukwo osudenɛ ntona li tukwukɛ esɛ nu ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ na, di sunu ongwu ndzɛ oshishe gyegwu-gyegwu nani. A li gbe okpapyi mgbi ama lakiyayi itsuutɔ si gbɛɛ:
REV 4:11 <<Abu mɛ, Otsɛ bɛyi Imgbasho mgbi eyi, ogbɛ okwɔkwɔ yi mmwɛ bɛyi mfye, lubana abu ta alungwɔ duu, ma mi oweka mgbi abu a ta ma di dzɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ mgbi ama aani.>>
REV 5:1 Nɛ ani di afɛ ofulu-fulu mi abugye mgbi ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ nani, ngwi a lɔ ungwɔ mi ali agyan duu kye kwobɛ imbe egyafa.
REV 5:2 Ani diyɛ di ongyesɔ odatu le noola mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ mɛ okye fwɛlu okwobɛ di kwulu afɛ na?>>
REV 5:3 Nghaduu inggisɛ onyi mi esho naadi mi ɛsɛ hona mi ikpɛsɛ yagba okwulu afɛ na naadi winɛ di ifun kpaa ba,
REV 5:4 Ani tsukwu diyɛ tsukwu ikyekyɛ a tu inggisɛ onyi nka kwulu afɛ na hona winɛ di ifun ba.
REV 5:5 Nɛ engyukwo ntona onyi nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Ka tsukwu ba! Dika, Ugaba mgbi etɔ mgbi emi iJuda, Etɔ mgbi iDevedi ngha wa. O ka yagba kwulu afɛ na yi okwobɛ-kwobɛ egyafa ntonani.>>
REV 5:6 Nɛ ani di Ongwummala, le dinɛ dafi a teyi ngwɔn mani, kwudzɛ mi idzidzɛ itsuutɔ, atta owamyɛ nghi enɛ bɛyi engyukwo ntona loka won. O dzɛ yi agbe nghi egyafa yi inɛ egyafa, ngwi li Onodzi egyafa mgbi Imgbasho ngwi a kye dɛsɔ nu ɛsɛ duu mani.
REV 5:7 O ba wa kye gbɛlu afɛ ofulu-fulu na mi abugye mgbi ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ nani.
REV 5:8 Man ngwi o kye gbɛlu nɛ, atta owamyɛ nghi enɛ ntona bɛyi engyukwo osudenɛ ntona lakɛ esɛ mi iyayi Ongwummala nani. Ama duu dzɛ yi ozuna a di byi uga abashi nmbwo yi ungwɔ ogbungbɛ mi ifun, ngwi li ibɔ mgbi emi osaan.
REV 5:9 A di shashi ofufɛ gbɛɛ: <<Abu mɛ okyi kyelu afɛ ofulu-fulu di kye kwulu okwobɛ-kwobɛ mgban ntonani, ikyekyɛ a ngwɔ abu, ma yi eyi mgbi abu, abu gya inggisɛ mi ali udzɛ bɛyi ondudzɛ, bɛyi inggisɛ yi ɛsɛ duu ikye Imgbasho.
REV 5:10 Abu nu ma yɛɛ esutɔ bɛyi ama ofifɛ ikye osunu Imgbasho mgbi eyi, a dika kye ɛsɛ nɛ teyi.>>
REV 5:11 Nɛ ani ndinɛ si fwo ela engyesɔ ibyibyi, mmbwo mgbi ama li idubu idubu, yi idubu iwyo akpe idubu iwyo. A kpakɛkɛ wo itsuutɔ bɛyi atta owamyɛ bɛyi engyukwo ntonani.
REV 5:12 Mi ela okwukwo a shashi gbɛɛ: <<Omɛɛmɛ li Ongwummala, ongwu a ngwɔn, o kye gbɛlu mfye yi aludu yi ozoyeye yi ɛnɛpɛ yi mmwɛ yi okwɔkwɔ bɛyi otsɛɛtsɛ!>>
REV 5:13 Nɛ ani fwo ali atta mi esho duu bɛyi mi ɛsɛ nɛ bɛyi mi ikpɛsɛ bɛyi mi ekyoo okwukwo, bɛyi alungwɔ nto mboma duu, le shashi gbɛɛ: Mbi ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ yi mbi Ongwummala ni otsɛɛtsɛ yi mmwɛ yi okwɔkwɔ bɛyi mfye dzɛ mbon, nghataa gyegwu!>>
REV 5:14 Adan owamyɛ nghi enɛ ntona gbɛɛ, <<No dzɛ ngha,>> man engyukwo ntona lakɛ esɛ di sunu.
REV 6:1 Dafi ani di Ongwummala kwulu okwobɛ-kwobɛ ongwi ababɔ nɛ. Ani si fwo onyi mi idzidzɛ atta owamyɛ ntona gbɔ mi ela ngbela dafi akpala mani gbɛɛ, <<Kwa!>>
REV 6:2 Man ani ndinɛ si di mmya onzundzɛ dzɛ iyayi mbi ani! Inggisɛ nle tɔn ma byi uta, a di kye okpapyi nun, o tɔn tasɛ dafi inggisɛ onghaangha mani, le ka ngha.
REV 6:3 Onɔ ngwi Ongwummala kwulu okwobɛ na ongwu fan ma, ani fwo atta owamyɛ ntona ongwu fan gbɛɛ, <<Kwa!>>
REV 6:4 Nɛ mmya oka nma dafi ola tasɛ, inggisɛ nle tɔn ma, a nun gbɛɛ no kyi kyelu iyu mi ɛsɛ nɛni, odi nu inggisɛ kwobu ewoma. A kye okwusunkli ogbadaa nun.
REV 6:5 Onɔ ngwi Ongwummala kwulu okwobɛ na ongwu ta ma, ani fwo atta owamyɛ ntona ongwu ta gbɛɛ, <<Kwa!>> Ani di mmya onbyinbyi kwudzɛ iyayi mbi ani! Inggisɛ nle tɔn ma, kye ungwɔ omba ungwɔ agya efa byabɔ.
REV 6:6 Ani fwo ungwɔ gbela dafi ela mi idzidzɛ mgbi atta owamyɛ ntonani. Le gbɛɛ, awu alakama onyi okpa mi ikye idɔ egbe onyi, awu enesɔ nghi eta okpa mi ikye idɔ egbe onyi, dika nu engyie yi eneekwɔ na nyanya ba!>>
REV 6:7 Onɔ ngwi Ongwummala kye kwulu okwobɛ-kwobɛ ongwu nɛ ma, ani fwo ela mgbi atta owamyɛ ongwu nɛ le gbɛɛ, <<kwa!>>
REV 6:8 Ani ndinɛ, man mmya nsila kwudzɛ! Ongye otɔn ma a kwun di Ikwongye, ta Endzi kyan iyikpa kwɛkwɛ. A kye mfye nu ma gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔ inggisɛ mi ayɛsɛ onyi mi idzidzɛ enɛ mgbi ɛsɛ yi okwusunkli yi onikyenbwa yi ootse, bɛyi mmbwaboshɛ emi ɛsɛ nɛni.
REV 6:9 Ngwi o kwulu okwobɛ-kwobɛ ongwu da ma, ani di oshishe mgbi ama ngwu a ngwɔ ikye elodzimgbasho ikyegbɛɛ a kyɔ obwɛndɛ otsitsi mi ita iwashi mani.
REV 6:10 A kwu ela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ka kye onɔ sinɛ, Otsɛ Ongha yi mfye, osaan yi otsitsi, se ngwi abu ka fwo inggisɛ emi ɛsɛ nɛ ikwɔ di kpa ma mkpa mi ikye eyi mgbi eyi ngwi a kye kyi esɛ na?>>
REV 6:11 Ta a nu ma angwuto onzundzɛ di nya ma gbɛɛ nu ma mbata gwee, nghataa ni umbwo engbidɔ angbeka bɛyi emi ongwunɔ ma ama ngwu a ka ngwɔ ma dafi ama abuoma kpaa a ngwɔ ma ma mbwumbwo se.
REV 6:12 N di dafi o kwulu okwobɛ-kwobɛ ongwu gyin na mani. Man ikpɛsɛ suusu kpakpa. Onɔ kyata yɛɛ onbyinbyi dafi ishisha angwuto ngwi a mɛ mi andu mndɔ mani, ofyia olɔlɔ kyata yɛɛ omuma dafi eyi,
REV 6:13 man mcɛ mi akpa yangwuta luba esɛ, dafi onggangga mgbi andundu li wulɔ onɔ ngwi awo fa fyumfye nani.
REV 6:14 Man esho byakpa byulu dafi afɛ ngwi a fulu mani, nɛ ali unggwɔ yi ibu duu a kye kwɔlu ma mi imbe mgbi ama.
REV 6:15 Ta utɔ emi ɛsɛ nɛ, utɔ engyaa, emi agyegika, emi aludu, ama odatu, yi ali ofyɛɛ bɛyi inggisɛ ɛwɛwɛ duu gbe ewoma da mi ishɛ bɛyi ifo unggwɔ.
REV 6:16 A kwu unggwɔ yi akwutsɛ ela gbɛɛ, <<Yulu tukwu eyi kye eyi da mi inɛ mgbi ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ bɛyi itingga mgbi Ongwummala!
REV 6:17 Ikyesinɛ egbe itingga mgbi ama okwulewo ma ba wa, nghanɛ li emɛ ka tsigɛgɛ yan gbɛ?>>
REV 7:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, ani di engyesɔ nghi enɛ kwudzɛ ayɛ enɛ mgbi ɛsɛ le kwulu awo mi ayɛ enɛ mgbi ɛsɛ gbɛɛ no ka fa mi ikpɛsɛ naa mi ekyoo okwukwo hona mi ekwɔ onyi kpaa ba.
REV 7:2 Nɛ ani di ongyesɔ oka tɔkyɛ mi onosa, yi ambɛ mgbi Imgbasho oshishe. O kwu ela mi ela okwukwo kɛ mbi engyesɔ nghi enɛ ama ngwu a teyi kye mfye nu ma gbɛɛ nu ma dzili ɛsɛ bɛyi ekyoo okwukwo ntona gbɛɛ:
REV 7:3 <<Ka dzili ɛsɛ naa ekyoo okwukwo hona ekwɔ ba, nghataa ni eyi kye ambɛ dzɛ engbidɔ mgbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi mi ebeshu se.>>
REV 7:4 Nɛman ani fwo mmbwo mgbi ama ngwu a kye ambɛ dzɛ ma mani: Idubu ideli onyi ngwusefa dɔn enɛ mi ali agwɔ mgbi iSrai duu.
REV 7:5 Mi agwɔ mgbi iJuda a kye ambɛ dzɛ inggisɛ idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iRubɛn idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iGadi idubu iwyodefa,
REV 7:6 mi agwɔ mgbi Ashɛ idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iNaftali idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iManase idubu iwyodefa,
REV 7:7 mi agwɔ mgbi iSimiɔn idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iLevi idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iSaka idubu iwyodefa,
REV 7:8 mi agwɔ mgbi iDzebulun idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iJose idubu iwyodefa, mi agwɔ mgbi iBenjamin idubu iwyodefa.
REV 7:9 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, ani di ibyi inggisɛ mi iyayi mbi ani ngwu inggisɛ onyi ka gbɔ ma gbɛ ba, kyɛ mi ali ɛsɛ yi agwɔ yi inggisɛ yi ondudzɛ duu, gbeka kwudzɛ iyayi itsuutɔ bɛyi iyayi Ongwummala. A wo angwuto onzundzɛ di byi abade mi abɔ mgbi ama.
REV 7:10 A si kwu ela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ: <<Owatɔ-watɔ kyɛ mbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi, Ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ, bɛyi mbi Ongwummala.>>
REV 7:11 Engyesɔ ntona duu kwudzɛkɛ kpakɛkɛ wo itsuutɔ di kpatsɛ engyukwo ntona yi atta owamyɛ ntonani. A tukwukɛ esɛ gbe ikye wɛɛsɛ mi iyayi itsuutɔ si sunu Imgbasho,
REV 7:12 le gbɛɛ: <<No dzɛ ngha! Otsɛ-tsɛ yi okwɔkwɔ yi ozoyeye yi angba yi mmwɛ yi mfye yi apa no dzɛ mbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi nghataa imbisɔ gyegwu. No dzɛ ngha!>>
REV 7:13 Nɛ onyi mbi engyukwo ntonɛ byi ani ita gbɛɛ, <<Ama nwo angwuto onzundzɛ ntonɛ ma, a li ele, a di kyɛ ole kyɛ?>>
REV 7:14 Ani si nu uka gbɛɛ, <<Ongyukwo, abu ye.>> Ta o gbɛɛ, <<Ntonɛ li ama ntasɛ mi adzɛ okwukwo nani; a kye salu angwuto mgbi ama non yɛɛ onzundzɛ mi eyi mgbi Ongwummala.
REV 7:15 Ikyenghanɛ, <<a to iyayi itsuutɔ mgbi Imgbasho dile sunun onɔ yi otu mi ozu mgban okwukwo nani; man ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ na ka kye iwulu abɔ mgban tukwu ma.
REV 7:16 Akponyi kpaa enbwa ka dɔ ma ba; ekweni kpaa dika kwu ma ba. Onɔ ka tsɛ ma ba, naadi olola onyi kpaa ba.
REV 7:17 Ikyesinɛ Ongwummala ndzɛ mi idzidzɛ itsuutɔ na ka li inggisɛ ongyo ma; o ka gbe ma teyi lu mi uteeni oshishe. Man Imgbasho ka fɔ ma etse inɛ duu.>>
REV 8:1 Ngwi Ongwummala kye afɛ ngwi a kyi kwobɛ ongwu gyafa kye kwulu nɛ, esho dede mɛ itsitsi obyi hini.
REV 8:2 Man ani di engyesɔ nghi egyafa nkwudzɛ to inai Imgbasho na, a kye agba onyonyi nu ma kpatsɛ.
REV 8:3 Ongyesɔ oka, nbyi uga abashi mgbi ungwɔ ogbungbɛ ma, ba wa kwudzɛkɛ iwashi. Ongwunɛ nɛ a kye ungwɔ ogbungbɛ kpakpa nun ikye okye toola yi ibɔ mgbi emi osaan mi iwashi abashi mi iyayi itsuutɔ.
REV 8:4 Nɛ iwu mgbi ungwɔ ogbungbɛ na, bɛkɛ yi ibɔ mgbi emi osaan, kyɛɛ mi abɔ mgbi ongyesɔ na, lu iyayi Imgbasho.
REV 8:5 Ta ongyesɔ na kyi kyelu uga ungwɔ ogbungbɛ na, mwa ola mi iwashi mbwokɛ ele, man kye ngwuta lakɛ esɛ; ta imbe kwadu, akpala gbo, mmbwo naabɔ, ɛsɛ di suusu.
REV 8:6 Nɛ engyesɔ nghi egyafa ndzɛ yi agba nghi egyafa ntona wewo ofo ma.
REV 8:7 Ongyesɔ ongwu ababɔ fo agba mgban, ta mmbwakwutsɛ yi ola ngwuɛkɛ yi eyi, man a kye ma ngwuta luba esɛ. Ayɛsɛ ongwu ta gyola, ayɛ ekwɔ ongwu ta gyola, oshɛ okyinda duu di gyola.
REV 8:8 Ongyesɔ ongwu fan fo agba mgban, man a kye ungwɔ dafi unggwɔ ogbagbadzidzi, nle gbɛ yi ola ngwuta wokɛ onekyoo. Man ayɛ ongwu ta mgbi onekyoo ma yɛɛ eyi,
REV 8:9 ta ungwɔ ama ndzɛ yi oshishe nwoto onekyoo mi ayɛ ongwu ta duu kwulu, a kye iwudza eni mi ayɛsɛ ongwu ta duu, kye sulu.
REV 8:10 Nɛ ongyesɔ ongwu ta fo agba mgban, man mcɛ okwulewo, nkwiinɛ dafi itɔci sini, ngwuta kyɛ esho wa gyɛkɛ okwokyiikwokyi mgbi ekyoo mi ayɛ ongwu ta bɛyi eni mgbi oshishe nani.
REV 8:11 Iyi mcɛ na gbɛɛ Onunɔ. Ayɛ eni ongwu ta na yɛ nunɔ, nɛ ibyi inggisɛ ama nweni onunɔ na duu kwulu.
REV 8:12 Ongyesɔ ongwu nɛ fo agba mgban, ta a kyi kwɔdzɛ ayɛ ongwu ta mgbi onɔ yi ofyia bɛyi mcɛ, man a yɛɛ iifu. Nghanɛ ayɛ ongwu ta mgbi onɔ yi otu duu dzɛ yi osa wuba.
REV 8:13 Ngwi ani le kyidi nɛ, ani fwo uyɛɛ le bulu mi idzidzɛ awo kwu ela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ: <<Ibli! Ibli! Ibli mbi imba mgbi ɛsɛ nɛni, mi ikye agba ngwi engyesɔ angbeka eta ntona le wewo ofo mani!>>
REV 9:1 Ngwi ongyesɔ ongwu da fo agba mgban nɛ, ani di mcɛ ngwuta mi esho luba esɛ. A kye ungwɔ okwulu ishɛ ndondu ba na nu mcɛ nani.
REV 9:2 Onɔ ngwi o kyi kwulu ishɛ na ma, iwu kyɛɛ mi ele dafi iwu mgbi ola okwukwo mani. Iwu na nu onɔ yi akpesho duu yifu.
REV 9:3 Man obagidi tɔ mi iwu na kpatsɛ ɛsɛ a di kye mfye nu ma dafi itɔ mfye mgbi mnaa ongwi ɛsɛ nɛni.
REV 9:4 A nya ma gbɛɛ nu ma ka kyɔ oshɛ mi ɛsɛ naadi afutse onyi hona ekwɔ unkonyi ba, kpaa li inggisɛ ama ndzɛ yi ambɛ mgbi Imgbasho mi ebeshu mgbi ama ba mata.
REV 9:5 A nu ma mfye gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔ inggisɛ ba, kpaa li onu ma isɔ mi ofyia eda kyoon. Ma Isɔ ngwi a gye ma di dzɛ dafi otooto mgbi mnaa onɔ ngwi i to inggisɛ mani.
REV 9:6 Mi egbe ntona ma, inggisɛ ka pita ikwongye, kpaa a ka dun ba; a dika mina okwulu, nghaduu ikwongye ka tsinya dzamata.
REV 9:7 Obagidi ntona to dafi mmya ngwi a mɛ ma ewo ika mani. A kye ungwɔ wo ma mi ikye dafi akata abashi mani, inɛ mgbi ama lu inɛ inggisɛ owamyɛ.
REV 9:8 Otu mgbi ama dzɛ dafi otu mgbi engyaa, aba mgbi ama di dzɛ dafi aba ugaba.
REV 9:9 A dzɛ yi okpalika ndzɛ dafi okpalika ashashi mani, ma adu mgbi asha mgbi ama dzɛ dafi akpala ogboogbo mgbi mmya bɛyi mmyikwukwɔ ibyibyi nkwadu tole kɛ ika mani.
REV 9:10 A dzɛ yi odu di li to dafi mnaa mani, ma mi odu mgbi ama, a dzɛ yi mfye onu inggisɛ isɔ mi ofyia eda.
REV 9:11 A dzɛ yi utɔ nkye ma le teyi, ongyesɔ ongwu ishɛ ndondu ba nani, ongwu iyin mi ondu iHibru li Abadɔn, mi ondu iGriki li Apoliɔn (Ongye odzili).
REV 9:12 Ibli ongwi ababɔ nyɛ waali; ibli angbeka nghi efa ka kyɛ iyikpa ma.
REV 9:13 Ongyesɔ ongwu gyin fo agba mgban, man ani fwo ela tɔkyɛ mi okoko enɛ mgbi iwashi abashi ndzɛ iyayi Imgbasho nani.
REV 9:14 Ela na gbɔ yi ongyesɔ ongwu gyin ndzɛ yi agba na gbɛɛ, <<Kye shɛlu engyesɔ enɛ ngwu a bwa ma adi mi ekyoo okwulewo mgbi iYufreti nani.>>
REV 9:15 Man engyesɔ enɛ ngwu a teyi kye ma dzɛkɛ le fɛ obyi nɛ yɛyɛ yi egbe yi ofyia bɛyi onova ma, a shɛ ma ta gbɛɛ nu ma ngwɔ inggisɛ onyi ikye eta mani.
REV 9:16 Ani fwo mmbwo oblakwutsɛ ama ndɔto mmya ma li imiliɔn ideli efa.
REV 9:17 Mmya yi ama otɔ ma ngwu ani di mi inɛ odiidi ma to ngha aani: Okpalika mgbi ama pita wo omuma, onbyinbyi vluvlu yɛ wo omuma dafi ofufu odaka mani. Ikye mmya ntona lu ikye ugaba, mi ondu mgbi ama ola, iwu bɛyi ofufu odaka le tɔ mi ele.
REV 9:18 A ngwɔ inggisɛ onyi ikye eta ma yi isɔ eta ntonɛni: Ola, iwu, bɛyi ola ofufu odaka nle tɔ mi ondu mgbi mmya ntona mani.
REV 9:19 Mfye mgbi mmya ntona dzɛ mi ondu bɛyi mi odu mgbi ama; ikyesinɛ odu mgbi ama dzɛ dafi ifa, ndzɛ yi ikye li laaba mani.
REV 9:20 Inggisɛ owamyɛ ama nsisi ngwu isɔ ntonɛ ngwɔ ma ba ma, di kyatitukwu mi ungwɔ ibwubwe ngwi a le kyɔ ba kpɔɔ; a nya osunu emɛsɛ ba, yi adagyɛ abashi, iyudza onzundzɛ okwɔkwɔ, itigbla, ikwutsɛ yi ekwɔ ikwukwɔ ngwi ka di naadi fwo hona kyikyɛ ba na ba.
REV 9:21 Naadi a nya yi inggisɛ ongwɔɔngwɔ yi obudei okyɔɔkyɔ yi amah hona mmyi mgbi ama oyiiyi kpaa ba.
REV 10:1 Nɛ ani di ongyesɔ oka odatu kyɛ esho le ba esɛ. A tukwun yi akpa, mmbwo di lowa nyan ikye mi esho; inɛ mgban kwɔ dafi onɔ mani, afɔ mgban di dzɛ dafi otlɛsɛ ola.
REV 10:2 O kye ongwaafɛ ofulu-fulu nlasisa byabɔ. O kye afɔ mgban abugye tuokɛ mi onekyoo yi afɔ mgban abubɛ mi esɛ,
REV 10:3 man o si feela okwukwo dafi agwudu otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi ugaba mani. Onɔ ngwi o feela mata, ela mgbi akpala egyafa ntona sandu.
REV 10:4 Ngwi akpala egyafa sandu nɛ, ani wewo okyi lɔlu; nghaduu ani fwo ela mi esho gbɛɛ, <<Kye odzɛ ngwi akpala egyafa ntona gbɔ na da dika kye lɔlu wokɛ esɛ ba.>>
REV 10:5 Nɛ ongyesɔ ongwu ani teyi din kye afɔ kwudzɛ onekyoo yi esɛ na, kyile abugye mgban lu esho.
REV 10:6 Man o fa mbi ongwu ndzɛ oshishe nghataa gyegwu nani, ongwu nta esho yi esɛ yi onekyoo bɛyi ungwɔ ama nto mboma duu, di gbɛɛ, <<Onɔ ombeembe ka dzɛma wuba!
REV 10:7 Nghaduu mi egbe ngwi ongyesɔ ongwu gyafa ka wewo ofo agba mgban ma, ungwɔ odaada mgbi Imgbasho ka mbwumbwo, yɛyɛ dafi o teyi noola nya engbidɔ mgban ama ogbɛɛsɛ mani.>>
REV 10:8 Nɛ ela ngwi ani teyi fwo mi esho na diyɛ gbɔdzɛ yi ani kpɔɔ gbɛɛ: <<Lu, ka kyi gbɛlu afɛ ofulu-fulu nlasisa mi abɔ ongyesɔ nkwudzɛ mi onekyoo bɛyi esɛ nani.>>
REV 10:9 Nghanɛ ani kɛ mbi ongyesɔ na ka nyan gbɛɛ non kye ongwaafɛ ofulu-fulu na nu ani. O nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Gbɛ di kye gye. Ka nu ifu mgbi abu maama, kpaa ka fyumfya mi ondu mgbi abu dafi enewo mani.>>
REV 10:10 Ani kye gbɛlu afɛ ofulu-fulu ongbungbɛ mi abɔ ongyesɔ na kye gye. I fyumfya mi ondu mgbi ani dafi enewo mani, kpaa ngwi ani kye gye mbe nɛ, ifu mgbi ani yɛ maama.
REV 10:11 Ta a nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Abu ka yegbɔ kyɛmɛ mi ikye inggisɛ ibyibyi, emi ɛsɛ yi ondudzɛ bɛyi emi utɔ.>>
REV 11:1 Ta a kye agida ndzɛ dafi ashi omba ungwɔ mani kye nu ani: di nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Lu ka kye mbalu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho, bɛyi iwashi, di kye gbɔlu mmbwo inggisɛ ama nle sunu mi ele duu.
REV 11:2 Kpaa ka mba ifyudɛ ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho na ba, dzanta dzɛkɛ, ikyekyɛ a kye nu Udzengye ntonani: a dika kyɔ itukwu ma mi ogalu osaan mi onova eta yi ofyia egyin.
REV 11:3 Man ani ka kye mfye nu obwɛndɛ mgbi ani nghi efa ntonani, a ka kye angwuto ikwu wo di yegbɔ esɔ mgbi Imgbasho mi onova eta yi ofyia egyin.>>
REV 11:4 Obwɛndɛ efa ntonɛ li ekwɔ olivi nghi efa mani, bɛyi akoola nghi efa nkwoto iyayi Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi ɛsɛ nɛni.
REV 11:5 Ma ali inggisɛ nmina okyɔ ma ungwɔ yɔ, ola li tɔ mi ondu mgbi ama kye ma gye: li itɔ ofɛ ngwi ali inggisɛ nmina okyɔ ma ungwɔ duu ka kwulu joani.
REV 11:6 A dzɛ yi mfye okye esho tukwu, gbɛɛ ni mmbwo ka kya ba, mi egbe ngwi ama le gbeesɔ mgbi Imgbasho mani. A di dzɛ yi mfye okyata eni yɛɛ eyi, odi nu ali itɔ isɔ okwulewo, alonɔ ngwi a mina duu.
REV 11:7 Onɔ ngwi a ngyɛlu obwɛndɛ mgbi ama ma, mmbwaba ongwi ntɔ mi ishɛ odondu ba na ka gblika yi ama, di ngha ma yi mfye di ngwɔ ma.
REV 11:8 Ikwɔ mgbi ama ka tila la ingɔfɛ mgbi ongbodzi ogalu, ngwi a li kwu mi ambɛ gbɛɛ, iSodon yi Igyibiti, imbe ngwi a kye Otsɛ mgbi ama kpaa gbokwo ekwatsi nani.
REV 11:9 Mi egbe eta dɔ itsitsi, ali inggisɛ mi agwɔ, ondudzɛ, yi ɛsɛ ka kyidi ikwɔ mgbi ama kpaa ka fwa gbɛɛ ni a ka kye ma ndzi ba.
REV 11:10 Imba mgbi ɛsɛ ka tsatsa mi ikye ma, di gha ewoma umba, ikyekyɛ oyegbɔ efa ntonɛ nu ɛsɛ isɔ.
REV 11:11 Kpaa ngwi i wa nyɛ egbe eta yi itsi nɛ, mmyɛ kyɛ mbi Imgbasho wa kaka ma, man a kyato dzɛkunto, idzidzi si kwulu ama ndi mani.
REV 11:12 Ta oyegbɔ efa ntona fwo ela okwukwo kyɛ esho le nya ma gbɛɛ, <<Luba esho na.>> Ngwi a le lu esho nɛ, engyikyili mgbi ama tokɛ le di ma.
REV 11:13 Mi obyi na yɛyɛ ɛsɛ suusu man onyi mi ikye iwyo mgbi ogalu na dzili. Inggisɛ kwulu idubu egyafa mi ɛsɛ osuusu nani, nɛ i kwulu ama nwatɔ ma ewo, a di kye oshewo nu Imgbasho ongwi esho.
REV 11:14 Ibli ongwu fan nyɛ waali; ongwu ta kyɛma dzikan-dzikan.
REV 11:15 Ongyesɔ ongwu gyafa fo agba mgban, man ela ama okwukwo tɔ mi esho le gbɛɛ: <<Esutɔ ongwi ɛsɛ yɛɛ esutɔ mgbi Otsɛ mgbi eyi yi iKrestu mgban, o dika kyuutɔ nghataa imbise gyegwu.>>
REV 11:16 Man engyukwo nghi osudenɛ, ama nsɔto itsuutɔ mgbi ama mi inai Imgbasho ma tukwukɛ kye ikye wɛɛsɛ di sunu Imgbasho.
REV 11:17 A le gbɛɛ: <<Eyi ta abu angba, Otsɛ Imgbasho onghaangha, Ongwu ndzɛ onɛnɛ di teyi dzɛ, ikyekyɛ abu kyi kyelu mfye mgbi abu okwulewo di wita okyuutɔ.
REV 11:18 Ɛsɛ gbeka buntse; ikyekyɛ onɔ itingga mgbi abu gyɔ. Onɔ gyɔ ogbɔ emi ikwukwɔ ikwɔ wa, odi nu engbidɔ mgbi abu ama ogbɛɛsɛ umba bɛyi emi osaan mgbi abu yi ama nsunu iyi mgbi abu mani, ama ongbungbɛ yi ama nshewo duu; odi dzili ama ndzili ɛsɛ mani.>>
REV 11:19 Ta a kwulu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi esho, man mi idzidzɛ ozu okwukwo osunun na, a di imu mgbi ondu odzɛɛdzɛ mgban. Man mmbwo naabɔ ba, imbe le kwadu, akpala le gbo, ɛsɛ le suusu, mmbwo akwutsɛ okwulewo di kya.
REV 12:1 Ambɛ okwukwo okwulewo tɔ mi esho: ongyaa kye onɔ wo ewo dafi angwuto, yi ofyia mi atafɔ mgban bɛyi okpapyi mcɛ iwyodefa mi ikye mbon.
REV 12:2 O dzɛ yi ifewo nɛ imba ogboogbo yi owulewo mgbi imba non makwɔ tɔ dafi o le mbongwɛ mani.
REV 12:3 Nɛ ambɛ oka di tɔ mi esho: ozumenyi omuma okwukwo ndzɛ yi ikye nghi egyafa yi agbe nghi iwyo bɛyi okpapyi egyafa mi ikye mbon.
REV 12:4 Odu mgban kye fyalu onyi mi ikye eta mgbi mcɛ di kye ma ngwuta luba ɛsɛ. Ozumenyi na kwulɛsɛ dzɛkiyayi ongyaa nle gblimba nani, ikyegbɛɛ ni ongwu kye ongwɛ na gye mi onɔ ngwi o mba yɔ.
REV 12:5 O mba ongwongyulɔ, nka kye ɛsɛ duu teyi yi okwuta utɔ ashashi. A kye lafwan ongwɛ lu mbi Imgbasho ka sɔkɛ itsuutɔ mgban.
REV 12:6 Ongyaa na si tsinya lu okwɛsɛ mi imbe ngwi Imgbasho mɛ dzankɛ ngwi a ka gbɛwɛbyin ofyia ngwusefa dɔn efa mani.
REV 12:7 Man ika kyɛɛ mi esho. IMaikye yi engyesɔ mgban gblika yi ozumenyi nani, ozumenyi yi engyesɔ mgban kpaa di gblika yi ama.
REV 12:8 Kpaa ozumenyi fyumfye mɛ ba, man a dzɛ yi imbe mi esho wuba.
REV 12:9 A kye andɛfɛ ozumenyi na ngwuta luba esɛ, ifa tugbe ngwi a kwun di olodu hona iSatan, nkye ɛsɛ duu wɛndɛ nani. A kyon ngwuta luba ɛsɛ yi engyesɔ mgban.
REV 12:10 Nɛ ani fwo ela okwukwo mi esho gbɛɛ: <<Onɛnɛ owatɔ-watɔ yi mfye yi esutɔ mgbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi, yi mfye mgbi iKrestu mgban ba wa. Ikyekyɛ ongwu nle du ongwufabɔ mbi emi ongwuneyi nya Imgbasho onɔ yi otu ma, a kyon ngwuta luba esɛ wa.
REV 12:11 A nghan mi eyi mgbi Ongwummala bɛyi elodzɛ mgbi ama okyɔ obwɛndɛ mani; a di oshishe mgbi ewoma kpa ma itukwu nyɛsɛ ba, nghanɛ a kye onbukwɔ nu eba.
REV 12:12 Nghanɛ ema ama nto esho tsatsa na! Kpaa ahoo mbi ɛsɛ bɛyi onekyoo, ikyekyɛ olodu lu esɛ mbi ema! O mbwo yi itingga, ikyekyɛ o ye gbɛɛ onɔ mgban le gbu ba.>>
REV 12:13 Onɔ ngwi ozumenyi difwi gbɛɛ a kye ongwu ngwuta luba ɛsɛ nɛ, o si wita olɔ ongyaa nmba ongwongyulɔ na onya.
REV 12:14 A kye asha mgbi uyɛɛ okwukwo nghi efa nu ongyaa na, ikyegbɛɛ non bulu lu okwɛsɛ mi imbe ngwi a mɛ dzɛkɛ ikyon nani, imbe ngwi a ka gbekabyin mi onova eta dɔ itsitsi, ngwi ozumenyi na ka to gbɛ ba mani.
REV 12:15 Nɛ ifa na tuyɛ eni mi ondu mgban dafi ekyoo mani lukwu ongyaa nani, ikye ni eni gben lu.
REV 12:16 Nghaduu ikpɛsɛ ya ongyaa na abɔ okwulu ondu mgban kye ekyoo ngwi ifa na tuyɛ mi ondu na mbe.
REV 12:17 Ta ozumenyi si kyitingga kpakpa yi ongyaa nani. Nghanɛ o wuta ika yi etɔ mgban ama nsisi duu. Ama nsunu ola mgbi Imgbasho di kwudzɛkɛ mi obwɛndɛ mgbi iYesu mani.
REV 12:18 Man ozumenyi na si kwudzɛkɛ mfyan mi onekyoo.
REV 13:1 Ta ozumenyi na tɔ mi ekyoo dɔkɛ mfyan. Ani di di mmbwaba tɔkyɛ onekyoo. O dzɛ yi agbe nghi iwyo bɛyi ikye egyafa, yi okpapyi iwyo mi agbe mgban ntonani, ma mi ali ikye mgban duu, o dzɛ yi iyi ofya Imgbasho ito mi ele.
REV 13:2 Mmbwaba ngwi ani di ma lu ishafwan, kpaa o dzɛ yi afɔ dafi afɔ mgbi mndi di dzɛ yi ondu itɔ mgbi ugaba mani. Ozumenyi na kye ɛnɛpɛ mgban nu mmbwaba na yi itsuutɔ bɛyi mfye okwulewo.
REV 13:3 I dzɛ dafi ikye mgbi mmbwaba na oka dzɛ yi ifwa okwukwo mi ele, nghaduu ifwa na myɛ. Nɛ i kwulu ɛsɛ duu ewo man a kyɛdɔ mmbwaba nani.
REV 13:4 Inggisɛ duu sunu ozumenyi na ikyekyɛ o kye mfye nu mmbwaba nani, a sunu mmbwaba na di byita gbɛɛ, <<Li emɛ gyɔ yi mmbwaba nɛ? Li emɛ ka kye afɔ twɛsɛ gblika yan gbɛ?>>
REV 13:5 A nu mmbwaba na ondu ogbɔ elodzɛ mgbi ewo okyile esho yi ito ofya Imgbasho, odi kyɔ mfye mgban mi egbe idubu onyi, ideli efa yi ngwuseta.
REV 13:6 O kwulu ondu ofya Imgbasho ito, di mben iyi, yi imbe ngwi o dzɛ bɛyi ama nto esho duu.
REV 13:7 A nun mfye ogblika yi emi osaan di ngha ma. A di nun mfye mi ikye ali udzɛ, inggisɛ, ondudzɛ bɛyi ɛsɛ duu.
REV 13:8 Ama ngwu a lɔ ma iyi mi afɛ mgbi Ongwummala duuse ni a ta ɛsɛ ba duu, ka sunu mmbwaba nani.
REV 13:9 Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi adɔ yɔ, no fwo.
REV 13:10 Inggisɛ ama ndzɛ gbɛɛ a ka kwu ma ofyɛɛ yɔ, li ofyɛɛ ngwi a ka kwu ma. Ama ndzɛ mbisɔ a ka ngwɔ yi okwusunkli yɔ, li mi okwusunkli ngwi a ka ngwɔ ma. Ungwɔnɛ mina onyɔtsɛ okwu-kwu yi itukwu oshiishi bɛyi okwudzɛ mi otsitsi mi ayɛ mgbi emi osaan.
REV 13:11 Nɛ ani di mmbwaba oka, tɔkyɛ ikpɛsɛ. O dzɛ yi agbe nghi efa dafi ongwummala, kpaa o gbɔdzɛ dafi ozumenyi mani.
REV 13:12 O li kyɔ ali mfye mgbi mmbwaba ongwi ababɔ na duu gbikyon, di li nu ɛsɛ yi ama nto ele duu sunu mmbwaba ongwi ababɔ, ongwu ifwa mgban okwukwo myɛ nani.
REV 13:13 O di kyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo ogbagbadzidzi, onoola tɔ mi esho ba esɛ ni inggisɛ duu di.
REV 13:14 Mi ikye ambɛ ama ngwi a nun mfye gbɛɛ non kyɔ gbikye mmbwaba ongwu ababɔ nɛ, o kpagya inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ nɛ wo. O wo ma ola gbɛɛ nu ma tuo adagyɛ ikye okye mmwɛ nu mmbwaba ongwu ma tanmmya yi okwusunkli kpa ka dzɛ oshishe nani.
REV 13:15 A nun mfye okye mmyɛ wo adagyɛ mgbi mmbwaba ongwi ababɔ nani, ikyegbɛɛ non gbɔdzɛ odi ngwɔ ama nfwa osunu adagyɛ na mani.
REV 13:16 O di si ali inggisɛ duu, ama ogyɛngyɛ yi ama oshewo, emi aludu bɛyi emi adzɛ, ama nbyabɔ ewoma bɛyi ofyɛɛ, gbɛɛ nu ma gbɛ ambɛ mi abugye hona ebeshu mgbi ama,
REV 13:17 ikyegbɛɛ ni inggisɛ onyi kpaa ka gya ungwɔ hona kye ungwɔ gya ba, sede non dzɛ yi ambɛ, ngwi li iyi mgbi mmbwaba na naadi mmbwo ngbikye iyi mgban mani.
REV 13:18 Ungwɔnɛ mina ozoyeye. Inggisɛ ndzɛ yi inɛ odiidi yɔ, no kye gbɔlu mmbwo mgbi mmbwaba ntonɛni, ikyesinɛ li ambɛ mgbi inggisɛ. Ambɛ mgban li egyin egyin egyin.
REV 14:1 Nɛ ani ndinɛ, ta mi iyayi mbi ani Ongwummala dzɛ, kwudzɛkɛ Unggwɔ iDzayɔn, ama nto biyan li ama ngwu a lɔ iyi mgban bɛyi Otsɔn mi ebeshu mboma mani.
REV 14:2 Man ani fwo adu kyɛ esho dzɛ dafi agwudu mgbi eni ofɛ-fɛ bɛyi adu mgbi akpala okwukwo. Adu ngwi ani fwo ma dzɛ dafi mgbi ama ogbla ozuna le gbla ozuna mgbi ama mani.
REV 14:3 Ta a shashi ofufɛ mi iyayi itsuutɔ yi atta owamyɛ nghi enɛ bɛyi engyukwo ntonani. Inggisɛ onyi kpaa yagba kpayi ashi ma ba, sede li inggisɛ idubu ideli onyi ngwusefa dɔn enɛ ngwu a dulu ma watɔ mi ɛsɛ ma ta.
REV 14:4 Ntonɛ li ama nmbe ewoma yi engyaa ba mani, lubana a kye ewoma dzɛ saan. A li kyɛdɔ Ongwummala ali imbe ngwi o kɛ duu. A gya ma gyaagya mi idzidzɛ inggisɛ di kye ma fifɛ nu Imgbasho bɛyi Ongwummala dafi ungwogye ofufɛ mani.
REV 14:5 A fwo onya omwaamwa mi ondu mgbi ama ye ba; a dzɛ yi obube ba.
REV 14:6 Nɛ ani di ongyesɔ oka le bulu mi esho, o dzɛ yi esɔ mgbi oshishe gyegwu ogbɔɔgbɔ ndzɛ mi ikye mgbi inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ nɛni, yi agwɔ yi ondudzɛ bɛyi ali inggisɛ duu.
REV 14:7 O gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Mio Imgbasho di kye okwɔkwɔ nun na, ikyesinɛ obyi mgban ogbiikwɔ ma gyɔ wa. Sunu ongwu nta esho yi esɛ, onekyoo bɛyi imbe eni le lu nani.>>
REV 14:8 Ongyesɔ ongwu fan kyɛdɔ di gbɛɛ, <<Angbodzi iBabyilon bulu wa, nɛnɛ li ogalu ngwi nu ɛsɛ duu fya mi amah mgban nani.>>
REV 14:9 Ongyesɔ ongwu ta kyɛdɔ ma di gbɔ mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ: <<Inggisɛ nsunu mmbwaba yi adagyɛ mgban di gbɛ ambɛ mgban mi ebeshu naadi mi abɔ yɔ,
REV 14:10 ongwu kpaa ka wa eneekwɔ itingga mgbi Imgbasho, ngwi a kye yaokɛ mi abumfye mi ibwɛ itingga mgban nani. A dika nun isɔ yi ola ofufu odaka mi inai engyesɔ osaan bɛyi inai Ongwummala.
REV 14:11 Man iwu isɔ mgbi ama ka du nghataa gyegwu. Onya dzɛma ba otu yi onɔ mbi ama nsunu mmbwaba na bɛyi adagyɛ mgban, hona mbi ali inggisɛ ngbɛ ambɛ mgbi iyi mgban duu.>>
REV 14:12 Ungwɔnɛ mina itukwu oshiishi mi ayɛ mgbi emi osaan ama nngyo ola mgbi Imgbasho di kwulɛsɛ mi otsitsi mbi iYesu mani.
REV 14:13 Nɛ ani fwo ela kyɛ esho gbɛɛ, <<Kye lɔlu ungwɔnɛni: <<Ogbumse li emi ikwukwɔ ama nkwulu mi ifu Otsɛ wita onɛnɛ nghataa lu iyayi.>> Onodzi gbela gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, a ka tonya mi idɔ mgbi ama okyɔɔkyɔ, lubana okyɔɔkyɔ mgbi ama ka kyɛdɔ ma.>>
REV 14:14 Ani ndinɛ, man akpa gbosa mi iyayi mbi ani, nɛ ongwu nsɔdzɛ mi akpa na ma li inggisɛ ndzɛ <<Dafi Ongwɛ Inggisɛ mani>> yi akata abashi mi ikye bɛyi agɛbɛ ogyigye mi abɔ mgban.
REV 14:15 Nɛ ongyesɔ oka tasɛ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho si wa inggisɛ ngwu nsɔdzɛ akpa na ela gbɛɛ, <<Kyelu agɛbɛ mgbi abu wita oshɛ, ikyekyɛ onɔ oshɛ-shɛ gyɔ, lubana etɔ mgbi ɛsɛ myɛ wa.>>
REV 14:16 Nghanɛ ongwu nsɔdzɛ akpa ma si ngwi agɛbɛ mgban mi ɛsɛ man kyi shɛlu ɛsɛ dafi etɔ mani.
REV 14:17 Ongyesɔ oka di tasɛ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi esho, ongwu kpaa di dzɛ yi agɛbɛ ogyigye.
REV 14:18 Ongyesɔ oka kpɔɔ, ongwu nle di mi ola, kyɛ mi iwashi wa wa ongwu ndzɛ yi agɛbɛ ogyigye na ela gbɛɛ, <<kyi kyelu agɛbɛ mgbi abu ogyigye na kye shɛlu awawa ekwɔ onaana mi ɛsɛ, ikyekyɛ etɔ mgban obube myɛ wa.>>
REV 14:19 Ongyesɔ na ngwi agɛbɛ mgban mi ɛsɛ man kye shɛlu awawa ekwɔ onaana obube ntonani. O gbe ma ngwuta yaokɛ ishɛ imbe ngwi a kye afɔ jiyɛ ma, otso itingga mgbi Imgbasho.
REV 14:20 Ishɛ ngwi a kye afɔ tɔdɔ ma ma dzɛ ifu ogalu ba. Nɛ eyi si fɛ tɔ mi ishɛ na shigbo mɛ o dɔ mmya onbukwɔ, fɛ lu dafi imai ideli onyi yi ngwusenɛ sini.
REV 15:1 Ani di ambɛ oka okwulewo kpakpa mi esho; engyesɔ nghi egyafa yi isɔ egyafa emi olɛlɛ, ikyekyɛ yi isɔ ntonɛ itingga mgbi Imgbasho ngyɛ.
REV 15:2 Ani di di ungwɔ ndzɛ dafi onekyoo idzinggi ngwuo yi ola, mi ele ma inggisɛ ama nngha mmbwaba na ika bɛyi adagyɛ mgban yi isɔ mgbi iyi mgban ma kwudzɛ to ele. Ali inggisɛ mgbi ama byi ozuna ngwi Imgbasho gbe nu ma mani
REV 15:3 di shashi mgbi iMose ongbidɔ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi ashi mgbi Ongwummala gbɛɛ: <<Ogbagbadzidzi bɛyi okwulewo li ungwɔ mgbi abu okyɔɔkyɔ, Otsɛ Imgbasho onghaangha. Ofɛ mgbi abu li otsitsi yi oyɛyɛ, Utɔ mgbi ɛsɛ duu.
REV 15:4 Li emɛ ka tsio abu ba, Otsɛ, di kye mmwɛ nu mi iyi mgbi abu ba? Lubana li abu yuo le saan. Ɛsɛ duu kawa sunu abu, ikyesinɛ ali mgbi abu osaan tsotɔ wa.>>
REV 15:5 Ngwi ungwɔ ntonɛ nyɛ nɛ, ani di a kye kwulu ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi esho bɛyi iTabenako Obwɛndɛ nani.
REV 15:6 Mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho na, engyesɔ egyafa tɔ yi isɔ nghi egyafa. A wo angwuto ondlɛndlɛ gbosinɛ kwɔ yi okpa abashi bwato igɛgɛ mgbi ama.
REV 15:7 Nɛ onyi mbi atta owamyɛ nghi enɛ ntona kye uga abashi egyafa nu engyesɔ egyafa ntona yi itingga mgbi Imgbasho mi ele kyɛɛ, Imgbasho ndzɛ oshishe gyegwu nɛni.
REV 15:8 Nɛ iwu mi okwɔkwɔ bɛyi mfye mgbi Imgbasho gbɛ ozu na sɔ man inggisɛ onyi kaka ele wuba nghataa isɔ egyafa mgbi engyesɔ egyafa ntona mbwumbwo.
REV 16:1 Nɛ ani fwo ela okwukwo kyɛ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho le gbɔ yi engyesɔ egyafa ntona gbɛɛ, <<Kɛ ka kye uga itingga mgbi Imgbasho egyafa ntona yangwuta mi ɛsɛ na.>>
REV 16:2 Ta ongyesɔ ongwu ababɔ kɛ ka kye uga mgban yangwuta mi ɛsɛ, man indza okpɛkpɛ yi owulewo gbɔfwɛ tɔ mbi inggisɛ ama ndzɛ yi ambɛ mgbi mmbwaba di li sunu adagyɛ mgban mani.
REV 16:3 Ongyesɔ ongwu fan kye uga mgban yangwuta mi onekyoo, man i kyata yɛɛ dafi eyi mgbi inggisɛ ikwukwɔ mani, ta ungwɔ oshishe ama nwoto onekyoo duu kwulu.
REV 16:4 Ongyesɔ ongwu ta kye uga mgban yangwuta mi ekyoo bɛyi ibu, man a yɛɛ eyi.
REV 16:5 Nɛ ani fwo ongyesɔ ongwu nle di mi eni ma gbɛɛ: <<Abu li emyɛmyɛ mi ikwɔ ntonɛni abu ndzɛ onɛnɛ di teyi dzɛ, abu Imgbasho Osaan, ikyekyɛ abu dzɛ yi mfye ogbiikwɔ mi itɔ ofɛ nɛni;
REV 16:6 lubana a dzɛ eyi mgbi emi osaan mgbi abu yi ama ogbɛɛsɛ, abu di kye eyi nu ma wa dafi i gbuo yi ama mani.>>
REV 16:7 Man ani fwo ela nu uka mi iwashi gbɛɛ: <<Ɛɛn, Otsɛ Imgbasho Odatu, ikwɔ mgbi abu li oyɛyɛ di li otsitsi.>>
REV 16:8 Ongyesɔ ongwu nɛ kye uga mgban yangwuta kyikɛ onɔ, man a nu onɔ mfye odzɛ inggisɛ ola yi otsɛɛtsɛ mgban nani.
REV 16:9 Olola nkwulewo na to ma ta a fya iyi Imgbasho ongwu nle di mi ikye isɔ ntonɛ nɛ ito, kpaa a fwa okyatitukwu di kyile iyi mgban desho.
REV 16:10 Ongyesɔ ongwu da kye uga mgban yangwuta mi itsuutɔ mgbi mmbwaba nani, ta iifu byakpa kyi gbɛlu esutɔ mgban sɔ, man isɔ nu inggisɛ wita ole la ewoma aba mi idɛ
REV 16:11 di fya Imgbasho ongwi esho ito mi ikye isɔ bɛyi indza mgbi ama nani, kpaa a fwa okyatitukwu mi ungwɔ ngwi ama pɛpɛ kyɔ mani.
REV 16:12 Ongyesɔ ongwu gyin kye uga mgban yangwuta mi ekyoo ogbagbadzidzi iYufreti nani, man eni mgban si ngwɔ ikye omɛ ofɛ mi ikye utɔ ama nkyɛ mi onosa mani.
REV 16:13 Nɛ ani di onodzi ibwubwe nghi eta nto dafi aliɔ mani; a tɔ mi ondu mgbi ozumenyi, tɔ mi ondu mgbi mmbwaba di tɔ mi ondu mgbi oyegbɔ atsika.
REV 16:14 A li onodzi emɛsɛ tole kyɔ ambɛ okwulewo, a di li tasɛ kɛ mbi emi utɔ mi ɛsɛ duu, okwu ma kwakye mi ikye egbe ika okwulewo mgbi Imgbasho onghaangha nani.
REV 16:15 Wɛ di iYesu gbɛɛ, <<Dii, ani ka ba dafi emumyi mani! Ikyese ka dzɛ yi inggisɛ nkwasisa di gbe angwuto mgban tokɛ biyan, ikye ni ongwu ka kyɛ ibiba di kye iba mgban dɛsɛ ba mani.>>
REV 16:16 Nɛ onodzi ibwubwe ntona kwu utɔ kwakye mi imbe ngwi a li kwun mi ondu iHibru gbɛɛ Amagidɔn nani.
REV 16:17 Ongyesɔ ongwu gyafa ma kye uga mgban yangwuta mi awo, man ela okwukwo tɔ mi ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho mi itsuutɔ, le gbɛɛ, <<I ngyɛ wa!>>
REV 16:18 Man mmbwo naabɔ, gbaadu, akpala gbo ɛsɛ di suusu kpakpa. Ɛsɛ osuusu onyi kpaa gyɔ yi ongwunɛ waba wita mi onɔ ngwi a ta inggisɛ nghataa ba onɛnɛni, Ɛsɛ osuusu nɛ timbi ngha duu.
REV 16:19 Ogalu okwukwo na gha ayɛ eta, ta ogalu mi ɛsɛ duu gbobu. Imgbasho wɛ Angbodzi iBabyilon man kye ibwɛ eneekwɔ itingga mgbi ongwu kye nun.
REV 16:20 Ali ibu duu tsebyulu, unggwɔ kpaa a di ma wuba.
REV 16:21 Akwutsɛ mmbwo nshe ngwi undo ma mɛ ideli onyi kyɛ esho wa le gyɛ inggisɛ. Man a nya Imgbasho agya mi ikye isɔ mmbwo akwutsɛ nani, ikyekyɛ isɔ na kwulewo kwuba.
REV 17:1 Onyi mbi engyesɔ egyafa ama ndzɛ yi uga ma ba wa gbɔ yi ani gbɛɛ, <<kwa, n ka tso abu adɔ okwookwo mgbi andɛfɛ owagbai ongyaa, nsɔdzɛ ikye eni ibyibyi nɛni.
REV 17:2 Utɔ emi ɛsɛ nɛ li kyɔ amah yan, imba mgbi ɛsɛ di li fya mi eneekwɔ amah mgban.>>
REV 17:3 Nɛ ongyesɔ na kye ani mi Onodzi lu imbe okplagada. Mmana ani di ongyaa sɔdzɛ mmbwaba omuma blɛtɛtɛ a lɔ ito ofya Imgbasho kpatsɛ ewo mbon, o di dzɛ yi ikye egyafa yi agbe iwyo.
REV 17:4 Ongyaa na mɛ ewo mi angwuto omuma vluvlu bɛyi omuma jaan hini, dile kwɔ yi abashi, ikwutsɛ onyina-nyina bɛyi ikwutsɛ okwɔkwɔ mi ifu mgbangyilole. O kye inumbɛɛ abashi ngwi ungwɔ ama okpɛkpɛ bɛyi ungwɔ ama otsiidza mgbi amah mgban woto ele ma byidzɛ abɔ.
REV 17:5 A lɔn iyi mi ebeshu gbɛɛ: ANGBODZI IBABYILON, ONƆ OWAGBAI DUU BƐYI UNGWƆ AMA OKPƐKPƐ MI ƐSƐ.
REV 17:6 Ani di dafi ongyaa na wa eyi mgbi emi osaan le fya mani, eyi mgbi ama nle kyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikye iYesu. Ngwi ani din ma i kwulu ani ewo kpakpa.
REV 17:7 Nɛ ongyesɔ na nya ani gbɛɛ: <<Kyɔsinɛ ngwi i kwulu abu ewo? N ka nu abu osa mi iba mgbi ongyaa na bɛyi mgbi mmbwaba ngwi o le tɔ, ndzɛ yi ikye egyafa bɛyi agbe iwyo nani.
REV 17:8 Mmbwaba ngwi abu di nani, teyi dzɛ, onɛnɛ o dzɛma wuba, dika wa tasɛ mi ikplishɛ di lu mi odzili-dzili mgban. Ka kwulu inggisɛ ama nto ɛsɛ, ama a teyi lɔ ma iyi mi afɛ mgbi oshishe ba kyɛ mi onɔ ngwi a ta ɛsɛ ma ewo, mi onɔ ngwi abu di mmbwaba nani, ikyekyɛ o teyi dzɛ, onɛnɛ o dzɛma wuba, nghaduu o dika waba.
REV 17:9 Ungwɔnɛ mina ozoyeye. Ikye egyafa ntonɛ li unggwɔ egyafa ngwi ongyaa na sɔdzɛ efu ntonani.
REV 17:10 A di li utɔ nghi egyafa. Eda toma wuba, onyi kale kyuutɔ ma, oka ma ba wa ba; kpaa non wa ba yɔ, li kyɛmɛ ngwi o ka kyuutɔ mi ongwonɔ gwee ta.
REV 17:11 Mmbwaba nteyi dzɛ, kpaa onɛnɛ o dzɛma wuba na, li utɔ ongwu gyata. O dzɛ dafi egyafa ntonani, kpaa o le ba ikye ni a wa dzilin kyoon.
REV 17:12 Agbe iwyo ngwi abu di na li utɔ nghi iwyo ama ntu esutɔ waba, ama nkawa gbɛ mfye dafi utɔ ononyi yi mmbwaba na di kyuutɔ mi ongwonɔ gwee mani.
REV 17:13 Oweka mgbi ama li ungwonyi, a dika kye owekwo bɛyi mfye mgbi ama nu mmbwaba nani.
REV 17:14 A ka gblika yi Ongwummala, kpaa Ongwummala ka ngha ma ikyekyɛ o li Otsɛ mgbi emi otsɛ di li Utɔ mgbi emi utɔ, ama ndi kyɛ yi Ongwummala ma, li ama ngwu a kwu ma ela kwu-kwu, sadu-sadu ma, a di li ama nkwudzɛ mi otsitsi.>>
REV 17:15 Nɛ ongyesɔ na nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Eni ama ngwi abu di ngwi owagbai ongyaa sɔdzɛ ele ntona, li inggisɛ, ibyi inggisɛ, agwɔ bɛyi ondudzɛ.
REV 17:16 Mmbwaba bɛyi agbe iwyo ngwi abu di na, ka di owagbai ongyaa na tanyi. A ka non yɛɛ abubɔ di non dzɛ ibiba; a ka gyon ikpewo di kyon toola.
REV 17:17 Lubana li Imgbasho nu utɔ ntonɛ duu tsɛwodzɛ ungwonyi di gbela kye mfye mgbi ama nu mmbwaba nani. A dika kyungwɔnɛ nghataa elodzɛ ngwi Imgbasho gbɔ ma ka mbwumbwo.
REV 17:18 Ongyaa ngwu abu di na li ongbodzi ogalu nle di mbi ali utɔ mi ɛsɛ duu.>>
REV 18:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ ani di ongyesɔ oka kyɛ esho le ba esɛ. O dzɛ yi mfye okwulewo, man okwɔkwɔ mgban nu ɛsɛ gbosa.
REV 18:2 O feela mi ela okwukwo gbɛɛ: <<Oblu-blu! Oblu-blu li Angbodzi iBabyilon! O yɛɛ udɛ emɛsɛ bɛyi imbe mgbi ali onodzi ibwubwe bɛyi imbe mgbi ingwunɔ ama ntsiidza di kyilitukwu.
REV 18:3 Ikyesinɛ ɛsɛ ama okwukwo tsatsadu wa fyɛbyɛ amah mgban. Utɔ emi ɛsɛ nɛ kyɔ amah biyan, man ama okyummya mi ɛsɛ nɛ yɛɛ emi aludu mi ikye imina mgban obube nani.>>
REV 18:4 Nɛta ani fwo ela oka kyɛ esho gbɛɛ: <<Tasɛ mbon na, emidani, ikye ni ema ka waabɔ mi ali ibwubwe mgban na ba, adzi ni ema ka wo isɔ nka ba mbon ntona ba mani;
REV 18:5 lubana ali ibwubwe mgban kwutokɛ shigbo to esho, Imgbasho di wɛ ungwɔ ibwubwe mgban.
REV 18:6 Nun dafi o teyi nu abu mani; kpan mkpa dudɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi o teyi kyɔ mani. Yawon ungwɔ owaawa mi ibwɛ no dzɛ mgban ma wo.
REV 18:7 Nun isɔ yi owulewo kpakpa dafi o nu ewon okwɔkwɔ bɛyi oshishe omyɛɛ-myɛɛ mani. Ikyesinɛ mi itukwu mgban o tsaabɔ igɛgɛ gbɛɛ, <Mmɛnɛ ani sɔdzɛ dafi Apodza mani; ani li owakwadɛ ba, ani dika kye abɔ tiko kpaa ba.>
REV 18:8 Ikyenghanɛ, isɔ ka gban sɔ: ikwongye yi abɔ otiko yi ootse yi owulewo bɛyi onenbwa omba enbwa ka ba mbon mi egbe onyi. Ola ka kyon gye, lubana Otsɛ Imgbasho ogbɔn ikwɔ ma datu.
REV 18:9 Onɔ ngwi utɔ emi ɛsɛ nɛ ama nkyɔ amah biyan di kyɔ oyabɔ mi omyɛɛ-myɛɛ mgban di iwu mgbi ola ogyeegye mgban yɔ, a ka tsukwu di kye abɔ tiko ikyon.
REV 18:10 Isɔ mgban ka wo ma imio, man a ka kwudzɛ fyata le gbɛɛ: << <Aho! Aho, ogalu ogbagbadzidzi, Eye iBabyilon, ogalu mfye! Mi obyi onyi ta Imgbasho fwo abu ikwɔ waana!>
REV 18:11 Ama okyummya mi ɛsɛ nɛ ka tsukwu di kyelela ikyon, ikyekyɛ inggisɛ onyi le gya ma okye wuba
REV 18:12 okye abashi yi iyudza onzundzɛ okwɔkwɔ yi akwutsɛ osunse mi ifu mgbangyilole bɛyi akwutsɛ itagwude; angwuto ondlɛndlɛ, angwuto omuma shinishini yi angwuto ovelevele yi angwuto omuma jaan; ali itɔ afutse ama ogbungbɛ bɛyi ali itɔ idabɔ ngwi a kyɔ mi ɛvɛ mnii duu yi ekwɔ ama ofyumfye mmya yi itigbla yi iyudza bɛyi ikwutsɛ osunse;
REV 18:13 okye akwukwu mgbɛ, mgbi otse ogɛ iwu, engyie ofyunfyummya ogbungbɛ bɛyi ofufu otse otoola, eneekwɔ bɛyi engyie olivi, ofumbu osuse bɛyi alakama; mnda yi mmala; mmya yi ungwɔ ogbe okye sha ma; yi emi ofyɛɛ.
REV 18:14 <<A ka gbɛɛ, <Ungwɔ osuse nmina abu otu duu ma lu dzɛ abu ta wa. Aludu bɛyi okwɔkwɔ mgbi abu duu byulu, o ka yɛ tu ma wuba.>
REV 18:15 Ama okyummya ungwɔ ntonɛ nɛ, ntu aludu mbon ma ka kwudzɛ fyata, yi imio ewo mi isɔ mgban ogyeegye. A ka tsukwu di kyelela
REV 18:16 di kwu-ela tɔ gbɛɛ: << <Aho! Aho, angbodzi ogalu, nmewo mi angwuto ondlɛndlɛ, angwuto omuma shinishini bɛyi omuma jaan, dile kwɔ yi abashi, akwutsɛ osunse yi akwutsɛ osunse mi ifu mgbangyilole!
REV 18:17 Mi ongwonɔ gwee nɛta, onikyɔ aludu mgbi ogalu nɛ bulu ngyɛ!> <<Ali inggisɛ ama ofa iwudza eni, yi ama odzagaba mi iwudza eni duu, yi ama okyidɔ mi iwudza eni, yi ama okyummya nyɛ ongwi onikyekyoo duu, ka dzɛkɛ mbotunto mbyoo.
REV 18:18 Ni a wa di iwu oduudu mgbi ogyola-gyola mgban ma, a ka gbobakwɔ gbɛɛ, <Ogalu oka teyi dzɛma dafi ongbodzi ogalu nɛ jo?>
REV 18:19 A ka gbe abɔ dikye, le tsukwu di kyelela gbɛɛ: << <Aho! Aho, ongbodzi ogalu, imbe ngwi ama ndzɛ yi iwudza eni mi ekyoo okwukwo duu yɛɛ emi awuya ikpewo aludu mgban! Mi ongwonɔ gwee ta, o bulu waana!
REV 18:20 Flinɛ won na, emi esho! Tsookwa won na, emi osaan yi ama ogbikye iYesu bɛyi ama ogbɛɛsɛ! Imgbasho fwon ikwɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi o kyɔ yi ema ma wa.> >>
REV 18:21 Nɛ angbodzi ongyesɔ kyi kyelu ofishi nshe dafi onikwɔɔ okpinangwɔ mani kye ngwuta wokɛ ekyoo okwukwo, si gbɛɛ: <<Yi itɔ abumfye nani a ka kye angbodzi ogalu iBabyilon ngwuta lu esɛ, a ka din wuba.
REV 18:22 A ka fwo ela ozuna bɛyi ungwɔ ogboogbo, yi oca ofoofo bɛyi agba ofoofo, mbi abu wuba. A ka tu inggisɛ idabɔ onyi mbi abu wuba. Ela inangwɔ okpaakpa ka dede mbi abu.
REV 18:23 Osa ipitila ka tsotɔ mbi abu wuba. A ka fwo ela obongyaa ofufɛ bɛyi ongyaa ofufɛ mbi abu wuba. Ikyekyɛ ama okyummya mgbi abu nose ngha mi ɛsɛ duu. O nu ɛsɛ duu boofɛ mi obudei mgbi abu.
REV 18:24 A tu eyi mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ yi emi osaan, bɛyi inggisɛ ngwu a ngwɔ mi ɛsɛ duu mbon.>>
REV 19:1 Ngwi ungwɔnɛ wa nyɛ nɛ, ani fwo ungwɔ dafi agwudu otsɛɛtsɛ mgbi ibyi inggisɛ mi esho le wulu gbɛɛ: <<Tsɛ Imgbasho! Owatɔ-watɔ yi okwɔkwɔ bɛyi mfye li mgbi Imgbasho mgbi eyi,
REV 19:2 ikyesinɛ ikwɔ mgban li otsitsi di li ayin. Lubana o ngwɔ angbodzi owagbai ongyaa ongwu nkye ɛsɛ kyi mbee yi amah mgban ogboogbo na ikwɔ. Imgbasho yile mkpa kpan ikyekyɛ o ngwɔ engbidɔ mgban.>>
REV 19:3 A diyɛ wulu gbɛɛ: <<Tsɛ Imgbasho! Iwu ntɔ mbon na lu esho gyegwu-gyegwu.>>
REV 19:4 Engyukwo osudenɛ bɛyi atta owamyɛ nghi enɛ lakɛ esɛ di sunu Imgbasho, nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ nani. A gbɛɛ: <<No dzɛ ngha, Tsɛ Imgbasho!>>
REV 19:5 Nɛ ela tɔ mi itsuutɔ na, le gbɛɛ: <<Tsɛ Imgbasho mgbi eyi, ema engbidɔ mgban duu, ema nli mion, wita mbi ama oyɛyikpa nghataa lu mbi ama onghaangha duu!>>
REV 19:6 Nɛ ani fwo ungwɔ dafi agwudu mgbi ibyi inggisɛ, dafi okadu-kadu mgbi eni bɛyi onikyɔ akpala, le wulu gbɛɛ: <<Tsɛ Imgbasho! Ikyesinɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho mgbi eyi Onghaangha li utɔ.
REV 19:7 Ni eyi tsatsa di shɛ ewo ta di nun mmwɛ! Ikyekyɛ eba okwokyiikwokyi mgbi Ongwummala gyɔ wa, ongyaa ofufɛ mgban ma wewo dzɛ le fɛ-fɛ.
REV 19:8 A kye angwuto ondlɛndlɛ, nkwɔkwɔ di gbosinɛ, kye nun gbɛɛ no kyi wo.>> (Angwuto ondlɛndlɛ nɛ, li ambɛ mgbi ali osaan mgbi emi osaan.)
REV 19:9 Nɛ ongyesɔ na nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Lɔ gbɛɛ: <Ogbumse li ama ngwu a bɔɔ ma oga ongwi onɔdɛ mgbi eba okwokyiikwokyi mgbi Ongwummala mani!> >> O di kiyayi gbɛɛ, <<Ntonɛ li elodzɛ otsitsi mgbi Imgbasho aani.>>
REV 19:10 Mi odzɛ nɛ, ani gbɛsɛ lankɛ iyayi ikye osu nun. Kpaa o nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Ka kyɔ ngha ba! Ani kpaa li ongbidɔ ungwonyi yi abu bɛyi engwunabu ama nkyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ikye oyɛyɛ mgbi ama mbi iYesu mani. Sunu Imgbasho! Lubana itɔdzɛ mgbi oyegbɔ yɔ, li onu obwɛndɛ ngbosa mi ikye iYesu.>>
REV 19:11 Ta ani di esho kwulu ladzɛ man mmya onzundzɛ kwudzɛ mi iyayi mgbi ani, ongye otɔn ma a kwun gbɛɛ Oyɛyɛ bɛyi Otsitsi. Yi emyɛmyɛ o li gbiikwɔ di gblika.
REV 19:12 Inɛ mgban dzɛ dafi ola onaabɔ mani, okpapyi dile kwuba mi ikye mgban. A lɔn iyi mi ewo ngwi inggisɛ onyi kpaa ye ba li ongwu yuon ta.
REV 19:13 O meewo mi angwuto ngwi a kye tswokɛ eyi, ma iyi mgban li Elodzɛ Imgbasho.
REV 19:14 Oblakwutsɛ emi esho le kyɛdɔn, le tɔ mmya onzundzɛ di wo angwuto onzundzɛ, ondlɛndlɛ gbosinɛ.
REV 19:15 Okwusunkli ogyigye ngwi o ka kye kwɔdzɛ ɛsɛ tɔ mi ondu mbon. <<O ka kye ma teyi yi okwuta utɔ ashashi.>> O ka nu itingga okwulewo mgbi Imgbasho Onghaangha tɔ, dafi a kye afɔ jiyɛ awawa ekwɔ ni eni tɔ mi ele nɛni.
REV 19:16 A lɔ iyi dɔdzɛ angwuto mi oba agya ita mgban gbɛɛ: Utɔ mgbi emi utɔ bɛyi Otsɛ mgbi emi otsɛ,
REV 19:17 Nɛ ani di ongyesɔ kwudzɛ onɔ, o kwu ingwunɔ ama nle bulu mi esho duu ela okwukwo gbɛɛ, <<Ba wa kwakye yi eka mi onikyɔ oga ongwi onɔdɛ mgbi Imgbasho nɛ na.
REV 19:18 Ba na adzi ni ema gye mmbwɛ mgbi emi utɔ yi emi agyegika yi emi angbodzi inggisɛ yi mmbwɛ mmya yi ama otɔ ma yi mmbwɛ mgbi ali inggisɛ duu, ama nbyi abɔ ewoma yi ofyɛɛ yi ama oyɛyikpa bɛyi ama olɔngbɔ duu.>>
REV 19:19 Nɛta ani di mmbwaba na bɛyi utɔ emi ɛsɛ nɛ yi ama oblakwutsɛ mgbi ama kwakye yi eka ikye ogblika yi inggisɛ otɔ mmya na bɛyi obyi oblakwutsɛ mgban.
REV 19:20 Kpaa a kyi bwalu mmbwaba nani, bɛyi ama ogbɛɛsɛ atsika ama nkyɔ ambɛ ama okwulewo ikye mgban mani. Yi ambɛ okwulewo ntonɛ, o kpagya ama ngbɛ ambɛ mgbi mmbwaba di sunu adagyɛ mgban ma wo. Ama efa duu, a gbe ma ngwuta wokɛ utɔ mgbi udola nle gbɛ yi ofufu odaka mi ele.
REV 19:21 Ama nsisi ma a ngwɔ ma mi okwusunkli ntɔ mi ondu mgbi ongwu nle tɔ mmya mani, man ingwunɔ duu kwakye gye ikwɔ mgbi ama di kwoolo.
REV 20:1 Ta ani di ongyesɔ tɔkyɛ esho le ba esɛ, byi ungwɔ okwulu ikplishɛ di byi itse okwulewo mi abɔ mgban.
REV 20:2 O kyi bwalu ozumenyi, ifa tugbe nani, ongwu a li kwun di olodu, naadi iSatan nani, di tan itse mi onova idubu onyi.
REV 20:3 O kyon ngwuta wokɛ ikplishɛ nani, kye tukwulu di kyi kwobɛ ikye otukwun ofɛ ole kpagya ɛsɛ wo nghataa ni onova idubu onyi na wa ngyɛ se. Ni ungwɔ na wa nyɛ yɔ, li kyɛmɛ a kawa dulun mi itse mi ongwonɔ gwee.
REV 20:4 Ani di itsuutɔ, ama nsɔto ele ma li ama ngwu a nu ma mfye gbɛɛ nu ma gbiikwɔ. Ani diyɛ di oshishe mgbi ama ngwu a dzɛ ma ikye mi ikye obwɛndɛ mgbi ama mi odzɛ iYesu bɛyi ikye elodzimgbasho. A sunu mmbwaba na naadi adagyɛ mgban ba, a di gbɛ ambɛ mgban mi ebeshu hona mi abɔ mgbi ama ba. A yɛ wa dzɛ oshishe di kyuutɔ yi iKrestu mi onova idubu onyi.
REV 20:5 (Emi ikwukwɔ angbeka nsisi duu kyɛɛ mi ikwu ba nghataa onova idubu onyi na ngyɛ.) Nɛnɛ li okyɛɛ-kyɛɛ mi ikwu ongwi ababɔ mani.
REV 20:6 Ikyese bɛyi osaan dzɛ yi inggisɛ ama nwodzɛ mbi ama nkyɛɛ mi ikwu ongwi ababɔ nani. Ikwongye ongwu fan dzɛ yi mfye ikye ma ba, a ka li ama ofifɛ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi mgbi iKrestu dika kyuutɔ biyan mi onova idubu onyi.
REV 20:7 Ni onova idubu onyi na wa ngyɛ yɔ, a ka shɛ iSatan adi mi obawi.
REV 20:8 Ta o ka tɔ lu oka kpagya ɛsɛ ngwi a kwu ma di iGogu bɛyi iMagogu wo mi ayɛsɛ enɛ ntonɛni, ikye okwu ma kwakye gblika. A mbwo dafi mfyian mi onekyoo mani.
REV 20:9 A gbɔfwɛ kpatsɛ ɛsɛ di lawo imbe emidi Imgbasho lato bɛyi ogalu nkpan itukwu nani. Nghaduu ola kyɛ esho ba esɛ wa kye ma gye.
REV 20:10 Ta olodu, nkpagya ma wo ma, a kyon ngwuta wokɛ utɔ ola nle gbɛ yi ofufu odaka, imbe ngwi a teyi kye mmbwaba na bɛyi oyegbɔ atsika ngwuta wokɛ nani. A kale nu ma isɔ otu yi onɔ nghataa gyegwu.
REV 20:11 Nɛ ani di itsuutɔ onzundzɛ nshewo yi ongwu nsɔdzɛ ele mani. Ɛsɛ yi akpesho tse dzata imbe ngwi o dzɛ mani, nghaduu imbe dzɛma ngwi a ka kɛ ba.
REV 20:12 Ani di di emi ikwukwɔ, ama nshewo bɛyi ama ogyɛngyɛ, kwudzɛ to inai itsuutɔ nani, ta a si kwulu afɛ kwuba. A kwulu afɛ oka, nli afɛ mgbi oshishe nani. A gbɔ emi ikwukwɔ ikwɔ mi ungwɔ ngwi a kyɔ ngwi a di lɔn mi afɛ ntona mani.
REV 20:13 Ekyoo okwukwo gbe emi ikwukwɔ ama nwoto mbon nu, ikwongye bɛyi endzi kpaa gbe emi ikwukwɔ nto mboma ma nu, man a gbɔ ali inggisɛ ikwɔ mi odzɛɛdzɛ ungwɔ ngwi otsungwɔn kyɔ mani.
REV 20:14 Nɛ a kye ikwongye bɛyi endzi ngwuta wokɛ utɔ ola. Utɔ ola nɛ li ikwongye ongwu fan mani.
REV 20:15 Inggisɛ ta ngwu a lɔn iyi mi afɛ mgbi oshishe bayɔ, a kyon ngwuta wokɛ utɔ ola nani.
REV 21:1 Ani di di esho ofufɛ yi ɛsɛ ofufɛ, lubana esho ongwi ababɔ bɛyi ɛsɛ ongwi ababɔ nyɛ wa, ekyoo okwukwo kpaa di dzɛma wuba.
REV 21:2 Ani di Ogalu Osaan, iJerosalin ofufɛ nani, tɔ mbi Imgbasho kyɛ esho le ba esɛ, a man dafi ongyaa ofufɛ ngwu meewo sunse saan mi ikye oban mani.
REV 21:3 Man ani fwo ela okwukwo kyɛ mi itsuutɔ na gbɛɛ, <<Onɛnɛ osɔɔsɔ mgbi Imgbasho dzɛ yi inggisɛ, o dika dzɛ yi ama. A ka li emidan, Imgbasho abuon ka dzɛ yi ama dika li Imgbasho mgbi ama.
REV 21:4 O ka kyi fwɔlu ma etse mi inɛ duu. Ikwongye ka dzɛma wuba naadi elela okyɔɔkyɔ hona akwɔ omaama naadi owulu-wulu, ikyesinɛ ungwɔ ama ogbugbe nyɛ wa.>>
REV 21:5 Ongwu nsɔdzɛ itsuutɔ ma gbɛɛ, <<N le nu alungwɔ duu yɛɛ ofufɛ!>> Ta o gbɛɛ, <<Kyi lɔlu ungwɔnɛ wokɛ esɛ, ikyekyɛ elodzɛ ntonɛ li elodzɛ ogbekabyi ele, a di li otsitsi kpaa.>>
REV 21:6 O nya ani gbɛɛ: <<I ngyɛ wa. Ani li Ababɔ yi Olɛlɛ, Owita-wita bɛyi Ongyɛɛngyɛ. Ali inggisɛ ngwu ekweni kwun duu, n ka nun eni mi ibu, eni oshishe non wa ayayi.
REV 21:7 Inggisɛ ngwu ngha yɔ, ka gyokwudɛ ungwɔnɛni, ani ka li Imgbasho mgban o dika li ongwani.
REV 21:8 Kpaa ama omio yi ama onoyɛyɛ ba yi ama ngbe abɔ wo idza yi ama ongwɔ inggisɛ yi ama okyɔ amah yi ama okyɔ obudei yi emi angwula bɛyi ama omwonya duu, imbe mgbi ama ka li mi utɔ ofufu odaka ogbɛ-gbɛ. Nɛnɛ li ikwongye ongwu fan waani.>>
REV 21:9 Nɛ onyi mbi engyesɔ egyafa ama ndzɛ yi uga nmbwo yi isɔ ongwi olɛlɛ egyafa ntona ba wa nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Kwa, n ka tso abu ongyaa ofufɛ, owa Ongwummala mani.>>
REV 21:10 Ta Onodzi kye ani teyi lu mi unggwɔ okwukwo oshigbo, si tso ani Ogalu Osaan, iJerosalin, tɔkyɛ mbi Imgbasho mi esho le ba esɛ.
REV 21:11 I kwɔ yi okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho, ma okwɔkwɔ mgban dzɛ dafi mgbi ashua owo onbukwɔ, dafi ikwutsɛ onyina-nyina, gbosa saan dafi idzinggi nle dzɛ nyina-nyina mani.
REV 21:12 Dzɛ yi oka ogbagbadzidzi, nshigbo yi onufɛ ogalu nghi iwyodefa, bɛyi engyesɔ iwyodefa le ngyo onufɛ ogalu ntonani. Mi onufɛ ogalu ntona, a lɔ iyi agwɔ mgbi emi iSrai iwyodefa ntonɛ onyonyi mi ali onufɛ duu.
REV 21:13 Onufɛ ogalu li nghi eta mi onosa yi eta mi aca yi eta mi agwudu bɛyi eta mi onɔdɛ.
REV 21:14 Ikpishi mgbi ogalu na dzɛ yi akwutsɛ nghi iwyodefa ngwi a wo itozu mi ele, mi ali ikwutsɛ itozu na, a lɔ iyi mgbi ama ogbikye Ongwummala iwyodefa ntona onyonyi mi ele.
REV 21:15 Ongyesɔ ngbɔdzɛ yi ani ma dzɛ yi agida abashi omba ungwɔ ikye omba ogalu nani, yi onufɛ mgban bɛyi ewishi mgban.
REV 21:16 A mbɛ ogalu na dafi ayɛ enɛ mani, dafi ngwi i tunto ma, li ngha ngwi i tsɛɛ kpaa aali. O mba ogalu yi okwuta na si difwi gbɛɛ di li imai idubu onyi yi ideli enɛ mi unto, i tsɛɛ di shigbo kpaa ngha.
REV 21:17 O kye mbalu ikpishi mgban man i shigbo dafi okwubɔ ideli onyi ngwusefa dɔn enɛ mi ombaamba mgbi inggisɛ owamyɛ, ngwi ongyesɔ na le kyidɔ ele mani.
REV 21:18 A mbɛ ikpishi na gbosa dafi ikwutsɛ onyina-nyina, bɛkɛ yi ogalu abashi kyoon, gbosa dafi idzinggi mani.
REV 21:19 A mɛ ita ikpishi mgbi ogalu na ingwinda yi ali itɔ ikwutsɛ osunse duu. Ita ongwi ababɔ li ikwutsɛ onyina-nyina, ongwu fan li onbyinbyi vluvlu, ongwu ta li onzundzɛ puu, ongwu nɛ li enotse indrakpakpa otsururu,
REV 21:20 ongwu da li akpalɔ opuu, ongwu gyin li akpalɔ ogloglo, ongwu gyafa li indrakpakpa onyina-nyina, ongwu gyata li enotse ama nkwakye nyina-nyina, ongwu gyanɛ li enotse ndigyɔ nyina-nyina, ongwu iwyo li indrakpakpa odzakpakpa, ongwu iwyodonyi li ayakwule onzundzɛ, ongwu iwyodefa li omuma vluvlu.
REV 21:21 A mɛ onufɛ ogalu iwyodefa ntona mi enotse mgbangyilole, ali onufɛ duu a man mi mgbangyilole onyi. A mɛ onɔɔfɛ mi ogalu na mi abashi kyoon, gbosa le dzɛ dafi idzinggi mani.
REV 21:22 Ani di ozu okwukwo osunu Imgbasho onyi mi ogalu na ba, ikyekyɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho onghaangha bɛyi Ongwummala li ozu okwukwo mgban.
REV 21:23 Ogalu na mina onɔ naadi ofyia gbɛɛ no tsɛ hona fyia mi ele ba, lubana okwɔkwɔ mgbi Imgbasho li nun osa, Ongwummala di li ipitila mgban.
REV 21:24 Ɛsɛ ka kyikyɛ mi osa mgban, utɔ emi ɛsɛ dika gbe okwɔkwɔ mgbi ama ba ele.
REV 21:25 Egbe onyi kpaa a ka yile onufɛ ogalu mgban tukwu ba, ikyekyɛ otu ka dzɛ imbe na ba.
REV 21:26 Ɛsɛ duu ka gbe okwɔkwɔ yi mmwɛ mgbi ama ba ele.
REV 21:27 Akponyi kpaa ungwɔ okpɛkpɛ ka kaka ele naadi inggisɛ nkyungwɔ ayiwi hona ungwɔ onya ba. Nghaduu li ama a lɔ ma iyi mi afɛ oshishe mgbi Ongwummala ma ta ka kaka ele.
REV 22:1 Nɛ ongyesɔ ma tso ani ekyoo mgbi eni oshishe, gbosa dafi idzinggi mani, le fɛ kyɛ mi itsuutɔ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi mgbi Ongwummala
REV 22:2 nyɛ lu idzidzɛ angbodzi ingɔfɛ mgbi ogalu nani. Mi ali ayɛ mgbi ekyoo na ekwɔ mgbi oshishe kwodzɛ ele, nli wa owawa ita iwyodefa, di li wa owawa mgban ali ofyia du. Afɛ mgbi ekwɔ na di dzɛ mi ikye ongyɛlu ɛsɛ ootse.
REV 22:3 Ikamba onyi ka dzɛ ogalu na wuba. Itsuutɔ mgbi Imgbasho bɛyi Ongwummala ka dzɛ mi ogalu nani, engbidɔ mgban dika sunun.
REV 22:4 A ka di inɛ mgban, ma iyi mgban ka dɔ ebeshu mgbi ama.
REV 22:5 Otu ka dzɛma wuba. A ka mina osa mgbi ipitila hona mgbi onɔ wuba, ikyesinɛ Otsɛ Imgbasho ka nu ma osa. A dika kyuutɔ nghataa gyegwu.
REV 22:6 Ongyesɔ ma nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Elodzɛ ntonɛ li elodzimɔ di li otsitsi. Otsɛ, Imgbasho mgbi onodzi mgbi ama ogbɛɛsɛ, dɔ ongyesɔ mgban gbɛɛ no kwulu iba tso engbidɔ mgban ungwɔ ama nka kyɔ dzikan-dzikan kyɛmɛ mani.>>
REV 22:7 <<Wɛ gbɛɛ, Ani yɛ kyɛma dzikan-dzikan! Ikyese no dzɛ yi inggisɛ ngwu ngyo elodzɛ ama nto afɛ nɛ mani.>>
REV 22:8 Ani, iJɔn, li ani fwo di di ungwɔ ntonɛ aani. Onɔ ngwi ani fwo di di ma ma, ani lakɛ esɛ mi iyayi ongyesɔ ongwu nkye ungwɔ ntonɛ le tso ani ma ikye osunun.
REV 22:9 Nghaduu o nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Ka kyɔ ngha ba! Ani kpaa li ongbidɔ ungwonyi yi abu yi ama ogbɛɛsɛ bɛyi ali inggisɛ ngwu ngyo elodzɛ mgbi afɛ nɛ duu. Sunu Imgbasho yuon!>>
REV 22:10 Nɛ o nya ani gbɛɛ, <<Ka kye elodzɛ ngwi a yegbɔ mi afɛ nɛ nɛ da ba, ikyekyɛ onɔ ma dzɛ kwɛkwɛ.
REV 22:11 Inggisɛ okyɔ obube no kiyayi okyɔ obube, ongwu itukwu le kplɛkplɛ no kiyayi odzɛ yi itukwu kplɛkplɛ. Nghaduu inggisɛ ama okyɔ osuse ka kiyayi okyungwɔ osuse, inggisɛ ndile saan no kiyayi ole saan.>>
REV 22:12 <<Dii, ani yɛ kyɛma dzikan-dzikan! Umba mgbi ani dzɛ yi ani, n dika kye nu ali inggisɛ mi odzɛɛdzɛ ungwɔ ngwi otsungwɔn kyɔ mani.
REV 22:13 Ani li Owita-wita yi Ongyɛɛngyɛ, Ababɔ yi Olɛlɛ, Otiita yi Odondu.
REV 22:14 <<Mse no bɛ ama nkyi salu angwuto mgbi ama, ikyegbɛɛ nu ma wa tu ofɛ ogye ekwɔ mgbi oshishe di tu ofɛ onyɛ mi onufɛ lu ifu ogalu na ewo.
REV 22:15 Ama nto ogalu mi esɛ ma, li obwe yi ama okyɔ obudei yi amah ibwubwe yi ama ogbɔngwɔ inggisɛ yi ama ola angwula bɛyi ama ngwu onya omwaamwa kpa ma di li kyungwɔ ama ntishi ba mani.
REV 22:16 <<Ani, iYesu, dɔ ongyesɔ mgbi ani esɔ ikye okye obwɛndɛ nɛ nu ema mi ikye okwakye mgbi ama onoyɛyɛ. Ani li akpa yi etɔ mgbi iDevedi, di li oshɛbɛ ongwi ikyegbe nani.>>
REV 22:17 Onodzi bɛyi ongyaa ofufɛ gbɛɛ, <<Kwa!>> Ma ali inggisɛ nfwo odzɛ nɛ no gbɛɛ, <<Kwa!>> Ali inggisɛ ngwu ekweni dɔn, no ba; inggisɛ ndi mina, no gbɛ umba mgbi eni oshishe ayayi.
REV 22:18 Ani iJɔn kwo ali inggisɛ nfwo elodzɛ ngwi a yegbɔ mi afɛ nɛ adɔ: Ni inggisɛ ta mbwo ungwɔ mi ele, Imgbasho ka mbwo otsungwɔn isɔ ngwi a lɔ mi afɛ nɛni.
REV 22:19 Ma inggisɛ ta ndi mwa elodzɛ mi afɛ ngwi a yegbɔ nɛ ngwuta, Imgbasho ka kyi kyelu ayɛ umba mgbi ekwɔ mgbi oshishe bɛyi ogalu osaan mgban, ngwi a lɔ ma mi afɛ nɛ mbon.
REV 22:20 Ongwu nkyɔ obwɛndɛ mi ungwɔ ntonɛ ma gbɛɛ, <<Ɛɛn, ani yɛ kyɛma dzikan-dzikan.>> No dzɛ ngha. Ba, Otsɛ iYesu.
REV 22:21 Elela mgbi Otsɛ iYesu no dzɛ yi emi ongwɛ Imgbasho duu.
